
1a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs/ /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
1b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma la gus de rjes gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje la/ /rang 'od yan lag 'dus pa
1b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba rgyas pa gzhan gyi don 'jug pa/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag /zhal gsum 'jigs pa'i 'jigs
1b4(rgyud 'grel): byed la ni spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshin rje gshed nag sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rang nyid rig pa mngon 'dod pa'i/ /dbang la sogs pa
2a1(rgyud 'grel): thob pa nyid/ /de yi 'di ni sgrub thabs rim/ /byis rnams bde bar rtogs phyir dang/ /mnyam pa dran par bya ched
2a2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mchog rnams byis pa'i ngag la ni/ /mgu bya'i phyir ni rnam par bri/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ldan/ /sems
2a3(rgyud 'grel): can don la ro gcig blo/ /byams sogs yon tan yang dag rdzogs/ /dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan/ /tho rangs snying rje'i bdag
2a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid can/ /dang por gdong sogs khrus byas nas/ /dben pa'i sa phyogs dur khrod sogs/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /
2b1(rgyud 'grel): brtsam bya rang snying pad+ma ste/ /zla ba la blta shin tu gsal/ /ya yig sngon po'i 'od zer can/ /sems can don ni phun tshogs byas/ /bla ma rdzogs pa'i sangs
2b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams/ /nam mkha' ma lus khyab par bsgom/ /de rnams dmigs la phyag byas nas/ /lus sbrul ba yi cho ga yis/ /sems ma la sogs kyis
2b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas/ /sdig pa bshags pa'o/ /lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa bgyis/ /de bzhin bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /mgon po rjes su yi rang gang/ /de gsum
2b4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de sras 'phags/ /bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang dam chos
2b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ /tshogs kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi/ /yon tan rgya chen khyed cag la/ /bdag gis lus ni dbul bar bgyi/ /dam pa'i chos ni thams cad
3a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ston pa'i sgra mdzes gnas gyur cig /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /sbyin sogs las kyi ngo bo la/ /sku gsung ye shes thob bya'i
3a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /rab tu gus pas gnas par bgyi/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang zhig bsod nams tshogs bsags
3a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed gyur nas/ /'gro la phan pa bdag byed cing/ /'di ltar smon lam btab nas ni/ /de nas blo
3a4(rgyud 'grel): yis gshegs su gsol/ /snying rjes cho ga bzhin bltas nas/ /sna tshogs stong pa'i rnam par bsgom/ /rang bzhin rnams dang bral ba'i phyir/ /rgyu yang
3a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med par bsgom/ /spyod dang bral ba nyid kyis ni/ /smon pa dag ni rnam par spangs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko haM/ de la sems ni brtan
3b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /oM yig las byung nyi ma las/ /der ni hUM yig sngon po'i mdangs/ /'od zer 'phros pas kun la khyab/ /rdo rje rtse lnga thams cad du/ /bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya/ /rdo rjes gzhi lcags ri dang/ /
3b2(rgyud 'grel): ra bgur dang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag don/ /slar yang bsam gtan yang dag brtsam/ /de la sna tshogs chu skyes zla/ /saM las byung ba'i rdo rje las/ /yan lag bzang po yan lag 'byung/ /
3b3(rgyud 'grel): chos 'byung dkar po gru gsum pa/ /steng du gnas pa mkha' mnyam bsam/ /dbus su pad+ma zla ba la/ /slar yang de dbus dkyil 'khor te/ /'bruM yig 'khor lo las bskyed pa/ /rtag pa'i yan lag las
3b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa/ /stegs bu lha mos legs mdzes pa/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod/ /ba dan dril bu dang ldan
3b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mnan/ /zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan/ /shar ni dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni rtsad dang mtshungs pa'o/ /in+d+ra
3b6(rgyud 'grel): nI la'i 'od byed pa/ /dbus kyis gzhi rnam par bsam/ /phyogs kyi kha dog dbye ba 'dis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin gur yang bsgom par bya/ /so so'i rtsigs pa go rims bzhin/ /
4a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa lnga ni bsgom byas nas/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /dpal ldan rnam pa lnga dang bcas/ /rdo rje nag po sel byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs zhes grags/ /de ni dbye
4a2(rgyud 'grel): bas bsnyad par bya/ /lte bar sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /zla bar dbyangs yig nyis rim dgod/ /de yi zla bar ka yis sogs/ /DaDha da d+he ya la yang/ /bcug nas de dag nyid las grub/ 'di dag 'di ltar grub pa ni/ /
4a3(rgyud 'grel): me long ye shes brjod par bya/ /mnyam nyid de dag gcig pa nyid/ /de skyes hUM ni so sor rtog /bya ba nan tan ye shes ni/ /de las skyes pa rdo rjer bsgom/ /nor bu me shel 'od 'dra ba/ /sa bon bcas pa'i 'od zer
4a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros/ /oM badzra At+ma kohaM/ zhes pas bdag nyid nga rgyal bya/ /de skyes dkar dmar mdangs ldan pa/ /'od zer mdzes pas 'khyud pa'i lus/ /khro bo sgeg gzugs bde ba yis/ /ngo bo dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal//
4a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan la g.yon brkyang gis mnan pa/ /'bar ba'i ral gri rdo rje gri gug gsor ba'o/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes snod ni 'od zer 'phro ba yi/ /phyag ni g.yas dang g.yon rnams kyis/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni/ /ye shes rdo rje
4a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i bdag /rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin gang/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /ces pa ni rnal 'byor ro/ /'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba ru/ /'gro ba gsum po yang dag bltas/ /rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas gzugs
4b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ rang gi lus la yang dag gzhug /bde ba daM pa rnam pa'i gzugs/ /bdag gi longs spyod bsgom par bya/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /sngags mchog de nyid gsum zhes pa/ /ho dmar gnyis kyi nang du gzhug/ ji ltar skar mda''phro ba ltar/ /byang chub sems ni de
4b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gzhug/ snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid zhu/ /byams sogs sems su sogs rnams kyi/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo skul bar byed/ /bzhengs shig gshin rje rje btung snying rje'i khro/ /khams gsum thams cad pa yi gti mug sol/ /de bzhin
4b3(rgyud 'grel): bdud las rgyal bar mdzod/ /bzhengs shig rje btsun thugs ni g.yengs gyur pas/ /'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ci sde bzhugs/ /bzhengs shig rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams kyis/ /byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mnyam mnan nas/ /ci phyir stong pa nyid la sems
4b4(rgyud 'grel): shing zhugs/ /bskul nas de ni thim 'gyur nas/ /de yi ro yi rjes su song/ /glu 'di yi ni ngor byas nas/ /phun tshogs nyams 'dra las byung ba/ /zhu ba rjes pa las skyes pa/ /yam sngon po las nyi dkyil 'khor/ /mi bzang khro bcas mdog sngo ba/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis
4b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa ste/ /smad rnon po 'bar ba'i rwa/ /rmig pa brko ba 'jigs byed pa /ma he sha de'i rgyab gnas pa/ /rdo rje sngon po 'od zer bcas/ /sa bon 'od zer bcas pa yis/ /gshed nag gzugs ni de yis bya/ /sna tshogs bdag la yang dag gzhug/ 'jigs byed
4b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po 'jigs su rung/ /ma he'i shar ni rdo rjer bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug bsgom par bya/ 'jig rten gsum pa bdud kyi 'khor/ /'od zer rnon po 'phro bas bsreg /mi bzad drag shul mun pa'i lus/ /'od zer ljags nI dril ba po/ /'bar ba'i che ba
4b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa'i byad/ /ral pa sma ra gyen du 'greng/ /g.yon brkyang pa yis zhabs kyis mnan/ /nag po rnam par myos byed pa/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni bud nag 'dra/ /g.yas pa zla ba'i 'od byed pa/ /g.yon pa dmar po'i mdangs su bstan/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 
5a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ sbom thung gsus pa 'phyang ba po/ /mgo po'i phreng ba 'phyang dang ldan/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /rang 'od shes rab yan lag sbyor/ /bde ba 'dab pa gzhan gyi don/ /lhag ma g.yas pa'i phyag dag
5a2(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon na 'khor lo chu skyes 'dzin/ /sbrul gyi dbang pos brgyan byas te/ /sngon po mdza' yas sbrul dag gis/ /ral pa bcings pa shin tu 'jigs/ /dmar po 'jog po klu yis ni/ /ma rungs pa yis rna ba brgyan/ /sna tshogs
5a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs ldan dpung brgyan te/ /dung skyong dag gi sbrul nyid ni/ /ser po gdu bu 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma dkar po'i do shal can/ ljang gu kar koTa yis ni/ /tshangs pa'i skud pa shin tu mdzes/ /bdud rtsi'i kha dog 'dra ba yi/ /nor 'dzin gyis ni ska rags byas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha
5a4(rgyud 'grel): dog skya/ /pad+ma chen pos zhabs gdub po/ /thams cad phugs kyi sgra byed pa/ /lce gnyis drag shul mche ba'i phreng/ /'di ni 'khor ba myang 'das gzugs/ /gshin rje'i sel bar byed pa'o/ /rtog pa zad pa'i ched bsams nas/ /sngags kyis yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /
5a5(rgyud 'grel): oM d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pa ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /rang snying 'od zer lcags kyu yis/ /mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad bkug nas zhal du gzhug /bde bar phab nas snying gar zhu/ /rdo rje lam byung zhu ba de/ /blo dang ldan pas
5a6(rgyud 'grel): spro bar bya/ /rang 'od pad+ma'i khongs su gnas/ /rang gi sa bon gzugs su blta/ /sa bon las byung 'khor lo kun/ /sa bon kun gyis byin gyis brlab/ /'pho zhing sdud pa'i 'od zer ni/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bsgom/ /ya yig sngon pos dbus ma skyes/ dkyil
5a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor can gyi mtshan nyid gsungs/ /shar du k+She las 'khor lo grub/ rtag pa dkar po phyag drug pa/ /'khor lo ral gri g.yas pa'i phyag/ g.yon na rin chen chu skyes 'dzin/ /lhor ni ma yi yi ge las/ /rin chen las skyes rin chen 'byung/ /btsom gser gyi mdangs
5b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /rin chen ral gri g.yas na 'dzin/ /g.yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /sa bon me dang pad+ma grub/ pad+ma rA ga'i 'od dang mnyam/ /g.yas na pad+ma ral gri'o/ /nor bu 'khor lo g.yon du dgod/ /de dang ral gri las byung ba/ /ljang khu phrag dog gshin rje
5b2(rgyud 'grel): gshed/ /g.yas na ral gri 'khor lo bsnams /mdzes pa'i nor bu pad+ma g.yon/ /thams cad zhe sdang gshin rje gshed/ /khro bo gzugs kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de rnams kyi ni rtsa ba'i phyag /gri gug thod pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis med gnyug ma'i shes rab dang/ /lus bdag med
5b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ngo bo dang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /rtag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rtsa bar gnas/ /sems can don byed bsgom par bya/ /shar sgor la yig las skyes pa/ /tho ba sngon po yi ni gzugs/ /g.yas na tho ba ral gri 'dzin/ /nor bu bzang
5b4(rgyud 'grel): po pad+ma g.yon/ /rdo rje thor grags gshin rje gshed/ /lhor na dzi dad dbyug pa las/ /dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dkar mdangs/ /dbyug pa ral gri g.yas pa na/ /chu skyes 'khor lo g.yon pa'o/ /nub tu pad+ma gshin rje gshed/ /ni skyes 'dod chags mdza' 'joms
5b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ /pad+ma ral gri g.yas pa na/ /g.yon na 'khor lo nor bu'o/ /byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed/ /ra skyes phrag dog mdza' 'joms pa/ ral gri 'khor lo g.yas pa na/ /g.yon na nor bu pad+ma ste/ /cung zad sngo ba'i bye brag ste/ /zhes pa 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /sprul
5b6(rgyud 'grel): ni thams cad pa yi gzugs/ /rnam par gtsigs pa'i gad rgyangs can/ /skra ser gyen du 'greng ba ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan/ /mche ba gtsigs pa gad rgyangs che/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mtshams bzhi la/ /zla ba la gnas lha mo rnams
5b7(rgyud 'grel): shar lho mtshams kyi lha mo ni/ /dza skyes rdo rje sems ma'o/ /dkar mo sgeg mo khro ba che/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs/ /de nas lho nub mtshams su ni/ /rdo rje phag mos las skyes/ /khro bo phag mo'i gdong can ma/ /zhe sdang gshin rje gshed dang mtshungs/ /byang dang
6a1(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi mtshams su ni/ /rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs can ma/ /do skyes shin tu dmar ba'i mdog /'dog chags gshin rje mthar 'joms gzugs/ /byang shar gyi ni mtshams su ni/ /gau ri ljang gu 'jigs su rung/ /ru skyes phrag dog gshin rje gshed
6a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i mchog /sngon po'i g.yas ni dkar ba dang/ /dkar po'i g.yas ni sngo ba dang/ /de gnyis kyi g.yon dmar po ste/ /de las gzhan pa sngo dkar po/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams bzhi ru/ /na yo nir thod pa'o/ /grub nas rab spro blo ldan gyis/ /
6a3(rgyud 'grel): ji skad brjod pa'i rang sngags kyis/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI la sogs sngags kyi sgras/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo yang dag bskul/ /sprul pa mdza' yas spros pa yis/ /sems can don mchog byas nas ni/ /rang gi lus la thams cad kyis/ /khro bo dpa' bo thams cad dgod/ /dzi na
6a4(rgyud 'grel): dzika /ces bya ba 'dis/ /shar du gti mug mthar byed pa/ /rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la gnas pa/ /sna tshogs chu skyes zla bar dgod/ /ratna d+h+rika ces bya ba 'dis/ /lho rtsibs chu skyes nyi ma la/ /phra ma zhes bya drangs nas ni/ /cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya'o/ /a ro lika ces bya ba 'dis//
6a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags shin rje sel byed pa/ /nub rtsibs 'dam skyes nyi ma la/ /cho ga bzhin du rnam par bsam/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ces bya ba 'dis/ /phra dog gshin rje zad byed pa/ /byang rtsibs chu skyes nyi ma la/ /cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya/ /mung+ga ra d+h+rika so bya ba yis/ /shar sgor chu
6a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes nyi ma la/ /thob pa'i 'tha''joms zad byed pa/ /blo dang ldan pas bsam par bya/ daN+Da d+h+rika pa'i sngags 'di yis/ /lho yi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /dbyug pa gshin rje gdul dka' ba/ /sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar dgod/ /pad+ma d+h+rika ces bya ba 'dis/ /pad+ma gshin
6a7(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed 'joms pa/ /nub sgor chu skyes nyi ma la/ /gtum po stobs chen bsgom par bya/ /khaDga d+h+rika ces bya ba 'dis/ /ral gri gshin rje zad par byed/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi mar bsam/ /byang du bdud ni 'joms pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi la/ /lha mo
6b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya de bzhin mchog /shar lho lha mo sems ma ste/ /gtum mo mdzes ma'i 'od zer can/ /mo ha ra ti zhes sngags kyis/ /sna tshogs chu skyes zla bar gnas/ /de nas lho nub rdo rje mo/ /phag mo rigs kyi gtso mo ste/ /dwe Sha ra ti de nyid 'dis/ /pad+ma zla bar mkhas pas dgod
6b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas nub byang mtshams su ni/ /zla bar dbyangs can dgod par bya/ /rA ga ra ta'i sngags 'di yis/ /de nas byang shar gau ri ste/ /badzra ra ta'i sngags 'di yis/ /zla bar oM gyis mtshan pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi ru/ /de nyid gsum gyi thod pa'o/ /'di ltar spro bya
6b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bcas/ /brtan par byas nas bde ldan pa/ /sngon gyi 'khor lo der thim par/ /mnyam par bzhag pas lta bar bya/ /'di ni gshin tu rnal 'byor ro/ /gshin rje nag po 'joms pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi rang bzhin gyis/ /mig dang sku sogs ngo bo la/ /
6b4(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams byin gyis brlab par bya/ /k+ShiM las 'khor lo gti mug mdangs/ /cung zad khro ba mig la ni/ /rdo rje mig dgod blo ldan gyis/ /rna bar dza yig rdo rje las/ /rdo rje rna ba nag po'i mdangs/ /sna ru khaM yig rin chen 'byung/ /phra ma zhes bsgrags dang mtshungs pa/ /zla bar rdo rje
6b5(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs so/ /lce la raM zhes pad+ma las/ /rdo rje lce byung pad+mar song/ /'dod chags gshin rje mdangs ldan pa'o/ /kaM skyes ral gri las byung ba/ /rdo rje sku ste zla bar gnas/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs/ /dpral bar sku yi lus can no/ /lte ba'i steng du saM las
6b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes/ /thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin mchog /khro bo sgeg pa'i gzugs can ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dgod/ /yan lag drug la dgod pa ni/ /mngon shes bsgrub pa'i don du bshad/ /snying gar hUM las rdo rje dbus/ /hUM gnas rdo rje sngon po'i mdangs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje gshin rje
6b7(rgyud 'grel): gshed/ /kha dog phyag mtshan yang dag ldan/ /mgrin par A(rgyud 'grel): yig pad+ma las/ /slar yang pad+ma las byung ba/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed 'dra'i lus/ /dpal ldan gsung gi rdo rje bsam/ /spyi bar oM las 'khor lo ste/ /oM dang 'khor lo dkar po'i mdangs/ /sku yi rdo rje?
7a1(rgyud 'grel): sku dbang phyug /phyag dang kha dog mtshan ma mchog /de nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ rdzogs nas nam mkhar gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mchod nas bsngags kyis ni/ /de rnams byin gyis brlab bar bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA? ya?  badzra?
7a2(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sna tshogs gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /sras dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas/ /mdun du bltas nas de rnams las/ /rnam par spros pa gang yin pa/ /sems ma
7a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs slar yang ni/ /zla mdangs bum pa bzungs nas ni/ /de rnams bkra shis tshigs bcad dang/ /de bzhin snyan pa glu yi sgras/ /dbang bskur bar ni bsam par bya/ /bdag dang gzhan nyid thams cad la/ /spyi bor gshin rje nag por ro/ /rdo rje can rnams bdag spyi bor
7a4(rgyud 'grel): rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs nas/ /bdag mdun bltas nas khro bos ni/ /bgegs bskrad nas ni bsrung ba dang/ /arg+ha zhabs bsil la sogs dbul/ /oM mung+ga ra ga dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dgug go /oM daN+Da hUM zhes pa 'dis
7a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go /oM pad+ma baM zhes pa 'dis bcing ngo/ /oM khang+ga ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'dis dbang du bya'o/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bkug nas gzhug /snying gar zhu bar bltas nas ni/ /rang snying pad+ma'i lted la/ zla ba las byung lha mo'i tshogs/ /sna tshogs
7a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog yo byad tshogs/ /lag pa'i 'dab mas bzung nas ni/ /mchod pa'i glu ni yid 'ong ba/ /sna tshogs gar gyi bye brag dang/ /bde ba chen po ster ba yi/ /'gying dang bcas pas mchod par bya/ /e ma kye kye bla ma gshin rje gshed nag po/ /srin po'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin
7a7(rgyud 'grel): gang/ /da ni khyod mthong bas 'jigs bas/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin dar/ /sa stengs bla sa 'og rnams/ /khyod kyis gar byas bas ni 'dar/ /mig sman bdar nag khro ba'i yid/ /gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs gzugs/ /gnag cig sbom pa yi ni tshad/ /rnam pa mang po'i gzugs
7b1(rgyud 'grel): sprul byed/ /rdo rje dbyangs can 'dud par byed/ /khyod ni gar mdzod bde ba che/ /khyod ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI:? sngags kyi sgras/ /khams gsum pa yi 'khrul pa sol/ /rje btsun snying rje yis ni khro/ /khyod ni 'gro bltas gar byed pa/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ khrag? ca dang mtshungs
7b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad no/ /sgra yi grongs rnams rnam bltas nas/ /'khor lo can ni de rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gtso bos de rnams so/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phra ma rdo rje'i rang
7b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje thugs bzhin rab gsal ba/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /thams cad dbyangs mchog dam pa mchog /rdo rje gsung pa phyag 'tshal
7b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /phrag dog dngos po'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po'i las kun byed/ /rdo rje sku bzhin rab gsal ba/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sdud/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mchog gi mchog /dkyil
7b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /oM yig las bskyed dag pa ni/ /mgo bo gsum gyi steng na gnas/ /pad+ma'i snod ni rab rdzogs nas/ /de'i mgo me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /raM las byung ba gru gsum mo/ /de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /yaM skyes sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs/ /g.yo
7b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i? ? gyis mtshan pa'o/ /de la ming yig dang po skyes/ /de ni rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /da yig las skyes yang dag byung/ /glang po la sogs lnga po rnams/ /hUM skyes rdo rje'i kha chod kyis/ /de yi kha bcad bsgom par bya'o/ /rlung gis bskul ba'i me yis ni/ /de yang zhu bar
7b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam? par? bsam/ /rdo rje mnyam pa'i ngor gyur pa/ /shin tu dri med dag par bltas/ /der ni oM yig 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun bkug ye shes gzugs/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab tu gzhug /bdud rtsi mchog lnga bltas nas ni/ /de nyid gsum gyi byin gyis brlab/ /dkyil
8a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bdag po tshim par bya/ /yi ge hUM las byung ba yi/ /lce ni rdo rje dkar por blta/ /de yi 'od zer sbu gu'i gzugs/ /de yis yang dag drangs nas ni/ /sna tshogs gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /dkyil 'khor pa ni de bzhin mchod/ /snying gar ye shes
8a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis/ /bkod nas rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /thog mdza' dbus kyis bye brag gis/ /'dir yang gcig tu mi rigs so/ /rdul phran cha shas med pas na/ /du mar yang ni rigs ma yin/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gang/ /gang bral de ni de bzhin min/ /'khrul
8a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs de nyid ma yin pas/ /gang phyir 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ /ma 'khrul rtag tu bsam mi khyab/ /spro dang bsdu ba yi ni lus/ /sems can don la ro gcig blo/ /'di las de nyid gzhan du med/ /ye shes zhabs sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /'di dag nyid ni
8a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bshad/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa las/ /gsungs ba cung zad bshad par bya/ /dngos po med cing bsgom pa med/ /khams dag med cing rnam shes med nam mkha' dang ni mthun pa'i gnas/ /nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa/ chos 'di bde ba chen po yin/ /sa yang med cing chu yang med/ /me
8a5(rgyud 'grel): dang rlung yang yod ma yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /skye ba 'di ni rab tu gnas/ /thams cad dngos po dngos med bshad/ /dngos po med par de yis bsgrags/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor par 'bral bas/ /chad pa ma yin rtag pa min/ /phyag dang zhabs dang kha dog
8a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /dngos po thams cad bden pa min/ /thog ma bar dang mdza' spangs pa/ /'di ltar dpyad na 'khor lo la/ /dam pa yang dag rtog pa spangs/ /phung po khams ni bdag med pa/ /bsgom bya bde ba dam pa'i gzugs/ /rang snying sa bon
8a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis/ /'gro ba gshin rje gshed byas nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /bkug nas de la song bar bsam/ /rdo rje dri ma med dang chos/ /ye shes lam skye dgod par bya/ /der ni rang gi sa bon rnams/ /ye shes h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs dgod/ /bde ba dam pa'i rnam bar?
8b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /yang dag rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /spro dang bsdu ba yang dag rgyas/ /bdag nyid mkhas pas bzlas pa brtsam/ /sku la sogs pa spro dang bsdu/ /rim dang cig car dag kyang rung?/ /khro bo'i tshogs ni sprul la bya/ /'gro ba h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sgra/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): lnga pra?? na ?
8b2(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ltar cho ga 'di yis ni/ /bsgom nas bzlas pa thams cad bya/ /zas sogs bya ba thams cad ni/ /byed 'dod blta bar brtson pa yin/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas nas/ /sems can don ni bya ba'i sems/ /de nyid gsum gyi cho ga yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo
8b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /bdag la bdag gi 'khor lo ni/ /cho ga ji ltar gzhug par bya/ /rang gi bsod nams yang dag bsags/ /mngon par byang chub yang dag bsngo/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'dis/ /gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /langs nas rang
8b4(rgyud 'grel): gi bdag po yi/ /rnam pa'i nga rgyal byas nas 'gro/ /rnam pa thams cad dngos po kun/ /sngags kyi dngos po de bzhin du/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed po'i gzugs/ /bsgoms nas bcag pa dag tu bya/ /thun mtshams su ni rnal 'byor sogs/ /dang po rnal 'byor pas bsgom bya//
8b5(rgyud 'grel): cung zad ye shes rjes rnal 'byor/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /yang dag ye shes dbang rnams pas/ /shin tu rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga yis/ /thun gcig la ni bsam gtan 'dir/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spro bsdu lus/ /de nyid gsum bdag ye
8b6(rgyud 'grel): shes gzugs/ /rang? nyid gshin rje gshed po yis/ /dbang bskur cho ga bsams pa dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga yis/ /zas kyi bya ba bya ba dang/ /gzhan yang mchod pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /bdag dang pha rol po yang rung/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu mchod/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed
8b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su/ /mthong ba nyid ni byang chub che/ /bdag gzhan mnyam par byang chub ste/ /gang phyir rang gi bdag po sbyor/ /de ltar min na ji ltar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yi grub pa mchog/ ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /dngos po gcig la brtags pa ste/ /grol dang bde dang sdug
9a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gnas/ /skye 'gyur las kyi bye brag las/ /rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems/ /bde ba dam pa mdza' yas gzugs/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /gang phyir 'bras bu nag por 'gyur/ /sgro 'dod 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skye dang 'chi bar bcas pa'i
9a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba zab mo 'jigs/ /chags sdang la sogs chu srin 'khrugs pa shin tu g.yo ba lbu ba rmugs nyid sogs/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed po bde ba'i rang bzhin nor chen sgrub thabs byas pa yi/ /tshig gi snang ba grub bcas bdag gis bsod nams thob pas 'gro
9a3(rgyud 'grel): kun grub thob shog /tshig gi snang ba grub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta dA na kirti dang/ lots+tsha ba tshul khrims rgyal ba'i 'gyur/ bkris/ */ /dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon
9a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri maN+Da la no pika /bod skad du/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /dpal ldan
9a5(rgyud 'grel): gshin gshed dkyil 'khor gtsor/ /btud de cho ga mdor dran ma/ me yi dkyil 'khor cho ga gshad/ /dang po rnal 'byor pa 'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam pa can gyis/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas la rang bzhin grub par bya ba'i phyir dam/ /gzhan lan gnyis lan gsum
9a6(rgyud 'grel): du gsol ba 'debs pa de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ gal te dkyil 'khor dri bar 'dod na/ /rnal 'byor bzhi sngon du byas la/ /bsnyen pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed nag po'i sngags 'bum/ gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gzhan gyi khri bzlas so/ /bcom
9a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba mtshan ma thob pa 'am/ rang gi sems dag pa'i sgo nas bri bar bya'o/ /de la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par/ dkyil 'khor gyis sbyang bar bya'o/ /gtor ma sbyin zhing mchod pa sna tshogs nye bar byas la/ /rnal 'byor ba ni
9b1(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa'i grogs dang bcas pas oM b+hu khaM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis nam mkha' i rang bzhin du bya'o/ /hUM laM hUM zhes bya bas nor 'dzin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM me dI ni badzra band+ha hUM zhes bya bas/ de nyid du rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i gshin rje mthar byed nag
9b2(rgyud 'grel): po'i gzugs rdo rje dang/ dril bus 'brel ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa la gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis/ slob ma bzhi lag pa na rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pas/ gsol ba gdab po/ /gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /
9b3(rgyud 'grel): ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas brnyes/ dbyangs mchog
9b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gtso bo'i gtso/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun pa/ /rdo rje sku dang rab tu mtshungs/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus
9b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gshin rje 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa/ /sdig pa thams cad 'jigs byed pa'i/ /mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod/ /de
9b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis dbyangs gcig tu gsol ba btab par rig nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gzir bar bltas te/ /nyon mongs pa rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ /hUM madzra tiSh+Tha zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis/ rang gi rdo rje
9b7(rgyud 'grel): gsor la/ /yi ge ma las mig g.yon pa zla ba Ta las mig g.yas pa nyi mar byas pas/ /dus dang phyogs kun bsal bar byas nas/ rnal 'byor pas khams gsum ma lus pa la blta zhing/ rkang pa'i 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar ba bsgoms la/ rdo rje gsor ba
10a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ rdo rje 'gros kyi gar dang/ 'khor lo'i sa bskor bar bya'o/ /mgur na h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa sgrogs pa'i sgras/ dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs skrag par byas la/ /nyon cig lha tshogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /lus ngag yid la gnas
10a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje lus ni mdangs ldan pas/ /lus sogs gsum skyes 'jigs par byed/ /gal te nga la 'gas brnyas na/ /'dir ni dag zhom gzhan du min/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'khor lo dang
10a3(rgyud 'grel): rin po che dang pad+ma dang/ /ral gri rab tu bkod la brjod pa bya'o/ /sa yongs su bzung ba byas pa'i rjes la/ /bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de la phur pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+hA ta yag+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM phaT/
10a4(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra pA dzA pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+naM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra kI la hUM phaT/ 'og dang steng dang phyogs mtshams kyi bgegs thams cad/ /ral gri gshin rje gshed kyis phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de ltar sa /
10a5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gzung ba byas te/ sa bgegs zhi bar byas par mthong ngam nas/ phyogs mtshams 'bar ba'i 'od kyis mtshams bcad pa byas te/ phyi rol tu sa'i lha mo ma dog ser ba/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi phyed phyung ba/ phyag
10a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa khas len pa'i lag pa lta bu g.yon na bum pa 'dzin pa/ me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mchod la sta gon du gnas par bya'o/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ / /theg pa spyod pa'i khyad par dang/ sa
10a7(rgyud 'grel): dang pha rol phyin pa la'o/ /ji ltar shAkya seng ge yi/ /bdud kyi stobs rnams bcom pa ltar/ /bdag gis bdud kyi stobs bcom ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ /de nas de nyid du zhugs par bsam par bya ste/ sa sta gon du gnas
10b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas yang de nyid la dris nye bar byugs la/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dgram par bya'o/ /lha'i gnas rnams su tsandan la sogs pa'i maN+Dal bya'o/ /de nyid du snying gar ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis/ /'khor lo bkug sa mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /mchod pas
10b2(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa yang bya'o/ /de nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i pus mo sa la gtsugs la/ /lag pa g.yas par spos snod thogs te/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /bcom ldan gshin gshed bden rdo rje/ /rig pa'i
10b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkyil 'khor snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /mgon po bdag nyid bri bar tshal/ /slob ma la ni brtse phyir dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni bcom ldan khyed la gus/ /dgyes par mdzad pa'i yos lags so/ /sangs rgyas rnams
10b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag la dgongs/ /'gro ba'i 'khor lo bya ba'i phyir/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gzhan yang gsang sngags lha nyid dang/ /'jig rten skyong dang 'byung po dang/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rjes bstan pa/ /bstan la dga' ba'i sems can dang/ /gang dag rdo rje'i mig
10b5(rgyud 'grel): can rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bdag ming 'di/ /gshin rje gshed nag dkyil 'khor ni/ /'gro ba dag phyir bri bar bgyi/ /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod kyis/ /rjes su brtse ba nye bar stsol/ /bdag dang slob mar bcas pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi grogs kun la/ nye bar mdzad par 'os pa
10b6(rgyud 'grel): lags/ /de ltar lan gsum gyi ngang du byas nas/ /'khor lo de yang dag par mchod de/ /nam mkha' la dgod par bya'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa nyi ma dang zla ba'i mig can yi ge dzaM? las dbyung ba gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sa bon las byung ba/ de'i kha dog can nyi
10b7(rgyud 'grel): shu rtsa lngar dbye bar byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur tsam bya ste/ sgo'i nyi shu cha dri zhim pa lngas rnam par byugs pa'o/ /skud pa 'khal ba ral gri gshin rje gshed dang lhan cig skud pa bsgrim par bya'o/ /'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis lcags kyus bkug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
11a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bcug la/ oM dIpta driSh+TaM i ku shi dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di dang/ oM a(rgyud 'grel): pra yats+tsha mohA kA lA de swA tsakra su tra na ya hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /zhe sdang dus kyi dgra la gsol ba gdab pa/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): o rgyan nu ga ta sarba ???
11a2(rgyud 'grel): rA nu ga ta sarba d+harmO a tyan+ta nu pra baSh+Ti sarba d+harmA hUM zhes brjod de/ thig skud 'dzin pas yi ge dza dza dza zhes rang gis bskul zhing bton la/ g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte ba'i steng du thig skud bzung ste/ nub tu 'dug la shar du mngon par phyogs pa dang/ shar du 'og
11a3(rgyud 'grel): ste nub tu mngon par phyogs pa dang/ /lhan cig nam mkha' i thig gdab par bya'o/ /yang 'og gi thig gdab par bya ste/ oM badzra sa ma ya su tra mA tI kra ma hUM/ sems can rnams kyi don du khyod/ yang ni dus 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes bya ba dang/ thig skud kyi
11a4(rgyud 'grel): sgras nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul la/ shar dang nub tu tshangs thig gdab par bya'o/ /byang du mngon par phyogs pa dang/ lhor mngon par phyogs pas/ lho dang byang gi tshangs thig gdab par bya'o/ /mer 'dug la gnod sbyin du bltas pa
11a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dbang ldan du 'dug la yi dags su bltas te/ shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po/ rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la yi dags su bltas pa dang/ bden bral du 'dug la gnod sbyin du bltas te/ nub phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po/ /mer 'dug la klu phyogs su bltas pa dang
11a6(rgyud 'grel): bden bral du 'dug ste/ dbang por bltas pas/ /lho phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po/ rlung gi phyogs su 'dug la dbang por phyogs pa dang/ dbang ldan du 'dug la klu phyogs su bltas pas khyad phyogs kyi rtsa ba'i thig gdab po/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis tshangs thig gi phyogs
11a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kar thig bdun bdun gdab po/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol gyi 'gram du/ thig drug gi rgyab la ni rta babs ci rigs pa'i thig go /mtshams kyi thig gnyis kyang ngo/ /thig de gnyis bltab du byas pas dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams la/ /skor phyogs su ? pa'i
11b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gnyis gdab po/ /phyogs kun kyang mnyam par mos par bya'o/ /'di mtshan ma dan mthong mi 'grub po/ /thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /phyogs rmongs 'khrul na slob ma'o/ /lhag chad las rmad 'byung bar 'gyur/ gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs
11b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhis brgyan pa/ /thig bzhi dang mnyam par ldan pa/ do shal dang se mo ngo dang/ dar dbyangs kyis brgyan pa/ mtshams dang sgo khyud dang/ 'gram rnams la rdo rje rin chen gyis mdzes par byas pa'o/ /de lta bu ni phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi ??
11b3(rgyud 'grel): cha gru bzhi pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la/ rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /de nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgo'i bar du'o/ blo dang ldan pas rtse mo lnga rnam par bsams la/ yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las khro bo lta'o/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyad cha ru/ bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya/ /kha khyer chen po ma gtogs
11b4(rgyud 'grel): ? shin tu mdzas pa yid 'ong ba'o/ /sgo khyud sgo dang 'drar shes bya/ /de bzhin lha yi snam bu ste/ rdo rje'i lha mor yang dag ldan/ /klu dang rol mo la sogs pas/ /kha khyer sgo yi phyed yin te/ /sgo khyud la sogs dra ba dang/ /dra phyed nyi ma zla ba dang me tog dag gi phreng ba yang/ /tshon rtse'i rnam
11b5(rgyud 'grel): ? phyir/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi bos pa'o/ /rin chen ka ba sogs snam bu/ /mnyam pa'i sa la tshon rtsi sbyin/ rta babs sgo yi lhum gyur te/ /ba dan dril bur ldan pa rnams/ /dril bur bcas pa rlung bskyod pa'o/ /ba dan phyi ya mtshams nyid du/ /gzhan rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar
11b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par rab tu brtag/ khru gang nyid ni mnyam sbyin zhing/ /ji srid khru ni stong gi bar/ /de bzhin du ni rim pa 'dis/ /snga ma bzhin du mnyam par thig btab nas/ /rim pa snga ma bzhin du rdul tshon gyi cha dag bteg cing bzung la 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis mngon par bsngags te/ oM badzra tsi tra
11b7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya hUM zhes bya bas so/ /de nas rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i gshin rje mthar byed nag po'i rnal 'byor pa/ kun tu rtog pa ma lus spangs pa/ 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas shing/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su brten nas lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bri bar bya ste/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang dmar po
12a1(rgyud 'grel): dang ljang gu ste/ nag po ni nang nyid du'o/ /sgo'i nyi shu cha ni tshon rtsi ste/ kun kyang sbom po la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral bar bri bar bya'o/ /de la sbom po bris na nad 'byung ngo/ /phras na ni nor nyams so/ /ya yos 'khon 'byung ngo/ /chad na ni 'chi'o/ /tshon rtsi rnams kyi bar ni nas
12a2(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis chod par bri'o/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ /lho phyogs ser po dang ldan pa/ nub kyi cha ni dmar po'o/ /byang phyogs ljang dang ldan pa'o/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od ldan pa/ /dbus kyi cha ni mnyan par bri/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /lha'i gnas thams cad du sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /dkyil
12a3(rgyud 'grel): du nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa 'byos pa'o/ /shar phyogs kyi rtse mo'i rtsa ba la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /lho phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i rin po che cha dgu pa'o/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la/ /nyi ma la gnas pa'i pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o
12a4(rgyud 'grel): byang gi phyogs kyi rtsibs kyi rtsa ba la ral gri ljang gu'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i me mtshams su 'khor lo'o/ /bden bral mtshams su rdo rje'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma'o/ /dbang ldan mtshams su ral gri'o/ /shar sgor ni rdo rje thob rtsibs nyi shu pa'o/ /lho sgor ni dbyig pa dkar po'o/ /nub
12a5(rgyud 'grel): sgor ni pad+ma dmar po'o/ /byang sgor ral gri'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir ni/ pad+ma'i snod bzhi bri bar bya ste/ rdul tshon dgye ba'o/ /de ltar yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la bltas la/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rang dang mtshungs pa'i
12a6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag po nyid du gnas te/ de'i sems kyis nam mkha' i khams byab par dkyil 'khor sgrub cing spros la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ /mig la sogs pa dang/ lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab cing/ bdag nyid dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur
12a7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la arg+ha la sogs pa dbul zhing khro bo rnams dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dag dbang du byas la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi sbyang? ba yang bya'o/ /bzlas pa dang bsgom pa dang mnyes pa yang bya'o/ /phyogs skyong ba rnams la yang
12b1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma dang mchod pa dbul te/ bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bskor zhing phyag kyang bya ste/ 'di lta bu ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs so/ de nas bum pa bco brgyad gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag /pad+ma'i snod bzhi yang bzhag go /las thams cad kyi mtshan ma gdab/ mgrin pa gos kyis dkri/ tsu ta la sogs
12b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kha rgyan dang ldan par bya/ /rin po che lnga dang sman lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang ldan pa de dag kyang/ sngags las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par bltas la/ de rnams su ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang zhing/ arg+ha la sogs pa phul te/ dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang dbang du byas la
12b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs pa dbul lo/ /me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje steng rnams su bzhag la/ sngags pa de srid 'dod kyi bar du dus gsum du bzla zhing/ 'khor lo de chu de nyid kyi rnam par mthong bar bya'o/ /de lta bu ni bum pa sta gon du gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas ma tshang pa la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar bya
12b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir dang/ yon bdag gi bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de la zhi ba'i thab khung bzhin du las thams cad pa'i thabs khung bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad tsam la/ zabs su khru phyed brkos pa ma gtogs pa rgya dang/ 'phang du sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer pad+ma rgyas pa'i rnam pa lta
12b5(rgyud 'grel): bus bskor ba'o/ /de'i phyi rol du kha khyer sor gnyis pas gru bzhir bskor bar bya'o/ /de'i mtshams la zla ba phyed pa'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa'o/ /thab khung gi dkyil du sor brgyad kyi tshad la rtse mo rnams la sor re re yod pa'i zhe sdang rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri'o/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du 'khor lo dang/ rin po che
12b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ pad+ma dang/ ral gri sor drug gi tshad tsam bri'o/ /tshon rtsi dkar pos steng du bri'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ bsreg pa'i rdzas ma lus pa g.yas ngos su bzhag la/ bsang gtor gyi chu'i snod la sogs pa g.yon phyogs su bzhag go /bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi
12b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yos khang nas me blangs la/ 'o ma can gyi shing rab tu spang bar bya ste/ srog chags la gnod pa spang bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yongs su gyur pa sngon du song ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du raM las byung ba'i me lha sku mdog dkar po zhal gsum pa gnyug mar gnas pa'i rig pa dang/ gnyis su
13a1(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sku phyag g.yas na spyi brugs bsnams pa/ gnyis pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ g.yon na dbyig gu rtse gsum pa bsnams pa/ gnyis pa na 'phreng ba bsnams pa/ gzhan dag na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ /g.yas brkyang
13a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ khro bo'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bsgoms la/ snying ga na gnas pa'i sa bon las ye shes kyi me dgug ste/ oM Tak+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis kun sha'i chun pos bsang gtor la sogs pa dbul zhing/ dam tshig 'jug pa dang
13a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs bya ste/ de'i zhal du yi ge raM bkod la bsreg rdzas byur bu dbul lo/ /blugs gzar dang dgang gzar gyi mchu dang/ mchu la yang rim pa bzhin bsgoms te/ sreg rdzas thams cad dbul lo/ /phyis de'i snying gar gshin rje mthar byed kyi rang
13a4(rgyud 'grel): gi sa bon las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsams te/ mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drang pa la sogs pa byas la/ mchod pa la sogs pa dbul te/ de'i zhal du ye ge raM bsgoms la/ oM agna
13a5(rgyud 'grel): ye swA hA zhes bya bas/ mar gyis bkang ba'i sreg blugs dbul lo/ /oM sarba pA pa da ha na badzrA ya sarba pA pa ni da ha swA hA/ zhes bya bas ni dur pa'o/ /oM badzra pu? ye swA hA zhes bya bas ni 'bras mgod pa'o/ /oM sarba sa ba de swA hA zhes bya bas ni zhe'o//
13a6(rgyud 'grel): oM a pra hi ha ta badzrA ya swA hA zhes bya bas ni ku sha'o/ /oM bo d+hi prak+Shi ya swAhA zhes bya bas ni oM shwat+tha'o/ /oM badzra ku pe rA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni n+ya gro d+ha'o/ /oM badzra yadz+nyA ya swA hA zhes bya bas ni u dum+ba nga'o/ /oM sa ha karA ya swA hA zhes bya bas ni
13a7(rgyud 'grel): a mra'o/ /shing las byung ba ma yin pa'i srig rdzas gzhan dag ni/ rang gi 'dod pa'i lha sngags kyi man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bskul ba'i tshig dang ldan pas/ bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsgrubs la bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas 'thor 'thung dang/ zhabs bsil
13b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ me tog dri zhim po la sogs pa dang/ na gza' dang/ so rtsi dang bshos rnams phul nas/ 'dod pa'i dngos po blangs la/ yi ge mu(rgyud 'grel): 'i mdza' can gyi yi ge gsum gyis gshegs su gsol lo/ /rdzas lhag ma rnams kyang sngar gyi cho gas me la ? la gshegs
13b2(rgyud 'grel): su gsol lo/ /sbyin sreg ga dgang gzar khru gang gi tshad la rtsa ba rdo rje rin po che dang ldan pa sor bzhi pa sor gnyis brkos pa rdo rje dang ldan pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu 'byung ba'i sbubs/ mthe'u chung gi tshang tsam dang bcas pa'o/ /blugs gzar ni sor gnyis can ??
13b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa brkos pa/ rdo rje dang ldan pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar bu ste/ dgang gzar dang/ blu gzar ro/ /de nas rab gnas kyi sa gzhi gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba dang/ slob dpon yang ji ltar chogs kyis
13b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan la/ sku gzugs sam/ ri mo 'am glegs bam bdun du bzhag ste/ bsang gtor dang/ yon chab dang/ 'thor 'thung phul la/ khu tshur g.yon pa 'am/ gzhan du yungs kar blangs te/ sku gzugs la sogs pa mdun du g.yon
13b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ gzhan gyis lan gsum gyi bar du bskor te/ me'i nang du blugs la/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badzra ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis btab pa'i khams phor gsum gyis bskor zhing g.yabs la bskur ro/ /de nas snyim pas chu blangs la ming
13b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid du blugs/ de nas nam mkha' la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nye bar spyod pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod de/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang zhing spos snod bzung la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sta gon du gnas
13b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir ro/ /dam tshig can khyod kyis bdag la dam tshig stsol cig ces lan gsum du brjod do/ ji ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs kun/ /dga' ldan gnas su bzhugs nas ni/ /lha mo sgyu ma'i mngal 'jug pa/ /de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol//
14a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po 'dir ni rtag bzhug nas/ me tog la sogs 'dir bzhes la/ /mi 'di'i don ni gzung phyir dang/ byang chub sems ni brtan par mdzod/ /de nas gti mug rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa bya'o/ /lha sta gon du gnas
14a2(rgyud 'grel): nas tho rangs kyis/ /sku gzugs gos ser pos g.yogs la/ /kha shar phyogs su bstan te khrus bya'o/ /de la rim pa ni 'di yin te/ ba'i rnam pa lnga la/ oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis/ mngon par bsngags pas bskus la/ de nas dri zhim po'i
14a3(rgyud 'grel): snum la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA zhes bya bas sngags te/ dur ba'i chang bus byug par bya'o/ /de nas shun pa lnga khar ba'i snod du bzhag la snum phyi'o/ /de'i rjes la rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas brtsams te/ bum pa so so'i chus khrus
14a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol lo/ /ji ltar bltams ma thag tu yang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun sku bkrus ltar/ /lha rjes chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /de'i rjes la
14a5(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' la gnas pa'i tsar tstsi ka la sogs pa/ rig pa'i tshogs rnams bkug nas/ ye shes bdud rtsi chus gang ba'i bum pa 'dzin pa de rnams kyis/ de mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas gos kyis rlan med par phyis la/ dang po'i gnas su bzhag go/ ras
14a6(rgyud 'grel): dris sam glegs bam mam/ mchod rten chen po rnams ni me long la snga ma bzhin du sku khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /de lta bu khrus gsol ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas mig la sogs pa dang/ lus la sogs pa byin gyis brlab cing/ bdag nyid dbang bskur la /rigs
14a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtso bor cod pan nyid du bzhag cing/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dmigs la/ yon chab la sogs pa dbul zhing dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o/ /glegs bam la ni yi ge'i gzugs nyid 'gyur
14b1(rgyud 'grel): ba lan bza' dbul te/ oM badzra bastra? ye swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so /de nas me tog la sogs pa dbul te/ oM badzra puShpe hUM /chu dang thang la skyes pa yi/ /me tog gtso bo mchog 'di dag /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ji ltar bde bas bzhes su
14b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/ /bdug pa'i dri yi mchog 'di dag /gus pa mchog gis bdag 'bul na/ /ji ltar bde bas bzhes su gsol/ /zhun mar 'bru mar snang ba 'di/ /lha rdzas 'od 'bar mun pa 'jig /bdag nyid dang bas 'bul lags na/ mi
14b3(rgyud 'grel): shes pa kun gsal du gsol/ /bza' bca' kun dang bcas pa yi/ /kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa/ /bshos gtsang dam pa bdag 'bul na/ /'di dag thams cad gzhes su gsol/ /de ltar mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pa dbul lo/ /phyi nas sku gzugs kyi
14b4(rgyud 'grel): ? dbye ste/ /dngul gyi snod na yod pa'i mar dang/ /sprang? rtsi gser gyi thur mas blangs? la oM badzra tsak+Shu sa man ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pas rdo rje gsor zheng g.yon pas dril bu dkrol la/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo
14b5(rgyud 'grel): phyir?/ /? bya ba la sogs pa'i bstod pa bya ste/ de lta bu ni rab gnas kyi cho ga'o/ /gang gi tshe snying rje mchog gi dbang du gyur cing dbang bskur la sogs pas slob ma bsdu bar 'dod na/ de'i ? dkyil 'khor gyi gnas kyi phyi rol tu/ rigs dang gzugs dang lang tsho dang/ dad
14b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ thos pa la sogs pa ?? don du gnyer ba'i slob ma lag tu me tog thogs te/ dkyil 'khor la phyag byas pa dang/ gzhan yon tan med pa yang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas pa chos bshad
14b7(rgyud 'grel): pas ?? no/ rjes su gnas pa zhi po 'am/ /rang gi bslab pa ldan pa'i 'khor/ /theg pa chen po'i blo can la/ /sangs rgyas yang dag cho ga gsungs/ /sngags kyi dngos grub mtshan ma 'am/ /'ga' zhig zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /de bzhin bsod nams ?
15a1(rgyud 'grel): la gzhan/ /'jig rten phyi ma theg mchog dang/ /mang du 'jig rten pha rol don/ /byas nas dang ldan blo dag byed/ /'jig rten 'di yi 'bras spangs nas/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i 'bras 'dod la/ /gang phyir 'di la phan mang ba/ /'di ming 'jig rten pha rol pa/
15a2(rgyud 'grel): de phyir 'jig rten gzhan grub phyir/ /khyed kyi bstan pa yid kyis bgyis/ /de ltar smras nas zhi bar 'jug pas rdo rje dang pad+ma dag par byas pa la gsol ba gdab bo/ /bdag gi ston pa dga' chen khyod/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub chen po'i lam
15a3(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas mchos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug pa gsol zhes lan gsum brjod de/
15a4(rgyud 'grel): gus pa dang ldan pa'i bla ma la 'di ltar gtsor byas la brjod do/ /sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga yis/ /theg chen 'di ni bu khyod shog/ khyod ni theg pa chen po'i snod/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sku gsung thugs
15a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gsang sngags bcu? nyid kyis/ /ye shes mnyam pa med pa brnyes/ /shAkya seng ge sogs mchog gis/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas/ /gang gis stobs chen bdud kyi sde/ /shin tu 'jigs pa chen bcom nas/ /'jig rten rjes 'jug bkod
15a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir bu khyod blo yis 'dir/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par gyis/ /zhes gsol ba 'debs pa la smras nas/ byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang/ skyes pa rnams yang dag par sbyor bar bya ba'i
15a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ de dag shin tu 'dod par byas la/ de'i snying gar yi ge hUM las rdo rje/ mgrin par yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma/ /spyi bor yi ge oM las 'khor lo/ /de rnams su sa bon dgod pa 'di hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM zhes brjod la/ dri zhim par bcas pa'i chu rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis gzung
15b1(rgyud 'grel): nas mgrin par bsku 'o/ /de nas de dag gi mgo la me tog sbyin no/ /dri dang byug pa ni mdun du'o/ /mar me mdun du'o/ /thams cad la las thams cad pa'i sngags bzla'o/ /de nas chags pa la sogs pa'i skyen dang bral ba'i so shing rtse mo me tog can phyir ro/ /des
15b2(rgyud 'grel): kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ bca' zhing ba lang gi pags pa tsam gyis phyogs ba lang gi lce bas byugs par dor do/ /da nas de lhung ba dang zhi ba la sogs pa grub pa'i mtshan ma de la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas chu khyor pa gsum gyis kha bshal te/ oM ??
15b3(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma pA ba nI tsA sya shod+ha ya sarba bi ka la pa a pa na hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis so/ /stan dang sngags su ku sha gding ngo/ /de'i tshar sum 'gyur gyi skud pas bcings te/ las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pas gsrung ngo/ /de nas thams cad mkhyen nyid
15b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten du/ /brgya la 'gyur ngam mi 'byung 'gyur/ /u dum bar? me tog kyang/ /des 'ga' res 'ga' 'byung ba srid/ /gsang sngags tshul la gnas pa yang/ /de bas kyang ni rnyed? par dga' / /gang gis sems can dpag med don/ /nus par mdzad las 'das
15b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bskal ba du ma dpag med du/ /gang gis sdig pa ston byas pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra 'thong bas ni/ /de dag thams cad zad 'gyur bas/ /sngags sbyor tshul la gnas pa dang/ /mnyam par gyur pas gzhan ci yod/ /tshe 'di nyid la spags bzlas pas/ /bla med
15b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas su 'gro? 'gyur te/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /ngan 'gro'i gnas ni de dag spangs/ /de dag thams cad zad 'gyur pas/ /de dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /blo gros shin tu brtan gyur nas/ /khyod ni de ring rnyed pa mchog /bdag nyid chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ /
15b7(rgyud 'grel): ?? rgyal ba thams cad ni bsras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di/ /khyod kyi kun gyis yongs bzung ste/ /gnas nas bdag nyid chen po las/ /gang gis khyod ni theg chen las/ /'dir ni 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin/ /lam 'di mchog ste dpal dang ldan/ /theg pa chen po snang?
16a1(rgyud 'grel): ba che/ /gang gis khyod ni 'gro 'gyur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bstan nas/ /ku sha bting ba la bzhag la rmi lam cung zhig mthong na'ang nga la tho rangs khyod kyis zlos shig ces bya ste/ 'di ni slob ma sta gon du gnas
16a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gal te mi dge ba'i mtshan ma zlos na de'i tshe/ las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis brdag par bya'o/ /yang des bsrungs la sdom pa 'dzin du bcug ste/ dkyil 'khor phyir mi bzlog pa'i dbang/ /gsal ba mgon pos bdag la stsol/ /dkyil 'khor lha dag
16a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las dag dang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang/ gsang ba'i sdom pa bla med rnams/ /slob dpon gyis ni bdag la stsol/ /rtag tu sems can don bgyid do/ /zhes brjod nas/ bdag dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga yin te/ dang po slob dpon dkyil
16a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du zhugs shing/ dbang thams cad rdzogs par bya ste/ rjes su gnang ba thob nas/ yol ba'i phyi rol tu yon phul ba'i slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snod du gyur pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs la/ oM:/ baM bI ra hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzla zhing me tog
16a5(rgyud 'grel): gi phreng ba bzung ste/ mig gnyis bkab pa las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i chus bsangs te/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i phyir khyod gang la dga' ba yin zhes bri'o/ /des kyang skal bzang bdag ni bde ba chen po la'o/ /zhes brjod do/ /de ma thag tu oM sarba oM ga tsit+ta
16a6(rgyud 'grel): udbA nga ya mi zhes bya bas rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag la/ oM su ra te sa ma ya stwaM ho tiSh+Tha badzra ya thA su khaM zhes bya'o/ /de nas sngar bstan pa'i yi ge lnga brjod cing/ yol ba'i nang du bkug la 'di skad ces brjod do
16a7(rgyud 'grel): de ring khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ de bas na ye shes rdo rje de bas bskyed par bya'o/ /ye shes gang gis de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyang 'thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang cig gos/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya
16b1(rgyud 'grel): ste /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /de nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te khyod kyis 'di 'ga' la/ /smos na mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ni/ /de ring khyod gyi snying la gnas/ /gal te tshul 'di
16b2(rgyud 'grel): smras na ni/ /de yi mod la bkas nas gshegs/ /zhes bya ba 'dis mna' bsgrag go /tsandan dang gur kum bsres pa'i chu la oM badzra ud ka tha zhes lan bdun gyi bar du bzlas la/ 'di ni dmyal ba'i chu yin te/ /dam tshig nyams na bsregs par byed/ /dam tshig srung na
16b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig ces brjod la byung ngo/ /de nas 'di skad brjod de/ /de ring phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje pa yin gyis/ /ngas gang smas pa'o khyod kyi bya ba yin no/ /nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /nyon mong ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas//
16b4(rgyud 'grel): dmyal bar lhung bar ma byed cig ces brjod do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbang tu gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de'i spyi bor yi ge paM las byung ba'i bum pas mtshan pa dkor po chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkyil du
16b5(rgyud 'grel): ta'o/ tha? snying gar lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ser po gru zhi?/ /rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshams su mtshan pa de la hUM ngo/ /lte bar raM las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa dmar po shin tu rno zhing tsha ba de la A'o/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu aM las byung ba
16b6(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po bzhi'i rnam pa lta bu g.yo ba'i ba dan phyed pas mtshan pa de la d+d+ho?(rgyud 'grel): drag cing rno pa 'bar ba'i phung po de rlung gi bum par bsams la ji srid me'i dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi bar du'o/ /de dag g.yos par gyur nas 'bar zhing byung bas dbang chen gyi dkyil
16b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor yang 'bar bar gyur to /de nas chu'i dkyil 'khor las dag cing gtsang ba'i rgyun bab pas/ ngoms shing tshim par gyur nas rlung gis bteg pa dang/ slob ma dang rang 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje mthar byed sku shin tu drag po can ? g.yas pas rdo rje 
17a1(rgyud 'grel): gsor ba g.yon pas dril bu 'khrol ba/ 'bebs pa'i sngags kyis phab ste/ spos dbul lo/ /de'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): h+rI Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT A be sha ye stoM b+ha ya ra ra ra ra tsA le hUM hA dzhai(rgyud 'grel): phaT ces bya bas myang du phebs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
17a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags gshin rje gshed du de ma thag tu dmigs la/ de'i lce la yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po bsams te/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes brjod de/ rdo rje chos rnams ni mgon po che/ /'od dpag med ni bde ba che/ /smos shig 'dod chags chos chen po/ /dge dang mi dge ba de 'dri/ /babs na dge dang mi dge
17a3(rgyud 'grel): de/ /dag gi brtan brjod par byed/ /sems ni brtan nas khams gsum gshes shing lus ni brtan gyur na/ /nam mkha' la yang 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gal te ring du 'gro 'gyur na/ /mgo bo'i gtsug tu lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rjes kun nas ?
17a4(rgyud 'grel): par bsgoms la de rengs par bya'o/ /de lta bu ni dbab pa'o/ /de nas thogs pa'i me tog de dkyil 'khor du dbul zhing pra tIts+tsha badzra ho zhes brjod do/ /de ltar lha gang gi gnas mtshan ma dang nye bar bab par gyur na/ /de'i rigs yin par de la bstan par bya'o/ /gnas mchog
17a5(rgyud 'grel): tu bab na dngos grub mchog 'grub po/ /gnas dkyil du ni dngos grub 'bring ngo/ /gnas snang kyi las dngos grub tha ma'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bab na dngos grub med do/ /gal te dkyil 'khor du ma bab na de yang 'phang ngo/ /lan gsum 'phangs kyang de nyid du ma bab na
17a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzung bar mi bya'o/ /de ni me tog dor ba'o/ /'phangs pa'i phreng ba de blangs te de'i mgo la bcings la/ sems can stobs po che 'di lor zhig ces brjod do/ /de nas oM rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ni/ /de ring khyed kyi mig 'byed mdzad/ /de ltar mig ni thams cad 'byed
17a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mig ni bla med pa/ /zhes brjod nas gdong g.yogs dbye'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha so so'i ming bstan pa sngon 'gro bas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te/ gtso bo'i bar du bstan par bya'o/ /de ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas chos chen po/ /
17b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing/ /nyid kyi mchog kyang stsal du gsol/ /zhes bya bas gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzung la/ rdo rje tsartsi ka la sogs pas bum pas dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje chen pos
17b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa/ /gsang gsum pa yi gnas byung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya/ /zhes brjod cing/ las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i bum pa'i chu rdo rje khu tshur gyis kun nas gtor zhing/ oM badzra a b+hi Sh+ny+tsi zhes brjod de/ slob
17b3(rgyud 'grel): ma 'khor lo sgyur ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro/ /chu'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nas gser ram gos las bsgrubs pa'i cod pan ji lta ba'i sngags kyis mgo'i steng du bzhag la nam mkha' i khongs su gtogs pa'i rang gi rigs kyi gzugs su cod pan la bzhugs su gsol te sbyin pa ni cod
17b4(rgyud 'grel): pan gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /de'i rjes la rdo rje byin la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang bskur bas/ /re ring khyod ni dbang bskur bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje'i bzhig rab 'grub 'gyur/ /zhes brjod cing rdo rje snying ga la sogs par reg la lag pa g.yas par sbyin pa ni rdo rje'i dbang
17b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yon par dril bu byin la/ /rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i lag pa dag gis 'khyud pa ltar byas te/ oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiShA badzra sa ma ya stwaM zhes brjod la sbyin te/ de ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nyid la bdag pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya'o/ /
17b6(rgyud 'grel): de la rdo rje dril bu spyi bor gzung la/ oM badzra satwa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas/ rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming gdags so/ /dbang 'di dag gis sngags dang rgyud bshad pa dang/ gsang sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bar
17b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /'di ni dbang lnga pa ste rtsa ba'i dbang yin/ /rgya ba'i dbang thams cad yang ? tsi ka la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad yin pa nyid do/ /de nas rtsa ba'i dbang mnos pas slob dpon sdom pa can/ kye snying rje'i gter bdag dang gzhan gyi don nus pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang de khyed kyi sku drin gyis
18a1(rgyud 'grel): stsal du zhes gsol ba gdab pa dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor dang nye bar rdul tshon dmar po las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du gor stan la bzhag ste/ rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pas dbang bskur zhing dam tshig gsum gzung ngo/ /de la dam tshig gsum ni
18a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yin te/ /hUM las rdo rje bsgoms la/ /khams gsum pa yi ral gri che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ 'di ni las kyi ral gri mchog /dgra rnams las rgyal bya phyir zung zhes ba bas de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje gzung ngo/ /'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go /de nas A(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i dril bu
18a3(rgyud 'grel): la shes rab dang/ thabs kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang dril bu 'dis 'grub par 'gyur gyis zung zhing/ bu rdo rje khyod kyis slob ma la yang zung zhig ces byas la/ de'i lag par byin te/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /sems can rang bzhin rtag tu dag /srid pa'i
18a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni byed pa yin zhes bya bas de la gdams par bya ste/ 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig go /de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig bstan te/ yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa nyid/ /phyag rgya yin par rab grags te/ /'di yis rang gi 'dod lha ni/ /bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por gnas/ /zhes
18a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid dang slob dpon gyi las dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang/ slob dpon 'jug pa'i bya ba bstan par bya'o/ /de la sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa bdag de kho na nyid du mnyam pas gru bzhi pa'o
18a6(rgyud 'grel): lus dang/ tshor ba dang/ sems dang chos rnams gcig dang du ma dang bral ba gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa nyid la/ dad pa rnam par dag pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo'o/ /skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang/ mi skyed pa dang skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i
18a7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i chos 'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba dang bskyed pa'i phyir rtsom pa'i las dang/ rtog pa'i bdag nyid kyis brtson 'grus bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni lha'i sgo'o/ /'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang sems dang/ dpyod pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang/ gang dran pa rnam par dag pa
18b1(rgyud 'grel): ni nub kyi sgo'o/ /dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab ces bya ba dbang po lnga'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni byang gi sgo'o/ /rtog pa dang/ dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang/ bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang/ rtog
18b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang dpyod pa spangs pa bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ dga' ba yang spangs shing btang snyoms dang/ dran pa dang ldan pas bsam gtan gsum pa dang/ btang snyoms dang dran pa dag pa dang/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba bsam gtan bzhi
18b3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par dag pa ni/ rta babs bzhi'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ seng+ge rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi po rnam par dag pa ni kha khyer bzhi'o/ /don dang gzhung dang/ nges tshig dang/ spobs pa bzhi dang/ gzungs bzhi rnam par dag pa ni
18b4(rgyud 'grel): kha khyer la gnas pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pas ni rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs so/ /mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ glengs gzhi dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas
18b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang rmad du byung ba gsung rab yan lag dgu gdul bya'i skye bo la bstan pa rnam par dag pa ni ril bu dang g.yer ga'i sgra dang ba dan no/ /dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang/ shin tu spangs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms
18b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pa ni/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang/ me long dang me tog gi phreng ba dang/ rnga yab 'bar ba'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis phyi rol gyi gzugs stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par mthong ba
18b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa dang po dang/ phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis nang gi gzugs de bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dang/ nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs med pa'i 'du shes kyis gzugs rnams mngon sum du nye bar rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa zhes bya
19a1(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum pa dang/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa dang/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa dang/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes
19a2(rgyud 'grel): med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa dang/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni brgyad pa ste/ 'di dag rnams dgra pa ni/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i zur bzhi dang logs bzhi'o/ /rdo rje'i theg pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i steng gi rim pa dang/ 'brel
19a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /'bras bu dbye bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo shin tu mtho ba'i bye brag gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo nyi shu'o/ /rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas ma lnga ni ngos rnams dang steng ngo/ /gos pa med pa'i chos gcig dang/ du ma ji ltar
19a4(rgyud 'grel): rigs pa rab tu ston pa ni/ lha'i gnas kyi sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /byang chub kyi sems yong su smin par byed pas nyi ma'i gdan dang lhan pa'o/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi myu gu 'phel bar byed pas zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa'o/ /snying rje'i bdud rtsi yongs su gang bas bum pa
19a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad do/ /chos kyi 'od kyi sgron ma'i grags ba ni dri zhim po'o/ /chos kyi dras ni bshos gtsang ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do/ /lha'i de kho na nyid brjod par bya'o/ /de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang/ zhe sdang chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni bcom
19a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das so/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsdus pas gnag pa ni nag po'o/ /brtags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid gshin rje'i thar byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do/ /shin tu gdug pa can dag po zhi bas mi 'dul pa khro bo chen po'o/ /rnam thar
19a7(rgyud 'grel): lnga gsum rnam par dag pa zhal gsum mo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas phyag drug gi /ser sna la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad pas rdo rje la sogs pa drug phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jig pas sprul gyis brgyan pa'o/ /tshogs
19b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yongs su rdzogs pas rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes la 'khyud pa'o/ /rtag tu sems can gyi don mdzad pas lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo'o/ /chos kyi sku nyid kyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku mdzad pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po dang gti mug chen po rnam par dag
19b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das gti mug gshin rje gshed do/ /gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no/ /gti mug gi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bla ma chen po dang/ tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das pa ma gshin rje
19b3(rgyud 'grel): gshed do/ /lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no/ /nga rgyal gyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ 'dod chags chen po dang/ 'du shes kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do/ /'dod chags kyi cha'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/
19b4(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog chen po dang 'du byed kyi phung po rnam par dag pa dang/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni bcom ldan 'das phrag dog gshin rje gshed do/ /phrag dog gi cha'i nyon mongs pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ phung po'i bdud la dad pa rnam par dag pa ni/ bcom
19b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das tho ba gshin rje gshed do/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang/ 'dod pa'i sgrib pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud la brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa na bcom ldan 'das dbyig pa gshin rje gshed do/ /mi
19b6(rgyud 'grel): mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun par nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa dang/ lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ 'chi bdag gi bdud la dran pa rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gshin rje gshed do/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs
19b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ skye ba'i sgrib pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ lha'i du rnam par g.yeng byed bdud la ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ral gri gshin rje bshad do/ /sa'i khams dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byams pa chen po'i
20a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo nyid rdo rje tsar ci ka'o/ /chu'i khams dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje phag mo'o/ /me'i khams dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'o/ /rlung gi khams dang/ ye shes
20a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po'i ngo bo ni rdo rje gau rim ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa dag pa ni thod pa bzhi'o/ /nang dri zhim pos kyang bkang ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa sa dang sbyar ba yang brtag par bya'o/ /stobs dang ma 'dres pa
20a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa ma bris pa ni gzhung mangs kyi dogs pas 'jigs pas so/ /de lta bu ni lha'i de kho na nyid do/ /de nas slob dpon gyi las te bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang/ bza' ba'i dam tshig bsgrubs brgyud de dang de dag bstan pa'o/ /bdag bsrung ba ni so sor 'brang mi'i dkyil
20a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bsgrub thabs bstan pas so/ /slob dpon 'jug pa ni gtor ma byin te/ de la rnal 'byor bzhi dang ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis bca' ba dang/ myang ba dang/ btung ba dang bldag pa la sogs pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dri dang phreng ba dang/ byugs pa dang/ phye ma dang/
20a5(rgyud 'grel): gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang dril bu la sogs pa'i sgra chen po kun rdzob du rdzogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma shing rta bkang ba 'am/ ma 'byor na nas kyi khur ba 'am/ 'bras chan nyung shas tsam dang bcas pa'i chu khyor ba gsum tsam yang rung ngo/ /
20a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas khro bo zhags pa dang lcags kyu la sogs pa thogs pa spros te phyogs skyong ba rnams snying ga nas lcags kyus bzung zhing/ mgrin pa zhags pas bcings nas drangs par bsam mo/ /de la oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ShI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Te n+ya
20a7(rgyud 'grel): sa pa ri bA ra mA karSha ya dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dbang po mig stong pa mdog dmar ser glang po che'i steng na 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas dang g.yon rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub byas pa bkug la bzhag go /sngags de nyid kyis nye dbang nam mkha' i lding la zhon pa/ rin po che'i
20b1(rgyud 'grel): cod pan can/ g.yas na bsrubs shing dang/ 'khor lo g.yon na dung dang nor bu ko tu pa thogs pa/ de'i dpon du ha cang mi ring bar gzhag go/ gshin rje sngon po ma he la zhon pa skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba lag pa nad byig pa dang/ sdig mdzub can gshin rje'i phyogs su'o/ /chu bdag pa
20b2(rgyud 'grel): po brang 'gro la zhon pa/ lag na klu zhags zogs pa/ nub phyogs su'o/ /ku ber nor gyi ster na 'dug pa ser po sa bon gyi grong khyer dang/ ne'u le lag na thogs pa byang phyogs su'o/ /de nyid du sna can dkar po bya ba la zhon pa lag pa g.yas na phreng ba dang/ sta re/ g.yon na la
20b3(rgyud 'grel): khug dang la du thogs pa'o/ /dbang ldan dkar po glang la zhon pa/ ral pa can/ mig gsum pa rtse gsum dang/ thong ba thogs pa lag pa gnyis kyis gau ril 'khyud pa dbang ldan phyogs su'o/ /me lha dmar po ra skye ba la zhon pa/ lag na phreng ba dang spyi blugs thogs pa/
20b4(rgyud 'grel): me'i phyogs su'o/ /srin po ro la zhon pa gri gug dang/ thod pa lag na thogs pa khro zhing rnga ma pa sngon po bden bral du rlung lta du ba'i mdog can ri dags la zhon pa lag pa gnyis kyis gos thogs pa/ /rlung gi phyogs su'o/ /zla ba dkar po ku mu ta'i steng na 'dug pa ku
20b5(rgyud 'grel): mu ta lag na thogs pa steng du'o/ /nyi ma dmar po lag na pad+ma thogs pa rta mchog bdun la zhon pa steng du'o/ /tshangs pa dmar po gdong gsum pa phag na thal ba'i snod dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ dbyig ba dang/ phreng ba thogs pa can ngang pa la zhon pa yang steng du'o/
20b6(rgyud 'grel): ? lha mo ser mo pad+ma sna gnas pa g.yon na bum pa thob pa/ g.yas pa khas len pa'i lag pa can 'og tu'o/ /thag bzangs kyi sngon po shin rta la zhon pa/ lag pas ral gri dang sdigs mdzub can de nyid du dgod do/ /de dag thams cad dgug pa'i sngags la
20b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni snga ma de nyid do/ /de nas yang rang gi snying ga nas khro bo'i phung bus mgrin pa nas bzung nas/ thogs pa'i khro bo rnams rnam par spros la/ de dag gi snying ga dang/ mgrin pa dang/ mgo dang/ rkang pa'i bar du gdab po/ /sngags ni oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): Thi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT
21a1(rgyud 'grel): sarba duSh+Tan+d+rA di sa pa ri bA ra Na kI la ya hUM phaT ces bya'o/ /de'i rjes la grub pa'i bcud kyis len grub pa bzhin du kun kyang/ gshin rje gshed kyi rnam par bsgrub pa'am/ byang chub kyi sems khu ba'i ngo bor bsdu ba po/ /gal te khu ba'i ngo bo nyid yin na de'i tshe sa bon dang phyags chen
21a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rim pas bskyed par bya'o/ /de la oM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i dbang po mar ser rin po che'i cod pan can phyag dang po gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa/ lhag ma bzhin rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ pad+ma dang 'khor lo bsnams pa/ ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dang dbyig pa las gshin rje sngon po
21a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal dkar po dang dmar po g.yas rnams ni gri gug dang dbyig pa dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon rnams na thod pa dang/ pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ skra ser po gyen du 'gred pa/ nyi ma la bzhugs pa khro bo'i gzugs can no/ /Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): dang klu zhags las chu lha dkar po zhal g.yas
21a4(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon sngon po dang/ dmar po g.yas na gri gug dang klu zhags dang/ ral gri phyag g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo rin po che'i cod pan can zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /wi dang sa bon gyi grong khyer las ku be ra ser po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal sngon po dang/ dkar po gri
21a5(rgyud 'grel): gug dang/ sa bon gyi grong khyer dang/ ral gri phyag g.yon na thod pa dang/ pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo 'tsho ba rin po che'i cod pan can ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o/ /gri dang rtse gsum pa las dbang ldan dkar po zhal g.yas dang yon sngon po dang/ dmar ba/ g.yas na gri gug dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/
21a6(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang/ nor bu dang/ 'khor lo gau ril 'khyud pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o/ /ha dang thal snod las me lha dmar po zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dkar po/ /g.yas na gri gug dang thal snod dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma
21a7(rgyud 'grel): dang nor bu/ nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /A dang rtse gsum las bden bral sngon po khro bo'i gzugs dang/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ g.yas na gri gug dang dbyig pa dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo/ /nyi ma'i gdun la bzhugs
21b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /na dang gos las rlung lha du ba'i mdog can/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas na gri gug dang ba dan dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang nor bu dang pad+ma dang/ zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /na dang ku mu ta las zla ba mdog dkar po zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang
21b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ g.yas gri gug dang ku mu ta dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang/ nor bu dang 'khor lo'o/ /hUM dang pad+ma las nyi ma dmar po zhal g.yas dang/ g.yon sngon po dang dkar po/ /g.yas na gri gug dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri /phyag g.yon na thod pa dang nor bu dang 'khor lo/ /hUM dang phreng ba las/
21b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa dmar po zhal g.yas dang/ g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas na gri gug dang phreng ba dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang nor bu dang/ pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /phaT dang pad+ma las/ sa'i lha mo ser pa/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang dkar ba/ g.yas na gri
21b4(rgyud 'grel): gug dang bum pa dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang/ nor bu dang/ pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /phaT dang ral gri las thag bzangs ris sngon po/ /zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ g.yas na gri gug dang/ ral gri dang rdo rje dang phyag g.yon na thod pa dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma nyi ma la
21b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /swA dang dung las khyab 'jug sngon po/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar po dang dmar po/ g.yas gri gug dang dung dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon na thod pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs pa'o/ /tA dang dgra sta las sna can dkar po/ /zhal g.yas dang g.yon sngon po dang
21b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ /g.yas na gri gug dang dgra sta dang/ ral gri phyag g.yon na thod pa dang 'khor lo dang pad+ma/ ri bong can la bzhugs pa'o/ /de dag thams cad kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i shes rab ni sku dang gnyis su med par gyur pa/ /phyag dang po gnyis na thod pa thogs pa 'khyud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa/
21b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ sgrub pa po'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa/ de lta bur bsams la/ de dag gi mig la sogs pa la/ ji skad bshad pa'i rdo rje mig la sogs pa bskyed de/ /lus la sogs pa la sku rdo rje la sogs pa dang/ ji skad bshad pas dbang bskur la/ cod pan
22a1(rgyud 'grel): la gshin rje mthar byed bsams te/ yon chab dang zhabs bsil dang/ bsang gtor dbul lo/ /de nas gtor ma thams cad bstab par bya ste/ bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i thabs kyis bsgrubs la/ de nyid gsum gyis bsngags te de'i lce'i sbyor ba rnam par ? la/
22a2(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi dbul lo/ /sngags 'di yin te/ oM in+d+rA ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ya ma yaSh+TI ba ru NA ya wi/ ku be rA ya kri/ a'i shAn ya ha/ atna ye A/ nai rita ye na/ pA ya ba na/ tsan+d+rA ya hUM/ atA ya hUM/ brahma Na phaT/ ba su Dha yai phaT/ pe ma ci tra Na swA/ sarba d+ha ta b+ho hA/ hi hi hUM hUM phaM pheM phaT
22a3(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /de nas me tog dang/ spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri dang bshos gtsang la sogs pa phul la/ de dag gis kyang sgrub pa po mngon par dga' ba'i myang ba la sogs pa nye bar longs spyod par gyur to/ /de nas de dag la bstod pa ste/ rdo rje gsor ning dril bu dkrol nas/ gti mug rdo rje'i? ngo
22a4(rgyud 'grel): bo khyod ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod nas/ mngon par 'dod pa blangs la gshegs su gsol te/ oM a(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas so/ /sgrub pa po de ji ltar 'dod pa de dang/ de sgrub cing mdun du rgyal bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ /'di ni gtor ma'i de kho
22a5(rgyud 'grel): na nyid do/ /de'i rjes la slob ma gshin rje 'dul ba'i gzugs su dmigs la rjes su gnang ba sbyin te/ sems can kun la phan? pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten kun la thams cad du/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin po che
22a6(rgyud 'grel): dang pad+ma dang/ /las kyi sgra bcug pa'i rim pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga ni rjes su gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i lag na gnas/ /phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sbyin pa'o/ /
22a7(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+haM badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha hwaM d+ha ra yA ma badzra satwa hI hI hI hI hUM zhes slob ma la brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'o/ /de nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsams la/ lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos
22b1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar bzung ba'i tshul dang/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa byas la/ oM e Sho hAM bya ka ro mi twAM/ badzra satwata thA ga ta/ b+ha ba durga ti taputI tye/ at+tanhab+ha ba sid+da ye// //kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ta thA ga ta sid+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya ste b+harb+ha wa swA(rgyud 'grel): zhes tshig 'di dang phyag rgya 'dis ?
22b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa byas pa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du mgrin gcig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston te/ mngon par mtho ba'i phyag rgya 'di'i mthu dang sngags 'di yi slobs la dang por gyis shig /ces bya ba slob ma la brjod de 'di
22b3(rgyud 'grel): ni lung bstan pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba brjod par bya ba ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /gzhan ni khams gsum na med de/ /des na rtag tu khyod kyis ni/ /'dod chags bral bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig sbyin pa ni hUM phaT gsang ba brjod pa'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
