22b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /de ring khyod ni gnas par gyur/ /khyod ni yang yang mi 'chi bas/ /de phyir bde chen theg pa mthod/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las 'das pa'i/ /srid pa khyod kyis shin tu 'grub/ /rdo rje phyag rgya zhes bya gang/ gang
22b5(rgyud 'grel): zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ sangs rgyas nyid thob the tshom med/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /gang phyir rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i kyi dam pa'i chos ni smad ni ?/ /nam yang sdad par mi bya'o/ /ma rig pa 'am gti mug gis/ /rtag tu skur pa mi gdab po/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /
22b6(rgyud 'grel): nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /slob dpon brnyas par mi bya ste/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rang gi bdag nyid mi spang ste/ /bka' thub gyis kyang gdung mi bya/ ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung 'di ni ma 'ongs sangs rgyas nyid/ /de ring dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyis/ /khyod kyi sngags dang rgyud
22b7(rgyud 'grel): kyang zung/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kyis kyang 'dod pa yin/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ cho ga bzhin du khyod kyis ni/ /'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /sgrub pa pos ni rgyud la sbyar/ /zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyug pa'o/ /'di dang rjes su gnas pa
23a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi po ni/ /dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs sam dbang bzhi pa'i rjes thogs su yang sbyin par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyi dbang nyid la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes kyang bya ste/ 'di ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /da ni gos kyi yol ba la sogs pas dben par byas
23a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs cig tu slob mar zin pa mdzes pa gzugs la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa dam tshig gi sdom pa can sbyor ba bzhi la mkhas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bla ma la gsang ba'i dbang gi don du dbul lo/ /de nas byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji ltar
23a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod chen stsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la'ang bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /zhes bya ba'am/ gzhan gyis kyang gsol ba gdab po/ /de nas bla mas sbyor ba bzhi mngon du byas la chos nyid kyi pad+ma'i nang na rdo rje zhugs pa'i mdza' bskyod pas/ rang rig pa'i
23a4(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa srin lag dang mthe bos blangs te slob ma'i kha ru bcug nas/ btung ba rin chen 'di de ni/ /rdo rje dus su rab sgrub byed/ /bu khyod rtag tu shes gyis la/ /yid la ma byung ba'i chu 'di 'thung/ /zhes bya bas sbyin no/ /des kyang e ma bde ba chen po/ /zhes brjod cing
23a5(rgyud 'grel): mid par bya'o/ /des kyang rang gi pad+ma'i lhag ma yang der gzhug par bya ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /de'i rdo rje la de nyid dam gzhan yang rung/ /rang rig pa'i ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sngar bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma'i lag par de'i
23a6(rgyud 'grel): lag pa gtad la/ mdzes pa 'di ni gzung ba dang/ /bstod bya sangs rgyas rnams kyi brtags/ /'khor lo rdzes chags sbyor ba yis/ /de phyir bde ba dam pa myang/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min/ /'gro gsum 'di dag ngag pa ste/ /de phyir 'khor ba spong ba ni/ /khyod ni nam
23a7(rgyud 'grel): yang ma byed cig/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /glen pa gang zhig 'das gyur na/ dngos grub mchog ni de la med/ /ces brjod la sbyin no/ /de yang gyur kum la sogs pas byugs la dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan te/ /gos dang dral
23b1(rgyud 'grel): bas chu skyes rab tu rgyas par gsal bar ston cing/ /slob ma la 'di skad brjod do/ /bu khyod dga' ba gang la yin/ /dri chen dri chung la sogs zas?/ /de bzhin khrag dang shukra dang/ /sha dang bud med gus dang gzhan/ /de bzhin bya ga'i ?/ /'o? byang smos pa las bde? ba can/ /zhes brjod par
23b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /des kyang/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /dri chen dri chu bu sogs 'tshal/ /bud med la yang rtag dang bgyid/ /b+ha ga la par 'o bgyid do zhes brjod do/ /de nas nges/ e ma'o bdag gi pad+ma 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ /gang dag chos bsten byed pa/ /bdag ni de yi mdun na
23b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa/ /ji lta ba bzhin pad+mar byas/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid kyang/ /'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /kye thar pa bsten cig ces brjod nas/ /des kyang bla ma'i man ngag gis/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mar/ /dmigs pa bstan pa'i cho ga'i bye brag
23b4(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /rnal 'byor pas ni ji srid du/ /byang chub sems ni 'byung 'gyur ba/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad 'thob pa/ /dga' ba'i bde las gzhan ci yod/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur te/ /byang chub sems ni 'bab gyur pas/ /phung po'i rnam shes rgyal gyur ba/ /smad pas dngos grub ga la
23b5(rgyud 'grel): yod/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i khams sbyor bas/ /der reg pa las ngo mtshar che'i/ /bde ba gang gang de las bskyed/ /mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o/ /dga' bral gyi ni dbus dag tu/ /ltos la bstan pa mtshon par gyis/ /pad+ma'i rdo rje la rdo rje'i bar dkas mnan pa'i gnas su rdo rje skyil krung
23b6(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /sems nor bu'i nang du song bas bltas la/ /gang gi che ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe/ de'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min/ /dbus kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor gang tshe shes mig gis/ /zad med bde la gnas pa ni/ /thun nam
23b7(rgyud 'grel): yang na nyin mtshan nam/ /zla phyed zla gcig lo dang ni/ /bskal pa'am bskal pa stong dag tu/ /ye shes mngon par sbyor bas gnas/ /de ltar brtags nas nus pa ji lta ba bzhin sems pa btang ste/ bcud kyis len gyis rtogs pa bzung la chu skyes kyis mdza' de nyid du mthong ba'i
24a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi sems blangs nas/ /ro mnyam par gyur ba ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'o/ /gal te 'dir dbang lnga dang/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ma gsungs par/ /dang po rtsa ba'i dbang yin te/ /gnyis par ral gri sbyin par bya/ /gsum pa
24a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu ste/ /bzhi po zla ba bza' ba'o/ /bzhi po de ni dbang chen ste/ /nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yin/ /zhes rgyud las gsungs pa ma yin nam zhe na/ /dbang lnga po de nyid rtsa ba'i dbang zhes bya ste/ thams cad du rdo rje tsar cig la sogs pa rtsa ba'i dbang gi byed par ldan pa'i phyir
24a3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ 'dis thams cad du las rab dbang du gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig sbyin pa ni ral gri'i dbang ste/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod pa'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bstan pa nyid kyis rdo rje dang/ dril bu spyi bor bzhag pas rgyud las thun mongs du
24a4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i brtul bzhugs dang/ lung bstan pa dang dbugs dbyung ba bstan pa'i/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gis rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs su bsgom nas/ btsun mo thams cad blang bar bya'o/ /de nas btsun mos rdo rje blta/ der ni 'o ma bsgrub par bya/ /rtse gcig sems
24a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'o ma bsgoms/ /phyag rgya chen por rab bsgrubs zhes bya bas bsgrubs pa nyid ni bla na med pa'i 'gro ba'i don ma lus pa'i/ sgrub pa brtags pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas yang rang gis rig pa dang/ tha mi dad pa thub pa'i 'khor lo'i bdag nyid/ yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i 'od 'phro
24a6(rgyud 'grel): ba bstan pa'i rang bzhin slob ma la sbyin no/ /zhes bya ba 'di yang sbyin pa'o/ /slob med la phan yon gyis spro bar bya ste/ mthong dang reg pas mchog nyid kyi/ /snying po mchog gi dkyil 'khor ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /de ring khyod ni legs par gnas/ /khyod la
24a7(rgyud 'grel): yang yang 'chi ba med/ /bde ba chen po'i theg pa 'di/ /kun tu bzang po yin pas na/ /gang yang ma 'jigs khyod rol cig /khyod ni srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgal/ /srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mchog gi mchog /'di ni rtag tu bsrung bar gyis/ /dngos
24b1(rgyud 'grel): grub pas tshig sdom pas yin/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gsungs/ /dka' 'di rtag pa mchog yin no/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin khros nas spun zla yi/ /skyon rnams bsgrags par mi bya'o/ /sems can rnams la byams pa'i
24b2(rgyud 'grel): sems/ /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems kyang spang mi bya/ /rang gzhan chos la smad mi bya/ /sems can yongs su mi sman la/ /gsang ba nyid ni bsgrag mi bya/ /bdag nyid smad par mi bya'o/ /rang gi chos la smad mi bya/ /gdug pa byams pas rtag tu spar/ /chos la chos bzung bar
24b3(rgyud 'grel): mi bgyi/ /sems can dad pa can mi bslu/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /shes rab rang bzhin bud med rnams/ /skyon 'di zhes kyang smad mi bgyi/ /rnal 'byor slong mos mi 'khor zhi/ /rnal 'byor nyid ni spar mi bya/ /rtag par rgyun tu gsang sngags bzla/ /dam tshig la sogs rtag tu bsten
24b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bla ma'i dam tshig la/ gnod na dkyil 'khor bris byas la/ /bde gshegs rnams la sdig pa bshags/ /de ring skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /de phyir 'di ni legs par mnos/ /mi mnyam pa yi lha rnams dang/ /mnyam gnas 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rjer
24b5(rgyud 'grel): bcas kun gyis/ /tshe dang ldan khyed dang dbang bskur/ /khams gsum rgyal po chen po ste/ /de ring bdag por rab tu brtan/ /de ring bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs/ /de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par/ /gyur pa 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bya bas rang gi rdo rje dam
24b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig mi zad pa'i bde ba byin la/ /bsten cig 'gro ba myur ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bas deng/ /rab tu mtshungs par rtag tu gyur/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /slob ma gus pa gsal ba yi/ /gsungs shig de bzhin bdag gis bgyi/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal
24b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ /gal te yod par gyur na de'i lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo thams cad kyis blangs la sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya'o/ /sreg rdzas gcig gam gnyis sam/ bdun gyi bar gyis so/ /des kyang mgu ba'i yid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i sa gzhi dang/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ gser dang/
25a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang/ bu dang chung ma sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos po 'am/ bdag nyid kyang dngos grub la sogs pa sgrub pa'i phyir dbul lo/ /yon bza' ba dang/ rang dang gzhan gyi 'khor los mchod par bya'o/ /sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bzung la/ /mchog sna tshogs
25a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis de dag tshim par byas te/ gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba byas la gsol ba btab ste/ brtan pos lha'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /chos thams cad rim skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje rtse mos 'khor
25a3(rgyud 'grel): lo gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas 'dod pa la rdul mtshon cung zad byin la/ chu chen por gshegs su gsol lo/ /snying po grong du gang bcug dang/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i nor gang yin/ /de dag thams cad slob dpon ni/ /rdo rje 'chang mchog bskur bar bya/ bzang
25a4(rgyud 'grel): po zhabs sogs kyis mdzad pa/ /gsang ba 'dus pa'i cho gar gsal/ /'dir ni gsang ba'i rlabs 'khor lo/ /cho ga la 'bad nyid kyis ngal/ /de phyir dbang po mchog rnams ni/ /skye bo bzang la bzod par gsol/ /gang phyir rang nyid dran pa'i phyir/ dpal ldan gshin
25a5(rgyud 'grel): gshed dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga sems can don bsgrub byas/ /de las dge ba gang thob pa/ rang gi shes las gzhan min pa'i/ /las 'joms shes rab dang ldan pa/ /spyod yul mi shes mun kun sel/ /srid pa mi 'jigs sang byed pa'i/ /legs pa'i tshogs  
25a6(rgyud 'grel): gang thob pa des/ /bdag dang 'gro ba blo ster shog /gshin rje gshed nag po'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon mkhas pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dA na kIrti dang// //lo
25a7(rgyud 'grel): ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// ! /rgya gar skad du/ badzra sa ra swa tI stotwa/ bod skad du/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mnga' bdag rdo rje
25b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can ma/ yang dag lam ston bla ma rje btsun la/ /dad cing mod la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros spel phyir bstod pa cung zad bri/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dbyangs can ma/ /rang don grub nas gzhan don ni/ /mchog tu gzhol mdzad rje btsun ma/ /dbyangs can de la skye bo yis/ /kun nas
25b2(rgyud 'grel): dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhal gsum rnam thar gsum gyi dngos/ /phyag drug pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/ /zhabs gnyis bden gnyis don rtogs ma/ /rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba smin mdzad pas/ /rtag tu pad ma rA ga'i mdog /dbyangs can de la spyi bo
25b3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pas/ /rtag tu chu skyes steng na bzhugs/ /dbyangs can de la spyi bo yis/ /kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni pad ma rA ga'i mdog /'dod chags rnam dag gsum la phyag 'tshal
25b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni in+d+ra nI la'i mdog /zhe sdang rnam dag thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /g.yon gyi zhal ni kun da zla ba'i mdog /gti mug rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po pad ma bsnams/ /ma chags 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal
25b5(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /bar pa ma rig cod mdzad ral gri bsnams/ /shes rab rnam gsum gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tha ma rnam rtog gcod mdzad gri gug bsnams/ /rtog med ting 'dzin gsol la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag drug g.yon gyi dang po band+ha bsnam/ /bdag med don rtogs
25b6(rgyud 'grel): mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bar pa dbul ba gcong mdzad rin chen bsnams/ /'gro kun re 'dod spong la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tha ma 'khor ba gcod mdzad 'khor lo bsnams/ /'khor ba rtsad nas gcod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mtshan dang dpe byad sku la phyag 'tshal
25b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /ka la bidka' i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes bya kun mkhyen thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ma rig mun sel khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
26a1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti dang/ lo rtsa ba mar do chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur ba'o/ /gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ yam a ri maN+Da la no bi ka ya mAn+ta koda ya nA ma bod skad du nga? gshin
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje khrag mthung la phyag 'tshal lo/ rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bar thub dbang 'od tshogs can/ /rang 'od gnyis med 'khril cing dpe bral bde bas gang/ /rab chags mdzes pas lha dang khro bas 'khrugs lta la
26a3(rgyud 'grel): blo mnyam 'jug mdzad gshin rje gshed der mngon sogs te/ /rgyud rgyal yon tan mang ldan mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba/ gshin rje dag yi don la bdag blo blun gyur kyang/ /zhal gyi pad ma las rnyed de yi rjes 'brangs nas/ dbang bskur sgrub bcas lo 'dab rtse tsam bya bar
26a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod/ /de la dang por sngags pa ni/ /rang lus 'jig na'ang gzhan don 'dod/ /rnyed dang bkur sti lam chags/ /rgyud 'dir gsang sogs dbang bskur bas/ /ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa yod/ /ljon shing gis klubs yid du 'ong/ /skye bo 'dus nas rnam dra bzhin/ /dris byugs
26a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog legs bkram par/ /dang por gdong sogs dag byas la/ /spro bas ? ba'i stan 'dug nas/ /snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /ya sngon 'od dang ldan pa bsam/ /de 'od las byung rigs tshogs kyis /bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bkug nas/ /rnam thar gyis sgo dag byas te/ /
26a6(rgyud 'grel): dag par gyur pas mngon sum blta/ /gshin rje gshed por sgrub pa yang/ /bsod nams med par mi 'grub la/ /sbyin sogs bsod nams bya ba yang/ /dbul phyir bdag gis mi nus pas/ /tsher bas sngon nas tshangs spyod bzhi/ /'bras bu yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /'gro ba kun gyi don
26a7(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i/ /ya nyid rab tu dran par bya/ /de las bdag nyid mAM sbrul te/ /lan gsum bskor zhing phyag 'tshal bsam/ /de sprul rig ma'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /ma lus mchod pas mnyes par bya/ /lus ngag yid kyis sdig bgyis dang/ bgying du stsal dang yi rang bar?/ /sgyu ma sgyu ma la
26b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs bzhin/ /thugs rje can rnams mdun du chags/ /sngon byas ma lus bshags nas ni/ /phyin chad de la mi 'jug cing/ /byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar/ /mi dge kun las ldog par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas de sras 'phags rnams dang/ /srid pa mthar phyin dam pa'i chos/ /skyabs kyi dam pa?
26b2(rgyud 'grel): de gsum la/ /deng nyid gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /rnam rtog rgya mos rab bcings shing/ /'khor pa'i rgya mtshor nub pa kun/ /bsgral phyir bde gshegs nyid thob pa/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /bde gshegs sras bcas 'phags skye bo/ /kun gyi dge 'dun bsdus la/ /sel med
26b3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu yi rang zhing/ /legs zhes kyang bsngags par bya/ /dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas kun/ /gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur ba'i/ /sbyin sogs lam gyi rang bzhin gang/ /ci yod stobs kyis yang dag bsten/ /yon tan rgya mtsho ldan rnams la/ /bdag nyid
26b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis dbul lags kyis/ /thugs rje mnga' ba khyod rnams kyis/ /so sor nang 'khor sbyod du bzhes/ /gang zhig mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa/ /ji srid 'khor ba gnas ?/ /de srid mya ngan mi 'da' bar/ /thugs rje can la gsol ba 'debs/ /byang chub shing la gzigs rnams la/ /thag
26b5(rgyud 'grel): chen bdud rtsi rab bshad par/ /'gro ba'i yab du gyur rnams la/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba gang/ /bgyid pa ma lus kun bsdus nas/ /'gro ba kun gyi bde chen nyid/ /thob pa'i rjes su mthun gyur cig /de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags la/ /gzhan don lhur mdzad thugs
26b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyes nas/ /rigs kyi bu khyod legs so zhes/ /gtang rag gnang nas mi snang gyur/ /rnam rtog rgya mtsho gting zab bar/ /yang dag lta ba'i glu shor cing/ /sna tshogs lta bas g.yengs rnams la /thugs rje chen pos dmigs nas su/ /rang bzhin med pas stong ba nyid/ /rgyu dang bral bas
26b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med/ /rnam rtog med pas rnam bral bar/ /byang chub sems mchog bsgom par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tAdz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sngags 'di bzlas nas 'gro kun gyi/ /lus ngag yid rnams ngo bo gcig /stong phyir de rnams brtags pa tsam/ /brtags pa yin phyir lus ngag yid/ /
27a1(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM yig gsum byas la/ /'od 'bar ho gnyis par gnas pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /nam mkha' la gnas bsam par bya/ /de las a(rgyud 'grel): chang byung nyi ma/ /de dbus yi ge hUM mthing las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od 'bar ba/ /lte bar yi ge
27a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM bcas bsam/ /de 'ong phyogs bcur rab 'phros pas/ /'od 'bar rdo rje'i gur du bsam/ /de dbus pad+ma zla stengs su/ /sam dkar las byung rdo rje las/ /kun bzang yum bcas bsam par bya/ /'bru lngas de zhu las byung ba/ /chos dbyings dkar po gru gsum pa/ /gyen du gnas pa
27a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'od bskor/ /pad mo sna tshogs pa las skyes/ /'dab ma 'bum ldan de dbus bsam/ /ge sar dbus su khaM yig las/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od tshogs can/ /lte bar bruM zer las byung ba'i/ /rig bcas rtag pa las byung ba/ /gzhal yas khang mchog gru bzhi pa/ /sgo bzhi rta babs mu
27a4(rgyud 'grel): khyud bcas/ /rdo rjer pa 'ong phreng bskor/ /dbus su rdo rje rgya gram mdzes/ /pad ma nyi zla'i gdan ldan bsgom/ /bzhi'o// //lte ba'i gdan steng bsam bya ba/ /a dang a(rgyud 'grel): mthar thugs phreng gnyis/ /de las zla ba de yis brgyan/ /ka sogs dpe byad 'od ldan
27a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /zur gcig las byung gnyis pa ste/ /dbus su 'dod chags yi ge raM/ /des bzhu 'od kyis gong bu las/ /dkar dmar hUM ni rab tu bsam/ /de mdog rdo rje de yis brgyan/ /badzro ta ko haM nga rgyal bskyed/ /rdo rje 'chang mchog 'ong tshogs can/ /zhal gsum sngo dkar dmar ba la/ /
27a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ral gri g.yas gnyis na/ /gzhan gnyis 'khor lo pad ma 'char/ /gri gug ba na ngas rang 'od 'khyud/ /bde bas gang ba bsam par bya/ /rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin gang/ /de ni sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan no/ /rnal 'byor ro/ /'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yis/ /snod du 'jig
27a7(rgyud 'grel): rten mthong nas su/ /rang snying las byung 'od zer gyis/ /khyab ste sna tshogs sangs rgyas byas/ /bkug nas bdag la zhugs pa yi/ /bde ba chen po nyid du gyur/ /mkha' la gnas pa'i yig 'bru lnga/ /ji ltar skar mnga' 'pho ba ltar/ /khar thim khu bar rab 'phros pas/ /rig dang bcas
27b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kun bzang zhu/ /'od kyi gong bur gyur pa las/ /thig le phra mo bzhi chad de/ /byams sogs tsar tsi ka sogs kyis/ /snyan pa'i glu yis bskul bar bsam/ /rje btsun thugs rjes khro bzhengs la/ /gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug spongs/ /gtso bor bdun rnams kun las rgyal/ /rje btsun ?
27b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thugs kyis bzhengs/ /'jig rten mgron gnyer gtong gnas shing/ /rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams bzhengs/ /kye/ khyod ni stong dmigs ci ste bzhugs/ /'jig rten byang chub rang bzhin mgron/ /'dod chags la ni dga' ba yis/ /zhu ba yin bskul nas su/ /de nyid la thim yang
27b3(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyur/ /rdo rje las byung mi bskyod pa/ /g.yas g.yon dkar dang dmar ba la/ /'od 'bar mthing ga sngon mtshungs phyag/ rgyan kun klubs pa'i sbrul gyis bcings/ /yum ldan thub pa'i 'od kyis 'khrigs/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das dngos kyi/ /sku de byang chub sems mchog go /oM swa b+hA ga
27b4(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /gsar byin brlab dang rjes chags ni/ /rgyud 'dir bdag gis mthong med kyang/ /rgyud rgyal don 'dir mi 'gal phyir/ /byin brlabs rjes chags bya bar 'os/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /mkha' khyab bde gshegs kun bkug nas/ /rdo rje las byung bar
27b5(rgyud 'grel): lte la/ /bde ba'i rgyun du 'phros par bsam/ /dga' ba'i thig le sa bon ni/ /'og nas 'chad pa nyid du gyur/ /de las thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /de las phyag rgya chen por blta/ /snod chen bzhi yang rdzogs pa dang/ /blo ldan phyi rol spro bar bya/ /hI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): las sogs gsang sngags kyis/ /
27b6(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang mthing kha rdo rje dang/ /ral gri 'khor lo pad ma 'chang/ /spros nas slar byon bdag la thim/ /dzi na dzika ces brjod pa yis/ /gti mug dkar po 'od 'bar ba/ /'khor lo ral gri rin chen bar/ /mkha' las bton nas shar phyogs su/ /lho phyogs rdo rje'i rwa nyid la/ /ratna d+h+rika gis ser sna ni
27b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsom gser dang mtshungs pa'i mdog /rin chen ral gri 'khor lo bar/ /A ro lika gis nub phyogs su/ /'dod chags byu ru bcag 'dra ba/ /pad ma ngang ni ral gri dang/ /'khor lo rin chen 'chang ba mchog /padz+nyA d+h+rika ces bya ba yis/ /byang du phrag dog chen po ste/ /sngo bsangs ral gri
28a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dang/ /'khor lo pad ma 'dzin pa'o/ /mung+gar d+hika gis de bzhin te/ /sngon po tho ba ral gri dang/ /rin chen pad ma 'dzin pa ni/ /shar gyi sgo du bsam par bya daN+Da d+hIka ces bya ba yis/ /be con 'dzin pa dkar ba ste/ be con ral gri 'khor lo pad/ /lho yi sgo ru bsam
28a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /pad ma d+h+rika gis nub sgo ru/ /pad ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba/ /pad ma ral gri rdo rje dang/ /rin chen 'dzin pa bsam par bya/ /khaDga d+hika gis byang sngo ru/ /ljang gu ral gri 'dzin pa ste/ /ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo can/ /rim bzhin 'chang ba 'khrugs pa'o/ /dwe Sha ra te zhes de
28a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /tsar tsig mdog dkar mo la/ /gtso bo dang mtshungs phyag mtshan can/ /me yi phyogs su legs par bzhag /mo ha ra ti zhes pa yis/ /phag mo sku mdog sngon mo la/ /rang gi gtso bo'i phyag rgya can/ /spros nas bden bral grwa la'o/ /ra ga ra ti zhes sngags kyis/ /dbyangs
28a4(rgyud 'grel): can ma ni dmar mo la/ /pad ma la sogs 'dzin pa'i phyag/ rlung mtshams na ni 'gro don mdzad/ /badzrar ti zhes pa yis/ /mdzod ldan ljang gu ud pa la can/ phyi ma btso bo'i mtshan 'dzin ma/ /dbang ldan grwa du bsam par bya/ /gti mug gshin rje lha mo bzhi/ /pad ma zla ba'i
28a5(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs/ /lhag ma pad+ma nyi ma la/ /lnga phrag gnyis dang drug phyed lha/ /gri gug ban da'i phyag zung cig/ mthun par rang gi rig ma 'khyung/ /bzhir gyur dbus su de 'od bsam/ /sngon po'i g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar/ dkar po'i g.yas sngo g.yon pa dmar/ /dmar po ser
28a6(rgyud 'grel): po ljang gu yi/ /g.yas sngo g.yon pa dkar po yin/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs 'od phreng can/ /ma lus 'khyugs pa sprul gyis brgyan/ /me mtshams la sogs ban da bzhi/ /zla bas gang ba oM gyis mtshan/ /pad ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ de nyid gsum gyis rim bzhin don/ /
28a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus yid sku mtshams breng rtse ru/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM raM kaM? saM las/ /gti mug gshin dgra sogs rim bzhin/ /rdo rje can sogs kha dog rgya/ /mngon par shes pa'i don du ni/ /rdo rje skye
28b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod rnam par bsgom/ /snying mgrin dpral ba'i zla steng du/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo la/ hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM yig bkod byas te/ /de las phyag rgya de byung sku/ /zhe sdang 'dod chags gti mug dang/ /'dra bar thugs sogs bsgom byas te/ /de dag thams cad rang
28b2(rgyud 'grel): rang rgya/ mtshan ma'i lte bar hUM A(rgyud 'grel): oM/ /de las tsar tsi ka sogs spro/ /mkhar bkug sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas/ /spyan drangs thugs gsung skur bcug la/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di brjod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ /
28b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAgbadzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka yi/ /sa bon las 'od lha mor spro/ /phyogs bcu'i mgon po mched byas nas/ /dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bya/ /de
28b4(rgyud 'grel): nas de bzhin gshegs dag la/ /sprul ba'i tsar tsi ka la sogs/ /phyag na ye shes chus gang ba'i/ /bum pa zla ba 'od legs thogs te/ /yid 'ongs bkra shis glu len cing/ /sil snyan spos kyi sprin dag dang/ /dri med dbang bskur sprin phab pas/ /so so'i gtso
28b5(rgyud 'grel): bos dbu brgyan no/ /rang snying 'od kyi tsar tsi ka/ bskul nas de yi thugs ka nas/ /rang 'dra 'phros te khro mo bkug /rdo rje'i bur stengs bzhugs bsam la/ /khro bo rnams kyis mngon bskrad de/ /rdo rje'i ra ba bshig byas nas/ /zhugs te rang mdun pad+mar bsam/ /de nas snying 'phros khro bo yis/ /gur
28b6(rgyud 'grel): bshig phyir btsigs snying zhugs bsam/ /rang mdun dung chos sogs gsum bzhag /me tog dkar ldan dri chus bkang/ /de mdun man 'jig gnyis stengs su/ /gser sogs gsol ba'i snod gnyis bzhag/ /g.yas phyogs dung ni gsum pa la/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i chogs su/ /byin brlabs
28b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi bcu phyer blugs/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri'i sngags bzlas la/ /ku shi'i ba ma pos dang po'i chu/ /bzed zhal dang por lan gsum gtor/ /gnyis pa chu dang me tog bcas/ /bzung ste de yi snod nyid la/ /lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya/ /gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas/ /gnyis par mchod yon chu yang
29a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin/ /de nang me tog gzung byas la/ /zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan pas/ /de yi snod la zhabs bsil sbyin/ /rang snying 'od kyis tho ba bskul/ /mung+gar dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod nas dgug /de bzhin be con bskul ba yis/ /daN+Da hUM zhes brjod nas gzhug /snying pos
29a2(rgyud 'grel): pad ma bskul nas su/ /pad ma pa ma zhes brjod nas bcing/ /de bzhin ral gri 'dzin bskul te/ /khaDga ho zhes brjod mnyes bya/ rang snying ye shes 'od cher gyis/ /mkha' khyab sangs rgyas kun bkug nas/ /khar thim lus kyi bcud gyur te/ /rdo rje lam byung shes rab kyis
29a3(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i snying por rab 'phros las/ /lha mo'i tshogs ni mdzes gyur te/ /ba spu'i bu ga las 'phros nas/ /me tog sna tshogs mdzes rnams kyis/ /sdong bu lag pas legs bzung nas/ sgeg dang bcas pas mchod byas te/ /rab snyan yid 'phrog klu dang ni/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa'i
29a4(rgyud 'grel): gar gyis su/ /bde ba chen po rab tu ster/ /kye kye gshin rje dgra nag po/ /bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /bdag gis khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs/ /khro bo'i rang bzhin nyid spongs te/ /bdag po yis ni gar byas pas/ /mtho ris mi yul sa 'og 'dir/ /nag po khro bo yid kyis
29a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs/ /gar byed khyod ni 'jigs pa che/ /nag por mi thung gshin dgras gnag /gzugs ni rnam pa sna tshogs sprul/ /rdo rje dbyangs can mas zhus pa/ /gar byed khyod ni bde ba che/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): 'i sngags kyis gar byed khyod/ /gnas gsum kun gyi the tshom spongs/ /rje btsun gshin rje
29a6(rgyud 'grel): khro bo khyod/ /'gro ba kun gyis gar byed mthong/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta puA dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako haM/ sgra yul thams cad brag ca dang/ 'dra bar rab tu blta byas te/ rang nyid lhag pa'i ltar gnas la/ yon tan kun ni sgrogs par bsam/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin dgra nag po rab
29a7(rgyud 'grel): tu 'jigs/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /mi 'jigs sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin dgra nag po shin tu 'jigs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab snang ba/ /rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gtso
29b1(rgyud 'grel): bo 'dod chags chos 'byung ba/ /dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog /gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /thams cad las kun gshin rje'i dgra/ las kyi rdo rje rab snang ba/ /ral gri'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams
29b2(rgyud 'grel): cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog /dkyil 'khor bdag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yaM las byung ba sngon po la/ /gzhu 'dra'i ba dan mtshan pa ste/ /raM gyis byin brlab rlung dkyil 'khor/ /g.yo med steng na me nyid ni/ /dmar po gru gsum ? las byung/ /de skyed ? bden ni/
29b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'o/ /de nang bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni/ /gshin rje lnga yi yi ge las/ /lcags kyu lnga ni de nyid kyi/ /ming 'di thog ma'i yi ge las/ /hUM dkar las byung rdo rje yis/ /de la kha ni bkang bar bsam/ /mthong gang spags pa'i bar snang la/ /zla ba'i steng du oM dkar bsam/ /kha
29b4(rgyud 'grel): bkab rdo rje'i lte ba yis/ /hUM las 'od 'phros ba dan bskul/ /de yis rlung bskyod des me bskul/ /rdzas kun zhu zhing khol ba la/ /rdo rjes 'khrug cing zhu gyur pas/ /shin tu dri med bdag mthong nas/ oM las 'od byung ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsi bsdus nas der thim pas/ /gangs chu 'dra bar bsil
29b5(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ /yi ge gsum brjod bsrungs la bzhag /gshin rje gshed kyi lha rnams kyi/ /ljags la rdo rje dkar po re/ /bsam te de las 'od zer ni/ spu gur gyur pa rab 'phros te/ /bdud rtsir zug la rang rang sngags/ /brjod pas spu gus sdubs nas tshim/ /snying 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcur khyab/ /
29b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos kun gshin rje dgrar? byas nas/ /bsdus te bdag pa thim gyur pas/ /bdag nyid yang thim thig ler gyur/ /thig ler 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed/ /de yi 'od kyi phreng ba yis/ /bdag sogs lha rnams gsal byas te/ /snying gar dkyil 'khor phra gnas pas/ /brtan par gyur nas spro dang
29b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /las dang chos dang chen po dang/ /gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje la/ /dad dang sa bon thugs kar bsam/ /ye shes sems dpa' i thugs ka ru/ /trI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gsang sngags bsam/ /gsang sngags bzlas pas gnas bzhi nas/ /khro bo'i rgyun rnams
30a1(rgyud 'grel): spro bsdu ba/ /rim pa 'am lhan cig bya bar 'dod/ /dbugs dbyung 'phro bar bsam bya ste/ /dbugs bsdu sngags kyang bsdu bar bya/ /bgrang phreng dung chen la sogs la/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs mched byas nas/ /gshin rje dgra yi skur bsam te/ /mtho bo lcags kyus
30a2(rgyud 'grel): drang zhing bzlas/ /rang snying de bzhin dmigs nyid pas/ /sems la nyams su chung 'gyur zhing/ /bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis/ /bsgrims te rdo rje gsong nas kyang/ /g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing/ /rdo rje glu chu la sna tshogs dang/ /mchod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod/ /dkyil
30a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhengs la yang bzlas so/ /bdag nyid gtor bar 'dod gyur na/ /'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te/ /mchod stong bdud rtsi myang byas la/ /yig gsum mthar ru mu(rgyud 'grel): bzhag pa'i/ /sngags kyis ye shes gshegs par bskul/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi lha rnams ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu:
30a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bsdu/ /bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la/ /ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya ste/ /de yang yi ge de stong bsam/ /bzod pa gsol dang gsol ba gdab/ /sngo dang smon lam gdab par bya/ /'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o// //rang gi lha yi nga rgyal gyis/ /yang
30a5(rgyud 'grel): dag 'das la spyod lam kun/ /gshin rje dgra yi ngo bor byas/ /zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin no/ /kha zas ci za bdud rtsir brlab/ /kha i hoM khung sreg khang du/ /lha rnams tshim bya sreg rdzas rnams/ /lag pa'i gzar bus bstab bar bya/ /phyi yi khrus rnams byed pa na/ /'gro ba rang bzhin dag
30a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam la/ /de bas bskur la yi cho ga bzhin/ /lha mo'i bum chus bkrus par bsam/ /phyi thun la yang de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i bar du bya/ /bza' ba zos nas nyal ba'i tshe/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal/ /ldan pa'i dus na dpal ldan pa'i/ /lha mo'i dbyangs kyis
30a7(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bsam/ /'di ltar 'di las dang po pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba yin/ /ye shes 'ga' sogs rnal 'byor pas/ /sbyor ba rnam gsum rim bzhin bya/ /spyod lam dag gi tshe na yang/ /lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun/ /phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid du/ /bsams te bya ba kun
30b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dpa' min gcig gcig mthong ba la/ /bde sdug rnam par grol 'gyur ba/ /sems nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir/ /rtag med sems gnag ga la 'gyur/ /sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga'o// //bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs bcom la/ /gzhan gyi don la brtson bya
30b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang/ /mtshan ma brtan po yang dang yang/ /mthong zhing gnang ba thob nas bya/ /yid dga' ba yis phyogs ni/ /shar dang byang ga che? nyid do/ /dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol bar/ /bgegs bskrad phur btab gtor ma sbyin/ /gsol gdab rnal 'byor gsum byas nas/ /sangs rgyas la
30b3(rgyud 'grel): yang gsol ba gdab/ /mchod yon ga las bsil phul nas su/ /sbyin sreg gis kyang rab tshim bya/ /de nas mkha' la bkod nas su/ /bgegs mad sa ni legs brkos nas/ /slar yang sa yis rab tu dgod/ /sngon du rus ring bsnyen byas pa'i/ /gshin rje gshed kyi skyong ldan pas/ /
30b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor sa ni rdzogs byas te/ oM b+hu khaM zhes sngags kyis ni mkha' la ri ni bskyed par bya/ /hUM laM hUM zhes rdo rje'i bdag /nyid dus byas de byin brlab/ /oM me di ni badzri b+hA ba badzra band+ha hUM/ /sngon bzhin lha yi ting 'dzin ni/ /sa yi dbus su rnal 'byor ba ni/ /rim bzhin byas nas rdzogs pa
30b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sangs rgyas kun bdag gshin rje ni/ /rdo rje dril 'dzin gtso bo la/ /grogs po rdo rje dril 'dzin bzhi/ /gti mug sogs bdag lhan cig tu/ /sprul pas dkyil 'khor gsum la ni/ /mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun
30b6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi gnas/ /chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs/ /kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag
30b7(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyor ba/ /kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med/ /kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas gshin rje
31a1(rgyud 'grel): gshed langs te/ /ma dang Ta mi yi ge las/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi mig gnyis su/ nyi ma dang ni zla ba bsam/ /blo can 'gro ba kun bltas nas/ /dkyil 'khor sa la stang stabs bskor/ /rkang thil a las rdo rjer bsgom/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gser byed cang g.yon
31a2(rgyud 'grel): pas dril bsil 'gying bag du/ /gnas te mche gtsigs hUM brjod do/ /lha dang lha min la sogs pa/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bskrad par bya/ /nyon cig bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun/ /sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yis/ /bdag ni dpal ldan ral gri 'dzin/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor
31a3(rgyud 'grel): lo'i don byed pa/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis/ /gal te gang gis bdag tshig 'das/ /lus ngag gsum las skyes pa bcad/ /'jig par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de nas sa la bskor byas te/ /bgegs med bya phyir phur bus gdab/ /phung po stang ni khro bo la/ /sman ni rdo rje rtse
31a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa/ /phung pa'i gsang sngags bzlas pa lnga/ /mtshams dang dbus su gdab par bya/ /'od zer rnon po rab 'phros pas/ /phyogs bcur yang dag gnas pa yis/ /bgegs kyi phung po kun gzhom mo/ /shin tu bgegs med rab mthong nas/ /mtshams bcad phyogs cing sngon
31a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ blo yis byas nas sa rdzogs nas/ /sta gon gnas pa'i rim bzhin bya/ /ba ser las gyur? lha ma ni/ /'od dang bcas pa bkug nas su/ /mchod pa phul nas gsol gdab/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ lha mo
31a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni dbang btsugs te/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud sde las/ rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /dri zhim chu yis sa byugs nas/ me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dgram/ /bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis/ /lha rnams maN Dal rab
31a7(rgyud 'grel): tu bya/ /de la dkyil 'khor dang sngags kyis/ /dgug la mtshams sogs bcing byas nas/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang bar bya/ /de nas bum pa'i sta gon ni/ /rin chen bum pa mi gnag pa/ /mgrin pa ras kyis bcing ba las/ /ldum bu mchog gis khal brgyan/ /rin chen
31b1(rgyud 'grel): smin 'bru sna lnga dang/ dro chus bkang ba mngon par sngags/ sna tshogs me tog rgyus pa yis/ skud pa'i rtse mor rdo rje gdags/ /bum khar bzhag la lag pas gzung/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gtso la sogs/ /sngags bzlas nas ni mchod yon 'bul/ /me tog dang pa dang spos sogs mchod/ /
31b2(rgyud 'grel): dri sogs pad ma'i snod legs bzhag /nyin dang mtshan mo thun gsum du/ /gtor ma sbyin zhing de bzhin bzla/ /de dag dkyil 'khor phyi rol la/ /gnas nas rgyal ba gtso bo yis/ /de nas g.yon gyi snod la chu/ /blugs nas re yis gtor bas na/ /bdag dang slob ma thams cad byas/ /chu
31b3(rgyud 'grel): yis dbang bskur gyur pa yin/ /de nas rang gi lce brlabs la/ /g.yas pas spos phor bteg nas su/ /bus mo btsugs nas blo ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor bcod pa sangs rgyas zhu/ /mngon po zhe sdang gshin rje yi/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis gshin rje'i? dkyil
31b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni/ /mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste/ /slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /de bas bcom ldan gus ldan la/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par gsol/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /'gro ba 'khor ba'i don byed rnams/ /'bras gnas byang
31b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' dang/ /gsang sngags kyi ni lha gzhan dang/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang/ /'byung po yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas bstan par mngon dga' dang/ /gang su lha yi mig can rnams/ /che ge zhes pa'i rdo rje yis/ /dkyil 'khor gshin rje las byung ba/ /ji
31b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar nye bar spyod nus pas/ /'gro dag don du bri bar bya/ /sgong? ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /thugs rjes nye bar gzung nas su/ /thams cad dkyil 'khor la bcug nas/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /de ltar snyan gsan lan gsum du/ /byas nas gtso la yan chad sogs/ /phul nas
31b7(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs te byed byung nas/ /slob ma brtags pa gzung bar bya/ /byas pa bzo dang khangs pa med/ /rigs mdog na song ldan pa dang/ /theg pa mchog la mngon dga' ba'o/ /de las bzlog pa'i slob ma ni/ /dman pas sta gon gnas mi bya/ /tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /phyi ma'i tshe la mi
32a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ngo/ /skyes bu tshe phyi mar 'dod pas/ /'dir yang 'bras bu rgyas par 'gyur/ /de ltar slob ma la smras nas/ /blo ldan rang gi nang du 'gro/ /yon tan de ldan slob ma yis/ /sgo nas gsol ba gdab bar bya/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /slob dpon ??
32a2(rgyud 'grel): dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag la stsol/ /de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar ba chen po'i grong khyer du/ /mgon po
32a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni 'jug par bgyid/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod nus pa'i/ /slob mar ba chags mdzes pa la/ /slob dpon rtse gcig tu byas la/ /tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin par bya/ /'jing shog bu 'di theg chen gyi/ /cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /tshul chen
32a4(rgyud 'grel): la khyod bsnyen pa gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang/ /da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun/ /de dag gis ni gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga mchog bzang 'di rnyed nas/ /dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du/ /thams cad
32a5(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa mnyam med brnyes/ /gsang sngags cho ga mnyam med de/ oshAkya seng ge la sogs kyis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dpung tshan dag kyang de yis bcom/ /'jig rten 'jug par rab shes nas/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i
32a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas bshags dang yi rang sogs/ /byas nas byang chub sems bskyed la/ bsrung ba byas te de nas ni/ /thugs gsung sku yi byin brlabs la/ /ye ge gsum dang ldan ba der/ mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas lha yi sngags bzlas
32a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ me tog rtser ldan sbyin par bya/ /tho rangs langs nas shar bltas te/ /sa lam lhung lci ba yis/ /sal ba ko tsam byugs te/ /rtsa mo bca' zhing de ru dor/ /zhi dang rgyas sogs gar grub blta/ /de nas kha bshal btab? gsum chu/ /byin lam?
32b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di bzlas par bya// //oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): sarba pA pa ni tsa sya sho d+ha ya sarba ba kal? paM a ba na ya hUM/ /gshin rje'i sngags bzlas ku sha ni/ /stan dang sngags su sbyin par bya/ /mdud pa gsum ldan bsrung skud ni/ /dpung pa g.yon par bcing? bar bya
32b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas sems kyi spungs bskyed phyir/ /zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad de/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /de phyir khyod rnams dong bas na/ /rab byung skal ba chen po pa/ /yod dang med pas rnam 'das shing zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis/ /rab tu mi
32b3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs gnas med pa/ /spos pa kun dang bral ba ste/ /spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa/ /rgyu dang las las kun tu byung/ /las dang bya ba sogs dang bral/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/ /theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi/ /tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur/ /ku sha'i lam du nyal
32b4(rgyud 'grel): bcug la/ /rmi lam mthong ba dge mi dge/ mthong rang bdag la ma 'dzem par/ /smros shig ces ni bsgos la btang/ /de nas sdom pa bzung nas su/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bsgom byas te/ /mchod cing gsol ba btab byas la/ /nam mkha' la ni dgod par bya/ /kha dog lnga yi skud pa
32b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /yak+She ma med bkod de/ /gshin rje dgra lnga'i sku ru bsam/ /zhe sdang gshin rjer bdag bltas la/ /dza las byung ba'i nyi zla'i mig /'bar mig lcags kyus drangs nas su/ /rang mdog skud ba'i nang du thim/ /gti mug ral gri dang lhan cig /thig sna drangs la bsgril bar
32b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// //a n+yo n+yA nu ga ta sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): pa ra spa rA nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harmA tyan+tA nu pra biSh+Ta sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ma dkar ldan lag pa yi/ /gzung la sngags 'di bzlas par bya/ /sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ /ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis gyur la/ /sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha/ /dri
32b7(rgyud 'grel): zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis ni/ /byugs nas bsrungs la snod gtsang bzhag /de la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod/ /de nas skud pa sngags byas la/ /dzdza yig gsum gyis btang bar bya/ /des kyang dzdza yig gsum gyis drangs/ /lte bar khu tshur g.yon gyis gzung/ /nub tu gnas nas shar bltas 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ /mkhas pas nam mkhar thig gdab po/ /oM badzra sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ sems can don byed dus dag tu/ /mkha' khyab pa yi de bzhin gshegs/ /'dir gshegs pa yi don gyi phyir/ /thig skud sgyu yis bskul bar bsam/ /lho nas byang
33a2(rgyud 'grel): du kha bltas te/ /shar gyi thig ni rab tu gdab/ /de bzhin byang nas lhor bltas te/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi skud pa brtag /de nas shar du drangs pa yis/ /byang phyogs kyi ni ngos gdab bo/ /shar nas bden bral mtshams bltas te/ /lho yi thig ni gdab par bya/ /de nas me yi mtshams
33a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas te/ /rlung gri mtshams su gdab par bya/ /bden bral mtshams nas dbang ldan du/ /drangs te grwa yi thig gdab po/ /de nas thig rnams ci rigs par/ /lhag chad med pa nyid du gdag /de nas dbus su phur? btab ste/ /de la brtod pa'i srang bu ni/ /dkyil 'khor nyis
33a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dag gis so/ /rdo rje ra ba la sogs bskor/ /'di yi phyi yi 'khor lo ni/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi la/ /rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes/ /kha khyer bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs brgyan/ /sgo yi mtshams dang grwa bzhi ru/ /zla phyed rdo rje mdzes par bya/ /de yi nang
33a5(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ /rdo rje phreng bas rab mdzes pa'i/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya/ /hi las nyi ma zla ba dag /mig tu bsams te khro bo yi/ /lta bar bcas pas kun bltas nas/ /sgo rnams dag ni legs bya ba/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad
33a6(rgyud 'grel): char bya/ /sgo khyud chen po sngar kha yin/ /sgo yi ched du khyams bya ste/ /de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o/ /kha khyer sgo yi phyed du ste/ /'gram dang gshog pa de yi ched/ /dra ba dre phye nyi zla dang/ /rnga dang rdung dkrol la sogs rgyan/ /de phyed tsho na sna lnga yis/ /rdo rje ra ba'ang de'i tshad/ /rta babs
33a7(rgyud 'grel): sgo yi sum 'gyur la/ /ba dan dril bu la sogs rgyan/ /rin chen kun dang lcags rnams dang/ /'byung khung bdag gi phyi ma la/ /yi ge lnga bkod byin brlabs bya/ /'bar bar gyur dang gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ /sems can khams rnams grol mdzad cing/
33b1(rgyud 'grel): de ni chos dbyings ro? yin no/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i tshe/ /rlung la sogs pa byur gyur na/ /khro bo'i sbyor dang ldan pa yis/ /rlung sogs bcing ba tshul bzhin bya/ /gshin rje gshed po rgyal kun gtso/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa/ /skyon kun? las ni rnam grol ba/ /de yi ??
33b2(rgyud 'grel): legs gnas te/ /dbang ldan mtshams nas mnyam po ru/ /bla mas g.yon gyi khu tshur gyis/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu sngon po de bzhin no/ /mnyam dang g.yas skor tshad ldan par/ /dkyil 'khor ri mo bri bar bya/ /mnyam po bri bar ri mo ni/ /sgo yi ti shu cha yin te/ /de ?
33b3(rgyud 'grel): sboms na nad 'byung la/ /phras na nor rnams zad par 'gyur/ /kyag kyog byung na 'thab mo 'byung/ /chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi/ /g.yas skor du ni ma bris na/ /rdul tshon gyi ni dngos grub nyams/ /rdo rje rtse mo dkar po'i ngos/ /gzhan ser ba yi mdog yin te/ /gzhan ni pad+ma rA ga'i ngos/ /de bzhin ma
33b4(rgyud 'grel): ra ka ta ste/ /nang du sngon por shes par bya/ /de ni rdul tshon rim par bshad/ /shar gyi phyogs su dkar po ste/ /lho yi phyogs su ser po yin/ /nub phyogs dmar po bya ba ste/ /byang phyogs ljang gu dag tu 'dod/ /dbus ma'i sa yi cha nyid ni/ /in+d+ra nI la rab tu 'bar/ /rtag tu shes rab thabs
33b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /shin tu mnyam gzhag yang dag bri/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan dag la/ /rdo rje'i 'od kyis kun 'khrigs pa'i/ /rdo rje dbus su yang dag bri/ /'khor lo 'od 'bar rab 'jigs pa'i/ /'khor lo shar gyi rwa la bri/ /rin chen 'od 'bar rab 'khrigs pa'i/ /rin chen lho yi phyogs su bri/ /nub tu
33b6(rgyud 'grel): lang ma'i sprin 'khrigs pa'i/ /pad+ma dmar po sdong bur bcas/ /ral gri'i 'od kyis rab 'khrigs pa'i/ ral gri byang gi rwa la bri/ /sngo ba 'bar 'od gsal ba ni/ /shar gyi sgo ru bri bar ba/ /be con 'bar 'od 'khrigs pa yi/ /be con lho yi sgo ru dgod/ /pad+ma 'bar ba rab 'jigs pa'i/ /'od
33b7(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa nub sgor bri/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i sprin ldan pa/ /byang gi sgo ru bri bar bya/ /me mtshams la sogs grwa bzhi ru/ /go rims bzhin du 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje pad+ma su ? la/ /'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya/ /phyi yi me mtshams la sogs par/ /zla bas gang ba'i snod bzhi bri/ /de ltar 'khor
34a1(rgyud 'grel): lo rdzogs pa dang/ /mkha' la bkod pa phab byas la/ /de nas sngon bzhin shes rab dang/ /sbyor byas 'khor lo bskyad nas gdon/ /de la sbyin sogs byin brlabs dang/ /thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje dang/ /dbang bskur la sogs bya ba yin/ /de nas sngon bzhin ye
34a2(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi/ /'khor lo dgug dang bgegs bskrad sogs/ /byas la sgo bzhi'i khro bo yi/ /sngags la dza(rgyud 'grel): sogs mthar ldan pas/ /dgug gzhug cing dang dbang bya dang/ /rab dra ba la sogs bya/ /de nas lha mos sngon bzhin mchod/ /bstod dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ /rdul yab spra?
34a3(rgyud 'grel): yab bsil yab dang/ /khyams dang skyes mas tshal dag dang/ /gzims mal dang ni gdan khri dang/ myur 'gro rta dang glang po dang/ yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing/ /rta babs dang ni bla re sogs/ /bza' btung bro mchog sna tshogs dang/ /glu gar la sogs mdza' yas mchod/ /
34a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas ci 'byor gzhan dag la/ bzlas pa byas te mnyes par bya/ /bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis/ /maN+Dal legs par byas nas su/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad oM ku sha ya dza(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
34a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kI la ya hUM phaT/ dgug dang phur bus gdab pa ste/ /de ltar byas pas 'od nyid du/ /gyur las rang rang yi ge ste/ /de las mtshan sa ma de las skur h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri rnam bzhi ni/ /dbang po gshin rje chu lus ngan/ /'byung po me lha srin po rlung/
34a6(rgyud 'grel): ta A nan las byung ba'o/ /hUM hUM phaT dang yi ge gsum/ /nyi ma zla ba tshangs pa'o/ /phaT dang swA ste yi ge gnyis/ /sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin/ /hA ni khyab 'jug la sogs so/ /thams cad zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag/ /dang po rang rang phyag mtshan la/ /lhag ma bde bar gshegs
34a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun/ /zhal mdog rigs kyi gtso bo 'dra/ /mig sogs brlab dang lus ngag yid/ /dbang bskur ba yang 'dra byas nas/ /gtor ma bdud rtsi bzhin brlabs la/ /lce yang brlabs te sbubs kyis su/ /rang sngags brjod pas brdub par bya/ /oM in+d+rA ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ya ma yaSh+TrA(rgyud 'grel): ba ru NA
34b1(rgyud 'grel): ya wi/ ku be tra ya kraM/ a'i shA nA ya ta/ agna ya yA nai re tya ya na/ bA ya be na/ tsan+d+rA ya hUM anA ya hUM/ brahma NA ya phaT/ ba su d+ha ra ya phaT/ bem ci tsA ya swA/ sarbba b+hu te b+hyo kA ha ha ha ha hUM/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ de yis phyogs skyong tshim byas nas/ /'thor 'thung byas la nang du 'gro/ de nas
34b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor zhal bsro'i phyir/ /sbyin sreg gis ni tshim bya ste/ /sbyin sreg las las 'byung ba ltar/ /zhi dang rgyas pa bya bar 'dod/ /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug phyir/ /dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya/ /bdag nyid sku sogs byin brlab cing/ /sna ba thob par gyur pa yis/ /slob ma
34b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhug pa'i don du ni/ /de nyid rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpar deng grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi
34b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag
34b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /de nas bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod/ /sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing/ /sems can kun
34b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi snying la zhugs/ /sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid/ /'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'i/ /mgon po bden pa 'di yis ni/ /bdag la khyed kyis 'dar rdzogs shog /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /rgyu dang
34b7(rgyud 'grel): las las kun tu byung/ /de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni/ /de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la/ /gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni/ /sdig med par ni thams cad mthong/ /thun mong sdom gzung slob ma ni/ /sngon bzhin sku sogs 'od gsal ba/ /yol bas bar du bcad nas su/ /kun
35a1(rgyud 'grel): byed bum pa'i chu yis su/ /dkrus pa'i dar ras dmar po yis/ /bu sdug de yis ngo bkab la/ /khyod su zhes ni dri bar bya/ /bdag ni skal ldan yin zhes smra /khyod ci dga' zhes dris pa la/ /skal pa bzang la bdag dga' zhes /'jug pa pos kyang ?  bar bya/ /
35a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas phreng ba sbyin bya ste/ /u dum bar man dar/ /yongs su dag ni ma li ka/ ka ra ni ka yi phreng ba ni/ /legs par mnos te bus zung zhing/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bla ma slob dpon ma yin?  rjes su/ /'bad pa chen pos dbang gi don/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos/ /rdo rje sems
35a3(rgyud 'grel): dpas dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang dbang bskur te/ /bdag la don mchog stsal du gsol /gtsol yon sogs rab tu dbul/ /gtor sems yang dag bskyed par bya/ /de yi snying gar rdo rje ni/ /me tog bcas pa'i snying por gzhag /oM sarba yo ga tsit+ta /u twAr
35a4(rgyud 'grel): yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya staM ho sid+d+hi badzraya ya thA su khaM/ de yis byed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i gsang chen 'di/ dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya'o/ /dad? pa med
35a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la yang mi rung ngo/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /tho sogs sngags kyis drang bya zhing/ /yi ge gsum gyis gzhug par bya/ /nang du sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug /de nas tshig 'di brjod par bya/ /de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do/ /de bas
35a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis khyod kyi rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ /ye shes gang gis khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par bya ba ste /gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ /dngos grub 'di ni khyod kyis dkyil 'khor las thod pa rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /khyod ni
35a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig las 'da' bar mi rung ngo/ /de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas/ /gal te tshul 'di smras nas ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /oM badzra satwa hUM/ pad gnas yig gsum 'bar ba yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni 'thung bcug ste/ /'di ni khyod kyi
35b1(rgyud 'grel): dmyal? ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /oM badzrod ba Tha(rgyud 'grel): de nas 'di skad smra bar bya'o/ /de ring phan chad khyed kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ /ngas ci smras pa'i bye ba 'di khyod kyis bya dgos so/ /nga la yang
35b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyas par ma byed cig /mi bde ba ma spangs par shi ? 'dus byas te/ /dmyal bar lhung bar ma 'gro zhig /de nas de ltar smra ba la/ /slob mas 'di ltar smra bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur? cig /
35b3(rgyud 'grel): ces smra bar bya'o/ /gsol 'debs de yi gnas bzhi ru/ /'gyur chen bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /yi ge bzhi la dbyibs mdog ldan/ /ba dan la sogs mtshan byas pa/ /bsams te rlung la sogs bskyod pa/ /rdob dag kyang 'bab gyur na/ /sems ldan 'bab pa ci zhig smos/ /
35b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes babs nas 'phar gyur na/ /tiSh+Tha badzras brtan par bya/ /lce la yi ge a bsams te/ /dge dang mi dge bri bar bya/ /de nas mig gi snang ba bri/ /me tog 'khor lo la dor nas/ /pra tAts+tshi badzra ho zhes brjod/ /slar yang blangs la mgor bcings la/ /phra ti kriSh+na? la sogs
35b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /mtshan ma gang la bab pa ste/ /de ni de yi lha ru sbyin/ /'od 'bar oM gnyis mig tu bsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis khyod/ /de ring nan tan mig phye'o/ /bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i mig/ thams cad rab tu phye bar 'gyur/ /badzra pa sha /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /ba ni
35b6(rgyud 'grel): dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba phun tshogs dngos grub kyang/ /khyod la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur/ /dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /ral gri gshin dgra
35b7(rgyud 'grel): nas brtsams nas /ji srid gtso bo'i mthar thug par/ /bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin/ /spyi bor chu yis gtor bya zhing/ /badzra ab+hi Shiny+tsa brjod/ /dbu rgyan dbang yang de bzhin te/ /de nas rdo rje sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang/ /da ring khyod la sbyin par bya/ /'di de sangs
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje zung zhig rab grub phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu 'khyung byas nas/ /bdag po'i dbang yang bskur bar bya/ /oM badzra a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /spyi bor gdab tshul ming dbang bskur/ /tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ oM badzraM satwa twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badzra
36a2(rgyud 'grel): nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ slob dpon gang dang gang dag gi /lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi/ de nas de yi mtshan dag ni/ /dpal dang kye yis mdzes par bya/ /rig pa'i dbang lnga byin nas su/ /rig sbyor brtul zhugs lung bstan dang/ /dbugs dbyung dang ni gsum du 'dod/ /hUM gis rdo rje de bskyed
36a3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ /phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha mAM/ e Sha stwaM d+ha ra yA mi badzre satwa hi hi hi hi hUM /thog ma tha ma med pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /chos kyi dril bu gzung bar bya/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab rjes 'gro ba yi dpyangs/ /rtag par khyod kyis kyang gzung ste/ /rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu bzheng/ /chos kyi dril bu
36a5(rgyud 'grel): dkrol par bya/ /srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa'i mchog ni 'grub par byed/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam
36a6(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog bzhugs par gyur gyi tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med
36a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /bsod nams byin brlabs kyis bsgrubs la/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtog tu bskyed/ /dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /phyag rgya chen po'i brtul zhugs ni/ /de yis rab tu sbyin par bya/ /
36b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sdom bzung yon phul te /phyag byas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod rten bgyis pa ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /'jug sgor pad ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dar gyis bkab par 'dug bya
36b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu? sgra dang/ /rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis/ /skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i/ /rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas su/ /de nyid la ni dbang bskur bas/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam/ /chu dang dbu rgyan sngon bzhin te/
36b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu tshig 'dis sbyin/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du/ grub pa'i rdo rje dril bu 'di/ /khyod kyis dad pas rab bzung la/ /rdo rje khyod kyis slob ma bsdus/ /ming yang sngon dang 'dra bar sbyin/ /de nas bla mas tshig 'di brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ral gri che/ /khams gsum
36b4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis phyag byas la/ /las kyi ral gri gcig bu mchog /bdud rnams las ni rgyal ba zung/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan pa/ /mnyam pa nyid phyir gru bzhi ste/ nye bar gzhag dang yang dag spong/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang ba dang dbang po/ /go rims bzhin du sgo bzhi'o/ /bsam gtan
36b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ni rta babs te/ /ting nge 'dzin bzhi kha khyer yin/ de rten gzungs kyi rang bzhin no/ /'gro kun gdul phyir phyogs sko na/ /rlung gis bskyong ba'i dril sgra sgrogs/ /byang chub yan lag rnam dag phyir/ /dra ba dra phyed la sogs spras/ /rnam thar brgyad ldan ka ba ste/ /rgyan ba/ /de bkra bas
36b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa ni/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs bskor phyir/ /sna tshogs las kyi mthar thug phyir/ /pho brang sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar/ /theg chen 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /sems can sems ni dgrol bya'i phyir/ /tshon rnams ye shes lnga yin no/
36b7(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems gang ka pA la/ /bdug pa me tog mar me dang/ /bshes dang byug pa la sogs ni/ /snyan grags byang chub yan lag dang/ /dga' dang chos zas lus bde yin/ /ngo tsha khrel yod sdom pa yis/ /bde bskyed dbyangs dang
37a1(rgyud 'grel): gar sogs yin/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs phyir gzhal yas khang/ /snying po len phyir dkyil 'khor lo/ /lha yi de nyid bstan bya ba/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dran ting 'dzin/ /stobs rnam dag pa sgor gnas bzhi/ /byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas
37a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhi/ /tsar tsika sogs lha mo bzhi/ /shin tu rnam dag la sogs lnga/ /zhe sdang gshin rje la sogs pa'o/ /'khor bas ma chags pad ma ste/ /nyi zla byang chub sems pa myu gu/ /gso dang smin par byed pa'o/ /de nas byang rang na sar ldan/ /ri dags lte ba'i dri ma nam dang/
37a3(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi sna cha gom ba zhig /gcig cig legs btsal dbul bar bya/ /bla mas bzhes te byin brlabs la/ /sbyor ba'i cho gas mnyes par bya/ /bde ba mthe bong srin lag gis/ /slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya/ /bde ba'i btung ba rin chen de/ /brtan pa'i blo yis btung yang
37a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /a ho su ? zhes kyang smra/ /de nas bu mo yig yangs mo/ /mdzes shing nu ma rgyas pa zhig /rang gi bu la sbyin par bya/ /mgo bor lag bzhag gsang ba gtad/ /de yi gzungs la legs sbyangs mo/ /de dang bde ba myong bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon shes rab dang/ /bcas bas
37a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la de nyid/ slob dpon las rnams brtan par bya/ /ji ltar dbang bskur la sogs 'dis/ /sangs rgyas sogs kun thob pa bzhin/ /byang chub spyod sogs gzhan dag dang/ /'dul sogs dge bas de bzhin min/ /de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig /rtag tu sdom pa yang
37a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste/ /de las gzhan pa'i dam tshig bsrungs/ /dkon mchog gnod pa gsang ba ste/ /bud med kun kyang spyad par bya/ /pha rol nir yang blangs nas su/ /rtag tu brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la gang bsrungs pa/ /de ni cho ga bzhin du
37a7(rgyud 'grel): bsrung/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs gyur nas/ /lung bstan pa ni bya ba yin/ /g.yon gyis snying gar chos gos zung/ /g.yas pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya/ /oM ngas khyod 'di ltar lung bstan yin/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton/ /srid pa'i mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje
37b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kye gshin rje mthar 'byin pa ni b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): de ltar lung bstan bsngags pa de/ /bla med nyid du lung bstan yin/ /de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ste/ /bsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang ni zhugs gyur pas/ /sdig pa kun las nges gron
37b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /byed rnams de nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di la ni/ /slar 'chi ba ni yod med de/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi bsod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /srid la shin tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod bton/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /
37b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa mchog tu gyur pa yis/ /dam tshig sdam pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis su/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dog med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'i/ /de las sogs
37b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bka' stsal ni/ /ci rigs par ni brjod par bya/ /de ltar bka' stsal thob pa dang/ /slob ma gus dang ldan pa yis/ /bla ma'i rlang par phyag byas la/ /thams cad bsgrub par khas blangs ngo/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni/ /ci nus pa yang bya ba ste/ /slob ma g.yon phyogs bzhag nas so/ /de
37b5(rgyud 'grel): yis ni lag nas gzung la/ /sbyin sreg bsang dang bsrung ba dang/ /me tog bsdus te bla ma la/ /phul la mer ngor smon lam bya/ /de ltar bya ba kun zin nas/ /de nyid gsum mthar mu(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /ye shes sems dpa' gshegs par bskul/ /de dang mthun par bskyed par bsdu/ /thog
37b6(rgyud 'grel): mar a ldan gsang sngags kyis/ /rdul tshon bsgrims te bsdu bar bya/ /rol mo bcas pas spyan drangs la/ /kI li kI lis chu bor dor/ /rdo rje'i skam khas phur bu gdon/ /rig pa spyan bzlas 'o mas bkru/ /ba yi lti bas dkyil 'khor byug /de steng dga' ston la sogs bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo
37b7(rgyud 'grel): byang kun/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bar bshad/ /de tar bya ba las dang po'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bya ba yin/ /gzhan dag dbab dang sems nyid kyis/ /byas pa rmad du byung ba yin/ /de ltar dbang thob spob ma de/ /der nyid slob dpon go 'phang 'gyur/ /de yis bsgrub pa 'bras
38a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas phyir/ /des ni bsgrub pa brtsam bar bya/ /las kyis mthar thug rgyud 'di ru/ /thun mong ma yin 'khor lo ni/ /dgos pa ma lus kun byed pa/ /de 'dir bdag gis bri bar bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas/ /legs byugs dur ?
38a2(rgyud 'grel): ras ma la/ /dug dang ni nam mkha' i khu ba dang/ /khrag dang dur khrod sol ba dang/ /da dur sogs sna tsha dang/ /rus ba'i smyu gus bri byang/ /gcer bu skra shig gdong bsnyer te/ /khres pas lho ru mngon phyogs la/ /sngags bzlas rtse gcig ba yis bri/ /zlum por bskor ba gsum bya
38a3(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug ste/ /le tshe rnams ni byas pa la/ /yi ge gsang sngags sa bon bri/ /dbus su zhe sdang rdo rje nyid/ /yang/ shar du gti mug rdo rje ste/ /lhor ni ser sna rdo rje yin/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje la/ /byang du phrag dog rdo rje'o/ /k+She ma me dang gnyis pa'i
38a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzhir lhor brtsams nas/ /shar gyi phyogs la thug gi bar/ /khro bo yum dang snang dag gi/ re re gong ma mas rim bzhin/ /do yo ya/ mtshams kyi le tshe brgyad po la/ bden bral mtshams na lha mo gnyis/ /rlung gnas mdzod ldan me mtshams snod/ /dbang ldan na ni thod ba
38a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis/ /me mtshams na ni sgo srungs gnyis/ /dzA sa ru Na ni rats+tsha ni/ /kun mir thog ma dbus su te/ /a/ lho ru ser sna ral gri 'dzin/ /nub tu chags dang dbyangs can ma/ /byang du phrag dog bden bral snod/ /shar du gti mug dang tho ba/ mar me do yi k+Sha ya/ /gnas ba
38a6(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang so so yi/ /phyogs mtshams bye brag bklag pa dang/ /phyi nang thun mong phyogs mtshams su/ /bklag pa dag ste gnyis su 'dod/ /ngas pa sde tshan so so ni/ /gtso bo khro bo lha mo dang/ /ban da bzhi ru shes bya ste/ /sdom dang so sor bklag par bya/ /yak+She ma med pA ts+tsha ni rA
38a7(rgyud 'grel): dzA sa do ru Na yo ni ra/ yi ge bcu bdun dbang byas nas/ rnam pa dgu ru bklag pa yin/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su gdon pa la/ /yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis gyur/ /rkang pa bzhi ru gdon pa dang/ /so sor phye ste gdon pa'o/ /ya ma rA dza la sogs pa'o/ /dang po dang mgo mdza' ltag ma thal/ /gtso
38b1(rgyud 'grel): bo lnga ru stan pa yin/ /dang po tha ma yi ge brgyad/ /gshin rje dgra nyid shes par bya/ /ya ya ya ya ya ya ya ya/ dang po mgo mdza' mdza' mi nya ltag/ ser sna rdo rje yin par 'dod/ /ma ma dang dang po'i mdza' ltag nyid dar mgo/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i yi ge yin/ /me me gnyis ba'i
38b2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' ltag gsum dang 'og /phrag dog nyid du bstan pa yin/ /dad gsum pa'i mdza' ltag bzhi dang 'og /gti mug rdo rje'i yi ge yin/ /kshe kshe? rkang ba dang po'i dbu ma bzhi/ /khro bo gcig dang lha mo gsum/ /rA dza sa do/ /rkang ba gnyis pa'i dbu ma bzhi/ /lha mo gnyis dang thod pa gnyis
38b3(rgyud 'grel): do ru Na yo/ rkang pa gsum pa'i dbu ma bzhi/ /snod chen gsum dang khro bo gcig /yo ni rA ya rkang bar zhi pa'i dbu ma bzhi/ /khro bo bzhi ru shes bar bya/ /yats+tsha ni rA/ 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dang/ /'phel dang mgrin dang mu bzhi dang/ /thun mong dang ni rnam pa drug /gcig gnyis gsum bzhi
38b4(rgyud 'grel): gong nas 'phel/ /gsum gnyis gcig dang zad mthar thug/ rA do ru yo/ ni rA yats+tsha ni rA/ dzA sa do ni yo ya/ /tha ma gcig dang gong ma gsum/ /'og ma gnyis dang gong ma gnyis/ /'og ma gsum dang dang po gcig/ ma 'dres bzhi dang mu bzhi'o/ /'jug dang ldog dang thun mong ni/ /gong
38b5(rgyud 'grel): du bstan pas shes bya ste/ /'jug ldog phyogs kyi gtso bo la/ /thun mong phyi yi phyogs la'o/ /dgu dang brgyad kyi yi ge ni/ bcu bdun dag ste lha ru 'dod/ /re re 'ang mgo dang mthar ldan pa/ /gsang sngags gdon bar bya ba yin/ /dbus kyi phyogs min stong pa ru/ /sa bon gnyis pas ming
38b6(rgyud 'grel): sbal bri/ /rim pa gsum pa'i le tso ni/ /bcu drug pa la bri bya ba/ /sngags min skul tshig bcas pa dang/ /yi ge gnyis bar ma'i bcug ba/ /spal zhing spel zhing bri bar bya/ /de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /lugs dang lugs min gnyis byas la/ /so sor mthun par mgo sbrang la/ /ti?
38b7(rgyud 'grel): te phyi rol mar khus byug /thod pa gnyis ni kha sbyar bar/ /mar khus khra ba blugs der bcug la/ /skud pa sngon pos khris bdun bkri/ de la me tog nag po dang/ /dug sogs nag pos mchod par bya/ /rgyal po'i sgo khangs dang ni/ /grog khyim la sogs dag las/ /gshin rje'i
39a1(rgyud 'grel): dgra yi sku bya ba/ /'khrugs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba/ /khru gang tsam gyi tshad byas la/ /de yi mdun du dkyil 'khor ni/ /gnag pa khrag gi chag chag can/ /byas la de sted spos chen dngul/ /de nas gdag gi gsang sngags ni/ /skul tshig ldan par rab tu bzlas/
39a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i rgyun ni rnam spros te/ /gzas pa'i lus las go cha dang/ /srung ba phrogs nas bdag la thim/ /de nas de ni gos med cing/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs pas gzir bsam/ /de bkug mthar byed lte bar gzhug /khro bo'i can gzan sna tshogs kyis/ /gshin rje gshed kyi lta ba nas
39a3(rgyud 'grel): rkang dang rgya ma khrag tshal du/ /phyogs bcur khyer nas 'gro bar bsam/ /de ltar brtan par gyur pa dang/ /shing gcig dur khrod la sogs par/ /gshin rje'i lto bar bcug la sba/ /'khor lo dgos pa kun byed 'di/ /so so'i bye bra shes byas la/ /zhi sogs las rnams thams cad ni/ /
39a4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar mngon par dga' bar bya/ /la li badzra zhes bya nus pa kun dang rnam bral yang/ /bla ma'i rjes 'brangs dad pas de yi phyogs tsam gzung bya ste/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di byas dge ba dri med gang yin pa/ /de yis 'gro kun gshin rje ma lus mthar phyin byed gyur cig /gshin rje
39a5(rgyud 'grel): gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyis khan po a mo g+ha badzra dang/ bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
39a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ /bo de tsit+ta tsin+ti ti/ /bod skad du/ mchod rten sgrub pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang thob gzhan don la dga' bas /dur khrod la sogs
39a7(rgyud 'grel): dben gnas su/ /byams dang snying rje sngon btang la/ /yon tan kun rdzob mchod rten gdag /de la dang por bdag nyid kyis/ /las dang mthun pa'i sa blangs la/ /khrus dang rgyan rnams ci rigs bgo'o/ /de nas rdo rje rnam bzhi yis/ /yang na gar mo lha yang rung/ /bdag nyid rdzogs nas
39b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzim pa brji/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT A ? te ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas brdzis 'dzin rdo rje bzhi/ /gong bzhin ci rigs spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstong las dang bstan la bya /'od kyi gong bur gyur pa las/ /'bi 'bi 'od kyi thig bral can/ /gong bus rjes de ru bkod/ /yang
39b2(rgyud 'grel): na oM bkod yum gyi mkha' / /'bi 'bi'i rdul phran re re la/ /yi ge ya la sogs pa bkod/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gdab/ /sgra yi dam chos la sogs sgrogs/ /mkha' byung bde gshegs kun dpag med/ /rdul re sku re de ltar brtag/ maN+Dal las mthun ras de bzhin/ /
39b3(rgyud 'grel): dad po snying po phyag rgya dang/ che ge las dang bstun par gzhug/ de nas rgyan dbul srog 'khor lo/ /dar chen chu srin rgyal mtshan gsol/ /legs par zogs nas gzhan yang ni/ /de nas rang snying 'od zer gyis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstod la sogs rdzogs
39b4(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /gnyis med tshul du bsre bar bya/ /de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis/ /tsar tsika sogs legs pa'i glus/ /lha mo chu yis sku khrus gsol/ /de nas las dang mthun pa yi/ /gsol ba btab bas shes par bya/ /gdab pa'i sngags ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): 'am nang gi yi ge bcu
39b5(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa'am/ /'khor lo'i sngags sogs so so 'am/ /bsdom pa la yang 'gal ba med/ /rang rang las dang sbyar ba'i sngags/ /sdig pa zhi bar bya ba yis/ /sarba pA pa shAn+ti daku ru yaM ku ru swA hA/ /nor dang bsod nams rgyas byed na/ /dbus su puSh+TiM ku ru swAhA/ dgra la sogs
39b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dbang sdud na/ /ba? sh+yaM ku ru swAhA/ gang dag gnod byed gsod 'dod na/ /mA ra ya hUM phaT bsgrub bya ngan byed par 'dod na/ /bi de sha ya phaT/ gna nas spro bar 'dod pa na/ /uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ gang dag mnan par bya bar 'dod na/ /staM b+ha ya hUM laM/ bsgrub bya dgug par 'dod pa yis//
39b7(rgyud 'grel): ak+Sha ra ya dza(rgyud 'grel): de la sogs pa'i sbyor po ni/ /rgyud las byung ba bzhin du brtag/ de skad du yang/ nye ba'i las ni gang grub pa/ phyag rgya snying po bris bcug na/ /gang bsgom the tshom med par 'grub/ /dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin pas des/ /gzhan yang nang gi sbyor ba ni/ /ting nge 'dzin la
40a1(rgyud 'grel): rag las pa/ /gzhan nas byung ba yang shes par bya'o/ /bdag gi dge ba cung zad 'di/ /'gro ba gshin rje gshed gnas thob par shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po la li ta badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ?
40a2(rgyud 'grel): sA ? pe ka/ bod skad du/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgrub ba'i thabs/ /'jam dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gshin rje dgra ma bon la/ /yang dang yang du phyag byas la/ /bar chad ? byed pa yi/ /bsrung ba dam pa bshad par bya/ /bsnyen
40a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga rdzogs pa yis/ /de yis bsgrub par 'bras bcas phyir/ /da ni srung ba'i las rnams bya/ /rab tu shis pa'i gnas mchog tu/ /khrus byas byug pa dri zhim byug /mchog gi gos bgo rgyan rnams gdags/ /bde stan skyil krung shar bltas la/ /phan pa'i sems dang byams
40a4(rgyud 'grel): par ldan/ /spro bar 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed de/ /bsod nams tshogs bsags gnyis med bsra/ /mtshan bcas sngags bzlas gtor ma sbyin/ /gsar zhing dge ba'i ras dag la/ /tsandan nag bur byug bya ste/ /skyes bu bzhi byed gur kum ste/ bud med la ni gi wang ngo/ /ser?
40a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs zhi byed dang/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad la/ /gur kum dag gis yang dag bya/ /de dag bri ba'i sgyu gu yang/ /gser ram dngul lam shis par bri/ /de dag bri ba'i rim pa yang/ /phyi dro maN+Dal legs byas te/ /mchod par ldan pas yang dag bri/ /bden pa
40a6(rgyud 'grel): bdar la bri bar bya/ /thig chen brgyad ni yang dag gdab/ /zlum por bskor ba gsum byas te/ /tha ma thod pas bskor bar bya/ /thig thung rnams kyang gdab bya ste/ dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug mig /dbus kyi re mig dgu pa la/ /dbus su ya la shar du kA/ /lho ru ma ?
40a7(rgyud 'grel): tu me/ /byang du ba ste mtshams bzhi ru/ /raSha rak+Sha bar ming gzhug /rim pa gnyis pa shar brtsams nas/ /ya tsa nir dza sa do ru Na yod ni rA/ rim pa gsum pa'i shar brtsams nas/ /shar gyi ri mig dang po la/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/
40b1(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha/ de 'og re mig gnyis pa la/ che ge mo rak+Sha rak+Sha/ de ltar re mig bcu drug pa/ spel zhing spel zhing dgod par bya/ /de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /lugs dang lugs min gnyis byas te/ /sa bskor lugs su byung ba la/ /gnam bskor dag ni lugs las ldog /yid
40b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags mthun mthun mgo sprad de/ /so sor mnyan por bris la dril/ /kham phor yang dag btsang ma'i nang /phyi rol spra tshil dril byas te/ /rtsi mar sbrang rtsir bcas pa gzhug /bas bskyed skud pa dkar po yis/ /khris bdun dag tu dkri bar bya/ /maN+Dal dkar po khru gang tshad/ /ba yi rnam
40b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dri yis byug/ de stengs kham phor kha sbyar bzhag /stong nyid dang las thig le ste/ /de las yig 'bru phyag mtshan sku/ /kun kyang zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag /rang gi rigs bcas bde ba gang/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan rdzogs par bskyed/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs tshul bzhin bya/ /
40b4(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo rdzogs pa dgug/ phyag dang mchod sogs sdom pa gzung/ /de nas gnyis med 'od zer gyis/ /dam tshig 'khor lo gnyis med bsre/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod/ /de nas thugs rdo rjes dran nas/ /bsrung ba'i don du 'od du
40b5(rgyud 'grel): zhu/ /thig le dag las yi ger gyur/ /lha rnams sngags kyis gzugs kyis bzhugs/ /de la byin brlabs 'di dag bya/ /spyan gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i/ /hUM ya mAn+ta krita badzra d+harmA tsak+Shu pra be sha ya zhes brjod do/ /zhal gyi phyag rgya shes pa yis/ /oM ya mAn+ta de pa sho d+ha ya traM pra
40b6(rgyud 'grel): pe sha ya phaT ces bstod/ /gtsug tu phyag rgya rab byas la/ /oM ya mAn+ta ka ba/ che ba'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /oM gu hya gu laM/ de nas mchod dang bstod byas la/ /spros sdu ldan pas gsan bsngags bzlas/ /bsrung ba'i don du rab tu sbyar/ /de nas kham por dbyung byas la/ /sgra tshil dag gis
40b7(rgyud 'grel): dril byas la/ /yang na rgya skyegs bskus byas pa'i/ /dri dang bsres te byug par bya/ /bsgrub bya khrus bya rgyan blo ste/ /dris byugs mAN+Dal ster bzhag ste/ /bden pa bdar te skyes pa g.yon/ /dpa' min dag ni g.yas su gdags/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i ra mag rnams dang/ me dang chu dang nang la sogs
41a1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag rlung dang ser ba rnams/ /bsrung bar 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /shin tu gtsang zhing mthon por ni/ /mAN+Da la legs byugs me tog dgram/ /de ni rgyal mtshan rtse la gdags/ /nyin re dus gsum yang dag mchod/ /skul tshig ldan pas gsang sngags
41a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /gtor ma rgyun tu sbyin par bya/ /sbyin sreg thal ba phyogs bcur gtor/ /'khor lo 'dod pa'i bskul tshig ldan/ de dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /bsrung ba kun gyi mchog yin pas/ /rnal 'byor pa yis 'bad par bya/ /srung ba kun gyi cho ga dam pa 'di/ /sgrub pa po dang sems can don
41a3(rgyud 'grel): du byas/ /de yis dge ba cung zad gang thob des/ /'gro kun bdud bzhi kun gyis gnod pa bsrung bar shog /dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // !/ (/dpal gshin gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs nyin byed grags pas mdzad pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ grih+Na ya mA
41a4(rgyud 'grel): ri na ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal khro bo 'jigs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mchog /drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed/ /khro chen de la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad bya/ /de la sngags
41a5(rgyud 'grel): ba dbang dang dam tshig dang ldan pa/ snying rje che ba/ brtul phod pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa des/ gnas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dga' ba'i gnas su gnas te/ brtul zhugs mchog spyad par bya'o/ /bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis lhar bskyed de/ /snying gar nyi ma'i steng du hUM bsam/ de la 'od
41a6(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis bskul nas spyan drangs te/ /bzhugs pa la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa'i bye brag dbul/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba bya ba dang/ /gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas/ de nas stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste/
41a7(rgyud 'grel): gang gi rnam par yang mi bsgom mo/ /oM shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA At+ma ko haM/ der rjes hUM las 'od 'phros pas/ /sdang ba thams cad bsreg par bya/ /bsdus pas rdo rje gur du gyur/ /ra ba dra ba bsam par bya/ /de nas nam mkha' i dbyings bsam bya/ /de yi nang du gzhal yas khang/
41b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rgya gram yang dag ldan/ /rta babs yi dang ldan par bsgom/ /nyi gdan ma he yi dags te/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa ni/ /A la'i bsgoms pas zla ba ste/ /kA li bsgoms pas rta bdun nyid/ /gnyis kyi bar du hUM bsams te/ /de nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /de la snying pos yang dag brgyan/ /de
41b2(rgyud 'grel): las 'od byung don byas nas/ /slar 'dus de dag 'od du zhu/ /de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba ste/ /rtsa ba'i lus mdog nag po'o/ /rdo rje ral gri gri gug ga-yas/ /'khor lo pad+ma thod pa ga-yon/ /rdo rje rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/
41b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas/ /rang rig ldan par rab tu bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma dag bya ste/ /bde gshegs thig le zla bar 'gyur/ /de las yak+She ma me da/ /ya tsa ni rA dzA sa do/ /ru Na yo ni ra dag ste/ /so so'i sa bon dag tu gyur/ /de las so so'i sku bskyed de/ /sngags chen gyis ni dbyung
41b4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'khrugs pa zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /kha dog in+d+ra nI la 'dra/ /lag na rdo rje chen po ste/ /zhe sdang chen po'i don mdzad nas/ /slar 'dus bdag nyid la thim bya/ /dzi na dzika gis gti mug gtso/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pa la zhi//
41b5(rgyud 'grel): dad ba'i chu zla dang mtshungs pa'o/ /lag tu 'khor lo thogs pa dbyung/ /gti mug chen pos don byas nas/ /mdun gyi zla dkyil dag la dgod/ /ratna d+h+rika gis ser sna'i bdag /gtso ma gser mtshungs phyag drug ste/ /rin chen thogs pa dbyung bar bya/ /ser sna dag byas rin chen byas/ /g.yas
41b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi nyi dkyil dag la bsam/ /A ro lika gis 'dod chags gtso/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma 'dra/ /lag na pad+ma thogs pa dbyung/ /'dod chags chen po'i don byas te/ /gtso bo'i rgyab tu bsam par bya/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika gis phrag dog bdag /zhal gsum phyag drug mar gtam mtshungs/ /phyag na
41b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri thogs pa dbyung/ /phrag dog don byas rdo rjer gyur/ /g.yon gyi nyi dkyil dag la bsam/ /mud gar d+h+rika gis tho ba drag /mdog gnag phyag drug tho ba bsnams/ /drag po chen pos don byas nas/ /shar gyi sgo la bsam par bya/ /daN+Da Di d+h+rika gis be con can/ /gser mdog
42a1(rgyud 'grel): lag na be con thogs/ /khro ba chen pos don byas nas/ /lho yi nyi dkyil dag la bzhugs/ /pad+ma d+h+rika gis padmo ste/ /mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /pad+ma thogs pas don byas te/ /nub kyi sgor ni bsam par bya/ /khaDga? ? ? 'gro 'byung?//
