62b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa' i gzugs dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul te/ hUM la zhugs pa dang hUM dang rdo rjer bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i/ rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo sgeg pa'i nyams can/ g.yas brkyang ba/ rtsa ba'i zhal
62b4(rgyud 'grel): dang sku thams cad dkar ba/ zhal g.yas g.yon sngo ba dang dmar ba// phyag dang po g.yas dang g.yon gyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag lhag ma rnams ni rdo rje dang ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang pad+ma
62b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ dbu rgyan du mi bskyod pas mnan pa/ 'di ltar bdag nyid bsgom pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'o/ /'di ni dpal gshin rje'i dgra sgo ngar 'jug pa rab tu bsgom pa'o/ /de nas rang gi ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon las byung ba'i
62b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas su byas pa drangs te/ rang gi lus la gzhug go /de'i 'og tu yi ge gsum pha dang ma'i dbus na gnas pa dri za'i sems can lta bu rang gi kha nas zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa rdo rje'i lam nas
62b7(rgyud 'grel): byung ste/ rang gi rig pa'i pad+mar lhung ba dang/ de las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar pos de la reg pas rig ma 'dod chags chen pos zhu zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyang zhu bar blta'o/ /zhu ba'i sgo nga las byung ba'i tsar tsika la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi stan
63a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'khod pas/ /bcom ldan 'das mi bzhugs par mthong ste/ yid mi dga' bas mgrin pa bshibs te/ slong ba'i glus 'di ltar bskul lo/ /rje btsun thugs rjes khro ba bzhengs mdzod la/ /jo bo de ring bdud las rgyal ba'i
63a2(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /srid gsum kun gyi gti mug mthar mdzod cig /'jig rten ma lus thugs kyi mgron bos nas/ /stong pa nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs/ /'jig rten bsod nams bya ba'i ched du ni/ /stong pa nyid du ma bzhugs rje btsun bzhengs/ /byang
63a3(rgyud 'grel): chub dngos la 'jig rten mgron pos nas/ /cis na bsam pa mi mnga' rje btsun bzhengs/ /de ma thag tu tsar cig la sogs pa sgong la zhugs shing zhugs ma thag tu/ sgo nga yongs su gyur pa las/ gshin rje'i dgra ma he'i steng nas sna tshogs pad+ma
63a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku mdog mthing nag/ zhal g.yas dang g.yon dkar ba 'di dmar ba/ phyag rnams rdo rje sems dpa' i mtshan ma dang ldan pa/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis spras pa/ 'od zer
63a5(rgyud 'grel): mthing ga'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa/ smin ma 'bar zhing khro gnyer brtsags pa/ phyag dang zhabs kyi sen mo rno ba/ gsus pa che ba/ mi thung gi gzugs can/ skra 'am pa gyen du brdzes pa/ klu? chen po mthong ba'i dug chen phu(rgyud 'grel): zhes zer ba rnams kyis yan lag
63a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan pa/ 'di ltar bdag nyid rnam par bsams pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid la chu'i nang gi zla ba ltar sbyong bas/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swAb+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bzlas pa bya'o/ /'di ni dpal gshin rje'i dgra sgo nga las byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so/ /de nas
63a7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te/ rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dang/ rdo rje'i lam nas song ste/ shes rab ma'i pad+mar gnas pa'i gong bu las/ zhe sdang rdo rje dang/ gti mug rdo rje dang/ ser sna rdo rje dang/ 'dod
63b1(rgyud 'grel): chags rdo rje dang/ phrag dog rdo rje rnams yaM dang kaShe dang ya? dang me dang de rnams kyi sa bon las spro zhing/ de bzhin du gong bu las byung ba'i sa bon ya dang tsa dang ni dang rA dang dza dpas dang/ do dang ru rnams las tho ba dang/ /be con dang pad+ma dang/ ral gri dang tsar tsik
63b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ phag mo dang dbyangs can ma dang/ mdzod ldan ma rnams 'byung bar bya'o/ /yang gong du las byung ba'i sa bon /na dang yo dang ni dang rA rnams las grA bzhir thod pa bzhi dpyad par bya'o/ /de ni 'di ltar sa bon las rang rang gi stan gyi steng du rang rang gi rtsa
63b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshan ma nges mtshan ma dbyung zhing de yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi lus su gnas pa'o/ /de nas rim pa bzhin du/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ oM ratna d+hIka oM A ro li ka /oM badz+nyA d+hI ka/ /oM mung+ga da d+h+rika
63b4(rgyud 'grel): oM da N+Da d+h+rika/ oM pad+ma d+h+rika/ oM khaDga d+h+rika/ oM dpe Sha ri ha/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM rA ga ra ti/ oM badzrar ti/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis sngar bshad pa'i lha rnams dang/ thod pa bzhi spros te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ rang ra'i stan la sa
63b5(rgyud 'grel): bon las byung ba'i lus rnams la zhugs par blta'o/ /da ni de dag gi gnas dang stan dang/ kha dog dang lag cha rnams bshad par bya ste/ dbus su ni nyi ma la zhe sdang rdo rje sngar bshad pa'i mdog dang lag cha'o /sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar phyogs su ni gti
63b6(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje zla ba la gnas pa dkar po/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas na 'khor lo dang ral gri dang/ g.yon na rin por che dang pad+ma can no/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i lto'i cha la ni/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i ser sna rdo rje gser btsom lta bu/ zhal gsum phyag drug
63b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yas na rin po che dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na 'khor lo dang chu skyes 'dzin pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i nub tu nyi ma la 'dod chags rdo rje mdog dmar ba/ /zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag gis
64a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu dang 'khor lo thogs pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su nyi ma la gnas pa'i phrag dog rdo rje sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas dag na ral gri dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma
64a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rtsa ba'i zhal sku dang 'dra ba/ zhal lhag ma dag 'chad par byad pa lta bu /phyag dang po gnyis thod pa dang gri gug dang bcas pa/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa 'dug stangs dang/ rgyan thams cad zhi
64a3(rgyud 'grel): ? rdo rje dang 'dra ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma la brten pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor rdo rje tho ba mdog dkar ba/ g.yas dag na tho ba dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma'o/ /lhor rdo rje be con mdog ser po/ /g.yas dag na be con dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na pad+ma dang
64a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /nub tu rdo rje pad+ma mdog dmar ba/ g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo can no/ /byang gi sgor rdo rje ral gri mdog ljang gu/ /g.yas dag na ral gri dang 'khor lo can/ /g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma
64a5(rgyud 'grel): can no/ /'di rnams ni sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ zhal rnams 'chad par byed pa las rtsa ba'i zhal rang rang gi sku dang 'dra ba/ dang po'i phyag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas/ rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa/ gshin tu
64a6(rgyud 'grel): tu 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can no/ /de bzhin du sna tshogs rdo rje'i shar lho'i mtshams su rdo rje tsar tsi ka sha chung ba mdog dkar ba/ g.yas dag na 'khor lo dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na rin por che dang pad+ma 'dzin po'o/ /lho nub tu rdo rje phag
64a7(rgyud 'grel): mo mdog ser pa/ g.yas na rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /nub byang du rdo rje dbyangs can ma mdog dmar mo g.yas dag na pad+ma dang ral gri can/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /byang
64b1(rgyud 'grel): shar du rdo rje mdzod ldan ma mdog ljang khu g.yas dag na ral gri dang 'khor lo can/ g.yon dag na nor bu dang pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs can ma sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla ba la gnas shing/ dang po'i phyag dag gis gri gug dang thod pa
64b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin cing/ rang dang 'dra ba'i thabs rnams la 'khyud pa/ g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ zhal gsum pa la gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal sngo ba ni g.yas pa dkar ba'o/ /g.yon pa dmar ba'o/ /yang gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal dkar ba de'i zhal g.yas sngo ba'o/ /g.yon la
64b3(rgyud 'grel): dmar ba'o/ /gang gi rtsa ba'i zhal ser ba de'i ni/ g.yas dang g.yon sngo ba dang dkar ba ste/ ljang gu dang dmar ba yang de bzhin no/ /grwa bzhin gnas pa'i mi'i thod pa rnams ni kha dog dkar po bcud kyis bkang ba'i pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i dbus su gnas pa'o// //
64b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dam tshig gi 'khor lo la bstims te/ thams cad kyi mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs la de bzhin du thams cad kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs byin gyis brlabs nas cho ga ji lta bas dbang bskur te/ rjes su mthun par spyi bo
64b5(rgyud 'grel): la rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de nas man ngag ji lta bas mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba'i bar du bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar pad+ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa gyen du 'breng ba zla ba la gnas pa'o//
64b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i lte ba la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de la dbus su yaM sngon po nyid de/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+rI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pas bskor ba yi ge shin tu phra bas gnas par bltas la/ de las byung ba'i gshin rje'i dgra dbugs la zhon pas
64b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro zhing de dang lhan cig 'jug pa gsal bar spro bar bya'o/ /gang gi tshe skyo ba na/ rus pa'i rang bzhin gyi phreng ba bdud rtsi bcus legs par byugs pa blangs la/ ril bu re re zhing yi ge me yongs su gyur pa'i 'dod chags gshin rje'i dgra'i gzugs
65a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsams ba 'am/ mi'i mgo bo 'phral du bcad pa khrag 'jig pas khyab par bsams te/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo dang srin lag gis gzung la/ khro bo'i brjod pa kho nas gsang sngags bzlas pa bya'o/ /'di la gang gi tshe
65a2(rgyud 'grel): rim gyis zlos pa de'i tshe/ sa bon yaM las zhe sdang gshin rje'i dgra la sogs pa re re lha mo dang bcas par spro ba dang/ gsang sngags re re'i yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /'on te ci car du ni sa bon yaM las kyang zhe sdang gshin rje'i dgra nas/ ji srid mdzed ldan
65a3(rgyud 'grel): ma gshin rje'i dgra'i bar du dus gcig tu spro zhing/ sngags kyang re re yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ cig car pa'i phyogs la sku rdo rje la sogs pa yang ye shes sems dpa' i sa bon dang lhan cig spro ba'o/ /'dir yang thogs pa dang/ shin tu myur
65a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang shin tu gsal ba dang/ mi gsal ba dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i sngags pas ni grangs 'bum gyi phra mo'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /bye bas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i dbang po phyag rgya chen por gnas pa'o/ /de
65a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bzlas pas yid skyo ba na/ ye shes 'khor lo mdun na bzhugs pa legs par mchod de/ bstod cing bdud rtsi bcu phul la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /yang dam tshig 'khor lo bdag nyid kyi yaM gyi sa bon gyi
65a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcug la/ /bdag nyid zhe sdang gshin rje'i dgra'i ngar 'dzin pa dang gnas bar bya'o/ /thun mtshams bzhi bo thams cad du 'di ltar sgrub pa 'di ni/ dpal gshin rje dgra'i las rab tu bsgrub pa/ las dang po ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i bya ba'o/ /gzhan
65a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes cung zad babs pa dang /ye shes la dbang thob pa dang/ ye shes la yang dag par dbang thob pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba ni le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa rgya cher byas pas 'dir yang ma smras so/ /de bzhin du bdud
65b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi myang pa dang/ gtor ma sbyin pa dag kyang/ bdag gis le'u gsum pa dang drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'i skabs su gsal bar byas pa kho nas shes so/ /phyogs dbang zla ba zhes grags pa/ /dpal ldan chos skyong de yi bkas/ gshin rje'i dgra gang zhes?
65b2(rgyud 'grel): po yis/ /bsgrub thabs cho ga rnams gsal ba/ /zla ba'i zer gyis reg pa yi/ /ku mud rab tu rgyas 'dra ba/ /'di ni rnam sbyar dge gang des/ /'gro rnams 'chi bdag las rgyal gyur/ /gshin rje'i dgra nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /ku mu ta kha bye ba zhes bya ba
65b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //A tsArya bi nA ya tsan+d+ra dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
65b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gus pa yis ni bla ma yi/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma phyag
65b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal te/ /bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i/ /mdor bsdus pa yi sgrub thabs bshad/ /dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /stong pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste/ snying
65b6(rgyud 'grel): ga pad+ma 'dab brgyud bsam/ /de steng nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi steng du hUM bsams te/ hUM las 'od byung mdun du ni/ /bla ma mkha' 'gro bzhugs par bsam/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod byas la/ /sdig bshags la sogs tshogs bcu bsag /
65b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying ga'i hUM las ni/ /'od byung lus ngag bag chags rnams/ /bsres nas stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /de ni ye shes tshogs yin no/ /sems ni hUM gi rnam bar bsam/ /hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur/ /rdo rje las ni skur bskyed do/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sku
66a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog nag /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ /spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen du mdzes/ /rdo rje ral gri gri gug gsum/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag na bsnams/ /'khor lo pad+ma thod ba
66a2(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa yin/ /g.yas skum g.yon brkyang bsus po che/ /lha mo phag mos mgul nas 'khyud/ /phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /g.yas pa gri gug banda g.yon/ /gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud pa'i tshul/ /
66a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i gnas su bzhugs/ /mig dang lus sogs dbang po drug/ sangs rgyas drug kyang yod par bsam/ /sku gsung thugs kyang byin gyis brlabs/ /snying ga'i hUM las 'od byung bas/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro spyan drangs la/ /tshig
66a4(rgyud 'grel): gi dbang yang blang bar bya/ /bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun/ /bcom ldan mnga' bdag chen po rnams/ khyed kyis bdag la dbang bskur gsol/ /de skad bdag gis dbang blangs pas/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/ /bdag
66a5(rgyud 'grel): gi spyi bor dbang bskur bar/ /rigs lnga cod pan gyur par bsam/ /mchod dang bstod dang bdud rtsi bza' / /rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ba ste/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin no/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thams cad
66a6(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i don du bzlas/ /gtor ma'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpan+na twA da oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swA hA/ /bar chad thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /nges ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /des ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas
66a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ngal gso bya/ /snying ga'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /khams gsum ma lus kun la khyab/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas sku ru gyur/ /gyur pa kun kyang bdag la bsdu/ /bdag kyang hUM la bsdu byas la/ /hUM yang thig ler gyur par bsgom/
66b1(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma'i rtog pa spangs pa ste/ /yang dag bde ba'i rnam pa'o/ /phyag med zhal med kha dog med/ /mchog tu dga' i ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /'di byas bsod nams gang thob nges/ /sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shog/
66b2(rgyud 'grel): nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i bsgrub thabs rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du /kriSh+Na ya mA ri kro d+ha rA dza ba tra sa ra sA d+ha ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po dus?
66b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar phyin pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spros bral thugs su chud bdag 'gro ba kun khyab pa/ /ma lus bdud 'joms thogs med khro bo kun gyi gtso/ /pad+ma rdo rje snyoms 'jug zhi bde mdzes pas
66b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyings/ /longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhes pa'i snying po la btud de/ /sangs rgyas thugs kyis rgyud rgyal 'bum pa thu bo che/ /na da ku be ra la yab kyis rjes gdams zhing/ /de yis de nyid bsdus pa'i byang chub sems chen po'o/ /rnam par rgyal la
66b5(rgyud 'grel): gsher rgyud las byung ba shad par bya/ /'gro kun sangs rgyas snying po ste/ gtso bo mi yang dang ldan bstan/ /ral gri pad+ma skyon med gnas/ /cod pan brgyan pa mthong bar bya/ /mdza' yas mi gnas gtso bo la/ /dmigs dang padmos rjes bzung nas/ /
66b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal por dran pa byas nas kyang/ /ltag pa'i lha rnams spyan drang ngo/ /rnam dag bdun gyis sbyangs pa la/ /tshangs pa bzhi yi sems gnas nas/ /'phrog pa med pa'i snying po nyid/ /thog mdza' med pa dmigs par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba
66b7(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ yi ge gsum gyi rang bzhin ni/ /bde? gsal stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /thog mdza' med nas sems can la/ /gnas phyir rig pa nyams mi bya/ /hUM las re pha byung nas kyang/ /nyi dkyil rdo rje 'khor lo bsgom/ /de rjes hUM las hUM byung
67a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chos 'byung gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyad ldan/ /pad+ma rdo rjes mtshan byas pa'o/ /gong mtshungs b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang/ oM las brtag pa sna tshogs mnyam/ /gdan ni rjes mthun gnas pa'o/ /a
67a2(rgyud 'grel): las mar ldan nyi ma zla/ /mnyam pa hUM las rdo rje ste/ /sku yi gzi brjid bsdus pa rgyal/ /rgyud gshed rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom/ /phab pa'i sbyor ldan byang chub sems/ /yongs 'gyur thabs dang shes rab sku/ /yig 'phru lnga yis gang ba las/ /'phros pa'i lha
67a3(rgyud 'grel): mos bskul nas bzhengs/ /chos kun bdag po bsgom pa bya/ /oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ yaM las skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed/ /in+d+ra ni la'i mdog 'dra ba/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar phag mos 'bril/ /ma he ser skya la bskum brkyang/ /
67a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thod pa/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad/ /thod pa lnga yis dbu brgyan cing/ /dbu skyes gyen 'greng brgyad kyis brgyan/ /rlon pa khrag 'dzag lnga bcu 'phyang/ /me dpung nang na gnas par bsgom/ /rang mtshungs ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /
67a5(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gsum dang ldan pas so/ /yi ge lnga rdzogs de bzhin gshegs/ /rigs kyis mdog dang mtshan mar ldan/ /sku ni mtho gar tshad yin te/ /phrag mo lnga ni chen gang ngo/ /sku gsum rab tu thob bya'i phyir/ /lus ngag yid gsum byin brlabs bya//
67a6(rgyud 'grel): spyi gtsug rtag ba'i rgyal po ste/ /mgrin par rdo rje nyi ma bsgom/ /snying gar mi skyong rdo rje 'chang/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ mig la sa'i snying po ste/ rna ba la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /sna la nam mkha' i snying po mchog /lce la 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon/ /sgrib pa rnam sel
67a7(rgyud 'grel): rus la dgod/ /kun tu bzang po yid kyi'o/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM ki kaM saM/ cho ga gsum dang ldan pa la/ /oM dang hUM gis spel bar bya/ /rdo rje lnga ni mchog byas la/ /gsol btab dbang gis mi bskyong 'gyur/ /mi bzang rdo rje 'khor lo nyid/ /mchod bstod byas la
67b1(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug bya// /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ tsakra maN+Dal d+hA tu dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya stwaM a haM a la la la la ho/ a a a a/ rdo rje nam mkha' byin brlabs la/ /bskyod pas lnga 'gyur byang chub sems/ /mkha' yi pad+mar rdzus skyes nas/ sa
67b2(rgyud 'grel): dgur bskyed la rab rgyas sku/ /ba spu'i bu ga che nas spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin yang rjes bsams nas/ /rigs kyi don yang bsgrub par bya/ /oM badzra d+h+rika ya hUM/ oM dzi na dzi ka k+She hUM/ oM ratna d+h+rika ma hUM/ oM a ro lika me hAM/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika da hUM/ shar
67b3(rgyud 'grel): du? gti mug gshed po ste/ /lho ru nga rgyal gshed po'o/ /nub tu 'dod chags gshed po ste/ /byang du phrag dog gshed po'o/ /shar la 'od zer gzhan rnon po/ /dkar ser dmar ljang rang 'od rig /rigs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya 'dzin/ /gzhan ni rim
67b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor shes pa'o/ /Na ye ni na rA 'phros pa las/ /byang chub sems kyis rab rgyas pa'i/ /tsar tsi ka sogs lha mo yis/ /mchod pas rab tu mnyes par bya/ /de nas rdo rje dril 'chang bas/ /bstod pa yang ni ched du brjod/ /dam tshig bzang po byin brlabs
67b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /rdo rje hUM gis myang bar bya/ /spro ba chen po 'jig rten khams/ /thogs pa med pas bsdus byas nas/ du mar brtson 'grus ldan yid kyis/ /yang dang yang du goms par bya/ /rdo rje snying ga'i dkyil 'khor la/ /yid skyob bkod nas bzlas
67b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rim dang cig car sbyor ba yi/ /sems can don du bzlas par bya/ /zla ba'o cog gi bcu bzhi la/ /dri chus byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru gsum ldan zhing me tog spras/ /mchod pa bzang ldan gtor
67b7(rgyud 'grel): ma bkang/ //mi rus lnga bcu tham pa la/ /khrag gis sbags pa'i mgo bor bsgom/ /ri lu re la gshed nag pos/ /brgyan pa khri yi bar du bzlas/ /mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes byas la/ /gsol btab gtor ma dur khrod spyin/ /oM in+d+ra ya trI(rgyud 'grel): ya ma
68a1(rgyud 'grel): ya Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): ba ru NA ya wikri ku be rA ya kri/ A shI nA ya ta/ agne me A/ nai ri ta ye na/ bla ya be ya na/ tsan+d+ra ya hUM/ sU syA ya hUM/ prahma NA ya phaT ba su d+ha ra ya phaT/ bem tsi dra ye sA/ sarba b+hu te b+hyo hA/ hi hi hi hi hUM/ pheM pheM pheM pheM phaT
68a2(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ gad mo chen mo brgyad rgad nas/ /gnad ba byin nas gshegs par bsams/ /'di ni bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'khor lo ni/ /dbang po skye mched stong ba yi/ /lcags kyi khang pa bcu bdun gyi/ /rdo rje snying po dgod par bya/ /chu
68a3(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil 'khor shing rta dang/ tsa spyang brgyug pa lta bu'o/ /sbyor ldan man ngag dam pa ni/ /dam pa'i zhal las shes bar bya/ /las dang brjes mthun 'khor lo ni/ /gzhan du rgya tshar bshad bas na/ /'dir ni mang du ma smos so/ /ya ma rA dza sa ngo mo ya/
68a4(rgyud 'grel): ya me ngo ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ zhi ba'i mthar ni swAhA/ rgyas dang dbang la oM dang ho/ /drag po hUM gis rten par bya/ /'phrin las bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyu dang bstan bcos mkhas ba bdag min te/ /dam
68a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bla ma'i zhabs la brten nas chos 'di byas/ /rgyud kyi mngon rtogs nges par byin pa'i yon tan dpal/ /dad dang shes rab snying rjer bcas rnam nges sgrol shog /bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim/ /zab mo'i sgrib pa rnyed dka' ba nor bu lta bu'i gzhung
68a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis/ /'gro kun gshin rjes gshed na gang shog /khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nag po'i dus mthar phyin ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po sh+rI paN+Di tas mdzad pa'o/ / //
68a7(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ba bsod snyoms ba pradz+nyA shI dz+nyO na kIrtis rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ra sI d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 
68b1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun rdo rje sems bdag sngags/ /'jigs byed dpa' bo dgra nag la/ /btung de brgyud rim las rnyod pa/ /dngos grub 'byung phyir bshad par bya/ /rang gzugs rdzogs pa'i snying ga ru/ /ya yig las ni 'gro ba sbyang/ /bdun po
68b2(rgyud 'grel): yid kyang sbyang byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la gzhag par bya/ /stong pa'i snying po gsal bar bsam/ /bsrung ba pad+ma ldan pa'i nang/ /chu skyes ri bong can rnon po/ /byang chub rgyu yi gshin rje gshed/ /rtsa ba'i zhal gyi khyad par can/ /zhu ba'i thig le
68b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems/ /ya las mtshan ma bsdu bar bya/ /de las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /in+d+ra nI la lta bu ste/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa dkar dang dmar/ /phag mo de mtshungs dam 'khyud pa/ /gri gug thod pa tsa ba'i phyag/ rdo rje bar dang tha ma gri/ gzhan
68b4(rgyud 'grel): na 'khor lo pad+ma 'dzin/ /thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can/ /ser brdzes spyan dgu bzlog cing 'gyur/ /lnga bcu'i do shal mnyam du spyangs/ /gdug pa brgyad kyis sku brgyan cing/ /rus pas brgyan cing dum bus bsgegs/ /mtshon cha bcu gnyis 'khrug par
68b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /ma he la bzhugs srid rtser 'bar/ /sku gsung thugs dang skye mched dang/ /dbang dang byin brlabs mchod dang bstod/ /bdud rtsi myang dang spro bsdu dang/ /bzlas pa'i rim pa'i man ngag las/ /shes pas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM kA la rU pa hUM/
68b6(rgyud 'grel): oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yak+She ya yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na naM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ drug pas gtor ma'i bsnyen pa bya/ /sum cu brgyad pas nye bar bsnyen/ /bco lnga pas ni/
68b7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsgrub/ /las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya/ /gshed nag rgyud dang 'byung ba las/ /rnyed de sgrub thabs 'di bris pas/ /blo ni rab dag gyur nas kyang/ /gshin rje gshed dus 'gyur bar shog /gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon mkhas
69a1(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kirtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ bai ro tsa na ya mA ri no? pi ka na ma/ bod skad du/
69a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed rnam par snang mdzad kyi mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rtag pa'i dpal/ /me long ye shes byang chub sems/ /'od gsal rdo rje kun zhi ba/ /gti mug rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
69a3(rgyud 'grel): sa rnams pha rol bgrod pa'i lam/ /rtag pa'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /dang por sngags pas snying rje dran pas rang lus rdzogs pa dang/ /snying gar sa bon gsal ba las ni dam pa rnams bsams nas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gsum
69a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi yon tan bsams byas nas/ /bsod nams rgya cher rab tu rgyas pa'i tshogs rab bsag par bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms ldan pas stong pa bsgom/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo byas nas pad+ma zla ba rgyas pa'i steng/ /k+She yig gyur pas chos kyi
69a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dmar zhing 'od 'phro ba/ bsdu ba'i de nyid las ni rtag pa'i skur gyur pa de khro la sgeg /rtsa ba'i zhal dang gzhan gnyis dkar sngo dmar zhing phyag drug yum dang bcas/ gri gug 'khor lo ral gri pad+ma rin chen chu skyes rab tu 'khrugs/ /glang chen
69a6(rgyud 'grel): pags pas stong dang smad? dkris mi mgo rlon 'dzag pa/ thod pa drug ldan skra ni dmar ser gyen brdzes sbrul brgyad yan lag spras/ /me dkyil na bzhugs ye shes sems dpa' gsal nas yan lag drug byas te/ /rlung dang me dang thod pa snod mchog
69a7(rgyud 'grel): sgron ma bcu yig kha bkab nas/ /bskyod dang 'bar bas glang po la sogs bcur gyur sbyor ba'i sems bab nas/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ byin brlabs rdo rje'i bu gus rab drangs mnyes byas sgro bsdus thim/ /rdo rje rtag pa rim gyis bskyod par ? thim
69b1(rgyud 'grel): nas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' i ba bsam/ /yod dang med pa las 'das spros bral nam mkha' lta bu'i byang chub sems dran nas/ /rmi lam sad? pa'i rnal 'byor phung po khams rnams kun spangs der zin? sa ni ldang ba brtsam/ /khams sogs bde ba chen por bdag?
69b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur gzugs brnyan lta bur rab rtogs 'di ni rgyal sras bdag/ snying po nyi zer ltar bur bzlas pa 'gro ba kun la phan par bya phyir 'bum du bzlas/ /rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis steng 'og la spyod 'jig rten don 'gyur thams cad gshin rje gshed
69b3(rgyud 'grel): thob shog /oM dzi na dzika mo ha ra ti/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje mi 'jigs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgrub thabs sangs rgyas la 'jug pa/ /bskyed
69b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang ni rdzogs pa'i rim/ /gong ma'i go 'phang ston pa po/ /sngags rnams sgrib pa grol gyur cig /gshin rje gshed nag por snang mdzad kyi mngon rtogs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa
69b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //!/ /rgya gar skad du/ ratna saM b+hA ba ya mA ri sA d+hA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan
69b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan don yid bzhin 'byung gnas rin po che/ /re 'dod skong mdzad rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal/ /kun rtog bral ba mnyam pa nyid ye shes/ /ser sna 'joms mdzad de la
69b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal te/ /nga rgyal rab rgyas sems can de don du/ /phra mas pa mdzad rab tu bshad par bya/ /byang chub sems dang shes rab ni/ /snyoms 'jug dran pa'i sngags pa yis/ /skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor pas/ /spro dang bsdu ba rab tu bya/ /bla ma rje dpal
70a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po dang/ /sdu gu lha sogs rab dmigs te/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs khyad par ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi lam gyur pa'i/ /go rims tshangs pa'i gnas rnams bsgom/ /rang bzhin stong pa rkyen?
70a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis te/ ye shes tshogs rab bsag par bya/ /ma yig hUM gis sna tshogs las/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo 'bar ba'o/ /chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ste/ /ma las rin chen zur brgyad pa/ /spro bsdu'i nga rgyal gsal bar bya/ /oM ratna saM b+hA ba At+ma
70a3(rgyud 'grel): ko haM/ de las gyur pa'i rdo rje ni/ /btso ma gser gyi mdangs mnyam zhing/ /rang 'od dang mtshungs rig mar ldan/ /zhal gsum g.yas g.yon sngo dang dkar/ /spyan dgu mche gtsigs phyag drug pa/ /gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag /rin chen ral gri
70a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo pad/ /g.yas dang g.yon la rim gyis sbyar/ /dbu skra ser brdzes gdug pa'i rgyan/ /lnga bcu'i phreng dang dur khrod spras/ /'od zer rno mnan me dpung 'bar/ /mi phyed rab tu 'khyud pa'o/ /sa bon rdzogs dang mig la sogs/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM gaM kaM saM
70a5(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rdzogs pa drug ni byang chub sems/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM las sku gsung thugs/ /'phros pas rin dbang gshin rje gshed/ /rab gnas rang dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ /rnam 'phrul mchod pa byang chub sems/ /bstod pa rgyud rgyal ji snyed bzhin/ /rlung me
70a6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa sgron me bcu/ /byin brlabs bdud rtsi myangs nas kyang/ /spro bsdu byas nas bzlas pa brtsam/ /oM ratna d+h+rika dwe Sha ra ti/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ stong gi nus pa khyad par rnyed/ /mkha' 'gro ma 'ang de dbang 'gyur/ /khri yis 'byung po las
70a7(rgyud 'grel): kun byed/ bya bas rgyas dang rlag 'gyur te/ /bye ba lnga bzlas tshad dang bral/ /shin tu rab zhi bsdus pa ni/ /chu yi snying po de bzhin du/ /chur 'gyur rang gi rngos dang bral/ /dngos med mnyam par bsgom par bya/ /bdag gis rab phye las sbyar ma
70b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad dang/ /byang chub la mos sgrub po bag tsam las/ /nga rgyal gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa brtsams/ /'dir mos rdo rje'i sa la thogs med shog /gshin rje gshed rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me?
70b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ a mi tE b+hA h+ri ut+tra na? rA ga ya mA ri sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'od
70b3(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa'i snying po/ 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs dbyer med pa yi/ /'dod chags che la phyag 'tshal te/ gang gi mngon zhen 'jigs byed la/
70b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /dad ldan shes rab snying rje yis/ /don bcas gzhan don gtsor 'dzin pas/ /sbyin pa la sogs legs sbyangs te/ /yid skyob sngags 'di brtsam par bya/ /dang por sngags pas khrus byas nas/ /nad
70b5(rgyud 'grel): tshangs can gyi stan bting la/ /rang gi snying nyid bskul bar bya/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs 'dus byas dang/ /theg chen cho ga bzhi dag dang/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis/ /bdag rgyud yongs su dag par bya/ /bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang/ /sangs
70b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhing rnams dag pa'i phyir/ /bsrung dang chu skyes bsgom par bya/ /mtshon cha rgyas dang 'od zer sna/ /paM dang raM las byung ba yi/ /nyi ma sa bon me yig las/ /bcu drug mnga' bcas lnga 'od zer/ /bsdus nas byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM
70b7(rgyud 'grel): a mi tA b+hA h+ri ut+tra na rA ga ya ma ri At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas rdo rje snang mdza' yas/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdangs dang mnyam/ /g.yas g.yon zhal ni sngo dang dkar/ /rang rig yum ni thabs dang mtshungs/ /stod smad stobs 'jigs pags pa gnyis/
71a1(rgyud 'grel): gri gug thod pa ral gri dang/ /'khor lo rin chen shin tu 'khrug /sbrul dang rus pas rnam brgyan pa/ /dbu skra brdzes la spyan mig 'khrug /mche gtsigs 'bar ba'i me dpung bsgom/ /rdo rje mig dang rna sna lce/ /lus yid? la ni
71a2(rgyud 'grel): sa snying sogs/ /rdo rje lus dang ngag yid la/ /rdo rje sku gsung thugs ldan bsam/ /mi bskyod la ni dbang blang ste/ /dbul gshin rje gshed po bsgom/ /sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis bcug nas kyang/ /tsar tsi ka sogs rnam 'khrul mchod/ /gshin rje
71a3(rgyud 'grel): gshed po rab 'jig pa/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas brnyed/ /dbyangs mchog gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis byin gyis brlab/ /bdud rtsi myangs la spro bsdu bya/ /sngags pas ji srid mi skyo'i
71a4(rgyud 'grel): bar/ /bzlas shing spro bsdu rgyas par bya/ /oM a ro lika rA ga ra ti hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thams cad 'dod chags rjes dran nas/ /'dod chags chen por rab dmigs te/ /tshan med yi ge spangs pa yis/ /a don bsam mi khyab pa bsgom/ /snying rje
71a5(rgyud 'grel): sad pas langs nas kyang/ /phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lam bya/ /thams cad du ni nga rgyal bdag /spangs na dam tshig nyams pa yin/ /bdag gis 'dod chags rgya mtshor nub rnams la/ /'khor ba'i mtsho la bde ba'i gru btsugs te/ /gsung gi dbang
71a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /'gro kun pad+ma bzhin du dri med shog/ //'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba// //slob dpon mar me mdzad kyis
71a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / (/gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//) /rgya gar skad du/ badzra tIk+Sh+Na ya ma ri sA d+hA naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i
71b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig sems can don byed cing/ /nan tan ye shes phyir mi ldog /margad ljang gu'i mdog 'dra la/ /rab tu dang bas btud byas te/ /brtul zhugs thogs pa med pa yis/ /las kyi don dam?
71b2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'grub phyir/ /dgra nag rgyud la nyer brten nas/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /dad ldan g.yo sgyu med pa yis/ /bla ma mgon la btud sbyangs te/ /bum sogs dbang ni thob nas kyang/ /dam bcas nas ni bsgrub par bya/ /rang nyid lhag pa'i
71b3(rgyud 'grel): lhar dmigs te/ /snying gar ri bong can gyi dkyil/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): yig 'od zer lnga ldan las/ /zhing gnyis ma lus sbyang bar bya/ /khyad par yul la brten nas kyang/ /phra rab lus kyi phyag 'tshal bya/ /tsar tsi la sogs rnam 'phrul gyis/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod
71b4(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ /sdig sogs dag par byas nas kyang/ /rje btsun pa ni mkha' la gshegs/ /don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems/ /tshangs pa'i gnas dang stong pa bsgom/ /oM shuA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba Ata ma ko haM/ nyi dkyil 'od zer lnga ldan pa'i/ /hUM
71b5(rgyud 'grel): las bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsam/ /pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las ut pal ral grir 'gyur/ /spro bsdus sku gsung thugs bcug ste/ /gyur pas phrag dog gshin rje gshed/ /mar gat ljang gu lta bur mdzes/ /sngo dang dkar ba g.yas g.yon
71b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal/ /rang 'dra yuM ni cung zad skem/ /'khyud cing yang dag mdzes par ldan/ /gri gug ral gri 'khor lo dang/ /thod pa rin chen chu skyes 'bar/ /stod smad glang chen stag lpags bsnams/ /rtog med go cha phreng bar bcangs/ /klu brgyad phuT? sgra mche ba gtsigs/ /
71b7(rgyud 'grel): me? dkyil nang na bzhugs pa la/ /sku gsung thugs la rdo rje gsum/ /skye mched drug la byang chub sems/ /dbang bskur spyi bor gshin rje gshed/ /sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /rnam 'phrul mchod pa bsam mi khyab/ /phrag dog rdo? rje'i
72a1(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun byed/ /sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba/ /ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rlung dang mes ni pad+ma sbyangs/ /ye shes zhu ba gsum byin brlabs/ /rdo rje sbu gus mchod byas pas/ /sangs rgyas thams
72a2(rgyud 'grel): cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor ni/ /kun rdzob bden pa bla med yin/ /khab len rdo yi rnam pa ltar/ /bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin byed pa/ /chos kun do gcig pa yin te/ /nan tan ye shes zhes bya'o/ /rgyud rgyal gsang ba 'dus sogs
72a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /dgongs pa bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim/ /rgyud gzhung thams cad 'gal med 'dis/ /'gro rnams nye bar 'tshe gyur cig /gshin rje gshed rdo rje rnon po zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //
72a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// / !/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra tsar tsi ka sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems ma bde ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
72a5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /thabs kyi rgyal po la 'dud shes rab go cha can/ /byams pa rnam par dag pas sems can brtse skyong ba/ /thabs chen sad pa'i mnga' yis ma rig srog gcod cing/ /gti mug rnam par dag pa ye shes yul can la/ /btud de zhe sdang thams
72a6(rgyud 'grel): cad rnam par mthar byed cing/ /snying po 'khor lo bsgrub phyir rab tu bshad par bya/ /dang po sngags pas tho rangs cha/ /khrus kyi bum pa legs byugs nas/ /gur kum chus byugs rdo dag gis/ /sgo dgu la ni brdeg par bya/ /de nas gos sogs tshul
72a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdams nas/ /shu kra dkar po'i maN+Dal bya/ /bdag nyid lha ru gsal ba yis/ /rnam dag bdun dang tshad med bzhi/ /byas nas phyi nas chos la blta/ /sngags rkyen gyis ni rnam thar bsgom/ /bdag bsrung ba ni ye shes la/ /gzhan bsrung 'khor lo
72b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'o/ /ma chags dang ni 'od zer bsil/ /rdo las chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /spro bsdus nga rgyal brtsam par bya/ /oM badzra tsar tsi ka At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas sku mdog dkar la zhi/ /cung zad skem zhing phral 'jam/ /dkar sngo dmar ba'i zhal gsum
72b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /gri gug 'khor lo ral gri dang/ /rin chen chu skyes 'dzin pa'i phyag /stag gi pags pas smad dkris te/ /dbu skra ser brdzes thod pa lngas/ /dbu brgyan lnga bcu'i phreng ba can/ /zhi zhing sgeg pa me dbus kyi la/ /g.yon bskum g.yas pa brkyang pas
72b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /rang snying sa bon rdzogs pa dang/ /yig 'bru gsum la rdo rje gsum/ /skye mched la ni rdo rje drug /rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): rab thim nas/ /ba spu bu ga chen po'aM/ yang na snying ga'i rnam 'phrul dang/ /phyi nang
72b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i mchod pa bya/ /lag pa rdo rje dril ldan pas/ /rdo rje zhi ba byang chub sems/ /gti mug rdo rje nyid dbyer med/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag chen po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /spro dang bsdu ba byed pa'am/ /ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bya/ /zhi
72b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dbang dang drag po yis/ /phrin las mthun par gsang sngags bsgrub/ /oM mo ha ra ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rdo rje tshig ni mi gsal zhing/ /sngags pa'i yid gsal bzlas par bya/ /gal te spros pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /ngal ba sob 'di lta
72b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /chos kun zhi ba rim bzhin du/ /pad+ma chos 'byung la thim bya/ /chos kun yi ge gsum ldan pas/ /go rim a yi sgras bskul te/ /skye med 'od gsal bsgom par bya/ /gti mug rab tu rmongs pa'i mun chen dang/ /nga bdag chings chen
72b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu bcad pa'i phyir/ /rgyud chen las byung bcom ldan mngon sum du/ /thos nas bris pa'i gzhung 'dis kun grol shog /rdo rje sems ma bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // 
73a1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra DA ki yo gi ni sA ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje
73a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdog rang bzhin rnam dag bde ba spyod can/ /rnam par rtog pa bral bas phag mo'i zhal mnga' ba/ /btud de rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes bde rnyed bshad par bya/ /sngags pa
73a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab snying rjer ldan/ /sa bon las ni rkyen gyis bskyed/ /myu gu rang gi lhar ldan pas/ /tshogs bsags 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor chad gis byugs nas kyang/ /rang byung me tog thig le dgod/ /bskus pa'i me tog sngon po dgram//
73a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag sogs bdag gis ci nus bya/ /dang po byams pa bsgom bya ste/ /gnyis pa snying rje'i rnam pa bsgom/ /gsum pa dga' ba bsgom bya ste/ /gsum gyi tha ma btang snyoms so/ /chos kun stong pa nyid dag tu/ /shes pa'i rnal 'byor rig pa'i rgyun
73a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ma ru gnas pa dag /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ster nyid du/ /thugs kyi yi ge bsrung ba bsam/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer bsil ba'i steng/ /sa la rdo rje sngon po ste/ /spro bsdu nga rgyal dran par bya/ /oM dwe Sha the ti badzra At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas rdo rje phag mo ste/
73a6(rgyud 'grel): in+d+rA nI la'i mdog 'dra ba/ /rtsa ba phag gdong rab sngo zhing/ /de las gzhan pa dkar dang dmar/ /gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag/ rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo pad/ /rim bzhin bkod pa'i sku mchog ni/ /g.yon bskum g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas//
73a7(rgyud 'grel): dbu dang sku ni dur khrod dang/ /klu yis mdzes shing phreng bar ldan/ /ma dpung nang na gzi brjid che/ /bskyed la gsum la rdo rje che/ /drug la byang chub sems dpa' drug /rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed/ /ye shes phag mos byin gyis rlab/ /mchod
73b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam 'phrul snying las sprul/ /mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che/ /zhe sdang bdag po thugs dbyer med/ /mi phyed rnam rtog rab gcod pa/ /rdo rje phag mo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'phros pas snying ga'i sa bon te/ /sbyangs pa rang yang dang ba'i ltar/ /byas nas bsdu ba
73b2(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang bya/ /gal te skyo na gsang sngags bzlas/ /ye shes sems dpa' i dkyil nyi ste/ /rdo rje sngags ni 'bar bar bsam/ /oM dwe Sha ra ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ stong dang khri dang bye bar bzlas/ /sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rab
73b3(rgyud 'grel): tu zhi ba'i byang chub sems/ /yi ge kha dog dbyibs kyang med/ /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /skye 'jig med pa bsgom par bya/ /de la rten cing 'brel 'byung ste/ /phyag rgya bkrol la spyod lam bya/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis rje btsun phal
73b4(rgyud 'grel): ?? dred pa/ rtog bral chos sku gzugs sku snang sgrub thabs/ /phag mo rnal 'byor ma ya sgrub thabs byas/ /'di yis dge thob thams cad grol gyur shog/ //rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon mar me
73b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / !/ /rgya gar skad du/ /badzra gI ti su kharnga? swa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes
73b6(rgyud 'grel): rab pha rol phyin pa rgyal pa kun gyis yum/ /dri ma med pa'i gsung chen rdo rje dbyangs can ma/ /btud de sangs rgyas bde chen rab tu 'phel bya'i phyir/ /gsung gi pad+ma dri ma med pa'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /nags tshal mi phyed dpon pa'i gnas/ /nyams
73b7(rgyud 'grel): dga' bkra shis dang ba ru/ /'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /chu bur lta bu'i tshul gyis bsgom/ /sems can kun don legs byas nas/ /dam pa'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /phyag 'tshal bstod dang bshags pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang
74a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul gsol gdab/ /bsngo dang smon lam btab byas nas/ /yid kyis gshegs gsol tshad med bzhi/ /sngon 'gro stong pa bsgom par bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo 'jigs chen po/ /mtshon cha la drug pa shin tu bsgom//
74a2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma zla ba'i steng nyid du/ /byu ru bcag 'dra'i d+ho dag las/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad mtshan mar ldan/ /'phros nas bsdu ba bya ba ni/ /rigs kyi 'khor lo ma lus pa'o/ /oM badzra rA ga ra ti At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /zhal gsum g.yas g.yon
74a3(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang dkar/ /phyag drug gri gug pad+ma dang/ /ral gri thod pa 'khor lo dang/ /g.yon bskum g.yas pa brkyang pas gnas/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ hUM las thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las gsung dang oM las sku/ /k+ShiM las sa snying rdo rje mig /dza
74a4(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje can rna bar/ /kham las nam mkha' i snying po snar/ /gaM las 'jig rten dbang phyug lter/ /kaM las sgrib pa rnam sel lus/ /saM las kun tu bzang po yid/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur gshin rje gshed/ /dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang du bya/ /mchod pa
74a5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga'i byang chub sems/ /rdo rje gsung ni ye shes che/ /pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin/ /'dod chags chen po sbyor ba/ /rdo rje mthar mdzad khyed la bstod/ /rdo rje sbu gus bdud rtsi myang/ /sa bon 'phros pas 'gro ba sbyang/ /rdo rje bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /yid
74a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba ni mchog tu gces/ /oM badzra ra ga ra ti hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ ma ning rdo rje bzlas nas kyang/ /snying po can dngos bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags chen po sbyor ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /bde ba sems dran sgrub thabs 'di brtsams pas/ /gzung dang
74a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag nas kyang/ /dka' ba rnam dag smon lam stobs gyur shog/ //rdo rje bde rgyas dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ karma badzra Ni gau rI sA d+ha naM nA ma
74b1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ /las kyi rdo rje gau rI'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btang snyoms rnam par dag pa phyag rgya che/ /ye shes pha rol phyin ma la phyag 'tshal/ brtson 'grus thogs pa med pas sems can don/ /'grub
74b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir gau rI'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /khrus dang rgyan dang gos dang byug pa rnams/ /phyi nang rnam par dag pa shes par bya/ /rang gi rnal 'byor dam pa mchod nas kyang/ /bde pa'i 'khor lo bdag la gzhug par bya/ /tshad med bzhi la rnal 'byor sems
74b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas/ /chos kun snying po 'od gsal bar bsgom/ /bdag rgyud sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni/ /ro gcig thig le'i ngo bor gyur pa las/ /chad pa nyi ma'i steng gi rdo rje nyid/ /'phros pas bsrung pa'i 'khor lo gsal bar bya/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ru dag las
74b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pas/ /ud pal ral gri ljang mdog gi/ dkyil nas 'phros shing 'dus nas nga rgyal bya/ /oM badzrA gau rI swa b+hwa ba At+ma ko haM/ gyur pa'i sku ni mar kata ljang mdog ste/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar/ /gri gug ral gri 'khor lo thod pa dang
74b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen chu skyes rnams kyis mdzes pa'i phyag /dbu skra gyen 'gra ta thod pa lngas brgyan cing/ /tshangs pas byin mgo bo lnga bcus spyangs/ /klu dang mar kata rus pa'i rgyan 'jigs pas/ /stag lpags bsnams pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang ste/ /gzi brjid me
74b6(rgyud 'grel): yi dkyil na tshar 'bar ba'i/ /sku gsung thugs dang spyan sogs byin brlabs la/ /yi ge mtshan ma sku ni gang 'dod brtsam/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'phros pas 'khor lo bzang/ /gsol btab rig pa'i skyes bu mi bskyod pa/ /rjes su mthun pa'i lha ni spyan
74b7(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas/ /mchod bstod mnyes par byas nas rang la thim/ /mchod pa'i rnam grangs nam mkha' rgyas gdab/ /b+ha ga'i rnam 'phrul dag gis ci bder mchod/ /sngags pa rdo rje dril bur ldan pa yis/ /snyan pI glu dang ldan pas mchod par bya/ /rdo rje las
75a1(rgyud 'grel): ni kun grol ba/ /phrag dog rdo rje dbyer med sku/ /thams cad rdo rje btang snyoms nyid/ /rdo rje las ma phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spras?/ /rgyal ba thams cad mchod phyir myang ba dang/ /sems
75a2(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad rdo rje'i skur byas nas/ /sngags kyi 'khor lo ji ltar 'dod pas bzlas/ /oM badzra ra ti hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ rgyal mtshan gyi khams su 'o ma sgrub/ /thabs kyi gzugs las rtag tu dang 'gyur bas/ /rtag pa'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed nas
75a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /mthong ba'i sgrub thabs bdag gis 'di byas pas/ /'gro kun spros bral zhi ba la gnas te/ /sangs rgyas ye shes mngon du rtogs par shog/ //rdo rje las gau rI'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
75a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ b+haDDA ka many+dzu sh+rI ya mA ri pU dza kra ma bi? d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab snying rjer ldan zhing legs brtan
75a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sangs rgyas snying po 'dod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas/ /bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chud byas nas/ /rje btsun rnams la btud de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya/ /bdag nyid dran pa gcig pa'i 'gro blor ldan bdag med pa las bzlog cing 'byor
75a6(rgyud 'grel): ba gsum pa dag pas/ /bsnyen dang sgrub la rab tu mkhas byas te/ /nyin dang mtshan mo thams cad g.yeng med tshul gyis 'bad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang/ /dri med snying po mthar mdzad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin/ /dgra las rgyal ba gshin
75a7(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed nag lha yi tshogs/ /thugs rjes thugs chud spyan ras nyid mtsho dgongs su gsol/ /chos sku longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul sku'i rang bzhin can/ /rgyal ba'i rang bzhin phung pos sems can de 'dod skong/ /'byor lnga phun sum tshogs pas
75b1(rgyud 'grel): nad gsos sman pa'i mchog /bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po lnga las rgyal zhing nyon mongs lnga rnams dag /rang gzhan don rdzogs gang zhig phag mo la sogs 'khril/ /ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga pa'i? mdog/ rnam thar
75b2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin zhal myong la 'dud/ /bdud bzhi las rgyal lta ba'i nges sgrol bcom nas kyang/ /dang sogs rnam dag khro bo'i rtags su nges 'byung ba/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i/ /'jigs shing rab tu gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan
75b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dag sku/ byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid/ /thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa/ tsar ci phag mo gau rI dbyangs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ /mchod yon gdan mchog zhabs bkra
75b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa dang/ /spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas tshogs/ /ral mor sil snyan me tog phreng dang lnga ldi dang/ mchod sdod bye bas brgyan pas rab tu mchod par bgyi/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs/ /du mar sbyad kyang tshim pa med cing
75b5(rgyud 'grel): ngo mtshar ba/ /yid ldan sems kyis ngal so khyad par gyur pa rnams/ /mos blo dad pa'i mthu yis bde gshegs 'khor la mchod/ /'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rab mtshan ldan/ rgyal po btsun mo blon po mchog ni zhi zhing mdzes/ /'byor ldan phun
75b6(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa 'khor lo bsgyur ba yi/ /khyad par rdzas kyi bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod/ /gzugs dang nyer ldan dud dang pad+mas rab tu mdzes/ /gun de dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog /'jig rten dag na grags shing snyan
75b7(rgyud 'grel): ?? brjod pa'i/? /bla med rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod/ /dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas/ /mi sha rta dang ba lang glang chen khyi sha dang/ /sgron ma che dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas/ /rnam par
76a1(rgyud 'grel): rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod/ /bde gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i yon tan ni/ /bdag gis bskal pa'i mthan? brjod pas mi lang? bas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' tsam mos 'dis/ /rgyal
76a2(rgyud 'grel): ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cad bstod/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mar gis bskyed cing/ /lus ngag yid gsum sgo ru smin pa'i mi dge bcu/ /so so thar dang byang chub sems par rig pa 'dzin/ /tshul khrims sdom dang dam tshig
76a3(rgyud 'grel): nyams pa ji snyed bshags/ /bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal/ /nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i tshogs/ /slob dang mi slob sems kyi grogs su gang gyur pa/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dge la rjes yi rang/ /sangs
76a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gdul bya'i snang ba rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi/ /'gro ba mig ldongs shes rab sman gyis gso ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul/ /rgyal ba bcom ldan mya
76a5(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'da' bar bzhad pa rnams/ /khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di dag mgon med pas/ /nam mkhas gang khyab sems can ji srid mchis pa ru/ /de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol/ /bdag gis lus ngag yid kyi dge
76a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshogs ji snyed/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa nyid du nges bsdus te/ /bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du/ /dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag gis rje btsun rnams la shin tu dang
76a7(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis/ /sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te/ /dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs drung? shog /nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag cing sems rtogs nas//
76b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur shog /me tog shu kra len cing spros pa nyid spangs te/ /nyon mongs mngal du mi 'jug bde ba len par shog /yid ches sems kyis lhan cig skyes pa rnyed gyur te/ /'byor pa'i nus pas rdo rje lta bu'i lus thob
76b2(rgyud 'grel): shog /chos rnams ro gcig bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas/ /rigs dang tshogs kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur cig /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i phrin las nyer thob ste/ /gdug pa can rnams gshin rje gshed la mdon? gshol shog /thun mong dngos
76b3(rgyud 'grel): grub thogs pa med par thob nas kyang/ /blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis 'tsho shog /nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa de ba chen po'i sa thog nas/ /bdag dang sems can gshin rje gshed po nyid grub shog /sgrub po dang ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab
76b4(rgyud 'grel): spyad phyir/ /rje btsun pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas/ /nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang gyur te/ rgyun chad med bar phun sum tshogs sku thob par shog /'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab tu gzhol/ /sdig pa'i dba'
76b5(rgyud 'grel): klung? 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu zhugs/ /rnam smin chu srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas/ /g.yeng bas ral ba don mod ma byed pa dge ba sbyongs/ /rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po
76b6(rgyud 'grel): kriSh+Na paN+Di tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri bud+d+ha sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la
76b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma rje btsun bla med dang/ /sku gsum mgon po gshegs nyid las/ /btung de de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs/ /blo dman bdag gis bshad par bya/ /sngags pa blo dang ldan pa yis/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed de/ /skad cig drang pas
77a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bya/ /gnyis pas rdzogs pa thig le che/ /bzang po nyid dang dpal gyi mgon/ /so so las kyang bzhi 'byung bya/ /rdzogs dang rab tu gnas pa dang/ /mngon par btud la mchod byas te/ /ya yig sprul pa'i bcas
77a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /bshags dang rjes su yi rang dang/ /bskul dang gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /skyabs su 'gro dang sems bskyed che/ /lus dbul yongs su bsngo ba bya'o/ /smon lam gdab dang gshegs su gsol/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song bas/
77a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam thar gsum gyi bdag nyid bsgom/ /oM swA b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM/ gnas dang dag pa'i ngo bo dang/ /bde ba bzang po 'di bsgom bya/ /shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni/ /yi ge gsum gyi
77a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bor lta/ /dag pa'i thig le nam mkha' yis/ /rgyun gyis gnas pa'i nyi ma hUM/ gyur pa rdo rje gzhal med khang/ /zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par gnas /sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil nyid du/ /zla ba yi ge bcu drug bcas/
77a5(rgyud 'grel): re pha las byung gnyis pa las/ /gsal byed yi ge khor yug blta/ /ro mnyam pa las sa bon nyid/ /nor bu rdo rje spro dang bsdu/ /nga rgyal gyur pas rdo rje sems/ /dkar dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /shes rab gnyis med sgeg dang stangs/
77a6(rgyud 'grel): gdug dang dur khrod rgyan gyis spras/ /gri gug thod pa rtsa ba'i phyag /rdo rje ral gri g.yas na bsnams/ /g.yon na 'khor lo chu skyes so/ /sa bon 'od kyi bdag nyid dpal/ /rjes su gyur pas khu bar blta/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gnas/ nyi ma
77a7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ya gcig bcas/ /gyur pas rdo rje sngon po ste/ /sa bon 'od las gshin rje gshed/ /char sprin gzhon nu lta bu'i mdog /g.yas pa zla ba lta bu ste/ /g.yon pa pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i sku/ /rtsa ba'i phyag
77b1(rgyud 'grel): gis 'khyud pa'i stangs/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang/ /pad+ma 'od zer chen po 'bar/ /gri gug rdo rje mtshan pa dang/ /thod pa byang chub sems bkang ba/ /yum dang mtshungs par 'dzin pa ste/ /gcer bu rgyan bral skra grol ba'o/ /snyoms par 'jug
77b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stangs dang ldan/ /brgya phyed mgo bo'i phreng ba can/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /ma he nyi ma gnas pa'i stengs/ /rdo rje gshed po bsgom par bya/ /sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa yis/ /sems dpa' i rdo rje bde bar bsgom/ /skye mched zla ba'i
77b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ste/ /sems dpa' i yi ge gsal bar bya/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM gaM kaM saM/ spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying ga'i steng/ /zla ba pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil/ /dkar dmar gnag pa'i yi ge dgod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa bon las 'phros gshin rje gshed/ /yab yum
77b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun/ /phab ste spyi gtsug bab gyur pas/ /dri med dag pas rdo rje sems/ /spros dang bsdus pas de nyid don/ /mnyes par byas la rgyud la bstim/ /des dang gsal dang brtan pa dang/ /phab la thig
77b5(rgyud 'grel): le thig le che/ /byed pa sbyor dang phra ma dang/ /go rim nam mkha' i rdo rje'o/ /'di ni 'grub med 'grub pa med/ /rang bzhin nyid nas rdo rje sems/ /rdo rje nam mkha' i khams sbyor bas/ /gnyis med ye shes chos kyi sku/ /'di ni rnam par dag pa'o/ /ldang ba sA lu'i
77b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bras ltar du/ /gnas pa rgyal po'i dbang sgyur bzhin/ /dbyings kyi rdo rje tha mi dad/ /sbyor ba'i byang chub sems phab pas/ sa stengs sa 'og sa bla yi/ /gnas su sku gsung thugs bsams te/ /ma yongs don grub bzlas pa bya/ /oM kA la ru pa
77b7(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ 'dis ni brgya byin la sogs pa brgyal bar byed pa'o/ /oM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni dngos grub chen po yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /oM
78a1(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'dis ni las thams cad 'grub bo/ /ha cang drag min dal ba min/ /cung zad ring ba ma yin te/ /thung dang mi gsal rnam spangs te/ /tshig gi bar du mchod pa'i/ /chen pos bzlas
78a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni bsgrub pa'i don du byas/ /las kun bla ma brgyud shes bya/ /mi shes pa dag dgrol ba'i phyir/ /bdag gis rtogs par gyur pa brtsams/ /'di la 'byung ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed 'gyur
78a3(rgyud 'grel): shog /sangs rgyas gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ /nA da ku be ra las byung ba'i don/ /kun da nak+She ri na bzhugs pa'i mkhas pa chen po rnal 'byor pa nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na
78a4(rgyud 'grel): kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri swa d+ha ni na ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ /mgon po gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma la
78a5(rgyud 'grel): gus de rjes la/ gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje ni/ /rang 'od yan lag 'dus pa yi/ /bde ba rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ /gshin rje gshed nag sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nyid blo yis bshad par bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /snying rjes skad cig ltar bskyed la/ /snying gar
78a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ya yig dgod/ /'od 'phros sbyangs te bla ma dgug /bkod pa bsams la phyag dang ni/ /mchod pa la sogs tshogs bsags te/ /blo yis mkha' la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /rang bzhin rnams dang
78a7(rgyud 'grel): bral bas rgyu/ /'di ltar yang na mtshan ma ni/ /rnam par dpyad pas med pas na/ /'di ltar smon lam rnam par spangs/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+haM haM/ de ltar brtan par bsams nas ni/ /ma yig las byung nyi ma la/ /sna
78b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs hUM las rgya gram bsam/ /hUM las 'od 'phros ra pa'o/ /de dkyil paM las pad+ma ni/ /dmar po'i steng du zla ba ste/ /de las dbyangs yig rnam par bsam/ /de stengs raM las nyi ma ste/ /gsal byed bkod la gsal bar byas/ /de las gong du hUM du gyur/ /de
78b2(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje hUM ldan bsam/ /de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /zhal gzhan gshin rje gshed dang 'dra/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar bar bsgom/ /thugs kar sa bon gsal ba las/ /'od 'phros bkug la zhal bzhugs pas/ /snying gar zhu nas thim byas la/ /
78b3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' gsang sbyangs la ho dmar bsam/ /zhu bas skar mda' lam zhugs bzhin/ /mkha' gsang nang du babs gyur pas/ /bdag nyid yum dang bcas pa gzhu/ /de las thig le bzhi 'phros pas/ /lha mo bzhi yis bskul bar bsam/ /rje btsun stong
78b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid la bzhengs la/ /khams gsum kun gyi gti mug sol/ /rje btsun chos nyid la bzhengs la/ /snying rjes sems can don mdzod cig /de rjes de yang thim gyur pas/ /thig le'i ngo bor blta byas la/ /zhu bas yongs su gyur pa skyes/ /ya yig
78b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon po nyi dkyil 'khor/ /de las rdo rje sa bon bcas/ /'od 'phros bstims te gyur pa las/ /bdag nyid 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la/ /g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar ba ste/ /rang gi yum dang ldan pa'i lus/ /rdo rje ral
78b6(rgyud 'grel): gri 'khor lo dang/ /chu skyes gri gug thod pa'i phyag /ma he'i gdan bcas gsus po che/ /glang po stag gi pags pa man bas/ /mche gtsigs sbrul gyi tshad ldan bskyed/ /sems can 'od 'phros ye shes dgug/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): de nas mig dang rna ba sna
78b7(rgyud 'grel): lce dang lus yid rnams la yang/ /mngon shes bsgrub phyir lta bsgom bya/ /k+ShiM dziM khaM gaM kaM saM/ de nas sku gsung thugs gsum la/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum/ /bkod pa lha ru dmigs par bya/ /de nas gshed lnga spyan drangs te/ /mchod la gsol btab dbang
79a1(rgyud 'grel): bskur bas rdo rje 'dzin pa spyi bor blta/ /de las sa bon yi ge las/ /'phros pas yi ge nyi mar bsdu/ /de nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa ni/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag tshul dang/ /gtor ma ldan pas bzlas pa bya/ /de nas ldang bar bcas pa ni//
79a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can don la sems pa yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin 'khor dang rdo rje bzlas/ /gtso mo khro tshul lo ma gtsigs/ /phra ba'i tshul gyis bzlas par bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT
79a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni las kun byed ba ste/ /'dod pa thams cad yid bzhin 'gyur/ /yaM las rlung ste raM las me/ /kaM las thod pa a las snod/ /'dab brgyad sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ /hUM las kha gdab oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ bsams te me sbar zhu bas
79a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ /sbyangs te oM las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes bkug la bstims byin brlab/ /spu gus drangs nas gsol sbyin bya/ /lha la sogs pa'i tshogs bcas rnams/ /lha rdzas rdo rje yongs su dag pa'i gtor ma 'di/ /grih+na khA hi grih+na kha hi ma
79a5(rgyud 'grel): ma shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug la sogs la/ /dpa' bo'i nga rgyal btang mi bya/ /dngos po dngos bral skye dang bral/ g.yo bo g.yo med bde ba can/ /thabs dang shes rab las 'byed cing/ /don gsum gnyis su med la bzhag/ bdag gi
79a6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs sbyar ba 'dis/ /'gro kun gshin rje gshed thob shog// //dpal gshin rje gshed nag po sgrub pa'i thabs shes bya ba rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal
79a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ mung+ga ra kro d+ha ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya
79b1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od mnga' zhing/ /'jig tshogs bdud las rnam rgyal ni/ /mthar byed che la phyag 'tshal te/ /de yi sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor gnas/ /skyes pa'i 'od kyis
79b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba sbyangs/ /'khor lo chen po spyan drangs nas/ /rnam dag dgu yi tshogs bsag bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ /tshangs pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa yi/ /stong pa chen po bsgom par bya/ /bdud kyi phyogs rnams 'jigs byed phyir/ /bsrung
79b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /chu skyes nyi ma'i steng nyid du/ /a las rdo rje tho ba ni/ /rtse mo nyi shur ldan pa yi/ /lte bar sa bon rab bzhag nas/ /spro bsdu byas nas nga rgyal bsam/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ gyur pas tho ba
79b4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed du bsgom/ /sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po/ /rang gi rig mas 'khyud cing mdzas/ /g.yas g.yon zhal ni dkar dang dmar/ /gri gug tho ba ral gri dang/ /thod pa 'khor lo rin chen mdzes/ /stag gi pags pa sham thabs
79b5(rgyud 'grel): su/ /mnabs shing g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba/ /klu dang dur khrod 'khrugs pas brgyan/ /mche gtsigs spyan dgur 'jigs pa'i mdangs/ /me dpung dkyil du gnas pa bsgom/ /sku gsum thugs dang skye mched drug /rdo rje gsal bar bskyed
79b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /dbang rtags gshin rje gshed kyis brgyan/ /yi 'bru bzhi yis dgug gzhug bya/ /bu ga chen po spros pas mchod/ /rdo rje dril bu ldan pas bstod/ /hUM hUM rdo rje stobs po che/ /rab 'jigs mi mthun zad mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sku dbyer med pa'i
79b7(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /tho ba rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgron ma 'o mar ldan pa yis/ /kha yi bu ga dag par bsam/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs bskul bas/ /'gro ba ma lus sbyang bar bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po rjes dran pas/ /khri dang 'bum du bzlas par bya/ /oM mud+ga ra
80a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hika hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ phyag rgya bkrol nas ngal sob?/ /gcig dang du ma las grol ba/ /rang bzhin med pa'i snying po tsam/ /chos kun gyi ni bdag po can/ /sems kyi bskal par bsgom par bya/ /bdag gis rgyu dang bla ma las/ //
80a2(rgyud 'grel): rnyed pa'i drin 'di thob pa des/ /skul nas sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /thams cad 'bras bu mngon rnyed shog /khro bo thogs gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
80a3(rgyud 'grel): !/ /rgya gar skad du/ daN+Da d+h+rika bi dA ra ya ma ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs kyi de nyid gtso dang mtshungs
80a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yi/ /lha ni bdud dgra dbyug pa gshin rje gshed/ /las rnams thams cad mthar mdzad la gtud de/ /mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub phyir bshad par bya/ /rang lus phyag rgya chen por dran/ /theg ba chen po'i blor byas nas/ /bla ma rje
80a5(rgyud 'grel): btsun rnams la ni/ /bsod nams tshogs rab bsags par bya/ /gnyis med sangs rgyas gnyis su med/ /rkyen skyes chos kun chu zla 'dra/ /de nyid skye med shes bya'i phyir/ /dag pa'i sngags kyis bskul la bsgom/ /tshad med rgyun chad med
80a6(rgyud 'grel): par sems/ /nam mkha' i thig pa de nyid las/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gdan bsams te/ /nga las dbyug pa dkar dang sku/ rtsa zhal dkar la sngo dmar zhal/ /rang gi rig mar mtshungs pa'i lus/ /gri gug dbyug pa ral gri dang/ thod pa
80a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo chu skyes 'dzin/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs/ chu skyes 'od zer rnon po mnan/ /mi bgo'i phreng sbyangs stag lpags mnabs/ /klu dang rus brgyan dbus mdzes pa/ /bskyed la lus ngag yid gsum dang/ skye mched rnams
80b1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dis byin brlab/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ k+ShiM dziM khaM gaM kaM saM dbang bskur cod pan mi bskyod bsam/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa byin gyis brlab/ /byang chub sems kyi sprul pas mchod/ /de nas rdo rje bral ldan pas/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje kun
80b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang/ /mnyam pa'i rdo rje mi bskyod pa/ /rdo rje gsang ba dbyings chen po/ /ye shes rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yig 'bru gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i/ /bdud rtsi rdo rje lce yis myang/ /spro dang bsdu ba byas nas kyang/ /gsang sngags khri ru bzlas ba
80b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /oM badzra daN+Da d+h+rika hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa chu me rlung 'byung ba'i rim/ /ye shes thig ler byas nas kyang/ /gzugs ni sgra nyid rang bzhin dag/ bdag med snying po bsgom par bya/ /ma rig mun pa 'joms byed sgron ma'i mchog/ bdud dgra khroM bo'i rgyal
80b4(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs 'dis/ /'gro pa'i 'jigs chen nges dgra bcom nas kyang/ /thams cad gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs shog /dbyug pa gshin rje gshed rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dI paM ka ras mdzad pa
80b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsaN+Da khaDga ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum
80b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa bzhi ba las ni rdo rje'i sku/ /bdud mthar mdzad pa rab tu gtum pa'i zhal/ /sems can rjes 'dzin thugs rjes chen por ldan/ /ral gri che la btud de bshad par bya/ /
80b7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig dran pa'i lhar bskyed nas/ /dam pa dmigs la tshogs bsag bya/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon 'gro bas/ /stong pa dang ni 'khor lo bsgom/ /pad+ma 'od zer rnon po ste/ /rang las shugs can gyur pa'i sku/ /mar ka ta ljang khu'i mdog 'dra la/ /
81a1(rgyud 'grel): sngo dang dkar po g.yas g.yon zhal/ /gri gug ral gri 'khor lo dang/ /thod pa rin chen chu skyes 'dzin/ /dpa' bo'i rgyan dang klu yis spras/ /dbu skra gyen 'greng me dpung dkyil/ /stag lpags mnams shing g.yon brgyad pa?/ //
81a2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa'i sku la 'di lta ste/ /snying gar hUM las rdo rje thugs/ /mgrin par A(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje gsung/ /spyi bor oM las sku rdo rje/ /mthing dmar dkar zhing mtshon char ldan/ /sa snying dkar po mig la k+Shi/ /rdo rje 'dzin sngon rna bar dziM/ /nam snying ser po sna la
81a3(rgyud 'grel): khaM/ 'jig dbang dmar po lce la gaM /sgrib sel ljang gu dpral bar kaM/ kun bzang dkar po lheng snar saM/ /spyan drangs mchod bstod byin brlabs bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs kyis/ /dbang bskur spyi bor
81a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed/ /sgo bzhi'i sngags kyis 'dod lha bskul/ /rang gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /mung+ga rA dza(rgyud 'grel): daN+Da hUM/ pad+ma baM/ khaDga ho(rgyud 'grel): snying gar ye shes zhu ba'i rgyun/ /ba spu khung nas sprul pas mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba
81a5(rgyud 'grel): At+ma ko haM/ hUM rdo rje las ni brtson 'grus che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje gtul zhugs 'dzin/ /las mthar mdzad pa'i thub pa po/ /rdo rje brtson 'grus khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas kyang/ /spro bsdu ldan pas bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra khaDga
81a6(rgyud 'grel): d+h+rika hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'byung ba rim gyi thig pa la/ /yi ge gsum du sbyangs nas kyang/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom/ /bdag gis rnyed dang kur sti la/ /ma bltas sems can la brtse'i phyir/ /ral gri rdo rje'i
81a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs byas/ /'di yis nges 'byung rnyed gyur cig /ral gri gshin rje gshed gtum po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA su kha pad+ma ya mA ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ pad+ma gshin rje
81b1(rgyud 'grel): gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rjes su dran ldan zhing/ /de 'dren thugs rje'i rtags mnga' ba/ /mtsho skyes zhal la phyag 'tshal te/ /de'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /dang por
81b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas khrus byas nas/ /ku sha'i stan la legs 'dug ste/ /lus ngag yid gsum bag ldan pas/ /cung zad 'gro ba'i ldan pas bya/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar ldan pas/ /cod pan rje btsun gzung bar bya/ /de nas rje btsun spyan drangs te/ /skyabs 'gro
81b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems bskyed de/ /de nas maN+Dal bstar bste/ /me tog dgram zhing mchod tshogs bsham/ /de nas sems can kun gyi phyir/ /bsod nams tshogs bsags gshegs su gsol/ /bu gcig ltar dran byams pa dang/ /sdug bsngal bral 'dod
81b4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang/ /bde ba thob pa'i dga' ba dang/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i btang snyoms so/ /snying rje thabs kyi rang bzhin dang/ /ldan pa'i stong pa bsgom par bya/ /bsrung 'khor pad+ma nyi ma'i steng/ /ni las chu skyes gyur pa'i sku/ /pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra la/ /
81b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon ni sngo dang dkar/ /gri gug chu skyes ral gri dang/ /thod pa 'khor lo rin chen 'dzin/ /thod pa lnga yis dbu bskor cing/ /phreng ba klu dang dur khrod brgyan/ /me dpung skyil krung stag lpags mnab/ /bskyed pa cung zad 'jam pa'i mdangs//
81b6(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs dang skye mched drug/ rang lus ngo bo byin gyis brlab/ /dbang bskur rtags dang ldan pa la/ /mchod la bstod pa 'dis mnyes bya/ /hUM rdo rje dam tshig rdo rje gsung/ /rdo rje dbyangs ni zab mo che/ /'dod chags rdo rje nyid mtshungs pa/ /skyon bral
81b7(rgyud 'grel): rje la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdud rtsi myang zhing spro bsdu bzlas/ /byas nas phyag rgya dgrol bar bya/ /oM badzra pad+ma d+h+rika hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rig pa'i shes rab mnga' bdag gis/ /stong ldan 'ben la thug pa na/ /gcig kyang mi gnas bde ba che/ /bsgom bya
82a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom byed med pa yi/ /rje btsun gsung gi drin dag dang/ /rgyud las mthong ba bris pa 'dis/ /'gro kun dri ma med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog /pad+ma gshin rje gshed shes rab bde ba can gyi sgrub
82a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs zhes bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA sh+rI dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// // */ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub
82a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga pad+ma srung bas mdzad pa bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri sA d+ha nAM maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs kyi maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
82a4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rdo rje ye shes dang/ /rje btsun mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos grub slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir/ /rje btsun dkyil 'khor dam pa yi/ /cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /sa gzhi bzang po yid 'ong
82a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ rin chen spos chus legs sprus te/ /mnyam pa'i sa la dri sogs sbyin/ /mdzes pa'i bzhi la thig le gzhag/ tA ma la'i lo ma 'am/ /ras bal gtsang mas dgod par bya/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /phyi nang khrus
82a6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas nas kyang/ /skad cig bskyed la tshogs bsags bya/ /bsrung dang chos 'byung gzhal yas khang/ /bskyed la de yi nang du ni/ /me tog bzang po dgram par bya/ /zhe sdang rdo rje nas brtsams te/ ral gri rdo rje rab tu bskyed/ /tshom du de la
82a7(rgyud 'grel): lan bdun te/ /bzlas pas pad+ma nyi zla'i steng/ /bde gshegs sras bcas bsam par bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tI na na hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ oM ratna d+h+rika /oM A ro lig/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika swAhA/ oM mung+ga ra d+h+rika/ oM
82b1(rgyud 'grel): da N+Di d+h+raka /oM pad+ma d+h+rika/ oM khaDga d+h+rika /oM mo ha ra ti/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ oM ra ga ra ti/ oM badzra ra ti/ so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang/ /rgyan dang bzhugs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ mngon par rtogs pa'i chog las/ /'byung ba bzhin du gsal bar bskyed/ /tshogs
82b2(rgyud 'grel): bsags dkyil 'khor bstim pa dang/ skye mched sku gsung thugs byin brlab/ /dbang blang ba dang dgug gzhug bya/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba dang/ spro bsdu dang ni bzlas pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yis legs byas te/ /'dod pa'i don rnams
82b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab/ /bshags dang bzod pa gsol byas te/ /de nyid gsum gyi cho ga yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig bskyed pa'i lha rnams ni/ /snying ga nyid du rnam par bstim/ /gnyis don dam pa bden pa yi/ /
82b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi tshul la gnas par bya/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /byang chub tu ni bsngo ba dang/ /smon lam chen po gdab par bya/ /de ltar nyid mtshan dus drug tu/ /snying brtse brtson pas dbul bar bya/ /g.yeng ba rnam par zhi don du/ tshogs
82b5(rgyud 'grel): bsags maN+Dal ting 'dzin ni/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga sngon song bas/ /gser dang pad zla rnam bsams te/ /gong bzhin rim par dgod par bya/ /oM badzra re khe hUM/ pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ oM badzra re khe hUM/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal hUM/ brnyen par bya ba'i gong bzhin du gshegs
82b6(rgyud 'grel): su gsol dang bsdu ba min/ /khyad par bsdus pa'i maN+Dal ni/ /las kyi sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /mdzes pa'i sngags kyis dgram par bya/ /ras sim bzang po'i gzhi dag la/ /thig le 'bru sogs bkod nas kyang/ /bde gshegs sras bcas
82b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs te/ /gdan gyi tshul du dbul bar bya/ /shin tu bsdus pa 'di lta ste/ /tshom bu gcig la mngon rten te/ /gzhal yas khong du dmigs nas kyang/ /de nang spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol/ /bsod nams tshogs kyis rgyud sbyangs nas/
83a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol btab bsngos la gshegs su gsol/ /ma chags brten pa'i snying gar bsdu/ /sgyu ma'i blo yis zin par bya/ /bla na med pa'i maN+Dal ni/ /snying ga'i pad+ma rnam dag nang/ /ye shes chen po'i thig le ni/ /lnga phrag gnyis
83a2(rgyud 'grel): dang drug phyed kyi/ /yig 'bru mchog tu rnam bsams te/ /mtshan dang rdzogs pa'i skur gyur nas/ dus gsum tshogs kyi mchod pa bya/ /rtag tu bsdu ba ma yin te/ dus med rtag tu brtson pas 'grub/ /bsam gyis mi khyab maN+Dal ni/ /chos
83a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid zung du 'jug pa las/ /rang gi de nyid rnam bsams pa'i/ /skye med mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas/ /rtog dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /rdo rje lta bu'i pho brang yin/ /dus gsum rtag tu sangs rgyas nas/ /skye med de bzhin nyid kyi bdag/ /chags sdang
83a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bas dbul bar bya/ /maN+Dal kun gyi mchog yin no/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi maN+Dal las ye shes maN+Dal rnam par skye/ /de phyir thabs kyi maN+Dal ni/ /rnal 'byor ba yis dbul bar bya/ /thun mongs dngos grub bsgrub pa dang/ /mchog
83a5(rgyud 'grel): gi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis bsam pa bzang po yis/ /maN+Dal byas pa'i dge ba gang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas zhing khams dag thob shog/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //
83a6(rgyud 'grel): zangs glid? rnal 'byor nA ga bu ra yis/ /rnal 'byor ma ka ra tri ta nyid la/ /bu tsha rgyal ba'i bu nyid btang nas kyang/ /ta ru pa ri dur khrod tshal nyid du/ /rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo nang/ /gsol btab rnal 'byor rnam kyi zhal do
83a7(rgyud 'grel): ru/ maN+Dal cho ga bsad snyoms pa yis byas/ /ding sang rnal 'byor lha spyod? ldan pa yis/ /dus rnams rtag tu maN+Dal 'bad par rigs/ // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ d+harmA ka ya dI paM bi d+hi na ma/ bod skad du/ chos kyi sku'i snang ba'i
83b1(rgyud 'grel): chog zhes bya ba/ /dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po snying rje'i bdag nyid pas/ /srid pa'i bde la ma chags shing/ /bdag 'dzin dag la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /bdag 'dzin yongs su dor bya ste/ bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa dang/ /rang dang gzhan ni?
83b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ /phyi nang bar chad sel ba'i mchog/ chos sku rten mchog gdab pa'i phyir/ /gshin rje gshed la gus btud de/ /mchod brten cho ga bshad par bya/ /zung du 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /yi dga' ba yis phyogs su/ /dur khrod dgon pa'i gnas
83b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu/ /bkra shis sa ni bzang po la/ /bdud rtsi rnam lngas legs byugs te/ /spos dang dri yi tshogs rnams dang/ /gser dang mu tig byi ru sogs/ /rin chen rnam mang bcug nas kyang/ /khrus byas dag pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'jim pa'i gong bu dril
83b4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang/ /bdag nyid lha ru rnam bskyed nas/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsag bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs byas la/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi khang pa dang/ gzhal yas khang mchog bskyed nas ni/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus nyid du/ skye med snang ba
83b5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab gsal ldan bsam/ /gyur pas ro mnyam thig le'o/ /de la thugs kyi yi ge ste/ /de nas thugs mchog nyid du 'gyur/ /nga rgyal sku gsung thugs bcug ste/ zhu bas chos kyi sku ru gyur/ /de yi sa bon yi ge
83b6(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'phros pas gshin rje gshed bkug ste/ /zhal du zhugs nas zhu bar bsam/ /bdag nyid thig le chen por blta/ /phyogs bcur thig le bzhi spros pas/ /tsar tsi phag mo'i dbyings ldan ma/ /gau rI lha mo bzhir gyur te/ /rje btsun thig le
83b7(rgyud 'grel): bskul bar bya/ /rje btsun bzhengs shing snying rje khro/ /srid gsum pa yi ma rig sol/ /rje btsun bzhengs shing rgyal rigs bdud bzhi las ni rgyal ba'i sems ni g.yengs/ /rje btsun bzhugs shing 'jig rten snyan mnan stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam rtsi/ /ci
84a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'jig rten snyan mnan stong pa nyid la sems te bzhugs/ /bcom ldan rgyal pos bskul nas kyang/ /lha mo nyid kyang thim par gyur/ de la nyi ma sa bon bcas/ /gyur pas rdo rje mtshan ma can/ /de la gshin rje gshed mchog
84a2(rgyud 'grel): sku/ /rtog pa bzhin du gsal bar bsam/ /de las mkha' gsang byin brlabs te/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor bkug nas kyang/ /zhu bas khams mchog dag pa'i nang/ /thig le bcu bdun nyid du gyur/ /de las sa bon gzugs su gyur//
84a3(rgyud 'grel): yak+She ma med/ ya tsa ni ra/ dza sa ngo ru Na yo ni rA/ rdo rje sngo dang 'khor lo dkar/ /rin chen gser dang pad+ma dmar/ /ral gri ljang gu tho ba sngo/ /dbyug pa gar gyi phyag rgyar gyur/ /de las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/ /dgra lnga yum bzhi bsgom par gyur
84a4(rgyud 'grel): mal nas skye ba'i tshul nyid du/ /so so gnas su dgod par bya/ /de nas bdag gi snying ga nas/ /sa bon dag las 'od 'phros pas/ /dkyil 'khor dag la phog gyur te/ /'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul nyid kyis/ /gsal ba'i bzlas pa dbul bar bya//
