84a5(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kra tA nan hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na/ prab+ha rA dza ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te samyaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ oM he ru suk+Sh+me/ sa me sa ma te/ sa ma ye/ sa ma ro bye/ a na lam+be ta raM be ya sho ba ti/ mahA te dze/ ni ra ku
84a6(rgyud 'grel): le nirba Ne/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ h+rid yA d+hiSh+ThA nA d+hiSh+ThI te swA hA/ gtso bo dag la ji ltar bzhin/ /gti mug sogs la rim bzhin no/ /oM dzi na dzi ka /oM ratna d+h+ri ka/ oM A ro lika /oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika/ oM mung+ga ra d+h+rika/ oM daN+Da d+h+rika/ oM pad+ma
84a7(rgyud 'grel): d+h+rika/ oM khaDga d+h+rika/ oM mo ha ra ti/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/ oM rA ga ra ti/ oM badzra ra ti/ nyi shu rtsa gcig lnga bcu dang/ brgya dang brgya rtsa brgyad dang ni/ /gtso dang 'khor gyi rim pa yis/ /bzlas pa bsdu ba'i tshul gyis bzhu/ /'od kyi phung por
84b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas ni/ /de nas skor por g.yas thogs te/ /gu gul a kar nag la sogs/ /dri yi bdug pas gdug par bya/ /de nas 'od kyi gong bu las/ /bcad cing sku gdung gdab par bya/ /snying por 'brel pa'i rten 'brel dang/ /bzlas shing dkyil 'khor grub?
84b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /bkod ba'i tshul gyis mkha' la bzhag /rdzogs nas lha yi dkyil 'khor la/ /skye mched byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /sku gsung thugs dang de bzhin te/ /dbang bskur dgug gzhug mchod bstod dang/ /bdud rtsi myang gis smin par mi bya/ /de nas
84b3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /bshags dang bsngo ba byas nas ni/ /sgyu ma'i blo yis zin par bya/ /de nas smon lam btab nas ni/ /gnas khang bzang por gzhug par bya/ /dus rnams kun tu mchod pa dang/ /bskor ba sogs kyis mnyes par bya/ /na
84b4(rgyud 'grel): mo ratna tA ya yA/ e d+harmA te tu pra b+ha bA/ he tu ne ShAn+ta thA ga to/ /dya ba dat/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni rod+ha/ e baM gA dI mahA sh+rA ma Na:/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang po la/ /mos pa'i blo yis bskor bar bya/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te /ratna rke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA
84b5(rgyud 'grel): ya/ aDha te samyaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA oM ratne ratna/ ma ha ratne/ ratna bIrya ye swA hA/ /rnal 'byor sems la gnod gyur ni/ /nam mkha' dag la gdab par bya/ /cho ga'i rnam pa gong bzhin te/ mtshan med phyir na mchog yin no/ /rkyen rnams tshogs par
84b6(rgyud 'grel): ba pa'i phyir/ /chu dang me dang rlung dag la/ /baM raM yaM ni rnam bsams te/ /'phros pas rgyal ba sras bcas dag /bsdus te yig 'bru la bstims pas/ /chu la dkar dang me la dmar/ /rlung la khro ba sngon po bsams/ /zhu bas 'od kyi phung por gyur/ /skor phor
84b7(rgyud 'grel): thogs la gdab par bya/ /rab gnas bya ba gong bzhin te/ /de las khyad par yod ma yin/ /rnal 'byor bsod nams bsags pa dang/ /bar chod myur du zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis sku gdung cho ga'i mchog/ mngon par brtsam pa'i dge ba 'dis/ /khams?
85a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /rnal 'byor laM la gnas pa rnams/ /sgo gsum sdig pa dag gyur te/ /chos sku gnyis med thob par shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka lA pa mahA zhes bya bas mdzad pa/
85a2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor pa pradz+nyA dz+nyA na yis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o/ /so ma pu ri gtsug lag khang chen du/ /nag po zhabs zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ /rnal 'byor tshe 'phes de pa ba la
85a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /yab mchog d+harmA pA la 'das gyur pa'i/ /ched du gsol btab rgyal po'i zhal snga ru/ /mchod rten cho ga me tog tshal du mdzad/ /spros bcas spros med tshul gyi lam mchog 'di/ /deng sang rnal 'byor rnams kyis gdab
85a4(rgyud 'grel): par rigs// // !/ /rgya gar skad du/ ho ma bi d+hiSh+Ti sha kriSh+Ta ya mA ri nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs
85a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje can/ /zab mo bcas pa'i rdo rje ni/ /bla med snying po la btud de/ /ro bsreg cho ga bshad par bya/ /sems can sangs rgyas snying po can/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rab sbyor ba'i/ /thabs kyi khyad par ro bsreg par bya/ rnam pa gnyis su
85a6(rgyud 'grel): shes bya ste/ /bsgrubs la bsreg par bya ba dang/ /dur khrod bsreg par bye ba'o/ /bskru bal bsreg pa rnam bzhi ste/ /dang por longs spyod 'khor lo dang/ /gnyis pa rab tu phye ba la/ /gsum pa nye ba'i bsgrub pa nyid/ /bzhi pa
85a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten cho ga yi/ /dang po ro la khrus byas nas/ /bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang/ /phyi yi gtor ma btang bar bya/ /de nas tshogs bsags nas bzung ste/ /mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs pa dang/ /bzad po'i khrol bzhag nas kyang/ /
85b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis legs par spras pa la/ /ga pu ral sogs khar blung nas/ /bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /snying gar gzungs thag btags nas kyang/ /rtsa ba'i sngags la de nyid gsum/ /spel ba'i bzlas pa khri tsam bya/ /de nas bye brag las byas
85b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /thod pa glang pa dbang po lnga/ /snying sogs bzhi dang nya bzhi dang/ /snum dang bdud rtsi lnga dang gnas/ /rkang brgyad sde ba'i bu ga dgu/ /rgyas pa'i srad bus bcings nas kyang/ /shun pa'i nang du dril la bzhag /de nas tshogs kyi mchod pa ni//
85b3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa dang bcas rtog med dang/ /shin tu rtog med la sogs ni/ /gang zag sems kyi khyad par yin/ /de yang rab tu sbyar ba dang/ /'dod pa gzhan la spel ba dang/ /rtog med rlon pa'i rol pa'o/ /de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo las/ /byung ba'i
85b4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis smon btab nas/ /tshe las 'das pa'i don gyi phyir/ /bsngo ba rab tu zin par bya/ /de ni longs spyod 'khor lo'o/ /smon lam dkyil 'khor de nyid dang/ /lha yi de nyid las sbyar ba'i/ /tshe las 'das pa'i don gyi phyir/ /rgya chen rab
85b5(rgyud 'grel): tu gdab par bya/ /sbyar ba gsum du shes bya ste/ dang po thal ba btags la bcag /de nas dri dang sbyar bya ste/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la ni ngan 'gro kun/ /sbyang bar byed pa'i sngags btags la/ /khri'am stong du bzlas pa bya/ /de nas maN+Dal ngos bsnyams la/ /
85b6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas kyang/ /dri zhim pa yis bsgoms pa'i sa/ /dri yi thig le gdab par bya/ /de nas srog chags med 'gyur zhing/ /mnyan zhing 'jam la dkar ba'i sa/ /blangs la dri zhim chu yis bran/ /de nas thal ba dang bsres la/ /'jim
85b7(rgyud 'grel): pa legs pa'i gang bu bya/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las/ /'phros pa'i 'od kyis tshe 'das ni/ /'og gi gnas nas bkug byas la/ /lus ngag yid gsum sbyang bar bya/ /de nas hUM hUM zhes brjod pas/ /khu ba'i thig ler zhu gyur te/ /a dkar thung du ??
86a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis/ /dbyangs dang gsal yig bsdu bar bya/ /de nas rdo rjer gyur nas kyang/ /hUM gis mtshan pa las 'phros pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams bsdu bar bya/ /de nas rang gi lha ? ?/
86a2(rgyud 'grel): yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ru/ /bskyed la sku rnams bsdu bar bya/ /de yang byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ bAgbadzra 'gre /tsit+ta badzra 'gre /de nas byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
86a3(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim nas kyang/ /'od kyi phung por blta bar bya/ /de nas rten 'brel ldan pa'i sngags/ /brjod cing btab la 'khor lor bsgom/ /sngar gyi maN+Dal drang ba'i dkyil/ /dri yi thig les brgyan pa la ma tog tshom bu
86a4(rgyud 'grel): bkod pa'i steng/ /spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas 'khor lo rgyal mtshan dang/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan gyis brgyan/ /de nas na bza' dkar po gsol/ /bkod pa shin tu mdzes byas la/ /skye mched sku gsung thugs dang dbang/
86a5(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug mchod dang bstod byas la/ /bdud rtsi myang dang spro bsdu bzlas/ /rdzogs nas bsngo dang smon lam btab/ /de nas gzhal yas bzang po'i nang/ /bzhugs su gsol la rtag tu mchod/ /ro bsreg gi rus pa'i tsha tsha'i cho ga yin/ /gshin
86a6(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed kyi ro bsreg gi cho ga zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ga Na tsakra bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ rje btsun mgon la phyag 'tshal lo//
86a7(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams khyad par bsags pa dang/ /dam tshig nyams pa bskad pa dang/ /bgegs rnams nye bar zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdag gis tshogs 'khor bshad par bya/ /yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs su/ /tshogs kyi khang pa yid 'ong ba/ /'khor
86b1(rgyud 'grel): khang rim gsum ran par gtsig /de nas tsandan gur kum dang/ /dri yi tshogs ni bsgos nas kyang/ /sa bzhi bzang po legs byas te/ /rnam lngas skyang nul byas nas kyang/ /gzhung dang mthun pa'i maN+Dal la/ /mdzes pa'i me tog legs
86b2(rgyud 'grel): bkram ste/ /mchod pa'i tshogs rnams tshad bar bsag /'byor pa'i yo byad ldan pa dang/ bsdu bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor tshogs/ /ma lus par ni bsdus nas kyang/ /slob dpon la ni zhu ba dbul/ /las kyi bum pa byin brlab nas/ /mchod pa'i bum pa
86b3(rgyud 'grel): bsags nas kyang/ /mdzes pa'i me tog legs btang ste/ /tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya/ /khro bo sngon po mdzes pa che/ /khyod ni dam tshig yid du 'ong/ /nor bu rin chen ches bcings pa'i/ /dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste/ /bdag ni
86b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba las bsgral phyir/ /dpa' bos gnang gis btang du gsol/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /bzang po'i sgo ni rnam par dbye/ /gsol ba btab nas nang bkug ste/ /las kyis bum pas chu gtong te/ /mnA chu blud la bral la dgod/ /de nas rdo rje slob
86b5(rgyud 'grel): dpon la/ /me tog phul te gsol ba gdab/ /de nas rnal 'byor pho mo la me tog gtor ma bskul bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /lhar bsgom lce lag byin gyis brlab/ /phyag rgya byin brlab mngon rtogs brjod/ /hUM thog mdza' med pa'i sems
86b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po'i gtso/ /oM mahA badzra hUM/ a/ srid pa rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /ngo bo nyid kyi gdod nas dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis//
86b7(rgyud 'grel): srid pa dam pa mchog tu byed/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+rI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM phaT/ oM mahA badzra gand+ha/ de nas mchod pa'i khyad par tshogs/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs la/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'phros pa yis/ /bla ma rje btsun mdun bsams te/ mchod yon zhal
87a1(rgyud 'grel): bsil zhabs bkru? dbul?/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyis rab mchod nas/ /de kho na nyid bstod pa bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM phaT/ oM mahA badzra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ de bzhin du puShpe dI pe/ ??/ nai bi
87a2(rgyud 'grel): dye shapda/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje dril bu ldan pa yis/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje mi 'jigs phyag 'tshal
87a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /nga rgyal rdo rje ngo bo khyod/ /rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa/ /rin chen rdo rje ngo bo nyid/ /'dod chags rdo rje gtso bo khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi rnam pa bsnyems/ /thams cad dbyangs ni mchog gi
87a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog /rdo rje gsung mchog phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog rdo rje ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun byed/ /sku yi rdo rje rab 'dra ba/ /ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
87a5(rgyud 'grel): tu bsdus/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag gis nyon mongs tshogs rnams las/ /byung ba'i sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ni/ /rje btsun 'jam dbyangs spyan lnga ru/ /de dag thams
87a6(rgyud 'grel): cad bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun mchog /slob sogs dge ba thams cad la/ /rgya cher bdag ni rjes yi rang/ /khams gsum rnam rtog dra ba yis/ /mngon par gtibs pa mun
87a7(rgyud 'grel): nag la/ theg pa chen po'i ye shes che/ /chos kyi sgron mas 'od snang mdzod/ /rdzogs sangs 'khor ba'i chos rnams las/ /chos skur mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa/ /'khor ba ji srid gnas par du/ /sems can don mdzad bzhugs su gsol
87b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams tshogs las mngon byung ba'i/ /dge ba'i bsod nams ma lus kun/ /sems can 'khor ba las sgrol phyir/ thams cad byang chub mchog tu bsngo/ /mchod pa nyi shu'i tshogs rnams kyang/ /de sogs rol mo'i tshogs rnams ni/ /rnal 'byor
87b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yid 'bad pa yi/ /rdo rje chen po mchod byas la/ /de nas blo yis shegs su gsol/ /de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te/ /snying rjes zin pa'i gsal bar bya/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /rdo rje sa gzhir ba dang/ /'phar ba'i khang pa drag po la/ /
87b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshon cha tshogs kyis spras par bsam/ /nang du chos 'byung dkar po ni/ /gru gsum mtshon cha dang bcas pa/ /rdo rje gzhal yas khang bskyed la/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi tshul dag gis/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor smin par bya/ /de nas bdud rtsi byin brlabs
87b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin mchod/ /de nas mthe bong srin lag gis/ /blangs pa'i bdud rtsi byugs pa yis/ /chos 'byung gru gsum dkar dmar bri/ /de nas bdud rtsi'i thig le yis/ /mdzes pa'i me tog legs bkram ste/ /skad
87b5(rgyud 'grel): cig bskyed dang dgug gzhug bya/ /de nas bdud rtsi phul nas kyang/ /bdag nyid la ni mchod par bya/ /thabs dang gsang bas blangs nas kyang/ /lce rtse smin mtshams spyi bor gtor/ /de nas de dag mi dmigs bsgom/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid la ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
87b6(rgyud 'grel): ?? nas kyang bstod cing bdud rtsi myangs nas kyang/ /gsal bar dmigs nas bzhugs su gsol/ /de nas zhing skyong 'khor bcas la/ /gtor ma rgya chen btang ba ni/ /yi ge gsum gyi ngo bo yis/ /bsregs dang sbyangs dang gtor byas la/ /maN+Dal bzang po
87b7(rgyud 'grel): yid 'ong ste/ /thig le le rtse dgu byas te/ /dbus la ye shes 'khor lo bsam/ /phyogs dang mtshams la zhing skyong brgyad/ /ma mo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ /bcas pa spyan drangs mchod pa bya/ /oM/ shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang/ /ri po dang ni ri
88a1(rgyud 'grel): su la phug /grong dang bzhi mdo dag dang ni/ /khyad par du ni khang stong dang/ /gdol pa'i snod dang thang dang ni/ /khyad par du ni chu la gnas/ /nag po drag po drag po che/ /lhas byin mnyam du bsten pa dang/ /nag po gtsigs
88a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mi sdug drag /rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams rgan byang mo dang drag mo dang/ /mi sdug ma dang u ma dang/ /rgyal ba rnam par rgyal ma dang/ /mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ /nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo/ /nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /
88a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo/ /drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo/ /'phrog byed ma dang mar mem/ /'jib byed grong gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /drag mo'i gzugs dang drag chen mo/ /mche ba gtsigs pa'i thod chen mo/ /thod 'phreng phreng can kha TwAM ma/ /sprul
88a4(rgyud 'grel): chen ral gri dgra sta can/ /rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma/ /de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /las kun rjes su grub byed ma/ /sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen mo/ /de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku che ste/
88a5(rgyud 'grel): rdul byed rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo/ /rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'dir 'dus shig /oM kak+ka Dha na babba na d+ha na/ kha kh+kha kha da na/ sarba duSh+TAn/ ha na ha na/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta yA mo ka sya hUM/ zhes pas bkug la/ pad+ma'i
88a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la gnas par bsams la/ /mchod pa lngar byin gyis brlabs pa de nyid dbul te/ /sngags de nyid kyi mjug la/ /a mo ka sya shAn+ti dU? ru hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas dbul te/ so so'i lce la hUM las rdo rjer byin/ /byin gyis brlab par bsams
88a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbu gu'i 'od kyis drangs te mchod par bsams la/ /de nas chos bshad de/ /chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsol la zhes bya ba brjod nas/ /smon lam btab ste/ sems can thams cad sdig med cing/ /
88b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad bde gyur cig /gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /da lta nyid du rjes brtse bas/ /rnal 'byor stan bcos gnas la dbang?//
88b2(rgyud 'grel): ces bya bas bsngo bar byas gshegs su mi gsol/ /de nas rnal 'byor pho mo kun lha'i dkyil 'khor du bltas la/ /dad la dri yis mchod/ de nas me tog dang bdug pa dang mar me dang/ lha bshos kyis tshul bzhin du mchod la/ /de'i 'og tu bdud
88b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsi dang bcas pa'i chang gis mched de/ /lag pa g.yon pas chad bzung nas/ /g.yas pas rtse gsum pa byas la/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sbyin te/ /ltos shig mdzes pa dam pa'i chos/ /'di la the tshom yod ma yin/ /bram ze khyi dang gdol
88b4(rgyud 'grel): pa gsum/ /rang bzhin gcig tu rtogs par bza' / /zhes bya bas drang ngo/ /len pa pos brjod pa/ 'dod chags dri ma bral ba yi/ /rin thang med las legs 'ongs chos/ /bzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal
88b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas pad+ma'i skor ba dang bcas pas blang ngo/ /'og ma rnams la drang ba la 'di skad brjod/ /sbyor ba'i dus na dngos grub ni/ /sbyod kun de nyid de bzhin du/ rnal 'byor pas ni kun tu spyad/ /ji ltar bde bar spyad par bya/ /zhe bya ba brjod la brim mo//
88b6(rgyud 'grel): de'i 'og tu sha lu dang gur mar gyis mchod/ /de nas lta bshos so sor drangs la/ /de nas kun gyis phud bsdus la/ /slob dpon la phul nas/ /slob dpon gyis cha gnyis su dgos te/ /cha gcig g.yon gyi phyogs su bgos la byin gyis brlabs
88b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi lha la dbul/ /cha gcig g.yas su bzhag la/ /byin gyis brlab la phyogs skyong la dbul te/ /oM a kA ro mu kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis mchod/ /de nas ci bder rol cing longs spyod/ skabs der bkra shis bya'o/ //
89a1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid yang dag spyod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pa ni kun nas bdag /ji ltar bde bar brjod par bya/ /sgyu ma lta bur mdzes pa yis/ /gnyis sprod kun khyud sogs sbyor ba/ /lus can don du yang dag spyad/ /dngos po bral la
89a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas lha dang phyogs skyong la gnang ba nod pa dang/ bzod par gsol ba byas te/ badzra satwas bzod gsol byas te/ badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /dam tshig gi lha snying gar bsdus la/ /o pad+ma ka shi hUM /
89a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bsdu'o/ /oM badzra du pe grih+Na gats+tsha hUM/ zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi lha gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas lhag ma bsdus te/ de la yang gnyis te/ rnal 'byor pho mo'i lhag ma ni phyi rol gyi sha za la sogs pa mi ma yin pa rnams la btang ste/ phyi
89a4(rgyud 'grel): sgor? gton la btang ngo/ /khyim pa'i lhag ma ni khyim pa de nyid kyi mi ma yin pa la bsngo'o/ /lhag ma de lta bu'i skal pa med pa la/ slob dpon gyi kha nas bdud rtsir byas la sbyin no/ /de nas yin bdag dang 'khor la bkra shis dang smon lam gdab
89a5(rgyud 'grel): po/ /de nas gtor skyel de log pa dang/ tshogs kyi khang sgor me long dang dung bud pa dkrol/ /chu can gyi zan ni mchod/ de nas nang du log nas rnal 'byor pho mo la yang de bzhin mchod pa bya'o/ /ma 'ongs skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsags par 'dod pa
89a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bslab pa'i lam la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /don du dri med lung dag bla ma'i man ngag ltar/ /ma nor bzung ste bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir bris pa yin/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rim pa slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
89a7(rgyud 'grel): */ (/dpal gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa slob dpon dpal rdo rje'i blos mdzad pa bzhugs so//) rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya ma ri a b+hi sa ma ma kra ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa/ bcom ldan 'das
89b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gus pas bla ma dang ni gshin rje gshed nag rdo rje ni/ /nyid mtshungs dang 'dus bde bas yongs gang gzhan gyi don 'jug pa/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo chu skyes gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams/ /zhal gsum pa la 'jigs
89b2(rgyud 'grel): ba sel mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus dgra nag po sgrub pa nyid/ /gang zhig 'dod nas de nyid rig /dbang bskur la sogs thob pa dag /de yi bsdom pa'i rim pa 'di/ /byis pas bde bar rtogs phyir dang/ /mtshungs pa rnams kyis dran phyir dang/
89b3(rgyud 'grel): gong ma byis pa'i tshig dag la/ /dgu bskyed phyir bri bar bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ldan/ /sems can don dga' blo dang ldan khyams pa la sogs yon tan rdzogs/ /dad dang thos pas rnam brgyan pas/ /dang por gdong la sogs bkru ba/ /snying rje'i
89b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid sngon du bya/ /dben po'i gnas su btsam bya ste/ /dur khrod la sogs bde gnas la/ /'dug nas sting gar pad+ma dang/ /shin tu 'od gsal zla ba blta/ /ya yig sngon po 'od mdzes pa/ /sems can 'byor pa'i don byed blta/ /nam mkha' i khams
89b5(rgyud 'grel): ni kun gang ba'i/ /bla ma dang ni rdzogs sangs bsgom/ /lus kyi bskyod pa byas nas ni/ /de rnams dmigs nas phyag kyang bya/ /tsar tsi ka sogs kyis mchod pa/ /byas la sdig pa bshags pa'ang bya/ /lus dang ngag dang yid
89b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis sdig /bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang/ /gang yang rjes su yi rang ba/ /de ni mgon la dus gsum bshags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /'phags pa rnams kyis bsags pa yi/ /bsod nams kun la rjes yi rang/ /dam pa'i
89b7(rgyud 'grel): chos dang tshogs mchog bcas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyod rnams la/ /bdag gis lus ni dbul bar bgyis/ /dam pa'i chos kun ston mdzad pa'i/ /sgra yis mdzes pas khyed bzhugs gsol/ /yang dag
90a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs sras bcas pa'i/ /sbyin pa la sogs ngo bo la/ /sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /rab tu dga' bas gnas par bgyi/ /sems can don phyir yang dag rdzogs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/
90a2(rgyud 'grel): dge ba yang dag gang bsags pa/ /byang chub tu ni bsngo bar bgyi/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed gyur nas/ /bdag gis 'gro la phan bgyi'o zhes/ /smon lam de ltar btab nas ni/ /de nas blo yis gshegs su gsol/ /snying rjes cho ga
90a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bltas nas/ /sna tshogs stong par rnam par bsam/ /ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir/ /rgyu nyid kyi ni mtshan ma med/ /rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir/ /smon pa nyid kyang rnam par spangs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sems de
90a4(rgyud 'grel): brtan par byas nas ni/ /raM las byung ba'i nyi ma la/ /hUM las byung ba'i mdog sngon po/ /'od zer 'phro bas kun bskor ba'i/ /rdo rje kun nas rtse lnga pa/ /bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sa yi dkyil 'khor dang/ /ra ba gur yang de bzhin no/ /
90a5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyad phyir/ /yang dag bsgom pa yang brtsam bya/ /de la sna tshogs pad zla bas/ /rdo rje bzang po'i lus byung ba'i/ /chos 'byung dkar po gru gsum pa'i/ /nang du sna tshogs pad rdo rje/ /gyen 'greng mkha' mnyam bsgom par bya/ /de
90a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du ni dkyil 'khor yang/ /bruM yig 'khor lo las byung ba'i/ /rtag pa'i yan lag las byung ba/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par brgyan/ /do shal se mo do yis mdzes/ /ba dan rtse mo sna tshogs pa/ /rlung
90a7(rgyud 'grel): gis bskyod pa'i dril bur ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mnan/ /zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan/ /shar gyi phyogs ni dkar po che/ /lho phyogs ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang phyogs mar kata lta bu'o/ /dbang ldan sngon po'i
90b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra ba/ /dbus kyi cha ni bsgom par bya/ /'di bzhin sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ /rtsig ngos steng g.yogs kyang bsgom bya/ /rnam pa lnga ni rnam bsgom la/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang nyid de/ /rnam pa lnga yin
90b2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje rnams/ /'jigs byed sangs rgyas gzugs shes grags/ /de yi dbye ba bshad par bya/ /sna tshogs gdan gyi lte ba la/ /pad+ma zla ba dbyangs yig zung/ /de las zla ba ka sogs pa/ /Da Dha da d+ha ya la yang bsnan pa gnyis 'gyur
90b3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba/ /zla ba dmar po bsgom par bya/ /'di dag yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes brjod/ /de dag gcig gyur mnyam pa nyid/ /der skyes hUM ni so sor rtog /bya ba nan tan ldan ye shes/ /de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'o/ /nyi ma'i
90b4(rgyud 'grel): mdangs ldan nor bu 'dra/ /sa bon dang bcas 'od zer 'khrug /oM badzra At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o/ /de las skya rengs dang po'i mdog can thub pa'i tshogs kyis mdzes pa nyid mtshungs kyis 'khyud sku/ /sgeg dang khro bo'i gzugs
90b5(rgyud 'grel): can bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa 'bar ba'i ral gri rdo rje gri gug gsor mdzad cing/ /'khor lo chu skyes snod ni 'od zer 'phro ba g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /chos
90b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ye shes ngo bo ni/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bdag nyid gang/ /rnam pa lnga yi ngo bo nyid/ /rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ro/ /'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yi/ /'gro ba gsum la gzigs nas kyang/ /rang
90b7(rgyud 'grel): snying ye shes 'od 'phros pas/ /sna tshogs sangs rgyas gzugs su bya/ /dga' ba de dam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /rang gi lus la mnyam par gzhug /kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yi/ /longs spyod rdzogs par bdag nyid bsgom/ /
91a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar sngags mchog yi ge gsum/ /dmar po ho gnyis kyis brten pa/ /ji ltar skar mda''pho ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems ni de nas gzhug /snying rje chags pa'i sems nyid kyis/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid dang yang zhu/ /tsar tsi
91a2(rgyud 'grel): ka sogs byams sogs pas/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo skul bar byed/ /snying rjes khros pa'i dad sgrol bzhengs/ /khams gsum kun gyi gti mug gsol/ /dad sgrol rtsol med ma bzhugs bzhengs/ /bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar mdzod/ /'jig rten
91a3(rgyud 'grel): mgon pos stong nyid ci ste bzhugs/ /dang sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhengs shig /byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mgron pos nas/ /ji ltar stong pa nyid ni sems par byed/ /bskul nas khu ba der thim par/ /de la rjes su chags
91a4(rgyud 'grel): par gyur/ /de lhe'i glu yi ngo nyid du/ /de la rgud pa ltar bsams nas/ /khu ba'i gzugs ni yongs gyur te/ /yaM sngon nyi ma las byung ba/ /khro bo sngon po 'phro bar bcas/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rwa rnon 'bar zhing spu ser skya/ /rmig
91a5(rgyud 'grel): pas brko zhing 'jigs sbyin pa'i/ /ma he yi ni rgyab gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje sngon po 'od dang bcas/ /sa bon bcas pa de'i 'od kyis/ /ma 'ongs las dgra 'jigs byas nas/ /bdag nyid la ni yang dag zhugs/ /'jigs pa chen po 'ang 'jigs byed
91a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /ma he'i rdo rje rnam bsgoms nas/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdud dkyil 'khor/ /'od zer drag po spros pas skrod/ /drag po mun 'dra gzugs drag po/ /lce 'dril ba la 'od 'byin pa/ /smar smin ma mgo
91a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes ser/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis/ /gshin rje dran pa med par byed/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /g.yas pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba/ /g.yon pa khrag dang 'dra bar bshad/ /rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thung zhing gsus par 'phyang la
91b1(rgyud 'grel): spom/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba rnam par 'phyang/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyis phyag dag la/ /thod pa dang ni gri gug bsnams/ /nyid mtshungs shes rab kyis 'khyud cing/ /bde bar 'joms 'jug gzhan don 'dod/ /g.yas pa'i phyag ni lhag ma la/ rdo rje ral gri 'bar?
91b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /'khor lo chu skyes g.yon dag la/ /sbrul gyi dbang pos brgyan du byas/ /sbrul rgyal sngon po dga' bo yis/ /skra bcings shin tu 'jigs par byed/ /tak+Sha ka klu dmar po yis/ /rna cha gdub kor byas pas 'jigs/ /rigs ldan khra bo dpung
91b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan te/ /dud skyong zhes bya'i klu de ni/ /ser po lag pa'i gdu bu byas/ /pad+ma dkar pos do shal byas/ /kar ko Ta ni ljang khu ste/ /se ral ga ru byas pas mdzes/ /bdud rtsi'i mdog dang 'dra ba yi/ /ner rgyas bus ni skar rags byas/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar
91b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mdog /pad+ma chen po rkad gdub yin/ /kun kyang phuT sgra drag po sgrogs/ /lce gnyis 'che ba'i phreng ba can/ /de ltar 'khor ba mya ngan 'das/ /gshin rje 'dul ba'i gzugs su shes/ /rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir/ /sngags kyis yang dag byin
91b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /rang snying sa bon 'od kyis bkug /yang dag rdzogs sangs mkha' khyab pa/ /kun tu kha nas gzhug par bya/ /bde ba myong bas snying gar gzhu/ /byas nas blo ldan khu ba de//

91b7(rgyud 'grel): ? sngon las byung ba/ /bstan pa'i mtshan ldan 'khor lo can/ /shar du k+She dang 'khor los byung/ /rtag pa phyag drug dkar po'o/ /g.yas na 'khor lo ral gri phyag /g.yon na rin chen chu skyes 'dzin/ /lho ru ma dang rin chen las/ /byung ba rin chen
92a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ldan te/ /gtso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ g.yas rin chen ral gri bsnams/ /phyag g.yon 'khor lo chu skyes so/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje can/ /me dang pad+ma las byung ba/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog /pad+ma ral gri bde? chen

92a5(rgyud 'grel): dang dbyug pa las gyur yod pa/ /dbyug pa gshin gshed mdog dkar po'o/ /dbyug pa ral gri pad 'khor lo/ /nub tu pad+ma gshin rje gshed/ /Ni las 'dod chags mthar byed 'dra/ /byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed/ /ra las phrag dog mthar byed

92b7(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed 'jigs byed pa/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /da Na Da d+h+rika gi sngags kyis ni/ /lho yi phyogs sgor gnas pa yi/ /dbyug pa gdul dka' gshin rje'i dgra /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi mar dgod/ /pad+ma d+h+rika ces bya ba 'dis/ /pad+ma gshin

93a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhi ru/ /'di ltar lho ma mchog zhi bsgom/ /shar lho mtshams kyi bar ni lha mo ni/ /skem mo khro la 'od bzang ma/ /mo ha ra ti'i sngags kyis ni/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla bar gnas/ /de yi nub tu rigs mchog ma/ /rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba/

93b1(rgyud 'grel): lag drug la dgod pa 'di/ /mngon shes don ni sgrub phyir bshad/ /snying gar hUM dang rdo rje las/ /gshin rje 'joms pa'i thugs rdo rje/ /mdog dang mtshon char yang dag ldan/ /mgrin par A dang pad+ma las/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed 'dra ba/ /dag
93b2(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rje bsam par bya/ /mgo bor oM dang 'khor lo las/ sku yi 'khor lo 'dra ba lus/ /phyag dang sku mdog mtshon chas ldan/ /rdo rje sku mchog de nyid gsum/ /bskyed la nam mkha' i dkyil gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas mchog la sngags kyis ni/ /byin gyis

94a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs/ /khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod/ /mi dang sa 'og rgya mtshor bcas/ /khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod/ /any+dza nag po bcag 'dra ba'i/ /khro bos ro langs bzhin gar mdzod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul cing/ /mdangs gnag

94a4(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /brag ca 'dra bar blta byas nas/ dkyil 'khor bas ni gtso bo bstod/ /des kyang de dag de bzhin no/ /gshin rje gshed por ba 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo

94a7(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ ba su d+ha ra ye phaT/ be ma ci trA ya sA/ sarba b+hu te b+hyo ha/ hA hA hA hI hI hI hUM hUM hUM/ pheM pheM pheM swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gtor ma phul nas/ /khyed kyis bdag gi smon lam thams cad grub pa'i grogs mdzad cig ces brjod la sarba de bA di ma:
94b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas 'byung po thams cad slar btang bar bsam mo/ /de nas bdag gi dge ba 'dis bdag myur du 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed khro bo chen por gyur cig ces smon lam btab la/ /sngar bskyed pa'i gnas la sogs pa je chung 'dus nas bdag
94b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi bar du mi snang bar bsams pa gshegs pa chen po zhes bya ste/ oM many+dzu sh+rI sa ma ya/ ma nu bA la ya/ many+dzu sh+rItwe no pa tiShpa dri Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+ya yo ma b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+ya yo me b+ha ga sarba sid+d+hi mme pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsita

95a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /drang dang bsre dang spo ba bsam/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa yis/ /oM badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dran byed cing/ /'khor lo bri ba brtsam bar

95a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa can blangs nas/ /mig gi tshad du byas nas ni/ /de yi ngos la re re gzhag /shar gyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i/ /rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig? bcu

95b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min chos can khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gsum pa ldan pa dang mi min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub byang mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar
95b7(rgyud 'grel): dgod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas drang ba brtsam par bya/ /dam tshig rjes su dran byed cing/ /rdo rje shugs dang ldan pa yis/ /shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas/ /yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya/ /phyogs

96a2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang/ /rim pa gsum pa'i khang par drangs/ /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral ni/ /rang rang nang ni mtshams su drang/ /de dag byung ba khang stong du/ /dbyangs
96a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi yi ge drang bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i gzhi la ni/ /ming gi yi ge drang bar bya/ /mig gi ye'i gzhi la ni/ /so so'i las dang mthun pa yi/ /bskul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya/ /gsang dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /yi ge phaT ni gzhag par bya/ /
96a4(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa la ni yi ge laM/ /zhi ba la ni yi ge oM/ /rgyas pa la ni yi ge swA/ /dbang la ho(rgyud 'grel): yis brgyan pa ste/ /dgug pa la ni yi ge dza:/ /de la las kyi 'od zer ni/ /zhi la chu ste rgyas las/ /dbang gi me ste drag po'i rlung/ /dbye dgug bskrad pa drag
96a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun/ /mnan pa dag gi rgyas pa bzhin/ /drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /bsre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /dbus kyi yi ge bkra shis la'ang/ /zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /'od kyi gong bu de'i nang du/ /
96a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag par bya/ /de dkyil rang ming dang por bzhag/ phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi/ /yi ge cur ma thams cad kyang/ /de tshe 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang/ /bcu drug khyim du spel te bri/ /byin rlob hUM
96a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba yang/ /khang pa gzhi la zur? ? mdzes/ /yongs su dag pa bkod byas te/ /mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni/ /spro ba dag ni brtsam par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba ji lta bar/ /'khor lo'i ras ni blang bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la/ /shin
96b1(rgyud 'grel): tu dge ba'i ras la bya/ /dbang dgu smad 'tshong smad dkris sogs/ /gsang dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang/ /mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras/ /gi wang gur kum zhi rgyas la/ /dbang dang dgug la tsan dan dmar/ /mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs/ /bskrad pa bya ? grag?
96b2(rgyud 'grel): gis te/ /dbye la rta dang ma he sogs/ /bsang la dug la sogs pa bri/ /dge ba'i las la zhing bzang po/ /dge ba mi na la rus pa dang/ /lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya/ /zhi la shar blta dbang la nub/ /rgyas pa byad ste drag po lho/ /gzhan yang ci
96b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs par sbyar bya/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la/ /sa skor rim bzhin bkod byas te/ /gnam skor dag ni rim las bzlog /bsad bskrad dbye dang mnan pa la/ /sa skor rim las bzlog pa ste/ /gnam skor dag ni rim bzhin bri/ /'di ltar legs par
96b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bris na/ /'khor lo rang la bzlog par 'gyur/ /de bas 'bad de nan tan bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas/ /maN Dal la gnas 'khor lo de/ /ras kyi 'khor lor spyan drangs te/ /rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /maN+Dal 'khor lo bsdu bar bya/ /ras
96b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs dmigs par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /'khor lo sba ba byas nas ni/ /gsang sngags bzlog pa brtsam par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ /dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM badzra be ga rdo rje
96b6(rgyud 'grel): shugs kyi sngags so/ /oM a sa me ti sa me mahA sa ma ye swA hA/ yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra sa many+dza(rgyud 'grel): dzA(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so/ /oM ya ma rA dza sa do ma ya/ a me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ ya kI yats+tsha ni rA/
96b7(rgyud 'grel): ya/ phaT phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ /las thams cad pa'o/ /oM trI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ? sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /shAn taM ku ru swA hA/ zhi bar skul ba'o/ /puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas bar ro/ /ba?
97a1(rgyud 'grel): ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o/ /mA ra ya phaT bsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe? Sha ya phaT dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o/ /stwaM b+ha ya hUM laM mnan pa'i 'o/ /A karSha ya hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): dgug pa'i 'o/ /oM mu(rgyud 'grel): slar dgrol pa'i 'o/ /A li kA li
97a2(rgyud 'grel): la'i grong khyer ni/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba brtsam pa ste/ /las kyi brtson ra dag kyang yin/ /yi ge btu ba med na ni/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ /ye ge tshang bar ma bkod na/ /gsang sngags sgra ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags brda
97a3(rgyud 'grel): yis ma bstan na/ /sngags pa'i dngos grub med par 'gyur/ /drang ba dag ni ma byas na/ /shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yi ge bsre ba ma byas na/ /khang pa bcu drug don med 'gyur/ /bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub/ /rig sngags nyams dang log
97a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /lha min g.yul las pham pa dang/ /dbang po'i dgra bo bsad pa bzhin/ /'khor lo spo ba ma byas na/ /cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang/ /dad pa brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /dpal
97a5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// // */ (/dpal gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon kun tu bzang pos mdzad pa bzhugs so/) / */ /rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri na ma sA d+ha na na ma/(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI ya mA ri
97a6(rgyud 'grel): dwe? Sha/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra nag po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /dpal zhe sdang gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma la gus phyag 'tshal nas/ /de rjes gshin dgra nag rdor la/ /rang 'od yan lag bzhugs pa yi/ /bde bas gang
97a7(rgyud 'grel): bas gzhan don mdzad/ /rdo rje ral gri 'khor lo dang/ /'dam skyes gri gug phyag gis 'dzin/ /zhal gsum 'jigs pa yang 'jigs mdzad/ /de la phyag 'tshal sgrub thabs bri/ /gshin dgra nag po sgrub thabs 'di/ /de nyid blo ldan 'dod pa yi/ /dbang
97b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs la ni thob pa gang/ /de yi 'di ni bsgom rim mo/ /byis pa rnams kyis go bde dang/ /rang dran don du byas pa yin/ /mchog rnams la ni 'grub par gsungs/ /rang dga' bas ni bri bar bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ldan/ /blo legs 'gro don ni
97b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa/ /byams sogs yon tan yang dag ldan/ /dad ldan thos pas brgyan pa yi/ /thog mar gdong sogs dag byas nas/ /snga dro gshin rje bdag nyid pas/ /dben yul la ni rab tu brtsam/ /dur khrod la sogs bde bstan bzhugs/ /rang snying pad+ma'i zla ba
97b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /ya yig rnam pa 'od ldan dmigs/ /kha dog sngon po 'gro don byed/ /bla ma dang ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ma lus nam mkha' i 'od gang bar/ /bsgom zhing de ni legs dmigs te/ /sku tshogs de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /tsar tsi la sogs mchod
97b4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /lus ngag yid kyis sdig byas gang/ /byas shing de bzhin yi rang ba/ /mgon la lan gsum smras shing bshegs/ /'phags pa rdzogs sangs rgyas sras dang/ /'dul ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /yang dag sangs rgyas bdag skyabs mchi/ /dag
97b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i chos dang mchog dge 'dun/ /khyod la bdag gis lus sbyin te/ /yon tan rgya mtsho la yang 'bul/ /chos ni thams cad gnas pa yin/ /legs pa'i sgras ni bstan pa'o/ /rdzogs pa yi ni sangs rgyas sku/ /de lam sbyin pa la sogs bzhugs/ /sku gsung
97b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thob don du/ /gnang bas bdag gis gnas pa ste/ /sems can don ni byed pa'i phyir/ /yang dag byang chub sems bskyed bya'o/ /bdag gis bsod nams byas pa gang/ /yang dag sangs rgyas la bsngos te/ /dpal ldan gshin rje dgrar gyur nas//
97b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis 'gro ba'i don byed shog /smon lam mchog 'di byas nas ni/ /blo ldan de rnams gshegs su gsol/ /snying rje'i rim pa mthong nas ni/ /sna tshogs stong par rnam dmigs na/ /rgyu ni mi rtog pa yin te/ /rang bzhin rnam par bral ba'o/ /rnam
98a1(rgyud 'grel): par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ /smon lam de ni rnam gshegs bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sems de nyid ni dam byas nas/ /a las byung ba'i nyi dkyil te/ /de la hUM skyes kha dog bsngo/ /'od zer 'phros pas
98a2(rgyud 'grel): kun tu khyab/ /bsrung ba'i don du rdo rje bsgom/ /kun tu rtse ni lnga yin te/ /rdo rjes bzhi de las byung/ /de bzhin gur dang ra ba'o/ /sangs rgyas zhing dag don du ni/ /yang dag bsam gtan kun brtsam ste/ /de la sna tshogs pad zla la/ /rtag rdor yan lag
98a3(rgyud 'grel): las byung ngo/ /dkar po gru gsum chos dbyings te/ /dbus su sna pad rdo rje'i gdan/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam 'greng ba bsam/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa'o/ /bruM rnams 'khor lo lte dbus skyes/ /dag pa'i yan lag las byung ste/ /zur bzhi
98a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni sgo? bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa'o/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis ni spras/ /mchod rnams lha mo yang dag brgyan/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis 'phyar/ /ba dan dang ni dril bu ldan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje kun tu mnan/ /zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i stan/ /shar du
98a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po yin/ /byang du ljang gu'i kha dog go /in dra nI la'i 'od dang ldan/ /dbus kyi sa ni rnam bsgoms te/ /'di ltar phyogs kyi dbye ba yis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom bya'o/ /bris sku la
98a6(rgyud 'grel): yang de bzhin bsgom/ /rab tu gzugs kyi rim ji bzhin/ /rnam lnga bsam par byas nas ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgom mo/ /rnam lnga de ni dpal dang ldan/ /de rjes gang bar 'dud sel byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan grags/ /de phyir
98a7(rgyud 'grel): ? de gsungs so/ /lte bar sna tshogs par zla la/ /dbyangs yig nyis skor dgod par bya/ /de yis zla ba rdzogs pa ste/ ka yig thog mar nyis skor bya/ /Da Dha da d+ha ya la bsnan pas de rnams rdzogs pa yis/ /zla ba dmar po rnam bsgom bya/ /de gnyis
98b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs la ji skad gsungs/ /me long mnyam pa nyid du brjod/ /de dbus hUM skyes so sor rtog /de las gyur pa rdo rje ste/ /de ni bya ba nan tan brjod/ /nyi ma'i nor bu 'od zer mtshungs/ /'od dang sa bon lan rdo rje/ /oM badzra At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya bas nga rgyal bya'o/ /de la ?
98b2(rgyud 'grel): pa kha dog dkar/ /thub pa'i mchog gis rab brgyan pa/ /rang 'od kyis lus 'khyud pa ste/ /sgeg pa khro bo'i gzugs can po/ /mchog gi bde ba dang ldan pa?/ dkar po sngon po dmar po'i zhal/ /g.yas skum g.yon brkyang bar gnas pa/ /'bar ba dang ldan ral gri dang
98b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gri gug gsor bar byed/ /'khor lo'i pad+ma skal ldan pa/ /g.yas pa'i g.yon du shin tu yang/ /'od zer 'phro zhing phyag gis 'dzin/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya bas rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin las/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni yod pa ste/ /
98b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnal 'byor ro/ /chags pa che bas 'dul ba yi/ /'gro ba gsum ni kun tu dmigs/ /rang gi rnam shes 'od zer gyis/ /sna tshogs spros pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rtag bde dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de rnams rang gi lus la byugs/ /rtog pa thams cad
98b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam spangs pa/ /bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs par bsgom/ /'di ni de nyid sngags rtse dmar/ /ho gnyis kyis ni spel ba ste/ /ji ltar skar ma 'pho ba bzhin/ /byang chub sems ni de bzhin gzhug /snying rjes chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rdor 'dzin nyid du
98b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od du zhu/ /byams pa la sogs tsar tsi kas/ /'khor lo'i bdag po sku la byed do/ /snying rje'i khro bo rje btsun bzhengs/ /gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug spongs/ /bdud rnams bzhi las gtso bo rgyal/ /kye 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis rje btsun bzhengs/ /
98b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgron gnyen stong pas bzhugs/ /'jig rten bsod nams rje btsun bzhengs/ /kye stong par bsam nas ci ste bzhugs/ /byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten mgron/ /'dis ni zhu ba bskul ba ste/ /chags pa'i rjes chags thim pa'o/ /'di yi glu yi
99a1(rgyud 'grel): mngon pa yis/ /'od du zhu ba'i bde sems ni/ /rab tu zhu zhing zhu la skyes/ /nyi dkyil la ni ya sngon te/ /khro bo dang ni khros pa can/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan/ /smin sa rnon po 'bar ba can/ /yan lag sdu gri bzhin
99a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs sbyin/ /rdo rje sngon po 'od dang ldan/ /ma he rgyab tu gnas pa'o/ /de yi sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /nag po dgra yi gzugs byas nas/ /stobs chen 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par byed/ /sna tshogs bdag nyid mnyam par bzhugs/ /ma he rdo rje bsams
99a3(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgoms/ /dug bzhin tsha ba 'phros pa ni/ /'jig rten gsum zad dkyil 'khor ni/ /mun nag lus ni drag shul can/ /ljags 'dril rab tu 'od zer 'phro/ /mche ba 'od zer 'phro zhing zhal/ /smin ma smar sgra gyen te/ /
99a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis gnas/ /dus ni mi dran byed pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni bung ba che/ /g.yas pa shin tu zla ba 'od/ /g.yon pa dmar po rab tu gsungs/ /rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /mi thung gsus chen nag po yin/ /mgo bo'i phreng
99a5(rgyud 'grel): bas do shal byed/ /g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /ba nad dang ni gri gug 'dzin/ /rang 'od shes rab yang dag sbyor/ /bde ba 'bab cing gzhan don byed/ /lhag ma g.yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /'bar bzhin rdo rje ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon
99a6(rgyud 'grel): pa gnyis kyi phyag gis ni/ /pad+ma dang ni 'khor lo 'dzin/ /sbrul gyi rgyal pos brgyan byed pa/ /sngon po grangs med sbrul rgyal gyis/ /shin tu 'jigs byed dbu skra bcings/ /dmar po 'jog po klu yis ni/ /stobs chen rna cha'i rna rgyan byed/ /rigs ldan ser
99a7(rgyud 'grel): pos dpung brgyan te/ /ser po yang ni phyag dub 'dzin/ /klu rgyal dud skyong glu yis ni/ /shin tu dkar po'i pad+ma 'dzin/ /'jog po ljang gu klu rgyal gyis/ /legs par tshangs skud byed pa ste/ /nor rgyas klu yi rgyal pos ni/ /de yi sku rags byas pa ste/ /
99b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma chen po klu rgyal gyis/ /pad skud kha dog dkar po bzhin/ /des ni zhabs gdub byas pa ste/ /thams cad phur sgra drag shul can/ /mche gnyis so 'phreng lce gnyis pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor byang rang bzhin can/ /'di legs gshin rje gshed po yin/ /shes nas ??
99b2(rgyud 'grel): med par bya/ /brlabs shing sngags kyis mnyam bya'o/ /o d+harma b+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba 'dis ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /rang snying 'od zer lcags kyus dgug /mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /thams cad de ni zhal du gzhug /bde zhugs
99b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bab cing snying gar zhu/ /byas pas blo ldan rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdor lam khu ba de nyid 'phro/ /rang 'od pad+ma'i nang gnas pa/ /sa bon gzugs kyis dmigs par bya/ /sa bon 'khor lo yang dag 'byung/ /sa bon rnams kyi byin brlabs te/ /tsha tsha 'phro zhing 'bar
99b4(rgyud 'grel): ba can/ /mkhas pas rim par bsgom pa ste/ /gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid ji bzhin pa/ /ya rnams dbus su sngon po byung/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po bzhengs pa'o/ /shar du k+She yis 'khor lo rdzogs/ /rtag pa phyag drug dkar po ste/ /g.yas par 'khor lo ral gri gnas/
99b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon par rin chen mtsho skyes 'dzin/ /ma yi rnam pas lho phyogs su/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen rgyal/ /gser sregs dang ni mtshungs pa'i mdog /g.yas pas rin chen ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon pas 'khor lo pad+ma gnas/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje
99b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /me yi sa bon pad+ma rdzogs/ /pad+ma rA ga mnyam mtshungs pa/ /pad+ma ral gri g.yas par gnas/ /nor bu 'khor lo g.yon par bkod/ /sa bon da las ral gri skyes/ /ljang khu phrag dog gshin dgra ste/ /ral gri 'khor lo g.yas pa 'dzin/ /pad+ma nor bu g.yon
99b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsnams/ /thams cad zhe sdang gshin dgra yi/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni khro bo'i gzugs/ /rtsa ba'i phyag ni gnyis gnyis kun/ /gri gug ban da bsgom bya ste/ /rang gi shes rab gnyis med lus/ /bde ba'i gzugs kyis rang bzhin can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
100a1(rgyud 'grel): kun gnas pa/ /dag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rtsibs rtse la/ /sems can don mdzad bsgom par bya/ /ya rnams shar phyogs sgo ru byung/ /thob sngon po rang bzhin te/ /g.yas par ral gri tho ba 'dzin/ /g.yon ?
100a2(rgyud 'grel): nor bu pad dkar gnas/ /de tho zhes ni gshin rje gshed/ /ts+tsha las byung ba be con lho sgor gnas/ /be con gshin dgra kha dog dkar/ /g.yas pas be con ral gri 'dzin/ /g.yon pas 'dam skyes 'khor lo bsnams/ /nub tu pad+ma gshin dgra ni/ /dmar po
100a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ ni las skyes pa 'dod chags rgyal/ /byang du ral gri gshin dgra ni/ /ra las skyes pa'i cha byad ni/ /rgyal po phrag dog dbyibs kyi gnas/ /cung zhig sngon po'i dbye ba yis/ /rab tu 'jigs bzhin byas pa ste/ /thams cad khros pa
100a4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa/ yan lag la 'grogs pa yis brgyan/ /gtsigs pa'i zhal gyis bzhad pa ste/ /skra ni ser skya 'bar zhing 'greng/ /nyi dkyil la ni yang dag gnas/ /mche ba gtsigs shing stobs kyi zhal/ /gri gug band+ha 'dzin pa'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje grwa bzhi ru//
100a5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin lha mo zla dkyil gnas/ /dza 'khor rdo rje tsar tsi ka/ lha mo de ni shar lhor gnas/ /skams ma dkar mo khro chen ma/ /gti mug gshin dgra rang bzhin bzhugs/ /de nas lho nub phag mo ste/ /sa las rdo rje skyes ma yin/ /phag pa'i gdong can khro chen ma/ /
100a6(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang gshin dgra 'dra pa'i 'od/ /rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs can ma/ /nub byang gi ni grwa ru gnas/ /do las skyes ma mchog dmar mdog /'dod chags gshin dgra'i dbyibs can ma/ /byang shar grwa ru yang dag gnas/ /dkar mo ljang gu 'jigs byed ma//
100a7(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog gshin 'gra'i phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /ru las skyes pa'i phrag dog dbyibs/ /sngon po'i g.yas pa dkar po ste/ /dkar po'i g.yas pa sngon po yin/ /de gnyis g.yon zhal dmar po ste/ /gzhan ma'i zhal ni dkar po'o/ /Na yo ni ra? grwa bzhi ru/
100b1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi ni band+ha ste/ /rang sngags rig pa ji bzhin gyis/ /blo ldan rdzogs shing 'phro bar bya/ /hUM/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sngags sgra yis/ /dkyil 'khor mnga' bdag yang dag bskul/ /grangs med sprul pa rnam 'phros te/ /brtson 'grus sems can don
100b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ /dngos po thams cad rang lus la/ /khro bo'i dpa' bos gzhug bya'o/ /dzi na dzika ces bya bas na/ /shar du gti mug gshin dgra ste/ /sna tshogs pad zla dbyibs rtse ru/ /de la de ni gnas par bya/ /ratna d+h+rika ces bya bas ni/ /lho yi pad+ma'i nyi dkyil la/ /
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs med don du dgug pa ste/ /rim pas de la gzhug par bya/ /A ro lik ces bya sngags kyis/ /'dod chags gshin dgra skyon med pa/ /nub kyi sna tshogs pad nyi la/ /rim pas de ni rnam bsgom bya/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika ni de nyid kyis/ /phrag dog dgra ni rnam dril byed//
100b4(rgyud 'grel): byang gi padmo rnon po la/ /de ni rim pas gnas par bsam/ /mud gar d+h+rika ni de nyid kyis/ /shar phyogs sgo ru pad+ma la/ /nyi dkyil la ni 'bar zhing gnas/ /tho ba mthar byed min zhes bya/ /rim pas mkhas pas yang dag bsam/ /daN Da d+h+rika ces bya sngags
100b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /lho yi sgo'u yang dag gnas/ /be con gshin dgra'i 'grubs pa/ /sna tshogs pad nyid zla 'od bsam/ /pad+ma d+h+rika ces bya bas ni/ /pad+ma dus med gshin dgra ste/ /nub sgo 'dam skyes nyi dkyil la/ /'khrugs pa stobs chen bsam par bya/ /khaDa
100b6(rgyud 'grel): d+h+ri ni de nyis kyis/ /ral gri de ri d+has? med pa/ /sna tshogs pad dang nyi dkyil la/ bdud med byed pa byang bsgor bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje grwa bzhi ru/ /gzhan yang de bzhin lha mo bsam/ /dwe Sha ra ti zhes sngags kyis/ /shar lho mtshams kyi lha mo ste/ /zla ba dag ni
100b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs dang/ /khros ma tsar tsi yang dag gnas/ /de nas lho nub rdo rje phag /rigs kyi bdag mo phag mo ste/ /mo ha ra ti de nyid kyis/ /pad+ma zla bar mkhas pas sgom/ /de nas nub byang grwa nyid la/ /rA gar ti zhes sngags kyis/ /pad zla la ni dbyangs can dgod/ /
101a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas byang shar dkar mo ste/ /badzrar ti zhes sngags kyis/ /zla pad la ni lha mo bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa bzhi ru/ /de nyid gsum gyi band+ha rnams/ /'di ni rnam 'phros dag pa'i 'khor/ /dam par byas na bde dang ldan ?? ma'i?
101a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo de thim de/ /mnyam nyid pas ni dmigs pa ste/ /'di ni sbyor ba dang po'o/ /gshin dgra nag po dus 'jigs pas/ /de yi rang bzhin dkyil lha rnams/ /mig dang lus sogs rang bzhin te/ /lha rnams kyi ni byin brlab bya/ /gti mug khyim la
101a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo skyes/ /cung zhig khros pa mig la gnas/ /rdo rje mig yin blo ldan dmigs/ /rna gnyis dziM las rdo rje byung/ /rdo rje rna ba kha dog gnag /dri las khaM skyes rin chen 'byung/ /ser sna de ni zla ba la/ /rdo rje dri ni de bzhin mchog /ljags la gaM las pad+ma
101a4(rgyud 'grel): byung/ /'dod chags dra ba rdor ljags yin/ /kaM las skyes pa ral gri ste/ /ri dags mtshan pa'i rdor lus yin/ /phrag dog gshin dgra rang bzhin gzugs/ /dpral bar lus yin zhes bya ste/ /lte stengs seM las rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje sems ni de bzhin
101a5(rgyud 'grel): mchog /sgeg po khro bo rang bzhin gzugs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa dgod bya ste/ /'di ni yan lag drug dgod pa'o/ /mngon sum don grub las su gsungs/ /snying gar hUM rdor dbus su gnas/ /hUM rdor sngon po legs 'od can/ /gshin dgra dang 'dra phyag mtshan
101a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs/ /sems la gnas pa'i thugs rdor bsgom/ /ol kong a las pad+ma skyes/ /de dbus puM las chags pa byung/ /'dod chags gshin dgra lta bu'i lus/ /dpal ldan gsung rdor rnam bsgom bya/ /spyi bor oM rnams 'khor lo dbus/ /
101a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gshin 'bar de dbus 'khor/ /sku yi rdo rje sku dang 'dra/ /phyag dang phyag mtshan kha dog mtshungs/ /de ni de nyid rdor mchog ste/ /rdzogs bas mkha' gnas sangs rgyas mchod/ /sngags kyis de rnams byin brlab bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta
101b1(rgyud 'grel): badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA? gba dzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /sna tshogs la gnas dgug byas pas/ mdun du de ni bzhugs dmigs
101b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /des ni yang dag spros pa yi/ /ji srid tsar tsi la sogs pa/ /zla 'od mtshungs pa'i bum pa yis/ /bkra shis la sogs klu rnams kyis/ /yang ni dbang bskur dmigs par bya/ /bdag nyid dang ni thams cad la/ /dbang bskur bas na tsiM byung ste/ /spyi bor
101b3(rgyud 'grel): gshin dgra nag po yi?/ /rdor 'dzin bdag nyid de bzhin no/ /rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /bdag mdun ye shes 'khor la dgug /'khor lo de ni dmigs nas ni/ /khro rnams bgegs bskrad srung bar byed/ /arg+ha bsil yab phul byas nas/ /
101b4(rgyud 'grel): oM mud ga ra dza(rgyud 'grel): 'di sngags kyis ni dgug pa ste/ /oM daN Da hUM/ 'di sngags kyis ni rab tu gzhug/ oM pad+ma baM/ sngags 'di yis ni 'ching ba ste/ /oM khaDga ho/(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di yis ni dbang byed do/ /rang snying sa bon 'od rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas dgug cing gzhug
101b5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /snying gar 'od zhu dmigs nas ni/ /ma lus rdo rje lam nas 'byung/ /rang 'od rig ma'i pad+ma la/ /zla ba las byung lha mo rnams/ /sna tshogs me tog la sogs rjes/ /phyag gi yal gas de rnams 'dzin/ /sgeg ldan de yi mchod pa ste/ /yid 'phrog
101b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i glu dang ni/ /sna tshogs gar gyi bye brag gis/ /des ni bde chen rab yin no/ /kye kye gshin rje dgra nag po/ /bla ma srin po'i rang bzhin can/ khyod mthong bdag ni rnam 'jigs te/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ /bdag pas gar byed pa yis
101b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /steng sa yis mi yul sa 'og 'dar/ /mig sman bcag bzhin khros pa'i yid/ /mig 'grungs khyod ni gar byed do/ /mi thung nag po gshin dgra ste/ /gzugs ni rnam pa sna tshogs sprul/ /rdo rje dbyangs can bdag gis zhus/ /bde chen khyod ni gar mdzad cig /h+rI:
102a1(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis khyod gar byed/ /khams gsum the tshom med par mdzod/ /gshin rje khro bo rje btsun khyod/ /gar byed 'gro bas mthong ba'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu'i ??/
102a2(rgyud 'grel): sgra yul bzhin du rnam dmigs bya'o/ /'khor lo la gnas lha rnams kyis/ /'khor lo'i bdag po bstod pa ste/ /gti mug rdo rje rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin dgra bdi ba 'jigs pa po/ /sangs rgyas kun ldan mgon po ste/ /'jigs med rdo rje phyag 'tshal
102a3(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /ser sna rdo rje rang bzhin khyod/ /yang dag gshin dgra 'jigs pa'o/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab snang ba/ /rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje rang bzhin khyod/ /'dod chags rgya mtsho chos kyi bdag /thams cad dbyangs kyi mchog gi mchog /gsung
102a4(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog rdo rje rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin dgra las kun thams cad byed/ /sku yi rdo rje rab snang ba/ /ral gri phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas kun gcig yang dag 'dus/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mchog gi mchog dkyil
102a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma bdag phyag 'tshal bstod/ /a las skyes pa'i dag pad de/ /mgo gsum steng du yang dag gnas/ /rnam rdzogs de 'og me dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum ra ba las byung ba'o/ /de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /g.yo ba sngon po gzhu dang 'dra/ /yaM las
102a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa ba dan dang/ /de la kha dog ming dang gzugs/ /snang mdzad la sogs gnas pa ste/ /de la sogs pa yang dag dbyung/ /rig ngan la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /hUM las rdo rje rim pa yis/ /de ni dgag pa bsgom par bya/ /rlung gis me ni rab sbar bas/ /
102a7(rgyud 'grel): zhu bzhin rnam par dmigs pa yin/ /rdo rje ro mnyam bsgyur ba ste/ /shin dag dri med dmigs pa'o/ /de la oM rnams 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin ye shes dgug /sngags kyi gzugs kyi rab tu gzhug /dmigs nas bdud rtsi lnga mchog
102b1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs nas/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim par bya/ /zhi ba rdo rje lce la gnas/ /hUM las skyes pa dmigs nas ni/ /de la sbu gu'i rnam pa yis/ /des ni mnyam par dgug par bya/ /sna tshogs gnas pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dkyil
102b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lha rnams de bzhin no/ /snying ga'i 'od zer rnams kyis ni/ /rnam rtog spangs pas dmigs bya'o/ /thog ma dbus mdza' dbye ba yis/ /'di la gtsig tu sbyor med de/ /rdul phran cha med rgyu yin pas/ /grangs med de ni sbyor mi bya/ /gcig dang du ma'i rang?
102b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyis/ /rnam par bral ba gang yin de/ /de ni de bzhin de ma yin/ /the tshom de nyid las bya'o/ /gang phyir the tshom gnyis la gnas/ /bsam mi khyab la the tshom med/ /spros dang bsdu ba'i sku yin te/ /sems can ro gcig don las byung/ /gzhan ni rgyas par
102b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid med/ /'di ni gsal bar rab tu gsungs/ /ye shes zhabs kyi zhal nas byung/ /dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par gsungs/ /'di la bdag gis rgyas ma smras/ /dngos po'i bdag nyid dngos po med/ /khams med rnam par shes pa 'ang med/ /nam mkha' 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): kun mnyam gnas bzhin te/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin bdag med pa/ /'di ni chos mchog bde chen po/ /sa min chu min gnyi ga min/ /me min rlung min mkha' min te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab sbyor bas/ /skye ba 'di ni rab gnas pa'i/ /dngos po thams cad dngos min
102b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de phyir dngos med grags pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor gyis ni 'brel/ /rtag dang chad pa gnyis min te/ /zhal med phyag med kha dog med/ /mchog gi dag pa'i mtshan nyid la/ /dngos po thams cad nges rtag min/ /thog ma dbus mdza' rnam par
102b7(rgyud 'grel): spangs/ /de ltar pho brang shes gnas pas/ /rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa ste/ /phung po khams dang bdag med par/ /dag pa'i bde gzugs bsgom pa'o/ /'gro ba gshin rje gshed byas nas/ /rang snying sa bon 'od rnams kyis/ /de bkug 'ong ba?
103a1(rgyud 'grel): dmigs nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs rdor rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin chos yin te/ /ye shes las skyes dgod par bya/ /de la de yi sa bon rnams/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs ye shes 'bar/ /lhag rtog spangs pas mthong ba ste/ /? ?
103a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bde ba'i rnam pa can/ /'phro ba 'dus pas yang dag dgang/ /bdag nyid mkhas pas bsgom pa yin/ /sku la sogs par 'phro bya ste/ /dus gcig dang ni rim pa yis/ /khro gzugs sna tshogs sprul pa byed/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sngags kyis ni/ /'gro
103a3(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad bde byed do/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bsam gtan byed pa'i rim pa 'dis/ /'bad la sngags ni de bzhin bya/ /gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs las/ /bsam gtan ldan zhing thams cad bya'o/ /mchod dang bstod 
103a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bdud rtsi za/ /sems can don byed yid kyis bya/ /de nyid gsum gyi rim pa yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par dbyung/ /bdag gi 'khor lo bdag nyid la/ /ji ltar rim pas gnas pa ste/ /bdag gis bsod nams byas pa gang/ /mngon par byang
103a5(rgyud 'grel): chub la smon bya/ /de nas smon lam byas nas ni/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM mu(rgyud 'grel): 'i sngags kyis ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol/ /'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /rang bdag rnam pa'i rang bzhin bzhengs/ de yi nga rgyal yang dag byed/ /'bad la dngos
103a6(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad ni/ /de bzhin de yi gzugs nges bya/ /gti mug gshin dgra'i gzugs kyis ni/ /gnas dang 'gro ba bsgom pa'o/ /gsungs pa'i dus ni de rnams la/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor bzhi bsgom ste/ /dang po rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che/ /cung zhig
103a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes de rjes sbyor/ /sbyor bdag yang dag rnal 'byor che/ /yang dag ye shes dbang gnas so/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pa gcig /dus cig la ni sngags bsgom bya/ /rnal 'byor che ldan rnal 'byor pa/ /'phro dang 'du ba'i lus nyid do/ /de
103b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid ye shes gzugs can dag /de phyir bdag nyid gshin rje gshed/ /dbang bskur rim pas bsam gtan gyis/ /khrus dang gza' ba thams cad bya/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi rim pa yis/ /gzhan mchod pa la rtogs par bya/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan ma ??
103b2(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ltar ni rtag tu mchod/ /dpal ldan gshin dgra'i bdag nyid can/ /byang chub bsgom pas rtag tu dmigs/ /bdag gzhan mnyam pa byang chub yin/ /de phyir rang bdag sbyor ba ste/ /de med bdag nyid sgyur 'dod pa/ /rnal 'byor chos sgrub rnyed min no/ /ji ltar
103b3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rnam pa la/ /dngos po gcig la rtog pa ste/ /sdug bsngal bral nas bde ba skye/ /las kyi dbye bas de dag skye'o/ /bdag nyid sems la rnam rtog med/ /dag pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin la/ /nag ces pa ni dga' 
103b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /de skyes 'khril bas shaM? dus su/ /zab pa stobs chen shin dgra nag /des ni phan byed gzhan min no/ /gshin sgrubs zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin/ /stobs chen 'byung tshogs 'jigs med de/ /de rnams dgug
103b5(rgyud 'grel): cing phur pas gdab/ /de ni 'jigs can khro gzugs so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 'byung po thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dgug pa ste/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ /'byung po thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa
103b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bus gdabs ste hUM phaT/ 'dis ni 'ong bar shes byas nas/ /rang gi kha dog brgyan pa brtag /g.yas pa'i phyag la rang mtshon 'dzin/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na sna tshogs pa'o/ /brgya byin gshin rje dbang ldan dang/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wikri sa bon gyis/ /de
103b7(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ /me dang bden bral rlung lha dang/ /hUM byung lus ni shes bya ste/ /nyi zla sa yin 'jig rten lha/ /hUM phaT phaT swAhA las skyes/ /lha rnams thams cad khyab 'jug ldan/ /'di ni gtor ma'i de nyid kyis/ /mnyam pa thams cad yang
104a1(rgyud 'grel): dag skyes/ /rim pas dmigs nas byin gyis brlab/ /de la rim pas dbang bskur sbyin/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rim pa yis/ /raM gi sa bon gser dang mtshungs mchod dang gtor ma de rnams dbul/ /'di ni gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub
104a2(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ /slob dpon kun tu bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //slob dpon don yod rdo rje yis/ /legs par bsal byed sgrub thabs 'di/ /bsgyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med dang/ /gzhan yang smon lam 'di btag
104a3(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rgyud dang sgrub thabs mi 'bral zhing/ /de yi man ngag rjes 'brang bas/ /bdag dang gzhan dag sems can kun/ /gshin rje gshed kyi zhal mthong shog/ //rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed
104a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mthar mdzad thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /'gro ba'i don du phyi rol gtum chen sku/ /mgon po gshin rje gshed la mgos btud de/ /de yi sgrubs thabs
104a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i don du ni/ /sngags pa dang po sems yongs mgu ba dang/ /bde ba'i stan gnas 'og tu dam bca' byas/ /snying gar hUM bkod pa las mchod pa'i tshogs/ /sna tshogs pa yi mgon la mngon par mchod/ /de yi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags
104a6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs/ /byas nas stong nyid yongs su bsgoms nas ni/ /dang por rlung gi dkyil 'khor yaM las byung/ /du ba'i mdog 'dra gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /rang gi sa bon las byung me yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum mdog kyang dmar ba yin/ /baM
104a7(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i chu yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /bum pa 'dra zhing dkar la thur bltas pa/ /yaM las byung ba'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni/ /zur bzhi pa la kun nas rab tu ser/ /hUM suM hUM las byung ba'i ri rab ni/ /raM rgyal rtse mo brgyad pa go rims bzhin//
104b1(rgyud 'grel): sngar bshad rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /gong nas gong ma'i rim pa bsams nas ni/ /de 'og hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje'i ma/ /ra ba dra ba dam pa dbus kyi char/ /a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dbus na d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i 'dzam? ?//
104b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo phyag g.yas ral gri mdzes/ /gzhon nu'i g.yon na thugs gar glegs ba bsnams/ /sku ni dmar ser zur phud lnga gnag cing/ /rdo rje skyil krung mchog bcas shin tu zhi/ /bsams la slar yang de yi thugs zla bar gnas/ /hi las byung//
104b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nyi ma 'char ka'i gzugs/ /kun nas 'od zer nag po 'phros pa yis/ /khams gsum khyab nas rgyal ba byang chub sems/ /khro bo rig pa gnas na legs bzhugs rnams/ /yang dag bskul te dkug nas nyi gzugs la/ /bcug la dar ni gcig
104b4(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur pa na/ /slar yang nyi ma nyid du gyur pa las/ /'od zer dmar po rab tu rgya che ba/ /shin tu 'bar ba spros nas de ru ni/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje kha gyes gnag /lte bar hUM bcas sna tshogs 'od 'dra ba/ /de las rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' spros/ /slar yang de
104b5(rgyud 'grel): yis 'gro ba drug la gnas/ /sems can gdul de byang chub mchog bkod nas/ /bkug ste thams cad rdo rje la rab bzhug /de 'og rdo rje ni la yongs gyur nas/ /gshin rje gshed po zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam/ /phyag g.yas rdo rje'i dbyig pa 'phyar
104b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /phyag g.yon sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa can/ /gshin rje ma he'i steng na gan? rkyal gnas/ /g.yas brkyang gnas pa yis ni gnod par mdzad/ /mi thung zhal ni rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs/ /gsus khyim che la ljags ni rnam par skyong/ /dbu skra smin
104b7(rgyud 'grel): ma ? dmar ser ni/ /gyen du brdzis shing spyan gnyis rnam par dmar/ /gnag cing khro bcas gnyer ma dpral bar bsdus/ /phus 'debs klu brgyad kyis ni yan lag brgyan/ /stag lpags bsnams shing thod pa'i rtse bran can/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba'i do shal 
105a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang mdzad cing/ /dus mdza' i me ltar 'jigs 'od rnam par 'bar/ /'jigs par byed pa'ang 'jigs pa skyed par mdzad/ /gtum zhing gshin rje gshed tshogs sangs rgyas 'phro/ /'jig rten lha mchog tshogs kyis ?
105a2(rgyud 'grel): byas shing/ /ha har bzhod pas lha dang lha min tshogs/ /kun nas yongs su skrag par mdzad pa'o/ /sa gsum dag na yod pa'i bdud kyi tshogs/ /ma lus pa yang rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ /de ltar bsam gtan la brtson gnas pa ste/ /dags?
105a3(rgyud 'grel): med par nyin mtshan sngags zlos shing/ /de nyid sbyor bas dur khrod sogs par gnas/ /dam tshig rnam dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi sgrub thabs 'di ni legs bris las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des 'jig rten/ /gshin rje
105a4(rgyud 'grel): gshed mnyam 'gro kun sdug bsngal ni/ /mi bzad tshogs thar bdud tshogs myur zad shog /gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzangs snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na
105a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzangs pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // ! /dpal gshin rje gshed nag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gus pa yis ni bla ma yi/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag 'tshal te/ /bla
105a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis/ /nag po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i/ /mdor bsdus pa yi bsgrub thabs bshad/ /dang por rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis/ /dben pa'i gnas su 'dug nas ni/ /stong pa'i sems la mnyam gzhag ste/ /snying
