216b6(rgyud 'grel): phyug seng+ge'i ? la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rig pa gced pas gro gug/ gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ dran pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pas gtun shing/ /sred pa gcod par byed pas chu gri'o//
216b7(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag go nyes pa 'joms pas rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o/ /phrag dog 'joms pas sta'o/ /lta ba ngan pa 'dzoms pas mdung ngo/ /dbang gi las byed pas mnga' o/ /'gugs pas lcags kyu'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa 'joms par byed pas
217a1(rgyud 'grel): dbyug tho'o/ /kha TwAM ga ni byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pas na 'khor lo/ /ye shes lnga ro mnyam par gyur pas bdag nyid rdo rje'o/ /mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'joms pas rdo rje tho
217a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /ral gri'i dngos grub ster bas na ral gri'o/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i sgras sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul bas cang te'u 'o/ /bde ba chen po dang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin ni sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i thod
217a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas tshangs pa'i mgo bo/ /bdud las rgyal ba'i rang bzhin gyi phub po/ /sems can thams cad dang chos thams cad du rtog pa'i rang bzhin med pas rkang pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i ye shes 'chi
217a4(rgyud 'grel): bas zhags pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rgyal bas na gzhu'o/ /stong pa nyid kyis na rgyu ma'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dril bu'o/ /chos thams cad byed pa po nyid kyis lag pa'o/ /chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid
217a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis na dur khrod kyi ras so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis phub pa nyid kyis skyes bu gsal shing la gtsugs pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'od gsal ba nyid kyis na me thab bo/ /dam tshig dag pa nyid kyis na thod pa btung bas
217a6(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba'o/ /bdud rnams bsdigs pa nyid kyi sdigs mdzub bo/ /sku gsung thugs rnams ro gcig pa nyid kyis 'phan lce gsum pa'o/ /chos thams cad 'od sgyu ma lta bu nyid kyis na rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan no/ /rmongs pa'i glang
217a7(rgyud 'grel): po bral bas na/ /glang po'i pags pa'o/ /zhabs g.yas kyi gdan brgyad ni dngos grub chen po brgyad rnam par dag pa'o/ /mig sman ri lu/ ral gri gser 'gyur/ /bcur len rkang byug /sa 'og/ phyag rgya chen po'o/ /zhabs
217b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon rnams kyi gdan ni bya rgod la sogs pa brgyad ni dbang phyug brgyad rnam par dag pa ste/ 'dod pa rmongs pa/ khro ba ser sna 'jigs pa gtsang sme/ de che ba 'phra ma/ khams gsum gyi mnga' bdag nyid kyis ma he'i gdong pa can ni/ /rwa
217b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyis bden pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'o/ /mkhas pa chen po ta thA ga ta rak+Shi tas mdzad pa'o/ /u to pa ti dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mal gro blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra ma hA b+he ya ba tha lhan
217b3(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mun nag lta bu'i sku 'dzin cing/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can/ /gdug pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /bdud dgra khyod
217b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs bka' ni bsrung ba dang/ /gdug pa 'dul bar bya ba dang/ /thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /sgrub thabs 'di ni brtsam par bya/ /dur khrod dang ni chu bo'i 'gram/ /shing gcig dang ni mtshan gcig
217b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /dbang dang dgug sogs gnas der bya/ /dang por rang snying zla ba la/ /rang gi sa bon bsam par bya/ /'od zer bla ma rang lha rnams/ /gsal byas phyag 'tshal mchod sogs bya/ /tshangs pa'i bzhi yi bsam gtan ni/ /
217b6(rgyud 'grel): byams pas dgra thun mnyam por dmigs/ /snying rjes sdug bsngal bral bar bsgom/ /dga' bas thar pa thob par dga' / /btang snyoms yal bar mi 'dor ro/ /de nas stod pa'i byang chub bsgom/ /ra ba dra ba sbyar bar bya/ /ma yi bu
217b7(rgyud 'grel): las skyes ba la/ /sems kyi sa bon bsam par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsam gtan bya/ /de steng hUM las gsal spros pas/ /bdud dang 'gegs ni sel byed pa'i/ /rdo rje ra ba bla re ni/ /sngags 'di yis ni bsgom par bya/ /oM suM ???
218a1(rgyud 'grel): b+ha hUM phaT/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM phaT/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bAn bidyAya rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje'i sa la nam mkha' ni/ /b+ha ga'i dbyings su bsgom par bya/ /dbus su yaM raM baM dang laM/ /'byung ba
218a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de steng sum las ri bo ste/ /pruM las gzugs kyi bdag po bsgom/ /de yongs gyur las gzhal med khang/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa la/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pa dang/ /ka ba
218a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis yang dag spras/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor/ /shing brgyad kyis kyang mdzes par byas/ /tshig pa dang ni ma tshig pa/ /dum bur gyur dang ma gyur pa/ /'jigs par byed dang 'jigs pa dang/ /btsang chen gtsugs
218a4(rgyud 'grel): dang shing la sbyangs/ /band+ha pu ta li la sogs/ /shing brgyad la ni gnas pa'o/ /srin po ro langs mkha' 'gro tshogs/ /sha za'i gdong can brgyad po ni/ /bya rog 'ug pa tshogs kyis bskor/ /gzhal yas khang gi dbus su ni//
218a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i yi ge sogs pa la/ /zla bas brgyan pa'i chu skyes bsam/ /dbus su bzhi pa'i bzhi pa la/ /dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan pa bsam/ /de la ral grir gyur pa dang/ /ral gri lte bar de nyid bsam/ /de yongs gyur pas
218a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal bsam/ /gur kum mdog ni gzhon tshul can/ /ral gri g.yas la u ta pa la g.yon/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab mdzes pa/ /sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /de ltar byang chub lnga bskyed nas/ /ma
218a7(rgyud 'grel): las bskyed pa'i nyi ma ni/ /de yi snying gar bsgom par bya/ /de las 'od 'phros phyogs bcu yi/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la/ /rig pa'i lha mo khro tshogs kun/ /spyan drangs nyi ma la bzhugs bsam/ /de nas 'jam dpal de nyid
218b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gcig tu gyur/ /'od kyi gong bu de las mi /'bar ba dpag tshad brgyad stong khyab/ /de gyur sems kyi sa bon las/ /'od zer lnga ldan kha dog nag/ 'od zer spre dang bsdu ba dang/ /de gyur rdo rje gdengs pa ni/ /
218b2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog nag por gyur par bsam/ /de las 'od 'phros sangs rgyas dang/ /rgyal sras gtso bo la sogs kyis/ /nam mkha' i khams kun gang ba yin/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam/ /sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas/ /slar
218b3(rgyud 'grel): byon rdo rje'i gzugs la zhugs/ /rdo rje chen po yongs gyur nas/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs/ /ma he'i gdong can zhal dgu pa/ /phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi phub/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum brgyad gnyis zhabs/ /phaT kyi sgra can
218b4(rgyud 'grel): gsus pa 'phyang/ /gyan btsugs thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing/ /klu brgyad kyis ni brgyan du byas/ /'jigs pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar/ /ha ha zhes rgod lngags bskyod cing/ /'jigs pa'i khro gnyer
218b5(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'bar/ /'jigs pa'i spyan ni nyi shu bdun/ /tshangs pa brgya byin tshogs za ba/ /rtsa zhal ma he'i gdong can khro/ /rwa yi bar na gnas pa'i zhal/ /dmar po 'jigs byed khrag 'dzag pa/ /steng zhal ser po cung zad khro/ /ral pa zur
218b6(rgyud 'grel): phung lnga dang ldan/ /gzhon nu'i cho lugs 'char ba po/ /g.yas pa'i dra la rten pa'i zhal/ /dang po mthing kha 'jigs par byed/ /gnyis pa mdog dmar khro bo'i zhal/ /gsum pa ser po cung zad khro/ /g.yon pa'i ro la brten pa'i zhal/ /
218b7(rgyud 'grel): dang po dkar po rmongs par byed/ /gnyis pa dung ka khro bo'i zhal/ /gsum pa nag po ljags 'dril ba/ /g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis glang po che'i/ /pags pa brgyangs te 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gi rim pa bzhin/ /kar ta ri rang b+hi d+hi

219a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ma he glang bod dang/ /rnga mo khyi lug wa brgyad mnan/ /g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis go rims bzhin/ /bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang/ /seng ge khra dang bya rgod chen po dang/ /ne tso krung krung brgyad po mnan/ /'jam dpal ye shes

221b1(rgyud 'grel): gshed/ /'jigs byed chen po 'jigs pa'i skur bstan nas/ /mi bzang dus mdza' i bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /zhal gdangs khro gnyer smin ma glog ltar 'gyu/ /spyan bgrang mche ba gtsigs shing rab tu 'bar/ /rdo rje'i rta gang drag

221b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa zad bar rdub/ /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyag rgya 'bar/ /bdud bzhi gnon pa'i zhabs ni bskyang bskum gnas/ /'jigs byed chen po'i sku la rtag tu 'dud/ /dbu dgu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /g.yas kyi zhal

222a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /dbang med dang pas 'dus pa dang/ ye shes sprul pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /'khor bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /ji lta bur ni sprul gyur kyang/ /rnam dag dbyings
222a3(rgyud 'grel): las ma g.yas pa'i/ /mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa tat+tha sto tra/ bod skad du/ de nyid lnga ba'i bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM chos
222a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyings ma bcos mkhyen pa'i thugs/ /'jam dpal rgyu yi byang sems sku/ /ut pal ral gri rab bsnams shing/ /zur phud lnga ldan gur kum mnga' o/ /zla gdan la bzhugs ye shes kyi/ /sku mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
222a5(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bdud 'joms la/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas 'dren pa yis/ /'jam dbyangs thugs khros hUM nag po/ /dngos grub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje khros pas srid gsum sbyong/ /spro zhing bsdus pas
222a6(rgyud 'grel): ma he'i zhal/ /ljgags 'dril pheM gi 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /hUM(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI:I gsung 'jigs la phyag 'tshal/ /dbu dgu sum cu rtsa bzhi phyag /bcu drug zhabs can dpa' bo che/ /mig sman bdar 'dra'i sku mchog ni//
222a7(rgyud 'grel): //'jig dus mi 'dra'i gshin rje gshed/ /gnag dang dmar dang ser zhal dbus/ /dkar dang dung mdor gnag zhal g.yon/ /sngo dang dmar dang ser zhal g.yas/ /zhal dgus srid gsum gsol ba po/ /gri
222b1(rgyud 'grel): gug rtse gcig gtun shing dang/ /chu gri rdo rje dgra sta mdung/ /mda' dang lcags kyu dbyug tho dang/ /kha TwAM 'khor lo rdo rje dang/ /thod pa ral gri Da ma ru/ /g.yas ba'i phyag na rnams pa'o/ /thod pa mgo bo phub dang rkang/ /zhags pa
222b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang rgyu ma dang/ /dril bu lag pa dur ras dang/ /gsal shing phub dang me thab dang/ /ro snod sdig mdzub ba dan dang/ /rlung ras phyag g.yon bsnams pa'o/ /gnyis ni glang chen ko rlon gon/ /mi dang ma he glang dang ni/ /bong bu rnga
222b3(rgyud 'grel): mo khyi dang lug /ce spyang g.yas kyi zhabs brgyad gnon/ /bya rgod 'ug pa bya rog dang/ /seng ge khra dang mgo bo dang/ /sngags can bzhad bya brgyad po la/ /g.yon zhabs 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam nyid mi g.yo dur khrod rje/ /
222b4(rgyud 'grel): ltung ba'i lha gnyis sdig pa'i sku/ /sdig mdzub drang pos gdul dka' 'dul/ /go bzlog mnan nas rab tu gsol/ /ling ga langs shing rtog pa spangs/ /dpa' bo gnas na gnyis med rol/ /lha min kun sogs dbang pos
222b5(rgyud 'grel): btud/ /mun sel thugs kyi mngon gyur pa/ /rnam rtog gshin rje 'dra ba rnams/ /nyid rol pa yi rnam rtog gis/ /gang mkhan ral gri 'bar ba yis/ /mnyug ma'i gnas la 'gong ba'o/ /'jam dbyangs ye shes snying rje
222b6(rgyud 'grel): khro/ /ye ma srid gsum gdug pa sel/ /bu la ma byams gshe ba ltar/ /bcos ma'i khro byad khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /de nyid lnga pa'i bstod pa rdzogs so// / //na mo badzra b+he ra pA ya/ stong nyid las byung
222b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i dbyings na bzhugs/ /'jam dpa' thugs rje 'khros pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed ni/ /dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor zhing gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan/ /khro rgyal dus mdza' i me ltar 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhal dgu
223a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi zhabs bcu drug /mthing nag mi thung gzugs can gtsir bum he'i zhal/ /paM dang ha ha hi hi drag po'i sgra dang ldan/ /mi 'gyur 'jam dpal bde chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /drag po'i
223a2(rgyud 'grel): stobs kyis bdud bzhi 'jams mdzad gshin rje gshed/ /grub chen brgyad kyi dbugs byin skye med mchog sbyin mdzes/ /sems can re skong las mdzad byams pa thugs rje can/ /zag med bde rgyas mnyam mchog khyod la
223a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra b+hai ra bstun ti/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi thun sgeg po sprin 'dra'i mdog /'od zer gyi
223a4(rgyud 'grel): pa 'phro bas bzhengs/ /mtshan ma 'greng ba ma he'i zhal/ /gnyis med sbyor bcas khyod rgyal mdzad/ /byol song ma lus thams cad kun/ /bcu drug zhabs kyi thams cad mnan/ /brkyang bskum zhabs ni brjid par gnas/ /
223a5(rgyud 'grel): stobs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i pags pa phyag gnyis 'dzin/ /g.yas kyi dang po gri gug ste/ /gnyis pa mtshon rtse gcig pa 'dzin/ /gsum pa'i phyag gis gtun shing bsnams/ /bzhi pa chu gri
223a6(rgyud 'grel): bzang po 'dzin/ /lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig bsnams/ /drug pa'i phyag gis sta re 'dzin/ /bdun pa'i phyag gis mdud 'dzin te/ /brgyad pa'i phyag gis mda''dzin to/ /dgu pa 'gugs don lcags kyu 'dzin/ /bcu pa khyab
223a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jug dbyug tho bsnams/ /bcu gcig rtog 'joms khaM TwAM ga /chos 'khor bskor ba bcu gnyis pa/ /bcu gsum ye shes rdo rje 'dzin/ /bcu bzhi brdung don tho ba bsnams/ /bco lnga dgra gsong ral gri 'dzin/ /bcu drug
223b1(rgyud 'grel): cang ti'u gnyis med brdung/ /de ltar 'dzin la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /g.yon gyi dang po thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi gnyis pa tshangs mgo bsnams/ /gsum pa shes rab phub 'dzin te/ /bzhi ba bsgrub bya'i rkang pa 'dzin/ /lnga pa bcing don zhags 
223b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dzin/ /drug pa gzhu 'dzin thabs kyi don/ /bdun pa nyon mongs rgyu ma 'dzin/ /brgyad pa shes rab dril bu 'khrol/ /dgu pa rdog don lag pa 'dzin/ /bcu pa bri don dur khrod ras/ /bcu gcig gsal shing nyon mongs 'bugs/ bcu
223b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis srog don me thab 'dzin/ /bcu gsum pa na thod tshal 'dzin/ /bcu bzhi sdigs 'dzub bsdigs par mdzad/ /bco lnga 'phan bsnams dug gsum 'joms/ /bsgrub bya rlung skur bcu drug ras/ /g.yon pas 'dzin la phyag 'tshal
223b4(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i gdan/ /gzhal yas me dpungs dkyil na bzhugs/ /'jigs mdzad sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rgya ched mgo bo'i do shal can/ /dbu rgyan thod pa lnga lngas
223b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du 'bar/ /zhal dgu ba la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /spyan bzlog nyi shu rtsa bdun dmar/ /ljags 'dril zhal nas ha har bzhad/ /mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan/ /ma he'i zhal la phyag 'tshal bstod/
223b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ni bstod phyis? ? pa yin/ /rnal 'byor kun gyis rnyed dga' ba/ /'od 'byung dang cing gus bas zhus/ /don yod rdo rje mkhas pas byas/ /'di byas pa yi dge ba yis/ /kun gyis 'jigs byed zhal mthong shog /dpal rdo rje
223b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs byed kyi bstod pa/ /maN+Dal don yod rdo rjes mdzad rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ zhang lo tsa ba shes rab bla mas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsu sh+rI b+hai rab nA mastu te/ bod skad du
224a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal 'jigs byed mtshon gyi bstod pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /a la la he 'jigs byed 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /rngam byed rgyal po 'jigs pa'i rol stabs can/ /dur khrod
224a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas rol sku'i cha lugs ldan/ /tshangs chen khyab 'jug gzhon nu lha tshogs dang/ dbang phyug thag zangs ris rnams ma lus zhal du gsol/ /khros mdzad rngam khro ru lu ru lu ste/ /thod par bu mar khrag bcas zhal du
224a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /che phra na mang po'i zar bus 'grin zhugs brgyan/ /glang po che'i pags pas na bza' can/ /zhal dgu khros gtsigs 'jam dpal chos kyi sku/ /ma he'i zhal 'dzin byol song skrag mdzad cing/ /rwa mdog in+d+ra? hUM a'i?
224a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phro zhing/ /hUM dang cham dang skra chen 'jigs par sgrogs/ /zhal nas ljags 'dril he he he he dza/ /ston ka'i char sprin gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /nam mkha' i any+dza'i mdog 'dra sngon por snang/ /pad dang pad+ma rwa ga'i
224a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'dra gnyis/ /gser bsregs dang mtshungs cho ba'i yon tan ldan/ /shel dang dur 'dra zla bzhi pa'i tshul/ /sre ya ka ltar dung kha rab tu drag/ rgu ba bzhin khros byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /thod pa lnga bcu se ral khar bsnams
224a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rkang tshil khrag dang zhag bcas glo snying gsol/ /sri ka duSh+TAn hu na ma ra dza/ shA naM ti? puSh+Ti ma hA ma ra dza/ las rnams ma lus rdzogs pas mthar phyin pas/ /sems can khams rnams ma lus kun don mdzad/ /
224a7(rgyud 'grel): gri khug la sogs rdzogs pa'i mtshan mar ldan/ /dbu mgo chen po'i tshogs ni gyen du bsgreng?/ /yan lag rags pa'i lto ni thur du bshal/ /dzA dzA kai kai hUM hUM ha la ha/ ha ha ya ya ma ma ra ra zhes/ /tsa tsha las rnams ma lus
224b1(rgyud 'grel): kun mdzad pa/ /slob dpon skur dang de'i dkor khyer dang/ /kun la gnod byed dam pa skur ba dang/ /dam tshig dag la mi gnas sgrol bar byed/ /rdo rje ? dbyig 'jigs pa'i sgra dang ldan/ /mi dang ma he la sogs de bzhin bya rog 'ug /bya rog
224b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis gnon pa'i ku tsar bzhugs/ /ha la 'grin bzang mar khu chen po gsol/ /a shwa da la sogs shing dbus dgyes par gsol/ /spyang gi kang ka 'bar ba ci spyad dang/ /bya rog khra dang ma hA ru lu ni/ /bdug pa can
224b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams ma lus sha za ba'i/ /tshogs kyi phyogs ni de bzhin sprin ltar gtibs/ /de' dra'i dbus kyi gzhal yas khang pa na/ /tshul du bzhugs pas sems can 'gro don mdzad/ /rol mdzad thugs rjes sprul la phyag 'tshal
224b4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /bdug pa zhal du gsol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las rnams mthar phyin mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro tshogs 'jigs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ud la sngo 'dra'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma brgya yi gzi ldan
224b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'ga' zhig mtshan ni 'dzin cing bstod pa dang/ /de yi yon tan phyogs tsam gzung nas kyang/ /yid la gnas kyi gzhan du mi smra na/ /dngos grub gter zhing las rnams ma lus 'gugs/ /'jam
224b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'jigs byed mtshan gyi bstong pa/ /slob dpon las kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal gshin rje gshed po'i? rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa bzhugs/ //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ya
224b7(rgyud 'grel): mAn+ta ka badzra pa b+ha da nA ma mU la man trArtha/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed po'i rtsa ba'i sngags don rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam rgyal khro bo'i gsang sngags gang/ /
225a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud gzhan kun tu spas byas shing/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/ /rgya mtsho rgya dang rdo rje ltar/ /brtag dang 'da' dka' mi phyed pa/ /ded dpon nyi ma bcud len bzhin/ /'dren sel rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /dri za'i grong dang
225a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bzhin/ /sgo dang byin brlabs mdza' yas pa/ /ji ltar nam mkha' i ldang gi rigs/ /gcig kyang skye ba'i bye brag gis/ /rigs kyi bye brag rnam pa bzhi/ /de dag nang gi dbye ba yis/ /stong phrag nyi shu gcig la sogs/ /mdza' 
225a3(rgyud 'grel): yas bshad pa ji lta bar/ /rtsa ba'i snying po la sogs pa'i/ /gsang sngags gang yin rigs gcig kyang/ /yi ge bsdu dang gtor ba dang/ /de bzhin rab tu gtor ba dang/ /yan lag so sor phye ba yis/ /sngags don sgo bzhir shes
225a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sngags don de dag re re yang/ /rnam grangs sgo zhes bya ba yis/ /sgo mdza' yas par gyur pa ni/ /ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba'i/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis mkhyen pa las/ /nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes na/ /'jig rten pa
225a5(rgyud 'grel): yis smos ci dgos/ /'di ltar sngags don mdza' yas shing/ /byin rlabs bsam gyis mi byas kyang/ /thub pa bdag nyid chen po yis/ /gang gi don du gang sbyar ba'i/ /gleng bzhi'i dbang du mdzad pa bzhin/ /gang gis de ltar
225a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyar byas pa/ /de la de yi dngos grub dag /ngo bo nyid kyis myur bar gsungs/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdud rnams 'dul bar byed pa yi/ /khro bo'i mchog ni gshin rje gshed/ /las rnams grub par byed pa la/ /'khor lo
225a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba rnams kyi mchog /sngags kyi nang na rtsa ba ste/ /khro bo nyid yin mnyes byed cing/ /de yi bka' bzhin grub byed pa'o// //gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis/ /bcu bdun yin te lngar yang zhes/ /'di
225b1(rgyud 'grel): dag rab tu gtor tshul bshad/ /yang khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje thugs/ /ye shes rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /gzung 'dzin rnam shes dag pa'o/ /k+She/ zhing khams rnam par dag pa na/ /tshogs mchog gnyis las
225b2(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i sku/ /mchog tu snang bas snang mdzad de/ /lus dang gnas gzugs dag pa'o/ /mas chen gter gyi 'byung khungs bzhin/ /yon tan zad med gter rgyur bas/ /rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ste/ /longs spyod tshor ba rnam dge
225b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /me/ lhun po bzhin du brtan pa yi/ /chas mchog mi g.yo brnyes pa yang/ /chos 'od dpag med ston mdzad de/ /tha snyad 'du shes dag pa'o/ /da/ sbyin dang snyan smra la sogs pa/ /'gro don spyod pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bde
225b4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs mdzad don grub pa ste/ /'du/ byed dag pa'i bdag nyid do/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba kun/ /thugs sogs chos kyi bdag nyid de/ /de phyir mi bskyod rdo rje sogs/ /rgyal ba rnam pa ldang 'dod do/ /ya/ gzung dang
225b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa slong byed pa'i/ /ye shes zung mthar phyin pa ste/ /lha dman spong pa'i dran pa ni/ /bde gshegs kun kyang 'gug par byed/ /tstsa/ dpyod pa rnam par bral ba yi/ /ye shes shes rab mthar 'byin yin/ /yang dag spong ba'i brtson
225b6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus ni/ /rgyal ba'ang sems can don du 'jug /ni/ nges tshigs brjod pa mdza' yas pa/ /brjod pa bral ba pad mthar 'byin/ /rdzu 'phrul ting 'dzin mi g.yo ba/ /rgyal ba 'ang sems can don du 'ching/ /ra/ rdul bral rnam bar
225b7(rgyud 'grel): mi rtog pa'o/ /ye shes bgegs mthar 'byin pa ste/ /dang sogs dbang du gyur pa ni/ /rgyal ba'ang sems can dpang du byed/ /byang chub phyogs chos dang bzhin no/ /thar pa'i grong khyer sgo yin te/ /sgrib pa spong ba'i ye shes ni//
226a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo sgo skyong zhes bshad do/ /dza/ 'gro 'dzin shes bya stong nyid sa/ /byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid/ /gzigs pa rnam dag spyod yul phyir/ /sangs rgyas spyan zhes brjod pa yin/ /sa/ sems can kun du sdud khyed pa/ /
226a2(rgyud 'grel): snying rjes brlan pa chu yi khams/ /'gro ba bdag gir byed pas na/ /rgyal ba'i yum mchog mA ma kI/ do/ nyes pa sel byed shes rab me/ /dga' ba chen po'i bdag nyid de/ /dri ma kun nas dag pa'i phyir/ /gos dkar mo zhes
226a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa yin/ /ru/ khro dang chags pa gnyis med pa'i/ /btang snyoms ye shes chags med rlung/ /'gro ba gnas nas 'don pa'i thabs/ /sgrol ma zhes su rnam par bshad/ /stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang/ /shes rab dang
226a4(rgyud 'grel): ni thabs rnams las/ /rgyal ba 'byung phyir spyod yul phyir/ /'gro ba skyob phyir yul du 'dod/ /ni/ sna tshogs rnam par spras pa'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya'i mchod pa bla med pa/ /byang chub sems kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rgyal ba mnyes
226a5(rgyud 'grel): byed dam pa'o/ /yo/ gang zhig rab tu gdangs snyan glu/ /sgra yi mchod pa bla med de/ /bstan pa dam pa'i dngos nyid chos/ /mchod pa rgyal ba mnyes par byed/ /ni/ dri med rnam par dag pa'i dri/ /tshul khrims dag pa'i bdag nyid de/
226a6(rgyud 'grel): bla med dri yi mchod pa 'dis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed/ /ra/ khu ba bcud len ro phi mchog /ting 'dzin rab tu mi g.yo ba/ /bde gshegs mdzad pa'i bdag nyid do/ /rgyal ba mnyes byed dam pa'o/ /gzugs sogs
226a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /byang chub sems sogs 'dod pa'i mchog /longs spyod mchod pa'i rang bzhin 'di/ /bud med gzugs su rnam par brtags/ /lus dang gnas dang longs spyod las/ /sgrib pa kun du 'byung bas na?/ /'di
226b1(rgyud 'grel): dag tsam gyi zag bcas kyi/ /chos kun yongs su bsdus par 'dod/ /de dag nyid las bzlog pa'i chos/ /'bras bu dang ni don dam dang/ /lam dang bstan pa dam pa yis/ /zag pa med chos bsdus pa yin/ /gtso bo yum dang mchod pa dang
226b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin sgo skyong bcas pa yis/ /zag bcas zag med dbyer med pa'i/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus/ /gang zhig yi ge 'phreng ba'i don/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid du/ /bsgom dang bzlas la rtson byed pa/ /myur du
226b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i rgyud de/ /ya ni rdo rje gshin rje dgra'o/ /k+She ni rdo rje zhing ngo/ /ma ni rdo rje sa'o/ /me ni rdo rje lhun po'o/ /da ni rdo rje sbyin pa'o/ /ya ni rdo rje zung ngo/ /sku? rdo rje dpyod pa'o/ /ni
226b4(rgyud 'grel): ni rdo rje nges tshig go /rA ni rdo rje rdul bral lo/ /dzA ni rdo rje 'gro 'dzin no/ /sa ni rdo rje kun sdud do/ /do ni rdo rje nyes sel lo/ /ru ni rdo rje gnas med do/ /na ni rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs so/ /yo ni rdo rje gdangs so/ /ni ni rdo rje dri med do/ /ra ni
226b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ri'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rgyud de/ /rdo rje gshin rje'i dgra ni zhing dag pa'i rang bzhin no/ /rdo rje'i zhing ni zhing dag pa'i gzugs so/ /rdo rjes ni zhing dag pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid do/ /rdo rje lhun po ni zhing
226b6(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i chos so/ /rdo rje spyin pa ni zhing dag pa'i dpyod pa'o/ /rdo rje zung ni sgo dag pa'i dang po ste/ /'jug pa dang 'byung ba'i sgo'o/ /rdo rje dpyod pa ni sgo dag pa gnyis pa ste/ /gtong ba drang len pa'i sgo'o/ /rdo rje nges tshig ni sgo dag pa
226b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa ste/ /dpyod pa dang brtson pa'i sgo'o/ /rdo rje rdul bral ni sgo dag pa'i bzhi pa ste/ /sbyong ba dang sbyor ba'i sgo'o/ /rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni gnas dag pa'i gzhi'o/ /rdo rje kun sdud ni gnas dag pa'i bla gab po/ /rdo rje nges tshig ni sgo
227a1(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i gdan no/ /rdo rje gnas med ni gnas dag pa'i snang ba'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni longs spyod dang po ste/ /rab tu spro ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs so/ /rdo rje gdangs ni longs spyod dag pa gnyis pa
227a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /rab tu spro ba'i dbyangs dang tshig dag go /rdo rje dri med ni longs spyod dag pa gsum pa ste/ /rab tu spro ba'i dri sna tshogs so/ /rdo rje ro ni longs spyod dag pa bzhi pa ste/ /rab tu spro ba'i ro sna tshogs so/ /de la ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
227a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi yan lag gi rgyud do/ /rdo rje gshin rje'i dgra ni lus dang snying ga'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /nag po dang rdo rje ni kha dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje'i zhing ni 'tshogs ma byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dkar po dang 'khor lo ni kha dog
227a4(rgyud 'grel): dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje'i sa ni lte ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /ser po dang rin po che ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje lhun po ni mgrin pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ dmar po dang pad+mar ni kha dog dang
227a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje sbyin pa ni rkang pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje zung ni lag pa g.yas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dkar po dang tho ba ni kha dog dang mtshan
227a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /rdo rje dpyod pa ni lag pa g.yon byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /sngon po dang dbyug pa ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje nges tshig ni kha byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dmar po dang pad+ma ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje
227a7(rgyud 'grel): rdul ni gsang ba'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /ljang gu dang ral gri ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje 'gro 'dzin ni 'tshogs ma'i gnas su g.yas phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dkar mo dang 'khor lo ni kha dog dang
227b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje kun sdud ni lte ba'i gnas su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /mthing ka dang rdo rje ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje nyes sel ni mgrin pa'i gnas su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dmar mo dang pad+ma ni kha dog dang mtshan
227b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'o/ /rdo rje gnas med ni rkang pa'i gnas su g.yon phyogs byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /ljang gu dang utpa la ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs ni mig byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dkar mo dang me long ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo
227b3(rgyud 'grel): rje gdangs ni rna ba byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /dmar mo dang gling bu ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje dri med ni sna byin gyis rlob pa ste/ /mthing ga dang spos por ni kha dog dang mtshan ma'o/ /rdo rje ro ni lce byin gyis rlob pa ste ljang gu dang ro snod ni kha dog dang
227b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyis gsang sngags kyi rgyud de/ /ya rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i sa bon no/ /oM badzra ya mA ri rdo rje gshin rje dgra'i gsang sngags so/ /k+She rdo rje zhing gi sa bon no/ /oM badzra k+Sha tra rdo rje zhing gi gsang sngags so/ /
227b5(rgyud 'grel): ma rdo rje sa'i sa bon no/ /oM badzra ma hI na dri/ rdo rje sa'i gsang sngags so/ /me rdo rje lhun po'i sa bon no/ /oM badzra me ru/ rdo rje lhun po'i gsang sngags so/ /dA rdo rje sbyin pa'i sa bon no/ /oM badzra dA na/ rdo rje sbyin pa'i gsang sngags so/ /ya rdo rje zung gi
227b6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon no/ /oM badzra ya ma rdo rje zung gi gsang sngags so/ /tstsa rdo rje dpyod pa'i sa bon no/ /oM badzra tsar tsa na rdo rje dpyod pa'i gsang sngags so/ /ni rdo rje nges tshig gi sa bon no/ /oM badzra ni ru ka ti rdo rje nges tshig gi gsang sngags so/ /rA rdo rje rdul bral gyi sa
227b7(rgyud 'grel): don no/ /oM badzra rA rdo rje rdul bral gyi gsang sngags so/ /dza rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra dza g+had d+ha ra rdo rje 'gro 'dzin gyi gsang sngags so/ /sa rdo rje kun sdud kyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra sa ra ha ra mi? rdo rje kun sdud kyi gsang sngags so/ /rdo rje nyes
228a1(rgyud 'grel): sel gyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra do ra ti da/ /rdo rje nyes sel gyi gsang sngags so/ /ru rdo rje gnas med kyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra ru ni la rdo rje gnas med kyi gsang sngags so/ /Na rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra Na na
228a2(rgyud 'grel): ru pa/ rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs kyi gsang sngags so/ /yo rdo rje gdangs kyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra yo ya ge yaM rdo rje gdangs kyi gsang sngags so/ /ni rdo rje dri med kyi sa bon no/ /oM badzra nir ma la rdo rje dri med kyi gsang sngags so/ /ra rdo rje ro'i sa bon no/  
228a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra rA sa rdo rje ro'i gsang sngags so/ /gsang sngags kyi yi ge tshig 'di dag la brten nas/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo dang/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi yan lag rnams legs par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni yi ge rab gtor
228a4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas yi ge gtor ba yi/ /sbyor ba tshul bzhin bshad par bya/ /gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis/ /bsdu ba bcu bdun dag tu shes/ /gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la/ /gtor ba 'di ni
228a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /dang por ya zhes gang gsungs pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par byed/ /k+She zhes bya bas dgra rnams kun/ /zad par byed par gdon mi za/ /ma zhes bya bas de bzhin du/ /de dag myur du gsod par byed/ /me zhes bya
228a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ri bo yis/ /kun nas gnon par byed par bshad/ /da zhes bya ba 'joms pa ste/ /lus dang yan lag ma rungs byed/ /de nas phyi rol bshad bya ste/ /ya zhes bya bas de bzhin du/ /'jigs cing rnam par g.yeng bar byed/ /tstsa zhes bya bas
228a7(rgyud 'grel): bags pa nas/ /snying gi ma zar yang za bar byed/ /ni zhes bya bas lhag ma rnams/ /cung zad lus par mi byed do/ /ra zhes bya bas gzugs rnams kun/ /rdul bzhin du ni bsnyil bar byed/ /dza zhes bya bas dbang po rnams/ /rmugs par byed
228b1(rgyud 'grel): par gdon mi za/ /sa zhes bya bas yi dags bzhin/ /'khor nas 'khyam par byed pa yin/ /do zhes bya bas bzang po yang/ /dman pa dag tu byed par 'gyur/ /ru zhes bya bas khrag rnams kun/ /sbu gu'i gnas nas rmongs par 'gyur/ /na zhes bya
228b2(rgyud 'grel): bas thams cad du/ /rnam par 'dren par byed par bshad/ /yo zhes bya bas las dag la/ /kun nas sbyor bar byed pa'o/ /ni zhes bya bas de bzhin du/ /dbang po nyams par byed pa ste/ /ra zhes bya ba dran pa'i gnas/ /bral bar byed par
228b3(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa'o/ /sgrub par byed pas tshul bzhin du/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog bsgoms te/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun 'di/ /tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang shes pa/ /de ni ring po mi thogs par/ /gdug pa 'dul ba gdon mi za/ /gzhan
228b4(rgyud 'grel): yang gsang sngags yi ge ni/ /dpag bsam shing dang nor bu bzhin/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub byed de/ /sgra dang yid la byed pa yi/ /rjes su mthun par 'gro ba yin/ /ya zhes bya bas 'gugs pa dang/ /bskrad dang dbye ba sogs kyang byed/ /
228b5(rgyud 'grel): k+She zhes bya bas bsrung ba dang/ /gtod dang 'khrug? pa'i las kyang byed/ /ma zhes bya bas rmongs pa dang/ /bskyed dang shes pa'i las kyang byed/ /ma zhes bya bas bdag nyid la/ /gang yang dgos pa de sbyor byed/ /da zhes bya bas 'dzin pa dang/
228b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang 'dul ba'i las kyang byed/ /ma zhes bya bas de bzhin du/ /gang dag bstan pa de sbyor byed/ /tstsa zhes bya bas g.yo ba dang/ /'gro 'ong spyod pa'i las kyang byed/ /ni zhes bya bas 'gog pa dang/ /ma lus gdon mi za bar byed/ /ra
228b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas dga' ba dang/ /chags dang 'grags? la sogs pa'ang 'byed/ /dza zhes bya bas mig 'phrul dang/ /bskyed dang bsgyur ba la sogs byed/ /sa zhes bya bas bde ba dang/ /rdzogs dang sdud pa'i las kyang byed/ /do zhes bya bas ris? 'gro
229a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /sman la sbyor dang sel bar byed/ /ru zhes bya ba khro ba dang/ /chags dang kun nas sgra sgrogs byed/ /na zhes bya ba thob byed cing/ /mthong dang 'dod pa 'dren par byed/ /yo zhes bya ba gang dang gang/ /rigs pa kun la sbyor
229a2(rgyud 'grel): bar byed/ /ni zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin/ /'gog pa la sogs sbyor bar byed/ /ra zhes bya ba de bzhin du/ /'ga' dang chags la sogs pa byed/ /sgra yi rjes su zhugs pa yis/ /las rnams gang dang gang byed pa/ /yi ge gtor ba'i tshul
229a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /de dag mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/ /de nas bshad par bya ba ni/ /kun nas bsdu pa zhes bya ba'i/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul gang yin/ /mdor bsdus 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /thog mar brjod pa'i yi ge ni/ /ya ma rA zhes
229a4(rgyud 'grel): gang gsungs pa/ /yi dags bdag po bod pa ste/ /las la skul bar byed pa'o/ /dzA sa zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /rmugs shing 'phrul dang 'khor ba ste/ /rgyas btab nas ni rmongs 'gyur ba'o/ /de nyid myur du bskul ba ni/ /do me ya zhes
229a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa ste/ /gshin rje dgra yi gsang sngags 'dis/ /'bad nas bskul ba byas pa ste/ /rgyas 'debs rnams kyis rgyas btab nas/ /yi dags bzhin du 'khyams par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags tshig rkang dang po 'di/ /'gro ba rgyas 'debs
229a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'o/ /gnyis pa dag tu brjod pa'i sngags/ /ya me do zhes bya gang gsung pa/ /ma gdon bdag po bod pa ste/ /las la bskul bar byed par bshad/ /ru Na zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /lus kyi gnas rnams thams cad kyi/ /sbu gu'i
229a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnams thams cad nas/ /khrag kun yongs su 'dren par bshad/ /de nyid myur du skul byed pa/ /yo da ya zhes brjod pa ste/ /gang zhig gshin rje gshed kyi sngags/ /'bar nas zlos par byed pa des/ /ma gdon bzhin du 'gro kun gyi//
229b1(rgyud 'grel): khrag rnams 'dren par gdon mi za/ /gsang sngags tshig rkang gnyis pa 'dis/ /khrag 'dren rnams kyis khrag drangs nas/ /rmongs par bya ba la sbyor ba/ /gshin rje gshed kyi bka' yis so/ /gsum pa dag tu gsungs pa yi/ /ya da yo
229b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gang brjod pa/ /'joms byed bdag po bod pa ste/ /las la skul bar byed pa'o/ /ni ra zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis/ /dbang po gnas rnams thams cad du/ /nus pa nyams shing 'gog pa yis/ /dran pa bral bar byed pa ste/ /de nyid myur
229b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bskul ba ni/ /yak+She ya zhes brjod pa ste/ /gang zhig gshin rje gshed po'i sngags/ /'bad nas zlos par byed pa des/ /'joms byed rnams kyis bcom nas ni/ /brgyal bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /gsang sngags tshig rkang
229b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa 'dis/ /shin tu rmongs par byas par 'gyur/ /bzhi pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags/ /yak+She ya zhes gang gsungs pa/ /za byed bdag po bod pa ste/ /las la skul bar byed par bshad/ /tstsa ni zhes bya'i yi ge gnyis
229b5(rgyud 'grel): pags pa mig dang snying gi mthar/ /bzhi ba dang myang dang bza' ba yi/ /lhag ma cung zad ma lus byed/ /de nyid myur du skul ba ni/ /rA ma ya zhes brjod pa ste/ /gang zhig gshin rje gshed po'i sngags/ /'bad nas zlos par byed
229b6(rgyud 'grel): pa des/ /gdug pa za bar bya ba la/ /za byed rnams kyi za bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags tshig rkang bzhi pa 'dis/ /gdug pa za ba'i mchog tu bshad/ /bstan pa dag la gnod byed pa'i/ /gdug pa tshar gcod bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo
229b7(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni/ /gsang sngags tshul bzhin gang zlos pa/ /de yis gdug pa 'jig pa la/ /gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyal ba'i bstan pa la/ /kun nas dang ba'i 'gro ba rnams/ /de las
230a1(rgyud 'grel): phan gdags bskyab pa'i phyir/ /yi ge bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad/ /gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis/ /tshul bzhin bde ba bkod pa lam/ /gang dang gang du ya dang ni/ /ni zhes bya ba'i yi ge dag /gsal nas
230a2(rgyud 'grel): lhag ma brjod byas nas/ /'gro la phan 'dogs byed par bshad/ /ma ra dza zhes gang smos pa/ /mchi bdag las gso bar bshad/ /sa do me zhes smos pa ni/ /de la de nyid sbyin byed pa'o/ /dang por brjod pa'i gsang sngags 'dis/ /
230a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro la srog sbyin byed pa'o/ /gnyis par brjod pa'i gsang sngags gang/ /me do ru zhes smos pa dag /bdag la nyes par brjod pa la/ /gang dang gang ni med byed pa/ /na yo da zhes brjod pa ste/ /gsang sngags gnyis pa 'di yis ni/ /
230a4(rgyud 'grel): grags pa nyams pa gso bar byed/ /gsum pa dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags/ /da yo rak+She zhes brjod pas/ /gang dag ji snyed yod pa yi/ /nor rnams kun tu srung byed pa'o/ /gsum par gyur pa'i gsang sngags 'dis/ /longs spyod nyams
230a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gso bar byed/ /bzhi par gyur pa'i gsang sngags gang/ /k+She tstsa ra ma zhes brjod pa/ /dga' pa'i spyod yul phun gsum tshogs/ /yongs su srung bar byed pa ste/ /gsang sngags bzhi par gyur pa 'dis/ /dga' ba'i spyod yul thams cad
230a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /spyod par rang dbang thob pa ste/ /rgyal po chom kun me la sogs/ /'jigs pa dag las thar bar gyur/ /dad ldan sems can bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags bsdu ba bshad pa'o/ /de dag tsam gyis rtsa ba yi/ /sngags don kun nas
230a7(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /yan lag so sor phye ba yi/ /sngags don cung zad bshad par bya/ /gsang sngags kun gyi thog ma ru/ /phyag 'tshal yi ge gang bzhag pa/ /a ni gdod nas skye ba med/ /u ni byang chub
230b1(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed pa/ /de dag zung du 'byor pa yis/ /oM ni cho 'phrul 'byung pa'i sgo/ /aM ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub/ /de bas yi ge oM zhes bya/ /bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/ phyag 'tshal yi ge zhes bya ste/ /gsang sngags gang dag
230b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa yi/ /thog mar yi ge 'di bzhag na/ /rab tu bsngags zhes bshad pa yin/ /tha mar phyag 'tshal brjod pa las/ /ha ni mi phyed rdo rje ste/ /u ni byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /aM ni mngon par rdzogs byang chub/ /de phyir yi ge hUM zhes pa thugs kyi rdo rje brtan byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang bkra shis yi ge ni/ /sa ni yang dag mnyam pa nyid/ /ba ni sgra snyan yid 'od pa/ /a ni skye ba med pa'o/ /ha ni sdig pa sreg pa la/ /a ni bzhin skye ba med/ /de phyir swAhA zhes bya ba bkra shis phun
230b3(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa ste/ /swA zhes bya ba swa ti ka/ /hA zhes bya ba ro tu ha/ /bkra shis gzhi tshugs shes brjod pa'o/ /de phyir sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /mjug tu tshig 'di bsngags pa yin/ /de la sogs pa'i sngags tshig la/ /yi ge yan
230b4(rgyud 'grel): lag gang ldan pa/ /de dag bye brag rnams phye ste/ /chos don lha dang las rnams dag /bye brag so sor sbyar byas nas/ /yan lag so sor phye ba yi/ /sngags don bshad pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo
230b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa'i cho ga'i rgyud de/ /thog ma nyid du rang gi snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi'i sa bon du gyur pa/ /yaM maM raM dzaM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhi/ /byang dang shar dang/ /lho dang nub rnams su rim pa bzhin du sngon po dang/
230b6(rgyud 'grel): ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ /dkar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ /'od dang ldan pa bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge maM de las oM badzra maM spha ra Na/ /zhes bya bas bskul bas/ /yi ge maM de las/ ye shes kyi rdo rje byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
231a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du khyab ste/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ phyi rol dang/ nang gis thams cad la phog pas/ /de dag dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par bya
231a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ /dbyer med par gyur nas/ /ye shes kyis rdo rje de nyid dang/ /dbyer med par gyur te/ /rdo rje de nyid kyang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas yi ge dzaM de las oM badzra dzaM sa pha ra Na zhes bskul bas/ yi ge dzaM de las ye shes kyi chu byung nas
231a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/ /'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'dod chags dang/ bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ phyi rol dang nang gi chu thams cad la phog pas/ /dri ma thams cad dag
231a4(rgyud 'grel): par byas te/ ye shes kyi chu dang dbyer med par gyur te/ ye shes kyi chu de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas yi ge raM de las oM badzra raM spha ra Na zhes bya bas bskul bas raM de las ye shes kyi me byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
231a5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du khyab ste/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang phyi rol dang nang gi me thams cad la phog pas/ dri ma thams cad dag par byas te/ ye shes kyi me dang
231a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med par gyur nas/ /ye shes me de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas yi ge yaM de las oM badzra yaM spha ra Na zhes bskul bas/ /de las ye shes kyi rlung byung nas/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab ste/
231a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phrag dog dang bcas pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ phyi rol dang nang gi rlung thams cad la phog pas dri ma thams cad dag par byas te ye shes kyi rlung dang dbyer med par
231b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur nas/ /ye shes kyi rlung de yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dri ma thams cad yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid/ bdag dang gzhan gyi rgyud kyis dbyer med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /ye shes rang rig pa tsam sgyu ma lta bu chos kyi dbyings
231b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid du ro gcig par gyur pa ji ltar nus pa de tsam du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pas/ /de ma thag tu byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin de nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur to/ /nyi ma'i
231b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de yang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bzhin du dbus sa'i cha dgu dang ldan pa/ gru bzhi sgo dang ldan pa'i phyi rol khor yug kun nas zlum pa/ 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba dang ldan pa dang/ dbus kyi cha la yi ge ya kha dog mthing ga
231b4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyi 'phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o/ /shar phyogs kyi cha la yi ge k+She kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o/ /lho phyogs kyi cha la yi ge ma kha dog ser po 'od zer gyi phreng bas
231b5(rgyud 'grel): kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o/ /nub phyogs kyi cha la yi ge me kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba bsam par bya'o/ /byang phyogs kyi cha la yi ge da kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba
231b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i 'od las/ phyi rol nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu rab tu gsal bar 'phro ba'o/ /de nas shar lho'i cha la yi ge dza kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /
231b7(rgyud 'grel): lho nub kyi cha la yi ges kha dog sngon po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /nub byang gi cha la yi ge kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /byang shar gyi cha la yi ge ru kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /de'i phyi rol gyi grwa rnams
232a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ shar lhor yi ge Na kha dog dkar po 'od zer las kyi phreng ba can no/ /lho nub tu yi ge yo kha dog mthing ga 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /nub byang du yi ge ni kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /byang shar du yi ge
232a2(rgyud 'grel): ra kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no/ /'od zer gyi phreng ba brgyad po de dag kyang/ /dang po rang rang 'dri ba'i 'od zer las phyi rol zla ba'i 'od zer lta bur gyur pa'o/ /shar gyi sgor yi ge ya kha dog dkar po/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor yi
232a3(rgyud 'grel): ge tsa kha dog mthing ga /nub phyogs kyi sgor yi ge ni kha dog dmar po/ /byang phyogs kyi sgor yi ge rA kha dog ljang gu de dag kyang 'od zer gyi phreng ba can sha stag ste/ 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi 'od zer las
232a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol me'i 'od lta bur gyur pa'o/ /de ltar ji ltar nus pa zhig bsam pa byas nas/ /de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te/ oM badzra ya mA ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ /ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas/ nam
232a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' i khams thams cad du gang bar gyur to/ /yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i sku sha stag tu gyur te/ nam mkha' i khams yongs su gang bar bsam mo/ /de nas sku de dag thams cad 'od du gyur ba las//
232a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya shel lta bur dkar zhing dangs pa/ gru gsum pa gyen du gnas pa/ nang pad+ma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ nam mkha' i khams dang
232a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa zhig tu gyur bar bya'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje las kyang ye shes kyi rlung gi phung po chen por gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brten par nus so/ /de nas yi ge kshe las dmigs te/ oM badzra kshe tra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis
232b1(rgyud 'grel): bskul bas/ kshe las kshe'i 'od zer byung nas/ /chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya thams cad gang bar byas te/ yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yongs su gang bar byas
232b2(rgyud 'grel): so/ /de nas sku de dag kyang 'od du zhu bar gyur ba las/ /bdud rtsi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che pad+ma 'dab ma dang/ ge sar dang snying por bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ /gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du bsam par
232b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas yi ge ma la dmigs te/ oM badzra ma hI n+d+ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ma las ma'i 'od zer phyung bas/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng thams cad yongs su gang bar byas so/ /de nas yi ge de dag
232b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ /pad+ma'i snying po la 'dus par gyur pas/ 'od tu zhu bar gyur nas/ /rin po che gser gyi rang bzhin du kun nas 'khrig par gyur par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge me la dmigs
232b5(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM badzra me ru/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas/ me las me'i 'od zer byung nas/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su gang bar byas so/ /de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag /med kyi sku sha stag tu
232b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur te/ /pad+ma'i snying po gser gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la 'dus par gyur bas/ 'od du gyur nas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po lhun po rab tu brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge da la dmigs te/
232b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra da na zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ de las me'i? 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun tu gang bar byas so/ /de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur te/ de dag ri rab kyi rtse mor 
233a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa las/ /'od du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi longs spyod sna tshogs kyi gzhir gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ /ljon pa'i shing dang/ me tog gi shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/
233a2(rgyud 'grel): spos kyi shing dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang/ gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o/ /gser dang/ dngul dang/ shel dang/ baiDdurya la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyang/ /kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ reg bya dang
233a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i chu dang/ btung ba'i chu dang/ khrus kyi chu dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang/ dri dang ro dang/ yan lag dang/ gnas pas/ khyad par du byas pa'o/ /gos dang rgyan dang/ bza' ba'i bye brag
233a4(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang de bzhin du yon tan gyis khyad par du byas pa ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge dza la dmigs te/ oM badzra dza gad d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis
233a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul bas/ dza las dza'i 'od zer byung ste/ phyogs kun du gang bar byas nas/ /de dag kyang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku sha stag tu gyur te/ slar 'dus nas 'od du gyur pa las/ /gzhal med khang gi gzhir gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste gzhi sna
233a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje las grub cing/ phyogs kun du yang sna tshogs rdo rje ra ba dang/ dra ba 'ang 'khrig par gyur pa de'i nang du/ rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzhi grub par bsam mo/ /de nas yi ge sa la dmigs
233a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ oM badzra sa ra ha ra Ni/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ sa las sa'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun gang bar byas te/ de dag kyang mA ma kA'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ /slar 'dus te 'od tu gyur pa las/
233b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang gi bla gab tu gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdung dang/ phyam chen dang/ phyam dgu po dang/ phyam pran dang/ lan kan gyi dra ba dang/ rten ma dang/ gzer mig la sogs pa spras pa'i dbus na/ gser gyi
233b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnas pa/ phyi rol rdo rje gur gyis yongs su khrigs par gtams pa'o/ /de nas yi ge do la dmigs te/ oM badzra do ri ha ta zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ de las de'i 'od zer byung nas/ phyogs
233b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu gang bar byas te/ de dag kyang na bza' dkar mo sha stag tu gyur nas/ slar 'dus te 'od tu gyur pa las/ gzhal yas khang gi gdan du gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dang/ nyi ma dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas yi ge ru la dmigs te/
233b4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ru ni la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ru las ru'i 'od zer byung nas/ /phyogs kun tu gang bar byas te/ de dag kyang sgrol ma'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ /slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las/ gzhal yas khang gi rnam
233b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste phyogs mtshams rnams su rin po che snang bar gyur te/ shin tu 'od gsal bar gyur pa'o/ /rin po che snang ba de dag kyang gzhi rten pa med cing 'od sgrib pa dang chod pa med de/ /'dod dgur 'phrul ba snang ba sha
233b6(rgyud 'grel): stag go /de nas yi ge a la dmigs te/ oM badzra ya ma/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ /ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas/ /shar phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ shar phyogs
233b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgor 'dus te 'od du gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgo phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste/ sgo de yang sgo khang dang bcas pa/ sgo glegs dang/ thems skas dang/ rta babs dang bcas pa/ 'gro ba 'jug pa dang/ thugs rje 'byung
234a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i sgor gyur pa'o/ /de nas yi ge tsa la dmigs te/ oM badzra tsa ra tsa na zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas/ tsa de las tsa'i 'od zer byung nas/ /lho phyogs su 'phros te/ de dag kyang
234a2(rgyud 'grel): khro bo shes rab mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa las/ 'od du gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gtong ba dang len pa'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i
234a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo'o/ /de nas yi ge ni la dmigs te/ oM badzra ni ru ka ti zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ni las ni'i 'od zer byung nas nub phyogs su 'phros te/ de dag kyang pad+ma mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ nub
234a4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa las 'od du gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgor gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos sna tshogs bstan pa la spyod cing brtsen pa'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo'o/ /de nas
234a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ger la dmigs te/ oM badzra rA dza zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ rA las rA'i 'od zer byung nas/ /byang phyogs su 'phros te/ de yang bgegs mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sgor 'dus pa
234a6(rgyud 'grel): las 'od du gyur nas/ /byang phyogs kyi sgo de yang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgor gyur pa ni/ /'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang/ sems can yongs su sgrol ba la sbyor ba'i mthu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i
234a7(rgyud 'grel): sgo'o/ /de nas yi ge Na la dmigs te/ oM badzra Na na ru pa zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ Na las Na'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te/ de dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya'i lha mo'i sku sha
234b1(rgyud 'grel): stag tu gyur te/ slar gzhal yas khang gi khor yug du 'dus nas gzugs kyi mchod pa thams cad byin gyis rlob bar mdzad par gyur to/ /de nas yi ge yo la dmigs te/ oM badzra yo ya ge yaM zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/
234b2(rgyud 'grel): yo las yo'i 'od zer byung nas/ /phyogs thams cad du 'phros te/ /de dag kyang sgra'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag du gyur nas/ slar gzhal yas khang gi khor yug tu 'dus te/ sgra'i mchod pa thams cad byin gyis rlob par
234b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad par gyur to/ /de nas yi ge ni la dmigs te/ oM badzra ni ra ma la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas ni las ni'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs thams cad du 'phros te/ de dag kyang dri'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag
234b4(rgyud 'grel): tu gyur nas/ /slar gzhal yas khang gi 'khor yug du 'dus te/ dri sna tshogs kyi mchod ba byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to/ /de nas yi ge ra la dmigs te/ oM badzra ra sa/ zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ ra las ra'i
234b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer byung nas/ phyogs thams cad du 'phros te/ de dag kyang ro'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i lha mo'i sku sha stag du gyur te/ slar gzhal yas khang gi khor yug tu 'dus nas/ ro sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis rlob par mdzad par gyur to/ /de
234b6(rgyud 'grel): dag rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bsgom pa bshad pa yin// //de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /yan lag bsgom pa bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor khro bo'i dbus gnas par/ /sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i/ /
234b7(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa las/ /cung zad tsam zhig bltas nas ni/ /de las 'od zer spros bya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun tu/ rgyal ba kun dang de yi sras/ /rig sngags rgyal po rgyal mor bcas/ /yi ge 'od kyis
235a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs nas/ /snga ma'i gnas su thim bar gyur/ /de yis nyi ma sa bon bcas/ /nyi ma'i nor bu 'bar 'dra ba'i/ /ye shes 'od kyi gong bur 'gyur/ /chos sku dag pa'i rang bzhin du/ /gnyis med ye shes brtan pa las/ /
235a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskul ba dang/ /snying rje chen po'i mthus bslang nas/ /gshin rje gshed ni bzhengs pa bya/ /sku ni ri sngon 'dra ba 'am/ /yang na char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ sngo rang dag gam stang zil bzhin du/ /yang na las kyi bye
235a3(rgyud 'grel): brag gis/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser yang rung/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhabs kyang drug /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis bzhugs pa la/ /stag lpags rlon pa na bzar gsol/ /smin ma spyan dang skra yang ser/ /sen mo spu dang pags pa dang/ /lus
235a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /'bar zhing mtshan ma'ang rab 'bar ba/ /be con ral gri dgra sta rnams/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams ba ste/ /band+ha sdig mdzub zhags pa ni/ /g.yon ma'i phyag ni bsnams pa la/ /dpa' bo g.yas
235a5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang stabs kyis ni/ /ma he ro dang bcas pa brdzis/ /mi bzad 'bar ba'i skur gyur ba'o/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te/ /g.yas pas mtshon cha be con gdengs/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ /gang dag phyag
235a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi 'dod pa na/ /g.yas na be con ral gri ste/ /g.yon na ban d+ha zhags pa rnams/ /'di la sogs ba'i phyag mtshan ni/ /bcu gnyis dag gam bco brgyad dam/ /yang na brgya dang stong dag dang/ /'bum dang bye ba rdul snyed du/ /ji ltar
235a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dod par bsgom bar bya/ /ji ltar 'dod pa de nyid kyis/ /dngos grub thob par gdon mi za/ /de nas snying ga'i gnas dag la/ /sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin/ /'dir yang gnas par lta bar bya/ /
235b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas sa bon yaM yig la/ /sngon bzhin gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ /gshin rje'i dgra ru gyur nas ni/ /slar 'dus thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur/ /sngon po rdo rje mtshon cha can/ /snying ga'i gnas phyogs nyid du ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
235b2(rgyud 'grel): gdan la bzhugs/ /de nas sa bon gyis gang ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyang/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i thugs kar gnas/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ya mA ri/ /de nas ke yi sa bon de/ /snga ma bzhin du sngags
235b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskul/ /rdo rje'i zhing du gyur nas ni/ /dkar po 'khor lo'i mtshon cha can/ /'tshogs mar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sku yi rdo rje bzhugs par 'gyur/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra k+She tra de nas sa bon ma lam
235b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang gi gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ /rdo rjes zhes bya bar gyur/ /gser 'dra rin chen mtshan ma can/ /lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mnyam pa'i rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ma hI ?/ de
235b5(rgyud 'grel): nas me zhes bya ba la/ /gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje lhun po zhes byar bshad/ /pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba la/ /me tog pad+ma'i mtshan ma can/ /'gul par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /gsung gi rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /de la
235b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra me ru/ /de nas sa bon da zhes pa/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul/ /rdo rje sbyin pa zhes byar gyur/ /rin che marka ta 'dra ba la/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i mtshon cha can/ /rkang pa g.yas su nyi ma
235b7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /las kyi rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /de la sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra da na de nas dza la bltas nas ni/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje 'gro 'dzin zhes byar gyur/ dkar mo 'khor lo'i mtshon cha can/ /rdo rje zhing gi g.yon
236a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su/ /zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje zhing la gzigs par mdzad/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra dzA gad d+ha ra/ /de nas sa la bltas byas te/ /de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje kun
236a2(rgyud 'grel): sdud ces byar gyur/ /baiDUr rdo rje mtshan ma can/ /rdo rje ma yi g.yon phyogs su/ /zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje sa la gzigs par mdzad/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra sang tA ra Ni/ yi ge do la dmigs byas te/ /de nyid
236a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis bskul bas/ /rdo rje nyes sel zhes byar gyur/ /dmar mo lag na pad+ma can/ /rdo rje lhun po'i g.yon phyogs su/ /zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje lhun po la gzigs mdzad/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /
236a4(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra do ra hi ta/ yi ge ru la dmigs byas te/ /de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje gnas med ces bya ba/ /marka ta utpal shes rab mtshan/ /rdo rje sprin pa'i g.yon phyogs su/ /zla ba'i gdan la gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje sbyin pa
236a5(rgyud 'grel): la gzigs mdzad/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ru ni la/ /de nas na la dmigs byas te/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje sna tshogs gzugs su gyur/ /dkar mo lag na me long can/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
236a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan la ni/ /mig gi gnas su bsam bar bya/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra Na na rU ba/ /yi ge yaM la dmigs byas te/ /sngon bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul/ /lha mo rdo rje gdangs su gyur/ /dmar mo lag na pi wang
236a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ /mkhas pas rna ba'i gnas la bsam/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra yo ya ge la/ /yi ge ni la dmigs nas ni/ /de bzhin sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje dri med
236b1(rgyud 'grel): ces byang gyur/ /sngon mo lag na 'phreng ba 'dzin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par/ /sna yi gnas la bsam par bya/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra nir ma la tsa/ /de nas ra la dmigs nas ni/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis
236b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ro zhes bya bar gyur/ /ljang gu ro ldan zas snod can/ /mkhas pas lce yi gnas la bsam de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra rA se de nas yi ge ya la dmigs/ /sngags kyis bskul bas de bzhin du/ /rdo rje zung du gyur nas ni/ /
236b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po rdo rje tho ba can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /dpung pa g.yas pa'i gnas la dgong/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ya ma/ /de bzhin ci la dmigs nas ni/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje dpyod pa
236b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ /sngon po lag na dbyug pa can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /dpung pa g.yon pa'i gnas la dgong/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra tsa ra tsa na/ /de nas yi ge na la dmigs byas te/ /de bzhin sngags
236b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskul ba yis/ /rdo rje des tshig nas bya ba/ /dmar mo lag na pad+ma can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /mkhas pas rkan la bsam par byas/ de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra ni du ka ti/ yi ger la dmigs byas
236b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ /de bzhin gsang ba'i sngags kyis bskul/ /rdo rje rdul bral zhes bya ba/ /ljang gu lag na ral gri can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /gsang ba'i gnas la bsam par bya/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM badzra rA ji
236b7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgom byas nas/ /ci nus gsal bar blta bar bya/ /de nas snying rje chen po yis/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir khros nas ni/ /tsa ba'i gsang sngags lan gsum mam/ bdun nam nyi shu gcig brjod pas/ /khro bo 'bar 
237a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i ye shes las/ /'od zer yi ge mtshon cha dang/ /rab 'bar sku yang 'phros nas ni/ /de tshe sangs rgyas zhing yang g.yos/ /gdug pa'i tshogs kun bcom nas ni/ /sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang/ /yan lag mgo yi
237a2(rgyud 'grel): dum bu dang/ /ro dang yan lag nyams pa'i ro/ /mtshon chas phug pa'i khrag bcas pa/ /kun nas sbrin bzhin 'dus par gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas zhing 'di yang/ /mi bzad dur khrod chen por gyur/ /shin du rus pa 'bu dang rnag /
237a3(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang/ zhag dang glad pa dang/ /gsar dang rnying dang tshigs pa dang/ /dri yang phyogs su ldang bar gyur/ /ked rus dag las me yang 'bar/ /'bu dang sbrang ma mang po dang/ /kad ka rgod dang bya rog dang/ /sha la dga' ba'i 'dab chags
237a4(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /kun nas za zhing 'thab par byed/ /seng ge stag dang wa dang khyi/ /sha la dga' ba'i srog chags kun/ /de bzhin za zhing 'thab par byed/ /'byung po yi dags sha za'i tshogs/ /ma mo sring mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs/ /kun nas
237a5(rgyud 'grel): 'du zhing 'tsho bar byed/ /de nas sprul pa'i tshogs chen kun/ /sangs rgyas kun dang 'dres gyur nas/ /gshin rje gshed la thim par gyur/ /de nas khro bo gshin rje gshed/ /lus ni ri rab lta bu'i tshad/ /sku las khro tshogs rngam
237a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin 'phro zhing 'du/ /pho nya mdag gzhug mdag gzhug na/ /mgyogs shing rab tu mi bsrun pa/ /go cha sra zhing mtshon chas no/ /sde tshogs dpung gis kun nas bskor/ /'di ltar gang zhig
237a7(rgyud 'grel): sgom byed pa/ /de ni gshin rje gshed po dang/ /mtshungs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de la gshin rje gshed po nyid/ /dgyes nas dngos grub gsol bar byed/ /de la lha 'am ? kyi rigs/ /kun gyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /
237b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang gshin rje mang po dang/ /ma mo srid mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /skrag nas thal mo sbyar byas te/ /de yi mngag gzhug byed par 'gyur/ /'jig rten dag na gang gnas pa'i/ /'byung pa thams cad bran bzhin 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje
237b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo bsgom pa rgyas pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi/ /cho ga kun nas bsdus pa bshad/ /nyi ma yi ge ra las bskyed/ /yi ge ya yis mtshan byas pas/ /'od zer rab tu 'phro ba ni/ /thog mar rang gi snying gar bsam/
237b3(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur ba dang/ /me ni rab tu 'phro ba dang/ /rdo rje lta bu'i rlung ldang ba/ /'jig rten yongs su khyab par ni/ /mkhas pas rab tu spro bar bya/ /'jig rten rab tu bsregs nas ni/ /rdo rje rlung gis gtor byas pas/ /chos kun nam mkha' 
237b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bu yi/ /bdag nyid du ni gyur par bya/ /sngags pas de tshe bsam pa ni/ /chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /ming dang mtshan ma bral ba ni/ /blo gros brtan pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas snying rje las byung ba//
237b5(rgyud 'grel): snga ma'i gnas bzhin bsgom bya ba/ /nyi ma yi ge ya yis mtshan/ /mkhas pas gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /de nyid yongs su gyur pa las/ /gshin rje gshed du gyur par bya/ /zhal dang phyag sogs sngon bzhin te/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
237b6(rgyud 'grel): med kyang ? gdun? tsam la ni bsgom par bya/ /yang na sku dang lhan cig tu/ /mkhas pas rdzogs par bskyed par bya/ /rtog pa gzhan las gsungs pa bzhin/ /gdan la yi ge 'am mtshan ma rnams/ /gnyis gnyis dag gam gsum
237b7(rgyud 'grel): las kyang/ /bskyod kyang nyes par mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu mtshungs par 'gyur/ /phyag zhal kha dog mtshon cha sogs/ /mang dang nyung dang tha dad dang/ /de bzhin go rims 'khrugs pa yang/ /dngos grub 'bras bu mchungs par?
238a1(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /'on kyang bag med le lo yis/ bka' bzhin byas par ma gyur na/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu yis ni/ /dngos grub nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de dag tsam gyis rdo rje yi/ dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i cho ga rnams
238a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang bsdus pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /legs par phye ste bshad zin te/ /de nas las rnams sna tshogs dag /mkhas pas bsgrub par bya ba la /dkyil 'khor dag dang mi ldan zhing/ /ri mo la sogs cho ga dang/ /brtul zhugs drag po med kyang
238a3(rgyud 'grel): rung/ /legs par bsgom dang bzlas pa dang/ /sbyin sreg 'khor lo'i sbyor ba la/ /sogs pa'i sbyor ba phra mo la/ /brten nas mchod la brtson pa yis/ /las rnams sna tshogs grub 'gyur pa/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /khro bo'i
238a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i gsang sngags gang/ /rgyud gzhan dag tu sbas byas pa/ /gshin rje gshed po mnyes byed cing/ /thugs yin thugs las phyung ba ste/ /'di ni bklag pa tsam gyis kyang/ /phra mo'i gdon rnams skrag byed ni/ /gang zhig bzlas brjod
238a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson pa yis/ /gdug pa gdul ba la sogs pa'i/ /las rnams grub pa smos ci dgos/ /de bas sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyi/ /cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par bya/ /thog mar rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag /snga ma bzhin du bsgom byas nas/
238a6(rgyud 'grel): snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /sa bon bcu bdun gyis gang ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor la 'khor lo 'dra ba dag /snga ma'i bag chags kyis bsgom bya/ /de nas yal dmigs nas ni/ /rang gi sngags kyis bskul ba yis/ /khro bo rdo rje zung zhes
238a7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /'jig rten khyab par spros byas te/ /rgyal ba sras bcas spyan drangs te/ /gshin rje gshed du gyur nas ni/ khor yug yongs su gang bar bsam/ /de nas Na yo na ri yi/ /yi ge bzhi la dmigs byas te/ /rang rang sngags kyis bskul ba
238b1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /gzugs sogs lha mo spros nas ni/ /la la gshin rje gshed po yi/ /dbang po rnams la thim par gyur/ /la la phyogs bcu thams cad na/ /mchod pa la sogs cho ga byed/ /la la me tog gdug pa dang/ /mar me dri dang zhal zas dang
238b2(rgyud 'grel): sil snyan rdzas la thim par gyur/ /spyi ru byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /khyad par dag tu byin brlab pa/ /me tog dang ni mar me la/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje thim byas te/ /gzugs kyis khyad par phye bar bya/ /de bzhin bdug pa byug pa la/ /dri yi rdo rjes
238b3(rgyud 'grel): phye ba yin/ yon chab bshos dang gtor ma rnams/ de bzhin ro yi rdo rjes phye/ /sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs ni/ /sgra yi rdo rjes phye ba'o/ /spyi dang bye brag dbye ba yis/ /rdzas kyang de bzhin shes bya ste/ /lha mo'i lus nyid phul ba yis/ /reg
238b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'i mchod par gyur pa'o/ /de ltar ting 'dzin sa bon dang/ /sngags dang rdzas dang ldan pa yis/ /gshin rje gshed po mnyes byas te/ /rdo rje dpyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bdag gi lus la 'jug par bya/ de nas rdo rje'i nges tshig gi /sbyor
238b5(rgyud 'grel): bas shin tu brtan par bya/ /rdo rje rdul bral sbyor ba yis/ /shin tu dbang du gyur byas te/ bzlas pa la ni 'jug par bya/ /de nas snying kha'i sa bon rnams/ /rab tu gsal bar dmigs nas ni/ /ji srid brtan par ma gyur tshe/ /gsang sngags
238b6(rgyud 'grel): spro bar mi bya zhing/ /ting nge 'dzin 'bad de bzlas la brtsam/ /gsang sngags yi ge sum cu gnyis/ thog mar oM dang ldan byas te/ /tha mar phaT gnyis ldan byas pa/ /gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po ste/ /ma yengs pa yi nyid kyis
238b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /dmigs pa brtan par ma gyur tshe/ /lha dang yi ge zhes bya ba/ /dmigs pa gnyis las ma gtogs pa/ /rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya/ /de ltar ci nus bzlas nas ni/ /bzlas par gtong par 'dod pa na/ gshin rje
239a1(rgyud 'grel): gshed po zhes bya ba/ /bdag gis lus la phyung nas ni/ /mdun na dgyes bzhin bzhugs pa la/ /bshags dang smon lam btab byas te/ /de nyis du ni mi snang gyur/ /de nas rang lus la bltas te/ /chos kun skye med dran
239a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /bdag kyang de bzhin mi snang gyur/ /yang na lha dang mi dbye bar/ /bzod pa yid kyis gsol nas ni/ /lhan cig mi snang gyur par bya/ /de nas stong nyid dran pa yis/ /langs te rang gyi spyod lam bya/ /stong nyid blo dang ldan pa na/ /
239a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos/ /dngos grub dag kyang myur du 'byung/ /byang chub mchog la nye bar 'gyur/ /gal te sngon gyis bag chags kyis/ /tha mal lus su mthong gyur na/ /gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun po/ /snying ga 'tshogs ma la
239a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs par/ /'od 'bar gdan dang bcas pa dang/ /rang rang gi nas su bsam byas te/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig gis kyang/ /bsrung ba'i bsam pa ldan byas te/ /lus dang gnas ngad grogs po dang/ /rdzas la bltas nas bsrung bar 'gyur
239a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nyin re cho ga bzhin/ /yang na dus bzhir sbyor ba bya/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /gshin rje gshed po mnyes par 'gyur/ /de yi bka' nyan thams cad kyang/ /sgrub pa po la dga' bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'chag gam khrus byed dam
239a6(rgyud 'grel): kha zas za dang nyal ba dang/ /de bzhin spyod lam kun du yang/ /ji srid g.yengs 'gyur thams cad la/ /stong pa nyid dam bsrung ba'i shugs/ /nam kyang gtang bar mi bya ste/ /shugs btang na ni bsrung ba nyams/ /gal te shugs dang ldan
239a7(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ /glo bur yid ni g.yeng gyur kyang/ /bsrung ba bral ba ma yin no/ /nam zhig yid ni brtan gyur na/ /lha dang yig 'bru gsal ba'i tshe/ /de tshe g.yo ba brtsam par bya/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /'od zer yi ge 'am mtshan ma
239b1(rgyud 'grel): 'am/ /sku yi tshul gyis spros byas te/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa kun/ /bsdus nas bdag la thim par bya/ /gal te bsod nams mchog 'dod na/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can kun/ /'od zer tshul du bsdus pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la ?
239b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /sku gsum rdo rjer gyur par ni/ /'dod na gnyis ka'ang lhan cig tu/ /'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis/ /yi dam bcas pa rdzogs par bya/ /gal te sgrub par byed pa ste/ /bzlas pa'i grangs la mos pa na/ /rtog pa las gsungs ji bzhin du/ /yi dam
239b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rdzogs byas te/ /de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /gal te dus la dga' ba na/ /de bzhin lo grangs ji nus pa/ /dam bcas nas ni sgrub la 'jug /gal te sgrub par byed pa ste/ /shin tu brtson dang ldan pa na/ /mtshan ma thob la dam bcas nas/ /
239b4(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin shin tu gsal ba yi/ /mtshan ma thob par gyur pa 'am/ /gal te lha yi lung bstan pa/ /rigs pa dang ldan thob pa 'am/ /mtshan ma rab 'bring bye brag rnams/ /rtog las gsungs pa ji bzhin du/ /sgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya/ /sngags pas bzlas
239b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod bya ba'i tshul/ /legs par phye ba bshad zin te/ /de nas las rnams sna tshogs kyi/ /dngos grub cho ga bshad par bya/ /thog mar shes rab cho ga ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sngags pas bsnyen pa rdzogs byas pas/ /gtsang ma'i gnas
239b6(rgyud 'grel): su song nas ni/ /ras dkar gtsang ma'i gos byas nas/ /rin chen 'bar 'dra'i gnas la 'dug /khrus kyang legs par byas nas ni/ /mngar gsum ldan pa'i kha zas dang/ /sman dang ldan pa'i mar dag kyang/ /sngags dang ldan pa'i ci ran bza' / /mchod
239b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag kyang byas nas ni/ /snying gar shes rab 'khor lo dag /zla ba 'dra dang shel 'dra dang/ /de bzhin nyi ma 'dra yang rung/ /rtsibs bzhi'am yang na rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /bcu drug sum cu gnyis kyang rung/ /de la rang gi sa bon ni/ /gsang sngags yi ge
240a1(rgyud 'grel): sum cu gnyis/ /dkar po cung zad rtsa dmar ba/ /'od dang ldan pa bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li phreng ba yang/ /'khor lo'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /de yang 'phro dang g.yo ba dang/ /myur du rab tu 'khor ba rnams/ /ci dga' bar ni
240a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya/ /de ltar zla drug zla ba gsum/ /gcig dang phyed du bsgom byas na/ /blo gros rab tu rgyas bar 'gyur/ /de nas bsrung ba'i cho ga yang/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /shes rab cho ga ji bzhin du/ /sbyor ba legs par byas pa
240a3(rgyud 'grel): las/ /yi ge ya dang ni bsal nas/ /lhag ma'i yi ge bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yi/ /maN+Dal byas nas de stengs du/ /bum pa lnga ni bzhag par bya/ /de bzhin gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mthar/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba la//
240a4(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha rak+Sha zhes pa dang/ /swAhA ldan pa bzlas pa yi/ /bum pa yis ni spyi bor yang bsrung bar 'dod la dbang bskur bya/ /de ltar lan cig lan gsum mam/ /lan bdun gyis ni bsrung bar 'gyur/ /de nas bshad bar bya ba ni/ /'byung chen bzhi yi
240a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyis/ /las rnams sna tshogs grub 'gyur ba/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /gang zhig dbang du byed 'dod na/ /chu 'gram dag tu song nas ni/ /zla ba phyed pa 'dra ba yi/ /kha dog dmar po'i gnas la 'dug /zla ba phyed pa'i
240a6(rgyud 'grel): dus dag la/ /sngags pas sbyor ba brtsams bar bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin mchod pa byas nas ni/ /snying gar ya las byung ba yi/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom bya ba/ /kha dog sngon la rtsa dmar po'o/ /de yi
240a7(rgyud 'grel): steng du pad+ma ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab ldan pa/ /rtsel ba dan g.yo ba dag /legs par bsam par byas na ni/ /de yi steng du yi ge yang/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis go rims bzhin/ /kha dog dmar skyar bsgom par bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya
240b1(rgyud 'grel): mdun gnas pa/ /kha dog dmar zhing gos kyang dmar/ /myos bzhin thal mo sbyor byed pa/ /'di ltar bsam pa byas nas ni/ /de nas rang gi yi ge las/ /me tog las ni grub pa'i 'dam/ /rlung gi shugs kyis 'phangs nas ni/ /bsgrub bya'i dpral ba mgul
240b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /snying ga lte ba gsang gnas su/ /rgyun mi 'chad par phog par bsam/ /bud med la ni khyad par du/ /gsang pa'i gnas la phog par bsam/ /'di ltar sbyor ba brtan pa yis/ /brgya byin dbang cher grags pa yang/ /de la dga' zhing dbang
240b3(rgyud 'grel): du gyur/ /de bzhin lha dang bdud la sogs/ /bram ze rgyal po blon por bcas/ /kun nas dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /lha mo 'am ni gnod sbyin mo/ /mngon par shes pa ldan pa dag /dbang du bye ba sgrub pa ni/ /ring bor mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /
240b4(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen bsgrub par dkar ba dang/ /rang gi 'dod pa mi ldan dang/ /rags las grub pa'i gzugs can dang/ /mngon par shes pa mi ldan pa/ /dbang du bya bar dka' bar bshad/ /lha mo gnod sbyin mo la sogs/ /phra ba'i lus can mngon shes ldan//
240b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gi 'dod pa ldan pa dag /mthu che ba yang dbang 'gyur bar/ /rab tu dka' ba ma yin no/ /gal te bsgrub par bya ba dag /sngags pas dgug par 'dod par ni/ /sbyor ba de nyid bsgom byas te/ /lcag kyu rlung dang ldan pa dag /sa bon rnams
240b6(rgyud 'grel): las ngas spros te/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i snying ga nas/ /drangs te dgug pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /gal te bskrad par 'dod na yang/ /sbyor ba de nyid bsgom byas te/ /rlung dang ldan pa'i rnga mo dag /rab tu gnag cing mgyogs pa ni/ /rang gi sa bon gnas
240b7(rgyud 'grel): las 'thon/ /de la bsgrub bya bskyon byas te/ /myur du lho phyogs bzla bar bya/ /gal te dbye bar 'dod pa na/ /sbyor ba de nyid sgom byas te/ /sprul dang ne'u le mang po dang /rang gi sa bon gnas las 'thon/ /de dag bsgrub bya gnyi ga yi/ /so sor lus la
241a1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs bar bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya de dag kyang/ /sbrul dang sre mo'i rang bzhin du/ /gyur nas phan tshun 'thab bar bsam/ /sbyor ba 'di ni brtan pa yis/ /bsgrub bya dbye zhing 'thab bar 'gyur/ /de nas bsgrub bar bya ba dag /gnon
241a2(rgyud 'grel): cing rmongs par byed 'dod na/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa yi/ /snying gar sa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru bzhi ser po ma las byung/ /de stengs sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /rtse mo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan/ /de la rang gi sa bon yang/ /kha dog ser po ldan pa dag
241a3(rgyud 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis tshang bar bsgom/ /de nas de 'dra spro bya ste/ /bsgrub bya gang na gnas pa yi/ /steng du yang dang yang mnan na/ /skye 'gro mnan cing rmongs par 'gyur/ /gal te rgyas par byed 'dod na/ /sbyor ba de nyid bsgom pa las/ /de las cung zad mi
241a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dra pa/ /rdo rje gnas su rin chen bsgom/ /de la 'od zer 'phro ba yis/ /rin chen lta bu'i 'od zer dag/ bsgrub bya la ni thim pa yi/ /bsod nams yongs su rgyas par bya/ /gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba la/ /me yi dkyil 'khor ra las byung/ /rdo rje
241a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse gsum 'od 'bar ba/ /rang gi yi ges mtshan pa yi/ /rdo rje me ltar 'phro ba dag /gang dang gang du bsam pa dor/ /gsad pa 'di las bsngags pa yin/ /gzhan yang zhi bar bya 'dod na/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dza? las byung/ /zlum zhing dkar la bum pa
241a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shel dang 'dra ba nyi shus rgyan/ /de yi nang du yi ge'i tshogs/ /ya ni gsal ba nyi shu bsam/ /yi ge dag las bdud rtsi chu/ /'dzag pas bum pa gang bar bsam/ /de nas ma rung bgegs la sogs/ /rab tu gdug pa'i sems ldan la/
241a7(rgyud 'grel): de la bdud rtsi 'od zer dag/ kun nas thim par gyur ba yis/ /gdug pa'i tshogs ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /'byung chen bzhi yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi sbyor ba gang sgrub pa/ /so sor phye ste bshad pa yin/ /bsgom
241b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ni bzlos ba dag /gal te 'bad nas byas pa yang/ /skal dang mos pa dman pa yis/ /las rnams grub par ma byung pa'i/ /sgrub pa po la phan gdags phyir/ /sbyor ba la ni brten par bshad/ /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed pa'i/ /rgyal po ngan pa
241b2(rgyud 'grel): byung gyur tam/ /blon po la sogs de bzhin te/ /skye bo ngan pa'i tshogs byung nas/ /thabs gzhan dag gis mdul na/ /bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /byang chub sems dang ldan byas te/ /de tshe dag po'i
241b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba brtsams/ /gdug pa gzhig par bya ba'i thabs/ /drag po'i sbyor ba gang gsungs pa/ /rgyal ba'i bka' nyid bsrung ba'i phyir/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /spu gu rig par bya ba dang/ /gnad kyi gnas rnams gzir ba dang/ /byug dang
241b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ba la sogs kyis/ /rul sogs ma rungs bya ba dang/ /bskam zhing bsred ba'i cho ga dang/ /lus kun yongs su gzhom pa dang/ /byad kyis phog par bya ba dang/ /'khrugs shing myos par 'gyur ba yis/ /gdug pa brlag par 'gyur ba
241b5(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /cho ga mdor bsdus 'di zhes bya/ /de la spu gu rig pa yi/ /cho ga dag kyang bshad bar bya/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te/ /srog dang yi ge gnyis med par/ /kha dog lnga ru gyur byas te/ /sprang bu trai la'i mchu 'dra ba/ /bdag gi sna nas
241b6(rgyud 'grel): dbyung bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i pad ma las/ /skud ba 'dra ba'i spu gu nas/ /srog gi yi ge drang bar bya/ /de nas bsgrub bya'i rdul dag dang/ /rjes dang dri ma sna tshogs dang/ /grog mkhar sa sogs sbyar byas te/ /kha sbyar ldan pa'i gzugs brnyan
241b7(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /gzhan yang chu 'am dur khrod dam/ /'byung po gnas pa'i sa dag las/ klu 'am sa yi bdag po 'am/ /ma mo'i tshogs sam 'byung bo dag/ kha dog bzhir dag ldan gzugs byas te/ /rang rang gnas su sbas byas nas/ /chu mi hom dang de bzhin du
242a1(rgyud 'grel): sa dang me yi hom dag gis/ /tshim par byas nas des bzung 'gyur/ /de la spu gu rig pa'i thabs kyis chog ni 'di yin te/ /thog ma nyid du spu gu rig pa'i cho ga gang gis/ /bsgrub bya klu yis zin par 'gyur ba'i thabs
242a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /de la dang por sngags pas rdo rje dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms te rang gi snying gar yi ge'i tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pa dag srog ces bya ba'i rlung dang 'dres par gyur pas 'od zer kha dog lnga pa
242a3(rgyud 'grel): 'am bzhi pa sprang bu trai la'i mchu ltar/ bcud thams cad 'byin par nus pa rab tu sno ba gdug pa sna'i bu gu gnyis nas byung bar bsam mo/ /de bzhin du dmigs pa byas pas/ /rang gi snas de'i reg pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ting nge
242a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin de dbang du gyur na ni dang por rdzi rno bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbugs rdub cing drangs pas gzhan gyi ro dag kyang nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ de nas ting nge 'dzin de shin du dbang du gyur na ni/ /sgrub bya'i lte ba'i gnas na pad+ma kha sbyor
242a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbus/ /srog gnas pa'i rtsa skud pa 'dra ba 'dus pa'i rtsa na/ /srog gi rang bzhin yi ge a'i dbyibs su gnas pa ni rtsa kha dog dmar skar gnas pa zhig yod de/ de de bzhin du gsal bar bsgoms nas de nas bdag gi sna nas
242a6(rgyud 'grel): dbugs kyi 'od zer rab tu rno ba de dag phyung ste/ /bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i ba spu'i bu ga nas zhugs nas/ /spu gu skud pa 'dra ba'i nang du zhugs te srog gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge la zug nas /yi ge
242a7(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad gzhibs te/ yi ge nyid kyang blangs nas drangs pas/ /dper na pags pa rlon pa las byas pa'i snod zhabs nas then nas slog pa bzhin du/ /sog gi gnas pad+ma kha sbyar te nang phyir bzlog par gyur par byas nas
242b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu drangs par byas na sbyor ba de 'ba' zhig gis kyang/ gang su yang rung ste de 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ sbyor ba dang bcas pa brtsam par bya ste/ thog ma nyid du ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyang 'bad pas goms par byas nas/
242b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyang byas la/ de nas bsgrub bya de'i rkang rdzas kyis dang/ phyi sa che chung gi rjes dag dang/ gzhan yang mtshil ma dang/ skra dang gos kyi dum bu dag dang/ gzhan yang de'i khyim gyi sa dang/ them pa rtsa'i sa dag ji ltar rnyed
242b3(rgyud 'grel): pa blangs te/ grog mkhar gyi sa dang/ 'bru sna tshogs kyi phye dang/ sa bzang po gzhan dag dang sbyar te/ legs bar btag nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa zhig bya'o/ de nas grog 'am/ 'dab ma gang yang rung ba la pad+ma kha sbyor
