290b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /lag pa g.yon pas dgab par bya/ /de ltar rab tu 'bad par bya/ /de tshe nam gyi tha ma la/ /'bar bar gyur na nam mkhar 'gro/ sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin rnams kyis bkur bar 'gyur/ /gal te du ba byung gyur na/ /de yi
290b3(rgyud 'grel): lus ni sbed bar 'gyur/ /gal te dro bar gyur na yang/ /rkang 'gyogs stobs dang ldan pa 'grub/ /de tshe 'grub par ma gyur kyang/ /phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /bkra shis phun sum tshogs 'gyur zhing/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong
290b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu/ /myur du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur/ /gal te bsgrub pa dman pa yis/ /de dag bsgrub par mi nus na/ /'o ma bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /sngags pa brtul zhugs spyad pa yis/ /zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/ /ba bzangs dag las byung ba
290b5(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /'o ma snod bzangs ldan pa dang/ /lag pa g.yon pas bkab nas ni/ /ma btang bar du bzlas pa bya/ /zla ba gza' yis ma btang bar/ /de tshe zho du gyur na ni/ /'thungs pas shes rab dngos grub thob/ /gal te zho ru ma gyur kyang/ /'thungs
290b6(rgyud 'grel): nas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzhon nu brtul zhugs ldan pa yis/ /dngos grub bzang po grub pa dag /kun nas sbyor ba bshad zin te/ /'di ni gzhon nu brtul zhugs dang/ /ri mo dang dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
290b7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bshad pa yin te/ /'phags pa su sid+d+hi ka ra la sogs pa las rgya cher bshad pas cho ga mdo tsam bshad par bya'o/ /re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bru drug pa zhes bya ba legs par mnos shing gnas
291a1(rgyud 'grel): ba thob pas khrus gyi cho ga dang/ /mchod pa dang bzlas brjod kyi sgo nas bsnyen pa byas pa/ dkyil 'khor dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar brtul shugs brtsams pas/ /ral gri dang tri shUl dang/ be con la sogs pa'i mtshon
291a2(rgyud 'grel): cha'i dngos grub la sbyor ba dang/ ldong ros dang any+dza na dang ri lu la sogs pa rdzas kyi dngos grub la sbyor ba'i tshe/ /bdag bas pa'i rim pa dang/ lha bsam pa'i rim pa dang/ de dag gi sngags dag dang/ khrus la sogs pa'i bya ba la sbyor pa'i
291a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags dag gsal bar ma bstan pas de dag brjod par bya'o/ /dang por phyi nang gi khrus byas nas sngags kyi khang par zhugs te/ stan la mtshon cha'i sngags kyis btab la 'dug ste/ /dang por ches thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dag par
291a4(rgyud 'grel): bsam mo/ /de nas snying rje chen po'i blos bskyed de/ rang gi snying gar snying po'i gsang sngags bzhag par bya'o/ /de la gsang sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM mu /de nas 'tshogs mar 'tshogs ma'i gsang sngags bzhag par bya ste/ oM mu mu zhes
291a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni gsang sngags so/ /de bzhin du spyi gtsug tu/ oM a'iM mu zhes bya ba bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas snying ga dang/ dpung mgo gnyis dang/ /mgrin pa dang dpral ba rnams su/ /oM oM mu swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i go cha'i gsang sngags 'di bgod
291a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de nas lag pa dag dang mig dag tu oM sum mu zhes bya ba mtshon cha'i sngags 'di bzhag par bya ste/ yi ge 'di dag kyang 'od 'bar bar bsgom par bya'o/ /des bdag 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid du gyur pa yin par nga rgyal bya ste/ de nas bdag
291a7(rgyud 'grel): gi mdun du yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma de nyid/ /yi ge oM las 'dab ma stong dang ldan zhing 'od 'bar ba'i steng du oM mu zhes bya ba las 'jam dpal gzhon nu gser btso ma lta bu utpal dang mchog spyin can bskyed par bya ste/
291b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying ga la sogs par snying po la sogs pa'i yan lag lnga ba'i gsang sngags dag kyang/ bdag nyid la bkod pa bzhin du 'dir yang dag par bya'o/ /gzhan yi ge oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ zhes bya ba rtsa ba'i gsang sngags las kyang/ /'jam dpal
291b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku dung dang me tog kun da'i kha dog lta bu zhig bskyed par bya ste/ de nas snying po'i sngags kyis spyan drangs ba byas nas bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin du mchod par bya ste/ mtshon cha'i sngags kyis nor bu blangs nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
291b3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de yang mi myur mi bul zhing lha dang gsang sngags la sems pa ma gtogs par/ yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/ ji srid yid mi skyo ba'i bar du bzlas nas gtong par 'dod pa na/ /bzlas pa de yang grangs kyi rnam pa yid la
291b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pas lha la phul te snying po'i sngags kyi gshegs su gsol/ /bdag nyid yan lag lnga pa'i sngags kyis bsrung nas cung zad dbugs phyung ste/ bsod nams kyi las gzhan dag bya'o/ /'di ni re zhig gzhon nu brtul shugs kyi sgo nas dngos
291b5(rgyud 'grel): grub bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba bstan pa yin no/ /gang dag bzlas pa la mi dga' zhing bsgom pa la mos pa rnams kyis 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste/ 'di yang gzhan du rgya cher bshad pas rtsa ba'i 'khor lo 'ga' zhig bshad par bya'o/ /de la 'khor
291b6(rgyud 'grel): lo bsgom par 'dod pas mchod pa byas pa'i rjes la/ snying gar zla ba lta bu'i 'khor lo yang zhing srab la dang zhing chung ba/ rtsibs brgyad pa snying po brtsegs pa lta bu khor yug kun nas zlum pa zhig bsam par bya'o/ /'khor lo'i phyogs bzhir
291b7(rgyud 'grel): dag thams cad kyi rtsa ba yi ge 'bru bzhi bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar oM AM i uM rnams bsam mo/ /mtshams bzhir bA gi shwar zhes bya ba bsams de de ltar rtsibs brgyad la yi ge 'bru brgyad kha dog dkar zhing 'od gsal ba ma rig pa'i
292a1(rgyud 'grel): mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa blos dus gcig tu gsal bar bsgom par bya'o/ /snying po la ni yi ge mu rab tu 'od 'bar ba bsams te/ de'i 'od zer gyis yi ge dang 'khor lo dang bdag gi lus thams cad gsal ba/
292a2(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyang dag cing gsal bar ji ltar nus pa bsam bya'o/ /gtor bar 'dod pa na chos thams cad kyang rang gi sems snang ba tsam ste sems ni shes rab kyi 'khor lor gyur cing snang la ji ltar 'khor lo dang zhing
292a3(rgyud 'grel): gsal la zhi ba bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang spros pa rab tu zhi zhing rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal te/ mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad dang bral bar bsams te/ de bzhin du mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /de las ldang bar 'dod na snying rje'i
292a4(rgyud 'grel): sems skyes par bsam te/ 'gro ba'i don bya ba'i bsam pas langs te spyod lam dag 'tsham par bya'o/ /gzhon nu'i brtul shugs la brten pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa
292a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa rgya che bdag las mdor bsdus te bstan pa rdzogs so// //de nas 'jam rgyal khro bo yi/ /brtul zhugs la sogs bstan par bya/ /bsnyen pa legs byas de 'og tu/ /khro bo'i brtul zhugs
292a6(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par bya/ /skra ni lhug par bshig byas shing/ /bzhin yang rnam par bsgyur byas te/ /be con ral gri tri shUl sogs/ /lag pa g.yas kyis bzung bar bya/ /sdigs mdzub dag dang ldan par bya/ /smyung ba la yang gnas bzhin du/ /khro bo yid
292a7(rgyud 'grel): la dran byed cing/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /gtam gzhan smra bar mi bya ste/ /khro bo dran pa ma gtogs pa/ /'jigs dang chags pa spang bar bya/ /tha mal mi dang mi 'grogs par/ /gcig bu khyad par lam nas rgyu/ /'di ltar zla
292b1(rgyud 'grel): drug spyad nas ni/ /bsgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya/ /dur khrod dben pa la sogs par/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po khyad par can/ /dur khrod thal ba 'am de ldan par/ /legs par bri bar bya ba ni/ /sgo bzhir ldan zhing grwa bzhir ldan/ /snying po ri mig dgu pa la//
292b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu bdun legs par dgod/ /de yi dbus su gshin rje gshed/ /dur khrod ras la bris pa ni/ /mi bzad rab tu 'bar ba bzhag/ de yi mdun du be con dang/ /ral gri tri shul la sogs pa/ /ji ltar sngon du brjod pa bzhin/ /legs par brgyan te
292b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhag par bya/ /sngags pa lha yi 'byor ldan pas/ /gshin rje gshed po spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa'i cho gas mnyes byas nas/ /de nas bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /grub pa'i mtshan ma thog gyur na/ /dngos grub sngon dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ /de dag phyi rol
292b4(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs kyi/ /sbyor ba bcas pa bshad pa yin/ /de nas bshad par bya ba ni/ /de las mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /smyung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos/ /kha zas dag kyang bsdam mi dgos/ /phyag rgya sngags dang bsam pa dag/ snga ma bzhin du bsgrub nas ni//
292b5(rgyud 'grel): sha chen za zhing khrag chen mthung/ /ba lang khyi sha de bzhin te/ /rta dang glang po la sogs pa'i/ /sha rnams rjen par bza' bar bya/ /khrag dang chang du sbyar ba yi/ /de bzhin bag dang ldan par btung/ /gshang gci khrag la sogs pa yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga
292b6(rgyud 'grel): po za byed cing/ /de bzhin lus kyang byug par bya/ /skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs su/ /khro bo'i gang mo drag por rgod/ /kun la bsdigs shing nyam nga med/ /'di ltar zla drug bsgrubs nas ni/ /bsgrub pa la ni 'jug par bya/ /mtshan mo dur khrod dben par
292b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris te/ /de bzhin sku gzugs bzhag par bya/ /mtshon cha la sogs de bzhin te/ /ci dga' ba dag bzhag nas ni/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /gshin rje gshed pa spyan drangs te/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi
293a1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /nyin re rtag tu mchod byas nas/ /bzlas pa la ni rnam par 'bad/ /de ltar rab tu brtson pa la/ /cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang/ /mnyams bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /de la gshin rje gshed po nyid/ /rgod cing
293a2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub stsol bar byed/ /yang na mtshon cha 'bar ba dang/ /'bar dang du ba dro ba 'byung/ /gal te grub par ma gyur yang/ /las rnams grub pa gdon mi za/ /'di ni brtul zhugs mchog ldan pas/ /dngos grub sgrub par byed pa la/ /dpa' bo
293a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis bsgrub bya ba/ /thun mongs min pa bshad pa yin/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i brtul zhugs spyad pas/ /dngos grub chen po rnams bstan pa las brtul zhugs kyang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /'di ltar
293a4(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol dang nang gi'o/ /de la phyi rol ni smyur ba dang bcas shing phyi rol gyi bya ba srung ba dang bcas pa'o/ /nang gi ni phyi rol gyi smyung ba la gnas pa dang bsrung ba phra mo dag med de/ rnal 'byor pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas mi la sogs pa'i sha rnam
293a5(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga dang/ bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga la rol cing phyi rol gyi bya ba la nyam nga ba med pa'i spyod pa'o/ /de gnyis ka'i thun mong lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas lha'i cha lugs 'dzin cing/ gsang sngags kyi bzlas pa dang lha yid la byed pa dang ldan
293a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dag ni mtshungs par shes par bya'o/ /de la re zhig lus kyi spyod pa ni gos med pa 'am yang na stag gi pags pa la sogs pa 'am dur khrod kyi thal ba 'am khrag lta bus bsgos pa'i ras gon pa dang/ skra spyi 'or bcing ba 'am/ lhug par
293a7(rgyud 'grel): bshig pa 'am/ lus dur khrod kyi sol ba 'am thal ba la sogs pas byug pa 'am/ bzhin rnam par bsgyur ba dang/ dbugs 'bud pa dang/ /lag pa g.yas par mtshon cha be con dang/ ral gri dang tri shul la sogs pa gang yang rung/
293b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtshon cha thogs pa dang/ g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub dang ldan pas dung chen po la sogs pa'i 'phreng ba thogs pa dang/ skye bo med pa'i lam du rgyu zhing phrad pa dag la yang lam mi 'dzur zhing/ /phyag mi 'tshal ba dang/ mtshan mo yang dur khrod la
293b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs byis pa rnams nyam nga ba'i gnas su gnas shing rgyu bar byed pa ni khro bo chen po lus kyi brtul zhugs so/ /rtag tu gsang sngags zlos shing tshig tha mal pa dag mi smra ba dang/ gal te bdud kyi rigs dag yid du 'ong ba 'am mi 'ong ba dag
293b3(rgyud 'grel): sprul nas/ /spro ba'i tshig dag gis dbugs 'byin tam ma rungs pa'i tshig gis skrag par byed kyang lan smra bar mi byed ba ni dag gi brtul zhugs so/ /rtag tu bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po 'ba' zhig sems par byed cing/ rtog pa
293b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yongs su 'der ba dang/ rang gi lha ma gtogs pa gzhan gang la yang ma chags shing/ /rtag tu rang gi lha la sems dang ba dang/ gzugs mi sdug ba dag snang bar gyur cing sgra mi snyan pa dag thos kyang sems nyam nga ba med cing/ /de bzhin du
293b5(rgyud 'grel): yid du 'ong ba'i yul dgra snang bar gyur kyang/ /g.yeng zhing chags par mi 'gyur bar blo rab tu brtan par gnas pa ni yid kyi brtul zhugs so/ /brtul zhugs rnam pa 'di gsum dang ldan par spyad pa ni phyi dang nang gnyis ka la thun mong du 'gyur ro/
293b6(rgyud 'grel): de la khyad par ni 'di yin te phyi rol gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin pas ni kha zas mi bza' bar smyung ba la gnas pas dus gsum du khrus bya'o/ /ltog par gyur na yang ba lang gi lci ba bza' 'o/ /des lus gnas par ma nus na ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar te
293b7(rgyud 'grel): btung bar bya'o/ /yang na ba'i rnam lnga legs par sbyar te btung bar bya'o/ /de la legs par sbyar ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dang po ba lang gi lci ba dang gcin du sbyar te/ legs par mnyes nas cung zad cig bzhag par bya'o/ /de nas steng gi dangs
294a1(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ zhabs kyi snyigs ma gnyis bzhag ste/ cha bar ma ska sla ran par blangs te der ba'i 'o ma dang ba'i mar dang ba'i kha chu rnams dang spyang te legs par bsdus nas dus dus su btang bar bya'o/ /gal te de ltar mi nus pa dag
294a2(rgyud 'grel): gis kyang dkar gsum la sogs te/ zas gtsang zhing bsngags pa zos nas khrus legs par byas te brtul zhugs spyad par bya'o/ dang/ nyi ma gung dang rgongs nyal ka rnam pa gsum dang/ nyi ma gung dang rgongs nyal ka rnam pa gsum
294a3(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /lhag pa'i dus ni sa chen po byas pa'i dus su lus thams cad bkru bar bya'o/ /sa chung du dang snabs 'dod ba dag la ni/ kha dang lag pa gnyis bkru bar bya'o/ /stod smad kyi spugs ngan pa brgyus pa dang/ lung pa 'dor ba dang/ kha zas za ba
294a4(rgyud 'grel): dang thos pa'i rjes rnams su ni kha tsam bkru bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang bag bya bar 'os pa sangs rgyas kyis ma gnang ba dag kyang srung bar bya ste/ 'di ni phyi rol gyi brtul zhugs kyi mtshan nyid thun med ma yin pa'o/ /de la nang gi brtul zhugs
294a5(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ /smyung ba la gnas pa med cing khrus med pa/ /kha zas bsdams pa med cing gtsang sme med par 'bral ba dang/ dam tshig gi zas su gyur ba mi dang/ glang po che dang rta dang ba lang dang khyi sha rnams rjen
294a6(rgyud 'grel): par za ba dang/ snang mdzad dang/ dri chu dang/ sa bon dang pad+ma rak+ta dang/ sha chen po zhes bya ba bdud rtsi lnga bo rnams za zhing las bya ba gang la yang 'dzem dang mi 'dzem pa zhes bya ba gnyis kyi bsam pa dang/ /spyod pa dang bral bas
294a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas par byed cing brtul zhugs spyod par byed ba ni nang gi mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar brtul zhugs zla ba drug spyang nas bsgrub pa la 'jug par gsungs te/ brtul zhugs spyod pa'i sngon rol du ni/ dus nges pa dang/ grangs nges pa dang/ mtshan ma  
294b1(rgyud 'grel): thob ba zhes bya ba'i bsnyen pa rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba la sbyar dgos so zhes shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa dang brtul zhugs dang ldan pas bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya ste/ re zhig 'byor pa bzang po la dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su song ste/
294b2(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod kyi thal bas ji skad gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtshan mo bri bar bya'o/ /de la 'dir re zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor re mig dgu dang ldan pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa/ de'i steng
294b3(rgyud 'grel): du sna tshogs pad+ma bdab ma brgyad dam bcu drug gam brgya'am stong la sogs pa ci dga' ba bri bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor de'i phyi rol du grwa bzhi dang/ sgo bzhi dang rta babs dang bcas pa yang bri bar bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol khor yug tu 'khor lo rtsibs
294b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu song gi rtse mo la rdo rje 'bar bas bskor ba las me 'bar ba 'phro bar bri'o/ /dbus dang phyogs mtshams dang sgo rnams su yang/ ji ltar sngon du rang gi snying gar 'khor lo bsgom pa ji lta ba bzhin du nyi ma dang zla ba'i gnas la yi ge bcu bdun dgod par
294b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa dang gtor ma la sogs pa rnams ni/ phyi nang gnyis ka la bye brag med par rnams dang/ rjen pa dang/ btsos pa rnams dang bsregs pa dang/ til chen po'i mar me'i 'phreng ba dang/ sha sna tshogs
294b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bsgom pa lnga la sogs pa srog chags thams cad kyi bar rnams dang/ rjen pa dang/ btsos pa rnams dang bsregs pa dang/ skam po rnams dang ldan pa'i bshos dang gtor ma yang dbul bar bya'o/ /arg+ha yang khrag dang chang du sbyar ba
294b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bul bar bya'o/ /de la re zhig 'di'i cho ga ni dkyil 'khor legs par khro ste/ /mchod pa'i rdzas kyang bsog ste/ sku gzugs bzang po yang dkyil 'khor du bkram nas/ ji skad du smos pa'i be con la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rus pa'i rgyan dang me tog dam
295a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan te/ bdug pas bdug ste bcom ldan 'das dang/ bdag nyid kyi mdun du legs par gtsugs te bzhag go /gal te rdzas las bsgrub pa zhig na mtshon cha'i gnas su ldong ros sam any+tsa na la sogs pa snod
295a2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i nang du gzhug go /de nas bdag nyid lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i gnas su bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed por bsams te/ /ji ltar sngon du brjod pa bzhin du der spyan drang ba dang mchod pa'i cho ga legs par
295a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /mtshon cha la yang mchod pa bya ste/ de nyid la me tog dang bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas/ /lag pa g.yas pas gzung ste bzlas brjod la 'jug par bya'o/ /de yang ji srid du mtshon cha de me ltar 'bar bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas par
295a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba 'am/ yang na zla ba drug gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ /de'i tshe mtshon cha de dag ji lta ba bzhin du 'bar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na dang po lha la gus pa btud de/ /bdag nyid phul nas dngos grub kyi rdzas de dag kyang bdag nyid dang lta bar
295a5(rgyud 'grel): slob? dpon dang/ rogs rnams la ci rigs su bgo bar bya'o/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na yang slar spobs pa'i cho ga dag brtsam par bya'o/ /gal te grub pa las nyams par gyur na dngos grub slar dbrog pa'i cho ga dag bya'o/ /gal te dus ma
295a6(rgyud 'grel): yin par mtshan ma byung na bsrung ba byas te dus su bslang bar bya'o/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na yang bgo ba la sogs pa de bzhin du byas te/ legs par bsrungs te bzhag na dngos grub 'bring po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la slar spobs pa'i cho ga
295a7(rgyud 'grel): ni dang por bsgrub pa nyid dang 'dra ste/ zla ba drug tu bsgrub pa'i cho ga de nyid slar bskyar bar bya'o/ /des grub bar ma gyur na cho ga gnyis pa ni thabs de nyid zla ba gnyis su bskyar bar bya'o/ /des grub par ma gyur na yang thabs gsum pa la yang cho ga
295b1(rgyud 'grel): de nyid zla ba gnyis su bskyar pa yin no/ /de ltar spobs pa'i cho ga lan gsum du bsgrubs kyang/ /sngon gyi las 'ang ting nge 'dzin dang/ dad pa'i bye brag gis dngos grub kyi snod du bcung zad ma gyur pa srid pas de nas drag shul gyi sbyor bas zhag bdun bsgrub
295b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ste/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las sprul ba'i khro bo chen po lag na lcags kyu thogs pa zhig dang/ rdo rje thogs pa zhig sprul te/ lcags kyu can gyis ye shes kyi lha thugs ka mnas drangs te/ rdo rje can gyis rgyab nas brdeg cing phul te dbang
295b3(rgyud 'grel): med par bkug nas/ sngon du smos pa'i dngos grub kyi rten rnams la thim par bsam zhing tshig 'dis yang bskul bar bya'o/ /sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor pas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson/ /nga ni dpal ldan ral gri 'chang/ /bka' 
295b4(rgyud 'grel): yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /gal te dam las 'gal gyur cing/ /grub pa tshul bzhin ma bstsal na/ /sangs rgyas sku gsung las byung ba 'ang/ /dam tshig mchog gis 'gags par 'gyur/ /zhig par gyur par gdon mi za/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig dag gis
295b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig rab tu bskul zhing/ /zhag bdun du bar chad med par lha gzir ba'i cho ga byas pas gdon mi za bar 'grub par bshad do/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i khro bo'i phyi nang brtul zhugs rnam pa gnyis 'dzin pas dngos grub chen po'i
295b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i khyad par bstan pa ste/ /cho ga 'di ltar nyid kyis lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang thod pa dang sdigs mdzub dang/ gzhan yang ldong ros dang/ mig sman dang ri lu dang bcud kyis len dang/ rkang pa byug pa la sogs pa rdzas thams cad
295b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /gal te mchog gi dngos grub chen po bsgrub mi nus pa rnams kyis ni/ 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang chu gtsang dang rtsab mo la sogs pa las bsgrub par bya'o/ /de la 'o ma la sogs pa bsgrub pa la ni/ sngon du bsnyen ba
296a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag gsum mam zla ba drug tu bsnyen pa byas te bsgrub pa zla ba phyed byas nas tha ma zla ba gzas zin ba'i nub mo dkyil 'khor byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ste/ zla ba gzas ma gtang gi bar du mar la sogs pa lag
296a2(rgyud 'grel): pa g.yon pas bkab ste/ dngos grub la dmigs nas rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod byas na/ /de zla ba btang bar gyur tsa na mtshan ma byung na ni/ /de dag 'thungs pas shes rab 'phel ba la sogs pa dngos grub 'bring po 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
296a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma ma byung na yang phan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bu dag la yang ni brtul zhugs 'dzin pa med kyang 'grub tu rung ngo/ /'di ni re zhig zhar la brjod pa ste/ brtul zhugs dang ri mo dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang ldan pas dngos
296a4(rgyud 'grel): grub chen po bsgrub ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa rdzogs so// //dngos grub pa dag gi spyod lam gyi mtshan nyid bya ba sna tshogs dag spyod pa la tshogs chen por 'gyur ba dang dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba dang/ bgegs
296a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i bar chad du mi 'gyur zhing bkra shis par 'gyur ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pas 'gro ba rnams sdud par 'gyur pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ de la spyod lam ni khrus dang/ kha zas za ba dang/ tha mal pa'i bya ba la 'jug
296a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan nyid dang/ nyal ba dang ldang ba'i bya ba dang/ rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba'i spyod pa dag ste/ rtsed mo la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /'di dag thams cad la yang thun mong du ni byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang ma bral
296a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ 'di chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs pa dang/ sgyu
296a8(rgyud 'grel): ma tsam du snang ba'i 'gro ba rnams la yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin mi gtong ba'o/ /bgegs bskrad cing bsrung ba yang de nyid kyis byas par 'gyur ro/ /khyad par
296b1(rgyud 'grel): du ni khrus byed pa'i tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur bar bsam par bya ste/ de yang mdun gyi nam mkha' la rang gi ye shes kyi lha bsams te de la yid kyis phyag byas nas/ ji skad smos
296b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i khrus byas pas ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i bum pas bdag la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par bsam mo/ /de nas yang bdag nyid kyi snyim pas chu gtsang ma blangs te/ de yang bdud rtsir bsams nas
296b3(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa rnams la lan gsum du phul te slar gshegs su gsol nas/ de nas bdag nyid ldang bar bya'o/ /de nas bsrung ba dang yang ldan par bya ste/ 'di ni re zhig khrus kyi cho ga bstan pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin mdor
296b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'o/ /kha zas za ba'i cho ga ni phyi rol dang nang gi bye brag gis rnams pa gnyis te/ de la phyi rol gyi ni sred cing chags pas longs spyad pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ phung po gnas pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir tshogs chen po bskyed
296b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ kha na ma tho ba med pa ci ran du za'o/ /nang gi dam tshig bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas thams cad mchod pa ste/ de la re zhig 'di'i cho ga ni kha zas kyi snod ni pad+ma'i snod du byin gyis brlab par
296b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /kha zas mi la sogs pa dam tshig gi sha rnam pa lnga dang/ /snang mdzad la sogs pa dam tshig gi bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin du brtags te ye shes bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dang ldan pa 'dod pa'i
296b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i yon tan dang ldan par byin gyis brlab bo/ /yang na bza' ba'i bye brag rnams ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams 'od du zhu ba las gyur pa'i kha zas su bsam mo/ /btung ba'i bye brag rnams ni yul rnams
297a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od du zhu ba las gyur pa'i bdud rtsi btung bar bsam mo/ /de ltar yab yum gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ro yis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i mthu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab po/ /de la bdag
297a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te lce dang lag pa dag kyang sprul pa'i lus kyis mchod pa byed pa'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /yang na lag pa'i sor mo lnga ni rigs lnga'i bdag nyid lag mthil gyi dkyil
297a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ni sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs pa'i pho brang/ kha zas rnams lag du blangs pa ni tshogs chen po la rol cing spyod pa ste/ mchod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang po'o/ /de nas kha ni rnam par thar pa'i gzhal yas khang/ lce ni sangs
297a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i ye shes/ /kha zas zos pa ni byang chub kyi sems rnam par mi rtog pa'i ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid la rol pa'i mchod pa ste/ de bzhin du mchod pa gnyis pa'o/ /de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i
297a5(rgyud 'grel): khog pa ni rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor kha zas kyis tshim par byas pa ni rang gi lha'i dkyil 'khor rgyun tu mchod pa/ zhu zhing mi snang bar gyur pas chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i ngang du rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ltar kham gyi zas kyi
297a6(rgyud 'grel): rdul phra rab gcig gis kyang/ mchod pa gsum byas par 'gyur la/ /mchod pa gcig kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur zhing/ bsod nams dang ye shes dag kyang
297a7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni rgya che ba bla na med pa'i mchod? pa zhes bshad do/ /za ba'i ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dag kyang 'dir 'dus par dgongs so/ /de la kha zas za ba'i tshe phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi yin te/ nam mkha' lding
297b1(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgyas dug sbyang zhing bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgyas tshogs kyi 'khor lor sangs rgyas rnams spyan drang ba dang/ pad+ma'i phyag rgyas tshogs kyi 'khor lo longs spyod pa dang/ slar gshegs
297b2(rgyud 'grel): su gsol ba'i phyag rgyas mchod pa zin nas sangs rgyas rnams rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o/ /de la nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya ni/ mthe bong dang srin lag rtse sprad de nam mkha' lding gi mchu
297b3(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas nas lhag ma rnams sbrul mgo ltar brkyang ba 'di ni/ dug thams cad 'byin par byed cing/ bdud rtsi sbyin par byed pa ni nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas zhes bya ba ste/ 'dir zas kyi steng
297b4(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag nas rang gi lha'i gsang sngags gang yang rung ba 'am/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i gsang sngags sam/ yum rnams kyi sngags sam/ ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i sngags sam/ rdo rje mkha' lding rang gi gsang
297b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis bzlas nas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /yang na lha thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus par gyur pa oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /
297b6(rgyud 'grel): de la nam mkha' lding gi snying po ni/ /oM badzra ga ru Da a mri te hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di yin no/ /de la spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo g.yab pa'i tshul gyis snying gar mkhrig ma bsnol te/ se gol
297b7(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum brdabs nas de nas zhi ba'i thal mo brdabs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis rting pa sprad de/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngos sbyar nas lhag ma pad+ma kha bye ba ltar byas te/ 'dis kha zas kyi snod bzung ste bza' zhing sbyin par bya'o/ /slar gshegs
298a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba'i phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo'i rgyab kyis g.yab ste/ 'dis lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyi rol gyi dgos pa'i bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug pa'i tshe ni rang gi lha'i ting nge
298a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin gyis gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i shugs nyid mi gtang ba tsam yin no/ /nyal ba'i dus na ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yid la byed pa yin no/ /ldang ba'i tshe na ni snying rje chen po'i bstobs bskyed pa'o/ /rtse mo la sogs pa'i rnam par g.yang ba'i
298a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe na yang/ dang po byang chub sems kyi shugs ma btang ba nyid kyis nyams par mi 'gyur zhes bshad do/ /'di dag tu bsrung ba thams cad la yang/ bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa tsam dang/ sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa dang/ gzhan
298a4(rgyud 'grel): yang mig bltas pa dang/ rdzas gtor ba dang/ thal mo drag tu brdabs pa dag gis kyang bgegs bskrad cing bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten gdab pa dang/ dam pa'i chos bklag pa'i tshe na yang/ /snying rje'i stobs kyis bdag dang gzhan
298a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ dge ba 'di spyad par bya'o snyam du bsam pa'i yid la byed pas 'phangs te bya'o/ /spyod lam bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba nye bar bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// //nam mkha' i khams kyi
298a6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' klas rab 'byams du/ /'jig rten dag na 'jigs byed ji snyed cig /bdud dang srin po gnod sbyin la sogs pa/ /de dag kun las gshin rje gcig mi bzad/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo gcig po yang/ /gshin rje stong pas lhag par
298a7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'jigs/ /shin du mi bzad khro rgyal gshin rje gshed/ /mthong ba tsam gyis khro bo thams cad kun/ /mthu nyams spa skod rang gi lag cha shor/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad na/ /'jigs byed rab 'jigs zhing gi rdul snyed kyang
298b1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed dang mtshungs pa mga' ma mchis/ /de phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid las/ /gang bshad de ni che ba/ kun gyi gtso/ /lha 'am bdud dam de bzhin bgegs kun la/ /log 'dren mu stegs skye ba ngan pa rnams/ /kun nas 'dus kyang bar du bcos
298b2(rgyud 'grel): mi nus/ /shes rab ting 'dzin dad pa dman pas kyang/ /rang gar 'dod pa'i bya ba sna tshogs byed/ /gang dag dad brtson phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /dngos grub kun la sbyor ba smos ci dgos/ /'on kyang sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi rtogs shing/ /lus ngag spyod
298b3(rgyud 'grel): pa lam du mthong ba dag /ma rungs gzhom dang mnan pa la sogs pa'i/ /tshar bcad las kyis gdul ba'i cho ga la/ /byang chub sems dang bral zhes rtog pa byed/ /de lta'i rgyud ldan 'gro ba dman pa yis/ /thos nas skrag gam gal te bcings gyur kyang/ /zab
298b4(rgyud 'grel): mo don chen snying po mi mthong bas/ /dad pas byang chub sems bskyed bral ba dang/ /grub dang bka' la the tsom za 'gyur te/ /grub pa med cing ltung ba'i rgyur 'gyur bas/ /'gro ba dman 'gyur de lta bzung ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i mtshan
298b5(rgyud 'grel): ci 'dra dang/ /rnal 'byor lam chen gang gis 'grub 'gyur ba/ /de dag 'dor bsdus cung zad bshad par bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig /'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs byung 'gyur ba/ /de dag dka' ba sna tshogs ci spyod kyang/ /mnyam nyid snying rje
298b6(rgyud 'grel): thob par ma gyur bar/ /byang chub mchog thob gang yang yod ma yin/ /mnyam nyid de yang chos kun skye med cing/ /'gags pa med cing rtag pa chad pa med/ /de bzhin 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bya ba dang/ /de bzhin tha dad don dang don gcig sogs/ /'khrul pa'i
298b7(rgyud 'grel): blo la ji ltar snang 'gyur zhing/ /mtshan ma ming gi brjod 'gyur thams cad kun/ /de la de yi rang bzhin de dmigs/ /rang bzhin shes bya ba gzhan gyis ma byas shing/ /brten pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste/ skye ba'i chos la rang bzhin de lta bu/ /yod
299a1(rgyud 'grel): na skye ba nyid du ga la 'gyur/ /des na rtag pa'i ngo bo 'ga' yang med/ /dngos po skye ba tsam du snang ba yang/ /skad cig gcig gis skye ba 'ang mi rdzogs la/ /skad cig gzhan du skye ba'ang zhig pa'i phyir/ /sgyu ma tsam du skye bar snang ba de/ /blo
299a2(rgyud 'grel): yis brtag du rung ba'i rten med de/ /de phyir skye ba'i chos tsam yod ma yin/ /gang la skye ba dngos por ma grub pa/ /de la 'gag pa 'grub par gal 'gyur/ /des na chos rnams 'di dag thams cad kun/ /rtag dang chad pa 'grub par mi 'gyur te/
299a3(rgyud 'grel): skye ba med na rtag pa ci las byung/ /'gag pa med na chad pa de bzhin te/ /chos rnams blo yis gzhig tu rung ba'i phyir/ /don gcig pa yang 'grub par mi 'gyur la/ /gcig la yongs su brten par ma gyur pa'i/ /du ma de yang gang gi dbang gis
299a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /gcig dang du ma grub par ma gyur pa'i/ /chos la 'gro 'ong bya ba gang la yod/ /'gro 'ong med na thar dang ma thar zhes bya ba/ 'phags dang skye bor bzhag pa mi 'grub la/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba zhes/ /de yi lam du bzhag
299a5(rgyud 'grel): pa gal 'grub/ /gal te don dam kun rdzob gnyis dbang gis/ /kun rdzob dbang la khyad par yod ce na/ /kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pa'i tshad gang zhig /ji ltar snang ba de tsam kun rdzob bam/ /'on te mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dag /kun rdzob
299a6(rgyud 'grel): ces bya'i tshad du brtag grang na/ /snang ba tsam nyid kun rdzob yin 'gyur na/ /sems can kun la bdag lta yod pa'i phyir/ /bdag ces bya ba kun rdzob yin par 'gyur/ /de ltar gyur na kun rdzob bden pa la/ /lta ba mtho dman bye brag med par
299a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gal te snang ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid zhig /kun rdzob bden par rnam par bzhag grang na/ /mtshan nyid blo yis phye ba yin pa'i phyir/ /de la mdza' dang tshad yod ma yin no/ /dngos gzhi tshad med pa la chos gzhog pa/ /byis pa mkha' la
299b1(rgyud 'grel): tsod dang de 'dra mod/ /kun rdzob tsam du kun rdzob mi rnyed na/ /yang dag don du kun rdzob ga la rnyed/ /de ltar kun rdzob rnyed par ma gyur na/ /don dam de yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /phan tshun bltos te rnam par bzhag pa kun/ /gang tshe bltos bzhi grub par ma gyur pa/ /de tshe de
299b2(rgyud 'grel): la bltos pa ma grub zin/ /de phyir chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba kun/ /rnam par bzhag du rung ba gang ma mthong/ /gang ma mthong bas gang la mi zhen cing/ /mi rtog sgrub mi dor blo'i rtsol dang bral/ /mnyam nyid byang chub sems shes de la brjod/ /'di ma rtogs
299b3(rgyud 'grel): par dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams/ /gang zhig 'byung bar sangs rgyas kyis ma gsungs/ /bsam pa 'di dang ldan zhing 'dir mos pas/ /sgo gsum spyod pa'i mtshan nyid nyes pa med do/ /sems can mang po yun du bder 'gyur zhing/ /bsgrub bya rang la
299b4(rgyud 'grel): yun du phan 'dogs na/ /'phral du sbyor ba rtsub par snang ba yang/ /sangs rgyas mdzad par sangs rgyas kyis gsungs te/ /rnal 'byor lam yang de las gud na med/ /de phyir rgyal ba'i theg pa mchog 'di ni/ /shes rab snying rjes ldan pas bsgrub 'gyur na//
299b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sogs lam gyi chos la ma brten par/ /'di nyid dam ni pha rol dag tu yang/ /bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kun/ /rang gi lha mnyes byas pa tsam gyis grub/ /mya ngan 'das mchog phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/ /chos kyi dbang phyug
299b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /thabs 'di nyid kyis myur du 'grub 'gyur na/ /shes rab ldan pa ci phyir 'dir mi rten/ /theg chen mdzed spyod smad du byung ba las/ /nor bu rin chen rin thang med pa bzhin/ /sems can mang po'i bsam pa sgrub byed cing/ /
299b7(rgyud 'grel): tshar gcad phan 'dogs bya ba ston pa la/ /'gro ba blo dman dngos lta can rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas mdzad dang de yi lan par/ /blos ma mthong bas gol sa gnyis su 'gyur/ /kha cig skur pas ltung ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /kha cig mos kyang lam
300a1(rgyud 'grel): du ma mthong ste/ /'di ched tsam gyis cho ga mthong 'gyur bas/ /mos pas zhugs kyang don chen dag las ring/ /de bas tshul bzhin 'dzin pa dag gis kyang/ /shes rab zhan zhing mos pa ldan pa la/ /gdam ngag thabs kyis legs
300a2(rgyud 'grel): par zin par bya/ /gal te gdams ngag bral ba'i 'gro ba yis/ /glegs bam mthong bas skur bar mi bya ste/ /legs par bsams te/ brtags pa rnam gnyis bya/ /gal te don ldan skur ba yin yang srid/ /de la skur 'gyur ltung ba thob par des?
300a3(rgyud 'grel): gal te don chen ldan pa ma yin na/ /btang snyoms bzhag pas sdig pa 'phel mi 'gyur/ /blo dang gdams ngag gnyis kas ma zin yang/ /rtag par 'di ltar sgro skur bral bar gyis/ /gang zhig 'di 'dzin 'chang bar 'dod rnams kyis/ /dad dang
300a4(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus shes rab gsum ldan zhing/ /sngon chad man ngag brtan par 'char ba yi/ /ngang tshul ldan na man ngag bzhag pa'i snod/ /mos pa brtan na shes rab mi ldan yang/ /bka' bzhin byed pa man ngag snod du bzhag /'jam dbyangs
300a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho lta bu ni/ /dngos grub rin chen sna tshogs 'byung khungs gnas/ /rang dang rgyud tsam 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yi/ /rin chen mchog bsdus sor bzhi za ma tog /rdo rje rab 'byed tshul las cher bsdus te/ /gang du rang gnas lus
300a6(rgyud 'grel): la 'chang ba tsam/ /tshul 'di sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsdus pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa/ /rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo rin po che'i rgya 'tsho lta bu las 'di dang/ gzhan du myur du spyad par
300a7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i cho ga rin po che mchog bsdus pa/ /sor bzhi pa'i tshad kyi za ma rtog gang tsam zhig bsdus te/ /rang gi lus la bcang sa nas/ /rang dang rang la brten pa rnams la phan gdags pa'i thabs/ /slob dpon chen po dpal ldan sgeg pa'i
300b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rjes kun nas bsdus pa rdzogs so/ //sprin med nyi ma shar ba las/ /las rnams kun du gsal 'gyur yang/ /'gro ba ma goms pa rnams kyis/ /bsgribs pa bzhin du bgrod mi shes/ /de lta'i sgrib pa gsal ba'i phyir//
300b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma 'di ni bdag gis byas/ /mdza' dag don rnams dpyad pa ni/ /mkhan po bzhed bzhin ma shes phyir/ /de ni bdag gis nus ma yin/ /re zhig 'di la 'jug pa tsam/ /phra mo'i lam sgo bstan par bya/ /de la rtogs pa 'dir las phra mo'i
300b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub sna tshogs bsgrub pa dang/ /dngos grub chen po dang bla na med pa'i byang chub nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs su gyur pa cho ga zhib mo bstan pa las/ /sngags bas 'jug par bya ba'i go rims ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang/ go rims kyi
300b4(rgyud 'grel): don gyi mtshan nyid dag legs par shes par 'jug nus par 'gyur pa'i phyir 'di bstan par bya ste/ de la dang por bya ba'i cho ga ni sbyor ba la 'jug par rtogs pa/ /legs par brtags pa'i bla ma las rang gi lha dang sngags dag gnos nas de
300b5(rgyud 'grel): nas dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dang/ las bya ba'i cho ga dag legs par brlab par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga la zhugs te 'bad par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu grub pa thob par gyur kyang rung ma gyur kyang rung ste/
300b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nye bar gsung nas las sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don yang sgrub cing/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas byang chub chen po bsgrub pa yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /de la sngon du spyad pa'i
300b7(rgyud 'grel): cho ga legs par spyad pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /lha bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i phyir gnas bde zhing dben par song la/ /der lha mchod pa'i gzhir gyur pa maN+Dal legs par byi dor byas te/ der lugs ma 'am ri mo la sogs pa mchod pa'i rten gyi
301a1(rgyud 'grel): phyir bzhugs par bya ba dang/ me tog la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad kyi phyir bsogs te/ rigs pas bsgrub par 'os pa thams cad tshogs bar byas nas/ 'dir spyad par bya ba ni lhur blangs te spyad par bya ba dang/ grogs kyi dge ba dang de nyid dang ldan pa'i spyod la ste/ de la lhur blang ba'i bya ba ni sgom pa dang mchod par bya ba dang
301a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod do/ /grogs kyi dge ba ni dbugs 'byin ba'i tshe/ /dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang mchod rten gdab pa la sogs pa'o/ /spyod lam ni mi rnams kyi chos lugs khrus byed pa dang/ kha zas za ba la sogs pa'o/ /de la lhur len pa'i spyod pa de dag kyang sbyor ba dang gzhugs pa'i
301a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba dang ldan pa ste/ de la sbyor ba ni sdom pa gso zhing gzung ba la sogs pa'o/ /gzhug pa ni bzod par gsol ba dang slar gshegs su gsol ba la sogs pa'o/ de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te dang po nyid nang par sngar langs te/ sems can gyi don
301a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o snyam du bsam par bya'o/ /de nas cung zad cig legs par spyad pa dang nyes pa spyad pa bsams te/ nyes pa rnams dgag cing legs pa rnams brtan par bya'o/ /snyam du dam bcas nas langs te/ khrus phra mo byas nas bdug pa bsreg cing
301a5(rgyud 'grel): me tog thogs te/ sku zugs la sogs pa la gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad ba 'di dag brjod cing dge ba'i chos 'di dag rgyud la bskyed par bya'o/ /'jam rgyal rdo rje la sog pa'i/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la/ /lus dang ngag yid gus
301a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /kun nas btud de phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing du gang bsngags pa/ /'jig rten dag na mchog gyur pa'i/ /rin chen me tog gdug sbos sogs/ /kun nas sprul te mchod par bgyi/ /bdag gis sngon chad byas pa'i sdig/ kun
301a7(rgyud 'grel): nas bsags par gyur pa rnams/ /rang bzhin med dang yong tshul gyis/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags/ /mgon po kun gyi bsod nams dang/ /dman pa'i dge ba thams cad la/ /de bzhin mthun par lta sems kyis/ /dang bas
301b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bde bar gshegs byang chub mchog brnyes nas/ /'gro ba thugs rjes gdul slad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la/ tshangs pa bzhin du gsol ba 'debs/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhes de dag la/ 'gro kun yun du bde ba'i phyir/ /ji srid
301b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba de srid du/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs su gsol/ /ji srid 'khor ba ma zad par/ /bdag gi dge ba 'ang de bzhin du/ /kun nas zad par ma gyur par/ /sems can yongs su smin par shog/ bdag kyang dus 'di phan chad nas/ byang chub snying
301b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i bar du ni/ /mgon po'i 'bangs su 'bul lags kyis/ /thugs rjes yongs su bzung bar mdzod/ /dus 'di nas ni ? nas ni/ /mgon po khyod kyi bka' bzhin du/ /sems can kun don bsgrub lags kyis/ /byin gyis brlab par mdzad du
301b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis rang gi rgyud la dge ba'i chos bskyed nas/ de nyid kyi tshe rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la 'jug pa 'am/ yang na de nas langs te dam pa'i chos bklag pa dang/ kha zas bza' byas te phyi rol gyi sa la
301b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa legs par byas nas khrus chen po yang byas te/ de nas rang gi stan la legs par 'dug nas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i cho ga ni sngon nyid du legs par bstan pa de nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms te mchod
301b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de dag gi gsang sngags ni lung sngon du bstan kyang/ de dag gi ngo bo ma bstan pas de bdag gis cung zad sbyar bar bya ste/ de la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags kyis spyan 'dren par 'dod na ni/ /de nyid kyi rjes su dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes
301b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o/ /gdan dbul ba yang de dag gi rjes su sa ma ya stwaM zhes sbyar ro/ /me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnams la yang rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rjes su ma hA pU dza sa ma ye hUM zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /de bzhin du slar gshegs su
302a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba ni bi sa ra dza ya swAhA zhes bya ba sbyar ba'o/ /yang na sngags so so la sbyar bar 'dod na spyan drang ba dang/ gdan dbul ba dang/ arg+ha dbul ba dang/ slar gshegs su gsol rnams la oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT ces bya ba 'di nyid
302a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya'o/ /gzhan dbul ba ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags nyid bskul ba med par sbyar bar bya'o/ /bgegs bskrad pa dang gtor ma bsngo ba la ni oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ ces bya ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /'di dag ni kun na bsdus pa la dga' 
302a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga yin te/ rnam par spros pa la dga' ba rnams la ni/ lhung lhung 'degs kyis ngag gis mdzes pa'i byas pa'i tshigs su bcad pas spyan drang ba dang/ mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba rnams byas te/ bsam pas rgyud la chos
302a4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed la/ sngags dang phyag rgyas de dag gus par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de la lhung lhung bdegs kyis ngag ni lha'i bu rnams kyi ngag yin te ha cang mi bul ha cang mi myur/ /lha yis sprul pa'i chu yis khrus gsol bzhin/ /der
302a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dir phyag zhabs kun nas bcabs par mdzod/ /ces brjod do/ /rnam par dag pa'i gsang sngags ci dga' bar brjod par bya ste/ /dag par bsam nas dang por mchod yon dbul ba la sbyar bar bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dag na mchod pa ji snyed
302a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /sngon du bdud rtsi zil dang dam pa 'gro /de phul nas ni mchod pa thams cad kyang/ /nges par phyag rgyas rab tu gdab par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod de/ mchod yon gyi sngags la ci dga' bar byed par bya'o/ /de nas 'dod pa'i yon
302a7(rgyud 'grel): tan gyi sgor gyur pa me tog la sogs pa nye bar sogs nas/ /'dod ldan dang por mthong bas dga' 'gyur pa'i/ /kha dog dbyibs legs rnams las me tog mchog/ sgra snyan yid 'ong rnam pa sna tshogs kyang/ kun las khyad par 'phags
302b1(rgyud 'grel): pa tshangs pa'i dag /yid 'ong dri dang kun nas ldang ba yang/ /lha rdzas ut pal ngang dang gar mi mtshungs/ /ror ldan kha zas sna sogs mchog rnams las/ /tshangs pa'i zil dang mdo dang gar yi mnyam/ /bde zhing sprad du bzod pa'i reg pa kun/ lha yi
302b2(rgyud 'grel): bu mo'i reg pa lta bu med/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i mchog tu rab bsngags pa/ /gang gis de 'drar byin gyis brlabs byas nas/ /bsod nams zhing 'gyur khyed la dbul bar bgyi/ /oM badzra puShpa mahA pu dza sa ma ye swA hA/ yang na de bzhin gshegs pa
302b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba'i bdag nyid/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes bya ba nyid dam yang na 'di dag dang mchod pa rang rang gi ming gi gsang sngags dang/ byin gyis rlob pa dang bces pa spel bar bya ste/ 'di ltar oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra pu? ma hA pu dza
302b4(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ zhes bya bas me tog gi mchod pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du badzra d+hu pa/ badzra dI ba/ badzra gand+ha/ badzra nai we bya/ zhes pas snga ma bzhin du spel bas 'jug pa dang/ mar me dang/ byug pa dang/ bshos gsar rnams la ?? bya
302b5(rgyud 'grel): de dag dang mchod pa gzhan rnams la yang/ /thun mong du byin gyis rlob pa mchod pa'i sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rig pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM A nut+ta ra sarba pU dza ma g+ha spha ra Na ma hA sa ma ye swAhA/ /zhes bya ba
302b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dis thams cad la byar bar bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs te sil snyan gyi mchod pa thams cad la yang/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsang sngags sgra thams cad zab mo'i chos su byin gyis brlab par byed pa'i rig pa chen mo 'dis byin
302b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM badzra g+haN+Da ra na pra ra Na sa ma pra ra Na sarba ta tha ga ta bud+d+ha k+She taM pra tsa la ye pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA swa b+hA be hUM swAhA/ zhes bya bas sgra thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar mchod pa zin nas de bzhin du gtor ma bsngo ba yang h+rI:
303a1(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi ci dga' bar bsngos te/ gsang sngags de nyid kyi sngags kyis nor bu blangs te/ ri mo 'am sku gzugs la mngon par phyogs par 'dug nas cung zad sems mnyam par gzhag ste/
303a2(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod kyi cho ga sngon du bstan pa lta bu ci nus shig bya'o/ /de nas gtong bar 'dod pa na yang mchod par bya'o/ /mchod pa mi nus na me tog mngon gtog par bya'o/ /de nas thal mo sbyar ba btud nas ri mo la mngon par phyogs
303a3(rgyud 'grel): te/ chos mchog mi g.yo bla med rab brnyes shing/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med tshogs mnga' yang/ /'gro ba kun la thugs rje snyoms mdzad pa/ /'jam mgon khyod kyi zhabs la rtag tu 'dud/ /rgyal ba mnyes phyir brjod rin po che/ /dang
303a4(rgyud 'grel): bas spyan sngar rtag tu mtshon bgyi ba/ /lus ngag dub dang bsam pa g.yeng ba yis/ /cung zad bde bar gnas pa 'tshal bzang pa bzhes/ /dad bas bskyed pa'i bsod nams phra mo yang/ /'gal yang chud gros mi 'gyur don 'gyur phyir//
303a5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags rin chen rnam grangs 'di tsam zhig/ mgon po mcho gnyid la ni gdams par bgyi/ /nad dang sdug bsngal dgra bgegs la sogs te/ /'khor ba rgya mtsho gnod pa sna tshogs dag/ 'di dang pha rol rtag tu gar byung yang
303a6(rgyud 'grel): gsan sngags rin chen 'bras bu der mchis mdzod/ /deng 'dir bdag gi dgos pa bsgrub legs kyis/ /thugs rje mnga' i bdag sras dang cas pa kun/ /bde ldan nyid kyi gnas su gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang 'gro ba'i don du
303a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs par mdzod/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyang brjod par bya'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la rgyal ba'i dbang por bstod ba dang/ bzlas pa btang bar
303b1(rgyud 'grel): bzod par gsol ba dang don yod par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags rgyal ba nyid la gdams pa dang/ dgos pa'i bya ba la dus bzhin du spyad pa'i mthu yod pa'i phyir/ dus su thod par gsol ba gdab pa dang/ bdag nyid ? 'byin cing?
303b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs pa'i tshe/ rang gi lha gnas dang dus ma yin par bzhugs pa rigs pa ma yin pas/ slar gshegs su gsol bar bya ba rnams rdzogs par byas nas/ bdag nyid dang/ grogs dang/ gnas dang/ yo byad rnams sngon du brjod pa bzhin
303b3(rgyud 'grel): du bsrungs nas/ dbugs dbyung zhing spyod lam dag bya'o/ /'di ltar nyin zhag re re la dus bzhi 'am gsum mam/ /re re rgyun ma chad par ji srid du dam bcas pa/ /grangs sam dus sam/ mtshan ma ma thob kyi bar du de bzhin du spyod pa
303b4(rgyud 'grel): mi bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas brtul zhugs dang cas kyang rung/ /brtul zhugs med kyang rung ste/ mtshon sna tshogs dang/ rdzas sna tshogs las dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ 'di la ni bsnyen pa 'am brtson 'grus bskyed par
303b5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba lhag par spyad par bya'o/ /de dag thams cad kyang dngos grub sgrub pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o// //de nas grub pa'i spyod par gsungs pa zhi ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs kyi bya ba la ni/ /bsgom pa dang
303b6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dang/ bzlas brjod rnams ni 'dir yang snga ma bzhin te/ bye brag tu ni ting nge 'dzin bye brag dang/ gsang sngags bskul ba bcas pa dang/ phyi rol gyi sbyor ba'i bya ba rnams ni/ las kyi cho ga zhib mo nyid du sngon du bstan pa bzhin du
303b7(rgyud 'grel): so so rang rang gi las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de ltar bya ba rnam pa gsum gyis bsdus pa 'di ni/ sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod pa ste/ 'di dag kho na tsam gyis sngags 'chang rnams kyi dgos pa grub par byed de/ /de la sngags mchog tu gyur pa rnams
304a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ thabs 'di nyid kyis mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la/ rig 'dzin gyis dngos grub thob par byas te/ lha dang mi yi skal ba bzang po rnams la yang longs spyod cing/ bya ba sna tshogs la mthu phun sum tshogs pa thobs
304a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su bsdud/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs na byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ /rdo rje 'chang rnams byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnams blta ba'i phyir dang/ zhing de dag na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas
304a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba'i phyir dang/ mchod pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul bas/ /zhing sna tshogs su zhugs shing de dag rtse zhing longs spyad nas kyang/ dngos grub de dag las nyams pa med par ting nge 'dzin mchog la
304a4(rgyud 'grel): yang snyoms par 'jug cing/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid la sbyor bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /kha cig ni tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub thob par byas te/ de tshe bskal pa gcig gam de las lhag par yang rung ste/ de tsam du
304a5(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lha dang/ lha ma yin la sogs pa dam pa rnams kyis bkur zhing/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ rigs sngags 'chang gi bu mo khyad par du 'phags pa rnams la yang longs spyad de/ de
304a6(rgyud 'grel): nas tshe 'phos nas ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhig tu 'khor 'dus pa dang por 'gyur ba'i skye ba blangs te/ der rab tu phyung nas chos kyi mig dag par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpar gyur nas/ de nas 'og min gyi gnas na
304a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rnam dang skal pa mnyam par skye ste/ de nas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po thob par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /kha cig tshe 'di nyid la dngos su phra mo thob ste/ lo brgya 'am stong ngam stong phrag du ma dag tu 'tsho zhing rdzu
304b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul dang mngon par shes rab dag dang yang ldan nas/ mthong ba'i chos la bde bar 'tsho zhing longs spyad nas/ gzhan du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad kyang rung ma phrad kyang rung ste/ skal pa bzang po la sbyar nas rim gyis byang chub thob par byed pa yod do/
304b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob pa de dag kyang kha cig ni dngos grub thob pa las kyang ma nyams par/ skal pa bzang po'i sgo nas/ bar chad med par byang chub la sbyor bar byed do/ /kha cig ni dngos grub thob nas 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi sred pa la longs spyod pas
304b3(rgyud 'grel): chags te/ dngos grub thob pa las nyams nas bar chad med par sbyor mi nus te/ bar chad dang bcas pas byang chub sgrub par byed pa yang yod do/ /kha cig ni skye ba 'di la dngos grub grub par ma gyur par shi 'phos te bar ma do'i srid pa
304b4(rgyud 'grel): mngon bar grub nas der dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba dang yod do/ /kha cig ni skye ba phyi ma yongs su grub nas skyes ma thag gam cung zad cig na dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba yang yod do/ /kha cig ni 'di'i las kyis mtshams sbyar nas/
304b5(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma'i srid pa las skal ba dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa po mngon par brtson pa can du gyur te/ /der dngos grub can du 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin du skye ba gnyis dang gsum pa la sogs pa du mas dngos grub can du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do//
304b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan yang sgrub pa bo rtsol ba'i mthu chungs bar gyur pas/ skye ba gzhan du rkyen sna tshogs kyi dbang du gyur pa dag kyang yod la/ gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyis zin par ma gyur pas sred pa'i dbang gis sngon du skal ba dman pa la
304b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ de ltar dman zhing nyams par gyur kyang thar pa'i sa bon ma bzhag pa yang ma yin no/ /de bas na sgo 'dir zhugs pa rnams kyis/ /lam 'ba' zhig la rten par bya zhing/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs bskyed
305a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /gang zhig mthong ba'i chos la bya ba phra mo bsgrub par 'dod pa rnams kyi gang zag gis kyang shes rab dang snying rje'i stobs bskyed par bya'o/ /de'i mthus bya ba rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhing yun du bde ba
305a2(rgyud 'grel): yang de'i stobs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag dngos grub grub par gyur pa las nyams par gyur cing rkyen gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te/ thar pa'i bar chad du gyur pa'i chos rnams kyang byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyi stobs chungs
305a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbang las gyur pa yin te/ de bas na gtsor bsam pa 'dis 'phangs te sbyad na bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /bdud thams cad zil gyi gnon par 'gyur ro/ /zhes rgyal ba rnams kyi gsungs shing/ /bla mas
305a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang legs par gdams pa'o/ /'gro ba'i mgon gyur 'jam mchog gang yin des/ /rig pa'i gnas mchog rgya cher bstan pa la/ /gsang ba'i mtshan ldan sgeg pa zhes bya ba/ /'gro ba sgrol 'gyur bya ba gang yin des/ /thabs mchog cho ga zhib mo lags?
305a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan mdzad/ /lam der 'jug pa'i bka' tshogs phra mo tsam/ /rigs pa bzang pos dman la phan phyir byas/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par gyur pa/ rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo las/ /slob dpon
305a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan sgeg pa'i rdo rje yis/ /las dang dngos grub cho ga zhib mo slob dpon rigs bzang pos/ de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dad bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal u pa ya sh+rI mi tra dang
305a7(rgyud 'grel): rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// (//dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub thabs rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba rnam snang bsrung bas mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra b+hai ra wa badzra pra ka ra sa d+ha na ma/
305b1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zab cing rgya cha 'jigs pa 'jigs mdzad pa'i/ /snying rjes khros pa'i 'khor lo la btud de/ /de nyid thob phyir snying rjes
305b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rnams la/ /mi phyed gsal ba'i sgrub thabs cho ga bri/ /'di nyid dbang thob blo gros gsal/ /gnang ba thob cing brtul zhugs nus/ /'gro ba'i don la rab brtson pas/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas su bsgrub/ /bris sku rab gnas legs ldan
305b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ /sha chen dmar chen mchod gtor dbul/ /rig ma ltan tshig dpa' ba 'am/ /yang na gcig pus bsnyen bsgrub bya/ /mchod sbyin rgya tshen sems bskyed cing/ /dbang dang tshogs ston smon lam gdab/ /bdud rtsis khrus gsol khro bo bcu'i//
305b4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis gnas bdag rnal 'byor bsrung ngo/ /snying gar paM dang re ba dang/ /thugs mchog sa bon rim pa las/ /pad+ma nyi ma rdo rje che/ /sa bon mchog las 'od lnga spro/ /rigs rigs bskul dang spyad byas nas/ /rgyal ba 'jigs byed bla
305b5(rgyud 'grel): ma blta/ /dkod pas phyag byas spros pas mchod/ /sdig pa 'gyod bshags slan chad bsdam/ /yi rang skyobs dang sems bskyed cing/ /bskul dang gsol rnams rgyas gdab bsngo/ /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang/ /btang snyoms bzhi la nan
305b6(rgyud 'grel): gtan bsgom/ /rang rang gnas dang bris sku la/ /spyan drang lha sogs gshegs su gsol/ /de nas phyi dang nang gi chos/ /thams cad de bzhin nyid yin cing/ /swa b+ha wa yis rjes su brjod/ /stong pa nyid la gshin tu gzhag /de nas sngon gyi smon lam
305b7(rgyud 'grel): dran/ /chos nyid de las yi ge yaM/ /raM dang hUM ni sngo dmar nag /de dag so sor gyur pa las/ /rlung dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /rdo rje sa gzhir bkur/ /blo dang ldan pas bsrung ba ni/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa rab tu bsgom/ /de'i dbus su paM
306a1(rgyud 'grel): bsam zhing/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig d+hI(rgyud 'grel): dag las/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba dang/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): las 'jam dpal ye shes sku/ /btso ma gser mdog mchog gi phyag /rdo rje skyil krung rin chen spras/ /mthon mdzad zur phud lnga dang ldan/ /sku la ?
306a2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bdag po bsgom/ /thugs kar rim par gnas pa yi/ /'od zer spro dang bsdus pa las/ /rnam par snang mdzad nyid du gyur/ /mtshan dang dpe byad nyid kyis brgyan/ /de yi khyad par gyur pa las/ /gzhal yas phyi nang bcas pa bsgom/ /
306a3(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /dril bu ral gri 'phan la sogs/ /me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /sgo dang sgo khyud 'gram rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras pa'i/ /zla ba phyed pa de bzhin no/ /'dod yon mchod pa'i
306a4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo rnams/ /dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa ste/ /shar ni gtum drag rab tu grags/ /de bzhin lho nub byang gi rim/ /ha ha rgod dang dpal gyi nags/ /ki li ki li shes par bya/ /me la sogs pa'i rim pa yis/ /tshang tshing can dang 'bar ba'i 'od//
306a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs sde dang ni mun pa can/ /de yi rim pas brgya byin dang/ /gshin rje chu lha gnod sbyin dang/ /me lha srin po rlung lha dang/ /'byung po'i bdag po dang brgyad do/ /shar gyi lha dbang dkar po ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa glang po zhon/ /lho yi gshin rje kha
306a6(rgyud 'grel): dog nag /dbyug pa 'dzin la ma he zhon/ /nub kyi chu lha dmar skya'i mdog /sbrul gyi zhags 'dzin chu srin zhon/ /byang gi gnod sbyin rta yi khri/ /kha dog ser po bum pa 'dzin/ /me lha dmar po dbyug gu ste/ /drang srong cha byad ra la zhon/ /srin po nag
306a7(rgyud 'grel): po gri gug lag /mi ro mi'i khri la gnas/ /rlung lha ljang gu ba dan 'phyar/ /sha ba zhon pa dag dang ldan/ /'byung po'i bdag po thal ba'i mdog /rtse gsum khyu mchog zhon par bcas/ /'di dag thams cad phyed skyil krung/ /ral pa'i thur?
306b1(rgyud 'grel): tshugs mig gsum pa/ /khro bo'i brjid ldan sprul dur khrod/ /brgyan cing chung ma bu 'khor bcas/ /chu lha gcig pu sbrul mgo dang/ /bcas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom/ /klu shing a ma'i shing dag dang/ /mya ngan med dang tA la'i shing/ /ardza?
306b2(rgyud 'grel): na dang pa la sha/ u dum wa ra byang chub shing/ /shing gi zhing skyong brgyad po yang/ /phyogs skyong kha dog brgyan de bzhin/ /glang po ma he gdan gyi mgo/ g.yas pa gri gug thod pa g.yon/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgrub pa'o/ /dri za gshin rje phyogs kyi
306b3(rgyud 'grel): gdon/ /sha za yi dags ro langs gzhan/ /bya dang gcan zan sbrul dag dang/ /ro langs dum bu tshigs dang rus/ /mchod rten ce spyang za ru brgyug /phyogs kyi rim pas steng dag na/ /tshangs ba dbang po khyab 'jug drag /tshogs bdag stobs bzangs
306b4(rgyud 'grel): smin drug bu/ /lags ldan nyi zla lha yi tshogs/ /ser po dkar po smug po nag /ser skya sngo skya dmar skya nag /bum pa rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ /rtse gsum mda' gzhur ral gri phub/ /mdung dang gri gug 'dzin pa yi/ /chung ma bu dang bcas pa bsgom/ /chu
306b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad sprin brgyad par dag na/ /'og gi sa bdag lha mo phag /klu brgyad shar la sogs rim par/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang/ /mdza' yas nor rgyas 'jog po dang/ /rigs ldan pad+ma pad+ma che/ /ljang dang ser dang sngo dang nag /dkar po ser po dmar dang
306b6(rgyud 'grel): dkar/ /sprul gyi gdengs ka zhags pa dang/ /rang dang chung ma bu 'khor bcas/ /thams cad rdo rje'i mig can te/ /rgyal ba'i bka' nyan bstan pa bsrung/ /sgrub pa po bsrung phyi bzhin 'breng/ /sha khrag drag po'i las la dga' / /gzhal yas de yi
306b7(rgyud 'grel): nang dag du/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra ba bsgom/ /shar ni dkar po lho ser po/ /nub ni dmar po byang ljang khu/ /chen po dbus ni sngon po ste/ /A li ka lI zla ba nyi/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): dang ral gri spros bsdus nas/ /gcig tu gyur
307a1(rgyud 'grel): nas 'jam pa'i dpal/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas dus gsum sku/ /mdog dkar phyag gnyis spyan gsum zhi/ /rigs lnga'i zur phud mthon mthing lnga/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rin chen brgyan/ /rdo rje g.yas la dril bu g.yon/ /rdo rje
307a2(rgyud 'grel): skyil mo dkrung bcas la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje pad mar bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang phan tshun gzigs/ /snying gar pad zla d+hI(rgyud 'grel): bltas la/ /rigs rigs bskul spyad 'od lngar byas/ /rnal 'byor dang po nyid der gsal/ /zhabs sbyangs
307a3(rgyud 'grel): dang smin byas nas/ /thams cad d+hI(rgyud 'grel): yig chos nyid zhugs/ /drag po'i rigs can la brtsebs/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sngags kyis bskul/ /tshang med bzhi'i lha mo bzhis/ /tsar tsi sogs kyi glu yis bskul/ /thugs khros pa'i
307a4(rgyud 'grel): dang sgrol khyod bzhengs shig /khams gsum kun gyi gti mug rab tu gsol/ /dang sgrol brtson bskyed steng pa nyid las bzhengs/ /bdud bzhi dag las shin tu rgyal mdzad pa/ /'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ci ste bzhugs//
307a5(rgyud 'grel): dang sgrol 'jig rten mgon mdzad da bzhengs shig /byang chub dgod par sems can mgron pos nas/ /ci ltar stong pa nyid la bzhugs pa ci/ /glu'i sgra yis de nyid gsum/ /ho nyid bcas pa der thim ste/ /'gro ba'i dkyil 'khor sgyu mar
307a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong/ /'gro la chags pas khu bar gyur/ /hUM sngon nyi ma la gnas pa/ /rdo rje sngon po khro bo bskyed/ /khro bo sngon po rus pa'i rgyan/ /spom thung gsus pa 'chang ba yi/ /mun pa lta bur 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /dkar dang dmar po g.yas
307a7(rgyud 'grel): dang ga-yon/ /gyen skyes sma ra ser po 'bar/ /ljags 'dril mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gshin rje brdzis/ /shes rab dang bcas gzhan don byed/ /gri gug rdo rje ral gri ga-yas/ /thod pa 'khor lo chu skyes ga-yon//
307b1(rgyud 'grel): yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'khyud/ /mdza' yas sngon po stag sha dkar/ /skra bcings rna cha mgul du 'chad/ /rigs ldan khra bo dpung pa'i rgyan/ /du skyod ser po lag pa'i gdub/ /pad+ma dkar pos do shal byas/ /kar ko Ta ljang se ral pa?//
307b2(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyas dkar po ske rags dang/ /pad+ma chen po rkang gdub dkar/ /lce dang mche ba gnyis ldan pa/ /phud phud sgra sgrogs 'jigs byed pa/ /mgo bo brgya phyed phreng ba 'phyang/ /rwa rno rmig pa rno ba dang/ /spu ser 'bar ba 'jigs pa yi/ /ma he gshin rje
307b3(rgyud 'grel): pho mo yi/ /steng du 'jigs byed legs bsgoms la/ /chos dbyings dag tu chos kun bsgom/ /oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko haM/ de ltar rjes kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /snying ga'i hUM de ya gyur te/ /de'i 'od kyis phyogs bcu yi/ /rgyal ba yum bcas
307b4(rgyud 'grel): dka' bar 'gyur/ /bde bar zhu nas rang la zhugs/ /hUM las rdo rje paM pad+ma/ /oM las rdo rje rtse mo dang/ /pad+ma'i ze 'bru byin gyis brlab/ /rjes su chags pas mkha' gsung du/ /thig le yi ge dang bcas la/ /gzhal yas lha rnams legs
307b5(rgyud 'grel): par bskyed/ /gzhal yas dbus su ya nyid las/ /gtso bo rang nyid lta bu bsgom/ /shar du k+She dang 'khor lo las/ /gti mug rdo rje dkar po ste/ /gri gug 'khor lo ral gri g.yas/ /thod pa rin chen chu skyes g.yon/ /lho ru ma dang rin chen
307b6(rgyud 'grel): las/ /'phro ma rdo rje gser gyi mdog /gri gug rin chen ral gri g.yas/ /thod pa 'khor lo chu skyes g.yon/ /nub tu me dang pad+ma las/ /'dod chags rdo rje rwa ga'i mdog /gri gug pad+ma ral gri g.yas/ /thod pa 'khor lo rin chen ga-yon/ /byang
307b7(rgyud 'grel): du de dang ral gri las/ /phrag dog rdo rje mar kata tshungs/ /gri gug ral gri 'khor lo g.yas/ /thod pa chen po pad+ma g.yon/ /khro bo'i gzugs ni thams cad 'jigs/ /rdo rje sna tshogs rtsa ba bzhir/ /nyi ma'i gdan la g.yon brkyang bzhugs/ /gti
308a1(rgyud 'grel): mug rdo rje zla ba la/ /gti mug sel ba nyid kyi phyir/ /shes rab cha yis de bzhin du/ /rdo rje rwa yi mtshams bzhi ru/ /zla ba'i gdan la lha mo bzhi/ /shar lhor dzwa dang 'khor lo las/ /rdo rje tshe rtsi gti mug mtshungs/ /lho ru sa? dang rdo rje
308a2(rgyud 'grel): las/ /rdo rje phag mo gtso bo 'dra/ /nub byang do dang pad+ma las/ /'dod chags rdo rje lta bur bsgom/ /byang shar ru dang ral gri las/ /phrag dog gshed dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /sgo bzhir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /khro bo bzhi ni rim pas skyed/ /shar
308a3(rgyud 'grel): sgor ya dang tho ba las/ /tho ba gshed ni bdag po mtshungs/ /g.yas na tho ba ral gri 'dzin/ /rin po che dang pad ma g.yon/ /lho sgor ts+tsha dang dbyug pa las/ /dbyug pa gshed mdog gti mug 'dra/ /dbyug pa ral gri g.yas na 'dzin/ /pad+ma
308a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo phyag g.yon na/ /nub sgor ni dang pad+ma las/ /pad+ma gshed ni 'dod chags mtshungs/ /pad+ma ral gri g.yas na 'dzin/ /rin chen 'khor lo phyag g.yon na/ /byang sgor ra dang ral gri las/ /ral gri gshed ljang khu ste/ /zhal dang rgyan ni
308a5(rgyud 'grel): phrag dog mtshungs/ /ral gri dang ni 'khor lo g.yas/ /rin chen dang ni pad+ma ga-yon/ /gri gug thod pa rang rig mkhyud/ /skra sma ra smin ma 'bar/ /zhal bzhad mche ba rnam par gtsigs/ /gtso bo lta bu sbrul gyis brgyan/ /sngon po'i g.yas dkar
308a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po ga-yon/ /dkar po'i g.yas sngo g.yon dmar la/ /dmar po g.yas sngo g.yon pa dkar/ /ser ljang g.yas nag g.yon dkar zhal/ /zur bzhi na yo ni rA las/ /bdud rtsi dang ldan thod pa bzhi/ /legs par bsgrubs nas dbyung
308a7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ /gtso bo rang rang sngags kyi dbyung/ /h+rISh+TI'i sngags kyis gtso bo dbyung/ /rigs kyis zhe sdang las bya ste/ /khro bor 'dus nas zhal dgu gyur/ /gtso bo bdag la zhal gzhugs par bya/ /dzi na dzi ka brjod gti mug gshed//
308b1(rgyud 'grel): gti mug las byas shar phyogs kyi/ /rdo rje rtsibs kyi rtsa bar bzhag /zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa'o/ /ratna d+h+rika gis phra ma ni/ /nga rgyal spyangs nas lho ru dgod/ /a ro lika brjod 'dod chags bshed/ /nub tu pad nyi dag la dgod/ /pradz+nyA d+h+rika gis phrag
308b2(rgyud 'grel): dog gshed/ /phrag dog las byas byang gis bzhugs/ /mo ha ra ti brjod pa yis/ /tsar tsi sgeg mo 'od bzangs ma/ /shar lhor rdo rje'i mtshams su bsgom/ /rang gi rigs kyis las byed ma/ /dwe Sha ra ti lho nub kyi/ /mtshams su rdo rje phag mo sgom//
308b3(rgyud 'grel): nub byang mtshams su dbyangs can ma/ /ra ga ra ta'i sngags kyis dbyung/ /badzra ra tis gau ri ma/ /byang shar rdo rje'i mtshams su bsgom/ /thams cad phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan/ /lha mo pad+ma zla ba'i gdan/ /rigs kyi phyag mtshan dag gis bskyed/ /
308b4(rgyud 'grel): rang rigs bskul sbyang byas la gzhug /de nyid gsum gyis thod pa dbyung/ /zur bzhi bde ba bdud rtsir ldan/ /mud ga ra d+h+rika gis tho ba gshed/ /las byas shar sgor pad nyi bsgom/ /daN+Da d+h+rika gis dbyug pa gshed/ /lho yi sgo ru de bzhin
308b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /pad+ma d+h+rika gis nub sgo ru/ /pad+ma gshed ni bsgom par bya/ /kha Da ga d+h+rika gis ral gri gshed/ /byang gi sgo ru bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag la mnyam par blta/ /'di ni shin tu rnal 'byor ro/ /gshin rje gshed nag 'jigs byed kyi//
308b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha rnams mig la sogs/ /k+ShiM/ dzi/ khaM/ gaM kaM/ saM gis/ /lha rnams dag tu byin gyis brlab/ /pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /'khor lo rdo rje rin chen pad/ /ral gri rdo rje sa snying dang/ /phyag na rdo rje mkha' snying po/ /spyan ras gzigs
308b7(rgyud 'grel): mgon sgrib pa sel/ /kun tu bzang po bsgom par bya/ /phyag na rdo rje kun tu bzang/ /thugs kyi rdo rje 'dra bar bsgom/ /mig ni gti mug sna phra ma/ /lce la 'dod chags lus phrag dog /gshed po 'dra ba cho ga bya/ /khro bo sgeg pa'i gzugs can no 
309a1(rgyud 'grel): snying gar hUM nag a(rgyud 'grel): dmar kha/ /mgo par oM ni dkar po bsgom/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo las/ /sku gsum rdo rje spro bsdu bsgom/ /oM sarba ta thA ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma koSha haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa At+mo?
309a2(rgyud 'grel): haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko haM/ rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kun bkug nas/ /'dun du dmigs la mtshang pas mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hI Shany+tsi mI brjod pas/ /tsar tsi sogs
309a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bkra shis glu/ /bdud rtsi bum pas bkrus pa dang/ /gtso bos dbang bskur gtso bo la/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid cod pan to/ /'khor lo pa la gshin rje gshed/ /cod pan dag dang ldan par bsgom/ rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes 'khor
309a4(rgyud 'grel): lo spyan drangs la/ /khro bos bgegs bskrad mchod byas la/ /sgo ba bzhi yis gnyis med bsre/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sa bon gyis/ /zhal gzhug zhu bas rdo rje'i lam/ /pad mar dbyung dang phyung ba las/ /lha mo sna tshogs me tog sogs/ /phyi'i
309a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas mdzes par mchod/ /tsar tsi sogs kyis bdud rtsi dang/ /sha lngas tshim par bya ba dang/ /rang gi gnyis pas gnyis med mchod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma konyhaM/ brag ca lta bu phul ba de/ sgra brnyan nyid
309a6(rgyud 'grel): du rang la thim/ /de bzhin bstong pas legs par bstod/ /gshin rje gshed por rab 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje ngo bo khyod/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gshin rje gshed pa rab 'jigs pa/ /phra ma rdo
309a7(rgyud 'grel): rje ngo bo khyod/ /rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa/ /rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ 'dod chags pad+ma'i 'byung gnas mnyam/ /dbyangs mchog kun gyi gtso bo'i gtso/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag

309b3(rgyud 'grel): bsgom/ /der bsdu ba 'am shar sgo lho/ /nub byang lha mo rim pas bsdu/ zhal dgu rdo rje rtse mo ru/ /'khor lo bsgom dang rtsa ba dag/ lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom/ /de nas gnas kyi 'khor lo ni/ /bskyed pa rnal 'byor chen po bya/ /de brtan ya mAn+ta ka nyid//
309b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum rjes kyi rnal 'byor bskul/ /sgom pa rdo rje rtse dang rtsa/ /lte ba snying ka rnal 'byor che/ /de rjes 'jam dpal ye shes nyid/ /dang po sangs rgyas gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rtse mo rtsa bar bsgom/ /lte ba snying ga de bzhin bsgom/ /de nas gnas kyi rim pa las/
309b5(rgyud 'grel): raM baM laM yaM rim par bgod/ /lus glong dag bsngams yang bcings la/ /'bar khol bsros pas dbab par bya/ /babs pas zhi dang snying gar gnas/ /dbang bzhi ri rim pas thig le drang/ /bde ba mi rtog stong nyid la/ /rnal 'byor mchog 'dod pa yi bsgom/

309b7(rgyud 'grel): dag spyad pas grub pa med/ /phyi rol rdul las grub pa ste/ /drug cha drug tu go gcig phyir/ /dpyad pas phra rab grub pa med/ /phyi rol sgyu ma dgag mi bya/ /nang la bdag dang gzhan gnyis kyang/ /grub dang ma grub dpyad pa yis/ /bdag med gzhan yang rtag pa
310a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mi rtag pa yis bden pa med/ /gnyis dang gnyis med de las gzhan/ /rigs pas rab tu mi gnas so/ /de bas chos rnams rnam par dag/ chos sku gzugs sku tha dad med/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis/ /'jug

310a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /ya mAn+ta ka'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snying gar nyi ma hUM bkod de/ /spro bsdu sngags kyi yi ges bskor/ /bdun 'bum snying po oM dang po/ /ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT bzlas/ /ting 'dzin mchod gtor bcas pa'o/ /des kyang 'dul bar ma gyur nas/ /

310a7(rgyud 'grel): brgyad legs par sbyar byas nas/ /bya rog sgro dang mi rus la/ /smyu gu byas la bri ba ni/ /gshin rje pho mo 'jigs ldan pa'i/ /rten 'brel 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bri/ /gsum du bskor la phyi rim la/ /ri mig 'khor lo bcu drug bya/ /phyogs mtshams
310b1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad la las kyi sngags/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): ming dang spel ba dgod/ /bar ma brgyad la mes brten pa'i/ /hUM phaT bsgrub byar bcas pa bri/ /par ma re mig bcu gnyis la/ /rA dzA sa ngo ru Na yo/ /ni ra yats+tsha ni rnams bri/ /nang ma brgyad la phyogs bzhi ru/ /ma me rak+She dbus

310b5(rgyud 'grel): ni ra rim pas dgod par bya/ /dzA ni sa ste dpral bar dgod/ /sa ni chu ste lte bar bra/ /do ni me ste 'grin pa nyid/ /ru ni rlung ste brla 'doms su/ /lha mo yum ni g.yon par dgong/ /na yo ni ra mig rna sna/ /lce dang bzhi la mkhas pas dgod/ /rgyu dang

311a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan sor brgyad bya ba dang/ /'khor lo yi ge sngar ltar dgod/ /lho sgor gshin rje'i mdun du yang/ /thod pa gsum la kha sbyor bzhag /de ltar bri ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skra grol gcer bu bdud rtsis byugs/ /lho phyogs ma he zhal ltar

311a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lho nas zhugs shing lho ru blta/ /snying ga'i snying po spros pa yis/ /las kyi gshin rje'i lto ba dkrug /gshin rje dka' bsgo phyogs skyong dang/ /gshin rje'i tshogs rnams mngag pa yis/ /oM dang h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri sogs
