311b1(rgyud 'grel): bar yod/ /steng 'og mtshams bzhi de bzhin du/ /srog gcod sha za khrag mthung zhing/ /mdangs 'phrog dbugs len par yang byed/ /lus lci la sogs 'byung ba rgud/ /rnam shes 'pho ba'i las byed cing/ /gshin rje'i lto bar 'gugs par byed/ /?
311b2(rgyud 'grel): khrag gsum gyis dgugs gzhug pa/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa'i las yin no/ /de nas 'khor lo kha sbyar du/ /bsgrub bya 'khor lo'i khang stong bzhag/ thod pa kha sbyar nang bcug la/ /bcu gsum dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag /rnal 'byor bzhi rdzogs rtsa ba'i
311b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags/ /gtso bo thugs ka 'khor de bzhin/ /bkod la bzlas pas sngags dang lhas/ /dkyil 'khor 'di dang gzhan bskul lo/ /sprul pas gzhan bskul rigs rigs kyi/ /bsgrub bya'i yi ge rtsa dang ni/ /bdud rtsi bcu dang sems blangs la/ /dkyil 'khor
311b4(rgyud 'grel): lha la dbang bskur zhing/ /lhar bsgrub dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bya/ /zla gcig nyi ma bzhi ru bcad/ /bzhi tshan bdun dang zhag gnyis te/ dang por gsol gdab tha mar bshags/ /pra ma ya hUM phaT dang ni/ /rak+ta tsa ra pa ya dang/ /mur tsa pa tsa pa ya
311b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dum pa sarba mA ra ya/ /rim pas sngags dang ming sbel bzlas/ /'bum gyis nges par 'grub par 'gyur/ /mtshan mo h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): 'i sbyor ba ni/ /gong du bstan pa de nyid do/ /las la chos skyong gshin rje dang/ /khro bo rnams ni de bzhin bskul
311b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa po yang skra grol zhing/ /gcer bu bdud rtsi lngas byugs la/ /lho sgor lho ru phyogs pa yis/ /g.yon brkyang DA ma ru dkrol lo/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgrub pa po/ /gsum maM dpa' brtson rang nyid bsgrub/ /ya ma me dak+ShE lnga yis/ /zhe sdang la sogs /
311b7(rgyud 'grel): las skyes pa'i/ /sprul mgo glang mgo bya yi mgo/ /'brug mgo phag gi mgo bo can/ /gshin rje'i rgyal po lnga bskul ba/ /skye rga na 'chi'i 'khor lo bskor/ /yats+tsha ni ra shan pa bzhi/ /gsang bshu gtsang dang za bar byed/ /dzA sa do ru drag mo bzhi/
312a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i rgyal po'i chung ma rnams/ /'ju skems bsreg cing gtar ba yi/ /bshan pa bzhi yi chung ma ste/ /legs nyes blta zhing dur khrod nyul/ /de'i 'khor na zhe sdang can/ /gsong dang sha la shin tu dga' / /mi sdug
312a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can mtshon cha thogs/ bka' bskul rim pas bsgrub bya la/ /brtse ba'i tshul gyis rlung shugs kyis/ /gshin rje'i lto bar bcug par bsam/ /so sor dril bar bstod par bya/ /snying rjes khro la bsgral bsam zhing/ /rang nyid 'jigs
312a3(rgyud 'grel): byed nyid yin zhing/ /sems stobs bskyed la bstod par bya/ /dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bka' yi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /bdud dang mu stegs lha min bcom/ /gshin rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos nyid la
312a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs ye shes sku/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dpal/ /mngon byang ye shes longs spyod rdzogs/ /ya mAn ta ka phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rigs bsdus pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rigs kyi gtso/ /zhe sdang 'joms
312a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad gshin rje gshed/ /khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing khrod/ /phyag drug mtshon chas bdud rnams 'joms/ /lha mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
312a6(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bor bzhengs/ /byams pa'i stobs kyis sku mdog nag/ khros pas dbu skra kham ser 'bar/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhal dgu khams gsum sa dgu mnan/ /mthar gyis snyoms
312a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'jug pa dgu/ bstan phyir zhal mdog so sor bstan/ /mgon po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje spyan dmar rtsa bdun 'bar/ /bzhad dang khro dang phaT kyi sgra/ /ha ha hUM hUM zhal rnams 'gyur/ /'jigs byed khyod la phyag 'tshal
312b1(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /thabs dang shes rab phyag gnyis ni/ /'gro ba skyob phyir glang lpags 'dzin/ /phyag gzhan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni/ byang chub phyogs las rnam par sprul/ /g.yas kyi rdo rje la sogs pas/ /thams cad gsod par mdzad pa po/ /g.yon
312b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thod pa la sogs pas/ /thams cad zil gyis gnon par mdzad/ /phyag dang phyag mtshan nam mkha' gang/ /gang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sprul nag tshangs skud dur khrod rgyan/ /thod rlon phreng ba thar pa'i rgyan/ /sha khrag
312b3(rgyud 'grel): tshil zhag rkang la bgyes/ /du khrod bdag po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ye shes me chen 'bar zhing 'phro/ /bde chen mtshan ma gyen du 'gred/ /ma he'i gdong can yum dang bcas/ /bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa bcu
312b4(rgyud 'grel): drug zhabs rnams kyis/ /lha brgyad mi dang byol song gi /gtso bo kun mnan g.yon brkyang zhabs/ /rtag chad sel la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'khor ba'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir/ /thugs rje'i thugs ni rab tu khros/ /gshin rje gshed
312b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lor sprul/ /'jigs byed tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba zhe sdang gzir gzigs nas/ /'gro ba'i zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir/ /bcom ldan zhe sdang gshed du byon/ /zhe sdang gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro
312b6(rgyud 'grel): ba gti mug sgribs gzigs nas/ /'gro ba'i gti mug bsal bya'i phyir/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed du bzhengs/ /gti mug rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba nga rgyal mnan la gzigs/ /'gro ba'i nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir//
312b7(rgyud 'grel): phra ma gshin rje gshed du sprul/ /phra ma 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro kun 'dod chags gdungs gzigs nas/ /'gro ba'i 'dod chags spyad pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags gshin rje gshed du byon/ /'dod chags 'joms la
313a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba khrag dog sgrol bya'i phyir/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed du byon/ /phrag dog 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyed kyi thugs rje dus nga yin/ /bstan pa nyams byed sdig can rnams/ /tshe srog las ngan dus
313a2(rgyud 'grel): de sgrol/ /rnam shes mi bskyod gnas su phongs/ /zhe sdang chen po'i dus la bab/ /sdig can zhe sdang rnam shes sgrol/ /gti mug chen po'i dus la bab/ /sdig can gti mug gzugs phung sgrol/ /nga rgyal chen po'i dus la bab/ /sdig can nga rgyal tshor ba
313a3(rgyud 'grel): chom/ /'dod chags chen po'i dus nga yin/ /sdig can 'dod chags 'du shes shig /phrag dog chen po'i dus nga yin/ /sdig can phrag dog 'du byed phrol/ /bka' las 'das so dam las 'gal/ /bstan pa 'jig go sdig las byed/ /
313a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la gnod do sems can 'tshe/ /slob dpon smad do slob dpon 'khu/ /sdig can 'di la thugs rjes gzigs/ /'di la thugs rjes ma bsgral na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sems can bslus/ /khro bo rnams kyang rang la khro/ /de bas sdig can
313a5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rjes sgrol/ /lus dang rnam shes so sor phye/ /lus dang sdig las 'dir sgrol la/ /rnam shes dge ba mi skyod mdzod/ /bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed bka' / /bstan pa bsrung phyir dkyil 'khor lha/ /'khor gyi chos skyong gshin rje rnams//
313a6(rgyud 'grel): khyed la drag po'i las bcol lo/ /oM rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor steng du bdag 'bod pas/ /steng du phyogs skyong lha rnams ni/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rgyal chen bzhi/ /gtso 'khor chung ma bu dang g.yog /bcas pa rnams la bdag
313a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bong pas/ /bdag la don chen gzhan med na/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dga' / /khyed ni sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa zhig la khad/ /khyed kyi rgyal ba'i bka' rjed dam/ /dam bcas bka' 
313b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ma bslu bar/ /bdag gis phyogs skyong khyed bskul gyis/ /sdig can nyams pa myur du song/ /oM gyis 'bod kyis lha chen brgyad/ /tshogs dang bcas pa myur du song/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ /oM ma he shwa ra de ben+d+ra brahma ru ti hUM/
313b2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha na b+hi ri ti karti mahA ka la che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shar gyi dur khrod gtum drag na/ /shar phyogs skyong bar dam bcas pa'i/ /dri zas bskor ba'i brgya byin ni/ /lus mdog dkar po glang po zhon/ /
313b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na rdo rje dril bu ga-yon/ /dur khrod rin chen rgyan dang ldan/ /chung ma bu dang bran g.yog 'khor/ /rnal 'byor bdag ni khyed 'bod pas/ /khyed la don ched gzhan yod min/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dang/ /khyed ni sangs rgyas bstan pa
313b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa zhig la khang/ /bstan pa 'jigs pa che ge mo/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis 'bod kyis brgya byin lha/ /sangs rgyas bka' las khyed ma 'da' / /mchod gtor sbyin pa chung ma gsan/ /'khor gyi pho nya las la bskul/ /bstan pa
313b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa'i las ngan 'di/ /zhags pa can gyis mgul nas chings/ /lcags kyu can gyis snying nas drongs/ /lcags sgrog can gyis 'di bsdoms la/ /las kyi rlung gis rgyab nas phul/ /las kyi gshin rjes 'dun nas gsum/ /stobs chen rnams
313b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'di khug cig /dmigs pa'i rten la thim par gyis/ /gshin rje lto ba'i 'khor lor chug /mtshon cha du ma'i char phog la/ /sdig can 'di yi tshe srog chod/ /srog la dbang bas 'di srog chod/ /dbugs la dbang bas 'di dbugs phrogs/ /
313b7(rgyud 'grel): sha za rnams kyis 'di sha zo/ /sdig can 'di yis pags pa dang/ /khrag dang zhag dang tshil dang rkang/ /rang rang dbang bas so sor khyer/ /gtang dang khas blangs bstan pa srungs/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na in+d+ra ye h+rI/ /che ge me ma ra ya hUM
314a1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi/ /lho yi dur khrod ha ha rgod/ /lho phyogs skyong bar dam bcas pa/ /gshin rjes bskor ba'i gshin rjes ni/ /lus mdog nag po ma he zhon/ /g.yas na dbyug pa zhags pa
314a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon/ /dur khrod rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/ /chung ma bu dang bran g.yog 'khor/ /rnal 'byor bdag ni khyod 'bod pas/ /khyed la don chen gzhan yod min/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas bstan la dad/ /khyed ni sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung//
314a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bstan pa zhig la khang/ /bstan pa 'jigs pa'i che ge mo/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ /Sh+TI yis 'bod pa gshin rje sogs/ /rim par bskul bar shes par bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI wi gri tA na na ya ma ye Sh+TI che ge
314a4(rgyud 'grel): mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ /de nas sngags kyi gnad la dbab/ /bcu pa phyogs skyong spel bas bzla/ /gzugs la dug tshon phur pa lngas/ /gnas par gdab pa man ngag yin/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'og phyogs skyong bar dam
314a5(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i/ /sa yi lha mo klu chen brgyad/ /rdo rje'i mig can dkar po'i phyogs/ /gtso bo'i chung ma bu dang 'khor/ /lus mdog phyag mtshan rang rang rtags/ /a dang phu(rgyud 'grel): yis 'bod pa dang/ /las kun 'khor la bcol bar bya/ /oM
314a6(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri ta na na hUM na ga phu pha phuM pheM phi phi pho che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ /khro bo mtshon cha dpag med kyis/ /sdig can 'di la rnam par gzir/ /rdo rje zhags pas mgul nas bzung/ /rdo rje lcags kyus snying nas drongs/ /rdo rje lcags
314a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrog dam du chings/ /rdo rje mtshon gyis rnam par chom/ /'khor lo 'bar bas rab tu khos/ /tho ba dbyug pas rdul du brdungs/ /mda' dang mdung gis thal byung phub/ /gri gug dgra stas lhu zug phrol/ /ral gri chu gris dum bur gtubs/ /me
314b1(rgyud 'grel): rlung las kyis rnam par gtor/ /rgyal ba'i bka' yin khro ba'i las/ /'khor gyi pho nya'i dus la bar/ /sdig can 'di la snying rje med/ /khro bo rnams kyi thugs rje yis/ /'khor gyis sad pa'i sdig can 'di/ /mi skyod zhing du 'di bskyol la/ /rgyal ba'i
314b2(rgyud 'grel): sras su 'di bsgrubs shig /rgyal ba'i thugs dam des mthar phyin/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed las byed pa/ /ya yi las byed ya ma ya/ /ya yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /las kyi gshin rje khyod bskul lo/ /khro bo sbrul gyi gdengs ka can//
314b3(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum khyod kyi lto na 'khor/ /skye rgan mchi'i 'khor lo bskor/ /bstan pa 'jig pa'i sdig can 'di/ /g.yas kyi gri yis srog snying chod/ /myur du mchi ba'i las la sbyor/ /g.yon gyi thod pa snying gar spyo/ /kha ru brdubs shig khA hi pi/
314b4(rgyud 'grel): tsit+ta rak+ta ma ra kha hi/ sdig can tsit+ta rak+ta khA hi/ las kyi gshin rje des sprul pa'i/ /dur khrod bdag po gshin gyi rje/ /nag po gel bag ral gri zhags/ /khyod kyi lto bar skye 'gro 'gro/ /sdig can 'di yi tshe srog chug/ zhags pas zung la ral
314b5(rgyud 'grel): gris gtubs/ /sdig can srog rtsa ma ra rbad/ /phra ma rdo rje'i las byed pa/ /ma yi las byed ma ru rtse/ /ma yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /srog gi bdag po ma ru tse/ /glang mgo gshin rje yab ti/ /skye 'gro khyod kyi lte rtsa gcod/ /g.yas kyi gri
314b6(rgyud 'grel): yis lte rtsa chod/ /myur du 'chi ba'i las la sbyor/ /g.yon gyi thod par lte khrag spyos/ /kha ru brdubs shig khA hi pi/ /zhags pas bzung nas ral gris gtubs/ /kha ru rdubs shig khA hi pi/ /pI ta rak+ta mar khA hi/ /sdig can nag rak+ta khA hi/ /'dod chags
314b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i las byed pa/ /me yi las byed smyo byed do/ /me yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /mdangs kyi bdag po bya mgo can/ /myos byed gshin rje pi pa tra/ /skye 'gro khyod kyis mgrin rtsa chod/ /g.yas kyi mnga' yis 'grin rtsa chod/ /myur du 'chi ba'i las la sbyor//
315a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa thod pas mgrin khrag spyos/ /kha ru brdubs shig khA hi bi/ /mgrin pa rak+ta ma ra khA hi/ /sdig can mgrin pa rak+ta khA hi/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i las byed pa/ /da yis las byed bum bu rdzi/ /da yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /dbugs
315a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag po bum bu rdzi/ /'brug mgo gshin rje ku be ra/ /skye 'gro yongs kyi bla dbugs bcod/ /g.yas kyi dgra stas bla dbugs tshad/ /'chi ba'i las la myur du sbyor/ /g.yon gyi thod pas bla khrag spyos/ /kha ru brdubs shig khA hi bi/ /pA ta rak+ta mA
315a3(rgyud 'grel): ra khA hi/ /sdig can bA te rak+ta khA hi/ /gti mug rdo rje las byed pa/ /k+She'i las byed bai sa ta/ /k+She yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /tshe'i bdag po bai sa ta/ /phag mgo gshin rje k+She pa la/ /skye 'gro'i tshe rnams khyod kyis chung/ /g.yas pa'i dbyug pas tshe
315a4(rgyud 'grel): brdungs shig /'chi ba'i las la myur du sbyor/ /g.yon gyi thod pas bla khrag spyos/ /kha ru brdubs shig kha ru bi/ /mun d+ha rak+ta ma ra kha hi/ /sdig can mun d+ha rak+ta khA hi/ /rdo rje tho ba'i las byed pa/ /ya'i las byed ya ma ra/ /yi yis 'bod do khyed
315a5(rgyud 'grel): bskul lo/ /gsod byed bdag po phya sangs ni/ /sha ba'i mgo can gshin rje drag /skye 'gro khyod kyi gsod par byed/ /g.yas kyi gri yis tshe srog gcod/ /g.yon gyi zhags pas dam du bsdoms/ /rdo rje dbyug pa'i las byed pa/ /ts+tsha'i las byed
315a6(rgyud 'grel): tsa ra na/ /ts+tsha yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /bshu byed bdag po tel pa ste/ /ce spyang mgo can gshin rje rno/ /skye 'gro khyod kyis bsha' bar byed/ /g.yas kyi gri yis pags bshus la/ /g.yon gyi zhags pas dam du bsdoms/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i
315a7(rgyud 'grel): las byed pa/ /ni'i las byed ya ma ni/ /ni yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /gcod byed bdag po rmig pa ni/ /rmig pa'i mgo can gtum po mgyogs/ /skye 'gro khyod kyis gtub par byed/ /g.yas kyi dgra stas rab tu chod/ /g.yon gyi 'khor los
315b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu phye/ /rdo rje ral gri'i las byed pa/ /rA yi las byed ral tshar dgu /rA yis 'bod do khyod bskul lo/ /za byed bdag po rA hU la/ /chu srin mgo can gshin rje 'jigs/ /skye 'gro khyod kyis za bar byed/ /g.yas kyi 'khor los dum bur gtubs
315b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi lcags kyus rab tu zung/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor gyi/ /las byed rnams kyi chung ma brgyad/ /dmar mo khrag gi ral ba can/ /gri gug thod pas lag gnyis 'brel/ /las kyi gshin rje'i chung ma yin/ /khams gsum skye 'gro
315b3(rgyud 'grel): lto bar chug /gcod cing sha khrag za la dga' / /'khor lo bskor cig gshin rje'i yum/ /dzA sa do ru'i las byed ma/ /ci rtsi phag mo dbyangs can ma/ /go ri bzhi'i bka' nyan ma/ /dus bzhi 'byung ba'i lha mo bzhi/ /sha khrag drod dang dbugs
315b4(rgyud 'grel): la gtod/ /dzA sa do rus khyed 'bod kyis/ /sdig can 'di yi sha khrag drongs/ /dbugs 'di khyod kyis myur du phrol/ /sgo ba'i pho nya bka' nyan cing/ /na yo ni ra'i las byed ma/ /zur zhig chings shig rab tu bsdoms/ /'khor lor gnon pa'i las
315b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig/ dus la phab pa tsan tra dza/ /bka' las ma 'da' sa ma ya/ /rnal 'byor ma bslu dkar ma dkar/ /bstan pa bsrungs shig dar ma dpal/ /ya ma med k+Sha che ge mo mA ra ya rbad rbad/ ya dza ni ra che ge mo mA ra ya khA hI khA hi/ /dzA sa
315b6(rgyud 'grel): do ru che ge mo mA ra ya dzwa la dzwa la/ Na yo ni rA che ge mo mA ra ya dzdza/ gshin rje'i lto bar 'khor lo bskor/ /gshin rje'i 'khor gyi pho nya'i tshogs/ /bya dang sprul dang gcan gzan khyi/ /sha zan thams cad myur du rgyug /sdig can 'di la
315b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rol/ /rang rang pags pa sha dang khrag /zhag dang tshil dang rkang mar rus/ /dbang po don snying skal pa kha'i// //de nas las la sbyar ba ni/ /rgyal po gtum po tsanDa li/ /'khor lo thod pa kha sbyar gzhug /lho sgor
316a1(rgyud 'grel): thod sgyed steng du bzhag /srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams/ /dbang med skye 'chi'i las la bskul/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa yi/ /las kyi gshin rje pho mo skyed/ /ya yis dgug gzhug bcing ba dang/ /gnyis med?
316a2(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i lto ba dkrug /khru gang gshin rje'i bskyed sogs yang/ /de ltar las mkhan dgu sogs bya/ /bsgrub bya nri las 'khor lo dang/ /gzugs la bskyed dang dgu sogs bstim/ /khro bo chos skyong bka' bsgo zhing/ snying po bdun 'bum
316a3(rgyud 'grel): bzla pa dang/ /sha chen khrag chen gtor ma bzang/ /bsgrub bya skyabs med khro bos bsgral/ /de nas nyi ma lngar phye la/ /nyi mo so sor mtshan mo dril/ /las sngags rtsa sngags so so la/ /sum 'bum 'bum phrag dag tu bzlas sngags kyi lha rnams
316a4(rgyud 'grel): so sor bskul/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sngags brjod pas/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed sogs rnams/ /dzi na dzika sgrogs phyogs skyong bskul/ /khre bos gshin rje ded cing bskul/ /sgrub bya'i ste nas 'khor los lus/ /so sor gang dang so
316a5(rgyud 'grel): sor khyer/ /sha dang khrag sogs sbyin pa'i rgyu/ /phung po khams sogs lhar bya zhing/ /sems ni mi bskyod zhing du 'phang/ /khro bo phyogs skyong gshin rje yi/ /g.yon gyi mtshon chas 'gugs byed cing/ /g.yas kyi mtshon chas gsod par
316a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ snying rjes khros pa'i las la bskul/ /de nas sbyin sreg mnan pa ste/ /pha mes bskyal ba'i dur khrod du/ /'khor lo gshin rjes mnan pa sba/ /thab khung khru gang gru gsum bya/ /khru phyed brko zhing rdzas ngan byug /dur gyi
316a7(rgyud 'grel): shing la dur khrod mes/ /spar la me lha gshin rje dang/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed sogs bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs brnyan mi rus phye ma dang/ /de yi rjes dang skra sen dang/ /rnam snang chu dang bcas pa rnams/ /nam phyed
316b1(rgyud 'grel): dag nas nam phyed sreg /tshu tshun d+ha ra'i pags pa ru/ /rnam snang chu yi sbyor ba ni/ /bla ma'i ngag la legs blangs la/ /gnas su sbas na nges par 'grub/ /de nas rtags sam nges 'phos nas/ /bsgrub bya de la dbang bskur zhing/ /bskyed dang rdzogs
316b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i cho ga yis/ /mi bskyod zhing du nges par skye/ /rgyal ba'i thugs rjes gnang ba la/ /rnal 'byor ba de 'gro don 'grub/ /rgyal bas bden par gsungs pa dang/ /bdag gis brgyud pa'i man ngag mthong/ /ting nge 'dzin ma gsal sngags mchod/ /
316b3(rgyud 'grel): yang na rdzas ma chogs pa yin/ /'on kyang zhe sdang kho na dang/ /dam tshigs nyams pa dag kyang srid/ /tsaN+Da li yi mtshan bsnan la/ /las kyi gshin rje'i 'khor lo bskyed/ /gnas su yi ge dgod pa dang/ /lto bar 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /mtshan
316b4(rgyud 'grel): mo sngags kun gcig tu bzla/ /nyin mo so sor khyed la bzlas/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bris sku la/ /sgron ma chen po'i mchod pa 'bul/ /spro bsdu bskul don snga ma bzhin/ /zla ba phyed kyis de des 'grub/ /de nas de yi lpags pa bshu/ /lha yi gnas
316b5(rgyud 'grel): kyi sha rnams kun/ /bzung nas rjes la las kun la/ /'khor lo lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dbang la sogs/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'khor los bsgrub/ /mchod dang gtor ma rgya chen dang/ /snying rje kho nas bsgrub par bya/ /rjes thob
316b6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par gzhag pas 'grub/ /bskyed dang rdzogs dang gnyis med pa'i/ /bsam gtan bzlas pa spro bsdu yis/ /rtag tu bsnyen pa bya ba yin/ /des kyang grub par ma gyur zhing/ /mtshan ma rmi lam rtags rnams med/ /'khrugs dang nor pa
316b7(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dag /dam tshigs nyams pa yin pas sbyang/ /dbang bskur tshogs kyi mchod pa dag /sngon gyi slob dpon de nyid dam/ /grub thob sgrub pa rtag tu byed/ /de mnyes byas la zhu ba bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rgyud nyid kyi/ /cho ga shes pas dbang bskur
317a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas cho ga'i rim pa yis/ /'jam dpal rnal 'byor gsol ba la/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang/ /skye mched byin brlabs dbang bskur la/ /mi bskyod cod pan ldan pa yi/ /snying gar zla dkyil yi ge d+hI(rgyud 'grel): oM d+hI:
317a2(rgyud 'grel): swatA phyogs bzhir bzla/ /sngags dbyibs chos la spro bsdu bsam/ /rjes la mchod gtor bzlas pa 'bad/ /gnyis dang le lo'i bar chad spang/ /zhag drug zla drug lo drug tu/ /bsnyen pa'i cho ga dpa' bas bya/ /thun gcig zhag gcig zla ba la//
317a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe gcig bskal bar bka' min bsgrub/ /lam mchog 'di ni yun rings min/ /dam tshig snying rje thabs ldan na/ /zla drug nang du rtags mthong bas/ /rgyal ba mnyes byed mngon spyod spyad/ /de rjes rjes thob 'gro ba la/ /phan phyir 'khor lo'i las
317a4(rgyud 'grel): la 'jug /phyi rol pa dag bstan la gnod/ /rang rig dam tshig nyams bdag /mchod dang gtor ma bzlas la brtson/ /bsrungs ba dag gis 'gyangs pa la/ /ngag mnan bzlog pa'i 'khor lo bya/ /'khor los sngags sbyor rim pa dang/ /rdzas
317a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ting 'dzin rim pa dang/ /bsnyen sgrub las sbyor zla drug gis/ /rgyud ltar 'khor lo sbas pas 'grub/ /de las khyad par rnal 'byor pas/ /mnan dang bzlog pa'i cho ga ni/ /sngon du bsnyen dang rtag tu bsgom/ /gzhan du rgyal ba'i bka' ?
317a6(rgyud 'grel): las 'das/ /mar tshes brgyad la bri ba ni/ /ras dag sngon ltar rdzas kyis brgyad/ /yung ba ba blas kha bsgyur pa'i/ /sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bri/ /'khor lo'i yi ge 'bri dang bsnan/ /las kyi bye brag shes pa yis/ /ma ra stam+b+ha bcu
317a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar/ /pra mar ya stam+b+ha ya laM/ /mkhas pas ya ma bzhi yi mthar/ /kha stong bzhi la ling ga bskor/ /de bzhin spel ma zhag lnga bzla/ /dang po zhag la bsnyen pa dang/ /tha ma lkug pa'i chu la mnan/ /zhag bdun dag gis nges par
317b1(rgyud 'grel): gnon/ /yang na mi 'jigs bsrung ba ni/ /rtag par bsgoms pa de nyid mchog /'khor lo 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bskyed/ /de nyid gsum gyi spro bsdus bsrung/ /bya min nyal ba'i sa min spang/ /shar du phyogs shing gsum la skyabs/ /rten 'brel mthu yang
317b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs yin pas/ /bram ze srid bsrung las byung ras/ /tshes brgyad dag la 'bras chus brgyad/ /tsan dan dkar po til dkar dang/ /gu gul dkar pos legs byas la/ /gur kum gi wang legs sbyar bas/ /bcu bzhi'i snga dro bri ba ni/ /bcu gnyis
317b3(rgyud 'grel): sor ni zlum por bskor/ /phyi rol rdo rje ra ba la/ /me ri hUM dang rab tu ldan/ /de nas cha mnyam bzhi ru bskor/ /phyi rol 'khor la sum cu gnyis/ /rtsa sngags 'khor lo'i rtse mor dgod/ /rtsa bar oM ni drug cu bzhi/ /bsrung ba'i ming ni mdza' brten bri/ /
317b4(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs mtshan hUM phaT mdza' brten pa'i/ /bar chod dag gi ming dag bri/ /ri mig kA li dag gis dgang/ /de nas 'khor lo bcu drug la/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): sogs brgyad ni brgyad por bri/ /brgyad pa ming dang bsrung bar bcas/ /sngar bzhin rtsa bar oM gyis brten
317b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan la phaT brten gzhan dag bri/ /ri mig dag la A li yin/ /de bar brgyad la snying po ni/ /a thung bsnan pas brgyad bri'o/ /rtsa bar a brten bsrung ba bzhag /mtshan mar hUM phaT gzhan bsnan no/ /de nang d+hI(rgyud 'grel): dbus bzhag pa yi/ /phyogs
317b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhir oM d+hI(rgyud 'grel): swahA dgod/ /stong pa bzhi la ming bcas bsrung/ /oM gnyis h+ri(rgyud 'grel): k+She shar yin la/ /de ma ma ni byang nub lho/ /srod la maN+Dal legs byug la/ /me tog nag po bcu bdun dgod/ /de steng bzhag la rnal 'byor bzhi/ /rdzogs nas
317b7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma gtang dang bcol/ /bzlas pa spro bsdu yi ge dang/ /bcas pa'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs dang/ /rdo rje sa bzhir ba gur/ /rtag tu de nang gnas pa gdags/ /yang na rtag tu mchod par bya/ /mgul lam gtsug dang dpung g.yon gdags/ /
318a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo khros kyang 'jigs mi nus/ /phyir bzlog 'khor lo 'dod na 'ang/ /sngon bzhin rnal 'byor bzhis bskyed dam/ /rgyud las myur dang skad cig las/ /rnal 'byor gsal bas 'grub pa'o/ /stong dang snying rje mi ri dang/ /dra gur
318a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas bdud bzhi bzlog /de nas 'khor lo so bzhi ni/ /steng du oM las lha chen dgu /rtsa sngags rnams la gshin rje brgyad/ /las mkhan brgyad dang pho nya brgyad/ /bshan pa brgyad ni bskyed pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor rang lha'i mngag pas
318a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog/ hUM las rdo rje'i mig can rigs/ /phaT las 'og tu klu chen brgyad/ /rtsa sngags bdun bzlas bzlog par bsam/ /de nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu la/ /steng 'og phyogs skyong bskyed pa dang/ /de nang drug las snying po las/ /gshin
318a4(rgyud 'grel): rje drug ni bskyed pa dang/ /de bzhin rang bzhin re re gzhug /gnyis med gyur pa las brtsol ba/ /so so lus bong ljang gu'i mdog /g.yas kun 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang/ /g.yon kun sdigs mdzub byed pa yis/ /phas kyi 'byung po
318a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlog bsams la/ /snying gar ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /'jam dpal ting 'dzin spro bsdu bzlas/ /bdun brjod sku yi rigs rnams gzhug /ye shes gshin rje gshed bsams nas/ /ya mAn ta ka bdun brjod la/ /gsung rigs
318a6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bskul zhing gzhug /dam tshig 'jigs byed gsal ba yis/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bdun brjod thugs rigs gzhug /bcu gsum yon tan rtsa sngags brjod/ /bdun gyis rgyal ba thams cad gzhug de bzhin bdun bdun nang rim du
318a7(rgyud 'grel): phyi nas brjod pas bzlog pa'o/ /sems ni ting 'dzin d+hI(rgyud 'grel): la sba/ /ngag ni ye shes A(rgyud 'grel): la sba/ /lus ni dam tshig oM la sba/ /rdo rje bzlas pa ldan pas zhal/ /yang na pho mo ma nor ba'i/ /thod par 'khor lo bri ba ni/ /rdzas dus sngon bzhin legs
318b1(rgyud 'grel): bris la/ /ma ra'i gnas su stam+b+ha bzhag /steng gi thod pa spyi rdol la/ /ling ga tshon lngas btags pa drang/ /sngags gsum tha mar stam+b+ha btags/ /d+hI(rgyud 'grel): swahA yis bsrung bar bya/ /zhag gam thun nam zla ba ru/ /thun gcig dus gsum dag tu
318b2(rgyud 'grel): brab/ /non pa'i rtags dag nges pa dang/ /ba bla yung bas g.yam nag la/ /nang du sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ /phyi ru ri rab bris pa yis/ /mi 'bab mtsho ru mnan pa bya/ /kha bla yung ba ldong ros dang/ /gi wang dag gis thab khung ni/ /khru gang gru bzhi par
318b3(rgyud 'grel): byugs la/ /skyer ba dur khrod shing dang ni/ /seng ldeng glang po che yi spangs/ /rgyal po'i me spar me lha ser/ /'jigs byed bskyed sogs gsal ba la/ /ba bla yung kar yung ba dang/ /glang po che yi sha sregs pa/ /byang du phyogs pa'i ming dang
318b4(rgyud 'grel): bsreg /zhag bdun bsregs na rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnon cing rengs pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /yang na bra ba nag dang dmar/ /cho ga sngon mas de bzhin mnan/ /dam tshig bskang pa'i cho ga yis/ /bsrung ba shin tu bsdus te bzang/ /stong dang snying rje kho na yis/ /
318b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba mchog gis sangs rgyas 'grub/ /sngags rnams rgyun du bzla ba dang/ /dge gzhan gtor ma dag la brtson/ /dam tshig bla mas legs bskyangs na/ /bar chod thams cad bzlog par 'gyur/ /las kun sngon du bsnyan pa ni/ /zla gnyis
318b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa zhag bdun dang/ /las sbyor zhag re spyir dgos pa/ /bsgrub pa po yis shes par bya/ /bskrad pa rgyal mtshan ras blangs la/ /sngon gyi rdzas kyis 'khor lo bya/ /sngags spel ling ga shes pas dgod/ /dgug gzhug rim pa zhag bdun
318b7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub/ /sa bdun dag la rta dang ni/ /bsgrub bya zhon pa'i gzugs byas te/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng lho phyogs/ /nyi ma'i nyon mong tsaN+Da laM/ /lus la skye tshe'i mar byugs nas/ /nim pa'i shing la des 'dzeg pa'i/ /thod par nyi phyed sdum da  
319a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhar/ /bya rog tshang bsregs thal ba dang/ /dur khrod thal ba bsres pa ni/ /de'i mgo la blug cing byug /rgyal mtshan ras bsregs thal ba dang/ bsres pa de yi rkang la bsku/ dur khrod sol ba bya rog khrag/ bya rog rus
319a2(rgyud 'grel): pas shing shun la/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor bris byas la/ de'i dkyil du bsgrub bya yi/ /ling ga ming sngags spel ba bri/ bya rog dag gam sa bdun la/ /byas pa'i mgul du de btags te/ lho ru phyogs pas de sngon bzhag /sa bdun sprus las
319a3(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje ni/ /dbyug thogs de'i rgyab nas 'dod/ /dgug gzhug gsal bas sgrub pa yi/ rtags byung zhag bdun lon pa dang/ 'khor lo gshin rje'i lto bar bzhag /ling ga bsgrub bya'i snying gar sla/ nim pa'i shing gcig rtsa ba ru/ /lho
319a4(rgyud 'grel): ru phyogs pas bskyal bar skred/ de nas sbyin sregs bya ba ni/ /rlung gi thab khung dbus su na/ /nim pa 'bras phug bya rog tshar/ da du ra shing dur khrod shing/ dur khrod shing gis me spang la/ /me lha ljang gu bskyed pa dang/ 'jigs byed bskyed sogs
319a5(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba la/ /gcir bu skra grol lho phyogs pas/ bya rog khyim cha spal pa khyi/ sha dang rnga mo'i rtug pa tshang/ byi la'i khrag gis sbrus la bsreg /yi ge bcu pa gtsor byas la/ /ming dang bcas pas grub pa yin/ /zhag bdun byas na grong
319a6(rgyud 'grel): khyer skyong/ /smyo bar bya ba sprod dang mtshungs/ /sha chen da du ro 'bras bsreg /dbye ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ bram ze ldom bi ma he rta/ bya rog 'ug pa ne le sbrul/ /khrag gis 'khor lo brgyad dag bri/ mkhas pas sngags dgod spol bas 
319a7(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /bram ze rigs ngan thod par bzhag /sa bdun dag la ma ha rta/ gzugs la shing shun ling ga sba/ sgro gnyis rus pa gnyis la ni/ /bcu pa'i sngags sgrel bri ba dang/ /sgro gnyis bcings la lpags par gzhug /nim pa'i shing gi steng
319b1(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag /sa bdun rgyu la bsgrub bya bya/ ma he rta la bskyon byas nas/ da du ra'i thal ba dang/ tsher mas bcu pa'i sngags bzla'o/ las sbyor ling ga bsgrub byar sba/ chu 'gram 'thabs par sba zhing bskyal/ de nas chu dang me yi thabs/ tsher ma pho
319b2(rgyud 'grel): ma can gyi shing/ dur khrod shing dang 'bras phub la/ /dur khrod gtum po'i me sbar te/ lha ni dmar nag bskyed pa dang/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bskyed pa la/ ma he rta dang bya rog 'ug /rma bya sbrul gyi sha bsreg bya/ yi ge bcu pa ming spel bas/ /
319b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyang 'byed/ de nas dbang dang dgug pa bstan/ gur kum gi wang srin lag khrag /'khor lo brgyad dag bri bar bya/ thod pa gnyis la 'khor lo bri/ /'khor lo dgug bzhug dril la gzhug /gur kum gi wang srin lag
319b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag/ /sa bdun sbrus la bsgrub bya yi/ sor mo bcu drug gzugs brnyan la/ sha khrag 'gi wang gur kum gyis/ gro ga'i 'khor la snying gar gzhug /me tog spos phor dus gsum mchod/ nub tu phyogs pas rtsa sngags bzla/ seng
319b5(rgyud 'grel): ldang me la thor ba bsro/ bcu pa'i snying po las sbyor bya/ 'gyang na dur khrod rdzas 'khor lo/ gsang pa'i 'khor lo sngags bye ba/ ro srogs sel ba spra tshil dang/ tsha ba gsum dang rdzas gzhan la/ /bsgrub bya mtho gang khas?
319b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs/ 'khor lo snying gar bcug byas la g.yon brkyang ma he'i zhal sbyar bas/ mnan la yi ge bcu pas dgug /sbyin sreg thab khung zla gam du/ tsan dan dmar pa dgu po gur kum dang/ gi wang srin lag khrag gi byug /seng
319b7(rgyud 'grel): ldang me lha lha gnyis dmar/ rke ba tshe'i gzugs rten nya dang chang/ til dang 'bras kyi tsher ma dug /bdud rtsi lnga dang khrag sprus la/ nub tu phyogs pas dus gsum du/ brgya rtsa brgyad ni zhag bdun bya/ sha lnga rnam snang rdo rje'i chu/ chang dang
320a1(rgyud 'grel): bsregs na rgyal po sogs/ thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ yi ge bcu pa'i sbyor bas bya/ rgyas par 'dod la rgyas pa'i las/ bsgrub pa po yis 'di ltar bya/ rgyal po khyim bdag ras blangs la/ gur kum
320a2(rgyud 'grel): gi wang tsan dan gyis/ 'khor lo brgyangs la bri bar bya/ sra ba gru bzhi ser por sba/ srad bu ser pos rgya gram dkri/ maN+Dal ser po'i steng du bzhag /byang du phyogs pas bsam gtan sngags/ rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor bas bya/
320a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog ser pos dus gsum mchod/ phra ma gshin rje gshed mnyam pa'i/ rgyas pa'i las ni gang 'dod pa/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub par 'gyur/ sbyin sreg rgyas pa'i thab khung du/ u dum wa ra'i shing la me/ spar la lha
320a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ser po bskyed/ til nas mar dang 'bras zho dag /byang du bltas pas stong du bsreg /gang 'dod pa de rgyas par 'gyur/ sngags dang ming du bcas bsregs na/ gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur ba'o/ zhi ba'i las ngag 'di
320a5(rgyud 'grel): ltar bya/ /stong dang snying rje 'jigs byed ldan/ tsan dan til dkar gur kum dang/ gi wang go ro tsa na yis/ 'khor lo brgyad dang ye ge dgod/ sra ba zlum po dkar po sba/ srad bu dkar pos dkri byas la/ maN+Dal dkar po'i steng
320a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhag ste/ shar du phyogs pas zhi bas bsgrub/ me tog dkar pos dus gsum mchod/ sbyin sreg thab khung zlum po ru/ ba la sha la me spar la/ me lha rdo rje 'jigs byed dkar/ bskyed dang dgug sogs legs par
320a7(rgyud 'grel): mchad/ /shar du la bltas til dang mar/ sbrang rtsi 'o ma dur ba dag /dus gsum dag tu zhag bdun bsreg /bdag dang gzhan gyi bar chad zhi/ las bzhan kun dang spogs pa ni/ 'khor lo'i rdzas dang sbyar bas dbye/ man ngag rgyud pa bla
320b1(rgyud 'grel): ma bsten/ rdzas dang dam tshig ting 'dzin gsal/ sngags la gus na 'grub pa las/ ma gsangs gzhan du mi 'grub po/ thams cad rdzas dang 'khor lo dang/ bsam gtan sngags la brtson pa dang/ bsnyen pa brtul zhugs dpa' ba dang/ bla ma la gsang
320b2(rgyud 'grel): gsangs na 'grub/ de las gzhan pas mi 'grub pas/ rgyud ltar snod brtag 'bad pas gsang/ ma gsangs snod ngan la bshad pas/ dpon slob 'di dang phyi mar brlab/ rgyud don bla ma la brten nas/ mos pas 'di byas mkhas pas bkod/ sgra?
320b3(rgyud 'grel): don log nyes pa rnams/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chos skyong bshags/ /rgyud dang gdams ngag la brten te/ 'gro la bsams nas sgrub thabs bris/ /'di las dge ba ci thob pas/ bdag gzhan rdo rje'i sku thob shog /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sgrub  
320b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs rdo rje 'od ces bya ba/ slob dpon chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //mkhas pa chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta de nyid dang/ lo tsa ba glan d+harma ma tis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab nas/ bdag byung? ngo
320b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bas/ bi ka ma la shI la nyid du bla ma chen po de nyid dang/ /lo tsa ba de nyid la mnyes par bsnyen nas zhus pa'o/ man ngag dang dkyus 'di phrad nas nges par gtan la phab pas nyams su tshor ba yod do// /
320b6(rgyud 'grel): (!/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra b+hai ra wa badzra maN+Da la pra ka bi d+hi nA ma bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gsal ba zhes bya ba/ /dpal
320b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' lta bur dngos bdag med/ /dus mdza' i 'od ltar lha rnams 'bar/ /shes rab thabs 'dres gnyis su med/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nyid thob 'dod rig can la/ de'i dkyil/ 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cho ga bshad/ brgyud pa'i rim 'ongs man ngag thob/ /rgyud sde shes shing cho ga mkhas/ /dam tshig la gnas byin rlabs yod/ sbyin sogs snying rje slob ma 'dzin/ gnod sbyin rigs 'dus bstan la gus/ de ni dka' yang
321a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon rigs/ bzung bar bya ba'i slob ma ni/ dad gus snying rje shes rab yod/ dge sdig rnam smin 'bras bu shes/ /sdom gnas dul zhing khro ba spangs/ brtul zhugs dpal phod sems stobs bzon/ sems gcig don med bsgrub pa
321a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod/ zab dang rgya che 'dzin la gnas/ de las gzhan pa 'dir mi gzung/ dur khrod la sogs dben bsdad de/ /maN+Dal mchod gtor rdzas bsags la/ sdom dang sngags kyi slob ma bsrung/ rnal 'byor bzhi gnas 'bum khri stong/ /snying
321a4(rgyud 'grel): po las dang rtsa sngags bzlas/ chos skyong bsnyen pa rtags mtshan grangs/ bsnyan pa grub nas sta gon te/ dbyibs sngags chos dang ldan pa yis/ phyogs dang dbyibs dang kha dog la/ btsal dang brtag pa dag tu bya/ dkar dang zlum dang shar la
321a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs/ /'bol snum gyong dang yang ba yis/ rnyed legs slang dang dbrog par bya/ yang na rin gyis ho yang rung/ lha mo dpang byang rnal 'byor bzhis/ stong nyid dra gur rdo rje'i gdan/ oM b+hu khaM gis chos nyid mkha' / hUM laM hUM legs 'byung ba'i
321a6(rgyud 'grel): rim/ /badzra me 'di'i sngags brjod cing/ rak+Sha rak+Shas rdo rjes bsrung/ sa ro dbyung zhing sbyang bar bya/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang/ spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par ni/ lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ brjod la lha mo mkha' 
321a7(rgyud 'grel): la bteg/ bdud rtsi khrag chen pa yi dri/ sor bzhi mtho gang gru bzhir brtsig/ slob dpon khrus bya dri zhim dang/ bdud rtsi lngas byug dur khrod kyi/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan cod pan dang/ stod smad gos ldan gdan la bsdad/ rdo rje dril bu snying rjes bzung/
321b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba bsgral phyir dkyil 'khor 'jug rnal 'byor chen pos gnas pa la/ dris brgyan rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ slob ma bzhi yis gsol ba gdab/ /'gro kun gti mug mnan mthong nas/ 'gro ba'i gti mug gsal ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan gti mug gshad du
321b2(rgyud 'grel): byon/ /gti mug 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bzhengs/ 'gro kun nga rgyal gyis mnan kyis/ 'gro kun nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir/ bcom ldan phra ma gshed du byon/ phra ma 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bzhes/ 'gro kun 'dod chags gzir gzigs nas/ /bcom
321b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'dod chags bshed du byon/ /'gro ba'i 'dod chags sbyar ba'i phyir/ /'dod chags 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro kun drag dog bcings mthong nas/ /'gro ba'i phrag dog bsgral ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan phrag dog gshed du mdzad/ /phrag
321b4(rgyud 'grel): dag 'jigs byed phyag 'tshal bzhengs/ /'gro kun zhe sdang gis gzir gzigs/ /'gro ba'i zhe sdang sbyang ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan zhe sdang gshed du sprul/ zhe sdang 'jigs mdzad phyag 'tshal bzhengs/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil
321b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun gyis mngon gyur pa/ /sdig pa thams cad nyams byad cing/ 'dod pa kun 'byung mgon par bri/ /gsol ba'i sgra de brag ca ltar/ gsal nas chos nyid dag la bzhengs/ /snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun/ /dug lnga'i gnas nas bsgral bsams
321b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /hUM hUM badzra u d+hi Sh+dza brjod la rdo rje gsor bas bzhengs/ /gang? ma las rdo rje'i can/ g.yas dang g.yon gyis/ /khams gsum blta/ /sangs rgyas kun bskul bgegs bskrad bsam/ rkang las hUM 'od rdo rje'i sa/ rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen par/
321b7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang g.yas brkyang sogs/ /gang dang bcas pas lan gsum du/ /dkyil 'khor bskor la bsrung ba bya/ hUM ba ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor byed/ nyon gcig bgegs rnams kun nyon gcig/ lus ngag yid la
322a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod pa kun/ /lha k+Shu gnod sbyin la sogs khyed/ de ring gzhan du 'gro bar gyis/ gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na/ rdo rje 'bar pa'i lus ldan pa'i/ rdo rje 'di yis bgegs byed kun/ lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya'o/ /de nas gnod
322a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes sngags kyis bsrung/ g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+hA ta yis phur pas gdab/ mchod dang gtor mas khro bo mchod/ bdag dang slob ma bsrung par gsol/ lha mo dmigs nas mchod pas mchod/ skyobs pa shAkya seng ge yis/ drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ stobs
322a3(rgyud 'grel): chen dag kyang de ltar bcom/ de ltar bdag gis bdud las ni/ rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ lha mo khyod kyis dpang mdzod cig/ lha mo slar thim sa sta gon/ de nas lha gnas bdud rtsi'i dris/ thig le me tog tshom bu bya/ lha bskyed dgug
322a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhug bcing bgyes la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang/ stong dang snying po ci nus pas/ mnyes par byas la gsol ba gdab/ pus mo'i lha nga pad+ma la/ g.yas gtsugs g.yas pas spos thogs te/ bcom ldan gshin rje 'jigs rdo rje/ /

322a6(rgyud 'grel): gnang bar 'os/ /'khor lo 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la dgongs/ /'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gzhan yang sngags la gnas pa'i lha/ /'jig rten skyed pa'i 'byung po rnams/ sangs rgyas
322a7(rgyud 'grel): bstan la dga' ba yi/ /rdo rje mig dang ldan pa rnams/ /de ring rdo rje 'dzin min bdag/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor 'di/ /'gro la phan phyir bri bar byed/ /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod kyis/ /rjes su brtse phyir nye bar gsol/ /bdag dang slob mar 
322b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni grogs kun la/ /bsrung dang nye bar skyob pa ni/ khyed kyis bya bar 'os lags so/ de ltar lan gsum brjod pa ni/ dkyil 'khor sta gon nam mkha' la bteg /de nas nag nig rtsa ba spang/ gser sogs rin chen sa yang rung/ /lto
322b2(rgyud 'grel): yangs mgrin ring mchu 'phyang ba/ /bco brgyad rang bdag tshan mas gdab/ /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang/ /tsU ta'i kha rgyas gos kyis dkri/ /lha bskyed dgug gzhug mchod bstod bzla/ zhu ba bdud rtsi'i chu yis dgang/ me tog phreng ba arg+ha'i snod/ /rdo rje dang
322b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas ku sha'i gdan/ lha gnas dag gam rim pas bzhag/ skabs der ru pa'i slob ma dag /khrus dang maN+Dal mchod pa dag/ me tog las gzung gus pas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi sgor bsdang bar bya/ dngos grub 'dod pas dad pa yis/ /'jig rten pha rol
322b4(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs te/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgrub bar bya/ 'jig rten 'di dmigs mchog mi 'grub/ de ltar spro ba bskyed nas ni/ /dad pa bskyed pa'i slob ma la/ /cho ga ji bzhin sems bskyed cing/ tshig 'di dag gis lan gsum brlab /dkon mchog
322b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags/ /'gro sogs dge la rjes yi rang/ sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ sems can
322b6(rgyud 'grel): ma lus bdag gis 'gron du gnyer/ byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ 'gro ba thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ de nas gus pas slob dpon la/ tshig 'dis lan gsum gsol ba gdab/
322b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal chen khyed bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i/ dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ byang chub sems ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ mchog gsum po
323a1(rgyud 'grel): yang bdag la gsol/ thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ mgon pos bdag nyid 'jug par 'tshal/ bu tshur shog cig theg chen la/ /sngags spyod pa yis mchog 'di ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ khyod ni theg chen snod
323a2(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni/ ye shes mnyam med yang dag mnyes/ shAkya seng ge sogs mchog gis/ /gsang sngags mnyam med mthu yis ni/ /'jigs
323a3(rgyud 'grel): pa chen po bdud kyi sde/ stobs chen dag kyang des bcom nas/ 'jig rten rjes su gshegs nas kyang/ 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de don bshad nas mkha' gsang
323a4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /byin rlabs dbyung ba rnam snang dmigs/ gnas gsum byin brlabs mchod pa bya/ gsang sngags mchog tu deng sems bskyed/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni bla na med/ dam pa bdag
323a5(rgyud 'grel): gis bsgyed par bgyi/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ mchog gsum bo la skyabs su mchi/ rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ni/ rdo rje dril gu'i phyag rgya yang/ /gsum bdag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ slob dpon dag kyang bzung bar bgyi/ rin chen rigs
323a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la/ nyin re bzhin nam dus drug tu/ chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams/ spyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu spyin/ byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i/ pad ma'i rigs mchog chen po la/ phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ dam pa'i
323a7(rgyud 'grel): chos kyang ma lus bzung/ las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ yang dag nyid du gnas par bgyi/ mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang/ dge pa'i chos ni bsdu ba dang/ /sems
323b1(rgyud 'grel): can don bya'i tshul khrims gsum/ de nas bdag gis bzung bar bgyi/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ bdag gis sdom pa ma lus bzung/ ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ dbug ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung
323b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod/ skyon spangs rtse mo cha las byung/ bcu gnyis sor bcas me tog bcas/ /ba yi pags pa tsam gyis byug/ shar bltas dor la zhi sogs brtag/ ngag gi nyes pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ dri chu'i skyob chu
323b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin par bya/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): pA pa ni shtsa saM shod+ha ya sarba bi kalpa a pa na ya hUM/ las dang rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pa'i/ sku sha sngas dang stan du sbyin/ lus tshad gsum sgril las sngags kyis/ mdud pa lha dang bsrung ba gdags  bar chad sdig pa zhi bya'i phyir/ zhi ba 'am man ngag sbyin bsreg bya/ de nas spro ba'i chos bshad bya/ gtor ma btang zhing mchod bstod bzla/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten du/ 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung srid/ u dum ??
323b4(rgyud 'grel): tog bzhin/ /rgya la lam na 'ang res 'ga' 'byung/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i mchog 'di ni/ de bas kyang ni rnyed par dka' / gang phyir sems can mnyam med don/ bla na med pa byed par nus/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa ru/ gang gis mtshams med
323b5(rgyud 'grel): sdig byas pa/ dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra mthong ba yis/ sdig pa thams cad zad par byed/ grags pa mdza' yas sngags spyod pa'i/ tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/ skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni/ go 'phangs bla na med par 'gyur/
323b6(rgyud 'grel): gang gis sngags sbyor mchog 'di la/ blo gros shin du dri med na/ /sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung ba yi/ /ngan 'gro thams cad 'dis spong ngo/ bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ gang phyir rgyal ba sras
324a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas kyis/ bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams bsrung/ thog mchog 'dir ni khyed rnams kun/ legs pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur/ theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba/ lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ khyed rnams 'di ru 'gro bzhin du/

324a4(rgyud 'grel): shi dza(rgyud 'grel): mchod la gsol ba gdab par bya/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): pra yats+tsha mo ha kI la ra swa tsakra sU tra NA yA hUM/ slob dpon slob mas thig gzung ste/ nub dang shar bsdang thig gdab po/ ye shes gzhal yas gsal bar gdab/ sngags 'dis sangs

324b4(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi/ thig bzhi dag kyang yang dag ldan/ shar ni dkar po chen po ste/ lho nub byang dag ser dmar ljang/ dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo shar/ lho ru rin chen pad+ma nub/ /byang du ral gri 'khor lo ma/ bden bral rdo rje pad ma byung/

325a1(rgyud 'grel): nang mchod dang bstod/ /slob dpon de nyid der rol bya/ /de nas lha la gsol ba ni/ /slob ma 'jug dang dbang bskur phyir/ /'dod chags chen po 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lo gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /bdag gi mthong nas slob ma rnams

325b3(rgyud 'grel): bu khyod zhugs pas na/ /ye shes rdo rje ngas bskyed bya/ /ye shes rdo rje mchog thob na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba/ /rnams la smras na dam tshig nyams/ /rdo rje me tog mgor bzhag ste/ /'di ni sku'i rdo rje ste//

325b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor man ngag thob pas bya// //de nas maN+Dal me tog lon/ /phul la dbab pa'i gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje dbab par mdzad du gsol/ /brjod la rtse gcig ba yi sems/ /skyil krung rtsog
326a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsog bor bsdad la/ /spyi bo snying ga lte ba rkang/ /baM laM raM yaM dzhai dag las/ /chu dang sa dang me dang rlung/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bskyed dzhaiM gis bskul/ /bskyod par bskul dang rlangs pa zhu/ /bdud rtsi 'bab cing ye shes skyed/ /babs par bsams
326a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bskul bar bya/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu bkol/ /oM d+hI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Tri(rgyud 'grel): wikri hA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT A be sha ya sto b+ha ya ra ra ra ra rtsa la ya hUM hA dzhaiM phaT/ lus ngag yid ni gang phebs la/ /gti mug gshed sogs gtso cher dbab/ /ngag la a dmar smra

326a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor re khA gang nyid rigs/ /phyi rol byung ba lan gsum bskyal/ /des kyang ma bab dbang mi bskur/ /de nas snang ba dri bar bya/ /lha yi rigs dang mthun pa 'grub/ /mig la oM bsgom ye shes spyan/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbye bar bsam/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed
326a6(rgyud 'grel): der khyod kyi/ /mig ni yang dag 'byed par byed/ /rdo rje mig ni bla med pa/ /phyi bas thams cad mthong bar shog /gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /mthong nas dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyod ni 'jigs
326a7(rgyud 'grel): byed rigs su skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /tho pa rdo rje 'jigs byed nas/ /zhe sdang 'jigs byed par du bstan/ /slob dpon lha la phyag gsum bya/ /dkyil 'khor gzhug pa'i cho ga ste/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa byang bar bstan// //
326b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob ma dbang thob phyir/ /rin chen bang mdzod bu smad bcas/ /rang gi lus ngag yid gsum yang/ /dad gus dga' bas dbul par bya/ /gdugs dang bla re ba dan sogs/ /mchod pa dag dang rgyan bzang ngam/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis legs brgyan la/ /lho
326b2(rgyud 'grel): sgor bsrung bar shes par bya/ /byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod chen stsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang rab tu skyob pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /lan gsum de brjod gsol pa gdab/ /de ltar dbang bskur yon rnams dbul/ /de nas
326b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rnal 'byor bzhis/ /bskyed la dbang bskur lha mo dang/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed slob dpon nyid/ /rig pa'i dbang lnga bskul bar bya/ /bkra shis sgra brjod bkra shis par/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed mkha' 'gros byed/ /gsang ba gsum nas byung ba yi/ /khams
326b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum kun gyis phyag byas la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskul ba/ /rdo rje chu yis bum dbang bskur/ /oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ las bum khrus bya rnam rgyal dbang/ /rigs kyi spro bsdu shes bya la/ /chu dang 'brel bas de bzhin kun/ /gser
326b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs thor tshugs cod pan dbang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /rigs lnga'i dbang bskur dag pa 'di/ /spyi gtsug rgyal bar dbang bskur bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna ba tra la a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed rdo rje'i dbang/ /
326b6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang chen 'di/ /yang dag khyod la bskur bar bya/ /oM badzri a b+hi pa titna a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya stwaM/ chos rnams rnam dag rnam par thar/ /shes rab pha rol phyir gnyis med/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa/ /dril bu'i
326b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur chen po long/ /oM badzra sarba ta thA ga ta badzra g+haN+DA b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/ /de nas rdo rje ldan ba'i lag/ spyi bor bzhag pas ming dbang sbyin/ /dngos po gang dang gang snang ba/ /de de rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid/ /chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis dag /sangs rgyas ye shes
327a1(rgyud 'grel): dang snang ba'i/ /oM badzra satwa ta nA mA d+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /rdo rje cho ge mo brjod do/ /rig pa'i dbang lnga lha mos bskur/ /ye shes lha la chos nyan rig /nyan dang bsgrub pa kun la dbang/ /des na rig pa'i dbang thob po// de nas slob
327a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon dbang dod du// /yon dbul gsol ba gdab par bya/ /dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog pa'i dbar/ /slob dpon dbang bskur bdag la stsal lo/ dkyil 'khor lho la de nyid dang/ /slob dpon gyi ni las dag dang/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig dang/
327a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba mchog gi sdom pa rnams sems can kun don bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon bdag la gsal/ /de nas lho sgor gdan dang khri/ /chog shes bya slob ma gzhan/ /bgegs gsal rgyan bzang dur khrod brgyan/ /slob dpon mi ldog dbang sbyin no/
327a4(rgyud 'grel): lag g.yas rdo rje bskyed nas ni/ /de nas rdo rje sbyin par bya/ /thog mdza' med pa'i rdo rje ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che rang bzhin/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'jigs byed dag pa'i bdag /oM? badzra mahA hUM/ de bzhin g.yon par dril bu sbyin/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid
327a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis dug /ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /dag pa'i srid pa grub par byed/ /oM a badzra b+haN+Da ya/ rang 'dra'i dam tshig phyag rgya ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya de bstan pa/ /rang yid gzugs ni bstan par byed/ /'di ni rang
327a6(rgyud 'grel): gi 'dod pa'i lha/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar grags shing gnas/ /shes rab bcu drug lon pa la/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa'i/ /lag pa gnyis kyis yang dag ma gyur/ /slob dpon dbang du bskur bar bya/ /brjod la de don de la bstan/ /de ltar mi
327a7(rgyud 'grel): ldog dbang bstan nas/ /de ni dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan/ /dran pa bzhi dang slong ba bzhi/ /rkang pa dbang po shar sgo sogs/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs yin/ /ting 'dzin rnams ni kha khyer bzhi/ /gzungs sgo dag ni lha mo'i tshogs/ /tshogs gnyis
327b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs phyir rgyan sna tshogs/ /gsung rab yan lag phan dril sogs/ /byang chub yan lag bdun rnams ni/ /dra ba dra phyed me long sogs/ /ye shes lnga ldan dkar sogs phyogs/ /ma 'dres ye shes lha rnam bzhi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rdo rje phreng/ /sna tshogs rdo rje
327b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs lngar 'dul/ /nyes pas ma gos sna tshogs pas/ /bdud rnams bsregs pas ye shes nyid/ /nyon mongs sel phyir zla ba'i gdan/ /snying rje brlan phyir bum pa brgyad/ /bde chen spyod pas mchod pa'i tshogs/ /dur khrod gdan gyis gshin rje 'joms/
327b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshol gdug pa 'dul ba po/ /rnam shes zhe sdang chos kyi dbyings/ /ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid/ /zhal dgu rnam thar gyis 'jug pa/ /dbus zhal gsum ni sku gsung pa/ g.yas gsum thabs kyi sku gsung thugs/ /g.yon pa shes rab rnam thar
327b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /rwa gnyis thab dang shes rab la/ /ma he dreg pa'i bdud rnams 'dul/ /spyan gsum dmar ba snying rje gsum/ /byams pa nag po dag pa rigs/ /khro bo bdud 'dul sprul gyis klubs/ /klus brgyan gshin rje gar dgus ldan/ /byang chub phyogs chos
327b5(rgyud 'grel): so gnyis phyag /phyag mtshan lha min 'dul byed pa'i/ /nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis gtso/ /gcer bu chos sku mtshan 'greng ba/ /bde ba chen po sku yi rtags/ /phyag gnyis glang po'i lags pa ni/ /thugs rje thabs kyis 'gro ba skyob/ /stong pa bcu drug zhabs
327b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug /zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags rims/ /'dul phyir lha dang mi sogs bya/ /dbu skra nang gi ye shes 'bar/ gzugs sogs phung po gti mug sogs/ /ye shes bzhi yis gzhan gshed bzhi/ /zhal gsum rnam thar ngo bo ste/ /mdog gis
327b7(rgyud 'grel): zhi sogs phyag mtshan yang/ /rigs rigs las dang mthun pa dag /nye ba'i nyon mongs 'byung ba bzhi/ /byams sogs tsar cil sogs so/ /'dog zhal phyag mtshan sngon dang 'dra/ /bde chen longs spyod thod pa bzhi/ /thob la sogs sgo ba bzhi/ /skye rga na 'chi sdug
328a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bzhi/ /sgrib bzhi lta bzhi 'jom par byed/ /bdud bzhi sngags par byed pa dang/ /mdog zhal phyag drug sbyin sogs drug /de ltar lha yi de nyid do/ /de nas mtshan ldan dbang thob cing/ /rigs dang si? ma ldan pa la/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub?

328a6(rgyud 'grel): chos gos snying gar gzung/ /g.yas pas mchog sbyin phyag rgya yis/ /sangs rgyas dang bcas 'di skad bsgrags/ /oM shi ti bya ka ro mi ta badzra satwa ta thA ga ta b+ha wa da khaM ti ho ut tedya a ha ta na d+ha b+ha waM sid d+hA ye kye che ge mo zhes bya ba ta thA ga tas twa sa

330a1(rgyud 'grel): ral gri sna tshogs rdo rje g.yas/ /pad+ma 'khor lo g.yon na 'dzin/ /nag dang dkar ba g.yas dang g.yon/ /tA na na hUM hUM phaT/ /phaT dang swAhA sa bon rnams/ /ral gri 'khor lo gong bzhin rims/ /'byung po me lha 'khor bcas rnams/ /
330a2(rgyud 'grel): gti mug gshed sogs mdog can no/ /hUM gnyis phaT gcig nyi zla sogs/ /gti mug gshad po lta bu'o/ /phaT dang swa hA lha mo dang/ /sa bdag khyab byed 'og phyogs skyong/ /rdo rje zhe sdang 'jigs dang mtshungs/ /dkar dang dmar po g.yas dang g.yon/

330a5(rgyud 'grel): wa ru na ye swahA/ wi ku re re ye swahA/ /kri a'i shan ye swahA/ /tA agna ye swAhA/ na ne raMti ye swAhA/ na bA ya be ye swAhA/ hUM tsan+d+ra ye swAhA/ hUM arka ye swahA/ phaT brahma ye swAhA/ phaT bai ma tsi tre ne swahA/ sarba b+hu te b+ho swA swa hA/ /ha ha Ta hi hi Da

330b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i gtso/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun byed/ /rdo rje sku dang rab mtshungs pa/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
330b2(rgyud 'grel): gsung pa/ /sangs rgyas kun thugs mchog gi gtso/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /a yi sgo can sngags brjod la/ /'dod pa'i las ni gsol ba dang/ /smon lam rgya chen gdab byas la/ /gtor ma dur khrod sogs su bskyal/ /chos
330b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi sbyin bar gyur pa'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi ru/ /khru gang khrung yar khru gang/ /sor mo nyi shu bzhi sogs rgya/ /phyed phyed zhabs su dbyigs rims brko/ /sor bzhi brgyad gsum byed gnyis dag/ bskor dang brtsig pa'i rim pas shes//
330b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rin chen pad+ma gri/ /phreng ba zur bzhi dag tu dgod/ /tsan dan gur kum pa la sha /dri ma zhim pas kha dog byug /zhi sogs phyag mtshan lha yis dgod/ me tog dkar ser dmar nag dgod/ /dgon pa'i ba lci pa la sha/ u dum wa ra a shar
