330b6(rgyud 'grel): la me tog dmar po bya/ /gsang ba lan tshwa ske tshe dug /mar la sogs pas rdzas rnams dbul/ /thab bsang me zhi rab tu sbyar/ /bram ze rgyal po rje rigs dang/ /gdol pa zhi sogs rim pas blang/ /me lha las dang mthun par ni/ /ri dang dbyug gu rtse
330b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum las/ /zhal gsum g.yas g.yon rigs dang mtshungs/ /dbyu gu phreng ba mchog sbyin g.yas/ /guN De pad+ma thor pa can/ /gsus pa che ba bskyed byas la/ /shar lho'i spyan drang gnyis med bya/ /mchod pa lnga dang legs par bstod/ /bsreg
331a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bdun nam rtsa gcig brgya/ /phul la me lha gnas su gshegs/ /me lha gzhal yas lha bskyed la/ /ye shes dgu la sogs pa yi/ /rnal 'byor chen po rang tu bya/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul/ /bstod pa sngags kyis
331a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kun sreg/ oM agna ye swAhA/ /mar gyi'o/ /oM sarba pA pa ha na da ha na bdzrA ya che ge mo/ /sarba shAn+tiM ku ru swAhA/ /til gyi sngags so/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ /'bras kyi'o/ /oM badzra bi dza ye swAhA/ /so ba'i'o/ /oM mahA be ga ye swAhA/ oM ma hA ba la
331a3(rgyud 'grel): ye swAhA/ /nas dang sran ma'i 'o/ /oM badzra A yu(rgyud 'grel): She swAhA/ /dur ba'i'o/ oM a pra ti ha ta badzra ya swAhA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra agna ya swAhA/ u dum wa ra'i 'o/ /oM badzra bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ /byang chub shing gi'o/ /oM badzra la ta ye
331a4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ blag sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku ber ya swAhA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /oM badzra d+haM ba ye swAhA/ /'o ma'i'o/ /oM badzra d+ha hi ye swAhA/ zho'i'o/ brgya sogs phul la bstod la gshegs/ /gal te drag po'i las 'dod na/ /sa bdun bzung la dug lnga
331a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang khrag lnga dang/ /kha ba lnga dang tsha ba lnga/ /sbrul la gzugs dang ming sgel la/ /dur khrod nang du sur mes bsreg /dur khrod shing la me spar la/ /drag po'i me lha rang la bsdu/ /man ngag yod pas bsregs na 'grub/ /man phyed 'jigs
331a6(rgyud 'grel): byed sbyor bas bya/ /thal ba gzugs brnyan de nyid du/ /mnan pa byas pas gdon mi za/ /khru gang gser dngul zangs lcags la/ /yu ba khru gang pa'i snod/ /sa drug rdo rje rin chen bcas/ /sor gnyis zhabs su rdo rje ldan/ /rdo rje'i spu gur ro rnams 'byung/ /mthe
331a7(rgyud 'grel): chung shing ba'i bu ga'o/ /blugs gzar ring thung de yi tshad/ /rtse sor bzhi ni pad 'dab 'dra/ /sor gnyis zab can rdo rjer ldan/ /de yis thams cad dgang gzar dag/ phyi nas me lha lhag par mchod/ /smon lam shis pa la sogs pa'i/ /cho ga cho ga
331b1(rgyud 'grel): shes pas bya/ /yi ge brgya pas lha gshegs la/ /thab dang thal ba legs par gshegs/ /slob dpon 'byor ba 'dod pa yis/ /rab tu gnas pa 'dod na yang/ /dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg sbyor shes pa/ /gdugs dang bla re mchod sogs 'gram/ /slob dpon
331b2(rgyud 'grel): khrus byas dri zhim lus/ /phyag rgya lngas brgyan rdor dril bzung/ /sum cha'i gdan la legs bzhugs la/ /sku gsum mchod rten glegs bam dag /ri mo gzugs na'am nub bzhugs la/ /shar du zhal ni gzigs par shis/ gsang gtor yon chab 'thor
331b3(rgyud 'grel): mthung dbul/ /sra ba sar par gu gul bsreg/ de la til dang bsang gtor gyis/ /lan gsum bskor la dor la bskyar/ /de nas ba yi lnga yi ku?/ /oM hUM h+ri h+ri a zhes bsku/ /de nas dr zhim dur bas bsku/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swa hA/ /
331b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod la bsku'o/ /de nas shun pa lngas bskru ste/ /oM swa b+hA wa bi shud d+honyahaM/ zhes pas bkru'o/ /de nas las kyi dum pas bkru/ /ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis kyang/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//
331b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin bde gshegs nyid khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ ri mo me long nang du bkru/ /gnas gsum byin rlabs mchod dang bstod/ /bkra shis tshig bdun dge bar brjod/ /snyan gsan phab la sta bon bzhugs
331b6(rgyud 'grel): na bza' ser po rten la gsol/ /bzlas pa gtor ma ci nus bya/ /mtho rangs skya rengs byung ba dang/ /sngon bzhin slob dpon rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngon gyi rim pas sku khrus gsol/ /mchod rten gzugs dang glegs bam rnams/ /sku gsum dag gam rigs
331b7(rgyud 'grel): lnga 'am/ /thugs dang sku dang gsung gi lha/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi legs bskyed la/ /rim par dbang bskur rab tu gnas/ /glegs bam 'od dpag med gyur nas/ /de yang gang yin de nyid gyur/ /sngags 'dis na bza' gsol bar bya/ /oM badzra
332a1(rgyud 'grel): bA sa se swahA/ /mchod bstod smon lam bkra shis bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg shin tu shis/ /de nas rdal snod dag tu ni/ /'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi yis/ /gser gyi thur mas spyan dbye ste/ /oM tsa rdzu? can ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni badzra swAhA//
332a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas gong gi gsol bstod bya/ /'gro kun gti mug gzir mthong nas/ /zhes pas gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /de la sogs pas bstod pa bya/ /bcom ldan gshin rje 'jigs rdo rje/ /rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
332a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma yon bdag brtse phyir dang/ /bcom ldan khyed la mchod pa'i phyir/ /lha khyod snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /mgon po bdag nyid rab gnas bgyid/ /bdag nyid khyed la gus mchod pas/ /bcom ldan bka' drin gnang bar 'os/ /'khor lo 'gro ba'i
332a4(rgyud 'grel): don mdzad pa'i/ /gsang sngags lha rnams bdag la dgongs//'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la dgongs/ gzhan yang sngags la gnas pa'i lha/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i 'byung po rnams/ /sangs rgyas bstan
332a5(rgyud 'grel): la dga' ba yi/ /rdo rje'i mig dang ldan pa rnams/ /de ring rdo rje slob dpon bdag /rdo rje 'jigs byed rab gnas 'di/ /slob ma 'di yi tshogs bsag byed/ /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer sbyong kyis/ /rjes su brtse bar nye bar gsol/ /bdag dang slob mar
332a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dang/ /rab gnas byas pa'i rten 'di la/ /bsrung dang nye bar bskyab pa ni/ /khyed kyis bya bar 'os lags so/ lan gsum du ni brjod par bya/ /sta gon dus su mi bsgyur bar/ /de srid srod la lan gsum brjod/ /yi ge brgya ba rang snying gis/ /rab
332a7(rgyud 'grel): tu gnas la brten par bya'o/ /sngon bzhin gtor ma sbyangs la dbul/ /de nas slob dpon slob ma yis/ /maN+Dal legs gshegs pa yis byug /bum pa la sogs lha kur gshegs/ /yang na slob dpon rten der bsre/ /de la maN+Dal mchad pa bya/
332b1(rgyud 'grel): yi dam lha dang chos skyong la/ /bsam gtan nor 'khrugs rdzas ma tshogs/ /nyes pa thams cad bzod par gsol/ /dge ba ci rtsam yod pa kun/ /'gro ba bsgrel phyir rab tu bsngo/ /dge ba'i las 'di rnams byas pas/ sangs rgyas kun dang bla ma dang/ /
332b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'jigs byed bdag bsrungs te/ /'gro ba'i bdud bzhi zhi byed shog /de nas slob dpon ma yis/ /maN+Dal legs gshegs pa yis byug/ bum pa la sogs lha kun gshegs/ /yang na slob dpon rten der bsre/ /la li badzra grags pa
332b3(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /nag po chen po brgyud pa'i rim/ /'jigs byed dkyil 'khor cho ga yis/ /lhag chad 'khrul pa mkhas bzod mdzad/ /yi dam lha dang rdo rje mkha' 'gros bsrungs/ /bdag gis lus ngag ngal bas 'di bris pa'i/ /dge ba dri med rgya chen thob
332b4(rgyud 'grel): pa nges/ 'gro ba rdo rje 'jigs byed thob par shog/ //rgya gar gyi mkhas po chen po paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //
332b5(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta bai ro tsa na re nyid dang/ lo tsa ba glan dang ma blo gros kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //shu lo ka nyis brgya lnga bcu ste brgya phrag phyed dang gsum yod do// //gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug gi 'khor lo'i
332b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA ri mu kha Sha tstsakra sA d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo//
332b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma bcom ldan mi bskyod la/ /gus pa yis ni btung byas te/ /thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /de la dang por sgrub pa ni/ /byang chub sems la gzhol ba dang/ /gtor zhing thos pa'i khengs pa med/ /le lo med cing khro ba
333a1(rgyud 'grel): med/ /ser sna med cing g.yo yang med/ /sgyu spangs shes rab gsal ba dang/ /gcig tu theg pa che gzhol bas/ /chu 'gram chen po bas mdza' dang/ /dur khrod shing drung dgon pa dang/ /dgon pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim/ /der ni mgon
333a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'di 'bad la/ /gzhan du bsgrub kyang 'di mi 'grub/ /bde stan la 'dug rang snying gar/ /a las nyi ma de stengs hUM/ /de las 'od 'phros bla ma dang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkug bya ste/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang/ /bshags dang bsngo
333a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bar du bya/ /byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms/ /tshad med pa yi rim pa yis/ /sems can rnams la phan btags te/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams/ /yod min med min gnyis ka min/ /gnyis ka med min pa yang min/ /spros bral ngo
333a4(rgyud 'grel): bo med pa bsgom/ /shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ rab nyid de ltar gnas pa yis/ /raM las nyi ma bsgom bya ste/ /de steng hUM las rdo rje ni/ /kun tu rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te/ /de dbus hUM las rdo rje ni/ /kun tu 'phros pas bgegs bskrad de/ /dwa ba
333a5(rgyud 'grel): gur dang sa gzhi dag /de yi 'og tu nges par bsgom/ /sam dang rdo rje rim pa yi/ /gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni/ /shin tu gsal bar bdag gi dmigs/ /laM las sa yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /ljang ser gru bzhi bsam par bya/ /baM las
333a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba chu yin te/ /dkar po zlum po bsam par bya/ /raM las byung ba me'i dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum dmar po bsam par bya/ /yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor/ /sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /ba dan ldan par nges par bsam/ /bruM byung
333a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /lte bar bruM las gzhal yas khang/ /sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud dang/ /dra ba dra byed kyis spras pa/ /pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /rdo rje phreng bas rab tu bskor/ /rtsig pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /pad+ma nyi ma'i
333b1(rgyud 'grel): gdan ldan bsgom/ /lte ba'i gdan steng bsam bya ba/ /ka sogs spangs pa'i A li ni/ /bcu drug yi ge phrag gnyis te/ /'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin/ /zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis/ /a sogs spangs pa'i kA li ste/ /bcu bdun gnyis po de stengs
333b2(rgyud 'grel): su/ /ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid/ /gsum pa'i gsum dang bzhi pa nyid/ /bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis/ /sen mo zangs sogs sa bon te/ /nyi mar rnam grags de dbus gnas/ /hUM dang ya yi rang bzhin las/ /rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog /thim
333b3(rgyud 'grel): pas nan tan ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid ngag pa ste/ /gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin/ /rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod pas bcom ldan 'das/ /rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la/ /bdag nyid phyag dang zhal rnams ni//
333b4(rgyud 'grel): drug drug ldan par gyur par bsgom/ /zhabs kyang de dang 'dra ba ste/ /g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni/ /rdo rje tho ba g.yas gnyis na/ /ral gri de bzhin g.yon gnyis kyang/ /dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan/ /gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin//
333b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu tha mas bsnams/ /steng zhal nag po rab tu 'jigs/ /zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung ste/ /brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas/ /stag lpags kyis ni smad dkris shing/ /sing has se ral ral pa ni/ /gyen bgreng bsdus te spyi bor
333b6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par bcings/ /'od dang khro bo chol pa ste/ /lag cha sna tshogs mtshan dang ldan/ /zhal bzhang h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): yi sgra sgrogs shing/ ro langs ma la rab tu 'khyud/ /ma he gshin rje khyod shug mnan/ /lag ngar gnyis ni bsnol
333b7(rgyud 'grel): byas la/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul can te/ /se gos brdab cing bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra sa ma dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon zhabs gsil dbul bar bya/ /oM arg+haM pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ /pra pa ra sa ta kA ra pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ /lcags kyul sogs rnam bzhi
334a1(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /nges par dgug pa la sogs bya/ /oM badzrAM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra pA sha hUM/ /oM badzra spo Ta baM/ oM badzrA be sha ha(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu kha dog dkar po la/ /phyag g.yon dkur brten g.yas brkyang bzhugs/ /g.yas kyis lcags kyu bsnams
334a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /zhags pa kha dog sngon po la/ /phyag g.yon dkur brten g.yas zhags pa/ /g.yon brkyang stabs su gnas pa'o/ /lcags sgrogs kha dog dmar po la/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni lcags sgrog bsnams/ /sa ga'i stobs su bzhugs pa'o/ /dril bu
334a3(rgyud 'grel): kha dog ljang gu la/ /phyag g.yon dkur brten g.yas dril bu/ /zlum po'i 'dug stangs kyis ni bzhugs/ /khro bo sgeg ba'i cha lug 'dzin/ /rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan/ /shar sgo la sogs rim bzhin gnas/ /lce steng hUM las rdo rje ni/ /gnod mdzes
334a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgyas dbang bskur rigs lngas brgyan/ /rdo rje bcings nas gung mo bsgreng/ /myu gu ltar byas sems ma'i rgya/ /spyi bor gzhag pa sngags brjod pas/ /spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' 
334a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan/ /mthe bong sems dpa' i skyil mo krung/ /mdzub mo gung mo rtse sbyar te/ /mdzub mo'i gung mo'i tshigs gnyis la/ /yid tsam bcag la lhag par sbyar/ /rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya ste/ /dpral gzhag rnam snang gis ni mtshan/ /gung mo rin chen
334a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ltar bya/ /rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /rna g.yas steng gzhag rin chen mtshan/ /ser mo pad+ma'i myu gu ltar/ /byas la gung gnyis rtse sprad de/ /yid rtsam thur du gzhag byas la/ /chos kyis rdo rje ma yi rgya/ /lhag par gzhag pas snang
334a7(rgyud 'grel): mdza' byas/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las/ /mthe bong gnyis ni mnyam por sbyar/ /gung mo'i tshigs ni gsum pa yi/ /rgyab tu mdzub mo rtse gzhag la/ /las kyi rdo rje ma yi rgya/ /rna g.yon steng gzhag don yod grub/ /oM dzi na dzika/ oM ratna d+hika/ oM
334b1(rgyud 'grel): a ro lika /oM pradz+nyA d+h+rika /shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la/ /gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang/ /dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang/ /de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu ste/ /g.yas kyi 'khor lo rin chen 'bar/ /pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /g.yon gyis dril
334b2(rgyud 'grel): bu legs par 'dzin/ /mig sogs byin gyis brlabs byas la/ /gti mug rdo rje sogs kyis bsrung/ /dbang sbubs stong pa nyid bya ste/ /snying po 'am ming gi yi ge yis/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya ldan pa yi/ /sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so/ /lkog ma
334b3(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba snying ga ru/ /sku gsung thugs su bskyed pa la/ /sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dag /rang lus bcug ste gnas pa las/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba
334b4(rgyud 'grel): at+ma kohaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ snying gar rang 'dra'i ye shes sems/ /de yi thugs kar rdo rje la/ /hUM gis mtshan pa'i yi ges bskor/ /lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te/ /gung mo'i rtse mo'i tshigs gnyis la/ /mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya/ /mdzub mo rgyab
334b5(rgyud 'grel): rtser sbyar ba ni/ /'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /snying gang bral ba lkog ma dang/ /dpral ba byin gyis brlab par bya/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ lo tsa na hUM/ mA ma kI traM/ maN+Da ra hI(rgyud 'grel): ta ra a(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su laM sogs las
334b6(rgyud 'grel): skyes bo/ /lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam/ /bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin/ /me mtshams sgeg mo dkar mo ni/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung brkyang bas bzhugs/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dkur brten/ /g.yon du yud tsam 'dud pa'o/ /bden bral
334b7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su kha dog ser/ /yon tan brgyus ma phyag na bsnams/ /rlung gi phyogs su mdog dkar mo/ /glu len pi wang sgreng bar byed/ /dbang ldan mtshams su kha dog ljang/ /phyag gnyis phyogs su gang bsgyur ba/ /grwa ru rtseg ma d+hu pe ni/ /g.yon
335a1(rgyud 'grel): du yud tsam 'dud pa la/ /puShpe gar byed kha dog ljang/ /dI be kha dog dmar po la/ /lag gnyis gyen sgreng mar me dbul/ /gand+he kha dog ljang gu la/ /lag gnyis dri ni 'jug par byed/ /phyag rgya lnga rnams brjod pas so/ /khu tshur dku
335a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gzhag pa dang/ /de bzhin dpral bar myug pa dang/ /kha nas 'byung dang gar byed bskyed/ /gdug spos myug dang me tog mthor/ /mthe bong brkyang ste rang lus la 'am/ /gzhan la myug tshul gnas pa ni/ /brgyad po mchod pa'i lha mo dag /bskyed
335a3(rgyud 'grel): dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin/ /lA sye mA le gIrti narti/ oM badzra d+hu pe/ oM badzra puShpe/ oM badzra A lo ke /oM badzra gand+he/ bstod pa rnams kyis yongs su bstod/ /bdud rtsi ji bzhin byin brlabs la/ /lce brlabs dbus kyis myang bar bya//
335a4(rgyud 'grel): rang rang sngags rnams brjod pas so/ /bdug pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge ni/ /bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa las/ /'khor bar dmigs par bya ba la'ang/ /nyi ma'i dkyil na dmigs pa ltar/ /dmigs te ma yengs 'jigs pa med/ /bzlas pa nyid la
335a5(rgyud 'grel): de ltar bya/ /bye ba tshad bar bzlas pa yis/ /rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa/ /med de thams cad de yis 'grub/ /'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang/ /phra mo'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ /gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyis ni/ /de lta'i tshul
335a6(rgyud 'grel): du bzlas pa bya/ /yul gzhan bla yi 'gro ba yis/ /bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swahA/ /'byung po rnams dang bcu bzhi pa/ /spel bas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /hi hi hi hUM/ pheM pheM pheM swahA/
335a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don la 'gro bsams te/ /mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang ba bya/ /de nyid gsum mthar mu(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /rang bzhin gshegs shing bskyed pa bsdu/ /bzod par gsol dang gsol ba gdab/ /sngo dang smon lam gdab
335b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid/ /gang gang dbang po'i lam 'gro ba/ /de yi ngo bor bdag gis blta/ /bsam gtan mi byed de blo yis/ /kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya/ /ldang dang nyal dang phyi khrus dang/ /bza' pa dag la brtson par bya/ /bcas
335b2(rgyud 'grel): dang 'bral ba med mod kyang/ /bdag dang blo dman don du bsdus/ /'di yi dge bas 'gro ba rnams/ /bcings pa rnams las grol bar shog /dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ /slob
335b3(rgyud 'grel): dpon de ba A ka ra tsan+d+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra tsan dra de nyid dang/ /co ga ro bande shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri sid+d+hi
335b4(rgyud 'grel): tsakra sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ gshin rje'i dgra bsgrub pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan gshin rje'i dgra mgon la/ /yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/ /gshin rje'i dgra ni bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /
335b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa'i thabs ni gshad par bya/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa der gsungs pa'i dam tshig yongs su bsrung ba zhing sems dag pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su dri la sogs pas byugs pa'i
335b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la me tog gi sil ma dgram par bya'o/ /der bcom ldan 'das gshin rje dgra'i bris sku bzhag la/ /de nas rang gi sngags kyis arg+ha'i snod la mngon par bsngags te bzhag par bya'o/ /rang gi snying gar a las nyi ma'i
335b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de'i steng du sa'i pha rol gyi sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gdan u ma byas la/ /zla ba dang thig les brgyan pa las 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba las bdud kyi gnas bsregs te/ /bgegs med par dmigs la/ /rang gi sa bon 'od zer
336a1(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs spros te/ de rnams rdzogs pa las rje btsun bla ma dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis til gyi gang bu bzhin du nam mkha' khyab par mthong nas/ yang da par mchod par
336a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ /oMm badzra puShpe hUM/ oM badzra d+hu pe hUM/ oM badzra dI pe hUM/ oM badzra gand+he hUM/ oM badzra nai bi dye hUM/ de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i bsod nams rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas
336a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mchog /byang chub bar ni skyabs su mchi/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can ma
336a4(rgyud 'grel): lus bdag gi 'gron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod pa bdag gis spyad par bya/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /de ltar sngon du smon lam lan gsum brjod do/ /de'i rjes la sngags 'dis chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom ste/ /oM
336a5(rgyud 'grel): shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko haM/ zhes bya ba 'di lan gsum brjod de/ /khams sum ma lus pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du bsgoms te/ /'gro ba thams cad mi dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi kun tu rtog pa'i sa bon ma rig
336a6(rgyud 'grel): pas byas pa'i ngo bo nyid dag cing/ /lhag par mos par byed pa ni lan gsum bzlas te/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ de nas sngar gsungs pa'i sa bon las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba de'i lte ba la nyi ma'i dkyil
336a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor/ /de'i steng du hUM bsams te/ /de las gshin rje gshed kyi rang bzhin du 'od spro bar bya ste/ /de'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis gshin rje gshed kyi rang bzhin du gsal bar bltas la/ /de nas de thams cad 'dus pa las/ /de nyid kyi
336b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma la gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad rdzogs pa'i mthar gshin rje'i dgra mdog sngon po khros pa 'jigs par byed pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa gang rgyangs rnam par sgrog pa/ /mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /gsus pa 'phyang ba/ /mi mgo skam po
336b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan pa/ /skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa/ /mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can mgo ba'i phreng bas dbu skra'i ral pa bcings pa/ 'jam dpal gyis kun tu brgyan pa/ /klu'i dbang po sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/
336b3(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i pags pas se ral du brgyan pa/ /zhal drug pa'i ljags bsgyur ba/ /sna tshogs pa'i zhal dang ldan pa/ /steng gi zhal 'jigs par byed pa/ /tshangs pa dang dbang po dang drag pos phyag byas pa/ /phyag drug pa g.yas gsum na rdo rje tho ba
336b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje bsams pa'o/ /g.yon gyi gsum na sdigs mdzub byed cing/ zhags pa dang/ gtun shing/ rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa'o/ /sna tshogs kyi mdog can 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyis khro bo rnams kyi phyag na mtshan ma lnga bsnams pa
336b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgoms ste/ ma he'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ zhabs drug pa/ zhabs gnyis kyis g.yon brkyang ba/ /rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis kyis gar byed pa'o/ /rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis kyis sems dpa' i skyil mo krung legs par brten pa/ /de'i 'og tu
336b6(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje'i rgyal po chung ma dang bcas pa kha sbub du 'gyel ba dang/ lha dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i bgegs rnams 'joms par byed par bsam mo/ /bdud rnams 'jigs shing sdangs pa dang/ kha sbub tu 'gyel te gnas pa'o/ /de nas
336b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya ste/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas la bskul zhing sngags 'dis dgug ste/ oM badzra aM ku sha dza(rgyud 'grel): de nas mdzub mo gnyis zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya zhing/ oM badzra pA sha hUM
337a1(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog gi gzugs kyis rked pa 'am dbyi mgo gnyis bcing bar bya zhing/ /oM badzra spho Ta baM/ de nyid rdo rje mthong bas bcings te/ dbang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /oM badzra A be sha ho(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ dgug par bsam par bya'o//
337a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog de mthong ste/ hUM las bgegs rnams gzhom par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis arg+ha'i snod sbyin bar bya ste/ rdo rje thal mo sbyar la arg+ha'i snod ltar bya ste/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM/ arg+haM pra tIts+tsha
337a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /rdo rje khu tshur las mdzub mo dang mthe bos me tog blangs la khu tshur bcangs te/ /rim gyis gung mo la sogs pa brkyang ste/ oM pra ba ra sa ta kA ra pra tIts+tsha swAhA/ de nas phyag rgya 'dis bsdus te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te//
337a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo dang mthe bong se gol brdab cing/ oM badzra sa ma dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod de/ /bdag nyid gshin rje gshed kyi nga rgyal ji skad gsungs pas bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gsum gnas gsum du dgod par bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig gi
337a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang rang gi sngags dang lhan cig tu snying ga dang/ mdzod spu dang/ mgrin pa dang/ mgo rnams su gzhag par bya ste/ de la phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ /mthe bong gnyis brkyang gung mo'i rgyab tshigs kyi gsum par sbyar ro/ /de
337a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi lce la hUM gis rdo rje gnod mdzes bsgom par bya'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don du de nas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bsgreng ste myu gu ltar byas pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag
337a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya ste/ spyi bor gzhag la oM badzra satwa hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ /'dis thams cad du/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa mdog gnag ba sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas gnas par bsam mo/ /de nas mthe bong gnyis sems dpa' i skyil mo krung du mdzub
337b1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang gung mo so sor sbyar te/ mdzub mo'i tshig gnyis pa bcag /gung mo yud tsam bcag ste/ lhag ma sor mo mnyam par sbyar ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi ste/ dpral bar gzhag nas rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar po byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas
337b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo rin po che'i gzugs ltar byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen mas te/ /rna ba g.yas pa'i steng du gzhag pas rin chen mchog ser po mchog sbyin can no/ /de nyid las sor mo rnams pad+ma'i myu gu ltar byas la gung mo
337b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse sprad de yud tsam thur du bcag ste/ 'dab ma ltar byas pa ni chos kyi rdo rje ma ste/ /ltag par gzhag pas snang ba mdza' yas sku mdog dmar po ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar ba las mthe bong gnyis mnyam par sbyar ba
337b4(rgyud 'grel): gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa'i rgyab tu mdzub mo bzhag pa ni las kyi rdo rje ma'o/ /rna ba g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag pas don yod grub pa mdog ljang gu mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o/ /de nas go cha'i dar dpyangs bcings te/ /mdza' ma la
337b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas bsrungs te/ kun nas mchod par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das la sngags kyis mchod pa ste/ thams cad kyang pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan can ma'o/ /oM lA sya hUM me'i mtshams su rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo/ /sems dpa' i skyil krung
337b6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ thams cad pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan can ma/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis dgur brten te/ gang byed pa'i 'gying bag dang bcas pa/ g.yon du zhal yid tsam 'dud pa'o/ /de bzhin du oM badzra mA le hUM/ bden bral du rdo rje phreng ba ma sku mdog ser mo
337b7(rgyud 'grel): bsam par bya'o/ /oM badzra gI ti hUM/ 'dis rlung gi phyogs su mdog dmar mo g.yon rdo rje khu tshur sdigs mdzub sgreng ba/ g.yas rdo rje khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba'o/ /g.yas g.yon klu len pa'i gar byed cing bsgeg pa'o/ /lus yid tsam
338a1(rgyud 'grel): gar byed pa/ glu len cing pi wang rdung par byed pa'o/ /oM badzra nir tye hUM/ 'dis dbang ldan gyi phyogs su sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis phyogs kun tu bsgyur ba sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa de nyid mgo bor gnas pa/ /gang sbyor ba'i
338a2(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyis gnas pa ni gar mkhan ma'o/ /oM badzra puShpe hUM/ mdun du sku mdog yid tsam dkar ba de bzhin du sngon du gar byed pa/ /rdo rje thal mo mgo bor rnam par 'dzin pa las snying gar me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin par byed pa ni me tog ma'o/ /oM
338a3(rgyud 'grel): badzra d+hA be hUM/ g.yas phyogs su yid tsam 'dud la/ sku mdog ser ba lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ste/ thur du bskor zhing spos dbul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra dI pe hUM/ rgyab tu yid tsam 'dud pa sku mdog dmar ba de bzhin du rdo rje khu
338a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur bcings la/ /lag pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng te/ /bskor zhing mar me 'bul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra gand+he hUM/ g.yon du yid tsam bdud pa kha dog ljang ba/ de bzhin du sngon du gar byed cing yongs su bskor ba gnyis kyis byug par byed pa dri
338a5(rgyud 'grel): chab ma'o/ /'di dag rang rang gi phyag rgya bcings pa las byung ba/ sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rol pa dang bcas par lag pa bskyod pa rnams so/ /nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor khyab pa'i chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo rtogs pa/ so sor brjod kyi
338a6(rgyud 'grel): mi lang ba'i rang bzhin sprul te/ /mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i sprin gyi tshogs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par bsam mo/ /ji ltar bstod pa la sogs pa thams cad man ngag la bya'o/ /dus bzhi'i rim pas
338a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sngags ji srid bzlas pa de srid mtshan ma bzang po rnams nges par mthong zhing nyi ma bdun na rmi lam bzang po mthong ba ni de'i dus la sangs rgyas rmi lam du mthong ba dang/ mchod rten dang/ sku gzugs dang/ gang yang dge 'dun
338b1(rgyud 'grel): mthang ba dang/ dge slong ma dang/ de bzhin du yang lha khang dam/ dge slong gcig gam/ de bzhin du chu klung ngam/ mtsho la rgyal ba dang/ ri la 'dzeg pa dang/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang/ brtul zhugs can dang/ sngags pa bye brag can dang/ dbang

338b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams brtsam par bya ste/ /de la las thams cad byed pa ni/ /'khor lo'i mtshan nyid ri'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa shin tu 'bar ba gsal bar bya ste/ de la A li kA li'i sbyor ba la u med pa rnams cho ga bzhin du bris pa las dbang ldan la sogs
338b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyi rol gyi mtshams la ri la sogs pa'i yi ge bzhi dgod par bya'o/ /rtsa ba'i sngags goms pa'i dbang gis spel lo/ /u'i re'u mig gi steng du ji lta bar mgo bos pha rol mdzes pa'i sna la brgyad pa dang 'og gis spras pa/ dbyangs yig
338b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa sum skor byas la dbus kyi re'u mig la yi ge ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te bri'o/ /las thams cad byed pa'i 'khor lo nges bsrung ba'i don la skyes pa rnams la gur kum dang/ /bud med rnams la gi wang gi
338b6(rgyud 'grel): gro ga 'am/ /um lha'i shun pa'am/ sla gor zho sha'i shun pa 'am/ ras la bsrung ba'i skul tshig dang ldan par bri ba na kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ zhi ba'i las nad par gyi mtshams la bya/ rje btsun sku mdog dkar por bsgom ste bri/ /mchod
338b7(rgyud 'grel): pa chen pa byas te ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba la sogs pa sngar sbyin pa byas na/ bsrung ba chen pa byas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dam skyes pa la sogs pa zhi bar bya bar 'dod pas/ /'khor lo 'di shing shing sha'i shun pa la
339a1(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya/ tsan dan dang/ gur kum gyis bris shing yang dag par de nyid kyis bya'o/ /sngar gsungs pa'i zhal la sogs pa las thams cad byed pa'i thab tu dgod par bya'o/ de'i snyed du bla de dgram par bya'o/ /bum pa bzhi po rnams la

339a3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bskrad par bya/ /bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya/ /thams cad du thad kha la sogs pa gzhag cing dgram par bya/ dri dang chu dang me tog dkar po bsres la/ skyong chu gtor gi sngags kyis chu'i sbyin sreg bya'o/ /chu des thams cad du yang dang/ yang
339a4(rgyud 'grel): du gtad/ nyi ma bdun du thams cad du yang gtor ma sbyin/ de nas 'khor lo de dbyung bar byas nas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por gzhag ste/ nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa byas na de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dmag gi dpung
339a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa la rengs par bya ba la sngar gsungs pa'i shing shun la ldong ros dang/ yung ba'i khu bas bskus te dri de yang bsku bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ chu bo'i dogs gnyis kyi sa dang/ ri'i sa dang/ lam
339a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram gyis dang/ sngar gsungs pa'i ldong ros dang/ yung ba'i khu bas bcing la/ gzugs brnyan byas nas de'i snying gar bcug ste/ kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bcug la bsgrub par bya ba 'ong ba'i lam gyi sa 'og tu bcug ste/ seng ldeng
339a7(rgyud 'grel): gi phur ba sod brgyad pas lus la sogs pa man ngag ji lta bas phur bu gdab pa byas nas gtor ma yang sbyin no/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i mdog la sogs pa 'di dag rdzogs pa dang/ lnga stong bzlas pa byas na gdug pa can thams cad rengs
339b1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /gang du rim dang dug la sogs pa med par byed pa der sran ne la lan bdun bsngags te/ 'dis 'khor lo bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du bsgrub bya gzhag cing ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga byas na de nas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra bo bcing ba la kham
339b2(rgyud 'grel): phor ma bsregs pa kha sbyar la/ 'khor lo 'dis shing myos byed kyi khu ba dang dur khrod kyi sol ba dang btsag rnams bsres la bri/ ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang/ sas g.yogs par bya/ de'i ming dang spel te stong bzlas na 'dis kha bcings pa la
339b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsad pa'i sbyor ba la 'khor lo 'di dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang/ tsha dang/ ske tshe dang/ mdzub mo'i khrag bsregs la bri/ /ro sregs pa'i sa dang/ thal ba dang/ dgra bo'i rkang rjes kyi sa dang/ mi rus kyi
339b4(rgyud 'grel): phye ma rnams kyis bsres la gzugs brnyan byas te/ de'i snying gar gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas dur khrod kyi me la bsro zhing khros pa'i sems kyis stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas nas/ de'i khyim mam/ /dur khrod du sbas na/ de nas skad cig gis 'chi
339b5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra nang dbye na ma he dang/ rta'i pags pa 'am/ /yang na dur khrod kyi ngas sam/ ro'i ras la/ ma he 'am rta'i khrag gam/ byi la dang khyi 'am/ khyim bya'i khrag gam/ nim pa'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang/ ske tshe dang bsres
339b6(rgyud 'grel): pas 'khor lo 'di bri/ rnam par 'gras par byed pa'i tshig dang ldan par bskul ba bris nas/ rta'i spal gyi khar bcug la ma he'i rmig pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa khri byas shing nim pa'i shing bskos te de'i nang du snga bar byas
339b7(rgyud 'grel): na/ de gnyis 'gras nas dpag tshad brgyas chos kyang 'thab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rims kyis thebs par 'dod na dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo 'di tsi tra ka dang/ dug dang/ arga'i 'o ma dang/ ske tshe dang/ khrag rnams kyis rdzogs
340a1(rgyud 'grel): par bris nas seng ldeng gi me la bsro zhing khros pa'i sems kyis brgya phrag lnga bzlas pa byas na/ /rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni/ bsgrub bya'i khyim mam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ dur khrod du spas na'o/ /thams cad las grol
340a2(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod na 'o mas bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa la gro ga la bzhi mnyam gyi 'khor lo 'di bri/ tha ma gnyis su oM bri/ dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming/ skul bar byed pa'i tshig dang ldan par bzung bar bya zhing/ /thad ka'i mdun du
340a3(rgyud 'grel): nyin re bzhin du kha nub tu bltas la/ zla ba drug tu gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin mos rin po che'i char 'bebs par byed par bsam zhing bdag po'i gzugs kyis rnam par bsams te/ bzlas pa khri dang sbyin sreg khri byas na 'grub pa na de
340a4(rgyud 'grel): nas nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur ro/ dbang du bya ba la ni 'khor lo gro ga la sogs pa'i shog shog la rang 'byung gi me tog dang gi wang gis bri/ yang na srin lag gi khrag dang/ pil ba'i 'o ma'i khu ba dang/ ras dmar po'i khu ba dang
340a5(rgyud 'grel): de'i rtse rnams bsres la bris te/ spra tshil gyis yang dag par dkri shing byugs nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa'i nang du gzhag la/ 'dzab khri bya ba ni ho mthar sbyar zhing nyi ma re re zhing ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas mchod pa
340a6(rgyud 'grel): byas na mod la/ dbang du 'gyur ro/ gra go la gur kum gyi sa skar ma rgyal gyi zla ba la sogs pa gzas zin pa'i dus su bris nas skud pa dmar pos dkri zhing mchod pa chen po byas te/ gtor ma yang sbyin zhing 'dzab stong phrag bcus
340a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa byas la ji ltar gsungs pa'i gzugs kyis mi'i thod pa'i nang du gzhug par byas na/ /de nas gang dang gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri la sogs pa reng bar bya ba la/ 'di nyid kyis ci yang rung ba'i mtshan rengs par
340b1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ tshig bskul ba dang ldan par bris na des rengs par byed do/ /drag po la sogs pa yo byad cho gas pa dang ldan pas gang 'dod pa de med par byed do/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i khyim dang/ dur khrod dang?/ shing?
340b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gi drung ngam/ gnas stong pa 'am/ chu 'gram mthon po dang ri 'am/ gnas dben pa 'am/ mchod rten dang/ sngon du grub pa'i gnas dag gam/ yid dang mthun pa'i gnas sam/ lha gang dang rang gi khyim du sngags pas 'dzab bya ba bzlas
340b3(rgyud 'grel): pa byas na/ ji ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba bla ma la dad pa de kho na nyid rig pa/ bla na med pa des ci yang 'grub po/ /ri lu 'dod pa'i dngos grub dang/ rA sa'i dngos grub dang/ rengs pa'i dngos grub dang rkang mgyogs kyi
340b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub dang/ ral gri dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ sa 'og ma dang/ gi wang dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ de bzhin du rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub dang/ klu mo dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang/ de bzhin du mi'i bu mo dang
340b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la spyod pa dang/ gang 'dod pa de grub par byed do/ /rang gi sde yongs su bsrung bar byed de/ /gzhan gyi sde 'joms par byed do/ /srin mo la sogs pa med par byed do/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed do/ /rims nyi ma bzhi pa la
340b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa med par byed de/ /dug dang pra dbab pa la sogs pa la yang bzlas pa byas par 'grub po/ /stag la sogs pa 'jigs par byed do/ /chu yis 'jigs pa med par byed do/ /sngags 'dzin pas 'dod pa'i snying po de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /
340b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhal lnga nas kyis snang ba las/ rang gi snying gar 'khor lo dgod par bya'o/ /ngo mtshar du ma rnams byed do/ /rje btsun gyi nga rgyal dang ldan pas kun tu gnas par bya'o/ /sngags pas rtag tu bzlas pa byas na des thams cad 'grub po
341a1(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma thams cad sngags 'dis sbyin par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri ta na na hUM ma ma a mu kaM karyaM ku ru sarba sha truM na pi ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ man ngag ji lta bas bdud rtsi la sogs pa byin pa dang/
341a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma sbyin par byas pas 'grub po/ /'khor los dgos pa kun byed do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs kyis/ /ye shes bla ma gnang ba yi/ /byas pa dran pa yis ni byas/ /gshin rje'i dgra mgon na na dag gis/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs
341a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi mchog byas la/ /de'i bsod nams khyad par gyis/ /sems can gnas chen thob par shog /dpal u rgyan gyis yul nas byung ba grub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
341a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu rten pa ni/ /rus spal 'o ma zhes bya dang/ de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang/ /'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin me yi khu ba dang/ /sgra brnyan gyis ni rdzas dag ste/ /'di rnams rtag tu sbyar na
341a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing/ /tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang/ /rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab/ /lha rnams kun gyi byin gyis rlob/ /'di la dpyad par mi bya ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyi 'grub/ /ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs//
341a6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas/ /de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten/ /tshes gcig skya rengs shar ba na/ /snod la ma reg rus sbal zho/ /drod ma yal bar gtang ba'am/ /yang na nyi ma'i spu gus btung/ /mar
341a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi do yi tshes gcig la/ /'od kyi lo ma btsal na ni/ /de nyid nas ni bzung nas kyang/ /zhag gsum skya rengs shar ba na/ /lo ma de bcad bza' bar bya/ /yang na nyi ma'i spu gus bya/ /'jim pa bzang po sbyar nas ni/ /zhag gsum chu'i nang du
341b1(rgyud 'grel): bskam/ /de blangs nas ni yang bskam nas/ /phye ma byi la spar tshad re/ /ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas/ /sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya/ /me yi sdong po sar pa ni/ /sa'i mar gyis dril nas ni/ /kha sbyar snod dang ldan byas nas/ /me chu sa yis btsir nas ni/ /btung
341b2(rgyud 'grel): ngam nyi ma'i spu gus btung/ /lan tsha bral ba'i sgra las ni/ /zhag gsum bcings pa'i sgra brnyan rdzas/ /nam gyi gung la sngags pas bzlas/ /chags sum snod du zhag gsum gzhag /rtse mo'i cha ni byug pa ste/ /dbu ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid/ /rtsa ba'i
341b3(rgyud 'grel): cha ni dor bar bya/ /'di rnams so sor bsten pas na/ /tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyis phye/ /byi la'i spar tshad re re sbyar/ /ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med/ /tshogs par bsten na bzang bar bshad/ /re re ra bsten kyang nyes pa med/ /'jam dpal gyi rtog
341b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dam rdzas gsar ba rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// //gshin rje gshed dmar po'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya nA ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
341b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs/ gshin rje gshed dmar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdung bzhi po ni rnam par 'joms/ /dpa' bo drag po sgrol mdzad pa/ /ya mA nA ka phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad/ /thog mar gnas dben par
341b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i ril bu khar bcu gnas bdag nyid ro'i thog tu bsams te/ 'dug la tshangs pa bzhi dang ldan pas bla ma dam pa la mchod par bya'o/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud+d+honyahaM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba
341b7(rgyud 'grel): d+harmma(rgyud 'grel): yo ga shud+d+honyahaM/ oM shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ yang yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog sngon po yaM gis mtshan pa gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu/ de'i thog tu ri dmar po yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil
342a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po 'bar bas mtshan pa/ pi yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po/ /kha dog kha dog dkar po bum pas mtshan pa/ lam yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha
342a2(rgyud 'grel): dog ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa/ sum yongs su gyur pa las ri bo mchog rab gru bzhi rin po che'i rang bzhin can lcog brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ /de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mtshan dra
342a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dra phyed brgyan byas shing/ /zhes so/ de'i dbus su paM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma de'i lte bar hUM gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje de las skyes pa'i dbyug tho nyi ma'i dkyil du sa bon dang bcas pa de yongs su gyur pa las/
342a4(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo gshin rje gshed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po nyi ma bye ba'i 'od can/ phyag g.yon na bdud ma lus pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa phyag g.yas na khams gsum rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyug tho
342a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po/ /brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ /klu brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ /mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal cung zad gdangs pa/ khro bo'i tshul gyis bzhad pa'i ljags 'gyu ba/ nyi ma lta bu'i spyan gsum zlum pa/ zhal khro nyer can
342a6(rgyud 'grel): sku spom pa/ rtsib logs dang gsum pa che ba/ sku dang yan lag dang nying lag thung zhing 'od 'bar ba/ dbu skyes dang sna? ra sang? cing 'bar ba/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa/ brgya phyed mi mgo'i phreng ba can/ rdo rje ro langs
342a7(rgyud 'grel): mas yang dag par 'khyud pa/ lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba/ /phyag g.yon na gnas pa'i thod par gdug pa bdud kyi khrag 'dzin pa/ g.yas na rdo rje gri gug /ma he'i thog tu zhabs g.yon brkyang bas
342b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa bsgom par bya'o/ /shar gyi 'dab mar gti mug gshin rje gshed badzra tsar tsi ka la 'khyud pa sku mdog dkar po/ /lho'i 'dab mar ser sna gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser cing phag mo la 'khyud pa/ nub kyi 'dab mar 'dod chags gshin
342b2(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed sku mdog dmar po dbyangs can ma dang yang dag par ldan pa/ byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mdog ljang gu go rI dang yang dag par ldan pa/ /g.yon na thod pa/ g.yas na gri gug phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa/
342b3(rgyud 'grel): dpa' po ji ltar phyag dang zhal gyi rnam pa can/ me'i mtshams su mu men ser chab kyi bum pa ci dus mas bkang pa/ bden bral du gser gyi bum pa kas to ris bkang pa/ rlung gi mtshams su byi ru'i bum pa si hAs bkang pa/ dbang ldan du
342b4(rgyud 'grel): dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyi bkang pa/ kha thod pas bcad par bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ ye shes sems dpa' dgug gzhug bya ba dang/ bzlas pa'i dmigs pa gong bzhin byas te/
342b5(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ thugs ga'i snying po'i/ /oM hoM k+ShoM kA yi ka ra ya/ grih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i thugs kyi snying po'o/ /oM mahA yak+Sha se nA ya/ mahA du dan+ta da ma/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ pi dra la yaM/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA
342b6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM dwe Sha ra ti/ nu da nu da/ tru Ta tru Ta hUM dza swAhA/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so/ /oM mo dAn+ta krita hUM hUM phaT/ oM pi shu nan+ta kri ta hUM hUM phaT/ oM rA gAn ta gri ta hUM hUM phaT/ oM irSh+ya na ta krita hUM hUM phaT/ dpa' ba bzhi'i sngags
342b7(rgyud 'grel): so/ /oM mo ha ra ti hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM pi shu na ra ti hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM rA ga ra ti hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): oM ir bu? ra ti hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so/ /dang po mi mgo gsum bskal pa'i me'am/ rdo rje lta bu 'bar ba can/ de'i ning du zan dang chu sres la/ go gu
343a1(rgyud 'grel): da ha na ma ra dang/ rgya skyegs 'dres ma'i khu ba lta bu yang dag par bltas la bsil bar gyur par bsams la/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ de nas mchod pa la sogs pa phul nas/ bsil
343a2(rgyud 'grel): par gyur pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya'o// //oM rak+ta mu ku sA ya/ rak+ta dzA Ta ya/ rak+ta mu khA ya rak+ta sha rI rA ya/ rak+ta b+hu dzA ya/ sA d+h+ra ka muN+Da/ mA lA b+ha ra Na ya/ rak+ta da thA sa ma ru DhA ya/ rak+ta pasma sa nA/ rak+ta ba ra Na/ b+hu Sha
343a3(rgyud 'grel): NA ya e baM ba liM/ gri h+Na grih+Na/ ma ma big+h+Na/ ha ra ha ra/ tsa turmmA ra Na/ bi bA ra pa/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ ts+tshinda ts+tshindi/ b+hind+ha b+hinda/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ts+tsha da ts+tsha da/ b+he da b+he da/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas so so la dbul bar
343a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ oM in+d+rA ya na mo h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ya mA ya na ma(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Tri(rgyud 'grel): ba ru NA ya ni mo bi/ ku be rA ya naM(rgyud 'grel): kri a'i shA na ya/ na ma ta/ agna yen ma A/ nai ri ta ye na mo na/ ma ya be na mo na/ tsan drA ya na mo hUM/ ArkA ya na mo hUM/ brahma Ne na ma phaT/ pa suM b+ha ba ye na ma
343a5(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ pe ma tsi tra Ne na ma(rgyud 'grel): swA/ sarbba b+hU te b+hyo na mo hA/ hI hI hUM hUM pheM pheM/ oM marmme marmmA bi ga te hUM/ badzra tsar tsi ke/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hu k+keM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ A mu kaM dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): oM g+ho Ne/ su g+ho Na/ badzra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ big+h+na ?
343a6(rgyud 'grel): oM mar me mar mA/ k+Sho b+ha Ni badzra sa ra swaste/ ha ra ha ra/ tha ra tha ra pa ra pa ra/ ka n+ya ka n+ya/ d+hu na d+hu na hUM a mu kaM dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): oM g+haM b+hi re/ badzra kAr ti ke/ g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): hUM rak+ta sho NaM/ ta pra ya gau rI ye/ a mu kaM dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): shing gcig dang dur
343a7(rgyud 'grel): khrod dam ri'i? rtse mor byung ste/ kha lho phyogs su bltas gcer bur byas nas/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na/ de nas 'di 'grub par 'gyur la the tshom med do/ /sngags kyi cho ga gsungs te/ dben pa gcig tu 'dug ste/
343b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun gyi thang ka bkram la/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon sum du dmigs nas/ mi rus kyi smyu gus khrag tshan dang/ bya rog gis khrag bsres pa bri bzhi sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad la 'khor lo
343b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bcu gnyis kyi dbus su rlung gi sa bon de'i lte bar dgra'i ming tshogs drag dang bcas pa kha sbyar du byas te bya rog gi ske la btags nas/ gal te ma bkrol na de ru chags par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid du bri bar bya ba'i sa bon bcu gnyis
343b3(rgyud 'grel): ni phaT phaT hUM hUM na na tA kri paMSh+TrI?(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i pU dza byas nas/ spos chen pos gdugs te/ gal te 'bab chu la sgyur na/ de nas mi gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ma yin pa bya rog gi sgro la lan gsum bsngags te dgra'i sgo
343b4(rgyud 'grel): gang du sbas na 'khor dang bcas pa de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa de nyid kyi dbus su tshe sna gsum dang/ dug dang ske tshe rnams kyis rus chen gyi smyu gus me'i sa bon dbus su tsheg drag
343b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa'i g+ha(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kha spyar la/ tha gnyis kyis phyi nas bskor te/ me'i shing gi me la bsros nas/ bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas pa de ma thag tu 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di man ngag la 'khor lo gnyis kha sbyar bar bya'o/ /yang
343b6(rgyud 'grel): na mi'i rus pa sor bzhi'i tshad la lan bdun sngags bzlas nas dgra bo'i sgo ru spas na/ de'i rigs stongs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sa bon bcu gnyis pas yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i dbus su tsan
343b7(rgyud 'grel): dan nas po ta tse'i shing ngam/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sngo rigs kyi shing gi smyu gus chu'i sa bon gyi dbus su bi de gnyis kho na kha sbyar la/ /tha gsum gyis phyi nas bskor te/ 'o mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ zla bar
344a1(rgyud 'grel): gang ba lta bur rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sa bon bcu gnyis pa de nyid kyis yongs su bskor bar 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis kyis dbus su rgya skyegs kyi yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yis bskor ba'i ho/ :gnyis pa sbyor nang du ming

344a3(rgyud 'grel): dang khal mo lta bur 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo byas nas ro bsregs pa'i sol bas ling ga bris la rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bo chos mnan te/ sngags bzlas pas gong bu dgag pa'o/ /de bzhin du snying gar h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar pos mtshan mar
344a4(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms nas/ bzlas na rkang pa 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na tsA la ya bA nga tsA la ne hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): tA na na ba tya de ba dad+daM? mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ra raM ra raM ho(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi
344a5(rgyud 'grel): kri tA na na dzi paM ba ra ta hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ra ta ru pa sarbba satwa/ da ma ka mahA b+hu pa na/ ba ti sto b+ha ba/ sta b+ha ya/ mahA ya band+ha ya/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): tshig drag dang
344a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dza(rgyud 'grel): gnyis kyi bar du bcug pa ni rkang pa dgug pa'o/ /rim pa ji lta bar sngags kyi tshigs rnam go bar bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): tA na na b+h+ruM/ a mu kaM/ g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha:hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zho dang 'o ma 'dres pa'i zan la sogs
344a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyin sreg gis rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na he he hUM hUM phaT phaT/ grong gi phyogs su gtor ma btang ste/ dbus su til gyi sbyin sreg byas na/ bdud kyi gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par
344b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ dmar ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad brlag par mdzad pa'i don to/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum ni spyan gsum mo/ /phyag gnyis ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rtog pa
344b2(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'o/ /stong pa dang snying rje dbyer med par ldan pas na shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o/ /klu brgyad ni rnam par shes pa brgyad rab tu ston pa'o/ /mi mgo brgya phyed kyi phreng ba ni yi ge lnga bcu dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa ye shes
344b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /g.yas pa'i dbyug tho ni phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang/ lha'i bu dang 'chi bdag gis bdud bzhi bcom zhing snying rje'i rang bzhin no/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas ni khams gsum rab tu
344b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa'o/ /bdud bzhi khrag gi ro dang bcur len dpag tu med pa myong bas na lha mo'i g.yon gyi phyag na thod pa'o/ /g.yas kyi gri gug gi dngos po dang/ dngos po med pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu bcod pa'i phyir ro/ /gdug pa can 'dul
344b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni khro bo'i gzugs can no/ /gsus pa 'phyang ba ni mya ngan las mi 'da' ba' o/ /dbu skra ser po gyen du brdzes pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam gyi bden pa rab tu ston pa'o/ /sgo bzhi ni bdud bzhi
344b6(rgyud 'grel): skrag par mdzad pa'o/ /zur bzhi ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rab tu gang ba'o/ /ka ba brgyad ni rmi lam lta bu dang/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang/ brag cha dang sgyu ma'i bdag nyid/ smig rgyu dang me long gi gzugs brnyan dang/ chu'i zla ba lta bu dang
344b7(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i 'ja' tshon te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa'i phyir ro/ /nang gi rtog pa 'jams pa ni dra ba phyed pa'o/ /rta babs bzhi ni sbyin pa dang snyan pa dang/ don mthun pa dang don dpyod pa dang/ ldan zhing rab
345a1(rgyud 'grel): tu spong ba bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /gshin rje gshed dmar sgrub pa'i thabs/ byas pa'i bsod nams gang bsags pa/ de yis 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /bdud bzhi las ni thar bar shog/ //gshin rje gshed
345a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sh+rI bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shi las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs bzhugs so// //
345a3(rgyud 'grel): !//rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mAn+ta ka sA d+hwa naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun nas bla ma la btud do/ /lhan cig skye dga' i ngo bo nyid/ /gshin rje gshed
345a4(rgyud 'grel): sku dmar po yi/ /sgrub thabs gsal por bri bar bya// //dang por re zhig sems can gdon pa'i bsam pa can gyi sngags pas snga bar langs te kha gtsang ba la sogs pa byas la/ bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying
345a5(rgyud 'grel): gar yi ge AM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /der yi ge hUM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las dbyug pa dkar po rdo rje'i rtse mo can mi mgos mtshan pa bsgom mo/ /de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
345a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i steng du yi ge hUM kha dog dmar po'i steng du yi ge hUM kha dog dmar po'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po dang bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i rnams nam mkha' i phyogs su bsam mo/
345a7(rgyud 'grel): de nas yi ge hUM las 'thon pa'i me tog dang spos la sogs pa yang dag par mchod pa sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te/ byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas stong pa
345b1(rgyud 'grel): nyir du bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ zhes pa yid kyis bklag go/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las yi ge paM yongs su gyur pa'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa la
345b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dkar po ste der yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yi ge hUM gis mtshan pa'o/ /de las hUM yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum bkang ste sems can mdza' dag gshin rje mthar byed kyi gzugs su byas nas hUM yig de la gzhug go/
345b3(rgyud 'grel): de nas thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gsum pa 'phyang ba g.yon brkyang gi gom stabs ma he la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas na dbyug pa dkar po g.yon na
345b4(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thong pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bsgreng ba/ mi mgo lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ klu la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /mgul par mi mgo 'jag pa'i phreng ba can/
345b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba'i phreng ba dmar pos phyogs mdza' dag khyab pa/ gshin rje 'jigs par byed pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum dmar la ? pa/ ljags 'gyur ba/ zhal nas khrag 'dzag pa/ rang snang gi shes rab kyis
345b6(rgyud 'grel): mgus nas 'khyud par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i shes rab ste/ 'on kyang bye brag tu shes rab ni mgo bo skam po'i phreng ba can na// slar nas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil
345b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge hUM yongs su gyur pa las dbyug pa dkar po ste de'i dbus su nyi ma dmar po yi ge hUM gi brgyan pa bsgom mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje yi ge hUM las byung ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i pad+ma'i yi ge a las
346a1(rgyud 'grel): byung pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma kohaM zhes brjod cing dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la bcom
346a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das ma'i lte ba'i 'og tu pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad ba'i steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po rtse mor re khA dkar po gnas par bsgom mo/ /thugs ka'i sa bon gyis nam mkha' i phyogs su spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snga ma
346a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mchod la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /oM a b+hi Sh+ny+tsiM tu maM sarba ta thA ga tA(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis dang rin po che la sogs pas spras pa'i gser gyi bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis yongs su gang bas bdag
346a4(rgyud 'grel): la dbang bskur zhing gur kum dang me tog la sogs pa'i char dbab pa dang snga bo che'i sgra la sogs pa yang bsgom par bya'o/ /slar yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha' i phyogs su gshin rje mthar byed dmar po
346a5(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs la/ snga ma bzhin yang dag par mchod de dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'dis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la/ dam tshig sems dpa' la gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar nyi ma la
346a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i yi ge hUM la gnas pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba 'bar bar bltas la yid kyis bzlas pa bzhin du khro bo'i tshig bzlas so// oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ thun gzhan la
346a7(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du sa bon dang phyag mtshan gyi rim pas bdag nyid bskyed la dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya'o/ /nyal ba'i dus su stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgom zhing nyal bar bya'o/
346b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa 'dis bsgom zhing bzlas na de'i gshin rje mthar byed dmar po 'di nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' o/ /rim pa 'di gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sbyor ba/ /'khrul 'khor ?
346b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang las rab 'byams la sogs pa 'grub pa'o/ 'on kyang 'dir bye brag tu zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ dbang dang/ mngon spyod kyi dbye bas dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang/ nag po'i gzugs su bsgom mo/ /gshin rje
346b3(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyis zhal snga nas dang/ chag lo tsa ba dge slong
346b4(rgyud 'grel): chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa'o// /'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig shin tu goms pa yis/ /spros pa nyid kyis yid
346b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs na/ /bla ma'i man ngag la brten nas/ spros pa de nyid spros med bya/ ri bo'i rtse sogs rab dben par/ /maN+Dal la sogs tshogs byas la/ /bdag bskyed mchod dang bum pa bzlas/ /ji skad bshad bzhin 'grub pa na/ /shin tu
346b6(rgyud 'grel): dad dang ldan pa yi/ /slob ma rjes su bzung bar bya/ /khrus sogs sngon 'gro bgegs bskrad la/ /thun mong pa dang khyad par gyi/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i sdom pa sbyin/ /rang snying la gnas dbyug pa dkar/ /rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom
346b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sna tshogs sgros pa'i yid 'di nyid/ /spros dang bral bar gdod nas grub/ /spros dang spros med gzhan min phyir/ /zung du 'jug pa'i sems bskyed bya/ /oM badzra yo ga tsat+totpa da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya ste/ de nas
347a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jam dpal 'dus pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga las gsungs ltar/ /'byung ba lnga dang phung lnga la/ /gnas pa'i nyon mongs lnga sbyangs nas/ /bde gshegs lnga dang ye shes lnga/ /dbang bar byed pa dbang lnga sngon/ /da
347a2(rgyud 'grel): nas bsgrub dang bsgrubs pa yi/ /bde ba thig le'i man ngag bya/ /rdo rje rnam rtog gzhom pa yi/ /g.yo 'dzin rlung gi man ngag dbab/ /de yi 'og tu zab mo ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang/ /mkha' 'gro'i bka' yis
347a3(rgyud 'grel): gdams gyur pa/ /rnam rtog 'od gsal zhal las gzung// de nas nam zhig rtogs gyur pas/ /skad cig nyid la ye shes 'char/ /grol dang grol ba ma yin pa'i/ /'ching ba kun ni spangs par 'gyur/ /nor dang go 'phang mnyam pa
347a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mkha' 'gro dang kun mthong dang/ /mkha' 'gro bran du bya la sogs/ /ci 'dod pa yi bsam pa 'grub/ /de ltar shin tu gsang pa bla ma dam pa'i drin las byung gyur pa/ /gsal par byas pa gang yin des ni srid pa gsum
347a5(rgyud 'grel): du 'ching ba kun/ /spangs nas srid gsum bde chen ngo gcig dpal ldan las 'bras kun gzigs pa/ /zhi las 'jam dbyangs shin tu khros pa gshin rje gshed du dpal thob gyur cig/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i byin
347a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa'i man ngag 'od gsal 'char ba'i rim pa slob dpon mthu stobs kyi mgon po dpal ba rungs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Da te bar n+d+ra ba'i zhal snga nas dang/ chag lo tsa dge slong chos
347a7(rgyud 'grel): rje dpal bzang pas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ su ni pra pany+tsa tat+to pra pany+tsa tat+ta pa de shanA ma/ bod skad du/ shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag
347b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /stong nyid snying rje gcig pa'i sku/ /srid gsum bde chen po nyid/ /spros pa'i dri mas ma gos pa'i/ /bla ma rdo rje can zhabs 'dud/ /lo gsum par du rnyed bka' ba/ /bla ma mchog gi bka' drin gyis/ /skad cig nyid la 'char ba ni/ /bla ma nye
347b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bsten par bshad/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod du/ /'jig rten chos la lta med pa'i/ /rnam rtog kun spangs dpa' bos ni/ /dog pa med par bsgrub par bya/ /blo gros mchog ldan sgrub pa pos/ /bza' skar chos grangs 'dir med de//
347b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la sogs lha rnams dang/ /phyi rol bkod pa 'dir mi dgos/ /bsam gtan bzlas pa yod ma yin/ /sreg blugs dang ni gtor ma med/ /phyag rgya bcing dang 'khrul 'khor sogs/ /phyi rol g.yeng pa kun spangs te/ /brtse ldan
347b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don sems pa/ /bla ma'i byin rlabs la brten nas/ /skad cig nyid la dngos grub 'gyur/ /thog mar bla ma lhar bcas la/ /maN+Dal dbul zhing mchod gsol gdab/ /gsang sngags rgyal po rjes dran nas/ /sems ni dag cing las
347b5(rgyud 'grel): rung 'gyur/ /bla ma dang ni rdo rje sems/ /tha dad par ni mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /de bzhin dge bdun bla ma ste/ /dngos grub go 'phang mchog 'dod pas/ /kun nas bla ma mnyes par bya/ sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje 'chang/
347b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsod pa'i pa'i dus 'dir bdag don du/ kun dang mthun par ston mdzad pa/ /de ltar shes nas dngos kun gyis/ /bsten bya dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ /dngos grub rgya chen snod du 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs dang/ /bdag 'dzin la sogs
347b7(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa/ /zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /ltas pa med par btang bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la/ /bsam pa thag pas skyabs song bas/ /lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa gang/ /bag la nyal dang bcas las grol/ /sku gsum
348a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /rdo rje rnams dang dbyer med 'gyur/ /'di nyid gsal zhing stong pa dang/ /rig pa de nyid ma 'gags pa/ /rang rig ye shes skad cig la/ /'dir ni thog ma dbus mdza' med/ /srid med mya ngan las 'das pa med
348a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med gzhan yang med pa ste/ /'di ni mchog du bde chen nyid/ /'di nyid gsal zhing stong pa nyid/ /'di las mtshon te shes bar bya/ /'di ni rang bzhin sku gsum dang/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can/ /sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas
348a3(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku/ /gzhan du bcas bas brnyed pa yin no/ /chos kun stong pa nyid rtogs pas/ /'gro la snying rje rgyun mi 'chad/ /thabs mkhas spyod bas mdza' yas pa/ /yul dang
348a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po med pa'o/ /rgya ma lta bur 'dzin med pa/ /rgya chen bsod nams tshogs la 'bad/ /rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor chub byed yin/ /rtog pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba/ /de cho mchog gi lam rnyed do/ /phyi rol yul
348a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'ching byed rnams/ /bu ga dgu nas snying gar bsdu/ /gang gi rnam rtog zung rdu yang/ /spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar/ /mi shel tsam du snying gar dgug/ snying gi bu ga gsal bor phye/ /skad mda''pho ba ji lta bar/ /rgya mtsho'i mthar thugs
348a6(rgyud 'grel): spro bar bya/ /rtog pa dang ni bral ba ni/ /lus kyi bde ba can der sen/ /yi ge gsum gyi gsang sngags brjod/ /mkha' dang rang rig stong pa nyid/ /ro gcig nam mkha' ye shes bsgom/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs kyi gsang
348a7(rgyud 'grel): chen bla na med/ /'di ni srid dang zhi las grol blang dang dor pa ci yang med/ /bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dang/ /bdud dang nyon mongs yod ma yin/ /lha dang srin po 'dir med de/ /nad dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos/ /'dis ni bdud dang nyon
348b1(rgyud 'grel): mongs 'joms/ /'joms byed bcom ldas 'das shes bya/ /de las gzhan pa gang yin pa/ /chos kun nyen por mi 'gyur te/ /thams cad rtog pa yin phyir ro/ /rtog pa'i rtog pas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas shes nas/ /phyi dang nang dang
348b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rnams kyis/ /spros pa'i 'dra ba rnams par bcad/ /yul gyi 'dzin ba rnam par bshig/ /stong pa nyid la gtang legs na/ /rtog pa'i dra ba spong bar 'gyur/ /rten dang brten pa rnam par dbye/ /mnyam par gzhag pa goms par bya/ /de nas byang chub
348b3(rgyud 'grel): sems bskyed pa'i/ /bla ma man ngag bshad par bya/ /bla ma rdo rje 'chang gi sku/ /'og min bde chen der bsgoms te/ /mi phyed bsam pas gsol ba gdab/ /mthar phyin tshe na rang la bstim/ /thog med bsam pas sbyangs pa yi/ /drin can rnams
348b4(rgyud 'grel): la snying rje bsam/ /gnod byung 'di rnams bdag gi ma/ /sngon che yang yang phan btags kyang/ /smyon pa bzhin du rang dbang med/ /mi dge'i las kyi mnar med 'gyur/ /de ltar dran pas srid gsum la/ /snying rje mthar phyin 'gyur pa yin/ /phyi nang
348b5(rgyud 'grel): spyod? pa mi bsrun pas/ /blo gros shin tu 'khrugs pa'i tshe/ /bdag dang gzhan du brje ba yis/ /byang chub sems 'di dran par bya/ /nges ni bdud dang nyon mongs tshogs/ /'joms shing spros med nying du 'gyur/ /srog 'gag pa yi sbyor ba yis
348b6(rgyud 'grel): goms par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ji ltar rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lus 'di rnam dag sbyar bar bya/ /dgad ba'i sbyor bas spyi gtsug nas/ /rkang mthil bar du dgang byas la/ /rdub pa'i sbyor bas zhi bar bya/ /dang por srub rtsing bsrub par bya//
348b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa rgya mtsho bskyod pa de/ /gsum pa gsang pa nor lha gnyis/ /bzhi pa yan lag brgyad bskum 'di/ /phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing srid gsum bsgrags/ /'di yi sbyor ba goms byas na/ /nad kun las ni grol 'gyur zhing/ /'di lta
349a1(rgyud 'grel): rgud dang rgas pa dang/ /'chi bdag thag ring kun rtog 'joms/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing/ /spros med ye shes go 'phang 'thob/ /dag pa'i bzhi mnyam blang byas te/ /gla ba yis ni dug med 'gyur/ /gon ji dang ni bar tsam?
349a2(rgyud 'grel): sga skya dang ni lhan cig byas/ /bu ram mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas/ /gsang sngags bzlas zhing zhag bdun bsgrub/ /dam tshig brtan ldan rnal 'byor pas/ /nang par dus su bsten par bya/ /skra dkar gnyer ma la sogs spong/ /dbang po rnams ni mchog
349a3(rgyud 'grel): tu gsal/ /lus kyi mdog rgyas zo mdog bde/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis byin gyis rlob/ /bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin dang/ /spros med ye shes go 'phang 'thob/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs su mnyes byas te/ /snying gi
349a4(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob sna rtse nas/ /sor bzhi bcal nas dbu mar gzhug /nor bu'i bar du bsreg 'dzin pa/ /steng gi dag pas zin pa yin/ /phyag na rdo rje gzung bya ste/ /g.yas pa'i mthil gyis bum pa sbyor/ /tsak+Shu gyen du blta bar bya/ /cig shos g.yo
349a5(rgyud 'grel): bar mi byed de/ /ba thag tsam yang mi 'byung ngo/ /gal te phyi rol byung ba na/ /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis tshar bcad do/ /'og rlung rngam pas dgra tshogs zhi/ /steng rlung mnan pas bdud rnams 'joms/ /dbus rlung dkrugs pas bar chod sel//
349a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor 'di la sgrub pa pos/ /du ba la sogs mngon shes so/ /rnam rtog dra ba ma lus bcod/ /shin tu spros med go 'phang 'thob/ /sgrub po'i lam gyi gegs byed pa/ /bar du bcod pa de sel ba/ /phyi rol bdud kyi dkrugs pa dang/ /yul? la
349a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dang rang rig dang/ /nang dang sdug bsngal rengs pa yis/ /bar du gcod pa phal cher la/ /sngar gyi man ngag bsgoms pa yis mkha' la sprin? tshogs 'khrigs pa la/ /mi bzad rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/ /gzhan yang bdud kyi bar chad gang
349b1(rgyud 'grel): spros? med de nyid dbyings su bstim/ /sten dang brten pa so sor bya/ /'dzin pa nyid la gtad par bya/ /de ltar goms pas spros med 'gyur/ /dga' dang bde ba dang ba yis/ /phyi dang gsang ba mtshon par bya/ /blo yi rtog pa ma zhi na/ /sems lam gyis ni/
349b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bskyed la/ /til mar dang btags ral gri bzhin/ /thogs pa med par gzhom par bya/ /shin tu spros med bla ma'i gsung/ /blo yi yul du goms na yang/ /spros pa rtsub mos bskyod pa'i tshe/ /blo la spros med kyis la reg /blo ni phal par brten par/ ?
349b3(rgyud 'grel): de tshe spros pa spros med du/ /ro gcig mnyam pa nyid du thim/ /'dre dang srin po 'jigs pa'i tshogs/ /dur khrod ro langs la sogs pa/ /'khun dang ngar ba bshugs pa 'bod/ /'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /sems las ma gtogs gzhan med pas
349b4(rgyud 'grel): bar sems skar mnga' 'pho ba ltar/ /de yi snying la thim pa yis/ /blo dang gzhan dang spos mang rnams/ /spros med ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /yang na blo de nyid la gtad/ /bdag gi gtsas te mchod sbyin bya/ /mi bzad gdon dang 'go ba'i nad/ /sdig
349b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rmi lam 'pho ba sogs/ /gza' dang rgyu skar gdon la sogs/ /nad dang mya ngan sdug bsngal dang/ /dgra dang 'byung ba'i gnod pa dang/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa yi/ /nye bar 'tshe ba sna tshogs pa/ /thag pa'i sbrul ni sangs pa bzhin/ /skyags pro ba dang gtsang
349b6(rgyud 'grel): sbra dang/ /'dzem bag dang ni ngo tsha dang/ /spros med ye shes kyis gzhom bya/ /bla ma 'dod ltar bsgrub bya ste/ /dga' dang bde dang rangs pa dang/ /tshim dang nga rgyal dregs pa dang/ /sgeg dang tshul 'chos rgyan la sogs/ /spros med ye shes ngo bo nyid//
349b7(rgyud 'grel): zhum dang sgyid lug mi mthun phyogs/ /thams cad spros med nyid du 'gyur/ /mi bzad nyon mongs gang yin pa/ /spros med de nyid las bzhan min/ /de ltar bgrod dang bgrod min pa/ /yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong ba/ /shin tu spros med sems kyis ni//
350a1(rgyud 'grel): zhen pa nyid du mi bya'o/ /'jig rten rnams dang mthun pa yi/ /rnam gzhag h+rul po gshig nas kyang/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /de las yon tan phun sum tshogs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje
350a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par 'gyur/ /e ma zhi ba chen po'i chos/ /i ma khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa/ /e ma mya ngan 'das pa mchog/ e ma 'khor ba zhi ba nyid/ /e ma 'di ni rab tu mtshar/ /skyon ni gang yin yon tan 'gyur/ /byang chub med cing mngon rtogs
350a3(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dngos po min zhing sgom pa min/ /khams kyang min zhing rnam shes min/ /nam mkha' i dkyil dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa/ /chos 'di bde ba chen po'o/ /sa yang ma yin chu yang min/ /me min rlung min nam mkha' 
350a4(rgyud 'grel): min/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sbyor ba yis/ /skye ba 'di la rab tu gnas/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med bshad/ /dngos po med ces ma bsgrags pa/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba dang 'brel phyir/ /chad pa ma yin rtag pa min/ /yan lag med cing kha dog med/
350a5(rgyud 'grel): thog ma dbus dang mdza' yang spangs/ /dngos po thams cad med par 'gyur/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /bsod nams sdig pa dag dang ma 'brel ba/ /mchog tu dga' ba dri med dga' ba yi/ /mgon po de nyid gtor chen gcig pu ste/
350a6(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang snying rje'i sems nyid mgon 'di yod/ /chos rnams ngo bo bde ba chen po'i mchog /mchog tu lhan cig skye dge'i ngo bo ni/ /gzugs med bsod nams med cing sdig pa med/ /skye dang 'gag pa yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar bla ma'i drin gyis
350a7(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid yid ches dran phyir gsal byas pa/ /de la nongs gyur dpal ldan bla ma lha mo rnams la bzod par gsol/ /rgyal ba sras bcas thugs kyi gsar 'di legs par bkod pa yis/ /gsod nams gang skyes de yis 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin
350b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyis/ /mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du/ /sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshor bcod cing?//
350b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'thibs? mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyis bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi phyir rgol bas glags
350b3(rgyud 'grel): lta bar ma nus pa'i ljongs chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi ma gzugs su /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa dpal d+ha rba Na A tsArya dang/ /glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
350b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// /gshin (rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs dpa' bo'i rgyal pos mdzad pa bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha na bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /dpal gshin rje
350b5(rgyud 'grel): gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal 'tshal lo/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA na ma(rgyud 'grel): lha byin bdag gi shAn+ti ku ru na ma(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ 'di ni zhi ba'o/ /rgya skyegs sam/ /tsan dan dmar po ming med kyi khrag dang bsres pas bri bar bya'o//

350b7(rgyud 'grel): karSha ya h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa dgu pa'o/ /ras la ba bla 'am/ yung ba'i khu bas/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kra tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM a daM ba lhas byin swa s+tha nA ta staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya laM/ rjes pa'i cho ga'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT baM/ lhas
351a1(rgyud 'grel): byin gyi mu khaM band+ha ma no band+ha mu khaM ku ru baM mo hA ya bya ba ha ra bi Sh+yA baM/ ras la dug dang ske tshe dang tsha ba'i mang nag dang/ nags kyi nim pa'i 'dab ma dang/ da du nga'i 'dab ma'i khu ba dang/ /de bsreg pa'i sol ba dang/ thal ba dang/
351a2(rgyud 'grel): khrag gis bya rog gi sgro'i smyu gus/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT lhas byin mA ra ya hUM/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ha ra che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ gsad pa'i cho ga'o/ /de kho na bzhin du/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT
351a3(rgyud 'grel): phaT lhas byin dang mchod sbyin dang/ /pi dwe Sha ya hUM phaT che ge mo nyid kyis/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+rI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ che ge mo'i ye na ka na tsa ta krin yan tra man tra bi Sha tsUr na pra yo ga ti ta ta sarbbo dg+hA Ta ya swAhA/ dang por 'khor lo btu bar bya ste/
351a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad pa 'am/ rtsi bas bcu gnyis pa'i dbus su ya/ shar du k+Sha/ lhor mi/ nub tu me/ byang du yi ge dang/ yi ge ya dang por byas pa'i/ rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra yats+tsha ni 'dab ma bcu gnyis su bri'o/ /rtsibs bcu drug tu de de'i bar du bcug
351a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i re mig la oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa la sogs pa bri bar bya'o/ /re mig gzhan brgyad du oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rdzogs pa dang/ swAhA mthar bri ste lha byin gyi shAn+ti ku ru puSh+Ti? ku ru ba sh+yaM ku ru/ staM b+ha ya mo ha ya/
351a6(rgyud 'grel): bi dwe Sha ya/ uts+tsha Ta ya/ ma ra ya/ mu kaM ku ru swAhA/ zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o/ /phyogs bral du lha sbyin gyi ming ngo/ /gshin rje gshed dmar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /bris la dge ba gang bsags pa/ /de yis myur du sems can rnams/ /de bas myur

351b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ ya ma ri yan+t+rA ba li/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'phrul 'khor gyi phreng ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmar po dang ser po dang/ nag po dang ljang gu dang dkar po'i
351b2(rgyud 'grel): mdog gi dbye bas phrin las kyi rjes su 'brangs nas bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa rjes su dran pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT na ma(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo shAn+ti ku ru na ma(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ rgyas pa la bau ShaT dgug pa la dza(rgyud 'grel): lkugs pa la bi/ dbang du
351b3(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba la ho(rgyud 'grel): rengs pa la laM/ bskul ba la hUM/ gsang pa la hUM phaT/ bskrad pa la hUM phaT/ de ltar nges pa la sogs pa'i phrin las rnams la gdags par bya'o/ /oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Ni yo da ya/ ya da yo na re yak+She ya/ yak+She
351b4(rgyud 'grel): yats+tsha ni rA ma ya swAhA/ /'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po'i phrin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams kyi bsrung ba dang zhi ba la gi wang gis dang dkar po 'am/ gro ga 'am smyug ma'i skogs pa 'am/ ras dkar po la 'khor lo gnyis mngon
351b5(rgyud 'grel): par bris te/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): yi ge ming la btags la nag nog la sogs pa med pa'i rdza phod kha sbyor du bcug ste/ mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug nas skud pa dkar pos bril te thun gsum du me tog dkar pos mchog shar phyogs su bltas la gshin
351b6(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed dkar po bsgom zhing mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya dmigs nas rang gi snying kha'i khug pa lta bu'i 'od zer las byung ba'i gshin rje gshed dkar po rnams kyi bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i chus yongs su
351b7(rgyud 'grel): gang bas dbang bskur bar bsams la sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT na ma(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo shAn+tiM ku ru na ma(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhi ba'i cho ga'o/ /skyes pa rnams kyis rgyas pa dang/ zhi ba la gur kum gyi 'khor lo gnyis pa ShaTa
352a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa mngon par bris te/ swAhA yi ge ming la btags la mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bcug nas/ skud pa ser pos dril te/ thun gsum du me tog ser pos mchod/ byang du kha bltas nas gshin rje gshed ser po
352a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya dmigs nas rang gi snying kha las 'od zer ser po las byung ba'i gshin rje gshed ser po dpag tu med pa rnams kyis gser gyi bum pa ser po/ /bdud rtsi ser pos gang
352a3(rgyud 'grel): bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bo ShaT che ge mo puShtiM ku ru bo ShaT swAhA/ rgyas pa'i cho ga'o/ /gro ga 'am ras dkar po la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba 'am tsan dan dmar pos
352a4(rgyud 'grel): ming med kyi khrag dang bsres pas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i yi ge ming la btags la nag nog la sogs med pa'i/ /so legs par btang ba'i rdza phor dmar po kha sbyar du bcug la/ mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du
352a5(rgyud 'grel): bcug nas skud pa dmar pos dril te me tog dmar pos mchod/ /nub tu bltas la bdag nyid gshin rje gshed dmar po bsgoms te/ mdun du zla ba dmar po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya bsams te/ rang gi snying ga las

352b1(rgyud 'grel): na na hUM hUM phaT phaT bau ShaT che ge mo bdag gi dbang du gyis shig /bau Sha Ta swAhA/ dbang du bsdu ba'i cho ga'o/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam zla mtshan gyi ras la chos kyi khu bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris la yi ge dza(rgyud 'grel): 'am h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'am yang na gnyis ka
352b2(rgyud 'grel): ming la btags la rdza phor kha sbyar ram bud med kyi thod pa kha sbyor du bcug la/ me tog dmar pos mchod/ skud pa dmar pos dril te rgongs thun nyi ma lta bu'i gshin rje gshed du bdag nyid bsgoms te/ rang gi snying kha'i 'od zer las byung ba'i

352b4(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo'i ched du mchod sbyin a karSha ya dza(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ yang na h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yang na gnyis ka'o/ /gal te 'ong bar ma gyur na 'khor lo de nyid du ba med pa'i seng ldeng gi me la bdug cing/ sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /dur khrod kyi ras
352b5(rgyud 'grel): la ba bla 'am/ yung bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ bsgrub bya'i ming la yi ge lam btags te/ nag nog la sogs med pa'i rdza phor kha sbyar du bzhug /rdza phor de'i steng du re khA ser po gru bzhi pa bdun bris te/ de'i steng du hUM baM hUM yi ge
352b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis mtshan pa'i lcog brgyad dang ldan pa'i ri rab de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor lam gyi mtshan pa sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa bris te/ me tog ser pos mchod/ skud pa ser pos dril te/ bdag nyid kha lhor bltas la gshin
352b7(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed ser po bsgoms te/ mdun du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya ser po bsams la/ bsgrub bya'i mgo'i steng du dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan par bsams la/ sngags bzlas 
353a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM che ge mo staM b+ha ya laM mnan pa'i cho ga'o/ /ngag mnan par 'dod pas de bzhin du 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ bsgrub bya'i ming la yi ge laM btags nas bzlas pa ni/

353a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge baM bsgrub bya'i ming la btags nas gshin rje gshed ser po'i rnal 'byor gyi cho gas bsgrub bya de lug gi snying gar rab tu bkug nas/ dbang chen gyi 'khor lo bzhis za
