353a7(rgyud 'grel): brkyang gi nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ /bzhin mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs pa/ /glog ltar ljags 'gyu ba shin tu mi bzad pa/ bskal pa'i me ltar shin tu 'bar ba/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyang ba/ dbyar gyi char sprin lta bur gsus
353b1(rgyud 'grel): ba 'phyang ba/ me 'bar ba ltar skra dang sma ra gyen du 'bar ba/ 'brug gi sgra lta bu'i hUM gis mgrin pa'i sbubs gang par bdag nyid bsams te/ mdun du bsgrub bya gos h+rul po dri ma can gyon pa/ lus la dri ma chags pa/ de'i spyi bo dang mtshogs ma dang snying
353b2(rgyud 'grel): ga dang/ dpung pa dang pus mo rnams la sngags kyi cho ga byas pa'i go cha dang bsrungs pa rnams gshig nas/ de'i lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams nye bar bsdus te/ rang gi lus la rab tu btug nas bsgrub bya'i lus khang stong lta bur bsams

353b5(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM lha byin mA ra ya hUM/ yang na cho ga 'dis 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ hUM phaT yi ge sgrub bya'i ming la btags la/ de bzhin du bsam gtan la gnas pa'i cho gas bsgrub bya lha dang bral zhing lus la dri
353b6(rgyud 'grel): ma chags pa/ me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya bzhin mi sdug pa/ khro bo sna tshogs kyis ral gri dang/ dbyug pa dang gtun shing dang sta re dang/ mtshon ka med pa dang/ gzhu dang mda' dang/ 'khor lo dang tri shul dang rtse gsum pa dang mdung
353b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mtshon piN+Di? ba la dang ldan pa'i phyag rnams kyis brgyab pas dum bu brgyar bcad cing/ bya rog dang 'ug pa dang/ /bya rgod dang spyang ki dang srin po dang/ mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis za bar bsam zhing/
354a1(rgyud 'grel): sbobs pas sngags bzlas pa na oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT lhas byin mA ra ya hUM phaT/ bsad pa'i cho ga'o/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na sngar bshad pa'i sngags bzlog nas bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro//  
354a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /sdang pa la de bzhin du 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ bsgrub bya'i ming la phaT yig btags la thod pa kha sbyor gyi nang du bcug nas skud pa nag pos dkris te nyi ma gung la dur khrod du sbas te/ gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor
354a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas gnas pa'i mdun du rta dang/ ma he la zhon pa'i bsgrub bya gnyis mtshon ston pa rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs sprul pa/ phyogs gnyis la gnas pas/ phan tshun za zhing 'khrugs par byed par bsam zhing bzlas pa bya ba ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri
354a4(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ phaT lhas byin mchod sbyin dang rnam par dbye bar gyis shig /phaT/ rnam par sdang ba'i cho ga'o/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis bsgrub bya'i ming la hUM phaT yi ge btags la thod pa kha sbyor du bcug nas skud pa nag pos dril
354a5(rgyud 'grel): te dur khrod du sbas la/ gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi mdun du yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya rnga mo sngon mo la zhon pa/ lho phyogs su rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa rnams kyi rjes
354a6(rgyud 'grel): cing 'gro bar bsams nas bzlas pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM phaT lhas byin skod? bar gyis shig/ hUM phaT skrad pa'i cho ga'o/ /gshin rje gshed kyis bdag bsrung ba'i cho ga ni/ oM ya ma rA dza sa de ya na ma:
354a7(rgyud 'grel): snying la'o/ /oM ya me ru du swAhA/ 'tshogs ma la'o/ /oM Na yo da ya hUM spyi bor ro/ /oM yo ni rA ba ShaT yak+Sha ya/ mig g.yas pa la'o/ /oM yak+Sha yats+tshi ni rA ma ya/ mig g.yon pa'o/ /oM da ya phaT rgyu ma la'o/ /rnal 'byor pa khros pas
354b1(rgyud 'grel): rang gi khrag dang/ ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang dug dang tshwa dang/ skye tshe dang mar nag dang d+ha du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis rim sam bri bar bya'o/ /gsod pa gshin rje'i sku la gnas/ /sdang ba rta dang ma he la/ /bskrad par
354b2(rgyud 'grel): mo rgyab na gnas/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /dbang bsdu bud med snying la'o/ /rgyas pa rta'i rgyab tu ste/ lkug pa lug gi snying la gnas/ /rengs pa ri rang dbus su ste/ /'gugs pa seng ge sha ra b+ha/ /gi waM gur kum dag gis kyang/ /gro ga la
354b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs dag la bri/ /rdza phor kha sbyor nang du gzhug /yongs su 'dud de dag sems kyis/ /bya rog chen po'i smyu gu ste/ nyin gung ro bsregs thab tu sba/ /thod pa kha sbyor nang bcug nas/ /bzhin mi sdug gi 'du shes can/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor
354b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /lho phyogs bltas pas chad pas bcang/ /zhi bar mdza' yi ya bsub bya/ /ni yig gnyis kyang de bzhin du/ /rjes la dbus kyi ya yang bsub/ /lhag ma 'bru rnams cing der gnas/ /'di yi bsnyen pa khri phrag gcig /yang dag dngos
354b5(rgyud 'grel): grub 'dod pas bzlas/ /gang la bris nas bzhag pa'i/ /khyim der rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung/ /zlum po gsum ni byas nas su/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa/ /re mig de la 'di ltar dgod/ /btags pa'i sngags ni bri bar bya/ /ya ma rA dza
354b6(rgyud 'grel): sa do me la/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra yak+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ dbus su yang 'byung ngo/ /nang gi 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi re mig la/ /k+She ma me da 'byung ngo/ /phyogs bral stong pa la bsgrub bya hUM gnyis kyi bar du gzhug go /lak+She ma
354b7(rgyud 'grel): me da yats+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni rA/ /'khor lo gnyis pa la g.yon nas brtsams nas g.yas skor gyis bri'o/ /'khor lo gsum pa la shar phyogs nas brtsams nas bar bar gyi re mig la/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): pi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes bri? bar?
355a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i bar bar gyi re mig rnams la che ge mo bskrad par gyis shig /song cig dbang du gyis shig /sdang bar gyis shig rgyas par gyis shig /zhi bar gyis shig /swAhA/ zhes de la sogs pa las kyi rjes su bsrad? ba
355a2(rgyud 'grel): bri bar bya'o/ dang por oM tha ma la na ma(rgyud 'grel): dang ba ShaT dang bau ShaT dang/ hUM phaT yi ge ldan pa'i sa bon rnams zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang dbang bsdud dang/ gsod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /'di dag thams cad bdag nyid bsgoms pas 'grub par
355a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dpal u rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum las byung ba slob dpon bi rU bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi ba shI? ta dpal mkhas pa chen po da na shI las  
355a4(rgyud 'grel): yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas/ /drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o/ //rgya gar skad du/ shI rak+ta ya mA ri sA b+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ dpal gshin rje gshed
355a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma de rjes rdo rje gshed dmar po/ /rang snang lus 'khyud bde bas gang zhing gzhan don 'jug /rdo rjes mtshon pa'i dbyug pa mi mgor ldan pa'i phyag /zhal gcig 'jigs ba sel la gus pas mgos
355a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims la sogs ldan/ /blo bzang sems can don rtsa gcig /byams sogs yon tan yongs su rdzogs/ /dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan/ /snga bar brtse ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /dang por kha sogs dag byas
355a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /skye bos dben sogs dur khrod sogs/ /bde ba'i stan la brtsam par bya/ /rang gi snying gar pad ma bkod/ /shin tu gsal ba'i nyi ma blta/ /yaM yig dbus su hUM yig ni/ /dmar po 'od zer 'phro ba'o/ /de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i
355b1(rgyud 'grel): rang lhag lha'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /rdo rje 'chang bdag rnam pa can/ /bla ma sangs rgyas de yi sras/ /khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can yang/ /dkyil 'khor pa yi rang bzhin can/ /dmigs nas de dag rnams la phyag /lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par
355b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /tsar tsi ka la sogs pa yis/ /mchod pa byas la sdig pa bshags/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig /bgyid dang de bzhin bgyid rtsal gar/ /gang yang rjes su yid rang ba/ /de dag dus gsum mgon la bshags/ /rdzogs sangs
355b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang de yi sras/ /'phags rnams dge tshogs rjes yi rang/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos/ /tshogs kyi mchog bcas skyabs su mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la/ /rang gi lus ni dbul bar bgyi/ /dam pa'i chos kun
355b4(rgyud 'grel): ston pa yi/ /sgra dbyangs mdzes pas bzhugs su gsol/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ /de sras lam gyur sbyin sogs tshul/ /sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /rab tu dang pas bsten par bgyi/ /sems can rnams kyi dan bsgrub phyir
355b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi/ /bsod nams kun nas gang bsags pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du/ /gyur nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi/ smon lam 'di ni byas nas su/ /blo yis de
355b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams gshegs de nas/ brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te/ /sna tshogs stong par rnam par bsam/ /rang bzhin dang bral stong pa ste/ /rgyu yis kyang ni mtshan ma med/ /rnam par rtog dang bral nyid kyis/ /smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA
355b7(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ /brtan par byas nas sems de ni/ /aM yig las byung nyi ma der/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ste/ /kun nas sngon po rtse lnga pa/ 'od zer 'phro bas kun nas 'khrigs/ /bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya/ /rdo rjes sa gzhi
356a1(rgyud 'grel): khor yug dang/ /ra ba gur ni de bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag phyir/ /slar yang bsam gtan brtsam par bya/ /der ni sna tshogs pad zla la/ /saM byung rdo rje bzang po yi/ /yan lag chos 'byung zur gsum dkar/ /sna tshogs
356a2(rgyud 'grel): pad ma rdo rje dang/ /son cing gyen du gnas bsgom de'i/ /dbus su slar yang dkyil 'khor ni/ /b+haM yig 'khor lo las skyes pa/ /rtag pa'i yan lag yang dag byung/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra byed kyis
356a3(rgyud 'grel): spras shing/ /stegs bu lha mos mdzes byas pa/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod/ /ba dan dril bu dang ldan pa/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam par mnan/ /zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan/ shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /
356a4(rgyud 'grel): nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gu yang dag mtshungs/ /dbang sngon 'od 'bar rnam par ni/ /dbus kyi sa gzhi rnam bsgom bya/ /phyogs kyi kha dog dbye ba 'dis/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'ang bsgom par bya/ /thog kyang de bzhin bsam bya zhing/ /rtsig
356a5(rgyud 'grel): pa so so go rim bzhin/ /rnam pa lnga ni rnam bsgom nas/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom/ /rnam pa lnga des dpal ldan ni/ /rdo rje gshin rje 'joms mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar grags/ /de yang dbye bas brjod par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo
356a6(rgyud 'grel): rje'i lte ba la/ /pad+ma nyi ma dbyangs zung dgod/ /de yis zla ba ka yig sogs/ /Da Dha dad+ha ya la yang/ /spel te zung des rdzogs pa yi/ /zla ba dmar po bsgom par bya/ /'di dag kho na rdzogs pa ni/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes brjod/ /mnyam pa nyid
356a7(rgyud 'grel): ni de gcig nyid/ /so sor kun rtog de byung hUM/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni/ de las byung ba'i rnam par bsam/ /rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug pa che/ /mi mgo ser pos rnam par brgyan/ /nor bu me shel lta bu yi/ /'od zer 'khrug pa'i sa bon bcas//
356b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzre da Na Da at+ma ko haM/ zhes pas nga rgyal bya'o/ /de las byung ba dkar po'i nyi 'od snang ba thub mchog 'od 'phro rang snang gis sku 'khyud/ /sgeg pa'i khro bo'i tshul can mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang gi mtshan 'chang ba/ /g.yon brkyang gdan
356b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang ldan/ /mi mgo so sor mtshan pa'i dbyug pa thogs/ /gtum po bdud rtsi'i tshogs kyi khu bas yongs su gang ba'i pad+ma'i snod ni bsnams pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi/ /ye shes rdo rje 'dzin bdag nyid/ /rnam pa lnga
356b3(rgyud 'grel): yi rang bzhin gang/ rnal 'byor zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /'di ni rnal 'byor ro/ /'dod chags chen po'i gdul bya ni/ /'gro ba gsum po mnyam bltas nas/ /rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas gzugs can byas/ /rang gi lus la mnyam

356b5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems la gzhug /snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid zhu/ /byams sogs tsar tsi ka sogs kyis/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pas bskul bar bya/ /thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /sa gsum mdza' 
356b6(rgyud 'grel): dag rmongs pa sol mdzod cig /jo bo bdud bzhi po 'di las rgyal ba/ /sems ni g.yengs so rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /'jig rten mgron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci/ /rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs/ /byang
356b7(rgyud 'grel): chub rang bzhin 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas/ /khyod ni stong nyid sems shing ci la bzhugs/ /khu ba de bskul zhu bar ni/ /gyur cing bcud de'i rjes su zhugs/ /glu 'di dag gi rjes mthun dor/ /de rnams rgud bzhin 'bod pa'i phyir/ /khu ba 
357a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs gyur pa las skyes/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid dkyil du/ /khros shing drag bcas dmar po ni/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /smin ma rno zhing rab 'bar ba/ /rmig pa brdabs pas 'jigs par byed/ /maM yig sa bon las byung ba//
357a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par byed/ /ma he de yi rgyab gnas pa/ /mi mgo ser pos mtshan pa yis/ /rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'od zer can/ /dkar po gdul dka' 'dul byed bsgom/ /slar yang sa bon de dbus son/ /nyi ma dang bcas me long gi/
357a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan ltar bsam de 'od kyis/ /sna tshogs dus dgra'i gzugs can byas/ /de la yang dag bcug nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dbyug pa las byung ba'i/ /'khor lo'i dbang phyug 'od gsal 'bar/ /bdag nyid 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /khams

357a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na pad+ma'i snod mchog ni/ /dkar po bdud rtsi lnga yis gang/ /sbom zhing thung la gsus pa 'phyad/ /mgo bo'i do shal rnam 'phyang ba/ /zhal nas khrag 'dzag mgul par ni/ /rang snang shes rab ma yi 'khyud/ /stag gi pags pa'i na
357b1(rgyud 'grel): bza' can/ /gdengs can dbang po khros pas brgyan/ /mdza' yas sngon po klu dbang gis/ /dbu skra bcings mdzes 'jigs par byed/ /klu rgyal 'jog po dmar po yis/ /rnam par drag po'i rna rgyan byas/ /sna tshogs rigs ldan dbul
357b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyan/ /klu rgyal dud skyong ser po ni/ /lag gdub dag tu 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma dkar po mgul pa'i rgyan/ /ljang gu stobs kyi rgyu yis kyang/ /mchod phyir thogs pa shin tu mdzes/ /gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi/ /kha dog lta bus ska

358a1(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes dga' i rang bzhin du/ /de yi mjug thogs bsgom par bya/ /shes rab lte 'og mtsho skyes ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po de'i/ /lte bar gnas pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar/ /de yi steng du gnas pa yi/ /pad+ma'i snal ma'i

358a5(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung ba'i/ /gtso bo bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /shar du k+She dang 'khor lo las/ /byung ba'i rtag pa phyag gnyis pa/ /dkar po g.yas na 'khor lo g.yon/ /de bzhin thod pa bsnams pa bsgom/ /lhor ni ma yig rin chen las/

358a7(rgyud 'grel): thod pa ni/ /phyag g.yas cig shos dag tu dgod/ /byang du ? ral gris bskyed/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu /g.yas na ral gri mchog bsnams shing/ /g.yon pa mi yi thod pa'o/ /'di rnams zhal gcig phyag
358b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ /zhabs ni g.yon brkyang stabs kyis bzhugs/ /thams cad zhe sdang gshin rje gshed/ /mtshan nyid dag gi khro ba'i gzugs/ /'on kyang de rnams phyag g.yas na/ /rang rang sku mdog rang phyag mtshan/ /gnyug ma'i shes rab gnyis med?

358b4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed/ /ni skyes chags pa mthar byed tshul/ /byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed/ /ra las phrag dog mthar byed 'dra/ /cung zad sngo ba bye brag tu/ /mdzes shing rab tu 'jigs par byed/ /thams cad gdug pa sprul gyis brgyan/ /mche
358b5(rgyud 'grel): ba gtsigs shing gad rgyangs can/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang dag bzhugs/ /rang snang shes rab yan lag sbyor/ /gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin can/ /mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal/ /rang
358b6(rgyud 'grel): rang phyag mtshan thod pa can/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i grwa bzhi ru/ /de bzhin lha mo zla bar bzhugs/ /shar lho dza? dang 'khor lo las/ /lha mo rdo rje tsar tsi ka/ dkar mo skem zhing drag mo che/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs ma/ /lho nub
358b7(rgyud 'grel): dag tu rdo rje sa/ /las skyes rdo rje phag mo ste/ /drag mo phag gi gdong can nyid/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs ma/ /nub byang bur du dbyangs can ma/ /dmar mo do dang pad+mas bskyed/ /rab tu zhi ma phun sum tshogs/ 'dod chags shin rje mthar byed gzugs/
359a1(rgyud 'grel): byang shar mtshams su dkar mo ste/ /ljang gu 'jigs byed ru las skyes/ /phrag dog gshin rje mthar byed kyi/ /tshul dang phyag mtshan 'dzin? par brtson/ /thams cad g.yon brkyang nga yi zhabs/ /rang rang mtshan
359a2(rgyud 'grel): ma thod pa can/ /'on kyang rdo rje phag mo dang/ /dkar mo bong bung? lto ba 'byang/ /Na yo ni rA las byung ba'i/ /thod pa bzhin zur bzhi ru/ /bskyed de ji ltar rang rang sngags/ /gsungs pas blo dang ldan pas dbyung/ /h+rI Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): la sogs
359a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags sgras/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po la bskur nas/ /sprul pa dpag med spro bar bya/ /bla med sems can don byas nas/ /dngos po kun kyi rang lus la/ /khro bo dpar bo dgod par bya/ /dzin dzig ces bya ba 'dis/ /shar gyi rmongs?
359a4(rgyud 'grel): pa mthar byed ni/ /rA yi rtsa bar gnas sna tshogs/ /pad+ma zla ba dag la dgod/ /ratna d+h+ri ka ces bya ba 'dis/ /lho'i rwa chu skyes nyi ma la/ /phra ma zhes grags spyan drangs nas/ /cho ga yis ni dgod par bya/ /A ro lig ces gsang sngags kyis/ /
359a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags gshin rje 'joms pa po/ /nub rwa chu skyes nyi ma la/ /cho ga ji bzhin dgod par bya/ /pradz+nya d+hIka gi de nyid kyis/ /phrag dog gshin rje rnam 'jig pa/ /byang gi chu skyes 'od rno bar/ /cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya/ /mud ga ra d+h+rIka
359a6(rgyud 'grel): de nyid kyis/ /shar sgor chu skyes nyi ma la/ /tho ba gshin rje mthar byed dag /mkhas pas cho ga bzhan du bsam/ /daN Da d+h+rika gi gsang sngags kyis/ /lho sgor yang dag bzhugs pa yi/ /dbyug pa dus dag gdul dka' 'dul/ /sna
359a7(rgyud 'grel): tshogs pad+ma nyi mar dgod/ /pad+ma d+h+rika nyid 'di yis ni/ /pad+ma gshin rje 'joms mdzad pa/ /nub sgor pad+ma nyi ma la/ /stobs po che ni bsam par bya/ khaD ga d+h+rika gi de nyid kyis/ /ral gri gshin rje zad mdzad pa/ /byang du bdud
359b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams sel ba po/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi mar dgod/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gra bzhi du/ /de bzhin gzhan yang lha mo bsgom/ shar lhor lha mo tsar tsi ka/ drag mo rab tu 'od 'phro ma/ /mo ha ra ti'i gsang sngags kyis/ /sna tshogs chu skyed ? ?
359b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /de nas lho nub rigs kyi yum/ /rdo rje phag mo mkhas pa yis/ /dre ba Sha ra ti de nyid kyis pad+ma zla bar dgod par bya/ /de nas nub byang mtshams su na/ /pad+ma zla bar dgod par bya/ /pad+ma zla bar dbyangs can ma/ /rA ga ra te'i sngags kyis
359b3(rgyud 'grel): dgod/ /de nas byang shar dkar mo ste/ /badzra ra ti'i gsang sngags kyis/ /zla bar 'di rnams shis par tshan/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gra bzhi ru/ de nyid gsum gyi thod pa'o/ /'di ltar 'khor lo dam pa spros/ /bde ba ldan pa bstan byas nas//
359b4(rgyud 'grel): sngar gyi 'khor lo de nyid du/ /thim par mnyam par bzhag par blta/ /'di ni shin tu rnal 'byor do/ gshin rje gshed po dmar po yi/ /dkyil 'khor ba yi rang bzhin can/ /mig dang sku sogs ngo bo ni/ /lha yi mngon par byin gyis brlab//
359b5(rgyud 'grel): k+Shi dang 'khor los gti mug bzhin/ /cung zad khro bo mig dag la/ /blo ldan rdo rje'i mig dgod bya/ /rna bar dzriM dang rdo rje bskyed/ /rdo rje'i snang ba nag por snang/ /snang khams rin chen las byung ba'i/ /ser sna zhes bya zla ba la/ /rdo rje sna yang de bzhin
359b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan/ /lce la raM las pad+ma bskyed/ /rdo rje lce ni zla bar gnas/ /'dod chags dang mtshungs rdo rje lus/ /skaM? skyes ral gri las byung ba/ /phrag dog gshin rje gshed ngo bo/ /lus ming bral ba'i zla bar gnas/ /lte ba'i steng du saM rdo rjes/ /sems
359b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi rdo rje de bzhin gzhag /sgeg pa'i khro bo'i gzugs can de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dgod/ /'di ni yan lag drug dgod pa/ /mngon shes don bsgrub ched du bshad/ /snying gar rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor hUM/ /rdo rje hUM las thugs rdo rje/ /dus dgra'i
360a1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog phyag mtshan ldan/ /sngon po 'od zer gsal ba'o/ /mgrin par A(rgyud 'grel): yig pad+ma'i dbus/ /slar yang A(rgyud 'grel): yig pad+ma las/ /'dod chags dus dgra lta bu'i sku/ /dpal gsung rdo rje rnam par bsam/ /spyi bor oM yig 'khor
360a2(rgyud 'grel): lo'i dbus/ /oM yig 'khor los 'od bzar dkar/ /sku yi rdo rje sku dbang phyug/ sku mdog dge dang phyag mtshan mchog /'di ni de nyid gsung rdo rje/ /mchog bskyed nam mkhar gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas mchod la gsang sngags kyis/ /de dag byin
360a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta bA gwa dzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ oM sarbba ta thA ga ta ga ya badzra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko haM/ rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis/ /'jig rten bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas

360b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag na sna tshogs pa'i/ /me tog nyer spyod sogs bzung bas/ /bltas te thugs kar zhu byas pa/ /rdo rje lam nas mthon gyur pa/ sgeg bcas mchod byed de rnams kyis/ /mchod pa glu dbyangs yid 'ong dang/ /sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin dag /bde ba chen
360b2(rgyud 'grel): po ster bas mchod/ /a ye kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /khro bo khyed mthong rnam par 'jigs/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ /khyod kyis gar mdzad sa stengs dang/ /sa bla dang nam? 'og gal/ /chags

364a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba yi/ /lus gsum las skyes dags par byas/ /gal te kha cig bdag las 'da' / /'jig par 'gyur gyis gzhan du min/ /rdo rje'i gnas su 'khor lo dang/ /rin po che dang pad ma dang/ /ral gri bcug la klag par
364a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sa yongs su bzung ba'i mjug thogs su bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir/ /phur bus gdab par bya'o/ /de la phur bus gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te/ oM g+ha(rgyud 'grel): g+ha(rgyud 'grel): ha ya g+ha ha ya/ sarbba duSh+Tan phaT/ kI la ya kI la pha sarbba pA
364a3(rgyud 'grel): lan? phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badzra kI la ma badzra d+hA rA dz+nyA ba ya ti/ sarbba big+h+naM kA be bIk+tsat+ta/ badzra kI la hUM phaT/ smad phur bu'i rnam pa/ stong ral gri gshin rje gshed kyis bgegs rnams la phyogs mtshams thams cad du phur bus gdab par
364a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ sa yongs su bzung ba'o/ /'di ltar sa gzhi bgegs med par bltas la/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer rnon pos mtshams la sogs pa bcing ba byas nas/ der ba ma las byung ba'i sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/
364a5(rgyud 'grel): lus? phyed 'thon pa/ phyag g.yas pa dam bca' ba khas len pa'i phyag rgya dang/ g.yon pas bum pa 'dzin pa spyan drangs la/ me tog dang dri bzangs la sogs pa sna tshogs pa la sogs pas mchod la lhag par gnas par bya ste/
364a6(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang/ /sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ ji ltar bdud kyi dpung bcom pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi sde/? /bcom
364a7(rgyud 'grel): nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi/ /zhes byas pa lan gsum brjod de/ /yang dag par mchod la de nas de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o/ /sa'i lha me lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas yang der dris te bar byugs pa la me tog bcal du
364b1(rgyud 'grel): bkram la/ /lha rnams kyi gnas su tsan dan la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la/ /der snying ga'i ye shes kyis 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs la/ /mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa bya ste/ mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o/
364b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas spos phor btegs la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dang/ sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ bcom ldan gshin rje gshed rdo rje/ rig pa'i rgyal po cho ga khyod la
364b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dud/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bdag 'tshal lo/ /de phyir bcom ldan bdag gus la/ /bka' drin gnang ba mdzad par rigs//
364b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'gro 'khor bya don stsol/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang/ /gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags la/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ /'byung po byang chub bstan gnas dang/ /sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba/ /
364b5(rgyud 'grel): byang? du rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams/ /bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag /gshin rje gshed dmar dkyil 'khor ni/ /ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod kyis/ /'gro ba sbyang phyir bri bar bya/ /des bdag slob mar bcas pa la
364b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su brtse ba nyer bzung nas/ /'dus pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /nye bar gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de ltar lan gsum byas nas 'khor lo de yang dag par mchod de/ /nam mkhar dgod par bya'o/ /lha lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas rnal
364b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ba yi yi ge dza(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i zla ba dang/ nyi ma'i mig can gyis gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i sa bon las byung ba de rnams kyis kha dog can nyi shu rtsa lngar phye ste/ srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur spoms su sgo'i nyi shu
365a1(rgyud 'grel): cha can gyi srad bu dri bzangs kyis byugs pa la/ ral gri gshin rje gshed skud pa 'dzin pa dang/ /lhan cig 'bar ba'i lta stangs kyis lcags kyus spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /oM dI ba ta dri Sh+Ti? aM ku sha tsa na?
365a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sngags kyis bcug nas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): pra yats+tsha mo ha kA la hA ri swa tsa kra sU tra na ya hUM/ zhes pa la sogs zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi bar du gsal btab la/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): a n+yo nA nu ga ta/ sarbba d+harma pa ra spa rA nu ga ta sarbba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): a
365a3(rgyud 'grel): dyan+tA? nu pra biSh+Ta(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmA hUM zhes pa brjod cing bsgral bar bya'o/ /srad bu 'dzin pa yi ge dza(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyis bskul la/ /rang gi dzdza(rgyud 'grel): dzdza(rgyud 'grel): dzdza(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa brjod de g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte ba'i steng du thig skud bzung nas khar gzhug/ nub tu
365a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug la shar du kha bltas te shar du 'dug cing nub tu kha bltas pa dang/ lhan cig nam mkha' i lhan cig nam mkha' i thig gdab par bya'o/ /slar 'og gi thig gdab ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra sa ma ya su traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ sems can don la khyed
365a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi/ /dus yin de phyir 'dir sbyon cig /ces pa'i thig skud kyi sgras nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bskul zhing shar nub kyi tshangs pa'i thig gdab par bya'o/ /byang du kha bltas pas lhor kha bltas pa dang/ /lhan
365a6(rgyud 'grel): cig lho byang gi tshangs thig gdab par bya'o/ /mer 'dug te gnod sbyin du kha bltas pa dang/ dbang ldan du gnas te yi dags su kha bltas pas shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig go /rlung du 'dug la yi dags su kha bltas pa dang/ bden bral
365a7(rgyud 'grel): du? gnas nas gnod spyin du kha bltas pas nub kyi rtsa ba'i thig go /rlung du 'dug la dbang por kha bltas pa dang/ dbang ldan du gnas nas klur kha bltas pas byang gi rtsa ba'i thig go /mer 'dug la klur kha bltas pa dang/ bden
365b1(rgyud 'grel): bral du gnas nas dbang por kha bltas pas lho'i rtsa pa'i thig go /cho ga 'di nyid kyis tshangs pa'i thig dag gi gzhogs/ /gnyis su thig bdun bdun no/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol tu thig drug drug go /phyi nas rta babs kyi rjes su mthun pa'i thig go/
365b2(rgyud 'grel): zur? thig gnyis kyang ngo/ /de nas thig skud gnyis ltab du byas la dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas g.yas skor du 'khor lo'i rnam pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gnyis gdab par byas te/ /phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
365b3(rgyud 'grel): mos pa byas zhing ngo/ /'dir mtshan ma min pas mi 'grub ste/ thig skud chad na bla ma nyams/ /lhag chad skyon gyi nad du 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul na ni slob ma 'khrul/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /thig
365b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang po? yang dag ldan/ /dra ba dra phyed dar dang ni/ /me tog phreng la sogs pas brgyan/ /grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang/ /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /nang du ni
365b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyis sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba gru bzhi po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /de nas sgo'i bar du rtse mo ldar ldar rjes su mthun pa'i cha dbye'o/ /yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): khro po'i lta bas/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor
365b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan? cha ru/ /bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya/ /tshad ldan shin tu mdzes pa ye/ /stegs bu chen po dor nas ni/ /sgo khyud sgo ltar shes bya ste/ /de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o/ /rol mo la sogs glu gar gyi/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag ldan/ /stegs
365b7(rgyud 'grel): su? sgo yi phyed yin te/ /'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin du/ /dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang/ /me tog phreng ba'i snam bu yang/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi sa yi phyir/ /rdul tshon sa yid de yi phyed/ /rin chen ka sogs snam bu yi/ /sa gzhi tshon gyis dang mnyam/
366a1(rgyud 'grel): rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur te/ /ba dan dril bu dag dang ldan/ /dril bu dang bcas rlung gis bskyod/ /ba dan phyi yi mtshams su'o/ /gzhan rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par/ /ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag /khru gang nas ni
366a2(rgyud 'grel): brtsams nas ni/ ji srid khru ni sdong gi bar/ /thig gdab pa'o/ /de ltar rim pa 'dis thig btab nas/ /snga ma'i rim pa kho nas 'bar ba'i lta stengs kyis/ /rdul tshon rnams yang dag par gzi brjid bskyed la mngon par bsngags par byas te/
366a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pa'i gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i rnal 'byor ba kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs pas 'khor lo'i nang du 'dug ste/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te/ g.yon pa'i khu
366a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur gyis dgye bar byas te/ /dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang/ /nag po'i bar du'o/ /re khA sgo'i nyi shu char? mnyam par sbom phra la sogs skyon mdza' dag dang bral bar dgye bar bya'o/ /de la sbom par bkye na nad do//
366a5(rgyud 'grel): phra mor bkye na nor 'jig go /yon pos 'khon 'byung ngo/ /bar du nas tsam gyi re kha dgye bar bya'o/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi char ni dmar po ste/ /byang ni ljang gu yin par bshad/ /inDa nI la
366a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar ldan/ /dbus kyis gzhi yang dag bri/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor kun nas bris la lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs pad+ma'o/ /dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbyug pa dkar po mi mgo ser pos mtshan pa'o/ /shar
366a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi rA'i rtsa bar zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o/ /lto'i rwa'i rtsa bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i/ /rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o/ /nub kyi na'i rtsa bar nyi ma la pad+ma dmar po'o/ /byang gi rwa'i rtsa bar nyi ma la ral gri
366b1(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i me mtshams su 'khor lo'o/ /bden bral gyis mtshams su rdo rje'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su pad+ma'o/ /dbang ldan du ral gri'o/ /shar sgor rdo rje'i tho ba rwa nyi shu pa'o/ /lho sgor dbyug pa dkar pa'o/ nub sgor pad+ma dmar po'o/ /
366b2(rgyud 'grel): byang sgor ral gri'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhing thod ba bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /logs bzhir bum pa brgyad do/ /rdul tshon dgye ba'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bltas la rnal 'byor pas rang snang gi yan lag gi sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams
366b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid la bcug la/ sems des nam mkha' i khams khyab par byas nas/ dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ /phyung la gnas ji lta bar bzhag la sbyan la sogs pa dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /dbang bskur byas la ye shes kyi 'khor
366b4(rgyud 'grel): lo spyan drangs te/ /mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas/ khro bo rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang/ dbang du byas te mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas bzlas shing bsgoms pas mnyes par bya'o/ /phyogs
366b5(rgyud 'grel): skyong rnams la yang gtor ma dang mchod pa phul nas rang nyid dkyil 'khor la dmigs te phyag bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas gtso bo dang dkyil 'khor thod pa dang bzhi ste/ bum pa bcu
366b6(rgyud 'grel): bdun dang/ slar las thams cad pa rnams mtshan mas mtshan cing mgrin pa gos kyi dkris pa/ /tsu ta la sogs pa lo ma dang ldan pa rin po che lnga dang/ sman lnga dang 'bru lnga dang ldan pa rnams de dang de'i sngags las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kyi
366b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i rnam par bltas la de rnams kyi mig la sogs pa dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur bar byas la/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ mchod yon la sogs pa phul dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/  
367a1(rgyud 'grel): bcing pa dang/ dbang du byas la mchod pa la sogs pa byas te/ me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i rdo rje'i steng dang steng du/ bzhag la de dang de'i sngags ji srid 'dod par thun gsum du bzlas nas me tog dkar po bcug la 'khor lo de de
367a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid du chu'i rnam par blta'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o/ /de nas chad pa la sogs pa'i skyon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ yon bdag gi bsod nams mngon par spel ba'i ched du sbyin sreg bya ste/ de la zhi ba'i thab khud gzhin
367a3(rgyud 'grel): du las thams cad pa'i thab khung khru gang gi tshad la zabs su khru phyed bskos la/ /bskos pa las khru phyed dor nas dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kha khyer pad+ma rgyas pa lta bus yongs su bskor ba de'i phyi rol tu sor gnyis dor nas stegs bu gru
367a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de'i zur du ni zla ba phyed pa'i steng du rdo rje rtse gsum pa rnams so/ /thab kyi dkyil du zhe sdang rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad kyis tshad dpangs su sor gcig pa'o/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang byang rnams su 'khor lo dang rin
367a5(rgyud 'grel): po che dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri sor drug pa bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol du rdo rje'i phreng ba bya'o/ /tshon dkar pos dkar por byas te/ thab khud do/ /de nas rnal 'byor pa kha shar du bltas bas bsreg bya'i rdzas mdza' dag gzhogs g.yas su bzhag ste/
367a6(rgyud 'grel): gsang gtor dang mchod yon gyi snod la sogs pa g.yon du bzhag la/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi tshang? bar nas me blangs la/ 'o ma can gyi bud shing la rlung yab can gyi me sbar bar byas te/ yi ge gsum gyis mngon
367a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsngags so/ de'i rjes la g.yas skor du sku sha dgram par bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yongs su gyur pa sngon du 'gro bas sna tshogs par ma'i steng du/ me zur gsum pa la ram las byung ba'i me lha sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag
367b1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa gnyug ma'i rig ma dang gnyis su med pa g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi phyag gis bgrang phred dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ /g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal pos gyis brgyan pa/ thugs kar rang gi sa bon gnas la bsgoms
367b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas oM Tak+ki hUM dza(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis ye shes kyi me lha spyan drangs nas/ ku sha'i chun pos bsang gtor dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul la/ dam tshig pa la bcug mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas/ de'i zhal du ri bkod nas
367b3(rgyud 'grel): dgang glugs dbul bar bya'o/ /dgang gzar dang blugs bzar gyi kha la yi ge ya bsgoms la go rims bzhin du bsreg bya thams cad bsreg par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su de'i snying gar rang gi sa bon las gshin rje mthar byed kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
367b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo can bskyed la spyan la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du 'gro pas/ ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang pa la sogs pa sngon du byas la de'i zhal du yi ge ram bsgoms te/ oM agna ye swAhA/ zhes pas mar gyi dgang blugs dbul bar
367b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM sarbba pA pa da ha na badzra ya sarbba pA pa ni tsA sya da ha swAhA/ til rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra yu(rgyud 'grel): She swAhA/ dur ba rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ya swAhA/ 'bras ma grugs ba rnams kyi'o/ /oM sarbba sa ba de swAhA/ zho zan gyi'o/ /oM a pra ti ha ta
367b6(rgyud 'grel): badzra ya swAhA/ ku sha rnams kyi'o/ /oM po d+hi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ shing a shwadA yi'o/ /oM badzra ku ba ra ya swAhA/ shing n+ya gro d+ha yi'o/ /oM badzra dza yA ya swAhA/ shing ba la sa yi'o/ /oM sa hA kA rA ya swAhA/ shing a mA yi'o/ /bsreg bya'i rdzas
367b7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rnams kyang rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i sngags man ngag ji lta bar bskul tshig dang ldan pas bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bor bskyed la/ bsreg par bya'o/ /de nas bsangs la zhal bsil la sogs pa phul? te/ dri zhim pa'i me tog la sogs dang/
368a1(rgyud 'grel): na bza' dang sa rtsi la sogs pa phul nas 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab la/ yi ge gsum yi ge mu(rgyud 'grel): mdza' can gyis gshegs su gsol lo/ /rdzas lhag ma rnams me lha la bsregs nas/ de yang cho ga snga mas
368a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol so/ sbyin sreg go /dgang gzar khru gang pa 'og tu sor bzhi pa'i rdo rje 'am/ rin po che dang steng du sor bzhi pa sor gnyis pa'i zab dang ldan pa rdo rjes mtshan pa/ bcud mdzag pa'i bu ga mthe'u chung gi ched tsam pa/ pad+ma'i
368a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa can dang blugs gzar sor gnyis pa zabs su sor gcig pa rdo rje dang ldan pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma'i rnam pa'o/ /zhes pa dgang gzar dang blugs gzang ro/ /de nas rab tu gnas pa'i sa bzhi gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs
368a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs pa yid du 'ong bar slob dpon ji ltar 'byor pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pas sku gzugs sam/ ras ris sam/ glegs bam mdun du rnam par bzhag la gsang gtor dang/ mchod yon dang zhabs?
368a5(rgyud 'grel): bsil dang zhal gsal phul nas g.yon pa dang cig shos kyi khu tshur dag gis yungs kar gzung la sku gzugs la sogs pa'i mdun du g.yon skor dang g.yas skor gyis bskor nas me la blugs te/ oM sarbba pA pa da ha na badzra ya che
368a6(rgyud 'grel): ge mo'i sarbba pA pi da ha swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'dis bsal ba'i kham phor gsum yang skor phyogs kyis bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas snyim pas chu bzung ste/ de kho na bzhin du me la blugs so/ /slad nas nam mkhar gnas pa'i de bzhin
368a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa rnams nye bar sbyor pa/ lngas yang dag par mchod la/ kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs pas spos phor gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams lhag par gnas par bya ste/ sa ma ya stwaM/ sa ma o haM zhes pa lan gsum
368b1(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /dga' ldan yang dag bzhugs pa rnams/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhum bzhugs ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs shing/ /mgon po 'dir ni rtag bzhugs nas/ /me tog la sogs
368b2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag ni/ /byang chub sems rab 'phel bya'i phyir/ /che ge mo yi don du bzhes/ /de nas gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /ces pa la sogs pas bstod par bya'o/ /lha lhag par gnas pa'o/ /snga dro sku gzugs na bza' ser po g.yogs pa  
368b3(rgyud 'grel): kha shar du phyogs pa la khrus bya'o/ /de la rim pa 'di yin te/ ba'i rnam lnga la oM hUM traM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i sa bon gyis mngon par sngags pas nye bar byug go /de nas dri zhim pa'i mar khu/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya gi sho d+ha ne
368b4(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis dur pa'i pir gyis byug par bya'o/ /de nas 'khar ba'i snod du bzhag pa'i shun ba lngas mar khu phyi bar bya'o/ /de'i 'jug? thogs su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas brtsams te bum pa so so'i chus
368b5(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol bar bya ste/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam nyid na/ /de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin dag gis khrus gsol bgyi/ /oM sarbba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM/ zhes bya
368b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags kyis so/ /de'i mjug thogs su nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i tsar tsi ka la sogs pa rig ma'i tshogs spyan drangs la ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa de rnams kyi dbang sbyin par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas ras
368b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis chu med par byas la/ sngar gyi rang gi gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ /ngas ris sam glegs bam maM mchod rten chen po rnams ni me long la snga ma'i rim pas khrus gsol bar bya'o/ /khrus kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas spyan la sogs pa dang/ sku 
369a1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ rang gi rigs kyi bdag po dbu rgyan la bzhugs par bsgoms la nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dmigs
369a2(rgyud 'grel): nas mchod yon la sogs pa phul te/ dam tshig pa la bcug pa dang/ glegs bam la ni yi ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba la/ /na bza' dbul bar bya ste/ oM badzra bA se swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa la//
369a3(rgyud 'grel): oM a(rgyud 'grel): badzra puShpe hUM zhes pa la sogs dang/ chu skyes de bzhin thang las skyes/ /me tog dam pa 'di dag ni/ /mchog tu gus pas bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar na khyed kyis bzhes/ /lhan cig skyes dang spyar bas byung/ /de bzhin
369a4(rgyud 'grel): bdug spos mchog di dag /mchog tu gus pas bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni khyod kyis bzhes/ /zhun mar 'bru mar mar 'di/ lha rdzas 'bar bas mun pa 'joms/ /mi shes thams cad zhi bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid dang pas 'bul
369a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi/ /lhan cig skyes dang sbyar ba yi/ /dri mchog dam pa 'di dag ni/ /mchog tu gus pas bdag 'bul na/ /ci bde bar ni khyed kyis bzhes/ /bza' dang bca' ba yang dag ldan/ /kha dog dri dang ro ldan zhing/ /thams cad sbyar ba'i

369b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bstod pa bya'o/ /rab gnas kyi cho ga'o// //gang tshe brtse ba gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa/ /dbang bskur ba la sogs pas slob ma bsdu bar 'dod na/ de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i phyi rol tu/ rigs dang/ gzugs dang/ lang tsho dang

369b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /zhes pa lan gsum brjod nas so/ /gus pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams kyis cig gtso bor byas nas brjod par bya ste/ /bu tshur theg pa chen
370a1(rgyud 'grel): po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin no/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dus gsum 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sngags kyi mthu yis ni/ /ye shes
