373b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bya phyir zung/ /zhes pas de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin du gzhug go /zhes pas rdo rje'i dam tshig go /de nas yi ge a las skyes pa'i dril bu/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin khyod/ /rdo rje dril bu rab grub phyir/ /bu yis yang dag gus pas zur/ /
374a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis slob ma bsdu bar gyis/ /zhes pa 'dis de'i lag pa byin no/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis bdag /ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag mchog sems dpa' yi/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur/ /zhes pa 'dis de dag
374a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang dkrol bar bya'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig go /de'i mjug thogs su/ /yid kyis lus brtan de nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig rab tu bshad/ /gang gis lus ni thams cad brtan/ /de nas phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags/ /'di yis
374a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gis 'dod pa'i lha'i bdag nyid phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab po zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig go /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang/ lha'i de kho na nyid dang slob dpon gyi las dang/ dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang/ slong ma
374a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa'i bya ba dag bstan bar bya'o/ /de la sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dag de kho na nyid du mi mnyam pa med pas gru bzhi'o/ /lus dang tshor ba dang/ sems dang/ chos rnams gcig dang du ma la sogs pa dang bral bas gzugs
374a5(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dang mtshungs pa nyid kyis dad pa de'i rnam par dag pa ni shar gyi sgo'o/ /mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ spong ba dang mi bskyed pa dang/ de bzhin du dge ba'i chos skyes pa dang/ ma skyes pa dag gnas pa dang bskyed pa'i
374a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir rtsom pa dang/ las dang so sor rtog pa dang/ bdag nyid dbang du bya ba ste/ brtson 'grus bzhi rnam par dag pa lho'i sgo'o/ /'dun pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ sems dang dpyed pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la dran pa gang yin/ /de'i rnam par
374a7(rgyud 'grel): reg pas nub kyi sgo'o/ /dad pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab ste/ dbang po lnga rnams la gang bsam gtan pa de'i rnam par dag pas byang sgo'o/ /rtog pa dang dpyod pa ste/ dga' ba dang bde ba dang/ sems rtse
374b1(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa nyid ces bya ba bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag lnga dang/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs pa'i bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ dga' ba yang spangs shing btang snyoms dang dran pa yang dag par ldan pa'i bsam gtan gsum dang/ btang snyoms dang dran pa
374b2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su dag bas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/ /chor ba bde ba yang ma yin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa ste/ 'di rnams kyi rnam par dag pas rta babs bzhi'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' mdzod dang/ dri ma med pa dang/ seng ge rnam par rtsen pa'i ting
374b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin bzhi rnam par dag pas ste ga bu bzhi'o/ /don dang tshig dang nges pa'i tshig dang/ spobs pa ste/ gzungs bzhi rnam par dag pa stegs bu la gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs so/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyan thams cad kyis
374b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par spras pa'o/ /mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dag lung bstan pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng bzhi dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ rmad du byung ba'i mtshan nyid can gsung rab yan lag dgu
374b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa dang/ gdul bya'i skye bo rnams la bstan pa'i tshul nyid kyis rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dang/ dril bu g.yer kha'i sgra dang ldan pa'o/ /dran pa dang chos rab tu rnam bar 'byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang dga' ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs ba dang
374b6(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang btang snyoms shes bya ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par dag pas/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang/ me long dang/ me tog phreng ba dang/ rnam par bkra ba dang/ rnga yab 'bar ba'o/ /nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi
374b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs rnams stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa dang po dang/ phyi rol gyi gzugs med par 'du shes shing nang gi gzugs rnams la de bzhin du lta ba'i rnam par thar pa gnyis pa?
375a1(rgyud 'grel): dang?/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs su 'du shes pas gzugs rnams mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas/ gnas so zhes bya ba gsum pa dang/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched la snyoms par
375a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa bzhi pa dang/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa dang/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa drug pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa dang/
375a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa ste/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rnam par dag pas sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i zur bzhi dang logs rnams so/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i ster ga logs kyi rim
375a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ yang dag par 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thig dang mnyam par ldan pa'o/ /rigs kyi dbye bas 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu 'byed pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo nyi shu'o/ /rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas kha dog lnga pa'i rtsig pa dang thog go/
375a5(rgyud 'grel): gos pa med pa'i chos gcig dang/ du ma stong pa nyid kyi ji ltar rigs pa'i lha'i gnas rnams su sna tshogs 'dab ma'i bad ma'i gdan no/ /byang chub kyi sems smin par byed pa nyid kyis nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan pa nyid do/ /byang chub kyi myu gu 'brel
375a6(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa nyid kyis zla ba'i gdan dang ldan pa'o/ /snying rje'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang bas bum pa brgyad do/ /chos kyi snang bas mar me'o/ /grags pas dri bzang po'o/ /chos kyi zas ni zhal zas te 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid do//
375a7(rgyud 'grel): lha'i de kho na nyid kyis mtshan nyid kyang brjod par byas te/ de la rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang/ zhe sdang chen po dang shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyis ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das so/ /chags pa can gyi sems
375b1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams 'dul bas sku mdog dmar po'o/ /brtags pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gshin rje mthar byed pa'i phyir gshin rje gshed do/ /shin tu gdug cing gtum pa rnams la zhi ba nyid rigs pa ma yin no zhes khro bo chen po'o/ /rnam par thar gra'i?
375b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo gsum rnam par dag pas spyan gsum mo/ /shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i gnyug ma'i ngo bo'i phyir phyag gnyis pa'o/ /gdug pa can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir phyag g.yas na dbyug pa'o/ /bde ba bsrung ba'i phyir g.yon na thong pa'o/ /zhe sdang gi
375b3(rgyud 'grel): char gtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'jigs pas sbrul gyi rgyan no/ /tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /rang snang gi shes rab la 'khyud pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas sems can gyi don rgyun mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i
375b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa nyid kyis bla na med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo chos kyi sku yin yang/ longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa gnyis su med pa'i sku'i rnam pa'o/ /gzugs kyi phung po dang gti mug chen po dang/ me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par
375b5(rgyud 'grel): dag pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'das gti mug gshin rje gshed do/ /gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te/ gti mug char gtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs brgyan no/ /tshor ba'i phung po dang phra ma chen po dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bcom
375b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das phra ma gshin rje gshed do/ /gzhan ni thams cad du sngar bzhin te nga rgyal gyi char gtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /'du shes kyi phung po dang 'dod chags chen po dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes rnam par dag ni bcom
375b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das/ 'dod chags gshin rje gshed do/ /'dod chags kyi char gtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /'du byed kyi phung po dang/ phrag dog chen po dang/ bya ba rjes su grub pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das phrag dog
376a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje gshed do/ phrag dog gi char gtogs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /'jig tshogs la lta ba dang shes bya'i sgrib ba dang/ phung po'i bdud mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang/ dad pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa ni/ bcom ldan
376a2(rgyud 'grel): 'das tho ba gshin rje gshed do/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang/ 'dod pa'i sgrib ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs
376a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni bcom ldan 'das dbyug pa gshin rje gshed do/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /log par lta ba dang skye ba'i sgrib pa dang/ mchi ba'i bdud mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang dran pa'i stobs
376a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma gshin rje gshed do/ /mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang rjes su mthun pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no/ /lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ las kyi sgrib pa dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba'i lha'i bu'i bdud mi mthun
376a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyogs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs rnam par dag pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'das ral gri gshin rje gshed de/ /rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi char gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyan no// //sa'i khams dang/ thabs kyi pha rol
376a6(rgyud 'grel): tu phyin pa dang/ byams pa chen po rang bzhin rdo rje tsang tsi ka'o/ /chu'i khams dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje phag mo/ /me'i khams dang/ smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dga' pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje
376a7(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can ma'o/ /rlung gi khams dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ btang snyoms chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i go rI'o/ /phyi'i gzugs la sogs pa drug rnam pa dag bas thod pa bzhi po'o/ /dri ni gzugs su 'dus/ chos kyi dbyings
376b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dag pas ji ltar rigs par sa bcu rnam par rtogs par bya'o/ /stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams 'di nyid du/ /mi mthun ba'i phyogs 'joms bar
376b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ zhes bya ba ni gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas ma bris so/ zhes bya ba ni lha'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /slob dpon gyi las bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang/ bza' ba'i dam tshig dang/ gtor ma'i cho ga dang/ bsrung ba dang/ phyir bzlog dag gzhan
376b3(rgyud 'grel): du shes par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor sgrub pa dang/ slob dpon 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to/ /de'i rjes su slob ma gshin rje 'joms byed kyi gzugs su dmigs la rjes su gnang ba sbyin par bya ste/ sems can kun la phan don phyir/ /
376b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten kun tu thams cad nas/ /ji ltar sna tshogs 'dul 'gyur ba/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /chos kyi gnas su rdo rje dang/ rin chen dang/ pad ma dang/ las kyi sgra bcug la tshigs bcad lngas rim pa bzhin du'o zhes bya ba rjes
376b5(rgyud 'grel): su gnang ba sbyin pa'o/ /de nas/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag na gnas/ phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung/ zhes pa 'dis rdo rje sbyin zhing slob mas/ oM sarbba ta thA ga tA sid+d+hi badzra sa
376b6(rgyud 'grel): ma ya tiShaTha e Sha stwaM d+ha ra yA mi badzra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM zhes brjod cing rdo rje'i brtul zhugs bzung bar bya'o/ zhes bya ba rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so/ /de nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su bsgoms la g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis snying gar chos gos kyi
376b7(rgyud 'grel): ? nas 'dzin pa'i tshul dang/ g.yas mchog sbyin pas/ /oM 'dir ni ngas khyod lung bstan bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas/ /srid pa mchog tu grub bya'i phyir/ /kye che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i/ /ta thA ga tA sid
377a1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha sa ma ya stwaM/ b+hur b+hu ba swa(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas lung bstan nas/ gang 'di dag las byung ba'i phyag rgyas lung ston par byed pa de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu bla
377a2(rgyud 'grel): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan par mdzad do/ /'di nyid las byung ba'i phyag rgya'i mthu dang sngags 'di yi stobs kyis so zhes dad par bya'o zhes slong ma la brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni lung bstan pa'o/ /gsang ba brjod par
377a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig /khams gsum na ni gzhan med de/ /de la 'dod pa chags bral nyid/ /khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o/ /mahA sa ma ya bA naM hUM phaT/ gsang ba brjod pa'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi/ /dkyil
377a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mthong zhing zhugs pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las nges par grol/ /de ring khyed rnams legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di yis ni/ /phyin chad 'chi ba khyed la med/ /srid pa shin tu grub bya'i phyir/ /srid pa sdug bsngal las
377a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod 'das/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gang yin pas/ /gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /byang chub sems ni btang mi bya/ /dam pa'i chos ni sun mi dbyung/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /mi shes pa 'am rmongs
377a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /de yang nges par bstan mi bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ /slob dpon smongs par mi bya ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /rang gi bdag nyid dor nas ni/ /bka' thub kyis ni mi gdung zhing/
377a7(rgyud 'grel): ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung/ /'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /da ni khyod nyid dkyil 'khor gyi/ /slob dpon sngags dang rgyud 'dzin par/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /lha rnams kyang ni mthun par dgongs/ /sems can
377b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la sems brtse bas/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin/ /rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya/ /sgrub pa po rnams rgyud la sbyor/ /'di ni dbugs dbyung sbyin pa'o/ /rjes su gnang ba la sogs pa lnga po 'di dag ni dbang lnga pa'i rjes la 'am/ dbang
377b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'i rjes la yang sbyin par bya zhing slob dpon gyi dbang nyid la phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang zhes brjod do/ /'di ni slob dpon gyi dbang ngo/ /da ni yol ba la sogs pa skye bos dben par byas pa'i sa phyogs su/ slob mas rang gi yid du 'ong ba'i ?
377b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i yon tan na dang ldan pa/ dam tshig dang/ sdom pa dang/ rnal 'byor bzhi la mkhas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas la/ /gsang ba'i dbang gi don du bla ma la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas/ byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la/ /mchod chen ji ltar
377b4(rgyud 'grel): stsal ba ltar/ /bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje dang bdag stsol zhes bya ba 'am/ gzhan gyis gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas bla mas kyang rnal 'byor bzhi mngon du byed cing chos nyid kyi mtsho skyes kyi nang du bskyod pa'i rdo rje'i nang du bskyed
377b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang rig pa brtan pa/ srin lag dang mthe bong dag gis brtsir te de las bton nas/ btung ba rin chen 'di de ni/ /lus kyi rdo rje rab gsal byed/ /bu khyod rtag tu shes nas skye/ /yid las byung ba'i chu mthung mdzod/ /ces pa 'dis bdud rtsi slob ma'i
377b6(rgyud 'grel): khar gzhug par bya'o/ /des/ a ho ma hA su kha zhes brjod cing blangs nas myangs la mgrin par med do/ /de nas yang langs la rang gi pad+ma'i lhag ma de nyid du sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni gsang ba'i dbang ngo/ /de'i 'jug thogs su de nyid dam gzhan
377b7(rgyud 'grel): yang rung ste/ rang yang dag par rig pa tsam gyis ye shes mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ /sngar gyi tshigs bcad kyis gsol ba btab pa dang/ /ldan pa'i slob ma de'i lag par de'i lag pa gtang la/ gzugs ma yid 'ong 'di de ni/ bsten byang sangs
378a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /rdo rje rjes chags sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa myang bar gyis/ /thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min/ /'gro gsum 'di yang dag pa yin/ /de las 'khor bar sbyor bral ni/ /khyod kyi nam yang
378a2(rgyud 'grel): ma byed cig /'di deng sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rigs ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa/ /de la mchog gi dngos grub med/ /ces brjod la sbyin par bya'o/ /de yang tsan dan dang gur kum la sogs
378a3(rgyud 'grel): pas byugs shing/ /shin tu dri zhim po'i me tog gi phreng bas brgyan te/ gos med par pad ma rab tu rgyas par gsal bar ston cing slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod de/ /dri chen dri chu bza' ba dang/ khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha/
378a4(rgyud 'grel): bu med gus mchod de bzhin du/ /b+ha ga pad mar tsum+ba ni/ /bu khyod spro ba yin ni ci/ ji ltar bde bar bus smros shig /ces so/ /des kyang/ dri chen dri chu sogs za ba/ lha mo ci phyir bdag mi spro/ /bud med rnams la rtag gus bya/ /b+ha ga nyid
378a5(rgyud 'grel): la tsum+ba ni/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ de nas des/ e ma bdag gi pad mo 'di/ /bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan/ gang zhig cho gas bsten byed pa/ de yi mdun du bdag gnas so/ /sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa/ /pad+mar bya ba ji bzhin
378a6(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ /bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni/ /'di nyid du ni rtag tu zhugs/ b+ha dza mo ksha ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod do/ des kyang bla ma'i man ngag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i gzugs kyi rtsa nye bar dmigs la/ byed pa'i bye brag bstan pas/ rnal
378a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa yi ji srid du/ byang sems 'byin par mi byed pa/ /de srid tho ba 'gyur rgyun mi 'chad/ /dga' ba la skyes de gzhan ci/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni lhung gyur na/ phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la/ /ma
378b1(rgyud 'grel): smad dngos grub ga la yod/ /mkha' khams rdo rje'i kun sbyor dang/ /reg byas kyang ni rmad byung che'i/ /bde ba skyed par byed pa gang/ /de ni mchog dga' byed pa po/ /dga' bral dag gi dbus su ni/ /mtshon pa ltos la gtan par gyis/ /pad+ma'i nam mkhar rdo rje yis/ lte
378b2(rgyud 'grel): pas gnas pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje skyil krung bdag gi sems/ /nor bu'i nang du son blta zhing/ /ye shes skye ba gang yin de/ /ye shes ngo bo zhes pas brgyan/ /chags pa ma yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar dmigs pa ma yin no/ gang tshe rnal
378b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ye shes mthong/ /bde la gnas bya 'gyur mi bya/ /thun nam yang na nyin gcig gam/ /zla byed zla ba lo dang ni/ /bskal pa bskal ba stong du yang/ /ye shes mngon sbyor gyis gnas bya/ /zhes rtogs par byas la/ ji ltar nus par yang dag bar
378b4(rgyud 'grel): gzung ste phyung pa ro ma kho nas chu skyes nas blangs la de kho na nyid kyi lta bas byang chub kyi sems dam tshig gi ngo bo gzung bar bya'o/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ngo/ 'dir dbang lnga dang shes rab kyi dbang ngag ga la yin/ /'dir de dag ma gsungs te/ /dang
378b5(rgyud 'grel): po cod pan dbang gi ste/ /gnyis pa ral gri sbyin bya ba/ gsum pa rdo rje dril bu ste/ /bzhi bzla ba bza' ba dag /dus dgra'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /bzhi po 'di dag dbang bskur che/ /dpal ldan chags chen rdo rje yis/ /dbang bskur 'di yis byin gyis brlabs/
378b6(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /zhe na de ni bden mod kyi dbang lnga po nyid cod pan gyi dbang ste/ /thams cad du rdo rje tsar tsi ka la sogs pa rnams cod pan la dbang gzugs kyi bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang/ /'dis thams cad du las rnams la dbang byed pas
378b7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje'i dam tshig sbyin pa ni/ /ral gri'i dbang ste mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur yang bstan pa nyid de rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu'i dam tshig la lus byin gyis brlab pa bcug
379a1(rgyud 'grel): nas so/ /thun mongs pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i brtul zhugs dang/ /lung bstan pa dang/ dbug dbyung ba yang ngo/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur yang/ /phag mo'i gzugs ni bzung nas su/ /btsun mo thams cad 'dod bya yin/ /
379a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rgyal mtshan khyams mthong nas/ /deng ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya/ /'o ma goms pa'i sems gcig gis/ /phyag rgya chen por rab bsgrub bya/ /zhes bya ba bstan pa nyid do/ de nyid bla na med pa grol ba mdza' dag gi don bsgrub pa brtags pa yi rnyog pa
379a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bral ba nyid las slar rang yang dag par rig pa dang tha mi dad pa thub pa'i tshogs mdza' yas pa 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can yid bzhin gyi nor bu brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid du slob ma la tshig gis sbyin par bya'o/
379a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba slar sbyin pa'o/ /de nas slob ma rnams phan yon gyi spro ba bskyed par bya ste/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor mthong zhing zhugs pas na/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol bar/ de ring khyed rnams legs par gnas/ /bde
379a5(rgyud 'grel): chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /phyin chad 'chi ba khyed la med/ /mi tshugs pa dang ma bcings par/ /gang la 'ang 'jigs med dga' bar gyis/ srid pa kun tu zhi bya'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod 'das/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir//
379a6(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i mchog tu yang dag 'gyur/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthun par gsungs/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ bde gshegs
379a7(rgyud 'grel): bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin khros nas spun rnams la/ /nyes pa brjod par mi bya'o/ /sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems/ /nam yang nges par spang mi bya/ /byang chub sems ni ngor mi bya/ /rang gzhan chos la mi smad do/ /yongs
379b1(rgyud 'grel): su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba nyid ni bstan mi bya/ /bdag nyid phung po smad mi bya/ /chos rnams ngo bo sun mi dbyung/ /bdug pa'i byams pa rtag tu spangs/ /chos la tshad bzung mi bya'o/ /dad ldan sems can slu mi bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig brten par
379b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /shes rab rang bzhin bud med rnams/ /skyon gyis nyes pa mi brjod do/ /rnal 'byor slong mos mi rgyu zhing/ /rnal 'byor spang bar mi bya ste/ /rtag par rgyun tu gsang sngags bzlas/ /rtag tu dam tshig la sogs bsten/ /gal te bla ma smod de bzhin/
379b3(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig bag med gyur pa na/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor de bris la/ /bde gshegs rnams la sdig pa bshags/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /gang phyir 'di ni legs par gnas/ /dam tshig lha rnams dang mnyam par/ /gnas par 'gyur
379b4(rgyud 'grel): pa the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can bcas pa/ /kun gyis tshe ldan de dbang bskur/ /khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che/ /rgyal srid bdag po brtan pa yin/ de ring bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /grong khyer mchog tu rab zhugs so/ /de ring khyod
379b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob pa 'di la the tshom med/ /'di ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ster bstan par gyis/ /de ring 'gro ba de myur rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ /mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du khyed rnams phyin
379b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /slob ma rab gus mnyes gshin pas/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' bsko pa'i/ /gsung ni de ltar bdag gis bgyi/ /gal te 'byor na de rnams kyi mthe bong g.yas pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung
379b7(rgyud 'grel): la sbyin sreg gis zhi bar bya ste/ dgang blugs gcig gam/ gsum mam/ bdun phul nas yon blang bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis kyang dga' ba'i yid kyis ji ltar 'byor ba'i sa gzhi glang po dang/ rta dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ rgyan dang/ bu dang/ bu
380a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ chung ma dang/ dran pho dang/ bran mo la sogs pa dbul zhing/ bdag nyid g.yog du 'am/ thos pa la sogs pa yon tan bsam pa grub pa'i phyir dbul lo/ /de nas slob ma rnams mnyes par byas te/ /yon dang de ??
380a2(rgyud 'grel): blangs la kha zas dang spyod yul thams cad kyis 'khor lo mchod par bya'o/ /'os pa'i slob ma rnams gzung ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchog gi bdud rtsis tshim par byas nas nye bar bsdu'o/ /de nas mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi
380a3(rgyud 'grel): myang bar byas la gsol ba btab nas gshegs su gsol te/ lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/ /zhes brjod cing rdo rje'i rtse mos shar gyi sgo nas brtsams te gtso bo'i
380a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas la sogs pa dbyi bar bya'o/ /de nas don du gnyer ba rnams la rdul tshon nyung shas byin la/ /thams cad chu bo chen por dor par bya'o/ /khung bu 'gengs dang rab gnas dang/ /sbyin sred 'khor lo'i nor gang yin/ /de kun slob dpon nyid kyi
380a5(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /zhes pa rdo rje 'dzin mchog gsungs/ /'dus pa'i tshe gar gsal bar ni/ /bzang po'i zhal la sogs pas mdzad/ /'dir ni shin tu zab pa yis/ /'khor lo'i cho ga gang des ngal/ /ji srid ltar rnyed 'di 'dra ba/ /rang nyid dran par bya phyir bris//
380a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di la lhag dang chad ba dag /dpa' bo rnams kyis bzod par mdzod/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar dkyil 'khor cho ga sems can don rnams yang dag sgrub/ /rang gi ye shes tha dad ma yin mdzad tshogs shes rab ldan pa'i spyod
380a7(rgyud 'grel): yul ni/ /mi shes mun pa kun 'joms srid ba zhi ba gnyis su med pa rtogs pa'i gnas/ /byas las dge tshogs gang thob de yis bdag dang 'gro ba de blo'i gter gyur cig /dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
380b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su gzung ba/ /nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od
380b2(rgyud 'grel): zer gyi zhal snga nas dang/ /cho ga lo tsa ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //de la brten nas rang gzhan kun gyi yon tan bdun ldan gyi phyag rgya chen po rtogs par gyur cig /
380b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ swA d+hiSh+Na? na tsa tu yo ga tat+two pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag /bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu spros med thugs
380b4(rgyud 'grel): rjes brlan/ /dpal ldan bde chen phyag 'tshal te/ /rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pa ni/ /bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar bshad/ /bla ma la gus dam tshig can/ /snying rje sems can don sems pa'i/ /sgrub pos dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /dngos grub dam
380b5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgrub par bya/ rnal 'byor dam pa bzhir bshad de/ /dbyibs dang sngags dang byin brlabs dang/ /rnam dag ye shes zhes bya bas/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /rim pa 'am yang na cig car du/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgom bya ste/
380b6(rgyud 'grel): gong bur gnas pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /lus 'di gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /'di ni bems po ma yin la/ /sha dang khrag kyang de ma yin/ /bden min rdzun pa ma yin no/ /tha mal ma yin ye shes sku/ /dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med/ /phun tshogs
380b7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan kun gyi rten/ /'di ni bdag las tha dad med/ /spang zhing bsnan du cung zad med/ /ma 'khrul bla ma'i bka' drin gyis/ /gdong nas grub par shes bya ste/ /lus can kun gyis de mthong dang/ gang gis thos dang dran tsam gyis/ /bsam pa rdzogs
381a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad zung 'jug sku/ /de ltar bdag nyid gsal bar blta/ /bdag gi thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /sa gsum 'od zer rab 'phros nas/ /mthong thos dran pa'i spyod yul du/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /brtan g.yo'i dngos po ji
381a2(rgyud 'grel): snyed pa/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /khams gsum min 'di gzhal med khang/ /srog chags min 'di rgyal ba rnams/ /phung po khams dang skye mched min/ /khams gsum man 'di dkyil 'khor pa/ /me long nang gi gzugs
381a3(rgyud 'grel): brnyan ltar/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rmi lam ji bzhin goms byas te/ /bar ma'i srid pa rab sbyor bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub thob/ /dbyibs kyi rim pa ste rnal 'byor ro/ /lus can rnams kyi srog gyur pa/ /rlung zhes bya ba las
381a4(rgyud 'grel): kun byed/ /'di ni rnam shes gzhon pa ste/ /srid dang rnam grol thob byed pa'o/ /bya gra dang ni b+ha ra ha/ mu sa la dang a tra tas/ /thog mar lus ni sbyar bar bya/ /lus sbyangs pas ni rtsa dang rlung/ /legs par dag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /spros pa thams cad
381a5(rgyud 'grel): spangs nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob/ /dgang pa'i sbyor bas dgang pa ste/ /dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug pa nyid/ /zhi ba yis ni zhi ba nyid/ /rengs pa'i sbyor ba mi g.yo'o/ /sbyor ba bzhi yis bdag nyid kyis/ /dngos grub chen po skye
381a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur/ /rtsa gsum zur gsum sbyangs nas ni/ /cung zad spyod lam ngal bar bya/ /dbang po ngal zhing dub pa'i tshe/ /sems ni rtse gcig nyid du gzhag /du ba la sogs lnga po ni/ /skad cig nyid la 'char bar 'gyur/ /mngon shes rdzu 'phrul la
381a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa/ /grol ba'i dngos grub go 'phang 'thob/ /rlung gi g.yo bas 'khor ba ste/ /mi g.yo bas ni mya ngan 'das/ /snying gi chu skyes dbus sogs pas/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /rnal 'byor bas ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /nang par bya rog mi grag
381b1(rgyud 'grel): par/ 'jug pa'i rlung ni gang yin la/ /stong phrag gcig ni bgrang bar bya/ sgrub pos sgra dang bral ba ni/ /'bum phrag gcig ni rdzogs pa na/ /tshe zad pa yang lo lnga ru/ /'tsho 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /snying ga'i hUM yig dkar po la/ /yul sogs dmigs par
381b2(rgyud 'grel): mi byed pas/ /rlung gi sbyor bas goms byed na/ /mngon par shes pa'i thob par 'gyur/ /rnam shes gong du 'pho ba ni/ /'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ /bu ga rnams su son pa'i rtsa/ /yi ge rnams kyis dgag par bya/ /a li kA li'i rlung gis ni/ /bu ga'i rlung
381b3(rgyud 'grel): ni sbyang bar bya/ /snying ga'i hUM yig shes dang sbyar/ /phyed dang gnyis kyi yi ge ni/ /'og dang steng du bzhag pa la/ /de'i 'og gi cha rlung gis/ /sa bon steng 'og bltas pa yis/ /rlung gi sa bon gnyis gzhag pas/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa kha sbyor? ba cing/ /yi
381b4(rgyud 'grel): ge phyed dang gnyis kyis sngags/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig rim par brjod/ /rlung ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste/ /gang dang gang du bgrod pa yi/ /rlung ni sgo ru brtsams pas te/ /dgug pa lhog pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de ltar sbyangs pa'i goms pa yis/ /grol ba'i dngos
381b5(rgyud 'grel): grub thob pa'o/ /sgo'i bye brag bshad par bya/ /'dod khams bde 'gro lte ba nas/ /gzugs khams smin mtshams thig le las/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nas gzugs med do/ /de ni mtho ris byed pa'o/ /sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su skye/ /rna ba las ni mi 'am ci//
381b6(rgyud 'grel): mig las mi yi dbang por 'gyur/ /gcin gyi sgo las dud 'gror 'gyur/ /bshad ba las ni dmyal bar 'gyur/ /bde 'gro las ni gzhan du 'gro/ de ltar ma nus stobs chung ba/ /rnam shes rab mar 'pho ba ni/ /spros pa thams cad bcad nas ni/ /rgyal sras laM
381b7(rgyud 'grel): la gtang bar bya/ /lus ni legs par bsrang bar bya/ /yang na seng ge'i nyal stabs bya/ /rnam smin las grub phung po 'di/ /bla ma lha dang 'byung po dang/ /ltos pa med par gtang bar bya/ /mchog gi sgo ni gsal por dbye/ /snying gi chu skyes padmo yi/ /hUM las
382a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam shes bstim par bya/ /spyi bor bla ma lhag pa'i lha/ /dus gsum bde gshegs ro gcig pa/ /mchod sogs byas la gsol ba gdab/ /de nas rlung gi sbyor ba yis/ /rnam shes thugs kar 'phang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye
382a2(rgyud 'grel): shes dang/ /rang gi rnam shes ro gcig par/ /stong nyid snying rje ro gcig pa'i/ /mi 'gyur bde ba bsgom par bya/ /de ni chos sku 'brin las dang/ /bcas pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang/ /nyin bzhin bram ze bsod
382a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yang/ /'di yi lam gyi grol 'gyur te/ /sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /dus la bab na 'pho bar bya/ /dus min lha ni gsod par 'gyur/ /lha ni bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /mnar med gnas su sreg par byed/ /'di ni bde bar gnas dus su/ /cung zad
382a4(rgyud 'grel): goms par bya ba ste/ /'byin dang 'jug pa'i rlung la ni/ /sbyor te spro dang bsdu ba'i tshul/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /yud tsam mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor bya/ /sngags kyis rims ba ste rjes su rnal 'byor ro/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag
382a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya las/ /bla ma'i man ngag rim pa yis/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod pas/ /mi 'gyur bde ba bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni/ /rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /tsar tsi ka ni pad+ma can/ /phag mo glang po can du bshad/ /rdo
382a6(rgyud 'grel): rje dbyangs can dung can ma/ /dkar mo ri mo can yin te/ /rigs ni bzhi yi mtshan nyid rnams/ /de ltar mkhas pas shes par bya/ pad+ma can gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /bzhi ni kun nas zlum po ste/ /rna ni za? ma'i me tog mtshungs/ /rus sbal rgyab 'dra'i sen
382a7(rgyud 'grel): mo dmar/ /nu ma mkhregs shing 'jam pa dang/ /rkang mthil mnyam nas brang yangs mdzes/ /ba spu 'khyil zhing dang pa'i skad/ /ri mo gsum can chu skyes mchog /pad+ma'i dri ldan glang chen 'gros/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ltar reg na 'jam//
382b1(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i byed pas bsten bya ste/ /pad+ma can gyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /glang po can zhes bya ba ni/ /sna g.yon pa spu 'khyil ba dang/ /'dod pas myos shing 'dod la sred/ /chang gi dri ldan byin pa sbom/ /lus ni sbom la mi bsrun pa/ /bzhin gyi mdangs che nga ro che/
382b2(rgyud 'grel): glu dar rol mo la dga' ba/ /byed pa bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /glang po che'i mchog sgrub byed/ /dung can ma zhes grags pa ni/ /ha cang skem zhing sbom pa min/ /skra ring sna yang cung zad ring/ /nu ma na ra ka 'bras ltar/ /zho dang 'o ma'i tshogs la dag
382b3(rgyud 'grel): bya rog skad can bung ba'i sgra/ /ba lang lce ltar rtsub pa ste/ /gri wang ra ti'i bcings pas bstan/ /ri mo can yang bshad par bya/ /shin tu khro zhing ngo tsha spangs/ /rtag tu rtsod pa la dga' zhing/ /lus thung de'i brang rnams mdzes/ /pa la'i 'bras ltar nu ma
382b4(rgyud 'grel): zab/ /byin pa 'phra zhing phyis gan nyal/ /gsus pa sbom zhing mchu yang 'phyang/ /sha ba'i dri ldan phug ron skad/ /de ni ri mo can zhes bya/ /pi las yi bcings pas bsten/ /ri mo can gyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /bcu drug lon pa'i skad bzang ma/ /gzugs
382b5(rgyud 'grel): dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /dang por legs par sbyang ba dang/ /dbang bskur nas ni sgrub pa brtsam/ /sku gsum thugs dang ye shes ni/ /dpral ba la sogs rnams su dgod/ /swAhA gsar ba gtsug gtor du'o/ /de nas pad+ma rdo rje sbyang/ /a yis
382b6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab brgyad la/ /a yis ze 'bru rab tu brtag /hUM gis rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /phaT kyi sgo la rab tu brtag /de ltar rdo rje pad+ma bcas/ /b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni/ /byang chub sems ni spro mi bya/ /rnal 'byor pas ni hUM phaT bsam/ /b+ha gar rdo rje
382b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par byed/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus par/ /sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya/ /rgyu mthun la sogs rab phye bas/ /shin tu rnal 'byor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i/ /rtsa ni nye bar brtsal bya ste/ /byed pa bcings pa'i
383a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ji srid du/ /byang chub sems ni 'byin mi bya/ /gang tshe chu yi ri mo ltar/ /de tshe thob 'gyur rgyun mi 'chad/ /dga' ba las skyes de gzhan ci/ /dngos grub kun gyi gter gyur pa/ /byang chub sems ni
383a2(rgyud 'grel): nyams gyur na/ /phung po rnam shes brgyal 'gyur bas/ /ma smad dngos grub ga la thob/ /mkha' khams rdo rje kun sbyor dang/ /reg byas kyis ni rmad byung tshe/ /bde ba skyed par byed pa ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba byed pa'o/ /dga' bral dag gi dbus su 
383a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /mtshon par de ni bstan par bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /lte bas mnan pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rdo rje'i skyil krung las sems ni/ /nor bu'i nang du son pa ltar/ /ye shes skye ba gang yin pa/ /ye shes ngo bo zhes bya ba/ /chags pa ma
383a4(rgyud 'grel): yin chags bral min/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang tshe rnal 'byor ye shes mthong/ /bde ba gnas su 'gyur mi bya/ /thun nam yang na nyin gcig dang/ /zla phyed zla phyed lo dang ni/ /bskal pa bskal pa stong du yang/ /ye shes
383a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas gnas par bya/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor ba ste shin tu rnal 'byor ro/ /mkha' 'gro'i pho brang chu skyes dbus/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu dngos/ /rnal 'byor chen pos ngal so bya/ /lte ba'i
383a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus son dpa' bo la/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la/ /ji ltar thim pa blta bar bya/ /lte ba'i chu skyes pad mo la/ /yungs kar tsam du brtags bya gang/ /bde gsal ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rtag pa ma yin
383a7(rgyud 'grel): chad pa min/ /bdag min gzhan yang ma yin la/ /srid min mya ngan 'das pa min/ /thog ma dbus mdza' rnam par spangs/ /'od gsal ba las de gsal na/ /de las rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor bzhi yi rim pa las/ /gang skyes
383b1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes phyag rgya che/ /thabs dang shes rab rang gis dngos/ /me long nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin/ /'jig rten khyab byed gsal bar snang/ /mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba che/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byung gnas kyi/ /ye
383b2(rgyud 'grel): shes chen po 'grub 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ste/ /rnal 'byor chen po'o/ /de ltar bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brangs te/ /de nyid gsal byas brtse chen bzod par gsol/ /'dir 'bad bsod nams dri med gang skyes des/ /srid gsum dbang
383b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig /rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya bar rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs la mnga' brnyes pa/ /dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad
383b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rdzogs so// //d+harma Na A tsArya dang/ /glo bo lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri sA d+ha ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /gshin
383b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ /oM ya mAn+ta kri ta hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /sngags pas dang por re zhig bde ba'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste/ /rang gi snying gar a yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil
383b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su hUM yig bsgoms te/ /de'i 'od zer gyis gshin rje'i dgra dmar po dang/ /bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun du bkug pa la dmigs te/ /me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis
383b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod pa dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig pa brjod pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas khams gsum pa'i bdag nyid rnams sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam dang/ mig 'phrul dang tshungs par dmigs la/ stong pa nyid rnam par bsam par
384a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hu At+ma ko haM/ zhes pas sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas hUM ngam/ i yig dmar por gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /de'i steng du hUM yig dmar po/ /de yongs su gyur pa las
384a2(rgyud 'grel): mi mgo rlon pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po/ de'i dbus su aM yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /de'i dbus su hUM yig dmar po/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las/ /gshin rje mthar byed pa'i gshin rje gshed
384a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o/ /sku mdog dmar po g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyi bzhugs pa/ /mche ba gtsigs shing zhal 'gyur zhing/ ljags 'gyur ba drag po/ /klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du
384a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba/ /mgul la mi mgo'i phreng ba dang/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /rgyan kha dog dmar po sna tshogs can no/ /shes rab ma g.yas brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis mtshan pa phyogs su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
384a5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi thugs kar sngags kyi sa bon yongs su gyur pa la nyi ma/ /de'i steng du hUM yig /de yongs su gyur pa las mi mgo rlon pas mtshan pa'i dbyig pa dkar po nges par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la
384a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i hUM yig dmar po rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba la hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjer bsam par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba las pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la am yig dmar pos mtshan
384a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de'i rjes su sogs brjod par bya ste/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko haM/ de'i rjes su lte ba'i 'og tu pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po 'bar ba bsam par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
384b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag gis khrag gi gang ba'i thod pa dang/ g.yas kyis mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po 'chang ba/ ma hi sha dang/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du gzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /shes rab ma dga' bas
384b2(rgyud 'grel): myos pa/ mgul pa thod pa skam po can/ /zhal gcig phyags gnyis ma/ /bcom ldan 'das dang zhal sbyor bas bzhugs pa/ de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed bsgom par bya'o/ /thun gsum mam/ thun bzhi rnam par bsgoms la gtor
384b3(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin par bya ste/ bruM aM dzaM maM hUM/ dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi sarbba yak+Sha rak+ShA sa b+hU ta bre ta pi shA tsonma da kum+b+ha N+DA pa smA ra Da ka n+yi da ya/ i daM grih+Nan+tu/ sarbba sid+d+hi pra ya ts+tshan+tu ya theSh+TaM b+huny+dza tha pi ba tha dzi gra tha ma ti/ kra ma
384b4(rgyud 'grel): tha sarbba sid+d+hi ye saha yi ka b+ha batu hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /las dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha dog dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po'i sku bsam par bya'o/ /de nas bzlas pa rjes su
384b5(rgyud 'grel): dran par bya ste/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba rat+ta sya shIn+ta ku ru nA ma swA hA/ rgyas pa la bo Sha ta/ dgug pa la dza(rgyud 'grel): dbang la hUM mu ge ho/ rangs pa la laM/ skrod pa la hUM phaT/ gzung ba la hUM/ gzhan rnams la uts+tsha Ta rnams so/ /de lta
384b6(rgyud 'grel): bu rengs pa la sogs pa'i las rab 'byams rnams kyi nang du gzhug go zhi ba la gi wang gis bsrung bar 'gyur te/ dar dang/ ras dang/ gro ga dkar po dang/ smyug ma 'am/ shun pa'i ras bkrus pa la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris la/
384b7(rgyud 'grel): nA ma'i yi ge'i nang gzhug go /gzhi nag po sogs pa dang bral ba'i rdza kha sbyar ba'i gnas su bur ma dang/ sbrang gi nang du bcug ste/ skud pa dkar pos dkris nas thun gsum du me tog dkar pos mchod nas/ /kha shar du mngon du phyogs la 
385a1(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed sku mdog dkar po'i rang bzhin du gsal bar bsgoms nas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas pa'i bsgrub bya ltas la/ /bum pa dkar po zla ba ltar dkar ba'i bdud rtsis gang ba'i dbang bskur bar
385a2(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas/ bzlas par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ nA ma de ba dat+taM sya shan+tiM ku ru na ma swAhA/ zhi ba'i cho ga'o/ /skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba la gur kum gyis so/ /rgyas pa la 'ang gur kum gyis so/ /'khor lo gnyis

385a4(rgyud 'grel): skur dmigs la/ zla ba kha dog ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya la gser gyi bum pa ser po dang/ bdud rtsi ser po rnams kyis dbang bskur bar bsams la/ sngags kyi bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT
385a5(rgyud 'grel): de ba dat+ta sya puSh+TiM ku ru bau Sha Ta swAhA/ rgyas pa'i cho ga'o/ /gro kha'i ras la rgya skyegs sam/ tsan dan dmar po'i khu ba 'am/ ming med kyi khrag dang bsres pas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris to/ ho(rgyud 'grel): yig nA ma dang bcas pa
385a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcug la/ yongs su chos pa'i rdza kha sbyar gzhag pa la mar dang sbrang rtsi nang du bcug la/ me tog dmar po rnams kyi mchod/ /nub tu kha bltas la gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i gzugs su bsams nas/ zla ba'i dkyil
385a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dmar po'i dbus su gnas pa'i bsgrub bya bsams la/ rang gi lus la 'phros pa'i 'od kyis dbang bskur bas myos par gyur te/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi mdun du 'gyel bar bsams te/ sngags bzlas pa ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri
385b1(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+taM sya kri te yadz+nyA dat+taM ba sh+yaM ku ru ho(rgyud 'grel): gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ der mar dang/ sbrang rtsi spangs pa'i 'khor lo de nyid la seng ldeng gyi sol ba la sogs du ba med pas bdug par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ha?

385b3(rgyud 'grel): nang du bcug la/ bud med kyi thod pa kha sbyor du gzhag la/ me tog dmar pos mngon par mchod/ /rgongs thun gyi nyi ma dang 'dra ba'i gshin rje mthar byed kyi sku dmar po/ /lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa bdag nyid kyis bsams nas/
385b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying lcags kyus phug /ske la zhags pas bcings nas 'ong bar bsams mo/ /gal te mi 'ong na de la seng ldeng gi mes gdung bar bya'o/ /sngags bzlas so/ /las rab 'byams rnams ni rgyud du shes par bya'o/ /gshin rje'i gshed
385b5(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal 'dzin kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan
385b6(rgyud 'grel): sa/ dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /dpal ldan yon tan sgra yi chos/ /bzang po rtogs pa'i skad gnyis pa/ /de yi dpe la bsgyur ba 'di/ /mthar byed la mkhas skye bos zung/ /sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ //
385b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri maN+Da la pu dza bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dal du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ /gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ya thA hi dzrA ta mA tre Na snA paM ta(rgyud 'grel): sarbba ta thA ga tA d+hi she
386a1(rgyud 'grel): kaM sa ma ya/ sh+ri ye hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas khrus bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pas lag pa dang/ /rkang pa kha bshal pa'i sngags so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga bA te puShpa ke ru rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA yArha te samyaksaM bud+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM puShpe
386a2(rgyud 'grel): puShpe mahA puShpe/ su puShpe puShpa/ ud+d+ha b+ha be/ puShpi saM b+ha be/ puShpa ba kir+Ne swAhA/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pas me tog byin gyis brlab po/ /oM ya mAn+ta kaM sarbba big+hA nu dU da ya hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis me tog dang/ chu lag pa'i nang du bzung ste/ sa la

386a4(rgyud 'grel): ma ka ga(rgyud 'grel): ces pas dri chab kyi sngags so/ /oM badzra b+hu me hUM phaT/ oM badzra go ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra da ke hUM phaT/ oM badzra puShpe hUM phaT/ oM badzra re khe hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags rnams kyis maN+Dal byi dor bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /yang lag pa

386b7(rgyud 'grel): sarbba bud+hAM shtsa bi sardza ya ma ma karyaM ku ru swAhA/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra maN+Da la/ mu ne mu mu su na rA ga ma na ya mu(rgyud 'grel): su na ra/ bi ma da nu kamswa dwA mA/ ga miSh+yan+te pA dA(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'di yis maN+Dal yang dag par bsdus te/ mchod
387a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kun bsal zhing dor ro/ /rnal 'byor pas 'od kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgoms te/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rang gi snying gar sa bon bsgoms te/ de'i rjes su yi ge brgya pa'i gzungs ni/ oM ya mAn+ta
387a2(rgyud 'grel): ka sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ ya mAn+ta ka twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri Dho me b+ha ga su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ A nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+hi ma pra yats+tsha/ sarbba karmma su tsa me tsit+taM sh+ri ya(rgyud 'grel): ku ru hUM ha ha ha ha ho(rgyud 'grel): b+ha ga bA na sarbba ta thA ga ta badzra ma me
387a3(rgyud 'grel): muny+tsa/ badzrI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa a(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa yi ge brgya pa'i sngags so/ /'di brjod nas 'dod pa'i lha'i nga rgyal gyis ji lta bar gnas par bya'o/ /gshin rje gshed dmar po maN+Dal du mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya'o/ /dpal 'dzin gyis
387a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur
387a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// //mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos kyi bzang po yis/ /ma bsgyur de phyir de yi phyag dpe las/ /legs par bsgyur 'di de yi gsung rab la/ /dad pa'i blo ldan rnams kyis spyi bos long/ /sa yi steng du nyi zla ltar

387a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de nas bzlas pa rjes su dran par bya ste/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): kA la ru pa hUM khaM nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ruM b+h+ruM sh+ruM sh+ruM hUM ka(rgyud 'grel): snying po phyi ma'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha(rgyud 'grel): b+ho ma tA
387b1(rgyud 'grel): kro d+hA gats+tsha gats+tsha asma ta pU dza pra ti gri h+Na pra sA d+haM me d+hi man ku ru swAhA/ spyan drang ba'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): A(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon no/ /oM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ zhabs gsil lo/ /oM bi kri tA na na duSh+Ta sa twa da ma ka ga(rgyud 'grel): ga(rgyud 'grel): ga(rgyud 'grel): dzi'i sngags so/ /oM ku mA ra? ?
387b2(rgyud 'grel): Ni dza(rgyud 'grel): dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT me tog dbul ba'i sngags so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha(rgyud 'grel): he phaT/ bdug spos so/ /oM kA la ru pa sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka mahA b+hu ta pa ti/ i maM ba ling grih+Na grih+Na pa ya swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM dI pa ta lo tsa na bi kri
387b3(rgyud 'grel): tA na na mahA TTaTTa/ hA sa nA di ne dIpta dIpta ya swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so/ /oM dza ya dza ya su dza ya bi shwa dU pa d+ha ri gats+tsha gats+tsha/ swa b+ha ba nAn kri taM te na/ ta thA ga taM shtsa sarba bud d+haM shtsa baM sardza? ya ma ma karyaM ku ru swAhA/ gshegs su
387b4(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba'i sngags so/ /gshin rje gshed nag po dang gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mchod pa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta dpal/ dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta nyi ma'i dbang po'i
387b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang/ /chag chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting 'dzin gyi cho ga gzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri sa mA d+hi bi d+hi/
387b6(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga /gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /re zhig dang por gtor ma gzhung dang mthun par bshams la/ bsgrub bya la sbyar ba bya ba ni/ kham pa dkar po la bshos
387b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas gnyis dang/ ?I rang bu myu gu dang bcas pa gnyis dang/ zan chang pa gnyis dang/ yungs kar dang/ dri zhim po dang/ sol ba'i me rnams bsags la/ /rang nyid gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa sgrub thabs
388a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bsgoms te/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las mdun du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor la nad pa la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya langs nas gnas par bsgom mo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer
388a2(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i khro bo gshin rje gshed lcags kyu dang zhags pa thogs pa rnams kyis/ /khams gsum gyi 'dri thams cad bkug nas 'dre gcig la thim par bsams la/ 'dre gcig pu de yang gcer pu skra grol ba mtshan ma 'og
388a3(rgyud 'grel): tu lhung ba/ bag med pa/ mdo ba/ sngo ba/ mi sdug pa cig bsams te/ de yang bsgrub bya la thim par bsams nas/ de'i spyi bor hUM las rdo rje rgya gram dang/ rtsibs logs gnyis su hUM re re las rdo rje rtse lnga pa re re bsams la/ rdo rje dag
388a4(rgyud 'grel): gis mnan pa dang/ 'og nas me yi sregs pa dang/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): big+hAn+ta kri tAM hUM zhes pa dang/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i sngags brjod cing hUM las yungs kar rnams rdo rjer gyur pas brabs pa bsgrub bya'i lus la rma dpag tu med pa byung
388a5(rgyud 'grel): nas nang dang gdon gyi dngos po thams cad kha'i nang nas thon par bsam ma/ /yang nad dang gdan gyi lhag ma lus pa rnams yungs kar gyis brabs pas tshig par bsam zhing de'i yang lhag ma rnams khyi nag por gyur nas kha'i
388a6(rgyud 'grel): nang nas phyir thon par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la oM sarba pa paM da ha na badzrA ya badzra swa twa sya sarba pA paM da ha swAhA/ zhes brjod cing yi ge hUM gis bzlas pa'i yungs kar g.yas pa dang cig shos kyi khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ re re zhing g.yon
388a7(rgyud 'grel): skor du lan gnyis su byabs la gsol ba'i med bsgyur ro/ /de bzhin du g.yon dang g.yas su chus bya'o/ /de bzhin du kham phor la sogs pa rnams dang ras kyis kyang ngo/ /kham phor la sogs pa ni mer blugs par mi bya'o/ /bgegs
388b1(rgyud 'grel): sel gyi snying po bzlas pa'i dri zhim po'i chu ni snying gar byugs nas gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o/ /yang de'i rjes la rang nyid rigs kyi bdag por bsgoms te/ ye shes sems dpa' cho ga bzhin du bcug nas/ shes rab ma dang bcas pa'i de
388b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa lnga bdun gyis nam mkhar bsams la/ de dag gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa las shes rab ma dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur te/ rang nyid kyi spyi bo'i bu gang thim nas
388b3(rgyud 'grel): sgal tshigs kyi nang du bzhugs shing rdo rje'i lam nas phyung ste/ rang nyid kyi zhal nas shes rab ma'i zhal la thim pa'i bsgrub bya rnams de'i pad mar gnas shing/ /cig car stong nyid kyi rjes la hUM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i mi bskyod rdo rje'i

392b7(rgyud 'grel): /de nas 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yid kyis bltas nas byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag gi bu la sogs pa dang rang gi lus la byams pa de ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa bya'o//
393a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar sems can de rnams/ skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ sme sngags 'don pa dang/ bkres pa dang/ skom ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsams la snying rje'i sems bsgom par
393a2(rgyud 'grel): bya ste/ ji ltar bdag gi bu la sogs pa dang/ rang gi lus kyi sdug bsngal sel ba de ltar bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ /ji ltar sems can de rnams 'dod yon lnga la nye bar spyod pa'i
393a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dang dbang phyug rnams rig par byas nas dga' ba'i sems bsgom par bya ste/ 'khor ba ji srid bar sems can rnams bde ba 'di nyid kyis gnas par 'gyur na legs so legs so zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can de
393a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnal 'byor pa la rnyed pa dang/ /ma rnyed pa dang/ stod pa dang smad pa dang/ grags pa dang/ ma grags pa dang/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal stong par rig par byas la btang snyoms kyi sems bsgom par bya ste/ sems can de rnams bzang po byed kyang rung
393a5(rgyud 'grel): zha? pa byed kyang rung ste/ de ltar na yang bdag gis sems chags pa dang sdang ba rnam ba kun du btang snyoms bya'o zhes pa'o/ /'dis ni tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom pa bstan pa'o/ /de nas rang gis lus la bsam par bya ste/ re zhig
393a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi lus 'di ni sdug bsngal brgya stong du ma'i snod du byas pa sems kyang rang bzhin gyis mi brtan pa de'i phyir ji srid bdag 'chi bdag gi dbang du ma gyur pa de srid du bdag gis gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su bdag
393a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid bsgrubs la sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang shin du brtson 'grus dang ldan pas na re zhig skye ba 'di nyid la da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyid du nus pa yin no/ /zhes
393b1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs so/ /de bas na bdag gis brtson 'grus brtan par brtsam ste/ /de ltar yang/ 'di ltar brtson la byang chub gnas zhes gsungs so/ /brtson 'grus kyang dge ba la spro ba nyid de/ de ltar yang brtson gang dge la spro ba'o/ /zhes gsungs so/ /des na
393b2(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus byas te dpa' bo gshin rje gshed bsgrub par bya'o/ /rang gi don sgrub pa po thams cad kyang bkra shis sngon du 'gro ba kho nas sgrub par byed do/ /de bas na dang por re zhig bkra shis par bya'o/ /gang yang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu ni bsod nams
393b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshogs rdzogs pa'o/ /zhes bsgoms la rang gi snying gar sems rtse gcig par byas nas skad cig gis sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig dmar po 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgoms te/ de'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i bla ma dang/
393b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ yi dam gyi lha la sogs pa mdun du bltas la/ yid la byung ba'i bu dzas mchod par bya ste/ de la me tog dang/ bdug spos dang mar me dang/ dri mchog dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ chos
393b5(rgyud 'grel): gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ ba dang la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /mchod pa bla na med pa bdun yang 'dis bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad bdag gis bshags/ dge la dga' bas rjes yi rang/ /bcom ldan thub pa
393b6(rgyud 'grel): dam chos sku/ ji srid 'khor bar bzhugs su gsol/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung/ /lam 'di yang dag bsten par bya/ /dge ba cho gas byang chub sngo/ /de nas phyag byas la bzod par
393b7(rgyud 'grel): gsol te gzhag par bya'o/ /de la 'di ltar bsgom par bya ste ting nge 'dzin du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang ji srid ye shes kyi tshogs ma rdzogs pa de srid du sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir ri zhig ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs par
394a1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /gzhan yang mi'i lus yongs su gyur pa kho na las sangs rgyas nyid de/ /des na mi'i lus kyang bsgyur bar bya'o/ /zhes rnam par bsams la stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ dngos po med pa bsgom pa med/ /sgom pa bsgom
394a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ma yin nyid/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /zhes pa 'di'i don yid kyis bsam ste/ rang gi snying gi nang du son pa'i sngags la sems gtad de/ de'i 'od zer gyis ga bur bsregs pa bzhin du rang gi / 
394a3(rgyud 'grel): lus bzhu bar bsams la/ /de nas pad+ma bzhu bar bsam mo/ /de nas nyi ma'o/ /de nas a'u yig go /de nas ha yig go /de nas zla tshes so/ /de nas thig le'o/ /de nas nA da'o/ /de nas ji ltar bud shing zad pas me nam mkhar thim pa de ltar
394a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi phung po yang zhu bar bsam ste cung zad kyang bsgom par mi bya'o/ /shing ltar brtan par byas la yud tsam gnas te sngags brjod do/ /oM shU n+ya trA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas skad cig gis bdag nyid sha dang rus pa dang
394a5(rgyud 'grel): khrag la sogs pa med pa shin du dang zhing gzhom du med pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pa gcir bu rtags gyen du brtan pa ral pa 'phyang ba dkar po pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa zhi ba'i gzugs can sems
394a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' i skyil krung can rlung sems zung du 'jug pa bsgom mo/ /de nas 'di ltar bsam ste ye shes kyi tshogs kyang rdzogs la mi'i lus kyang yongs su gyur pas de'i phyir na da ni bdag nyid gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su bsgrubs la rang
394a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don du dngos grub bskyed par bya'o/ de yang rgyu khyad bar du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa 'gro ba de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyu nye bar brtag go zhes bsam la/ oM dmar po yongs su gyur pa'i/
394b1(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM las skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsgoms te de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang rdo rje gur dang/ rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba la sogs pa bsgom mo/ de'i dbus su baM gyi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs
394b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i sa yig yongs su gyur pa las gru gsum gyi dkyil 'khor dkar po'o/ /de'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsam mo/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i dbus su yi ge yaM sngon po yongs su
394b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu rtse mo gnyis su ba dan gyis mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge raM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar po 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge baM dkar po yongs su
394b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar po bum pas mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge lam ser po yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ser po rdo rje rtse gsum pa sa mtshan pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge suM yongs su gyur pa las ri
394b5(rgyud 'grel): rab lhun po gru bzhi pa bai DUrya dang shel dang gser gyi rang bzhin lcog brgyad kyis mdzes pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge b+h+ruM ser po bsgom ste de mdza' dag yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//
394b6(rgyud 'grel): rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen dra ba dra phyed dang/ /'dod yon lnga yi sa nye bar mdzes/ /de'i dbus su pa yig las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du yi ge oM las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
394b7(rgyud 'grel): so/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las zla ba me long lta bu'i ye shes nyi ma dang lhan cig bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge hUM dmar po las dbyug pa dkar po nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gis mtshon pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so/ /de las bdag nyid
395a1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gis skar mda''pho ba ltar zhugs nas gcig tu 'dres pa shin du rnam par dag pa chos kyis dbyings kyi ye shes rnam bar bsam mo/ /rnam pa lngas mngon par byang chub pa 'di ni rnal 'byor ro/ /de nas
395a2(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dngul chu dmar po'i rnam pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du khu ba'i gzugs su bsgoms la/ /khu ba de las skad cig gis rdo rje tsar tsi kA dang/ rdo rje phag mo dang/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang/ rdo rje dkar mo ste lha mo de dag
395a3(rgyud 'grel): mthon nas shar dang lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su gnas te khu ba de dbyangs dang bcas pas bskul bar bsams te/ thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /sa gsum mdza' dag rmongs pa sol mdzod cig/ tsar tsi
395a4(rgyud 'grel): kA yis so/ /jo bo bdud bzhi po 'di las rgyal ba/ /sems ni g.yengs so rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /phag mo yis so/ /'jig rten mgron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci/ /rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs/

395a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin te/ /ma he dmar po'i rgyab tu bzhugs/ /gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ /ban d+hu ka'i me tog 'dra/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /sbom zhing thung la gsus pa 'phyang/ /spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa po//
395a7(rgyud 'grel): sma ra dmar ser shin du 'jigs/ /dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes/ /zhal ni mche ba rnam bar gcigs/ /ljags ni bsgyur zhing gang rgyangs can/ /dbyug pa dkar po mgo bos mtshan/ /phyag ni g.yas pa dag gis bsnams/ /g.yon
395b1(rgyud 'grel): gyi phyag na pad+ma yi/ /snod ni mdzes pa dang bcas pa/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od 'bar ba/ /g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /ma he yi ni rgyab nas su/ /gshin rje 'gyel zhing 'jigs mdzad pa/ /brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ /klu brgyad pos ni
395b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam brgyan pa/ /dbu la mgo bo'i phreng ba bcings/ /mgo bo'i do shal 'phyang ba po/ /khyab bdag stag lpags na bza' can/ /rdo rje ro langs ma yis mkhyud/ /bcom ldan sku mdog dag dang ni/ /ldan zhing gri gug thod pa bsnams/ /phyag rgya lnga yis
395b3(rgyud 'grel): sku la brgyan/ /de dag mchog tu bsgom par bya/ /de nas bdag ni grub thob nyid/ /the tsom med ces nga rgyal bye/ /de nas/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma khonyhaM/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod do/ /'di ni rjes su rnal 'byor ro// //

395b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang rdo rje la sems gtad la oM yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse gcig pa oM yig ser pos rtse mor mtshan pa bsgom mo/ /pad+ma yang a yig dmar po las byung ba 'dab ma gsum pa ze 'bru la yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): yi mtshan
395b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dab ma gsum pa kha bye bar bsam mo/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu dA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pa brjod de rdo rje dang pad+ma'i sbyor bas bdag nyid bde bar bsgom par bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi gnyis gnyis ltar 'pho ba'i gnas skabs
395b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis par bdag nyid bsgoms la lha mo'i pad+ma'i dkyil du dus mtshungs par 'phos pas khams gnyis 'dres par bsgom ste dkar po dang dmar po'o/ /de nas yongs su gyur pa las gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa gnas ji
396a1(rgyud 'grel): lta bar pad ma'i dbus su bsgom la bcom ldan 'das ma las byung bar bsgoms te/ de nas de rnams mdun du bltas la rang rang gi gnas su bzhug par bsgom mo/ /de nas shar gyi 'dab ma la nyi ma la gti mug gshin
396a2(rgyud 'grel): rje gshed dkar po la tsar tsi kA sku lus skem zhing nag pas 'khyud pa'o/ /lho'i 'dab mar nyi ma la ser sna gshin rje ji gshed ser po phag mo ser mo phag zhal can gyis 'khyud pa'o/ /nub kyi 'dab mang nyi ma la 'dod chags gshin rje
396a3(rgyud 'grel): gshed dmar po dbyangs can ma dkar mo'i sbyor ba can no/ /byang gi 'dab mar nyi ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu dkar mo wljang ser dang mnyam par ldan pa'o/ /'di dag kun kyang gshin rje gshed dmar po dang ro langs ma lta
396a4(rgyud 'grel): bur bsgom par bya'o/ /me'i mtshams su mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang ba bsgom mo/ bden bral gyi mtshams su gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o/ /rlung gi mtshams su byu ru'i bum pa si hlas gang pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi
396a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshams su dngul gyi bum pa ga bur gyi gang ba'o/ /'di dag thams cad kyi kha thod pas brgyan pa'o/ /de nas rang gi snying gar pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i dbyug pa dkar po yi ge hUM dang bcas pa bsgoms la/ /de'i 'od zer gyis

396b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /zhes brjod pas dbang bskur te/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i chus spyi bor rdo rje sems dpa' i bdag nyid can bsgom mo/ /dkyil

396b4(rgyud 'grel): po shin tu 'jigs/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /sku'i rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po shin du 'jigs/ /sems kyi rdo rje rab gsal ba/ /rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i
396b5(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin khyod/ /khyab bdag 'dod chags chos 'byung gnas/ /dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje gshed po las kun byed/ /sku'i rdo rje rab gsal

396b7(rgyud 'grel): dmar po/ /bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ /khro bo khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs/ /bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs/ /khyod kyi gar mdzad sa stongs dang/ /sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo/ /chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo'i yid/ /gar
397a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzad khyod nyid ro langs lags/ /sku lus bong thung dmar po ste/ /rnam pa sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis btud/ /gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags dag gis ni/ /khyod ni sa gsum

397b1(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal brjod de bdag gshin rje gshed zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa nyid du rang bzhin gyi grub pa nyid do zhes pa'o/ /de ni rnal 'byor chen po'o// //rnal 'byor bzhi'i rim pa 'di yi thun gsum mam thun bzhi 'am ji ltar 'dod pa'i
397b2(rgyud 'grel): dus su bsgom par bya'o/ /'bum yongs su bzlas pa de srid du bzlas so/ /de nas 'bum gyi mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas las thams cad pa'i thab khung du cho ga bzhin du mngar gsum gyis bskus
397b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i me tog dmar po stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg bya ste sngags re re nas bzlas nas so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na man+t+ra sid+d+haM me de hi hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /de nas gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'byung ngo/ /las thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /de nas phyag rgya
397b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na re shig skad cig gi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsgom ste rgyun mi 'chad pa chu bo'i rgyun 'bab pa lta bus so/ /bsgoms bas skyo na sngags bzlas te ji srid lus
397b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur na gshin rje gshed kyi skur ma gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de nas phyag rgya chen po grub par 'gyur te lha'i skur grub pa nyid phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo/ /de dag kyang gom pa tsam kho nas 'byung ste/ /de skad du/ yang dag yang dag ma yin
397b6(rgyud 'grel): mdun gnas pa/ /skyes bu goms pa'i sbyor bas 'grub 'byung te/ /'dod pas 'khrugs pa bzhin du nyams dga' bde/ /sems kyang rjes su 'brang ba nges sbyor ldan/ /zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan yang/ goms pa'i spyod yul ma gyur med
397b7(rgyud 'grel): ces so/ /de nyid kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye ba 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid du gsungs so/ /gzhan yang bsten pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya ste/ de la cho ga 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs sam thang
398a1(rgyud 'grel): ka bzhugs su gsol te ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bya ste bya ba thams cad spangs nas/ bya ba de la sems rtse gcig pas bzlas par bya ste/ ji srid rang nyid byon nas kye kye sgrub pa po khyod la mchog ci sbyin par bya zhes gsung

402a2(rgyud 'grel): hI hI hI/ hUM hUM hUM/ pheM pheM pheM/ swA hA/ zhes so/ /de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la so rtsi la sogs pa yang dbul te/ bzod par gsol zhing gshegs su gsol te a(rgyud 'grel): yig gsum dang se gol gsum gyi gshegs
