402a5(rgyud 'grel): u tsa cha Ti ya hUM phaT cas pa 'dis tsan dan dmar po'i sind+hu ra bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres pa 'am 'ba' zhig pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa nye bar byugs la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra re khe hUM dkyil du zlum po byas te oM su re khe sarba ta thA ga tA
402a6(rgyud 'grel): d+hiSh+Tha n+tu swAhA/ 'dis me tog gzhag nas lag pa bkus nas skad cig gis rang gi lus las mthon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo maN+Dal du bzhugs par bsgoms la mchod par bya ste/ oM rak+ta ya mA ra ya badzra pe ta ta? laM
402a7(rgyud 'grel): A ling+gi ta kand+ha rA ya a(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ dbus su'o/ /oM mo ha ya mA re ye badzra tsar tsi kA ling+gi ta kand+ha rA ya a(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ shar du'o/ /oM bi shu nA ya mA rA ye badzra bA rA hI A ling+gi ta kand+ha rA ya a(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ lho phyogs su'o/ /oM
402b1(rgyud 'grel): rA ga ya mA ra ge badzra sa ra swasti A ling+gi taM/ kand+ha ra ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ nub tu'o/ /oM ir Sh+ya ya mA ra ye badzra gau rI A ling+gi ta kand+ha rA ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ byang du'o/ /oM ra dza paTTa g+ha Ta ya tsa tu(rgyud 'grel): sa ma pU ra Na ya A a(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/
402b2(rgyud 'grel): me mtshams su'o/ /oM su bar Na g+ha TA ya kaM rU ri kA pU ra Na ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ bden bral du'o/ /oM pra b+ha la g+ha TA ya sihla ka pU ra NA ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ rlung du'o/ /oM ra dza ta g+ha TA ya kar pU ra pU ra NA ya A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ dbang
402b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan du'o/ /sngags 'di nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin mngon par sngags pa'i mchod rdzas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/ /bstod pa bsdus pa yang bya ste/ phyag btsal nas bzlas pa byas nas gshegs so/ /oM mu(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes ba 'dis rang nyid
402b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lus kho na la gzhug go /de la 'di ni bstod pa'o/ /ma he dbang phyug chen po lha bdag po/ /gnyug mar gsungs pa'i dngos grub mnga' bdag po/ /sdig pa 'jigs rung bgegs rnams 'joms bdag po/ /gshin rje'i 'khrul 'khor
402b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags mchog bdag po/ /dbyug pa dkar bsnams dbyug dkar bsams pa po/ /mi thod phyag na mi thod 'dzin pa po/ /zung 'jug bde ldan zung 'jug bde ba po/ /gshin rje gsod mdzad gshin rje gsod pa po/ /mi thod klu yis
402b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyan byas 'jigs pa po/ /bcos ma'i sku lus sprul gzhi mdzad pa po/ /mthar ba de'i go 'phang gnas gzugs 'god pa po/ /brtan ster blo ster tshe ring ster ba po/ /de bzhin yid mdzad pha rol phyin pa po/ /lhan skyes bde chen gcig thugs
402b7(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa po/ /thugs rje ro gcig bsod nams mdzad pa po/ /thugs gsung bstod dge'i las kyi lam pa po/ /zhabs la lha mo bcod can bdud pa po/ /dgegs tshogs mdza' dag go 'phang bcom pa po/ /nor ster sku mdog nyi ltar dmar pa? po/
403a1(rgyud 'grel): bde chen gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rnam par dag pa bsgom par 'dod na/ /de'i tshe bsam gtan dang sngags bzlas pas skyon rnam par dag pa bsgom par bya'o/ /bsgegs rnams zhi phyir bsrung bar byas/ /de
403a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid rgyud ni byams la sogs/ /smon lam 'bras bu rnyed pa'i phyir/ /mchod pa bsod nams 'phel bya'i phyir/ /lta ba gzhom phyir stong pa nyid/ /rang lus mchog tu lta ba yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag phyir/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil
403a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsungs/ /gru bzhi bden bzhi bsgrub phyir sprul/ /bdud bzhi bzlog pa'i don du ni/ /sgo bzhi po ni kun nas gsungs/ /zur bzhi dag ni tshangs pa yi/ /gnas bzhi rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs bsgrub don du/ /ka ba brgyad
403a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsal bar bshad/ /kun rtog thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir/ /dra ba dra phyed rin po che/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsgrub phyir/ /rta babs bzhi po kho na ste/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i rgya'i phyir/ /sa bon la sogs zhu ba'i tshul/ /byams
403a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs 'bras bu lta ba'i phyir/ /tsar tsi ka la sogs pas bskul/ /gshin rje'i dgra ru rab grags phyir/ /gshin rje gshed gzugs bsgom pa'o/ /chags can sems tsam gdul bya'i phyir/ /sku'i kha dog dmar po'o/ /dus gsum ye shes
403a6(rgyud 'grel): grub bya'i phyir/ /spyan gsum par ni brtags pa'o/ /phyag gnyis gnyug ma'i ngo bo'i phyir/ /shes rab de nyid rgyu'i phyir/ /dbyug pas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir/ /bsrung ba'i don du thod pa phyag /g.yon brkyang shin du rlom pa'i phyir/ /klu ni klu
403a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ /gdug pa sdigs phyir mgo bo'i phreng/ /ma he gdul dka' 'dul byed phyir/ /khro bo shin du chags sbyor phyir/ /spom pa gang ba thob pa'i phyir/ /stag lpags la sogs khro bo'i phyir/ /skra grol ba ni grol ba'i phyir/ /
403b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje'i ngo bo rtogs pa'i phyir/ /skyes pa'i gzugs ni rtag tu bshad/ /shes rab gri gug dngos po dang/ /dngos med lta ba bzlog pa'i phyir/ /lha rdzas bdud rtsi myang ba yi/ /ro dang ldan phyir thod pa'o/ /stong nyid ngo bo rtogs bya'i phyir/ /bud med gzugs su yang
403b2(rgyud 'grel): dag bstan/ /stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba la/ /gnyis kyi sbyor ba bshad pa'o/ /dbang phyug brgyad kyis khyab bdag nyis/ /phyir ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams bstan/ /de phyir rdo rje thugs bsgrub phyir/ 'di la rnal 'byor gzhan yod min/ /zhes pa'i rnam
403b3(rgyud 'grel): bar dag pa bsam par bya'o/ /bzang po'i blo yis bdud kyis brtson pas sprul pa'i brjod pa rgya chen nus gyur cig /de nyid de nyid rigs pas nges byas 'di ni sems can don rnams bsgrub bya'i phyir/ /dpal ldan gshin rje'i dgra yis rab bsgrags
403b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud tshan sna tshogs bla ma dam pa'i/ /zhabs las rtogs nas the tshom med pa'i yid kyis bsam pa rnam par dag pas bya/ /dad pa med par 'bras bu mi 'thob nyid/ /des na dad pa nyams pa nyid maM bya/ /blo gros bzang po mkhas pas sgrub thabs
403b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ dag byas gshin rje gshed dmar skur gyur cig /gshin rje gshed dmar bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /byas las bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /de yis gshin rje gshed nyid de'i/ /rnal 'byor mchog la brtson par shog /rang byin gyis
403b6(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs// //slob dpon chen po mkhas shin dngos grub brnyes pa/ /blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa// //
403b7(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma 'od zer gyis zhal snga nas/ gus pas mnyan nas chag lo tsa ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// (//gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gsal byed bzhugs so//) //
404a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya man+ta ka yan+t+ro t+ta ka/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gsal byed/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di rnams bri gzhi ni/ n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma la sogs
404a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /dang po 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa zlum po/ /gnyis pa la rtsibs bcu gnyis pa/ gsum pa la rtsibs bcu drug pa/ rtsibs brgyad pa'i phyogs su ya ma la sogs pa'i yi ge dgod/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma la bsgrub bya'i ming gi yi ge dgod
404a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs bcu drug pa'i rtsibs kyi bar bar gyi rtsibs brgyad la/ de ltar bsgrub bya zur rnams su'o/ /'khor dang po'i dbus kyi lte bar/ ya ni rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar du ma/ rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i shar du rA/ gnyis par dza/ gsum par sa/
404a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi par ngo/ /rtsibs brgyad pa'i lho'i rtsibs la me/ slar yang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'dab ma lnga pa la ru/ drug pa la Na/ bdun pa la yo/ slar yang rtsibs brgyad kyi nub kyi 'dab ma la nga/ yang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa la
404a5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dgu pa la rA/ bcu pa la ya/ slar yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i byang gi rtsibs la k+She/ yang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i bcu gcig pa la tsa/ bcu gnyis pa la ni/ /de bzhin du gsungs pa/ ya ma rA dza sa ngo me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya
404a6(rgyud 'grel): da yo ni ra ya/ k+She ya ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ zhes pa rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /yi ge bcu drug ni rtsibs bcu drug la'o/ /gcig ni gtso bo ste 'di ltar dbus su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ya ma ra dza sa ngo me ru Na yo/ /de nas dbus kyi snying po'i
404a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /da ni ra k+Sha yats+tsha/ de nas na'i mdza' can no/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dang/ rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i nges pa'o/ /da nas rtsibs bcu drug pa'i ngos bsgrub bya'i ming gi bar bar gyi 'dab ma la sngags
404b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di rnams bri bar bya ste/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ sdang pa rnam par dbye ba la dbus su gtso bo ya'o/ /gsang pa la ma/ dbang du sdud pa la rAM 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa la rA/ mnan pa la k+She/ dgug pa la nga/ rmongs pa lam/
404b2(rgyud 'grel): stobs dang ldan par bya ba la do/ /zhi ba la sa/ bskrad pa la ts+tsha/ chad pa btab pa la Na/ sems gnan pa la ru/ rgyal ba la dza/ rab tu gdung ba la ya/ dgra brlag par bya ba la ni/ 'dir las kyi rang bzhin gyis yi ge dbus su gtso bor gyur pa de'i
404b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas su ya bri bar bya/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo la nges pa 'di/ dang po'i sangs rgyas nas btus pa'o// //'di rnams kyi zhi ba la sogs pa'i las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga brjod de/ /de la zhi ba dang
404b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i 'khor lo ni/ n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma rlan dang ma bral ba'i bri gzhi la/ 'bras sA lu btags pa'i chu yis/ /dur ba'i smyu gus so/ /rgyas pa la 'jag rgod dkar po la sogs pas bri'o/ /de bzhin du gsad pa dang bskrad pa la/ dur khrod kyi ras
404b5(rgyud 'grel): la dug dang khrag dang sol bas mi rus kyi smyu gus so/ /skrod pa la bya rog gi sgro rkang gis bri'o/ /dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa la gro ga la gur kum dang gi wang gser gyi thur mas so/ /dgug pa la tsan dan dmar pos seng ldeng gi smyu gus so//
404b6(rgyud 'grel): rengs pa dang rmongs pa ni mchod sbyin gyi lo ma yongs su smin pa kha dog ser po la/ 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang bsres pa'i ba bla 'am yud pas so/ /ka ped kyi smyu gu dang mchod sbyin gyi smyu gus rmongs par byed pa la'o/ /'di ni nges pa'o// //
404b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo de rnams kyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga bshad de/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i 'khor lo bris la/ 'khor lo la sogs pa skud pa dkar pos bcing bar bya/ ji ltar 'khor lo mi mthong ba'i tshul lo/ /de bzhin las kyi bye brag gi skud pa dkar po dang/
405a1(rgyud 'grel): ser pos bcir bar bya'o/ /de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa ni mar dang 'o ma dang sbrang gis bkang ba'i rdza phor kha sbyar du gzhag par bya'o/ /gsad pa dang bskrad pa la thod pa khrag gis bkang par gzhag par bya/ dbang dang dgug pa la spra tshil
405a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yogs la gyo mo kha sbyar du mes gdung bar bya'o/ /mnan pa dang rmongs pa la ba bla'i chus bkang pa'i so phag dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ /gnas gtsang zhing rlan dang bcas pa'i maN+Dal gyi steng du/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa la gzhag par bya'o/ /gsang ba
405a3(rgyud 'grel): dang skrad pa la dong gi nang du zho dang mar blugs la sba bar bya/ /dgug pa dang dbang la thab kyi 'og tu'o/ /mnan pa dang rmongs pa ni sa skam por sba bar bya'o/ /dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu 'di ni sngags pas nges par rig par bya'o//
405a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo bris pa de rnams kyi phyi rol gyi 'khor lo'i nges pa gsungs te/ de la zhi ba'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor cing ra khAs bskor bar bya'o/ /rgyas pa la blang bo ches bskor bar bya ste/ ji ltar glang po che'i lto bar
405a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo chud pa'o/ /gsang pa la yi dags kyi lus su'o/ /bskrad pa la rnga mo'i lto bar ro/ /dbang du bsdu ba la ri dags kyi lto bar ro/ /dgug pa la rta'i lto bar ro/ /rmongs pa la ra'i lto ba 'am lug gi lto bar ro/ /mnan pa la rus spal
405a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi lto bar ro/ /ji ltar 'khor lo lto bar 'gyur/ /phyi rol gzugs kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas gong bu gsungs pa'i skud pas dkris par bya'o/ /rig pa de rnams kyi dus su thun gyi nges pas gsungs te/ thun dang po phyed g.yon pa chu'i dkyil
405a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la kha byang du bltas te zhi ba'i las sgrub/ /thun phyed kyi gnyis pa la de bzhin du rgyas pa'i las la dbang ldan du kha bltas la'o/ /thun tshod gnyis pa'i thun phyed la g.yas pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba'i tshe/ /kha shar du bltas la
405b1(rgyud 'grel): gsad pa'i las sgrub thun tshod gnyis pa'i phyed kyi phyi ma la me ru bltas te skrad pa'i las sgrub/ thun tshod gsum pa'i phyed la g.yas pa sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dus su kha lho ru bltas te dbang gi las sgrub/ thun tshod gsum pa'i phyed kyi phyi ma la bden bral
405b2(rgyud 'grel): bltas te dgug pa'i las sgrub/ thun tshod bzhi pa la g.yas pa sa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i dus su kha nub tu bltas te mnan pa'i las sgrub/ thun tshod bzhi pa'i phyed la rlung du bltas te rmongs pa'i las sgrub/ dbang du bya ba dang dgug pa ni/
405b3(rgyud 'grel): gro ga la gur kum dang gi wang la gser gyi smyu gus bri/ zhi ba dang rgyas pa la n+ya gro d+ha'i lo ma la dur bas 'bras kyi khu bas bri/ gsad pa dang bskrad pa ni dur khrod kyi ras la sol ba dag gis/ mi'i rus pas so/ /mnan pa dang rmongs
405b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dag las phag gi phye ma 'am yung bso// //'khor lo'i cho ga nye bar bsdus pa/ paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa nis ka lam ka'i zhal snga nas dang/ /dpyal lo tsha ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
405b5(rgyud 'grel): !/ (/gshin rje gshed dbang po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid gsal byed bzhugs so//) //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri yan+t+ra ti t+ta ni rde sha ka/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal
405b6(rgyud 'grel): byed/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bud med rnams la srung ba'i phyir/ zhi ba la gi wang gis/ dar dkar po 'am gro ga 'am snyug ma'i lkog pa 'am/ ras legs par bskrus pa la 'khor lo gnyis
405b7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par bris te/ der na ma yi nang du bcug pa'i ming gi yi ge bris la/ nag nog la sogs pa spangs shing rdza bor kha dog gcig pa kha sbyar du mar dang sbrang gi nang du bcug ste/ skud pa dkar pos dkris nas gzhag ste/ /bshad
406a1(rgyud 'grel): du bltas te thun gsum du gshin rje gshed sku mdog dkar po bsgoms nas/ me tog dkar pos mchod cing mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thog na bsgrub bya gnas par bltas la/ bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i
406a2(rgyud 'grel): chus yongs su gang pas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT na ma(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo la shAn+tiM ku ru nam/ zhi ba'i cho ga'o/ /skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba'i las la gur kum gyis so/ //
406a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa la'ang 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ der yi ge swA hA'i nang du ming yig bcug la/ mar dang sbrang gi nang du bcug la/ rdza phor kha sbyar du skud pa ser pos legs par dkris te gzhag /de nas kha byang du bltas la gshin rje
406a4(rgyud 'grel): gshed sku mdog ser po'i skur yang dag par dmigs te/ thun gsum du me tog ser pos mchod mchod cing zla ba ser po la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya kha dog ser po bsams la/ bum pa ser po'i zla ba ser po'i bdud rtsis dbang bskur cing zlas
406a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ste/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ 'am/ yang na oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ po ShaT che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru bo ShaT/ rgyas pa'i cho ga'o// /gro ga 'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu
406a6(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am tsan dam dmar po 'am/ ming med khrag dang bsres pas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ ho(rgyud 'grel): 'i yi ge'i bar du ming bcug la/ nag nog la sogs pa kha dog ngan pa spangs pa'i rdza phor kha sbyar du/ mar dang sbrang rtsis yang dag par bkang
406a7(rgyud 'grel): ste skud pa dmar pos bcings la gzhag go /de nas kha nub tu bltas la/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas/ thun gsum du me tog dmar pos mchod cing/ zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'i bsgrub bya kha dog dmar po
406b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams te/ rang gi lus las 'od 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu bkang bas shin tu myos par gyur te/ rkang pa gnyis kyi mdun du 'gyes bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur na mar dang sbrang rtsi spangs pa'i 'khor lo kho na/
406b2(rgyud 'grel): seng ldeng sol ba'i dud pa med pa'i me la gdung bar bya'o/ /de dag gi sngags ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ho(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo ma ma ba shaM ku ru h+ro(rgyud 'grel): oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ba ShaT che ge mo ba sha ma na ya ShaT/ dbang gi cho
406b3(rgyud 'grel): ga'o// //dur khrod kyi ras sam ra dza sa las byas pa'i ras la chos kyi khu bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge dza 'am h+rI(rgyud 'grel): 'i bar du bcug pa'i ming bris te/ rdza phor kha sbyar ram/ bud med kyi thod pa kha sbyar gyi bar du
406b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhag la/ gos dmar pos gtums te me tog dmar pos mchod cing/ rgongs thun nyi ma lta bu'i gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sku zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa bsams la/ /bsgrub bya'i snying gar lcags kyus phug cing/ sgo nas zhags
406b5(rgyud 'grel): pas bcings la drangs par bsam/ gal te 'ong par ma gyur na de nas seng ldeng gi me la gdung bar bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT dza(rgyud 'grel): de ba dat+taM A karSha ya dza(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa dgug po'i cho ga'o/ //dur khrod
406b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi ras la ba bla 'am yung ba'i khu bas/ 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge lam gyi khongs su bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ rdza phor ser po kha sbyar du gzhag /rdza phor la re khA gru bzhi pa bdun bris te/ de steng du ri rab lcog chen
406b7(rgyud 'grel): po brgyad? dang ldan pa yi ge hUM nang du bcug pa/ lcog gi steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor la gyis mtshan pa/ sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba skud pa ser pos bcings te/ bdag nyid gshin rje gshed ser po bsams la/ bsgrub bya ser po kha lhor bltas
407a1(rgyud 'grel): nas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'dug pa la/ gser gyi ri bdun dang ri bo mchog rab kyis mnan cing/ sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyis mnan par bsams te bzlas par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri d+hA
407a2(rgyud 'grel): na na hUM hUM phaT phaT laM de ba dat+ta swas+tha na staM b+ha ya laM/ mnan pa'i cho ga'o// //mnan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin du ming nang du bcug pa'i 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ laM de ba dat+ta sya ya thA ra b+ha kA ra ya kri te ni/
407a3(rgyud 'grel): wa ra ya to bi ru pa gaM de wa dat+ta yadz+nyAM data ta sya wAka staM b+ha ni ku ru laM/ bzlas pa byas pas mnan par bya ste/ dag mnan par bya ste/ dag mnan pa'i cho ga'o// //lkugs par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis
407a4(rgyud 'grel): mngon par bris te/ wang de ba dat+ta sya mu kha ban+ta ya baM/ zhes pa nang du gzhug /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrub bya lug gi snying du rab tu zhugs shing/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yis za ma tog lta bur kha sbyar du byas te/ rengs
407a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba'i cho gas 'khor lo gnyis bri ba dang/ sgom pa dang mnan par byas nas bzlas par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT baM de ba dat+ta sya mu khu band+ha mu kaM ku ru baM/ yul chos la sogs pa rmongs par 'gyur ro// //
407a6(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod kyi ras la ske tshe dang tsha dang/ dri tsha ba'i mar khu dang/ nim pa'i 'o ma dang/ d+ha d+hu ra'i lo ma'i khu ba bcas/ ro sregs pa'i sol ba dang/ rang gi sngags 'dzub kyi khrag gis snag tsha byas la/ bya rog gi sgro rkang gi smyu gus 'khor lo
407a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge hUM gi nang du bsgrub bya'i ming gzhug /kha lho phyogs su bltas pa gshin rje khro bo'i gzugs can/ zhabs g.yon brkyang pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ bzhin mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs pa/
407b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzad cing zhal gyi ljags glog lta bur 'gyur ba/ bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer can phyag mtshan mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar ba/ char 'bab pa'i sprin lta bu/ lto ba che zhing dbu skra dang smar ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ mgrin pa'i dbugs chu 'dzin
407b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi glog lta bu/ hUM gis yongs su gang bar bdag nyid rnam par bsams te/ 'dun du bsgrub bya gos dri ma can h+rul po gyon cing/ /lus thams cad thal bas byugs shing me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ spyi bo dang 'tshogs ma dang/ snying ga dang
407b3(rgyud 'grel): lag pa'i rtsa ba dang pus mo rnams kyi sngags kyi tshogs byas pa'i go cha dang/ srung ba rnams dang phral nas de'i lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams drangs shing bsdus te/ rang gi lus la rab tu bcug pas/ de nas khang pa stong pa lta bur bltas la//
407b4(rgyud 'grel): khro bo'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs/ mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs phyag na 'phyar ba sprul te/ bsnun cing dum bu brgya stong du byas nas/ sha dang tshil bu dang rus pa rnams za zhing/ khrag kyang 'thungs la bsregs shing thal ba byas nas/ mdun du
407b5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje char 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi mdog can lta bu ma he la gnas pa/ dbyugs to dang zhags pa 'dzin cing lto ba che ba/ zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsams te/ de'i snying gar gnas te nges za bar bsams
407b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ sngags bgrang bar bya'o/ /de nyid kho na'i tshogs 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te/ yi ge hUM dang phaT kyi nang du ming bcug pas de bzhin kho na'i bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bsgrub bya lha dang bral zhing kha dreg can me'i dkyil 'khor
407b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnas shing/ khro bo'i gzugs mi sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ral gri dang/ mtshon shing dang/ dgra sta dang/ mdung dang/ zhags pa dang/ 'khor lo dang/ rtse gsum dang/ lcogs tho la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rdeg pa dang/ dum bu brgya
408a1(rgyud 'grel): ru bcab par bsam zhing/ bya rog dang 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ ce spyang dang/ srin po dang/ mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis za bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba
408a2(rgyud 'grel): dat+taM mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM de ba dat+taM mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ gsad pa'i cho ga'o// //de bzhin du 'khor lo bsgrub bya'i ming phaT kyi nang du bcug pa bris te/ thod pa kha sbyar du gzhag la/ skud pa sngon pos
408a3(rgyud 'grel): bkris pa ste/ nyi ma phyed kyi dus su dur khrod du dang brus la bcug la/ gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ bsgrub bya gnyis rta dang ma ha la zhon cing/ lag na mtshon cha 'phyar ba/ rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas gnyis ka
408a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas par sprul te/ 'thab mo byed par bsam zhing sngags bzlas te/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+taM yadz+nyA dat+ta b+hai de sha ya phaT/ sdang ba rnam par dbye ba'i cho ga'o/ /'khor lo de nyid kho na gnyis su yi ge hUM dang phaT kyi
408a5(rgyud 'grel): khongs su bcug pa bris la thod pa kha sbyar byas nas skud pa nag pos dkris te/ dur khrod du sbas la gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i mdun du yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de thog tu rnga mo/ de'i thog tu bsgrub bya rnam pa sngon
408a6(rgyud 'grel): po bsams te/ rdo rje khro bos brab cing lho phyags su 'gro bar bsams la skrod par 'gyur ro/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT de ba dat+ta uts+tsha Ta ya phaT phaT/ bskrad pa'i cho ga'o// //khro bo gshin rje
408a7(rgyud 'grel): gshed mthar phyed ni shin tu dmar ba/ sbyor ba ni dur khrod kyi thal ba dang/ dug dang/ tsha dang/ ske tshe dang/ chu tsha bas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis/ gtor ma'i cho ga bstan cing gsungs pa dang/ zla ba zla ba'i tshes bcu bzhi la sha
408b1(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang/ bdud rtsi lngas bzlas pa'i yul la bskus shing ldan par byas na/ shin du gdung bar byed pa'i mchog /khri phrag gcig gis 'byung po rnams/ /stong phrag gcig gis mkha' 'gro dang/ /yi dags tshogs rnams gsod par byed/ /bzlas pa ?
408b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis rnal 'byor bdag /las rnams thams cad 'di yis byed/ /bzlas pa bye bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /bya ba lnga yis smos ci dgos/ /slongs ma za zhing mi bzlas te/ /ma slongs pa yang chags mi bya/ /dam tshig rtag tu brtan bya zhing/ /
408b3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor chen po sngags bzla'o/ /rnal 'byor rig pa'i sems can kun/ /byams pa'i sems ni rtag tu bya/ /nyin re zhing ngam zla ra dang/ /lo ra bzhin du rtag pa ru/ /dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi gtong/ /gtor ba drug
408b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu rtsa bzhi 'bul/ /bgegs rnams thams cad zhi ba dang/ /bsod nams yang ni 'phel ba'i phyir/ /de las 'dir ni 'byung po yi/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya/ /dri chen dri chu bsres pa'i chus/ /maN+Dal gru gsum byas nas ni/ /gshin rje
408b5(rgyud 'grel): gshed kyi rnal 'byor gnas/ /phyogs skyong rnams ni yang dag dgug /sngags 'di yis dgug par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM in+t+ra ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ya mA ya Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): ba ru t+ta ya bi/ /ku be rA ya kri/ a'i sha nA ya ta/ agna ye a/ ne ri ta ye na/ bA ya be ni/ tsan+t+ra ya hUM/
408b6(rgyud 'grel): Arka ya hUM/ brah+na Ne phaT/ ba su d+ha rA ye phaT/ be ma tsi tra Ne swa/ sarba b+h+ru te b+hyo hA/ hI hI hI/ pheM pheM pheM/ swAhA/ zhes pa 'dis rtag tu bza' ba ji snyed pa dang btung ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyi phud gshin rje gshed la dbul bar
408b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de rnams 'dis mnyes par bya zhing bzod par gsol nas/ /ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol/ /bdag gis bsod nams ji snyed gang bsags 'di yis 'jig rten rnams/ /ma lus mya ngan rnam bcom de ni byang chub snod gyur te
409a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang 'gro ba rnams kyang byang chub lam la nges sbyar nas/ /don dam bde bas legs ldan sangs rgyas sku ni thob par shog /ston ka'i zla ba lta bu yi/ /grub pa'i sgrub thabs nges pa ni/ /sems can rnams la phan phyir du/
409a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas brtan byang chub snying pos mdzad// //dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta rdo rje gdan pa
409a3(rgyud 'grel): ni ska laM ka'i zhal snga nas dang// //dpyal lo tsa ba dpal chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mU ri sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs
409a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba/ gshin rje dgra dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM yig dmar po 'bar ba la me 'bar bar lta ste/ de'i steng du/ a(rgyud 'grel): yig gis gser gyi bum pa'i snod chen po'o/ /de'i nang du go ku da ha na pi ra shu ma mu /de rnams thams cad 'o ma'i rang
409a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhin ltar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su snod kyi shar du glang po la zhon pa'i dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'o/ /lhor ra ma he la zhon pa'i gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'o/ /nub tu chu srin la zhon pa'i chu lha zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /byang du gter la
409a6(rgyud 'grel): zhon pa'i lus ngan song phyag na na ku li dang bi dza pU ra cen no/ /mer ra? la? zhon pa'i me lha phyag na phred ba can no/ bden bral du srin po ro la zhon pa ral gri 'debs pa'i phyag can no/ /rlung du ri dags la zhon pa'i rlung lha rlung der 'dzin pa'o/ /dbang
409a7(rgyud 'grel): ldan du glang la zhon dbang phyug rtse gsum dang thod pa 'dzin pa can no/ /dbus su tshangs pa'o/ /de'i mdun du zla ba'i lha phyag na ku mu ta can no/ /rgyab tu nyi ma la phyag na pad+ma can no/ /g.yas su sa'i lha mo dam bca' la mngon par phyogs
409b1(rgyud 'grel): pas bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yon du thag bzangs ris gzhon nu'o/ /de ltar yongs su bskor nas bzhugs po'i 'byung po'i tshogs ma lus ba skad cig gis stong pa nyid las sems can rnams yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje'i dgra'i skur dmigs te
409b2(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi ljags la rdo rje nas 'bru tsam bsgoms te de rnams la gtor ma nye bar dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar sngon kyi sa bon las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i steng du/ hUM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i mi mgo rlon mtshan pa'i
409b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug tho nges par bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i hUM yig dmar po bsam par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje hUM yig yongs su gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang bar 'dab ma brgyad
409b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pad+ma la aM yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa'o/ /de'i rjas su sngags brjod par bya ste/ oM sarbba tA thA ga ta rA ga Na badzra sba b+ha ba At+ma konyahaM/ de'i rjes su lte ba'i 'og der pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du/ h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po 'bar ba
409b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yon gyis thob pa khrag gis gang ba dang/ g.yas kyis ma mgos mtshan pa'i dbyug tho dmar po 'chang ba/ ma he Sha'i steng du sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa bsgom
409b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /shes rab ma dga' bas myos pa thod pa skam pos mgul pa brgyan pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig sbyor pas bzhugs pa/ de lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje'i dgra thun gsum mam bzhir bsgom/ gtor
409b7(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin no/ /phruM maM h+rIM khaM hUM zhes pas dam tshig byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /oM in+d+ra ya h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ya ma ya Sh+Ti(rgyud 'grel): ba ru NA ya gi/ ku be rA la gri/ oM shA nA ya bag na/ ya tA gna ye A/ ne ni ri dyan/ bA ya beny+tsanbrA ya hUM/ arkrA ya hUM pra hma NA ya phaT/ ba su d+hA rA ya phaT/ be ma tsi tra
410a1(rgyud 'grel): Ne swA/ sarba b+hu te b+hyo hA/ h+rI h+rI h+rI/ hUM hUM hUM/ pheM pheM pheM/ swAhA/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /gang cung zad za ba de thams cad gshin rje'i dgra la dbul bar bya'o/ /slob dpon chen po blo bzang snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i gshin
410a2(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dmar po'i sgrub thams rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis/ /smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /gshin rje
410a3(rgyud 'grel): gshed dmar yon tan 'byung gnas sgrub thabs chos/ /rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyi mi rtogs pas/ /dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skad gnyis pa/ chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus pas bsgyur/ /sa'i steng na nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ //
410a4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya man+ta ka niShpa na na yo nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la re zhig dang por bdag gis
410a5(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad gshin rje gshed dmar po'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po bsgom par bya'o/ /snyam du bsams la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
410a6(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma lta bur stong pa nyid ro gcig par bltas te/ stong pa nyid la rab tu thim pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad bden brdzun gyi mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad dang bral zhing cir yang ma grub pa'i stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i ngang las
410a7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gis ji ltar blos phyogs pa'i rgya chen por bar mtshams med cing snying po gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i sa gzhi 'bar ba dang/ de'i steng du bar du 'khrigs pas bum bu gcig tu gyur pa'i sra zhing 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba dang/ de'i steng
410b1(rgyud 'grel): du bar mtshams med par gcig tu gyur pa'i rdo rje'i mda'i dra ba dang/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i bla re dang/ de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i gur 'bar ba dang/ de'i nang du 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa ser po g.yas su shin tu drag po 'khor ba rtsibs kyi rtse mo la nye bar gnas pa'i shin tu
410b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i khro mo bcu dang bcas pa'i lte ba'i ngang du/ rlung dang/ me dang/ chu dang/ sa'i dkyil dang/ ri rab kyi steng du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su sna tshogs mtsho skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i ma he dmar nag shin tu khros pa rus rgyan
410b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis ba rgyan pa'i rgyab tu/ gshin rje yab yum zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang bas mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po nyi ma bye ba'i 'od can zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na khams gsum rnam
410b4(rgyud 'grel): par 'joms pa'i dbyug tho dkar po snams pa/ phyag g.yon na bdud ma lus pa'i khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/ brgyad gnyis lo'i rnam pa can/ mi mgo lnga'i phreng bas dbral par brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga dang/ klu
410b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul par 'phyang ba/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs bsnams pa/ sma ra dmar skya dbu skra dmar ser gyen la rdzes pa/ thung zhing sbom pa/ gsum pa tshe ba/ nyi ma lta 
410b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa/ zhal khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal bcung zad gdangs pa/ khro bo'i tshul gyis bzhad pa'i zhal/ ljags bsgyur ba/ yum rdo rje ro langs mas mkhyud pa/ lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/
410b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ dbu sku grol ba/ phyag g.yon na gdug pa bdud kyi khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas na rdo rje gri gug 'dzin pa/ mgo bo skam po lnga bcu'i phreng pa mgul par 'phyang ba/ de la gzhan yab nyid 'dra ba can/
411a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de la sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i shar gyi 'dab ma la nyi ma la gnas pa'i gti mug gshin rje gshed sku mdog dkar po/ rdo rje tsa rtsi ka nag po la 'khyud la/ lho'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ nyi ma la gnas
411a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phra ma gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser po/ /rdo rje phag mo ser mo la 'khyud pa/ nub kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i 'dod chags gshin rje gshed sku mdog dmar po/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma dkar mo la 'khyud pa/ byang gi
411a3(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i phrag dog gshin rje gshed sku mdog ljang gu /lha mo gau ri ljang la 'khyud pa'o/ /gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i dpa' bo bzhi ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas rnams na
411a4(rgyud 'grel): rim pa bzhin 'khor lo dang rin po che dang/ pad+ma dang ral gri 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon thams cad khrag gis bkang pa'i thod ba thugs kar 'dzin pa/ de las gzhan thams cad gtso bo dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rdo rje tsar ci ka la sogs pa'i
411a5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mo bzhi ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas rdo rje gri gug /g.yon pa khrag gis bkang pa'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ spyan gsum pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ dbu skra grol ba bsgom par bya'o/ /me'i tshams
411a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ mu man gser chab kyi bum pa/ tse tu ra sa ma yas gdab/ bden bral gyi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ gser gyi bum pa ka sto ris gang ba/ rlung gi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ phyi ru'i bum pa sihlas gang
411a7(rgyud 'grel): ba/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ dngul gyi bum pa ga phur gyis gang ga bum pa bzhi ga yang kha thod pas bcad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i rang nyid
411b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i ye shes sems dpa' i thugs kar/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma gnas pa'i dbyug tho dkar po'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hUM dmar pos mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de la bcom ldan 'das nyid la ni mi skyor pas rgyas btab pa'o//
411b2(rgyud 'grel): gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi la ni go rims bzhin rnam par snang mdzad dang/ rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ snad ba mdza' yas dang/ don yod grub pas rgyas btab pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i snying po ni/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel):  
411b3(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'o/ /de ltar bshad bar gyur mod kyang/ phun tshogs sku ni dpag med de/ chu'i gter las chu 'dzin gyis/ chu blangs zad par mi 'gyur bzhin/ /gshin rje gshed dmar po rdzogs pa'i rnal
411b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas spas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI rak+ta ya mA ri dzI baM tat+two pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
411b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i man ngag /dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag cing dri med bdud bzhi 'joms/ /dpa' bo gshin rje gshed btung de/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed rgyud las/ /sbas pa bla ma'i
411b6(rgyud 'grel): lung gi bshad/ /phyi dang nang dang gzhan rnams kyis/ /dus dgra'i tshul 'di shes bya ste/ /lho phyogs sa 'og rim pa bdun/ /sgo med mun gar bcu drug nas/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i las kyi 'khor/ /bye ba 'bum bcas gshin rje ste/ /gru pa'i dngos?
411b7(rgyud 'grel): grub phun sum tshogs/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis nyi ma'i mdog lar gsal/ /ma he la bzhugs de yi ge sher yin te/ /lhar bces 'jig rten kun gyi gtsug gis mchod/ /gdug cing gtum pa'i skye bo gang/ log par ltung pa gshin rje
412a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /snying rjes bstan la gzhug pa'i phyir/ /tshar gcod pa ni gshed yin no/ /ka li ya ste A li ma/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa gshin rje ste/ /kun dar ma ni dbus gnas su/ /gang zhig gnyis su med de gshed gnyi ma
412a2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i lam gnyis bor/ /'gro ba gang yin gshin rje ste/ de yang dbus su gang gnas pa/ /ye shes de ni gshed yin no/ /dman pa'i snying gi dbus song rtsa/ /nyon mongs ngo bo nyid yin no/ /srid pa'i rtsa ba gshin rjer bshed/ /rnal 'byor
412a3(rgyud 'grel): pa la tshul de nyid/ /yang dag ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /de ni de yi gshed yin no/ /gzung ba ya ste 'dzin rtog ma/ gzung dang 'dzin pa'i kun rtog ni/ /'khor ba'i rtsa ba gshin rje ste/ /a ni rnam par skye ba med/ /de ni gang yin snying rje'o/ /stong nyid
412a4(rgyud 'grel): snying rje ro gcig pa/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das te gshed/ /gang zhig lus ngag sems kyi ni/ /snyings ma gang yin gshin rje ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis/ /dngos por gyur pa gshed yin no/ /mdor na srid pa'i kun rtog tshogs/ /gang
412a5(rgyud 'grel): yon gshin rjer gshad pa ste/ /rnam par dag pa'i ye shes sku/ /kun mkhyen pa ni gshed du gsungs/ /lte snying 'grin pa spyi bor ni/ /bdud bzhi gnas pa gshin rje ste/ /mthar byed bzhi ni gshed yin no/ /ya la sogs pa'i yi ge
412a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /ma ngag las kyi gshin rje ni/ /mi bzang srid pa'i las kyis gzir/ /dag pas dpal ldan dus kyi dgra/ srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing/ dngos grub bde chen mchog ster yin/ /ya ma gnyis su 'dzin pa ste/ /spos med 'od
412a7(rgyud 'grel): ?gsal an tar brjod/ /ka yig bla mas bstan pa nyid/ /gshin rje mthar byed ces byar grags/ 'tsho ba zhes bya srog tu brjod/ /'tsho ba'i dbye ba zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang 'gyur/ /gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba las/ /srog ni de
412b1(rgyud 'grel): gi gsang 'di gang gis shes/ /thams cad grub cing rang dbang 'gyur/ /gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba las/ /srog ni de bzhin gnyis su brjod/ /dngas ma dang ni snyigs mar gnas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /bla ma'i thugs su shes bya ste//
412b2(rgyud 'grel): mi phyed brtan pa'i gus pa yis/ /ltos pa med pa'i bsnyen bkur bya/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /mi 'gyur ba ni srog gi mchog /de las gzhan pa'i bskyed pa yi/ /yig 'bru rnams dang phyag mtshan dang/ /phyag rgya snying po la sogs pa/ /rgyal po sras
412b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas srog yin te/ /dad pas thugs dam bskul bar bya/ /stong nyid snying po'i snying rje can/ /rnal 'byor lam pa rnams kyi srog /dngos grub chen po 'dod rnams kyi/ /srog ni dam tshig sdom pa yin/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgrub bya ba/ /'jig rten pa dang
412b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'das/ /yon tan 'byung gnas srog gcig tu/ /byang chub sems ni kun dar brjod/ /bla ma lhag pa'i lha rnams kyi/ /byin brlab srog ni mi phyed pa'i/ /gus pas brtan pa med na min/ /de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i/ /'byung po phal
412b5(rgyud 'grel): che'i srog gi gnad/ /srog dang 'tshong dang ni tshe/ /'di rnams dbye bas shes par bya/ /rtsa ba'i srog ni sngon bzhin no/ /sa stengs 'byung po kha cig gi /dbus rlung srog tu nges pa yin/ /'byung po rnams ni rang rang gi /bod pa'i sngags dang sa bon dang//
412b6(rgyud 'grel): ma Ni rnams kyi srog yin no/ /sde chen bzhi ba'i dang po la/ /mos brgyan dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan/ /'byung po rnams kyi srog la gnas/ /de las gzhan par byung po'i srog /kha cig gnas la gnas pa yod/ /zhugs shing la sogs
412b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni/ /kha cig rdzas la brten te gnas/ /kha cig rang gi grab mar gnas/ /kha cig phyi yi 'byung bar gnas/ /nor bu ri rab gos la sogs/ /kha cig sman dang kha cig dug /kha cig 'gro ba gzhan gyi gzugs/ /sa stengs 'byung po rnams kyi 
413a1(rgyud 'grel): srog /bdag gi rtsa la gnas pa yin/ /de la sogs pa du ma yis/ /srog gi dbye ba sna tshogs pa/ /'di ru brjod pa mi nus so/ /mi rnams kyi ni srog gyur pa/ /ming dang ming yin dang po dang/ /rnam par shes pa tshe gzugs yin/ /gza' dang
413a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyu skar la sogs pa/ /mdor na brtan g.yo ma lus pa'i/ /srog ni phyi dang nang du gnas/ rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste/ /'khor bar gnas pa rnams kyi srog /stong nyid snying rje mi 'gyur ba de/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i srog /srid pa dang ni mya ngan
413a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das/ /rtsa yis bdag nyid lus la gnas/ /lte ba mgrin snying spyi bo la/ /rlung me chu sa zhes bya ba/ /phrag dog zhe sdang chags dang rmongs/ /lus ngag yid gsum mi phyed gnas/ /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnas/ /sdug bsngal kun 'byung paM
413a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'gog /bden pa bzhi yi ngo bo nyid/ /rgyu mthun rnam smin skyes bu can/ /dri ma med pa'i 'bras bu bzhi/ /srid pa'i skye gnas bzhi po dang/ /e baM ma yA yi ge bzhi/ /de bzhin ya ma rA dza bzhi/ /spyan dang mA ma gos dkar sgrol//
413a5(rgyud 'grel): yum bzhi po yi rnam pa ste/ /gshin rje shes rab pad+ma dang/ /bgegs shes bya ba mthar byed bzhi/ /tshad med bzhi dang mthar byed bzhi/ /dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig bzhi/ /dam tshig las chos phyag rgya che/ /phyag rgya che yi rang bzhin no//
413a6(rgyud 'grel): rig bzhi ye shes bzhi yi dngos/ /sku bzhi ye shes bzhi dang ldan/ /khams gsum la sogs thams cad kyi/ /bdag nyid chen po rdo rje 'dzin/ /bdud kyi bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir/ /de phyir gsang ba bshad par bya/ /A li kA la'i
413a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum bsrung bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar gsal bas/ /A li kA li rab brjod pas/ /spyi gtsug nas ni rkang mthil bar/ /shes rab thabs kyis skor phyogs su/ /mi phyed par ni bcing
413b1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /A li kA li rtsa gnyis po/ /thabs dang shes rab yi ges bsrung/ /gnyis med rtsa ni rdo rje bsrung/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid do/ /rang gi gsang sngags rgyal po la/ /shes rab thabs kyi ye shes mchog /thog ma nas ni mdza' ru sbyar//
413b2(rgyud 'grel): oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT sbyor ba yis/ /hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje yis/ /rang gi gsang sngags brtan par 'gyur/ rang ming rigs kyi yi ge dag /ya dang ma yi nang bcug ste/ /a li kA li gnyis med pa'i/ /za ma tog gi nang son la/ /lte ba'i chu skyes 'og
413b3(rgyud 'grel): tu sga/ /brgya byin gyis kyang mi tshugs na/ /sha za phra mo smos ci dgos/ thabs dang shes rab ro gcig pa/ /rnam par mi rtog bde ba che/ /'od gsal ting 'dzin mchog gi ni/ /lhag pa'i bsrung ba gzhan med do/ /sa chu pas kyang mi phyed do/ /a
413b4(rgyud 'grel): A/ i a'i/ u a'u/ ri rI/ li lI/ e Ai/ o a'au/ aM A(rgyud 'grel): oM a ra pa tsa muM hUM phaT/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dzha nya/ Ta Tha Da Dha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ shes rab yi ges 'jig rten dang/ 'das pa'i
413b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub bya dbang du 'gyur/ /rtag tu bsgrub pa po rnams la/ /thabs kyi yi ge brtan par 'gyur/ yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags kyis/ /lhag pa'i lha ni mnyes par bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag rjes 'brang 'di/ /blo ldan slob mas bskul ba'i phyir//
413b6(rgyud 'grel): me long ltar gsol byas pa la/ /bla ma lhar bcas bzod mdzad rigs/ /dge ba gang nges 'gro ba kun/ /bdud bzhi'i dgra las rgyal gyur cig /dpal gshin rje gshed kyi 'tsho ba'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta d+har pan A
413b7(rgyud 'grel): tsarya'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa d+har paN a tsArya de nyid dang/ glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis/ /chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyar cing
414a1(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ rak+ta ya mA ri de sha pA d+hiSh+na na/ bod skad du/ gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa/ khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /snying
414a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes chags pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /bde chen gshin rje gshed po la/ /btud de 'dir? ni phyin brlabs bshad/ /de la 'dir ni rim pa 'dis/ /rnal 'byor byang chub 'dod pa yis/ /dad pa chen po brtan byas te/ /bla ma'i kha las shes par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin
414a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gsang sngags dang/ /bla ma bkur dang mkha' 'gro bsnyen/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i rdo rje la/ /mchod sogs las su rung bar bya/ /maN+Dal la sogs yo byad dang/ /bum pa dkyil 'khor gsang sngags bri/ /lha yi gzugs brnyan gsal ba
414a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bzlas dang mchod sogs sdog 'gro bas/ /bgegs sbyar gsol ba gdab pa dang/ /dam tshig gzung dang sems bskyed bya/ /oM badzra yo ga tsit+to twA da yA mi su ra ta sa ma ya stwaM/ hoM sid+d+hi badzra ya thA su khaM/ de nyid gsum gyi skad cig la/ /lus
414a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs ye shes gsum du bya/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i man ngag gis/ /rang nyid ye shes dran pa dang/ /rdo rje sgra ni brjod par bya/ /cho ga las byung chu sogs lnga'i/ /ji bzhin dbang ni sbyin byas la/ /'dod na rang snying pad 'dab la/ /yi ge lnga ni dgod
414a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /hUM b+hUM aM dzi da khaM kha dog lnga yi 'od zer gyis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas la sogs yon tan tshogs/ /'od ni gsal bas yang dang yang/ /bkug nas spro dang brtan par bya/ /rdo rje rnams dang dbyer med pa/ /skad cig nyid la
414a7(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bris pa yis/ /maN+Dal byin la 'di skad do// gdod nas rang bzhin rnam dag mchog /'od gsal srid gsum kun gyi bzhi/ /shin tu bde pa'i bde ba sde//
414b1(rgyud 'grel): sems kyis yid ni de ltar blta/ /bsdus te dmar pos thig le bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag gi rjes 'gro /rig pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa 'ang sbyin/ /bu ga'i sbyor ba dam pa yis/ /yid ni bde ba can du 'phang/ /de ltar rten dang brten med bar/ /gang la gang gis
414b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'dzin med/ /gdod nas skye ba med pa yi/ /skye sogs spros las 'das pas na/ /spros pa nyid ni spros med pas/ /zung 'jug 'od gsal bde chen nyid/ /bde bas bde ba rtog pa'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ye shes che/ /gang na btsal yang mi rnyed de/ /bla ma mnyes
414b3(rgyud 'grel): thabs kha las so/ /de ni rtog ba tsam gyis ni/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /'ching ba kun spangs rnam grol gyi/ /ye shes mchog ni thob pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum na mnyam pa spangs/ /'di ni bla ma gshin rje'i dgrar gyur pas/ /bdag la rjes su gzung bas
414b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob/ /de don gzhan la'ang sbyin phyir yi ge ru/ /bris la bla ma mkha' 'gro bzod par mdzod/ /phod la ma yin man ngag med la min/ shin tu gces pas phangs pas phangs par bya/ /de ltar bla ma'i drin las zab mo gsal phye bas//
414b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun lhan cig skyes dga' bde ba'i gtso/ /kun khyab bde gsal mi rtog ye shes zung 'jug sku/ /thob nas bde bas bde la rnam rol dgyes par shog /gshin rje mthar byed dmar pos byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa grub thob kyi
414b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor los bsgyur ba bram ze dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+ha ra paN A tsArya dang/ glo bo lo tsa pa dge slong shes rab rin chen gyi bsgyur ba'o// //
414b7(rgyud 'grel): bod du 'gyur ba'i byin rlabs kyi bka' la 'di las zab pa tshad pa byin brlabs che ba/ mnyan pa/ brgyud pa dang ldan pa med pas su thod thod la ma byin/ /bsnyen pa yongs su ma rdzogs na mkha' 'gro ma'i bka' chad 'ong bas shin tu
415a1(rgyud 'grel): mnyan/ /rjes gnang ma thob par dpe 'ang ma ston a zhes bla ma rgya gar shar phyogs pa gsung/ sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// //rgya gar skad du/ de wi d+ha ra pra b+hA d+hiShthA na/ bod skad du/ lha mo
415a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams/ /mthar byed ma la rab btud nas/ /spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis byin rlabs bshad//
415a3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal la sogs sta gon bya/ /bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la/ /yon bcas dad pa'i slob ma la/ sdom pa byin la dam la bzhag /de nas 'dun pa drag po yis/ /bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab/ /pad+ma'i
415a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas zla ba la/ /oM skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar/ chu shel gri gug pad+ma'i snod/ /thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan/ 'od dkar 'phro 'du shel lta bu/ /de ltar gnyis ka gsal byas nas/ /bla ma'i snying gar ji bzhin gyi/ lha
415a5(rgyud 'grel): mo 'thon te snying gar gzhug /de yi brang dkyil oM skyes pa/ gri gug as mtshan thod nang du/ phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya/ /de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi/ gnyis 'dzin 'khri ba kun bcad de/ /bdag med shes rab dam pa yis//
415a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyis/ /stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim/ /thod pa'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyis/ /'dzin pa'i du(rgyud 'grel): kha kun gsal te/ /zag med bde bas bde gshegs mchod/ /mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog /
415a7(rgyud 'grel): bkug la gnyis su med par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi /ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis/ bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g.yo yi/ /bcud bsdus ngo bor bsams byas la/ /bla ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI:
415b1(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ a mo ha ra ti A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hUM hUM dzA dzA dza ya a A/ i a'i/ u a'u/ ri rI/ li lI/ e Ai/ o aau/ aM a(rgyud 'grel): 'phar dang g.ya' dang rgod pa dang/ bde stong nyams ni skye bar 'gyur/ /ji srid bran du
415b2(rgyud 'grel): khas blas nas/ /yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig bzhin/ /bla ma bsten pas brtson par bya/ /bla ma blo ba ma bde ba'i/ /slob ma'i dngos grub 'dod ba ni/ /chur shes smig rgyu ji bzhin no/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin brlabs grub thob kyi
415b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra dang/ lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las/ /dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs paN+Di ta d+har paN A tsarya dang lo tsa
415b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so/ /snga 'gyur la 'di tshan che tsam gda' o/ gsung ngo// //rgya gar skad du/ pra d+ha wa d+ha ra swA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'od 'dzin sgrub pa'i
415b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ bdud rtsi'i mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gang zhig kha zas nyung ba yis/ /'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis phongs na/ /sems nyid bza' bar bya ba'i phyir/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len
415b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad/ /gsum la skyabs song byang chub sems/ /gnas bzhi la sogs sngon song bas/ /skad cig nyid las yul rnams dang/ /yul can stong pa'i ngang nyid las/ /paM las 'tsho skyes dbus son pa'i/ /nyi ma'i dbus su lha mo ni//
415b7(rgyud 'grel): chu shel lta bu gri gug dang/ /bdud rtsi bum pa g.yas dang g.yon/ /dar dkar gos dang rin chen rgyan/ /lang tsho rgyas shing sha rgya sa ma/ /li ba'i skra dang bung ba'i dri/ /mdzes ldan ma yi brang dbus su/ /rang dang 'dra ba'i lha mo naM/ /dangs pa'i
416a1(rgyud 'grel): shel drung mu tig ltar/ /dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i 'ong can blta/ /de nas rang snying shing 'bras ltar/ /rtse mo gyen lta rtsa lnga dang/ /bcas pa phyed nas mtshon gyis gcad/ /steng gi phyogs ni sangs rgyas lnga'i/ /rtsa dang
416a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas te ltos med dbul/ /nyon mongs lnga'i rtsa sbubs nas/ /dri ma ma lus bshad lam nas/ /'thon te rgya mtsho'i dogs su bskur/ /rtsa stong bum pa'i bdud rtsis bkang/ /lus dang rtsa dang khams bdud rtsi/ /ye shes rgyal po'i rlung rgyas te
416a3(rgyud 'grel): khru ma mar gyis gang ba ltar/ /rang gi lus dang de bzhin sems/ /zag med bde bas rab rgyas te/ /dmigs shing spros pa bcas pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la gtad de gzhag /de ltar yang yang gos pa yis/ /ting 'dzin zas su mi 'gyur ba'i/ /
416a4(rgyud 'grel): srin pu kun yang 'dzag 'gyur bas/ /de don bya phyir gsang sngags dang/ /smon lam che la 'bad par bya/ /de ltar rten na zag med kyi/ /ting 'dzin mchog ni skye ba dang/ /gnyid rmugs la sogs byed pa'i zas/ /til tsham dgos par mi 'gyur
416a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang/ /lus rgyas dangs shing sha stobs rgyas/ /thig le rgyas shing 'jig mi 'gyur/ /dus min mchi bas mi gos te/ /phyi nang mkha' 'gro dran du 'gyur/ /'dre sogs gnod par mi 'gyur zhing/ /'gro kun
416a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' zhing dbang du 'gyur/ /ci 'dod dam pa'i mchog ster te/ /'dod sred ma lus rab bcad nas/ /dus kyi dgrar ni myur 'gro'o/ /de ltar bla mas gnang ba yi/ /man ngag gsal la nongs mchis rnams/ /bzod par gnang zhing de yi ni//
416a7(rgyud 'grel): dge bas gshin rje gsod gyur gcig /'od 'chang ma'i sgrub thabs ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi man ngag ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lo ban snga ma dang 'dra/ 'di'i
416b1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag cig sngar yang snyan brgyud du byung 'dug ste/ /gzhung sngar ma 'gyur gsung// //rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag byin rlabs dang bcas pa dpal rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros pa chen po zhe sdang gshin rje la
416b2(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor gang la phyi dang ni/ /nang gi 'chi ltas brtag bya ste/ /nges par 'chi 'gyur rlung las te/ /gsum mam lnga 'am bdun la sogs/ /g.yas g.yon rlung ni ma 'gyur na/ /nang gi rtsa dang rlung thig le/ /las mi
416b3(rgyud 'grel): rung bas mchi ltas su/ /brtags nas glu ba'i rnal 'byor bya/ /g.yas nas lnga dang g.yon nas gcig /skyes dang sdud pa'i khyad par ro/ /glo g.yas sa la phab byas nas/ /brla g.yon steng du rkang g.yas bzhag /g.yon gyi rkang mgo skyid par
416b4(rgyud 'grel): spril/ /lag g.yon nu mnyes mchen khung gzhug /lus mdzid dpung pa g.yas la bskur/ /dpung pa g.yas pas kha bcus la/ /rdo rje'i bzlas pas bslu bar bya/ /des kyang 'pho bar ma gyur tshe/ /rdubs la mthe chung g.yas kyis bkag /
416b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon? nas 'gro 'ong bya ba dang/ /rlung bcing man ngag gdam pa'o/ /'khrul 'khor bzlog ste bya ba ni/ /g.yon nas 'pho bar 'dod na'o/ /de ltar phyi dus tshes grangs la/ /brtags nas gal te mi 'pho na/ /dus la bab pas rnams shes 'phang//
416b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan la yang/ /zhen pa'i rtsa ba rab bcad nas/ /longs spyod lus dang dge la sogs/ /lha dang bla ma 'gro drug la/ /ltos pa med par mchod sbyin bya/ /lus la chags dang zhen pa ni/ /skad cig tsam yang mi bya'o/ /gnas
416b7(rgyud 'grel): dang grogs sogs gzhal med dang/ /lhar ni yang dang yang dran pas/ /bla ma 'ba' zhig bsam par bya/ /drag ldan bsam pas skyabs song la/ /dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /dmigs pa'i spyi bor bsgoms byas nas/ /dbu 
417a1(rgyud 'grel): ma gnyis ni sprad byas la/ /snying dbus hUM las sgo rnams bkag /sems rten hUM ni yar 'phangs te/ /bla ma'i hUM ni snying khar bsdu/ /'dod che 'og tu mi dgug go /yang na sgo gzhan bkag rjes la/ /rtsa gnyis thabs shes yi
417a2(rgyud 'grel): ges dgag /snying dbus dbu mar zla khaM hUM/ /de stengs hUM ni skar mda' ltar/ /'jug pa'i rlung dang sbyar bar bya/ /yang na 'od kyis 'pho ba ste/ /gzhu dbyibs 'khrul 'khor bya rjes su/ /lte bar rlung bcas zla bar hUM/ /snying dbus gong bus bu ga
417a3(rgyud 'grel): dgag /stobs kyi yi ges sems drangs nas/ /lha yi thugs kar 'phangs te bsre/ /gnas gzhan gang du skye 'dod par/ /yi ge gsum gyis drangs ta 'phangs/ /yang na spros med rnal 'byor pa/ /sna tshogs stong pa'i gzugs nyid las/ /'od
417a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal dang du 'pho ba ste/ /phyag rgya chen po nyid 'gyur ro/ /rang gi sems gong du 'pho ba'i man ngag slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi gdams pa de nyid kyi mdzad pa'o/ /paN+Di ta rgya gar mngon shes can dang/ /bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos khu bas bsgyur ba las
417a5(rgyud 'grel): phyis sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba d+har baN A tsarya dang/ lo tsa ba shes rab rin chen gyis gyi grong du bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// //byin gyis rlabs pa'i rim pa dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pas
417a6(rgyud 'grel): ri dang dur khrod du/ /rim pa gnyis dang bzlas pa dang/ /mdun bskyed mchod dang gtor ma sogs/ /phul la bla ma las lung nod/ /rang nyid dpal ldan dmar po'i sku/ /gong bu nyid du gsal ba yi/ /n+ya gro d+ha'i sdong po ni/ /brgya byin gnas su sleb
417a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtser/ /bla ma lhar lta dbu ma yi/ /sgo ni rab tu dbye bar bya/ /snying ga nas hUM ni skar mda' bzhin/ /steng gi sgo nas rab 'phangs te/ /rdo rje gsum dang dbyer med de/ /bsre ba gsum ni dran byas nas/ /spros med nyid la sems gzhag bya/ /ye shes
417b1(rgyud 'grel): chen pos byin rlob 'gyur/ /'pho ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bla ma shar phyogs pa chen po d+har paN A tsArya dang/
417b2(rgyud 'grel): glo bo lo tsa ba dge slong pradz+nyA ratNas sku mkhar nyi gzungs su bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ agne de ba pU dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ me'i lha mchod pa zhes bya ba/ /ma lus gdug pa'i sems ldan pa/ /bla ma la ni sdang
417b3(rgyud 'grel): ba sogs/ /gzhom phyir drag byed cho ga ni/ /gshin rje 'joms mdzad mchod phyir bshad/ /'bum ni yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ /dge ba'i mtshan ma mthong 'gyur zhing/ /lha dang bla mas mthong 'gyur na/ /'grub 'gyur gzhan du nyams par 'gyur//
417b4(rgyud 'grel): dus dang thabs dang rdzas dang ni/ /cho gas bsgrub par bya ba ste/ /rnam dag bzhir ni shes par bya/ /sgrub po snyen pa mthar son dus/ /drag po'i stobs dang mig dmar sogs/ /drag po'i gza' skar rgyu ba'i dus/ /mar ngo'i zla ba'i bcu bzhi sogs/ /drag byed
417b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus/ /rgyu ni rlung ni rgyu ba'i dus/ /dgun smad mtshan phyed dbyar gyi smad/ /sna bug g.yon nas rlung rgyu'i dus/ /g.yul 'gyed la sogs skye bo rnams/ /rab tu 'khrugs pa'i sems ldan dus/ /'di ni drag po me yi lha/ /mchod
417b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnam dag dus su bshad/ /de nas gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /byang du gnas dang mdog nag dang/ /rtsub cing tsher ma skye ba dang/ /drag po'i lha tshogs gnas pa'i phyogs/ /de ni dran byed me'i gnas/ /thab sogs cho ga bshad par bya/ /thab
417b7(rgyud 'grel): khung gru gsum sor nyi shu/ /zabs su sor bcu ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje dang ni rtse gsum bri/ /zla ba rdo rje mtshan sna tshogs/ /rdzas kyi rim pa bshad bya ba/ /rnga mo'i rtug pa rdo thal dang/ /me tog nag po tsher ma'i shing/ /sor brgyad khrag spags
418a1(rgyud 'grel): tsha ba gsum/ /dug khrag skye tshe lan tsha dang/ /dgra'i dri ma la sogs dang/ /mar til 'bras so nas sran gro/ /dur ba ku sha thod par bsre/ /mdog nag gzugs dang rus sbal gzugs/ /zhe sdang so 'chang khro gnyer ldan/ /gdong
418a2(rgyud 'grel): nag mig ni dgrad pa'o/ /dgra po dgu dang bral zhing dbye/ /hUM ldan ku shas gsang gtor brim/ /oM badzra satwa a/ /ku sha bkram la me ni spar/ /shan pa 'am ro bsregs me yis so/ /oM agne dzwA la dzwA la raM/ me dbus raM las byung ba yi//
418a3(rgyud 'grel): ra nag zhon pa khros pa'i gzugs/ /bgrang phreng ril pa dbyug pa can/ /drang srong nag pos bskor cing gnag /de nas dgug cing spyan drangs te/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM oM e hye hi ma hA b+hu ta de ba ri Shi di dzwa dzwa(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): oM agne kro d+ha de dza phaT/ oM
418a4(rgyud 'grel): badzra Nri ti khaM phaT/ oM badzra arg+haM phaT/ oM badzra puShpe phaT/ oM badzra d+hu pe phaT/ oM badzra A lo ke phaT oM badzra nai bi dya phaT/ oM badzra shapta phaT/ mchod pa'o/ /dzi a/ ku ru ku ru/ puShpa d+hu pa/ dI pa/ gand+ha/ nai bi dya/ shapta/ oM dang swAhAs
418a5(rgyud 'grel): thog mthar brgyan/ /sbyang ba'o/ /chu gnyis ya ra de bzhin du/ /me lha'i kha la rab bkod la/ /pus mo'i bar bcug lag pa yis/ /gsum mam bdun du g.yas nas dbul/ ag ne/ sarba ba baM da ha na/ badzrA ya/ badzra bu sha ya/ sarba pA baM
418a6(rgyud 'grel): b+ha wa ta/ a pra te he ta ya/ ha bi ka ya/ ma hA ba la/ badzra g+hasma ri/ bo d+hi b+hik+Sha ya/ oM dang swAhAs thog mthar brgyan/ oM agne de ba ri Shi mahA te dza gnod byed mA ra ya phaT/ de nas snying gar lha'i gzugs ji bzhin bskyed la de bzhin
418a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod/ /oM ya man+ta kA mu ka ta mu ka ta mA ra ya phaT/ oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri ta na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badzra bet+ta li/ a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ dzi na dzi ka/ ratna d+h+ri ka/ A ro li ka /pradz+nyA d+h+rig/ mo ha ra ti/ dwe Sha ra tI/ rA ga ra tI/ badzra ra tI/
418b1(rgyud 'grel): mung+ga ra d+h+ri ka/ daN+Da d+h+rika/ pad+ma d+h+rika/ khaDga d+h+rika/ a mu ka ma ra ya phaT/ ces pa ni khyad par ro/ /de nas mchod cing bstod de bsdu/ /slar yang lhag mas drang srong mchod/ /tshangs mgon mchog gi sras po gzi dang ldan/ me yi las steng 'jig rten
418b2(rgyud 'grel): me yi lha/ /'bar ba'i nang na sku brjid rgyan gyis klubs/ /phyag 'tshal 'dod don byin pa khyer brtson mdzod/ /bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya/ /dngos grub zhu zhing lhag chad bskang/ /gsang dang rengs pa la sogs pa/ /ji ltar yi sbyor bas
418b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /de ltar gshin rje gshed dpal mchod pa yis/ /srid gsum nyon mongs bud shing kun bsregs nas/ /'gro ba'i mun sel ye shes lnga 'od 'bar/ /rdo rje me yi go 'phangs la gnas shog /dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
418b4(rgyud 'grel): drag byed me'i cho ga zhes bya ba dngos grub brnyes pa dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har paN a tsarya dang/ dge slong shes rab rgyal mtshan gyis mang yul du bsgyur
418b5(rgyud 'grel): cing zhus pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a mri tA d+hiSh+Ta na nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas/ /gshin rje gshed
418b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal gnyer byed na/ de yi bsten bya dam tshig ni/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa bshad/ /de la rnal 'byor pas dben pa'i gnas ri'i phug gaM dur khrod la sogs pa mi'i skye bos dben par byas la/ /bcud ma nyams pa'i dri chen dang//
418b7(rgyud 'grel): g+han 'dzi dang/ ba ru ra dang/ a ru ra dang/ bla ba dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ bu ram dang/ so ga'i dus ma yin pa'i dus su 'dus byas pa'i pa ra na dang/ legs par sbyar ba'i ril bu u rin d+ha pa'i snod dang/ la ba dmar po'i na bza' 
419a1(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa sta gon du byas la/ ji skad bshad pa'i rim pa nyis sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang gtor ma 'ang phul zhing/ /slob dpon la yon phul nas 'khod la/ /lhan cig skyes dga' i gnyug ma'i bde ba che/ /gnyis
419a2(rgyud 'grel): med mnyam sbyor srid zhi dus kyi dgra /dpal ldan phyag 'tshal 'dir ni brtser dgongs nas/ /brtan g.yo 'jigs mdzad dam tshig mchog stsol mdzod/ /ces lan gsum mo/ /de nas slob dpon gyis ji ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten thams
419a3(rgyud 'grel): cad de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor shes te rang gi bu byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /snying gar dbu ma'i nang du hUM ngo/ /phyogs bzhir b+h+ruM aM dzriM khaM ngo/ /dbus dang mtshams bzhir mu bi shu ma ra'o/ /kha dog ni rigs dang mthun
419a4(rgyud 'grel): par ro/ /de bzhin du lte ba dang mgrin par yang dgod par bya'o/ /de nas lus kyi 'dug stangs dang rlung ran par bya zhing/ /snying ga'i yi ge las so so'i kha dog dang mthun pa'i 'od zer byung nas ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
419a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las sku lnga'i rnam par bkug ste/ /yi ge lnga la so sor bsdu'o/ /de lta bu'i rim pa kho na ye shes las 'byung ba lnga sbyang zhing slar yang yum lnga'i rnam pas bsdu'o/ /de bzhin du lte ba
419a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mgrin pa las kyang ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa sbyang ba'i phyir ro/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras dus kyi dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir ro/ /phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga dang/ nyon mongs pa ni bdud te/ ye shes su byin gyis brlab pa'i
419a7(rgyud 'grel): phyir ro/ /de yang dus gsum du gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /slar yang 'og gi 'khor lo yi ge dang bcas pa snying kha'i hUM la bsdu zhing yi ge brgyad kyang bsdus te/ de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan bdud rtsi lnga'i ngo bo hUM cha lnga
419b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rnam pas bstim zhing/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI(rgyud 'grel): bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ pany+tsa mri todg+ha Ta sa ma yA tiSh+Tha badzra dzA dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/(rgyud 'grel): mung+ga ra h+ri ha ha ha ha hUM/ spyi bor me tog dang bcas pas brtan par bya ste/ 'dod pa la sogs pa dang/ dus gsum gyi dngos
419b2(rgyud 'grel): grub rigs lnga dang/ dpa' mo lnga dang/ ye shes lnga la sogs pa'ang brtan g.yo thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par shes pa hUM 'di'o/ /zhes nges par byas la/ dag pa rjes su dran pas rnam par shes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes sgyu ma lta
419b3(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ngo bo nyid rtag tu chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos shing g.yo ba med pa nyid la sems gnas par byas la sems bla mas rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas chad med pa'i sems kyis bzlas pa dang gdug pa can rnams bzlog par bya'o/ /de nas yang
419b4(rgyud 'grel): ji skad gsungs pa'i ril bu 'am/ thod pa char gis bkang ba slob ma la sbyin zhing/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo'i/ dngos grub bdud rtsi las byung ba/ sngags mchog gis rab bsngags pa/ /dam tshig 'di ni khyod la sbyin/ /des kyang blangs te 'thungs
419b5(rgyud 'grel): pas lus thams cad byang chub sems kyi rgyun gyis gang ste/ zag pa med pa'i bde bas tshim ste/ 'dod pa'i sred pa ma lus pa zad nas bde ba dang rab tu mi rtog pa'i ye shes zung du 'jug pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas rgyun ma chad par
419b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum mam/ bdun nam thun bzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nus pas bstan par bya ste phan yon ni dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyad las gsungs pa'i rim dang mthar thugs pa ni dam tshig 'dis bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed mang po nyid mngon du byed
419b7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid las thos so/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi du bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dar paN A tsarya dang/ /

420a2(rgyud 'grel): tsakra rak+Sha d+hiSh+ThA na priSh+Tha yo ba de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i byin brlabs dang/ phyir bzlog pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid gsum ro mnyam bde
420a3(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ /dpal ldan gshin rje 'joms mdzad la/ /btud de de yi 'phrin las ni/ /bsgrub phyir 'phrul 'khor cho ga bshad/ /bsnyen pa byas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ji lta'i sbyor bas 'khrul 'khor rnams/ /sgrub na de'i byin gyis brlabs//

420a5(rgyud 'grel): byin la bsgo/ /de nas dad bcas slob ma ni/ /khrus byas thal mo sbyar byas la/ /bla ma la ni phyogs par gzhag /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs dang/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i sdom pa sbyin/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las rab 'byams//

420b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas/ /g.yon du 'god par bya ba nyid/ /lho ru ma yats+tsha yig go /nub tu yi ge me do ni/ /byang gi gsum la do ru Na/ /rtsibs mtshams 'god pa'i yi ge ni/ /na yo ni ra lan gsum mo/ /de nas ri mig phyi ma la/ /oM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya ma do ru
420b2(rgyud 'grel): Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM phaT swAhA/ 'khor lo kha sbyar rab dmigs la/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal ba'i 'phrin las thams cad dang/ /mthu dang yon tan kun bsdus la/ /snying dang 'grin pa'i 'khor
420b3(rgyud 'grel): lo gzhug /slob dpon dmar po'i 'khor lo'ang/ /ji ltar me ni me gcig la/ /mar me gcig chad ji bzhin du/ /ma nyams 'phel ba 'phangs pa bzhin/ /slob ma'i snying dang 'grin par klan/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang/ /rtsa ba'i sngags
420b4(rgyud 'grel): ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /yi ge bcu gnyis lung byin la/ /bris zhing bsgrub pa byas pa yi/ /'khor lo'i rdzas ni lag byin la/ /brtan phyir rdo rje spyi bor gzhag /tiSh+Tha badzra tsakra rak+Sha sa ma ya mu dra ho/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i bcud kun las/ /mi bskyod zhi dang
420b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang byed pa/ /sngon spyod dam pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /rab 'byam las rnams bsgrub phyir zung/ /'di ni ding nas gzung byas te/ /mi 'bral bar ni bya ba'o/ /de ni rjes su gnang ba yi/ /las ni thog med myur ba dang/ /lha mnyes pa dang rim gnyis kyis//
420b6(rgyud 'grel): grog gyi dam par 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan du 'khor lo rtsom pa ni/ /mi mkhas 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing/ /sngar byas dngos grub gang 'dod pa/ /phye phung chu la sogs bzhin no/ /'khrul 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa/ mkhas zhing grub pa brnyes
420b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal 'dzin chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //de nas yang dag bshad pa ni/ /gsang dang rengs dang bskrad la sogs/ /bya 'am gzhan gyis byas kyang rung/ /phyir bzlog rim ba'ang gsal/
421a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /'jigs dang bar chod mtshan ma 'am/ /rmi sogs ngan pa byung gyur tshe/ /bzlog pa drug tu bya ba ste/ /rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin/ /rlung dang mnyam med dag dang ni/ /srung ba med pa'i bsrung ba'o/ /de la re zhig rnal 'byor
421a2(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /seng ldang dbyug pa gla rtsi dang/ /gi baM shu dag gu gul dang/ /gand+ha til dang yungs kar dang/ mi min gyi ru si la dang/ /tsan dan dmar sogs de bzhin du/ /li khri mtshal dkar 'dus byas la/ /sa bon sngags las bcu gsum ltar/ /bskyed
421a3(rgyud 'grel): la bcu gsum gnas su bzhag/ hUM k+She ma me dang dza sa do ru yats+tsha ni rA/ /snying ga mig dang rna ba lnga/ /kha dang lte ba'i 'og bsgo gnyis/ /brla gnyis phrag ba gnyis dang ni/ /de bzhin spyi bo'i gtsug la reg/ ji ltar zhe sdang gshed sogs sgom//
421a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzas rnams bsdus te lus la bcang/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug drang srong sogs/ /log par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis/ /nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyi'i byad rdzas kyis phyir bzlog pa'o/ /shin tu ngan par byed pa yi/ /rig 'dzin la
421a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs mong gyur na/ /de bzlog pa'i cho ga ni/ /tshad med sems sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /gsang sngags gsum gyis dag par bya/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ nam mkha' i dkyil du bsam bya ba/ /paM raM las byung pad nyi'i steng/ /sna
421a6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rdo rje yongs gyur pa'i/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgom bya ste/ /rtsibs bcu mu khyud lte bar bcas/ /b+h+ruM las byung ba'i gnas bcu la/ /hUM byung rgyu dang bsre ba las/ /ji ltar 'byung ba'i khro bo bskyed/ /dbus su rang nyid gshin rje
421a7(rgyud 'grel): gshed/ /mdog gnag mkhros pa ma he'i steng/ /de ltar bskyed nas cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje gsum du bya ba dang/ /zhug dang bcir sogs legs byas nas/ /Tak+ki rA dza grangs med pas/ /gnod byed gdung zhing dgug la gzhug/ rdo rje'i go gon ting
421b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ni/ /snying ga'i sems dpa' i gnas su srung bya ni/ /dmigs la bzlas te 'khor bas so/ /dus dus gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /gzir ba'i sbyin sreg mtshan phyed na/ /khro bo bcu la sbyin par bya/ /phyi'i byad sngags kyis phyir bzlog pa'o/ /gal te rnal 'byor laM pa la
421b2(rgyud 'grel): rtog dang mtshan mas g.yangs pa'i byad/ /bde bzlog pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /rlung gi sbyor ba brtsam bya ste/ /u pa tan+ta d+ha ru na/ /Da mi bya gra mu sa la/ /g.yo dang 'jug pa'i rlung gzung ste/ /dbu mar rgyu ba ye shes rlung/ /kun byed rnam rtog 'joms pa'o/ /nyon mongs
421b3(rgyud 'grel): las kyi rlung shugs dang/ /ye shes chen por byed ba ste/ /su yi mthus kyang mi tshugs so/ /nang byed rlung gis phyir bzlog pa'i/ /gdon dang 'jigs dang byad dang nang/ /bar du bcod pa'i chos rnams kun/ /phyi rol gyur pa la yin pas/ /phan tshun
421b4(rgyud 'grel): bsre ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /ji ltar dgu la bdud rtsi bzhin/ /bar gcod ye shes chen por bya/ /'jigs sogs rtog pa'i bdud byung na/ /'dzin mkhan rtog pa rang nyid kyang/ /pha rol gdon du bsgyur byas la/ /gdon nyid gang yin 'dod byar bya/ /de ltar
421b5(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid gnod byed ni/ /lhang lta pha rol de bzhin no/ /de nas bla ma dran byas nas/ /ji snyed brtan g.yo lha dang sngags/ /su yis su la gnod byed pa/ /'khrul ba'i mtshan ma rang sar grol/ /'dzin pa kun bshig spros med kyi/ /ting 'dzin chen po skye bar
421b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /nang gi byad ting nge 'dzin gyis phyir bzlog pa'o/ /mthar thugs ye shes bdud gyur pa/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba 'dor 'dod dang/ /blang bya mya ngan 'das pa ste/ /gnyis su rgyu ba nyid yin no/ /de nyid lam du bya ba yang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
421b7(rgyud 'grel): gsung bzhin bshad/ /dmyal sogs 'khor ba'ang legs gshes na/ /sangs rgyas nyid las ma g.yos te/ /phung po lnga ru gnas phyir ro/ /ye shes lnga ni yin pa'i phyir/ /lus kyi dri chen la sogs lnga/ /bde gshegs lnga nyid bdud rtsi lnga//
422a1(rgyud 'grel): rig ma lngar ni bzhugs phyir ro/ /rgyal sras brgyad du gnas phyir ro/ /lha mo drug tu gnas phyir ro/ /'jigs byed bcu ni yin phyir ro/ /de ltar thams cad sangs rgyas kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'ba' zhig rang bzhin la/ /nad 'joms sman la dug
422a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /'ga' zhig 'di la dong byar 'dzin/ /gal te 'khor ba nyid yin yang/ /'khor ba thog ma dbus mdza' med/ /skye dang 'gag pa kun kyang spang/ /skad cig rdul gyi cha spangs la/ /yod min med min yod pa'ang min/ /sgyu ma'i glang po ji
422a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /skye la skye ba yod min pas/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bus sgyu ma yi/ /bud med 'dor bdag dang mtshungs/ /de ltar bsgoms pas 'khor ba la/ /'dor 'dod ma spangs par yang grol/ /gal te rang nyid bde ba yi/ /zag med dbyings la
422a4(rgyud 'grel): sems dga' na/ /gnyis med snying rje lhan cig skyes/ /zung du 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ /don gnyis 'byor pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /bdag don kho na ma yin te/ /'bangs rnams bde la mi 'god par/ /rgyal srid rang bde'i phyir bzung na/ /gzhan phung
422a5(rgyud 'grel): mjug tu bdag kyang phung/ /bdag ni til tsam med pa'i phyir/ /bdag gi don gyis ci zhig bya/ /bdag med ye shes lhan skyes kyis/ bdag se med ma lus rab bcang nas/ /gzhan don kho na'i blo yis ni/ /mi gnas lhan cig skyes dga' i mchog/
422a6(rgyud 'grel): brjod min cir yang snang ba nyid/ /rang bzhin spros dang bral ba ni/ /shel la tshon gyi kha dog ltar/ /sna tshogs stong pa'i gzugs nyid ni/ /bde stong gsal zhing mi rtog pa/ /brtan g.yos sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /yongs su khyab
422a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /spros med byang chub sems su gnas/ /gang du btsal yang mi rnyed de/ /bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po/ /lhan cig skye dga' zung 'jug ni/ /gdod nas gnas pa yin phyir ro/ /de ltar shes pas 'khor 'das la/
422b1(rgyud 'grel): blang dor nam mkha' i sprin bzhin du/ rang bzhin gyis ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /mthar thug ye shes kyi byad rnal 'byor gnyis kyis phyir bzlog pa'o// //de ltar bla ma'i drin las thob par gang gyur pa/ /gshin rje gshed dpal gsang ba'i
422b2(rgyud 'grel): man ngag gsang ba 'di/ /dri med ji bzhin gsal bar byas la nongs pa kun/ /chos dbyings yin phyir ye shes che rnams bzod mdzad rigs/ /gnyug mar gnas pa bde chen snying rjes brlab gyur pa/ /bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad dpal ldan dus bkrar mang
422b3(rgyud 'grel): po nyid/ /'di byas dge ba'i mthu yis srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus pas/ /chu la chu ltar rang gi ye shes chen po rig cig rtogs gyur cig /phyir zlog pa'i man ngag gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba/ /bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i
422b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi gdams pa/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub mchog brnyas pa'i dpal 'dzin gyi mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a nu pa ma rak+Shi ta dang/ lo tsa ba dang ma yon tan gyis bsgyur cing
422b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan la phab pa'o/ /dus phyis chos kyi rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi gzungs su/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi mkha' pa chen po dang phan A tsarya dang/ /lo tsa ba blo bo shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus so/ /'di'i dpe skabs su rgya gar bal bo thams
422b6(rgyud 'grel): cad du rgyun chad pa las phyis dbu rgyan du mkha' 'gro ma brgya mtsho'i gos can las/ rnal 'byor sen te wa len tas zhus te byung ngo// //(las kyi gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs//) //

423a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud ces bya bas te/ /'gro ba kun gyi lus kyi bsdud/ /lus dang grib ma'i tshul bzhin du/ /'gro ba kun la snang bas te/ /phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o/ /'jigs pa de'i gzugs mthong na/ /ya ma de'i dri bar 'byung//
423a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang gi srog (lhan cig skyes pa'i) bi bdud/ /gang gis bdud na lhag pa'i ji ltar gnas na phyogs na gnas pas gang la yod na te/ /brtsigs pa can la phyag de kun gyi srog len par bya srog 'tshal lo/ /de la 'chi bdag skyes ste gshin rje bu'i
423a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs/ /ga khru gang yi dags len pas gos la bri/ /nag po zhal gcig phyag rtsa gshin rje'i gdan lta bu ste gnyis pa/ /mche ba 'jigs pa ral pa mche bzhi brtsigs/ /rgyan med gzugs bstan rdo rje ste sprul rus pa'i phred ba can/ /? g.yas
423a4(rgyud 'grel): pas ya ma'i dbyug pa can/ /sdig rongs sa 'dzub zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /ma gdan he dag la gnas pa bri// de su rung ba nas rnal 'byor chen po yis/ /mdun du gnas la zhi sgrub dang stag gnas bya/ /yang nas ti
423a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam gsum las/ /yang na hUM las nag po chen pos te/ /yi ge bcu gcig brjod byas la/ /ras la bris pa bzhin du bsgom/ /bsgrub po oM ka la rU ba ya ma ya me'i rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas bsnyen pa bya bar oM 'am ? gtor ma gri gug?
423a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i na phyag mtshan lta bu gsungs/ /dur khrod nags tshal song byas la/ /bzlas brjod byas pa'i tshul dag gis/ /ha ha bzhad cing 'ong bar rigs/ /sngon du gyur nas b+ha li sbyin/ /de la bsnyen pa'i zhes snying po 'di'o/ /oM ka la rU pa b+hi ma
423a7(rgyud 'grel): yak+Sha hUM/ /ma hA ro sha na/ dben bcu bzhi ra sid 'jigs byed kyi d+hi ya sarba b+hu ta a d+hi ba ta brtags ya/ bam/ dang po rmi lam du ya ma ra dza ye hUM phaT swAhA/ thog ma bsnyen pa dang gtor ma gnyis 'ong ba la thog ma mdza' thog ma dang yang dag ldan//
423b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu bzhi phye ba bsnyen pa yin/ /rim pa bzhin du ma phye ba/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par shes/ /grub te mngon du gyur pa na/ /sha chen gtor ma chen po sbyin/ /oM ka la ru pa ya ma rA dzA hUM i daM ba li grih+na kha kha khA hi khA hi tshogs la sogs pa sngon du sbyin/ /de ltar grub nas las byas
423b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ /ban d+ha mtshan ngan bzang po brtsal/ /dum bu gcig gam gnyis pa la/ /bral ba'i ngos nas rtag par drang/ /ma thod dag la ro ras la/ /gnod sbyin pe ba sa ha'i gzugs/ /snag cha bya rog khrag dang ni/ /dur khrod sol ba bod bu'i chus/ /mi rkang smyu
423b3(rgyud 'grel): gus legs par bri/ /spyi bo'i ngos kyis phyogs dag la/ /rab la 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /dgra don ra ya phaT rim pa gsum bskor ldan pa la/ /rim pa gnyis pa dag la ni/ /rtsibs gnyis gnyis kyi tshad la bris/ /de la gsang sngags dgod pa ni/ /
423b4(rgyud 'grel): ma ma shi truM a mu kaM /'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su bri/ /shar nas brtsams 'di ltar bri/ /tro sa ya/ tro yi yaM/ a gad ta yi/ a gat+te ya/ sho sha ya/ sho sha ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa batso/ /ban d+ha ban d+hi/ tsur na tsur ni/ rim pa tha ma dag
423b5(rgyud 'grel): la ni/ /shar nas brtsams nas 'di ltar bri/ /tsak+Sha badzra na g+ho ra pa tra ye/ k+She tra bA la/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hina d+ha b+hina d+ha/ thAM kaM b+ha dza pA ti/ ru d+ha ma/ arg+haM pa/ oM mA ra yaM/ badzra ye badzra ye satwaM b+ha ya hUM phaT/ bar du dgra'i ming rus bri/ /rgyab srubs
423b6(rgyud 'grel): dag la gsang sngags gri/ /skud pa sngon po nag po yis/ /s+thod pa de ni bsnam par bya/ /ro shing me la ban d+ha sogs/ /de ltar zhag gsum byas nas kyang/ /las kyi 'chi bdag khru gang ba/ /zhal gcig mche brtsigs phyag gnyis pa/ /grog mkhar bdun
423b7(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam snang dang/ /dur khrod sol ba'i rgyu dag la/ /bong bu chu yis gzugs byas te/ /de'i snying khang thod pa gzhug /'khor lo la bris sngags bzlas te/ /mar tshes bzhi dang brgyad dag la/ /dur khrod lha khang dag du mnan/ /de ltar las 'di rdzogs
424a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /gang la bya ba'i dngos po de/ /rang gi bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur/ /'chi bdag yi dags rgyal po ni/ /ma dros mtsho'i 'bri dkyil la/ /ri nang dgu'i ha mdza' ste/ /spos dang ri bo'i bar dag na/ /mchu dang zheng du cha mnyam mcho//
424a2(rgyud 'grel): de 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og /'chi bdag yi dags rgyal po'i gnas/ /'gro ba lhag pa'i phyogs na gnas/ /de'i yum de tsa mun dri/ /rabs chad pho mo'i thod pa la/ /ya gnyis dag gi bar du yang/ /ro ras dag la gzugs bri ba/ /zhal
424a3(rgyud 'grel): dang phyag zhabs sngon bzhin bri/ /de la 'chi bdag tsa mun tri/ /nag mo mig gsum khro gnyer can/ /kha gdangs skra rjes nu ma 'phyad/ /gsus chen dud 'gro'i gos gyon la/ /g.yas na tri shul g.yon pa yang/ /mi'i thod pa dag dang sbyar/ /mi'i rgyus pas
424a4(rgyud 'grel): bsdams pa yi/ /bar du 'khor lo gzhug par bya/ /de nas 'chi bdag 'khor lo ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de la ya ma pho mo'i 'khor lo ni/ /ras la 'chi bdag tshul bzhin du/ /rtsibs brgyad gnyis dang ldan pa'i/ /dbus nas brtsams nas 'di
424a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bri/ /ma ma sarba sha hUM/ lte ba'i dbus su bri bar bya/ /shar nas rim pas 'di bzhin bri/ /a mu ka syi/ du na du na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma thA/ pra ma thAM/ hUM dzwA ra dza ri/ /dza re na bya/ d+hi ro ge nA/ rim pa tha ma dag la
424a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shar nas rim pas 'di lta ste/ /nyi ga na shi baM/ yi raM ri tshus ya/ ya baM sha ya/ dzam baM h+ri da ya/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ ma de pa shi baM/ ma ra ya/ na sha ya/ hUM phaT/ 'khor lo gnyis kyi bar du yang/ /gang la bya ba'i ming rus
424a7(rgyud 'grel): gzhug /bla mas 'chi bdag bsam byas te/ /srog gi snyong po gdon par bya/ /gos sngon gyon pas de bzhin du/ /yum ma las mkhan dpa' bo ni/ /yum gyi srog snying bcug pa gdon/ /oM h+ri tsa muN Di baM hUM phaT swAhA/ yab yum 'khor lo gang yin pa
424b1(rgyud 'grel): gong gi thod par gzhug par bya/ /shi ba'i skra'i skud pa 'am/ /mi rgyas dag gis mkhas pas bsdam/ /mi'i rgyus pas gzungs thag bya/ /gtso dang gzungs kyi bzung byas nas/ /maN+Dal steng bzhag bzlas pa bya/ /'khor lo steng 'og sngags bzla ba/ /gtso dang brdzungs
424b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'bum phrag bzlas/ /de nas bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang/ /dur khrod dam ni lha khang dam/ /lha klu drag po'i gnas su mnan/ /lha la sogs pa shi bar bstan/ /de'i bsgrub pa'i gnas rnams kyang/ /dben pa'i phyogs su byas nas ni/ /bla ma pha ma mchod pa'i
